host.host_about:
Gosto de socializar!
De conhecer novos lugares e as artes nelas contidas

address.street: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal
address.government_area: Santa Marinha e São Pedro da Afurada

reviews.comments: The place is just beautiful and very nice. Jorge is really open minded and really convenient. Everything was perfect, We recommend Jorge to everyone! :)
Great ! Just great !
I recommend it. Perfect

Jorge is such a lovely host, very accommodating and friendly. The area is close to the city bus 15min or 5 by car. The apartment is charming and perfect for a couple or single traveler. Supermarket and two big shopping centers  + cinema, 5-6 min away. I stayed for a couple of weeks and couldn't be happier.

name: Luxury condo with free indoor parking
summary: Beautiful Studio with stunning views and free indoor  parking in the heart of downtown. Dare to discover this magnificent place and its surroundings, close to awesome shops, restaurants, art centers, parks, and universities. New building with gym, indoor pool and rooftop terrace with BBQ grills and breathtaking panoramic views are additional reasons for choosing this place next time you visit Montreal.
space: This superb unit features a private balcony overlooking the colourful Montreal landscape and includes a free indoor parking spot located in the basement of the building, cable TV with sports, movies and variety channels, unlimited high-speed internet and fully equipped kitchenette with amenities, including silverware, cooking-ware, toaster, tea kettle and Tassimo coffee maker. A 46-inch LCD TV, washer, dryer and other appliances are also available for your comfort.
description: Beautiful Studio with stunning views and free indoor  parking in the heart of downtown. Dare to discover this magnificent place and its surroundings, close to awesome shops, restaurants, art centers, parks, and universities. New building with gym, indoor pool and rooftop terrace with BBQ grills and breathtaking panoramic views are additional reasons for choosing this place next time you visit Montreal. This superb unit features a private balcony overlooking the colourful Montreal landscape and includes a free indoor parking spot located in the basement of the building, cable TV with sports, movies and variety channels, unlimited high-speed internet and fully equipped kitchenette with amenities, including silverware, cooking-ware, toaster, tea kettle and Tassimo coffee maker. A 46-inch LCD TV, washer, dryer and other appliances are also available for your comfort. Let me know how can I make your stay more pleasant. Guests can enjoy local restaurants, theatres and shops along St. Catheri
neighborhood_overview: Guests can enjoy local restaurants, theatres and shops along St. Catherine Street, less than 5 minutes' walk away. Sherbrooke Street, featuring art galleries and museums, is less than 10 minutes' walk away. The Old Port of Montreal is 10 minutes' drive away.
notes: Indoor swimming pool Awesome Gym Rooftop terrace with BBQ grills Free indoor parking space (in the basement) Washer & Dryer (in the unit)
transit: Metro stations, including Atwater and Guy-Concordia stations are in close proximity. Guy-Concordia metro station is just a 9 min walk away.
interaction: Let me know how can I make your stay more pleasant.

reviews.comments: Wonderful condo in an excellent location. Carlos was incredibly hospitable and friendly! Thanks for the lovely stay!

My girlfriend and I stayed here for Memorial weekend and the place was very convient to the center of town, the metro, restaurants and shopping. The apartment was modern and quiet and the underground parking was a huge plus! Carlos was pleasant and responsive to any questions we had and we would highly recommend his place to anyone traveling to Montreal.
Everything was great! Carlos is very nice. The place was well stocked, in a good location, and a good size!

Superbe place! Very clean and easy access. Carlos was fantastic with accomodating us with 2 parking spots. Although we were 2 couples, good thing we brought a throw cover and pillows for the pull out because their were none other than that fantastic. We would definitely rebook with Carlos.

Carlos and this apartment really check all the boxes on what an AirBNB should be. The location is great, the price is great, and Carlos is so helpful and flexible. I'll be staying here again on my next trip back to Montreal.

Amazing place to stay, which is located at the downtown, Carlos was very helpful host and takes care of your needs.
I enjoyed my stay here and definitely look forward to stay in the future.
Thanks Carlos for the excellent hospitality extended to us.

Das Apartment von Carlos liegt in Gehdistanz zu Downtown Montréal und ist damit idealer Ausgangspunkt für die Besichtigung der Stadt. Es ist neuwertig und verfügt über alle Annehmlichkeiten, die ein Tourist braucht. Trotz der zentralen Lage verbringt man die Nacht dank moderner Bauweise sehr ruhig. Das Waschen unserer Kleider war problemlos möglich.
Muy recomendable. Un apartamento con todo lo que se puede necesitar, todas comodidades. Un barrio tranquilo y muy bien comunicado, tanto del centro Como del aeropuerto.
Carlos was a great host who was very flexible and incredibly easy to communicate with. We had a great time and would recommend the spot to anyone looking for a few days in a great part of the city!

I exspecially enjoyed the cleanliness and the excellent quality of the entire décor, the functionality of the items, the studio apartment is really cozy cheap compared to the offer of hotels and residences in montréal. If you have special space requirements, it is best to point to a two-room apartment, here the bed, although separate from the living room/kitchenette, is visible. My review is great, i would recommend it, even for a stay longer than two weeks that i and my husband spent there.

Perfect place.

The unit is new, clean and everything works perfectly. The location is excellent, downtown (close to Guy Concordia subway station on the green line and to Lucien L'Allier on the orange line) and at less than 5 minutes on foot to St-Catherine Street. 

I loved my time there and I would recommend it to anyone.
Very clean apartment. Carlos met me to hand the keys and explain everything. It si difficult to find better location.
Très belle localisation et très propre. Carlos répond promptement aux demandes. Nous le recommandons.

My husband and I really enjoyed ourselves in Montreal. The location was perfect for us and it was easy to walk to many restaurants and shopping. The condo is beautiful and very clean. We really appreciated all the nice homey touches and that the kitchen had pots and pans and even olive oil. Would highly recommend 
Thank you so much!
it Was brand new condo, very clean and good location.
The apartment is as described and as per photos.
Location is central and metro stations are nearby.Its a nice clean place.
L'appartement est propre, emplacement idéal pour les gens qui aime le centre ville,  hôte réactive, il y'a juste que pour le moment l'immeuble est en construction et ça commence tôt avant 8H00 AM.
Carlos' place was great, conveniently located, super clean, stylish and a great value. Carlos was responsive, check-in was super easy and overall, despite the frigid temps :-)  it was a great stay!!

name: For 4 or 6 - Wonderful Apartment downtown
summary: Cosy and new apartment with very good areas with dining room, living room, kitchen, 2 bedrooms mezzanine with two single beds and bathroom and a sofa bed for two in the second room. Furnished and equipped just in front of Clérigos Tower, the heart of the city. Is about 100 m to Lello´s bookstore and 500 m to S. Bento railway station. The apartment is on the 4th floor with no lift.
space: The apartment is very well located, in one of the most emblematic buildings of the City down town. Is the perfect place to feel the city and its people.
description: Cosy and new apartment with very good areas with dining room, living room, kitchen, 2 bedrooms mezzanine with two single beds and bathroom and a sofa bed for two in the second room. Furnished and equipped just in front of Clérigos Tower, the heart of the city. Is about 100 m to Lello´s bookstore and 500 m to S. Bento railway station. The apartment is on the 4th floor with no lift. The apartment is very well located, in one of the most emblematic buildings of the City down town. Is the perfect place to feel the city and its people. Bus and taxis at the door, subway and train at 500 m. We're very pleased to have you in our city, and at your disposal for any help you need. As you walk out of the apartment building you're close to all trendy restaurants, famous monuments, and by night you can enjoy a fun evening. The "Clérigos Tower" will be your host during your stay, and you'll get to the famous "Lello Book Store" in less than 5 minutes walking distance. In 5 minutes walking distance, yo
neighborhood_overview: As you walk out of the apartment building you're close to all trendy restaurants, famous monuments, and by night you can enjoy a fun evening. The "Clérigos Tower" will be your host during your stay, and you'll get to the famous "Lello Book Store" in less than 5 minutes walking distance.
notes: ACCOMMODATION BULLETIN - According to the "Local Accommodation Law" in Portugal, we are required to deliver to the SEF (Immigration and Borders Service) on the day of the check-in of all NON-PORTUGUESE guests, the "Accommodation Bulletin" with some personal data of the guests. For any questions or clarification about this form, please contact Airbnb. Here the information we need of each guest: Full Name:      Birth Date:      Birth Place:      Nationality:     City of Residence: Country of Residence (Website hidden by Airbnb) Passport Number   or   ID Card Number: TOURIST MUNICIPAL RATE - The Tourist Tax will enter into force on 01 March 2018, with a value of € 2 per overnight stay and per person, up to a maximum total value of € 14 per person (seven straight nights per overnight stay/person). The Tourist Tax is charged on all guests older than 13 years. The Tourist tax is payable by the guests in cash upon arrival.
transit: In 5 minutes walking distance, you can find the "S. Bento Railway Station", the station is beautiful and there you can take the train or metro to longer distance places. About 50 meters from the building there is a public car park, guarded 24 hours a day.
access: Bus and taxis at the door, subway and train at 500 m.
interaction: We're very pleased to have you in our city, and at your disposal for any help you need.

host.host_about: Porto

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: The apartment was absolutely great and in a very good location. The communication with the host was uncomplicated, so was the check-in. Very flexible with the check-in time! Thank you!

Very good accommodation and host
Centrally located and was as described. Manuel was fine with a late departure which was much appreciated. Recommended.

The apartment is very tastefully furnished, well equipped, clean. Communication with Manuel was perfect at any time, and he also has very flexible check-in times. It is very central and you can reach everything on foot. As already described in the description it is on the weekend loud as there are some bars and clubs in the vicinity. This did not bother us, we felt very comfortable & Will come back again.
Appartement très bien situé, très proche des restaurants et bar (à une rue)

Fantastic apartment in a perfect location! The place was very clean and offered everything we needed. Communication with Manuel was superb, very easy check-in and check-out. We loved the apartment and the city of Porto!

This apartment made our stay in Porto, Perfect location in the best part of the city.
Manuel was very fast to reply to any queries we had and was very accommodating.
The air-conditioning was great and all the bathrooms are new and well fitted out.
The Kitchen/Livign room was very generious and had lots of natural light.
Manuel's place is in a beautiful building right in the heart of an increasingly vibrant city and it has the best views in town. We loved the experience, thank you Manuel.

A great place to stay! The flat is very nicely designed, spacious and feels very fresh. It is located next to restaurants, bars and some major Porto attractions so we could walk everywhere we needed. Manuel was also very helpful. He responded very quickly to our messages and sent us many good recommendations where to go!

Everything here is managed on a professional level: communication, check-in, check-out (really appreciated the flexibility!), the presentation of the flat itself.
The house is a beautiful and cleverly organized top floor flat in a building in the middle of the night-life area, perfect to enjoy the city during the entire day.
Absolutely recommended!
Súper anfitrión, el apartamento nos encantó y la ubicación es la mejor! Lo súper recomiendo!

What a treasure! The pictures do not capture how special of a place this is in Porto. Fantastic location, beautiful big windows opening up to the city, very clean and the host/owner Manuel was wonderful! He was very communicative and extremely helpful with tips and suggestions. Would definitely suggest staying here!
Prévoir des bouchons d'oreilles, appartement très bruyant, ainsi que des sachets de thé ou des capsules Nespresso pour le 1er petit déjeuner, ainsi que quelques morceaux de sucre si besoin.
Lovely appartment, very central, Manuel is really kind! everything worked perfectly

A really nice apartment. Incredible location and the facilities available in the apartment were spot on. 
Manuel was very helpful during problems (for example with electricity) and suggesting things (like restaurants, things to see). The only con was: the noise from outside, especially from a couple of clubs around and the people coming from it. And finding a parking spot. The parking garages around the apartment costed way too much, but with a little walk there were a couple cheaper options!

Manuel's place has the best location, is perfect for two couples, clean and really good layout/design. Owner is easy to communicate with, and space has wonderful views. The unit has everything you need for your stay in historic centre of lovely Porto. I really recommend everyone to book this place if possible. Thanks Manuel
Very good

La casa es espectacularmente bonita incluso mejor que en las fotos. Las camas muy cómodas, todo muy limpio y la cocina completa con todo menaje del hogar. Vistas directas a la iglesia de los clérigos y excelente ubicación, además Manuel da unas excelentes indicaciones para poder disfrutar de la ciudad.
Very beautiful appartment in the centre. We stayed for five nights ( family with two kids > 11 yrs). Very clean and stylish rooms. Communication with the owner were optimal!

Es un apartamento con un encanto especial, tiene un salón con unas ventanas grandes y maravillosas vistas, lo que lo distingue de otros muchos. Está fantásticamente ubicado, cómodo y  muy bien equipado. Es monísimo
Fantastic apartment! Location is great, and an amazing space inside with all you'd need. Host was very easy to communicate and sent a very in depth list of things to do. Highly recommend!
Absolute champion. Great host who couldn't do enough for us. Will definitely be back!

We had a great stay, thank you! 
Check in was easy with a safety box. Communication was always within minutes and we had some great recommendations for food. The apartment is as per the photos in a very central location near all the main sites and at the top of the hill which makes walking around easy. Due to its location it is very noisy including through the night with bars nearby. This is mentioned in the listing.

El departamento tiene una excelente ubicación, en pleno centro y cerca de los principales atractivos.  La sala/comedor es amplia y cómoda con balcón que tiene bonita vista. Es perfecto para una familia de cuatro. Totalmente recomendable.
It was the perfect apartment for our quick trip to Porto. Parking was just 50m away, making it so easy for us to walk with our luggage. We'd come back here again !
A really beautiful apartment in the most central location. Manuel was very prompt with communication and we really appreciated his flexibility with late check in/ check out. Thanks Manuel!

Great location, located right (Email hidden by Airbnb) fortable appartment,   equipped with everything. Very nice and authentic look and Manuel is very cooperative. 
Elevator can save lots of energy .we counted 76 stairs to our apartment... 
The only problem was the noises at night. The street sound from trafic and espaicly from the people hunging out.  In total we love the place.

We had a fabulous time staying at Manuel's apartment in Porto. We were four girls so with two twin rooms and two bathrooms it was just perfect. The flat was well equipped in a perfect location close to all of the hub bub of the city which was what we wanted. 

The flat itself itself if really pretty and when if not walking around discovering Porto you'll happily spend time indoors in the bright and airy apartment. 

Manuel was so helpful with organising taxis, checking we were ok via msg and giving us loads of hints and tips to get the most out of weekend. 

Thanks Manuel, we will be back!

The apartment is great! Lovely place, and perfect location. Every picture at the listing is real as advertised.
The place is big enough for 6 people. You should know though that it is a kind of loft place, so there isn't too much privacy. If you don't care for that in your visit, the place is really great. I think it would be difficult to top it at that price
The apartment was right in the centre of Porto and matches the pictures you see. A very nice and clean apartment as well as a great host. Would highly recommend!

The apartment is located in the middle of the action, shops, restaurants, and night life. It has an incredible view over Porto's highest building the Clérigos Church, just across the street. Manuel was very friendly and caring.

O apartamento é muito bem localizado, eu e minha família tivemos uma ótima hospedagem. 
Manuel nos enviou muitas informações e dicas, facilitou bastante nossa hospedagem.
Manuel je bio jako ljubazan. Apartman je bio izrazito čist. Lokacija je savršena. Preporučujem svima.

We enjoyed the days in this wonderful and stylish restored appartement. We didn't miss anything. It was very clean and comfortable. It's a good location with sights, restaurants and shops in walking distance. Manuel did a very good job and gave us a lot of good advices. All questions were answered immediately.
Super Wohnung, 1a gelegen und klasse Kommunikation. Ganz klare Empfehlung.
Amazing location and a really nice and comfortable apartment. Would definitely stay here again/recommend to others!
Inmejorable trato, ubicación y comunicación. Super recomendado.

Sans hésiter allez-y! Beaucoup de charme, parfaitement situé à 5 minutes à pied de la gareet bien équipé. Hôte très attentionné.
4 étages à pied ce n'est rien à Porto :)

Gostámos muito da casa. Está num local muito central. Perto de tudo o que queríamos conhecer! É um 4.º andar sem elevador mas sobe-se razoavelmente  bem. Durante a noite ouve-se barulho na rua, mas isso está muito bem especificado nas observações. Não recomendo para quem tem o sono leve. 
A casa é maravilhosa, a decoração fantástica, ainda é maior do que parece nas fotografias.
Não conhecemos pessoalmente o Manuel mas esteve sempre “presente” , muito atencioso e preocupado.

El apartamento es precioso, especial, más de lo que enseñan las fotos porque su diseño es diferente y difícil de imaginar hasta que lo ves.  Perfecto para cuatro o seis personas con sus dos habitaciones y sofá cama y sus dos baños. Eso sí, uno de los dormitorios está suspendido sobre el salón  por lo que si quieres privacidad o con quien compartes el apartamento ve la tele o tiene encendida la luz y eso te molesta, es un inconveniente. Sin embargo, en mi opinión, es ese dormitorio suspendido sobre el salón lo que le da un encanto especial y es algo que solo una casa antigua con techos abuhardillados, permite. Es un diseño ingenioso que a mí me ha encantado. La única pega, que es un cuarto sin ascensor pero después de las cuestas que hay que subir en Oporto, es una cuesta más, sin más. Además al ser un edificio antiguo, es un encanto más subir una escalera con historia. El apartamento está en pleno centro. La torre de los Clérigos se te cae encima de lo cerca que esta. Al lado, la librería Lello e Irmao, la estación Sao Bento... es una ubicación estupenda, con un parking al lado.... El anfitrión muy atento, nos ha resuelto todas las dudas y nos ha dado buenos consejos. Oporto nos ha encantado y sin ninguna duda, si volvemos nos alojaremos de nuevo en este apartamento. Además de su privilegiada ubicación y su especial diseño, el alojarse en un apartamento con arraigo, sin duda tiene un plus.

We spend 2 night in the Manuel’s apartment and it was great. Location of the flat is amazing, in the heart of the city, near to the Lello bookshop. Manuel is a great host, he responds quickly and gave us many useful tips. If you are going to Porto I highly recommend Manuel’s apartment.
Amazing place!

This was an absolutely amazing apartment!! A beautiful bright space in a perfect location.  A short walk to everything you would want to see in Porto.  Manuel was a great host, although we didn't meet him, check-in instructions were easy and he was always quick to respond if needed.  We would definitely come back to stay here and recommend it to anyone!

My two friends and I very much enjoyed staying here!  The location was perfect, right in the heart of the city and very close to shops, restaurants, and other sights.  Manuel was very helpful with everything and sent some great recommendations.  The apartment was clean and spacious.  We wished we could have stayed longer!

Melhor acomodação que já fiquei. Sinceramente, apartamento bem localizado, os responsáveis pelo Airbnb foram muito reativos, simpáticos. Um especial para Dn.Angela, que amor de pessoa! Ademais, tudo muito bem organizado, tudo em ótimo estado, uma casa aconchegante com uma linda vista! Que experiência! Super indico!

Manuel is an outstanding host: gives you all relevant information and more; makes everything easy for a successful stay; is very reactive when asked for a service.
The flat's localization is highly convenient if you want to be based downtown and have an easy access to all places to see and all transportation. It is well equipped and nicely designed. A lovely place for 4 people, especially with kids.
One big drawback: the flat is very, very noisy, even at night. Be prepared for it.
And it may be cold as well if it is not warm outside.

I highly recommend this place. It was clean and is centrally located, and Manuel was very quick to respond to any questions that we had. He also provided many helpful local sightseeing tips. Check-in was very easy. Thanks for everything!

EL alojamiento tiene un emplazamiento inmejorable.
La comunicación con Manuel es fluida porque contesta muy rápido, aunque en mi caso, no le he visto personalmente, tampoco ha sido necesario.
Las recomendaciones sobre restaurantes y sitios para conocer, nos las ha facilitado vía mail y este tipo de información, a mi me gusta más recibirlo directamente pero, en todo caso, es un extra.
La casa está limpia y tiene un poco de todo para hacerte la vida más fácil.
La pila es un poco pequeña y dificulta fregar pero.... es poca cosa.
El parking es caro pero al parecer hay bonos de 24 horas, si bien, yo no supe cómo contratarlo.
Para descargar, la calle no da muchas opciones y es complicado si bien el parking está a escasos 100 m.
La evaluación general es muy positiva y lo recomiendo.

Great location in the ceter of Porto with charming views trough the multiple balconies. The apartment is very spacious and can accommodate a lot of people comfortably. 
Only downside... it was really cold during our stay there in January and the street is quite noisy with traffic and people.
Awesome
Amazing place, very central. The apparent wooden beams make it especially elegant. Can be a bit cold in winter, but at least the bedrooms are nice and warm.
Manuel è un ottimo host, gentile e rapido nelle risposte. L'appartamento è ospitale, pulito e ottimamente posizionato.
Great place stay ! Everything was clean and comfy!
Wonderful place! Comfortable, clean, and perfect for a group of friends. Close to restaurants and bars, which meant it could be a little noisy at night.
숙소 위치와 환경이 모두 좋습니다. 다만 2층 샤워실에서 물이 새고 창문등이 잘 닫히지 않습니다

Excelente apartamento en el centro de Oporto. Hemos estado muy a gusto, sin duda un lugar con encanto, acogedor y con todos los servicios. En el centro centro de la ciudad, al lado de la zona de marcha con bares y discotecas. El único inconveniente es quizás ese, el ruido por la noche, durante el fin de semana. Aún así es tan bonito, ¡que vale la pena!
El alojamiento muy acogedor y en una situación idónea para visitar oporto! Manuel, el dueño, muy atento y encantador, nos dio muchas recomendaciones! Muchas gracias Manuel

Gute Wohnung in super Lage. War mit 3 Freunden über das Wochenende in Porto. Die Wohnung an sich ist schlicht, 2 Badezimmer, 2 Schlafzimmer, Aufenthaltsraum und Küche. Lage herrvoragend, inmitten Porto, Partymeile gleich um die Ecke.

Manuel's place is beautiful, so central and super comfy. It was a little cold in February, but the heaters helped. It was a little noisy with traffic noise, but that's because it is so central. Manuel made check in and check out super easy. He gave us great travel tips and great guides to nice places to eat and places to visit. We had a great time. Plenty of space for 6 guests.

The apartment is very charming and the location is very central. The neighborhood is very cool and there are lots of great restaurants nearby. 
Manuel was very responsive, and had some good suggestions on what to see and where to go.
If it hadn´t been for the excessive streetnoise, and the fact that it is a very cold apartment in the wintertime everything would have been perfect.

Appartement très beau, propre et très bien situé (tout se fait à pied).
Literie très confortable avec bonnes couettes et couvertures chaudes. Mais nous avons eu très froid : les climatisations réversibles installées en hauteur ne chauffent que les mezzanines > donc pas de soucis pour la nuit. Mais la pièce de vie mériterait un bon chauffage d’appoint.
Rue TRÈS passagère donc très bruyante > boules quies indispensables pour dormir !

Great flat in a brilliant central location. Much bigger than expected. Manuel was a fantastic host, really helpful with great advice about nearby amenities and restaurants, really speedy responses on the comms. Little bit noisy at night on a weekend as near to the bar area but a price worth paying for the amazing location.

Very nice place!! and super well located. Manuel was a great host giving us all the information and tips about the city! 
Will definitely go back to Porto and to his place!

O apartamento é excelente. Localizado em frente a Torre do Clérigos e muito próximo aos principais pontos turísticos. Manoel é um anfitrião excepcional, nos deu várias dicas sobre a cidade e estava sempre disponível para nos auxiliar. Recomendo a todos que querem conhecer a cidade.
Excelente!!

Manuel was an excellent host and available at all times. He gave us parking and some other useful  indications. The house is in an unbeatable location near important spots such as torre dos clerigos and lello library. Cool views. The apartment is newly refurbished and very lightly. The beds are very comfortable and the shower and hot water work perfectly . We were a group of 6 and we all definitely  recommend it. The only bad thing is that in rainy and windy days the house is a bit cold.
Excellent location. Great contact with Manuel.

Hola,

El apartamento es precioso, acogedor y muy bien ubicado. Manuel ha estado atento todo el fin de semana.
The best location in Porto. The apartment is clean and well equipped. Highly recommend.
Supper Appartment an genialer Lage. War mit 5 Freunden dort. Zu 6 etwas knapp aber wir hatten dennoch eine gute Zeit. Netter, hilfsbereiter Gastgeber. Checkin war super einfach und unkompliziert.
Todo perfecto.
Casa molto bella!
Great location
Manuel was so helpful. He gave us tons of recommendations and check in was easy. The apartment was perfectly located. We had a great stay.

Had a fantastic time in Porto, staying in Manuel's apartment. It is in an amazing location right in the thick of things. Yes, it can be noisy (especially if you are there for last game of the season ... and Porto FC are champions) but earplugs go a long way and it is so convenient for bus, train, taxis etc. Would heartily recommend!

Manuel was very helpful with his recommendations, and was very prompt in responding to our messages. The location of his apartment in Porto has a wonderful view. The only potential concern is that it is 4 flights of stairs after a steep hill, but if you don't mind this little exercise for the day, it is perfect!
The apartment is fantastic and really in the  city center. Manuel was an excellent host, always with quick answers and excellent tips. I recommend!

A lovely apartment and very comfortable for the 5 of us. I could not rave more about the location, so central to everything! Minor issues with the wifi being slow/unreliable. Manuel was a great host and was quick to respond with queries and tips for exploring the local area.
excelente espaço, aconcelho
Appartement spacieux et très bien situé. Idéal pour 5 personnes. Nous avons adoré!
Very good location. Everything within walking distance. Great view. A bit noisy on the weekend from the street below.

Un super séjour chez Manuel: localisation centrale idéale, un logement bien conforme aux photos, la propreté est également présente et une facilité d’accès au logement à notre arrivée (instructions claires, le système est simple).
Un seul point reste le bruit compte tenu de la localisation mais celui ci devrait être résolu car Manuel nous a dit que le double vitrage allait être installé d’ici peu! 
Encore merci, Porto est vraiment une ville surprenante!
This is an excellently located apartment and Manuel is great with lots of tips for places to stay. It does need more comfy seating and utensils though.
Great apartment in the center of everything. The host responded very quickly to all questions. We were three women who enjoyed our time in Porto.
Manuel's place was better than I had anticipated! It was clean and pretty and right in the middle of everything!
This is such a gorgeous apartment in Porto! It’s in a good location to walk a lot of places also. I highly recommend!
Great location and suitable for a family of four. The lack of elevator could be a problem for some travelers
Great apartment, great location, highly recommended.

Manuel’s apartment in central old town Porto is just beautiful. The loft bedrooms are such lovely spaces and the added bonus of two bathrooms with teenage kids certainly made our stay even more relaxing! The beds and pillows were super-comfy and from the apartment’s location, we were able to walk everywhere! We parked our car in the nearby carpark and didn’t return to it until the end of our Porto holiday. 
The only thing that we feel we should mention is that late at night (and early morning) the noise from the busy local streets can be heard. This is especially the case as the apartment is located near the bar areas - I guess being so centrally located is a bit of a double edged sword. Once we adjusted to the noise, we were absolutely fine - but if you’re a light sleeper, this may pose as a problem. 
We loved the aesthetic of Manuel’s apartment and our stay in beautiful Porto was wonderful.
Thank you Manuel for letting us stay in your fantastic apartment!
Fantastic location to explore Porto. The apartment is spacious, we were 5 and we had plenty of room. Easy check in.
Charming apartment
Very nice appartement. Communication really clear. A little bit noisy but well located.
very beautiful place in the center of Porto!
客廳的地板不穩,走路都能感覺到地板在搖晃
Stylish flat, great location, easy check-in.  Manuel had some great tips for visiting Porto. Many thanks!
Estancia perfecta! Ubicación inmejorable!!

Perfect location, close to all the nice spots in Porto. 

Fun house, just a bit exhausting to reach the top floor, no elevator. 

Nice clean house, clean beds and blankets.
Perfect location in center of city. Nice corner apartment with great views of the Clerigos. This is a special place!! Two separate bedrooms. Thank you Manuel!! Highly recommended
Great, communicative host who was flexible with check in and check out. Really enjoyed the location and layout of the apartment.

O lugar tem uma localização incrível, a poucos passos da Torre dos Cléricos e da Livraria Lelos, o que compensa a falta de um elevador. O edifício agora passa por reformas em outros apartamentos o que deve deixá-lo em breve ainda melhor.
Great place at great location! 4 separate beds in two bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and a nice living room next to the beautiful church and with very nice bars around the corner.

We planned a girls trip to Portugal for 8 days. The first leg of it to Porto. Wow! The apartment was perfect, exactly as described and in the center of everything! Porto was by far our favorite town that we visited and Manuel was friendly and helpful with suggestions on things to do and places to see. It is definitely a 4th floor walk up, but the view of the cathedral is incredible from the Juliet balcony. We would definitely stay here again if we came back to Porto.
Buena ubicación y buena comunicación

This location has to be 6 stars in Porto and it cannot get more perfect. Manuel has been a wonderful host, and had gone the extra miles to help us with some issues we had. I feel this is value for money and would not hesitate to recommend to anyone who look for the perfect stay in Porto!
Muy lindo apartamento ubicado en el centro de Porto. Cerca de todos los lugares de interés y a metros de las calles más movidas durante el día y la noche.
Great location except non stop noise until daylight
Great locale. Vibrant , lively neighborhood. Many things close by. The host was prompt and easy to communicate with. Manuel also provided great recommendations. We especially loved Cantina 42.
R.A.S. tout impec, mais un poil bruyant, car l'appartement, très beau, donne sur une rue passante de Porto... seul petit bémol.

Es un apartameto precioso y con todo lo que se necesita en un viaje.
El punto del apartamento es inmejorable, en pleno centro de Oporto, el único pero si cabe es que en los alrededores hay mucha vida nocturna y se oye bastante, por lo demás un apartamento de 10

The view is astonishing! And the beds are very comfortable. Really beautiful and unique space to stay! For those worried about noise,  you will definitely hear street noise on Friday and Saturday. However, we didn't really mind that. Manuel was very helpful and shared great tips for places to eat and see. We could walk to almost everything from the apartment. Thanks, Manuel!

great location with walking distance to everything.
it's in the heart of the city so expect noise in the early hours.
I would say the optimum occupancy would be 4 people due to apartment size.
Bedrooms are open plan and in the roof eaves so not ideal for 6foot + people but still perfectly adequate. overall good apartment and Manuel was a fantastic host!

Central location in historic Porto next to restaurants, bars, sightseeing and public transportation. Great for four (4 beds), and the sofa bed was ok too. Communication was easy and fast, and Manuel gave us local tips.
We were absolutely in LOVE with that apartment. It was really just beyond perfect and every each one of us will try to get it back as soon as one of us is back in Porto!
Hemos pasado unos días magnìficos .  La situación increíble. Manuel ha resuelto nuestras dudas en todo momento. Repería sin pensar.

El alojamiento es tal y como se muestra en las fotos, la ubicación es inmejorable, en pleno centro de Oporto. La única pega que se le puede decir es que está en una zona de mucha vida nocturna y al no estar insonorizado es difícil conciliar el sueño. 
En cuanto a nuestra experiencia con Manuel, también inmejorable. muy profesional y atento, nos dio muchísimas recomendaciones de bares, restaurantes y sitios turísticos.
Excelent AirBnb right in heart Porto. Great space and easy communication. Very reslonsive host with local useful tips. Totally recommended.

The apartment is beautiful and finely decorated. It's very clean and the kitchen is equipped with all necessary amenities. The location is great, because all main attractions are within a 15 minute walk. All perfect, if it wasn't for the room temperature and the noise coming from the street. In the apartment there's no heating, but just A/C, which may be good in the summer but not in the winter. If you want the living room not to be too cold you have to switch the air conditioner on, but if you do the bedrooms will get too hot. It's not easy to find the right balance, so you'll either be too cold downstairs or too hot upstairs. What makes things worse however is the noise coming from the street. When I read the many reviews about this I thought "Come on, it can't be that bad"... Yes, it can! People in Porto seem never to be sleeping. From the apartment you can hear people screeming and shouting, playing very loud music and car horns all night long. Even if you accidentally manage to fall asleep, you'll be waken up repeatedly during the night. If I put together all the short fractions of sleep we managed to get, we probably slept 1 night out of 3. On check-out day we were just happy to leave, looking forward to getting some rest somewhere else!
As for the host, we never got to meet him, but he sent us very detailed explanations about self check-in and some tips on things to see and to do.
Great place. Great location. Plenty of room for 5 adults.

Clean, spacious and perfect location! What more can you ask for?

It looks exactly like the pics (maybe even a little bigger). Plenty of space for 4 people- or even 5 or 6. 

From the main room, you have an amazing view of the clergios tower. When you look out, you will see people standing 10 feet from the building all taking pics of the beautiful view. 

Manuel was great to work with. Very accommodating and quick to respond. 

Would definitely stay here again if we are lucky enough to make it back to Porto.

Manuels apartment is located in the Vitoria district in a great spot very close to Sao Bento Station, hence central to many interesting sites. It is spacious, flooded with natural sunshine and light. The space can sleep 6 comfortably, but I must mention that it can be very noisy on weekend nights. Did not stop us from having fun!!
Porto is a very pretty city and all roads lead to the river! A great spot to start your discovery of the fine Portuguese wines and ports! 
The people are welcoming and tourism is of great benefit to the country. Enjoy!!!
위치도 좋고 숙소도 너무 깔끔하고 좋았어요!! 포르투에 길게 묵으실 예정이라면 추천드립니다!
A real 5 star place. Everything is great from communication to location. We were a family of 5 with 3 grown up Children 22-27 and we all loved this Apartment.
Buen alojamiento, con luz y sol. Muy bien situado y acogedor

Great host who arranged the stay, even on short notice. The place was clean and had everything we needed for the weekend. Manuel also provided lots of information about Porto and where to eat and what to see.
very great accomodation. host is super nice and location is perfect. also beds were really comfortable for us. perfect accomodation.

name: Big 4 Bedroom~
summary: Beautiful, spacious apartment with 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, 5-10 minutes walk from Rambla de Catalunya, Passeig de Gracia and Diagonal metro. The apartment has a balcony facing the street from the living room. I have apartments of same type in this building, so pictures might vary slightly from the exact apartment, but always same layout. All bedrooms are interior. One set of towels and bed linen per person is included. There is a private washing machine in the apartment HUTB-003835
space: There are beds for 7 people, and you choose if you want prepared double or single beds. Please leave the apartment in a good condition, taking trash out to the dumpsters on the street right outside of the building and clean the dishes.

Due to building-policies we are not allowed to host younger groups. - Late Checkin fee after 21:00 is 20€, and 50€ after midnight - Barcelona City Tax of 2,48€ /person/night must be paid on checkin and is not included in the price - ID details of all guests staying must be given (following Spanish law) - Smoking is strictly forbidden at the whole property - SILENCE HOURS 21:00-09:00. host.host_about:
Hi there,

My name is Enrique and I am a Barcelona Local. I have always loved traveling myself, but also sharing the beauty and wonders of Barcelona with others, so a few years ago I started renting out 2 apartments to travelers coming to the city, always meeting everyone in person so I could share my insights and hidden secrets about Barcelona :)

Now I rent out a few more apartments and it is no longer just me, but we are a small team of people managing the apartments together, but with the same focus on personal and attentive services in authentic apartments that allow for the genuine Barcelona feel for your trip! We call our little team Stay U-nique, because of this focus on a unique feeling when staying with us.

If you have any questions, want to hear about an apartment or just say hi, don´t hesitate to reach out :)

Have a great day!
Enrique

name: 5 Room Villa in Oporto Center
summary: A marvellous Villa in the city center, situated in a main street of Oporto close to the subway and buses and in a walking distance to old town center. Subway line direct from and to the airport and as well to the main train station. Five large rooms, two of them with private bathrooms. Two other bathrooms, one without bath. Kichen fully equipped.
space: A very bright Villa with five double rooms with good vibes. 2 large terraces and a large balcony, ideal to spend a good time outside. You can bring your family or your friends... you will fell at home and as well on holidays. Supermarket, pharmacy, all facilities just outside the door! Perfect to relax after a shopping or a touristic day! Take a chance...enjoy your holidays in this well located Villa!

host.host_about:
O meu nome é Ana. 
Viver cada dia e aproveitar a beleza dos pequenos momentos. O mar é a minha liberdade e a montanha o meu abrigo. 
My name is Ana.
To live each day and take the advantage offered by the beauty of the litle moments. The sea is my freedom and the mountain is my shelter.
Gosto de conhecer novas pessoas e novas culturas, ler, ouvir música, escrever, dançar, viajar, caminhada, desporto,...

I like to meet new people and new cultures. to reed, listen to music, write, to dance, travel, long walks, sport...
Tenho ainda muito para aprender com os outros.
 Tengo, todavía mucho que aprender con los demás.
I still have a lot to learn with the others.
I love a good laugh, a good meal, a good wine, good company, good friends. I also like movies, music, cultural exchange, new experiences.
  I enjoy all the good literature, Portuguese and foreign.

reviews.comments: Alquilamos el apartamento 2 familias (7 personas). Es una casa de dos plantas bien situada y cómoda. Disponíamos de 5 habitaciones y 3 baños por  lo que nos hacía muy fácil la estancia. Wifi genial. Está situada en un barrio popular rodeada de supermercados, fruterias, carnicerías e infinidad de restaurantes. Para los futboleros a solo 25 minutos andando del estadio del Oporto. A tan solo 3 paradas de metro del centro de la ciudad.Ana muy amable con nosotros y preocupada de que todo estuviera correcto. Por poner algún pero, que es una casa con la cocina un poco antigua, aunque con lavadora y lavavajillas estupendos, y que no había tele.

TODA A FAMÍLIA GOSTOU MUITO DA CASA, POIS ALÉM DE LIMPA E ESPAÇOSA, ESTÁ BEM LOCALIZADA, PRÓXIMA AO CENTRO DE PORTO.
ALÉM DO SUPORTE E CONTATOS QUE MANTÍNHAMOS COM A ANFITRIÃ, ANA, DESDE QUE FIZEMOS A RESERVA, A MESMA AINDA NOS RECEBEU COM ALGUNS MIMOS. VALEU MUITO À PENA!!!!
Parfait local très propre dans le centre ville pas la peine d’utiliser la voiture la propriétaire très très aimable

name: The Paddington Cottage | Sydney Eastern Suburbs
summary: A member of Dinnigan Cocks | Bespoke Homes. When we acquired this property we chose it for its small scale charm and its history.  It is the perfect, other-worldly Georgian cottage, tucked away in the heart of Paddington. It is an area rich with historic landmarks and stories, and was originally home to the Gadigal peoples of the Eora nation. *NOTE: this terrance has a narrow and steep staircase to L2/L3 not suitable for young children and elderly people.
space: Mary Place retains all the proportions of the original artisanal cottage, complete with the chimneys and fireplaces; pretty sash windows and tiny staircases that snake right up into the rooftop third bedroom. The style of the cottage is unique, decorated by Collette Dinnigan with her signature mix of fine country antiques, beautiful bed linen, towels, and eclectic paintings. The tiny private courtyard trimmed with evergreen shrubs and annual flowers - opens out from the well-appointed kitchen -and is the perfect place to dine and enjoy a good glass of red. The atmosphere we have sought to create is personal, warm, somewhere magical to escape, something to explore. A discovery and a home. We hope you love it as much as we do. Total space: 70 sqm 2 Queen Beds, 1 Single Bed
description: A member of Dinnigan Cocks | Bespoke Homes. When we acquired this property we chose it for its small scale charm and its history.  It is the perfect, other-worldly Georgian cottage, tucked away in the heart of Paddington. It is an area rich with historic landmarks and stories, and was originally home to the Gadigal peoples of the Eora nation. *NOTE: this terrance has a narrow and steep staircase to L2/L3 not suitable for young children and elderly people. Mary Place retains all the proportions of the original artisanal cottage, complete with the chimneys and fireplaces; pretty sash windows and tiny staircases that snake right up into the rooftop third bedroom. The style of the cottage is unique, decorated by Collette Dinnigan with her signature mix of fine country antiques, beautiful bed linen, towels, and eclectic paintings. The tiny private courtyard trimmed with evergreen shrubs and annual flowers - opens out from the well-appointed kitchen -and is the perfect place to dine and enjo
neighborhood_overview: Tranquilly and privately nestled in one of Paddington's finest and oldest enclaves, this exceptional Cotswolds cottage style residence is a home of unquestionable quality. Beautifully presented, this freestanding c1850s Georgian terrace is well placed just metres to village life.
notes: - Seamlessly melding period charm and contemporary comfort - Intuitively designed to maximise the flow of light and space - Carefree entertaining with adjoining lounge and dining areas - Modern user-friendly kitchen, stainless steel gas appliances - Versatile living with a secluded attic retreat/guest bedroom - Bathroom, frameless glass shower, integrated laundry - Master bedroom with built-ins, sun dappled garden courtyard - Timber floors, skylights, plantation shutters - Moments to cafes, regular transport, cinemas and boutiques Simply minutes to Centennial Park, Five Ways and the city
transit: Our cottage is located close to cafes; a hair salon; some good unique Australian clothing stores and a comprehensive grocery store at Five Ways in Paddington. It is a vibrant area with a village style vibe.  Within a 1.5km radius are the Victoria Barracks; two art house cinemas; art galleries; and many great restaurants. It is a 5 minute taxi ride to the CBD and 10 minutes to the Opera House and Bridge.
access: Check-in instructions will be sent upon completed reservation.
house_rules: Please note that all our homes have no party policies as noise travels to neighbours easily in both residential and hinterland areas. No extra guests are allowed to the houses and noise levels are to be respectful at all times. There is to be no outdoor music or outdoor entertaining after 10pm. Noise complaints will result in bond deductions and possible eviction. We apologise for being so strict but noise is a serious issue and keeping our neighbours happy is of paramount importance.

host.host_about: From Sydney, Australia.

reviews.comments: A perfect hideaway tucked in a laneway of leafy Paddington. A perfect spot to relocate whilst we were renovating our kitchen with a hop, skip & a jump to my favourite shopping hub of Glenmore Road as well as the delicious Jackie's. The 3 bedroom cottage looks so pretty from the outside and beautifully furnished & styled on the inside, it made me pine to move back to Paddington.
A little gem of a cottage in Paddington. A wonderful place to unwind ... like a little retreat from the world.
Great location and nice and clean
Another great stay in the cottage! I feel like moving in here instead of my newly renovated house.

Bradley's place is top notch, super comfy and very recent renovated old Paddington cottage. Close to shops, restaurants, pubs and Oxford St transport. Would recommend for two couples or two singles.
Kitchen with all the bells and whistles!
Will be staying again!!

We were fortunate to secure a stay at Bradley's place in (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication with Bradley was first rate throughout. 
The property is a quaint cottage superbly located in Paddington within walking distance of numerous great watering holes and eateries. The cottage was spotlessly clean and very homely for our stay in Sydney.  It was a great find and Bradley is clearly an experienced host.

Bradley's home is spotlessly clean and beautifully furnished. The bedlinen is crisp and fresh and the beds are very comfy. There's an abundance of generous supplies, like Aesop bathroom products, extra towels, and beer in the fridge. Bradley was a prompt and polite host - we couldn't ask for more.  The house is just around the corner from oxford st shopping and the nearest cafe, Jackie's, is superb. Despite its central location the street itself is lovely and quiet.
We would absolutely return here!!
Just a note for anyone with young kids or mobility issues - there is a very narrow and steep flight of stairs to the bedrooms.
Overall, we just loved it!!
Amazing place.
A lovely and cosy cottage in the heart of Paddington. It was a great place to stay and was within walking distance of just about everything! We really enjoyed our stay.

Bradley's cottage is absolutely gorgeous. The location in Paddington is fantastic for walking. The cottage is beautifully presented with the most amazing linen! Bradley was so helpful, we would stay here again in a heart beat, Many thanks.
Bradley的这套房子是典型的小而美的类型,除了进去的道路和楼梯比较窄,其他都非常好,屋子很漂亮,Bradley也非常热情友好,介绍了很多当地的好吃的,非常感谢!
Great location, very charming and spotless! Will definitely recommend to friends visiting Sydney. Thanks Bradley

The house is in a great location, central to exploring many parts of Sydney. The house has everything you need to feel at home while away from home. There is plenty of equipment to cook up a meal and even laundry machines for your use. There are many great places within walking distance including eateries, shops and a great wine store. Its easy to get to the beach and to the city within a short period of time from the cottage. The cottage is cosy, and I think its notable that only one of the three bedrooms, has a door that closes. Lastly, as mentioned in another review the stairs are very narrow to get to the second and third floor, so be aware of you physical capabilities when staying here. We enjoyed our trip to Sydney very much.

Loved loved loved staying here. I booked the place for my (rather particular mother in law) and she said it was the first rental she didn’t have to go out and buy cleaning supplies and scrub head to toe. Our favorite - apart from the wonderful location - was the styling of the place, from the high quality linens to the choice of crockery and decor. Thanks!

Lovely character cottage that ticks all the boxes for visitors from
Interstate or overseas. Highly recommended.
Outstanding residence. Perfect location. Stylish. Spotless. Bradley is communicative and easy going. Definitely consider staying again when I'm back in Sydney.
Quaint and pretty cottage in a wonderfully quiet location . Very close to the wonderful shops and amenities of the Paddington. A lovely home for a romantic weekend get away . Great host in every way.

This cottage was quintessential Paddington. Very centrally located , very clean, and the flowers and starched white sheets were a special and unexpected treat. Only thing that surprised us was the  bedroom and bathroom were on different levels.  We loved our stay and would highly recommend this cottage.

Bradley's Paddington Cottage is absolutely gorgeous.  Beautifully decorated, fantastic location in Paddington and yet very quiet.  Lovely old cottage, with modern kitchen, bathroom and heavily sheets & bedding.  I would easily recommend it for those looking for a beautifully appointed cottage in Paddington.

Mary Place is a unique, tidy, spotless, charming cottage with the upmost attention to detail and a lovely sense of home away from home. There are exquisite antique linens, beautifully placed candles, a fireplace, quirky furniture, a miniature garden, all the nice kitchen amenities required. It is ideal for guests who appreciate this stylish touches and will look after the it so. The location was wonderful, we could see stars from out the sky light from the attic bed, magpies would sing in the morning, the fireplace glowing in the evening. A thoroughly enjoyable and memorable stay in a beautiful and loved cottage. Thank you Bradley

We absolutely loved staying at Bradley's house! It was charming and in the most perfect location. It was chilly and rainy the week we were there, so it was nice sitting by the fire at the end of the night with a glass of wine. Sleeping on the top floor was a dream! The french doors in the kitchen leading out to the yard would be perfect to open on summer nights. If we're ever in Sydney again, we'd love to stay at Bradley's house again!

I would highly recommend Bradley’s beautiful home as a place to stay. It is cosy and comfortable with beautiful furnishings, linens and every thing you could need is considered. It’s in a great location and easy to get around. But we were also happy to come back and relax in this wonderful space.

name: Private Sunny Room in Bushwick
summary: Cool one bedroom in an apartment of  3. The building is  made up of mostly undergrads. Theres no pets or children in the building right around the corner from a hipstery bar, as well as a deli that makes bomb sandwiches. About 4 blocks from J train. 30 minute train ride to manhattan. There's also a washer and dryer downstairs. And a dishwasher in the apartment.

host.host_about: Hi my name is Michelle, I'm 22 and I've never done this whole airbnb thing but I'm excited to meet new ppl and learn how to be a good host :)

name: Harbour Views from North Sydney High Street
summary: ** LAST MINUTE AVAILABILITY FOR DECEMBER DUE TO CANCELLATION** Bright 1 bedroom apartment on the Kirribilli/North Sydney border delights all guests with its space and views. Have your morning coffee on the balcony watching the cruise ships, navy warships and ferries come and go through the iconic harbour. With allocated parking and easy ferry access it's a great base to explore from. Backed up with 24/7 help from a dedicated holiday rental agency you can rest assured your stay is in good hands.
space: Located on the fourth floor of a secure building this apartment is just a few moments walk from the High Street ferry wharf, on a direct route to Circular Quay, it's easy to get into the heart of the city to explore Sydney further. Trains are available at Circular Quay also if you want to travel further afield but Milsons Point and North Sydney stations are within ten minutes walk too. The kitchen is well equipped for anyone wishing to cook up a storm during their stay. If you need to do any laundry during your stay there is a laundry room within the building with many large coin-operated washing machines and dryers. The apartment is not suited to families with children under 5 but young, sensible children over that age should be fine. This is a no smoking apartment. The apartment has one allocated parking space for your exclusive use; it is a large space but accessed by a slightly narrow ramp so best for smaller cars and/or confident drivers.
