neighborhood_overview: Many people think of North Sydney as the CBD alone, but the CBD is surrounded by some of the best living in Sydney. If you work in the city you are spoilt for choice when it comes to transport. Trains and buses are constant. On a nice day walk to work across our great bridge. Stroll to nearby restaurants at Blues Point Road, Crows Nest or Neutral Bay, or stay in North Sydney itself with a great variety of restaurants and good pubs. Everything is walking distance in this suburb. There are great shops at Greenwood Plaza, Walker Street, Neutral Bay or Crows Nest for all your grocery needs or late night requirements.  Visit the great markets near the North Sydney council on Friday nights and Saturdays. Parks are plentiful with North Sydney oval and Cammeray park perfect for kids and families, or take a leisurely stroll to the harbour.
notes: All the apartments we manage come with a welcome letter and a full instruction manual so you know how everything works to ensure you can get the most out of your stay. The manual also contains many menus from local restaurants to give you some idea of what is available nearby and also information on tourist activities available in Sydney. There is also a local map with some highlights such as the local supermarket and train station plus maps of Sydney for those not familiar with the area. All bedding and towels are included along with beginner basics such as tea, coffee, sugar, milk, shampoo, bodywash and toilet paper to get you through the first few days. We try to meet all guests on arrival in person so a time will be arranged in advance of your arrival which will also be confirmed in the day once you know your plans. On arrival we ask all guests to quickly fill in some contact information and tell them a little bit more about how we hope they'll look after the apartment. Please note
transit: The ferry is just a few moments walk away at the High Street ferry wharf which takes you directly to Circular Quay for The Rocks and the Opera House. There is a train station at Circular Quay also if you want to travel further afield.
access: Guests have full use of the apartment to make themselves at home. You will of course have your own keys to come and go as you please.
interaction: As a professional holiday rental agency we are available to answer any questions or help with any problems that crop up. Unlike part time casual owner-managers we do this for a living professionally, it is our core focus, we hold professional licences to do this and we are ALWAYS just a message away if you need us. You won't be left high and dry with us!
house_rules: THIS SECTION CONTAINS IMPORTANT INFORMATION, PLEASE MAKE SURE YOU READ BEFORE BOOKING : This is a quiet building and we expect all guests to be considerate of the neighbours. Please treat the apartment as your own but please no wild parties. We kindly ask guests to wash and put away all used items from the kitchen and leave any rubbish in the external rubbish area when they leave. If you require use of the sofabed for your stay please book for 3 or 4 people to ensure the small additional cost for the bedding is included in your booking. Occupancy of one or two people is understood to just use the bedroom. On arrival, like staying in a hotel, we ask guests to fill in a registration form to ensure we have full contact details for them. This form also provides more information about the Security Deposit for damage and breakages held by Airbnb for your stay.

host.host_about:
SHR prides itself on how we look after our guests with friendly, attentive, knowledgeable service. We aim to meet all guests in person on arrival to help them into the apartments we manage and we work hard to ensure guests have the best stay possible. We're a licensed real estate agency so you can be sure you're dealing with reliable professionals who can always be contacted rather than people who have many other things demanding their attention in life. For us, our guests will always be our number one priority.

We're actively looking to take on new properties throughout Sydney so if you need your holiday property managed by professionals that lead the field in customer satisfaction and occupancy rates please get in touch through Airbnb or Sydney Holiday Rentals dt com dt au.

reviews.comments: I would happily live in this apartment as it is. The view is spectacular and the apartment is very comfortable with a very well equiped kitchen good internet and all the comforts of home including a nice bed. I love this location, close to the train and direct access to the city but in a lovely neighbourhood again with unbeatable views of the harbour. Everything is good quality and the inclusions well thought out to make things easy for your stay. I have rented Airbnb properties all over the world, this is one of the first ones that I sent links to my friends. You won't be disappointed.

Really had a good time in the apartment.
Accurate description, and so happy to offer that to my sister's and husband first trip to Australia, Sydney.
Mavelous view when waking up, we've been lucky with the weather, great situation. Close to the ferry -10 mn, Neutral Bay, very close, couldn't be better. Feeling so lucky finding this apartment and being accepted.
Quiet environment, safe car park, good internet, all facilities... Good bed (according to my sister), I had the sofa and cannot complain either, what else can you expect?
Check-in has been brief, straight forward, well organised.
Stephen has been a great host and I want to thank him again.
I hope to come again, one day, if it's not over booked !!!
100% satisfied...
JP

Stephen was a fantastic host let me check-in early and also offed late check-out place had everything you needed to make yourself at home plus more hardly had to go out and buy anything & was so clean, defiantly recommend this place to anyone looking at staying.

This apartment has a beautiful view right when you walk in. It's the first thing we noticed. You look southwest towards the water. The apartment is nice and well stocked with everything you'd expect. It's also just up the road from the North Sydney ferry what and just a street or two over from Milsons Point train station. Stephen was always quick to respond and work with us anytime we had questions. I was very impressed.

Cozy apartment , just a walk over the bridge and your in town .Best way to see Sydney. 
Great location with a water view. Train and ferry close by .
Hard to leave the apart!!!
Would return for sure .The host very easy to comunícate.
Stephen is such an amazing host. Promt and extremely hemohim . The property is everything you want and need!
It was a beautiful apartment that's new on Airbnb with a few kinks to work out.
Stephen was a wonderful host and accommodated our late check in. Highly recommended!
The apartment is spacious and clean. All amenities are there and it's close to the train station. It's full on natural light and has great views of the harbour. Highly recommend!
A lovely apartment with beautiful views. Very clean & tidy. A great location on the north shore & wonderful hosts who went out of their way to be helpful. Thanks for a great stay!

Such a great place for a few days whilst working at Milsons point. The balcony looking over the water and really comfy bed are a real bonus and the place is just the right amount of designer chic. Will book again next time for sure!

The apartment is very clean and has a beautiful view. The location is very quiet but it's just a short walk up to the restaurants and bars at Kirribilli. And having a parking spot was great because finding on-street parking would be challenging. We'd definitely stay there again

Great one bedroom pad in Sydney with easy access to public transport, cafes, restaurants and bars. Also had a fold out couch which meant my Mum could stay the weekend. Highly recommend - we had a great time!!

From the excellent meet and greet we had a great stay. The location was awesome with local cafes, ferries down town, and an easy walk over the harbour bridge. All in a lovely part of Sydney. The apartment was comfy, well equipped and with an amazing view.
This apartment was wonderful.  The view was spectacular with a nice balcony. The bed was very comfortable and the water pressure in the shower was great!  I highly recommend Stephen's place.

Enjoyed our weekend in this lovely apartment which had everything we needed including a super location with a lovely sea view. 

The bed was very comfy and apparently the sofa bed was awesome too. Well suited for 2 people.

Beautiful apartment with gorgeous views of a small bay. Spotlessly clean and very well stocked with dishes etc.  The bed and sitting are are very comfortable.  Easy 5 minute walk down the hill to a quick ferry to Circular Quay and you can get anywhere from there, and a slightly longer walk to N Sydney/Kiribilli shops, restaurants, and the train. 

Stephen was a great host. He went out of his way to get us in for early check-in and he checked in on us on our first morning to make sure everything was ok. 

This is not the place for you if you want to be in the middle of bustling Sydney activity, but if you want a beautiful, quiet place that's close enough to get anywhere, we highly recommend this one!
Great location, Clean, Easy check-in and check out. Good communication. Would recommend.

Great spot, nice view over harbour. Modern clean apartment, has all you need.
Excellent water pressure in shower!
Easy check in.
May get a bit hot on warm summer days, as the sun comes through early in the morning.
Great stay, would book again.
Great little base from which to see Sydney,  We would stay again.
Very comfortable and clean, fabulous views, a rare find!

Die Unterkunft liegt sehr zentral im angesagten Kirribilli, zu den Cafés 5-10 Minuten Fußweg, ebenso zur Harbour Bridge und der Bahnstation Milsons Point.
Zur Fähre 3 Minuten und dann in 10 Minuten zum circular quay.
Wir können die Wohnung nur empfehlen und werden sie bei unserem nächsten Sydney Aufenthalt bestimmt wieder buchen. Auch die Fotos im Internet entsprechen genau den Gegebenheiten.
We had a great stay. Really loved the view over Neutral Harbour and how central and easy it was to commute everywhere. Highly recommended.
嗯,这是一次愉快的旅途｡very nice room!

The apartment is just as its described in airbnb and we could not have asked for better.  Our own parking spot below right near the entrance to the lift, a corner apartment with all the facilities we needed and Stephen went out of his way to make sure that little glitches were quickly rectified.  The location is amazing - so easy to get to from either side of the harbour and being on an upper floor we had amazing views over the harbour.  Grocery stores and restaurants are about 500m from the apartment and do require some hill climbing if you walk, but again the views made walking very enjoyable.  Don't forget to bring or get Opal cards if you you want to use the ferry which is just 300 metres straight down the road.
Thanks for having us. Wonderful place with great location.

Very comfortable & well equipped unit, small balcony with lovely views of Careening Cove & the harbour. Bedroom has large wardrobe & plenty of drawers. Slow but adequate elevator. Excellent location - 5 minute walk to N Sydney ferry,  bit over 10 minutes to Milson's Point station, with shops & food outlets, 15 minutes to Coles supermarket at N Sydney. 
Only downside - there seems to be no direct access outside the building from the upper basement level, where the parking slot is, to the lower level where the bell-pushes are. So if you don't have the door key you have to walk right round the road, a bit tedious.
Otherwise we had a vey comfortable stay & would had stayed longer had it been available.
Great place, very convenient, clean, close to cafes and shops etc and transport into town. Stephen was a great host who responded quickly when we needed help and was flexible with meeting us.
Great apartment in a good location with good shops and restaurants. Wonderful view of harbour. Well equipped and spacious. Easy walk to ferry.

This is a lovely apartment with a fantastic view. It was a quick walk to the train or ferry so very convenient for getting around Sydney.  It’s a very quiet neighborhood but there are some nice places to eat a short walk away. Stephen met us as we arrived and explained all we need to know for our stay. Highly recommended for those exploring Sydney.
Apartment is sparkling clean with great views. Checking in was met by Cristy who was helpful and polite. Highly recommend these guys

Fabulous location, only a few minutes walk to North Sydney ferry stop. A 15 minute walk to many Kirribilli restaurants and cafes. The apartment is very comfortable and well equipped. There are all the little added extras, that you don’t get in a hotel. Views of the harbour are beautiful. We had beautiful weather 17-24 degrees. If it was a hotter evening, the apartment may have been a bit warm, as there is no aircon or thru flow of breezes. We would definitely stay again, but not in summer.
Great stay

Our second time in this apartment in a couple of months and as with the last time we really enjoyed it.  Good brisk walks required to ferry, trains or cafes but all are not long and the location gets you to you to anywhere in the CBD quickly.  Excellent value for money for an apartment with dedicated parking.
Nice and quiet, beautiful little spot with lovely views and a beautiful clean home. Will be back again!

Beautiful view!!!
Lovely apartment.
Excellent location.
5 mins walk to ferry port, 10-15 mins walk to Milsons Point & North Sydney train stations.
Local grocery shops, Bars and restaurants 5-10 mins walk also.
Would highly recommend this apartment to any prospective booker.
A wonderful place to stay! A beautiful, bright apartment with harbour glimpses. Easy communications with Stephen and a great experience all round.
Fantastic place and location, exceptional service from Stephen, thanks.
It was for my parents to stay and they really enjoyed the view from windows and balcony. Nice quiet area, also convenient location. Everything was in the unit for their stay. Thanks!
Cristy has been a good host providing us with information about tranaportation and restaurants in the neighborhood. the location was quiet and convenient.
One of the best place i've ever stayed! Beautiful apartment with great location. Very thoughtful on all the small details, will stay again!
The view from the apartment is beautiful and it's got everything you need in it. Location is perfect and I'd definitely stay here again the next time we visit Sydney
This place is true to its word of the gorgeous and amazing view from the room! Cleanliness is A Plus and complete amenities!

106 High Street was easy to find and a fantastic location.  We loved having a harbour view and being just a short walk from North shore wharf.  Milsom's wharf was beautiful too, tucked away in a secluded inlet where you could sip coffee, eat and enjoy clear skies and local boat activity. The local theatre had some amazing performances so we did not need to venture far.  Local eateries were of a high standard, although we were glad to find the local Aldi in North Sydney to help out with budget constraints!  We were able to run around Kiribilli and under the Bridge as well as over it.  A beautiful city and very pleased we stayed on this side. Stephen was very helpful and was on hand to ensure our stay was memorable. Many thanks from us UK visitors.
A gorgeous apartment exactly like the photos. Sparkling clean and easily accessible to the ferry, great local parks for the kids, relaxing yacht club, cafes and Luna Park.

Simply Amazing. Great location, only a short walk from public transportation. Has a great local market right around the corner and a short distance from an amazing view of Sydney’s best sights. Clean, comfortable and relaxing. Couldn’t ask for more for a Sydney get away.
Great location! Perfect for what we wanted! Train station and ferry within walking distance! Parking spot available for our car. Would definitely stay here again!
Lovely apartment with views of the harbour and the bridge.  Down the road to the ferry and short distance to trains.  Great location.  Definitely recommend.
Lovely quiet place to stay with beautiful views and all the amenities I needed
Was great
A great location with views and a clean, tidy and comfortable place to stay very accessible to the city without a car, which is good as the car park is quite tight.
This property is our Executive's number 1 choice each time he comes to Australia from Europe. For more than a year now. Superb view, fantastic property, and the easiest communication with the host!
Great location and facilities, short walk everywhere. Lift a bonus. Would stay again
Fabulous place to stay. Views and close to everything. Highly recommend and will be back next time I’m in Sydney

My parents really enjoyed staying at this air bnb! It’s a very good location, there is a lot of easy transport, there are nice restaurants and bars. The apartment is clean,the interior is nice and they really enjoyed the water views! I would definitely recommend this place.
Excellent place to stay in Sydney

Stephen’s place is what is described but location is fantastic.
It’s 5 minutes walk to Kirribilli and Harbour Bridge and you don’t need any public transport to move around locally I.e Milsons Point, McMahons point(if you love walking).
Quite neighbourhood and fantastic waiter views.

we choose stephens appartment as a base to explore sydney -worked well because of the ferries. next wharf 3 min walk. very nice cafe ( flying bear) in 4 min walk, great tip by cristie, who let us in on our late arrival , 11pm.
after all a great place to stay!!
地理环境好,性价比很高,是悉尼富人区的生活,周边很安静,走路几分钟就到码头,不到10分钟就到火车站,去市中心就是相隔一桥,极力推荐!

Overall, this is a decent apartment if you're looking to stay in North Sydney.  While quiet and secluded, it's conveniently near regional bus, train, and ferry services. If you're planning to arrive via car, I'd recommend bringing a small one as the parking space is quite small.
Worth place to stay
Good stay. Ok location, better rent a car for travel
Thank-you :)

apartment (number 42) is managed by an agent - Sydney Holiday Rentals. It is clean, nicely furnished and decorated, has a well equipped kitchen and is  located in a quiet area of north Sydney.  It is in an oldish block and is as described on the air bnb site, except for  parking. On phoning the agent to arrange a time to be met at the apartment, we were advised there had recently been difficulties with other residents parking in space 42. So, surprise, surprise when we arrived, yes there was a car in space 42. The agent insisted we park in space 43 instead which belonged to another apartment that sydney holiday rentals also manage.  This was not a full size spot and we had great difficulty fitting our Subaru into the spot. After scraping the side of the car on the adjacent concrete pillar it was obvious this spot was next to useless for all but micro cars. After asking the agent 3 times to contact the building manager in order to locate the owner of the car in spot 42 ( which was a standard sized spot) she very reluctantly went away and made a phone call. Miraculously, the owner materialised within less than 5 minutes and begrudgingly moved her ‘illegally’ parked car.  The agent’s insistence we park elsewhere on the property and her resistance to call the building manger, made us wonder whether apartment 42 does not, despite the literature provided for arrival and the advertising, actually come with parking space 42. So, if you need parking, we suggest you find another apartment.

At no point did the agent apologise, either for not being able to deliver on the parking space, nor for arriving 30 minutes late to meet us at the department despite insisting we arrive no later than 4.00.  

Unfortunately this experience spoilt our stay.
Auf Grund der Lage, Ausstattung und Ausblick unbedingt empfehlenswert
This sunny one bed apartment is in a fabulous location .

Stephen was prompt with his responses, and even offered us suggestions for a rainy day. The apartment has a great view, location and is definitely worth the price. Note, however, that this isn't like other Airbnbs and is run by a rental management, so lacks a 'personal touch' if you're expecting one. Also, the check-out process is stringent and a little tedious, but wasn't a deal-breaker for us given how nice the place was.
Stephen was extremely prompt in communication before and during our stay. The apartment has a beautiful view of the Sydney Harbour and a very thorough binder of local attractions and ferry schedules.
Fantastic views, and a clean, comfortable stay. Thanks!
This apartment is fantastic. Great host, great location, we will definitely be back!

The Apartment is wonderful. We have been there for our last week in Australia and it was a great time. Everything you need is there. The Location is perfect (near trains, buses and ferry) and a short walk from the Harbor Bridge. We would definitely choose the Apartment again, when we come back to Sydney once a time.

This apartment is well appointed clean and comfortable. Close to Milsons point train and ferry stations for easy city access.  Parking space is a bonus as you won't need your car but awkward for large cars. Would definitely stay here again.

We enjoyed at our mini holiday in this appartment. Views are amazing! There where everything we needed in this appartment. 
Neightborhood is bit quiet, but you get easily around by ferry and train.

It was our second time at the apartment.
All was very good again.
It’s a great place for a few days in Sydney

name: Charming Family House with Garden (6981/AL)
summary: Notre maisos est petite mais a 3 chambres charmants et accueille jusqu'a 6 personnes
space: AL nr. 6981/AL Casa d'Alicinha is a cosy family home with garden located in a quiet neighbourhood in Porto, totally refurbished in 2011. It has 3 bedrooms, WC, living room, kitchen and a lovely garden where you can relax and pick your own fresh vegetables! It hosts comfortably up to 6 guests and provides wireless internet access, fully equiped kitchen, towels and sheets. Several supermarkets and other stores (e.g. bakery, butcher, pharmacy, etc) are located close to the house. Casa d'Alicinha is easily reached by car or public transports, and is very close to several buses lines  to the city centre, train stations,Casa da Música and seashore. The house is located 400 m away from the river Douro, 1,6 km from Serralves Museum, 1,7 km from the sea (and its wonderful sea sunset), 2,5 km from Casa da Música and 3,5 km from the city center. We provide useful information about what to visit, where to eat, transport schedules and daily utilities.

It has 3 bedrooms, WC, living room, kitchen and a lovely garden where you can relax and pick your own fresh vegetables! It hosts comfortably up to 6 guests and provides wireless internet access, fully equiped kitchen, towels and sheets. Several supermarkets and other stores (e.g. bakery, butcher, pharmacy, etc) are located close to the house. Casa d'Alicinha is easily reached by car or public transports, and is very close to several buses lines  to the city centre, train stations,Casa da Música and seashore.
