house_rules: - No smoking. - No pets allowed. - No noise before 07:00 nor after 22:00 (10 p.m.). - Lock the doors everytime you leave the house. - Keep the house clean (Wash tableware). - Don't leave garbage on the house

host.host_about:
Hello, I´m Helena and I live in Porto. I will be pleased to give you all the tips you need to travel in our town and in the region.
Have a good time in this beautiful city! Enjoy your stay at Casa d'Alicinha.

reviews.comments: Casa D'alicinha is perfect for a stay in Porto.  The location is great for both the centre and the beach area of Foz.  The house is comfortable, modern, clean and well equipped and Helena is a fantastic host - she'll give you all the information you need about Porto and things to do (especially places to eat).  If you haven't been to Porto, it's a beautiful city definitely worth checking out - and this is a great place to stay.

We came to porto to a concert in the centre of town we found our accommodation was ideal for our purpose.Situated on all Bus routes we could take advantage of the local transport to visit all the area quickly cheaply and stress free.Our host Helena was very helpfull and available at all times and we will have no hesitation in rebooking the house again should we return to porto.

Amazing! It´s not a house!It´s a home!We loved it.Enjoyed everything: Location, accomodation and the host Helena! Very carefull and helpfull!
She helped us with tipps and let all prepared!Perfect!Recommend 1000 times!

The place is conveniently located. It is also quiet . Nice and comfortable appartment.The hostess was really helpful, hospitable . The service was fantastic.
Margarita

We were a party of 4 and stayed 4 nights and 3 days 

First of all, the house was really great. Clean, brand new furnitures, 3 comfy bedrooms and a garden where you can have breakfast in the mornings.

It was also perfectly located. 
Don't be afraid to go to Helena's house, it is way better than being in the center and you have the bus, the tramway and the river 5' away walking.  

Helena was so generous, there are not many people like her. 
She gave us many advices, gave us a lift to a shopping mall (to enjoy Primark!), and also food when we arrived as it was too late to go to a restaurant. Seriously who does that? :) 

I really recommend that you'd go to this nice and quiet house, you'll love it! 
Thanks again Helena
Very quiet and clean house with a lovely garden. Helena and Domingos were both welcoming and helpful and provided lots of suggestions and maps for local activities.

Helena is a wonderful host and her house is a perfect holiday spot. the condition of the house is even better than in the pictures. good space in the house (sleeping for 6 people, lounge, kitchen/dining area), a beautiful large garden with a hammock, a functioning kitchen that we used often to cook for a party of 5 people. the house is not far from the beach and town. I would definitely recommend this place and come back when i return to Porto. Thanks again to Helena and family. Natasha,  Nico x2, Igor and Hanh.

Helena's house was a wonderful place to spend the night. The place was lovely: clean, spacious, well-appointed. We cooked a nice dinner and had a wonderful time eating outside in the backyard. The neighborhood was quiet and peaceful, but it is quite easy to get to the center of town or the airport from here. Helena was also a lovely host, very helpful, welcoming, and accommodating. We would definitely stay here again in the future!

The place is really nice, with a beautiful garden. It's the perfect size for a family and not far from the city center.
The host took good care of us and have good advices about Porto and its whereabouts.

Our stay at the Casa d'Alicinha was almost perfect! We were welcomed with fresh bread, eggs and juice, which were very welcome after our trip.The house is really beautiful and clean, and everything was there what you could need (and if not, Helena would bring it to you asap!). Helena is a true 'hostess', and a very generous person who has all the info you could need. Our little daughter got extra toys to play with, a little swimming pool on hot days, to enjoy (even more) the very nice garden. Picking our own tomatoes and zucchinis was wonderful, eating (and cooking!) outside too. It was perfectly located to explore both Porto city centre, Foz and Matosinhos, very close to trams, busses, shops, ... We would return!

We only stayed at Porto for three days, but we had a wonderful experience!    Helena´s house is very charming, confortable, clean and it has a little garden where you can sit outside and have even a meal. It is well located between the town and the beach. Helena treated us with some tipical "natas" which were  delicious!
Thanks for all and, we hope to come back one day!

Séjour et location très agréabl (Website hidden by Airbnb) Helena est  une personne sympathique et a l'écout (Website hidden by Airbnb) Nous recommandons vivement cette location pour une visite de porto (Website hidden by Airbnb) Katia et Jean-Luther
wonderful host in Porto 100% recommended - Helena helps a lot and supports us with everything we need - many thanks and we will come back!

Esta pequeña casita en Oporto, al lado del río Doiro es un remanso de paz que hemos podido disfrutar gracias a su maravillosa anfitriona que lo tiene todo muy bien equipado y con mucho gusto. Ademas dispone de un pequeño huerto que es un aliciente mas para que la estancia sea agradable. Lo único es que está un poco alejada del centro, pero está bien comunicada gracias a los medios de transporte.

Helena waited for us and was so friendly and made us a very warm welcome, with lots of information, a good introduction in this so lovely decorated house with its cute garden. We could recommend this home heartly, its a quiet and nice place, and you can reach every place in Porto via public transport in a few minutes, the sea just in five minutes by foot.
The 5 of us stayed only for one night, but we recommend the house. It is a little lovely house close to the old part of the town. We enjoyed it!

Le séjour a été très agréable. La maison est charmante, confortable et située dans un quartier résidentiel calme à deux pas du Douro. Petite maison de plein pied avec un jardin, idéal pour déjeuner au soleil. La cuisine est entièrement équipée, salle de bain propre et la literie est récente. Il y a un supermarché et plusieurs arrêts de bus à deux minutes et la maison est située à mi-chemin entre le centre ville de Porto et le bord de mer.

Héléna est très accueillante et de bons conseils. Je vous recommande vivement cette maison.

Séjour très agréable chez Helena. La maison est jolie, bien tenue et située entre plage et centre ville. Nous étions 6 adultes et un bébé : tout le monde avait un vrai couchage, y compris le bébé ! Le jardin est un vrai plus quand il fait beau. La gentillesse et les attentions d'Helena sont très appréciables !

The house is located in a really calm and pleasant neighbourhood of family houses and is close both to the center of Porto and to the ocean. Helena is a very well-organised and helpful host who is ready to answer all your questions. She also has a very detailed map of the neighbourhood with lots of information about every-day use venues (super markets, bus stops, newsagent). I strongly recommend the house and the host - they made our stay pleasant, comfortable and free from any problems..
And the inner patio of the house is just lovely for a morning coffee in the sun!

We spent 2 nights at Helena's house and had a great time. Porto is beautiful and it was very easy to get from the house to the historic center (we had a rental car). The neighbourhood is nice and quiet and there is a supermarket close by which was very convenient. The house is indeed charming, and we especially liked the vegtable garden in the back. Helena was a great host and helped us make the best of our stay. 
Obrigada!

I stayed at Helena's house in Porto for a week in May 2013 with three friends. The house is lovely, with a really pretty little garden and everything you could need. (no grill/oven but you don't need one as the food in Porto is so great!) The location is perfect. Easy to reach the centre of town by bus or a beautiful walk along the water front. Also close to beaches and Parque Ciudade.

Helena was a perfect host. She has lots of thoughtful and helpful information in the house and checked in to make sure everything was going ok. I would 100% recommend staying with Helena!
Muito atenciosa e com pormenores carinhosos que nos conquistaram. Sentimo-nos muito bem recebidos e recomendamos sem reservas.

Nous avons passés un séjour très agréable chez Héléna. 
Héléna est une hôtesse adorable . Elle nous a accueilli en Français, ce qui est très confortable! Elle a le sens du détail, tout est prévu pour que le séjour se passe parfaitement.
Nous avons trouvé la maison très charmante. C'est très propre. Nous avons pu cuisiner a notre convenance. Nous avons aussi profiter du jardin, ce qui est un grand plus.

July 2013. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Helena's little house in Porto.  The location was great as we were looking for a quiet location after staying in the middle of Lisbon. It was easy to park the car and a good walk into town along the river.  Helena was a wonderful host-so helpful and thoughtful.  Nothing was too much trouble.  The house was very clean and well furbished.  Shame the vegies weren't ready for picking!  Would definitely recommend a stay with Helena.

Hemos estado un fin de semana y aunque hizo mucho calor en general,no impidio disfrutarlo,Oporto es una ciudad que siempre volvemos y conocer la casa de Helena,fue todo un acierto,sobre todo por la calidez de ella y estar pendiente a que no falte nada,la zona donde esta ubicada es muy tranquila,ideal para ir con niños.
Nos volveremos a ver.
Marina,Eloy y Marcelo.
We highly recommand this beautiful house and this warm family. If you wanna feel home, that's the good adress in Porto!

Très agréable séjour dans cette maison avec jardin (et trottinettes pour les enfants) située dans un quartier résidentiel calme; le centre-ville est néanmoins très accessible avec bus ou tram. L'hôtesse est très sympa , très accueillante , serviable et disponible.  De plus, elle parle français. Un séjour 20/20!
I stayed in Helenas house with 4 friends in August 2013. I can highly recommend the house, which is beautiful !!!! Helena is a really nice and helpful person.

Séjour trop court (2 jours!) rendu très agréable par Helena qui a été aux petits soins avec nous! 
Maison très propre et saine, meublée de façon moderne et avec goût. La literie est bonne (à ne pas négliger pour passer de bonnes vacances!). Il y a tout ce qu'il faut pour voyager en famille, avec des enfants, des ados ou des petits : baignoire, chaise haute, couverts, lit bébé et même pot ;-), et jeux d'extérieurs!! Merci beaucoup Helena d'avoir pensé aux petits! 
Séjour très agréable aussi en amoureux avec la possibilité de manger à l'extérieur et de faire la sieste dans le hamac! 
Nous étions très bien aussi à 2 couples avec 2 enfants de 2 ans. Les bus, les grands magasins et le douro sont accessibles à pied. Le centre est à 20 minutes en bus. L'aéroport à 15 euros de taxi, également accessibles en métro + bus. 
Bref, allez-y !!

Thanks a lot Helena for your great hospitality. The house is very clean and great for a family. It is really well located! Merci encore, Helena donne de bons conseils, elle est très disponible et cette maison est située idéalement, au calme et proche des plages et du centre de Porto, what else?!

Un accueil très sympa par Héléna, une maison très mignonne, fonctionnelle et très propre avec un jardin bien agréable pour y manger à l'ombre ... La situation est idéale pour effectuer des visites aux alentours, sur Porto et profitez des plages à proximité. Toute la petite famille est ravie d'y avoir séjourné et recommande le lieu sans hésitation

Pasamos unos días estupendos en esta maravillosa casa. Helena es una anfitriona de 10. Muchas gracias por todo!!!
Repetiremos seguro :)

This was one of the best experiences with AirBnB hosts so far. Helena was super helpful with a bunch of suggestions related to travel/transport and tips where to eat and what to see. 
The house itself was very cozy for our 5 person company. It has great location, just between the ocean and city center so it was very comfortable to explore Porto.
We had a very nice stay in Helenas little house. The location was is perfect, close to the city center and the beach.

This house was perfect for our short stay with a baby. Helena was a lovely host, providing everything we could need to be comfortable with a baby. It is a very neat, well organised house in an area that you can easily explore Porto from.

We really enjoyed our time at the very cozy and lovely house from Helena. She was super helpful with all the suggestions related to travel, transport and tips where to eat and what to see. A perfect organized and very kind host! :-)
The house was very cozy and comfortable for our 4 (- 6)  person company. The location was great, between the ocean and city center so it was very comfortable to explore Porto.

La maison était très propre et l'hotesse très accueillante et très accomodante. Toujours prête à nous offrir quelque chose.
5 étoiles.
Luc
muy bien, Helena muy amable y ubicado en una zona residencial muy confortable, gracias

séjour de 4 jours début mars.
Maison charmante pour une grande famille et très propre. Quartier calme avec toutes commodités.
Accueil chaleureux, avec des petits attentions gourmandes bien agréable.
Merci Helena, si nous revenons a Porto, ce sera chez vous.
La famille Chevallier

We really enjoyed our stay @ Helena's house. She
gave us lots of useful info & made us feel @ home.
Especially the home made soup & the ride to
the airport with our little boy were very welcoming.
Thank you very much Helena.

The house was cozy and proper. Especially the garden was a delight, we ate breakfast there many mornings. Also, the location of the house was perfect for us, it is close to public transport and in between the city centre of Porto and the sea. 
Helena is very friendly and helpful and gave us some nice recommendations for restaurants and sightseeing.

Lovely house in a great part of Porto. Really convenient for beach and city. We stayed with our two small boys, everything we needed was there. Helena was very helpful! Garden is a real bonus. Would definitely go back.

Helena`s house was perfect! It was comfortable for 5 person. Quiet area. Can`t hear city noise. We could reach every place in Porto (center or see) via public transport in a few minutes. Lovely garden-perfect place for breakfast. Helena was very kind and helpfully. She lent us own iron and electric boiler. Definitely she is perfect host. 
Thank you very much!

Super séjour ! Héléna la propriétaire est très chaleureuse et accueillante, elle parle couramment français et est toujours aux petits soins.
La maison est très agréable, à l'identique avec les photos. Propre, avec tout ce qu'il faut. Le jardin et le mobilier extérieur permettent de prendre l'air dehors de bon matin ou le soir quand il fait chaud. Le potager est un plus, le prunier et ses fruits : un régal!
Le quartier est calme et un peu excentré du bruit de la ville, c'est parfait. Plusieurs stations de bus sont situées à proximité. Possibilité de garer sa voiture à côté de la maison sans frais supplémentaire.
Le seul petit bémol, mais qui ne nous empêchera pas de revenir : les chiens présents dans la rue sont un peu bruyants à certains moments de la journée.
Nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans la maison d'Helena. La maison est bien située (et bien desservie en transport en commun) entre la plage et le centre ville de Porto.

We had a great stay in Helena's house.  It was very comfortable and perfect for a family of five.  Backyard was great with fresh plums.  very accessible to public transportation and close to river and ocean.  Good restaurants close also.  Helena was also very helpful when ever we had questions.  Highly recommended.
Ja

Séjour agréable, maison neuve et propre
Les + : la maison d'Helena est située dans un quartier très calme, et comporte un jardin agréable. Dommage que la météo ne nous ai pas permis d'en profiter pleinement ! 
Les - : les literies, l'équipement minimal pour cuisiner

Une semaine très sympathique dans une maison propre et très charmante. Le jardin permet de se reposer et d'oublier que nous sommes en ville. Petit bémol: la cuisine un peu juste pour 5 personnes.

Merci Helena pour l’accueil, les jouets pour notre fille et cet agréable séjour.

Nous avons passer 10 jours agréable, nous avons été reçu comme si nous étions des amis de la famille. Helena est toujours là pour nous aider et nous conseiller. 
La maison est comme sur les photos, idéale pour les enfants pour le jardins fermés et les jouets que Helena nous prête. Le quartier est très tranquille, les commerces sont à proximité. La maison est juste au milieu du centre historique et des plages.
L'hospitalité et la gentillesse des portugais, nous a donner envie de revenir un jour dans ce pays.

Helena was a fantastic host. House was comfortable and as described. Helena went beyond the call if duty to help us with a toll problem, and gave us directions to a delicious meal. Would definitely recommend her and her house.

Helena is a very good host and nice person, her english is fluent, the house is clean, pretty and full of tips about the nearest shops, transport, restaurants. Helena is always ready to help you with any troubles.

The house is not situated in the very center, but the district is nice and quiet, 2 bus stops to the center or to the ocean side are from 1 to 3 minutes walking. For the company of 3-4 people the price for taxi from center to Helena's house is equal to total price for the bus. So, no problems.

I can strongly recommend Helena's house as a very good choice for budget travelling for the company of 5-6 persons. "Budget" I mean "cheap and good", not "bad but cheap" :)

Nuestra visita a Oporto fue extraordinaria gracias, en gran parte, a la Casa d´Alicinha. Muy bien situada, sin problemas de aparcamiento y bien comunicada. Hemos disfrutado del relax que ofrece su jardín y su espacioso salón en el que los niños han jugado sin parar. Muchas gracias a Helena por su hospitalidad. Sin duda, repetiremos!

Maison accueillante, sobre mais charmante. Jardin très appréciable, il manque juste quelques équipements dans la cuisine si vous souhaitez rester pour un long séjour. Bonne localisation, proche de l'océan et du centre. Hôte très à l'écoute et gentille, merci pour le séjour.

Nossa pequena estadia na cidade do Porto foi perfeita, e parte disto foi ser hospedado pela Helena.
Super simpática, muito solicita e a casa impecável. 
Recomendo a todos que quiserem conhecer o Porto que se hospedem com a Helena. 
Muito obrigado por ter feito parte dessa viagem maravilhosa.

Nous avons passés un week-end de 3 jours entre amis, à 5, et cette petite maison nous a fait nous sentir comme chez nous! Très agréable, l'espace, est largement satisfaisant lorsque l'on passe la journée en ballade. Propre, lumineux, les photos parlent d'elles mêmes. Le jardin est un vrai plus, qui permet de profiter du soleil de Porto au petit-déjeuner. Et pour ne rien gâcher, Helena est une hôte très sympathique! A l'écoute, disponible, et souriante!

Beautiful apartment! Clean and charming, we were very comfortable and happy to stay at Helena's house. She welcomed us warmly and explained everything about the apartment. What we liked the most was that she prepared a map with stores and little marks where the house, the supermarkets, post office etc. were. She recommended restaurants and places and we felt very well treated with all the help she offered. Great stay, we loved it!

Nous avons passé un excellent moment dans cette maisonnette joliment décorée et en très bon état. Nous sommes partis à cinq et avons pu très facilement avoir un peu d'intimité grâce aux trois chambres à coucher. La maison se trouve dans un quartier calme et elle possède un agréable petit jardin. Nous avons été ravis de cette expérience ! Excellent rapport qualité - prix.

Fomos muito bem recebidos pela Helena (e família) que tem imensas dicas preparadas sobre acessos e restaurantes. 
A casa tem condições óptimas e fica num bairro sossegado. 
O nosso objectivo era participar na Maratona do Porto o que se revelou dos melhores locais para aceder ao percurso, tanto a pé para apoiar os corredores como para aceder à meta rapidamente e os trazer de volta a casa.

Helena est une hôte très accueillante, souriante et disponible pour rendre service et rendre agréable notre séjour à Porto. La maison est idéalement située, proche du fleuve et des transports en commun. La situation de la maison entre ville et plage est idéale. Dans un quartier très calme. Nous n'avons malheureusement pas pu profiter du très agréable jardin et de la terrasse en raison du temps pluvieux et du vent mais l'extérieur de la maison est très sympa. Les lits sont très confortables. Je recommande vivement Helena, son accueil et sa maison!

Helena was a great host, real generous with her time, and made us feel welcome even though we had to change the check-in hour. She also had lots of maps to show us what to do and what to visit nearby. We settled into her house very quickly. It's a great deal to spend a weekend in Porto.

Nous avons passé 10 jours formidables à la fin du mois de décembre à Porto et dans ce petit appartement. Helena est une femme très adorable et toujours prête à aider. Elle a bien préparé l'appartement comme nous le souhaitions. L'appartement offre de la place à 6 personnes, bien que ce soit assez petit. Surtout le soir quand il fait noir et il est impossible de sortir. Ce qui  n'est pas le cas en été. Heureusement il y a un petit jardin, qui permet de se ballader un peu et de prendre l'air. C'est un coin idéal puisque l'appartement se trouve à 500 mètres de la mer, qui offre une vue splendide sur Porto et ses quais et à 3 km du centre de Porto.
Merci Helena pour l'hospitalité.
A fantastic trip, and have a sweet dream in here. The feeling is just like at home.

Is a beautifull place, cute, quiet and clean. Perfect for spend a days with the family near to the center of the town, few minutes, with a great comunication with other main places of the city, like the Serralves Museum and the beaches.
Helena is a gentle and polite person, and she told us everything about the city and the neighborhood to find all what we could need. She made us feel good like at our home.

Unbelievable entrance for her house.

She was a nice and respectful person. Every thing was clean and ready to enjoy the stay. Nice garden at the back of the house and warm place for winter. Nothing left behind in order to be a drawback.

We enjoyed dear Helena and wish you all the best with your future.
Regards,
Ata.

We were allowed to arrive five hours early to the property, which was a great help after our long and uncomfortable bus ride and we were able to remain in the house for the entire day after our departure. The house was as described and Helena was very helpful to shown us everything and gave us some food to get us started. The location was conveniently between the beach and centre with easy access to both via the bus and tram system and the garden and hammock were a delight.
L'accueil d'Helena a été à l'image de sa maison, c'est-à-dire, chaleureux et naturel. La maison est décorée avec goût. L'emplacement est idéal pour visiter Porto. A recommander

Très bon accueil avec des indications sur les restaurantś, supermarchés su quartier, avec les horaires et places sur la carte. 
Quartier moyen près de barres d,immeubles mais calme.

Helena nous a très bien accueilli, même si notre avion est arrivé avec deux heures de retard, soit minuit passé ! la maison est charmante, calme et sympathique, parfait pour un week-end entre amies. Dommage que le temps n'est pas été de la partie pour que nous puissions profiter agréablement de la petite terrasse et du jardin.

Helena nous a accueilli chaleureusement. Elle nous as indiqué à l'aide d'un plan du quartier toutes les commodités à proximité. Elle s'est montré tout au long de notre séjour, très disponible, toujours prête à nous faciliter notre séjour.
Le logement est très agréable, propre, joliment décoré, fonctionnel. La literie est de très bonne qualité.  Nous avons apprécié de manger dans le jardin. 
Merci beaucoup Helena pour votre accueil et votre disponibilité.

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Héléna (parle très bien le français). La maison est très agréable, propre, bien décorée. De nombreuses indications sur les restaurants, supermarchés, transports en commun sont très utiles. Quartier calme et bien placé pour visiter Porto.

Séjour parfait dans cette petite maison très agréable.
Le quartier est très tranquille, l'arrêt de bus est tout à côté, on peut faire des courses à proximité. On peut accéder au Douro très facilement, et prendre le tram pour se rendre à l'océan ou bien aux vieux quartiers de Porto.

Helena est charmante. Un jus de fruit, quelques fruits, un litre de lait nous attendaient. Il y a tout ce qu'il faut dans le logement.

Merci encore pour ce séjour très agréable.

Helena est une hôte très sympathique, qui a tout prévu pour faciliter le séjour : quelques victuailles pour démarrer, des plans, guides et brochures ... 
La "petite maison" est bien agencée et le jardin très agréable. Transports à proximité ( bus, tram et taxi ). 
Un lieu de séjour à recommander sans hésiter.

La casa es preciosa, muy cómoda y con mucho encanto. Muy bien situada al lado del rio y a mitad de camino del centro y de la playa. Helena tiene todo muy bien preparado en cuanto a información de todo tipo. La recomendamos sin ninguna duda.

The family house is indeed charming: everything you need is in and around the house. Good beds, very good shower and everything you need for a stay. All was very clean. Helena is really helpfull on times that you need her. She wants you to feel at home......and sure it works.
Nice house, nice garden, nice neighbourhood and nice rent lady.

We did not get to meet Helena in person during our stay as she was on holiday. However, she has got everything arranged, with her mum coming to check us in and information provided in her flat. 
The apartment, though slightly far from the city centre, is rather easily accessible -  Helena provides clear directions. The accommodation is exactly like what was shown online - very pretty!

Très bon accueil : Héléna parle très bien français. Elle a su nous donner toutes les instructions et indications pour pouvoir se repérer dans Porto. 
La location est très bien située que ce soit pour aller en centre ville ou à la plage.
La maison avec son jardin réuni toutes les qualités pour passer de bonnes vacances.
Très bon rapport qualité prix.
2 jours agréables dans un quartier bien desservi par les transports. Les renseignements de Héléna pour trouver sa maison sont parfait, l'accueil est cordiale et la maison charmante.
Todos los detalles para facilitarte la estancia y Helena muy amable nos ayudó con sus indicaciones.
Agréable maison très bien située à seulement 3 kms du centre de Porto. Helena parle très bien le français et nous a très bien renseigné sur tout ce qu'il y a à faire à Porto. Merci

Es war sauber, Lebensmittel für den Anreisetag wurden besorgt. Außerdem hat Helena uns telefonisch Anweisungen bezüglich des Weges zum Haus gegeben. Die Räume waren mit schönen Möbeln eingerichtet. Des weiteren gab es einen schönen Garten, der mit dem Haus in einer ruhigen Gegend liegt.

Un petit havre de paix dans un Porto bouillonnant : une ruelle peu fréquentée, un esprit de village, un petit jardin charmant… Mais surtout, un hôte très accueillant et très chaleureux, qui saura vous aiguiller - plans et guides à l'appui - pour profiter pleinement de la ville : c'est sans doute cela, l'esprit AirBnB !
Just perfect. Very proffesional approach and preparation.

Liebe Helena,
vielen Dank für den wunderbaren Aufenthalt in deinem charmanten und liebevoll eingerichteten Haus. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Du hast uns herzlich empfangen und alle Fragen beantwortet und gute Tipps gegeben. Dein Haus ist super sauber und gut ausgestattet. Der Garten und die gesamte Umgebung ist angenehm ruhig. Die Busverbindung ist ideal um schnell in die Altstadt zu kommen. Wir können dein Haus und dich als Gastgeberin jedem weiterempfehlen. Vielen Dank dafür! Wir wünschen dir alles Gute!
Obrigada.
Kirstin,Martina,Valentin&Lukas

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour d'une semaine avec nos trois enfants. La maison est très agréable, confortable et dans un quartier très calme. Nous avons pu profiter du jardin et de la terrasse. Helena est une hôte remarquable et cerise sur le gâteau elle parle très bien le français.

Hallo Helena, wir waren nun innerhalb eines Jahres zum zweiten Mal in Porto und dabei wird es nicht bleiben. Für eine Familie mit 5 Personen war Dein Haus wirklich perfekt, denn 3 Schlafräume bieten genügend Privatsphäre und zudem konnte ich mir als Frühaufsteher morgens erstmal einen guten Kaffee kochen, ohne einen Schlafsofabenutzer zu wecken-:)! Zudem kann man im Garten selbst im Schlafanzug eine erste Frischluftrunde drehen. Alles ist so wie beschrieben, geschmackvoll, viel Liebe zum Detail, sehr gepflegt, eine Urlaubsumgebung zum Wohlfühlen. Die Lage zwischen Stadt (Porto) und Meer (Foz/Matosinhos) ist gerade für den Sommer sehr schön, nur der 500er Bus hat uns einige Male mit sehr individuellen Verkehrszeiten...aber es ist ja Urlaub und mit Helena wäre das sicher nicht passiert... . Also, alles ganz wunderbar für Menschen, die wirklich Land und Leute kennenlernen möchten, da bellt dann auch mal ein Hund um die Ecke. Für andere Geschmäcker gibt es u. a. den Robinson-Club, wenn auch nicht in Porto...gut so.
Ganz liebe Grüße - obrigado e as maiores felicidades!

A Helena é uma anfitriã preocupada com o bem estar dos seus hópedes e mostrou-se sempre disponível para auxiliar na localização de pontos de interesse na cidade do Porto.
Adoramos a localização da casa. Um bairro silencioso e pacato, a 5 minutos a pé do rio e com transporte direto para o centro. Tencionamos regressar e recomendar a casa a amigos.Obrigada Helena
The house has been awesome, so comfortable, so new, so spacious...thanks Helena, we had an amazing stay. Muito Obrigado!

A casa da Helena é uma preciosidade no meio de Porto. Sem contar que a própria Helena é uma pessoa muito solicita, com várias dicas boas sobre a cidade e é uma excelente anfitriã.
A casa é completa e é até mais bonita que nas próprias fotos. A decoração é de bom gosto e a limpeza estava impecável.
Minha família e eu passamos dois lindos dias maravilhosos nesse lugar cheio de encanto.

Helena is very friendly and helpfull. Although she was busy herself, she has made it very easy for her guests with lots of information, maps, suggestions on the pinboard and in a well documented binder. We had no problem taking the buss, finding good food, etc., because of this.
The house is cosy and has everything you need. We were staying there with our 10 month old daughter, and there was a baby bed and baby chair!
The location is not walking distance from the city center, but busses come regularly, so that is not a problem.
Una casa preciosa en un entorno muy tranquilo. Muy cerca del autobus para ir al centro de la ciudad. Helena tiene todas las indicaciones y planos necesarios, muy amable y simpatica!!

Helena's house is truly charming. It is close to ocean and river Douro and getting to the city center is not a problem: buses goes regularly and there are beautiful old trams on the river embankment. Helena provided us lots of useful information and presented a special map with tips and places. If you are looking for quite and comfortable place to stay in Porto during your travel it definitely deserves your attention.

My 5 relatives had an impeccable short-stay in Helena house! 
Her attention to detail absolutely needs a 5 stars rating. 
Big beds, extra clean house, a perfect location, bottled water, available products to take your breakfast, a nice map with suggested restaurants and nearby visits. 
They truly recommend Helena's house... and Foz do Douro is so... so close! at a lovely walking distance. At the end of this experience, I am also a happy guy, since I have convinced them to go for an AirBnB rental. Had convinced them that Helena's house was a secure choice, taking in consideration all the other wonderful reviews.

Helena was a great host, she made us feel welcome and provided useful information on the local are.

I recommend this home!

Nos hemos  sentido como en casa. La descripción  del alojamiento se ajusta perfectamente  a lo q te encuentras  cuando llegas. És perfecto para 2 o 3 personas. Muy limpio, acogedor  y decorado con gusto y cariño.  Helena  es  una anfitriona  excelente. Preocupada q estés  agusto durante  tu estancia, informando, sugiriendo y arreglando  cualquier  incidencia.  Ha sido  un placer  y si volvemos  a Oporto  repetiremos alojamiento! !

It is a very comfortable and beautifully decorated house in a quiet neighborhood.
Helena is very friendly and helpful. She advised us where the closest shops were and how to move around the city.
The house is well equipped including WiFi and cable TV.
We had a great time and recommend it for visitors wanting to see Oporto.
Very nice house, good for children. Have lovely yard.

Cette maison est coquette et très propre. le quartier est calme et bien desservi par les transports en commun . Helena à tout préparé sur un plan et dans un bois pour que nos visites soient agréables.le temps était très pluvieux nous reviendrons plus tard dans la saison pour mieux en profiter.

Helena était présente à notre arrivée et elle s'est montrée disponible tout au long de notre séjour.
Le logement correspond bien à la description, il est propre et agréable. 
Le quartier est calme , sécurisé (stationnement d'une voiture possible dans la rue) et bien desservi par les transports (10 min du centre de Porto).
Nous recommandons ce logement.

Helena is a perfect host, making you feeling comfortable and welcome. She was very helpful providing us with advice for what ever we needed. The locatin of the house is perfect: 1 minute walk to the bus stop in the direction of Airport, 5 minutes walk to the bus stop of the tourist double-decker bus or normal bus/historical tram in the direction of the beaches or the old town. Our two kids (4 and 6 years old) enjoyed the adjacent small garden very much and the playgrpunds in a beautiful park nearby (in walking distance). We will come again!

This is a cosy little house with all comfort, clean and nicely decorated. The garden is very nice too, our kids loved playing there. The location is perfect in between old city and beaches (all easily reached by bus). So a great and recommended place to discover beautiful Porto with your family.

La Maison est vraiment comme sur l'annonce, propre et accueillante, bien située.
 Mme. Helena est très sympathique, accueillante  et nous fait sentir comme à la maison !
Nous avons eu une petite description de Porto qui nous fut vraiment utile !
Nous reviendrons !

A casa è como no anuncio, limpa e acolhedora, muito bem situada.
Da. Helena è muito simpatica, acolhedora e faz-nos sentir como na nossa casa!
Fez uma pequena descrição da vila do Porto que nos foi muito util.
Vamos voltar!
Maison parfaite,  au calme avec un jardin magnifique ! Plutôt bien situé et facile d'accès. Super rapport qualité prix.

Olá Helena,
Obrigada por nos receber e por ter sido tão gentil e atenciosa conosco.
Adoramos a hospedagem, a localização, o lugar como um todo.
Recomendo a todos! 
Mais uma vez obrigada e até a próxima.
Abraços!!
Helena fue un anfitrión excelente y todo cuanto anunció sobre la casa estaba a nuestra disposición durante la estancia.

I couldn't arrive due to visa issues, but my friends who stayed with Helena have really good impression.
The house is nice and cozy, good for friends visit.
Thank you, Helena.

Helena é super cuidadosa com a residência. 
O ambiente é aconchegante e muito bem cuidado.
Helena fez da residência um local com muitas informações do que se fazer no Porto, inclusive de lugares fora da região turística tradicional.
Lugar excelente para relaxar e descansar para aproveitar a cidade do Porto e sua região.
Indicaria para qualquer pessoa a escolha dessa residência.

We have had a perfect stay in Helena's apartment, which is nicely situated between the city and the beach. It is a great place with a lovely garden. A good place to stay outside of the tourist areas and be in the middle of the Portuguese every-day life. The communication with Helena went smooth and Helena arranged for a late check in as we had a late arrival time at the airport. We used the bus to get around in the city, so the two bus stops nearby were very convenient. We recommended the apartment to another family with kids in the same age range as ours (we have 3 kids aged between 15 and 8).
Bon accueil d Helena. Maison très bien aménagée et équipée. Jardin fort agréable. Maison proche transport en commun et commerces. À recommander.

Nos alojamos una familia de cinco miembros y todo fue perfecto, según lo anunciado. La casa tiene un emplazamiento magnífico, en un barrio tranquilo y muy bien comunicado. Sin problemas de aparcamiento. La casa es muy acogedora y reúne las condiciones necesarias para una estancia muy confortable.
Helena está atenta pero desde una gran discreción.
En definitiva: muy recomendable.

Nous avons passé 5 jours magnifiques à la casa d'Alicinha avec nos trois enfants entre 2 et 9 ans et nous recommandons ce logement accueillant à toute famille qui souhaite découvrir Porto. Situé dans un quartier très tranquille mais proche de toute commodité, le logement est décoré avec goût et l'on s'y sent bien. Helena a veillé à ce que nous ne manquions de rien et s'est toujours montrée très disponible.

Helena nos recibió y atendió perfectamente.
Nos facilitó información de la zona y fue muy amable en todo momento.
La casa es perfecta y tiene todo lo necesario.
Tenía un pequeño huerto al cual nos invitó y pudimos incluso probar un par de tomates de su cosecha.
Nuestra estancia fue perfecta. En nuestro caso accedíamos en coche al centro histórico de Oporto en 5-10 minutos de coche.

La maison est dans un quartier tranquille et près à pied de supermarchés, c'est pratique.
Il est facile de se rendre en bus ou tramway dans le centre de Porto. A pied, il faut environ 45mn (fait avec deux enfants).
Le jardon est agréable, les enfants ont apprécié le hamac.

Passamos dias incriveis na casa da Helena. A casa é muito gostosa e aconchegante. Embora nao seja no centro, o transporte é bem facil. Encontramos tudo muito limpo, com roupas de cama de qualidade e muito bom gosto e cuidado nos detalhes. Helena é uma anfitriã muito atenciosa nos dando informacoes e ajuda para tudo, durante toda a estadia. Recomendamos!

Nous avons passé une excellente semaine à Porto ! La maison est bien située ( à quelques minutes du Douro, et d'un arrêt de bus et de tramway) et est fonctionnelle et très propre.
Nous avons aussi apprécié la mise à disposition du jardin entièrement clos car nous avons 3 enfants en bas âge.
A notre arrivée, Héléna avait déjà tout prévu pour que notre séjour se passe au mieux. Helena a été absolument charmante.
Sincèrement nous sommes ravis !
Logement à conseiller !
Super séjour dans cette petite maison. Helena a été tres acceuillante et nous a bien aidé pour nous indiquer tous les endroits utiles dans le quartier ! Merci !
Very beautiful and comfortable apartment, very friendly and helpful host. We were happy to stay here.

The house was beautiful and the garden was a nice addition. Helena's place is situated away from the city center, but the public transport is well connected from there. It is also close to the beach which is convenient. Helena is very well prepared for her guests.

Accueil souriant et discret d'Héléna. Petite maison confortable et joliment aménagée où l'on se sent bien. 
Proche de la mer et du Douro, il est facile grâce aux nombreux bus tous proches de se rendre dans le centre de Porto.

Quartier calme proche de tout à pieds ou en bus. Maison adorable idéale pour petite famille et propriétaire très accueillante. 
A très bientôt

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour chez Helena, appartement très propre et spacieux,  Helena est une hôte très sympathique,  le seul bémol  c est qu'il y ni avait qu une chambre sur trois avec un lit 2 personnes

Nous venons de passer une semaine chez Helena.  Nous sommes ravis,  sa maison très fonctionnelle pour 4 est bien placée.  À côté des transports,  de l'accès à l'autoroute et à 5 min des bords du Douro.  Nous avons trouvé très facilement une place pour nous garer tous les jours.  Helena est une hôte très sympathique qui a le souhait de nous faire passer le meilleur séjour. Que du bonheur d'y être et une certaine émotion lors du départ.
La décoration,  le jardin forment un super lieu de vacances.  Proche du centre et des plages par le bus. Parfait pour une famille

We (two parents with son of 16) stayed in Helena's place, close to Porto, for one week. The house was fine for us, although cooking an evening meal is somewhat complicated with a single electric stove. There are plenty of supermarkets closeby, we did our shopping at Supercor Fluvial. Getting to and from the city centre of Porto takes some time. There are several buslines (and a historic tram) but one has to be patient. A rented bike is usefull, for exploring the coast or riding along the river (Vueguini rental). It takes 1,5 hrs to get with a rented car to from Helena's place to the interesting parts of the Douro valley and vinyards. On walking distance is the Foundation Serralves, museum and garden. Very nice!
Thanks for having us, Helena!

Very nice house! Cute bedrooms with comfortable beds, lovely garden with a table (we recommend having breakfast outside!), nice bathroom and kitchen. If you want to use the kitchen consider the fact that there's only one hotplate. 
The neighbourhood is very quiet but a bit far from the city centre (45 minutes by foot). However, there are several bus lines that offer a connection to various touristic places. 
In total, we really enjoyed our stay and Helena was a lovely host!
조용하고 아늑한 느낌이 좋았고 호스트도 친절하고 늦은 체크인과 짐보관등 해주어좋았다

ne vous attendez pas a un palace ,mais a un endroit ou on se sent bien , détendu .
Helena est discrète et en même temps elle est présente pour tout renseignement 
Vous êtes comme à la maison, l'essentiel de la vaisselle est la ,le linge de maison est propre .( parure de lit et serviettes ).
 au niveau de internet ne vous attendez pas a la fibre mais le wifi fonctionne et dans la douche vous ne serais pas sous les chutes du Niagara mais vous pourrez vous laver sans problème.
pour finir je vous conseil se logement ou il fait bon y passer des vacances !!!
Logement très agréable et très bien situé pour visiter Porto et ses environs.

Très bon accueil d'Helena qui parle très bien le français, très arrangeante quant aux horaires d'arrivée et de départ.Tout est bien organisé dans la maison (conseils,...). Très jolie maison avec un jardin bien agréable.
Nous  conseillons cette location car très satisfaits !
The house is lovely. Really enjoyed being in the garden. It has some stores and restaurants around, as well as well transport connections to the city centre. Definitively a very good place to stay!

Helena es una gran anfitriona, nos ha recibido con cada uno de los detalles posibles. La casa es aún mejor que las fotos, muy cómoda, el patio es una delicia a tener en cuenta (sobre todo con niños). Está en una ubicación muy tranquila, buena para los que no tienen problemas en caminar, y excelente para aparcar si van con coche. Muchas gracias Helena
Idéal pour visiter porto et se retrouver au calme avec un petit jardin le soir nous avons adoré merci pour tout

On n'a rien à reprocher à cette maison pittoresque et confortable avec le jardin qui nous a tant donné (surtout le prunier ;)). La maison est bien placé pas loin du fleuve et à côté de la piscine et du magasin bio. Endroit et hôtes très chaleureux. On y retournera avec plaisir.

Nous sommes venus 10j avec 4 enfants. Le logement est idéal, situé à 40 min à pieds du centre mais très rapide avec un beau bus qui longe le Douro. L'avantage est que l'on peut aller se promener le long du Douro le soir ou aller en 20' à  pieds a la plage. La maison est mignonne  parfaite pour 3 ou 4 enfants avec un jardin agréable et très calme et une terrasse pour manger. Helena  parle très bien français et a été  très accueillante. On dois remercier son mari qui a sauvé notre poussette qui avait perdu une vis dans l'avion.  A recommander !

Très agréable maison, très bien situé.
Helena est très accueillante.
N oubliez pas de goûter les petits pains dans la boulangerie située dans la rue au dessus.

Petite maison dans un  quartier calme de Porto, à deux pas du Douro, près du bus 500 qui mène directement au centre historique d'un côté et aux plages de l'autre. 
Petit jardin très agréable , où nous avons même pu déguster des tomates du potager.
Nous y avons passer une semaine très agréable en famille, avec nos trois enfants. Héléna est très attentive à ce que tout se passe au mieux pour ses hôtes.
conforme aux photos et déscriptions
Petite maison tres agreable pour 4 personnes,propre, bien située. Dommage qu'il y ait ce chien qui aboit la nuit.

Merci à Helena qui est une hôte d'exception ! Elle nous avait préparé une petite carte avec toutes les choses importantes à savoir. Nous avons également put profiter du jardin et du potager et de ses légumes délicieux ! Nous recommandons fortement ce logement !
Lovely home in a great location. Easy access to the beach and the city centre.

Maison très agréable avec un petit jardin tout aussi agréable... 
Helena est très accueillante ....
À proximité de Porto centre et des plages .
Helena's place is a great place to stay and it has evrything you need. Helena is very helpful and give a you lots of tipa to make the best out of your visit in Porto!

Ein sehr sauberes Apartment mit einer super netten Vermieterin, guter Lage und Einkaufsmöglichkeiten  2 gehminuten entfernt. Der Fluss ist auch nur 400 Meter entfernt. Zudem gab es einen kleinen Garten mit einer Hängematte, Rasenfläche und Essmöglichkeiten. Leider war der WLAN-Empfang nicht sehr gut bzw. In grossen Teilen des Apartments nicht vorhanden. Mit allem anderen waren wir sehr zufrieden!
Maison idéale pour une famille à côté de Porto. Lieux calme. Maison très propre

Nous avons passé un très bon week-end dans la maison d'Helena à 2 adultes et 3 enfants. La maison est spacieuse, agréable et propre, située à 5 minutes du fleuve et de la ligne de bus. Helena nous a accueilli très chaleureusement dans un français parfait ! On recommande

L'accueil d'Helena qui parle parfaitement le français est super, la maison est fidèle aux photos et très propre. Le centre ville et les plages ne sont pas loin (30 minutes de marche ou 10 minutes en bus). Helena s'est occupée de nous réserver un taxi pour le retour à l'aéroport. Nous y retournerons avec plaisir.
Excelente anfitriã com ótimas dicas de passeios. Atenciosa e prestativa.

Tres bon sejour chez helena. La maison avait tout ce qu il nous fallait pour notre sejour, propre et assez proche du centre en 20mns en bus. Les lits et chambres étaient confortables et le jardin est agreable pour boire le porto au soleil.  Helena est tres sympa et disponible si besoin.

Logement coquet, propre et suffisamment équipé pour un court séjour pour 6 personnes.  L'équipement est complet et des éléments d'information très pratiques pour se déplacer ou visiter Porto sont mis à disposition. Le centre historique de Porto est assez éloigné mais en bus ou en tramway cela ne pose pas de problème. Situé dans un quartier calme il est vraiment dommage que le chien des voisins nuise à la tranquillité de tous.  A part cela Helena nous a réservé un accueil sympathique et parle français, ce qui est très appréciable.
a very cute little house. an easy bus ride to the main downtown, and easily walkable to the river if you like going on walks!

Un super endroit, maison charmante, emplacement idéal (à mi-chemin entre le centre et la plage) pour ceux qui veulent être en ville mais tranquille.
A 20 h après une journée à Porto on est heureux de se poser sur la terrasse, dans le hamac...
Maison qui est bien conçue et pourrait accueillir 6 personnes sans problème. 
On a adoré.
Lovely house, very comfy beds, nice little garden. Thank you very much, Helena!
Une hôtesse vraiment très attentionnée, très gentille, exceptionnelle ❤️
Extremely nice place, the host is very agréable. Overall, highly recommended!
Muy recomendable.

It was a great pleasure for us (2 adults 2 schooler and 1child) to stay in Helenas beautiful house. It was very clean and comfortable and has everything we need. Also we enjoyed a lovely garden. Helena is  very nice and super hospitable. This place has very good location, is not far from the center and ocean and  close to the nice river embankment. Perfect transport  accessibility and parking space.  Highly recommend.
Close to local amenities and not a lot of money to get an uber into town

Maison bien structurée avec un jardin où il fait bon prendre ses repas

Nous avons aimé la localisation de la maison dans une region résidentielle et proche des moyens de transport

Beautiful house in a quiet neighbourhood. Everything as described, but the photos don't reflect how beautiful and cosy the house really is. Helena is a great host and we were very sad to leave this super cute house again. For us as a family with 4 small kids it was the perfect location.
Very clean and well equipped!!!
Thank you Helena!

Maison conforme à la description.
Très bon accueil et infos pratiques tres claires et très bien réalisées. ( plan, horaires de bus, etc).
Helena est une hôte disponible.
Seul tout petit bémol, ne rien laisser d alimentaire  sur le plan de travail de la cuisine' car il y a beaucoup de fourmis. 
Pour les prochains visiteurs nous avons laissé une bombe anti fourmis.
A noter.... la tres bonne boulangerie située juste au dessus de la maison (bâtiments roses). Très pratique, très bonne et très typique 
de ce qui se fait à Porto et personnel très  sympatique.
Nous recommandons vivement ce logement.
Friendly host invites you into a perfect family home. The river is near for a nice walk and children to play! Recommended!

Maison agréable et jardin fortement appréciable l'été. Bien située entre centre ville et mer. Très appréciable de se balader le long du Douro qui se situe à 500 mètres de la maison. Facile de se stationner à proximité. Helena est très agréable.
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour chez Helena. Appartement très propre.
Logement bien situé, propre avec un extérieur très agréable. Plan de porto à disposition et adresse pratique. Merci helena pour votre disponibilité.
Das Haus und die freundliche Gastgeberin Helena sind sehr zu empfehlen.
Very pretty cottage with lovely furnishings. Nice to have a garden which is very unusual in Portugal in a big city. Easy to get into town by public transport. Really good  stay. Thank you Helena.
Petite maison avec cour très agréable
If you are looking for a quaint, lovely place that is different but homey this is for you. It is "off the beaten path" but that is part of the charm.
Charmante maison et hôte très agréable. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour. Je recommande vivement.

Maison agréable, surtout pour le jardin.
Un peu loin a pied du centre ville mais bien desservie par les transports en commun
Helena est très agréable, surtout qu’elle parle très bien français
Merci pour cette semaine de découverte du portugal

name: Modern Sunny Midtown Gem
summary: A modern newly renoveted apartment with high ceiling and lots of natural sunlight. Simple yet edgy interior design. True size one bedroom located in the hip neighborhood of Kips Bay.
space: Perfect place for a few friends, or a couple to come and enjoy New York City in a way that is comfortable and affordable. Staying in an apartment in a great vibrant location that is far enough from the bustle, but close enough for you to walk to the Empire State Building, Madison Square Park, and Union Square. Union Square hosts their annual summer farmers market as well.  5/10 minute walk to Grand Central, where you can take practically any subway.
description: A modern newly renoveted apartment with high ceiling and lots of natural sunlight. Simple yet edgy interior design. True size one bedroom located in the hip neighborhood of Kips Bay. Perfect place for a few friends, or a couple to come and enjoy New York City in a way that is comfortable and affordable. Staying in an apartment in a great vibrant location that is far enough from the bustle, but close enough for you to walk to the Empire State Building, Madison Square Park, and Union Square. Union Square hosts their annual summer farmers market as well.  5/10 minute walk to Grand Central, where you can take practically any subway. You are able to access all the space. You will be provided with towels, clean sheets, body wash, and shampoo. I will also provide a fully equips kitchen. Will provide wifi and Netflix and HBO for free. I have pullout bed that can accommodate one person, in addition to a queen sized bed in the bedroom. I will not be available in person, but I will have a co-host
neighborhood_overview: Midtown East/Murray Hill/Kips Bay area is a wonderful neighborhood to stay in while visiting New York City. In the heart of Manhattan you are located close to the 6-N-Q-R-B-D trains a short walk from the home. This neighborhood gives any guest the real experience of living in the City far away enough from the business, but close enough to great eats, attractions and shopping. The duality of relaxation and exploration are met.
notes: Shir, my co-host if flexible with check in hours, just communicate with her when you plan on arriving, upon booking this listing.  There will be an additional $30 charge if the check-in is after 10pm. If keys are lost, there will be an addition $100 charge for lock change.
transit: You are close to the 6 line subway, which is the east side line. However with a short walk you can take any subway you would need. In addition we have buses that provide the same transportation as the subway, but a bit slower due to traffic. I would recommend using the subway to get everywhere or your feet.
access: You are able to access all the space. You will be provided with towels, clean sheets, body wash, and shampoo. I will also provide a fully equips kitchen. Will provide wifi and Netflix and HBO for free. I have pullout bed that can accommodate one person, in addition to a queen sized bed in the bedroom.
interaction: I will not be available in person, but I will have a co-host named Shir to guide you through any questions or concerns you have about the apartment. You will coordinate with her to check you in and out so you will mainly be in contact with her. If you have any concerns or questions about the unit over the course of your stay contact Shir. Her information will be provided upon booking. However, I am available if needed.
house_rules: - Please respect quiet hours beginning at 11pm to 9am the following day. - Please do not alter the orientation of the furniture layout. - Please contact me or my co-host with any concerns about the apartment.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Thank you for your kindness and availability.  We stayed 10 days for a business trip and had a great time !

This apartment is in a great location on a quiet street but close to everything.  It's actually bigger in real life than it looks in the pictures and it's exceptionally clean.  Shir met us there with keys and was a pleasure to work with.  We had such a lovely time in New York and this was such a pleasant place to come home to every night.

Fue extraordinario. El departamento muy lindo, bien ubicado, limpio. 
Pasamos unos días hermosos y nos sentimos muy cómodos!
wonderful place and in the center of everything.

Just finished spending a week at Leah's place. Very bright and very clean. It's a fantastic location located extremely close to the subway. Quiet location that's only a small trip to the massive summer crowds of New York City. Check in was a piece of cake and any questions I had during the week were immediately answered. I highly recommend!!!
Nice room at a convenient place
El departamento muy lindo! Tal cual como se ve en las fotos! Todo impecable! La ubicación muy buena, zona linda y tranquila, a una cuadra del subte. Volveria sin dudarlo!!
Great location! Highly recommend staying at Leah’s place when visiting manhattan :)

After researching different apartments in NYC for hours and hours, I was so incredibly thankful to have fallen upon Leah's place! It is perfectly located, super clean and stylish inside & the bed is so comfortable! The AC in the apartment is very refreshing and cooling, especially in New York's crazy-hot summers! The elevator-access to the apartment is also great, so that after a long day of exploring the city, you do not have to walk up a load of stairs, but can simply take the elevator up. This apartment was so fabulous to stay in, and I was so sad to leave it! Really recommend to anyone looking for the perfect apartment in NYC!!

Perfect location to visit NYC ! The appartment is in a nice neighbourhood (lot of restaurant, caffee,...) and only 1 block from the subway. You can see the top of the empire state building from the window.
The appartment is clean and 
I slept on the couch and it is not very confortable. There is a bed for two persons but the third person need to sleep on a couch in the living room.
There is an air conditionner in each room (fortunately ! this week was so warm and humid) but the installation is a little bit noisy.
This is for sure a apparment to advise !

Stylish,  safe and clean apartment in brilliant location. Communication with the host was amazing and they went out of their way to help us with early and late luggage drop offs and pick ups. Highly recommended.

Great location with easy transport links around New York City. Grand central only a few minutes walk away and subway on the next block which we found really useful when going longer distances. Apartment was clean with great facilities in the kitchen and bathroom and a good size communal space. Perfect for two or maybe three people. Meryl was a friendly  co-host who was very accommodating throughout our stay and available to contact should we have questions etc. Lots of food places nearby that have gluten free and other dietary meals as well. Would recommend!
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The location was great - lots of food options, access to subway, 10min walk to Empire State, conveniently located in midtown Manhattan. The place is extremely clean too and well kept. 

However, we weren't able to stay for the whole duration due to a misfortune with the apartment keys - we couldn't leave the building because of it. 

The host stepped up and tried to remedy the issue. Great communication all throughout, we weren't left in the dark and Airbnb was in the loop. By next day, the host graciously offered to rebook us to a nearby nice hotel. A bit inconvenient to checkout then check-in at a different place but the host and Airbnb ensured that we were taken care of. 

After our misadventures, we managed to enjoy the rest of New York, so thank you!

name: *** Next To Place Des Arts ***
summary: • Centrally located in the entertainment district. • Experience first-hand Montreal's unique culture, events and festivals. • Brand-new building is convenient to major subway and bus lines.
space: • Very bright apartment from early morning to sunset.  • Spacious and comfortable.  • All furnished, including a Smart TV with cable, Free Wi-Fi, microwave, dishwasher, laundry dryer and washer, etc.  • Everything is set up for you to feel exactly like home. • Spacious indoor heated pool & jacuzzi, state-of-the-art fitness facility, and an outdoor terrace with gorgeous views of Montreal.
description: • Centrally located in the entertainment district. • Experience first-hand Montreal's unique culture, events and festivals. • Brand-new building is convenient to major subway and bus lines. • Very bright apartment from early morning to sunset.  • Spacious and comfortable.  • All furnished, including a Smart TV with cable, Free Wi-Fi, microwave, dishwasher, laundry dryer and washer, etc.  • Everything is set up for you to feel exactly like home. • Spacious indoor heated pool & jacuzzi, state-of-the-art fitness facility, and an outdoor terrace with gorgeous views of Montreal. Guest has access to the entire place, including the gym, jacuzzi, indoor pool located within the building on the 11th floor. I am always ready to answer to any issues or questions my guests might have via: • Airbnb App • Text Messages, (Hidden by Airbnb) , (Hidden by Airbnb) ( (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)  A perfect gateway from which to explore the rich history of Old Montreal, the so-called birthplace of Canada
neighborhood_overview: A perfect gateway from which to explore the rich history of Old Montreal, the so-called birthplace of Canada. Step back in time and onto the old city's cobbled streets and explore the churches, ancient squares, restaurants and cultural landmarks that decorate it. Take part in frequent cultural events and activities as performances and street artists present you with lasting, unforgettable experiences.
transit: • Minutes away from the airport. • Incredible easy of access via train, subway and bus stations. • Parking lots and corners scattered across the area. • Near a significant highway that connects you to other parts of the city.
access: Guest has access to the entire place, including the gym, jacuzzi, indoor pool located within the building on the 11th floor.
interaction: I am always ready to answer to any issues or questions my guests might have via: • Airbnb App • Text Messages, (Hidden by Airbnb) , (Hidden by Airbnb) ( (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
house_rules: We would love our guests to keep the apartment in good standing and not to smoke indoors to avoid fees taken out of security deposit. Check in and check out times are 4PM and 11 AM. If you require an early check in/late check out, a charge of 50 $ will be added.

host.host_about:
I am an easy going person with a great passion for nature and travelling.. I love to be with and around people, I think I can learn something new from every person I meet.. I am curious to explore other cultures and ways of life..
currently I live in Montreal but have visited many places when I got the chance.

reviews.comments: Great apartment in a posh downtown location.

This unit was everything as advertised. The location was spectacular - literally less than 5 minutes walk from Place d'Arms Metro station (orange line) and less than 10 minutes walk from Place d'Arts Metro station (green line). This made it so so easy to see different parts of the city via the Metro and our trip experience was definitely heightened by this. From midway up the building you have an amazing  view of both Old Montreal and the Musée des Arts. The balcony is the perfect size for two people to sit and have their morning coffee. The unit was clean, the linens crisp and it was equipped with air conditioning, which was a welcome relief from the 32 degree Celsius weather outside. You have access to a gym, pool and terrasse that also has a beautiful view. Mike's assistant Vincent was extremely patient with us after we arrived later than anticipated due to road construction. He gave us great tips about the city and the immediate vicinity which helped us plan our week. Overall, the location, stunning view and well laid-out unit made this trip a 10/10. We would definitely recommend Mike's Superior Condo to family and friends traveling to Montreal!

Beautiful place in the heart of downtown Montreal. It was our first time visiting and the location was perfect. Walk to pretty much anything. The apartment is immaculate, the building is super nice, and the doormen are very friendly. The apartment is exactly like the pictures, nothing more.

Great apartment. Central location, well equiped, very comfortable. Would definitely recommend if you want something central in Montreal. Only minus was no toilet paper, but it's easily fixable with supermarket two blocks away!

The place was in a fabulous location, was extremely clean, and well-kept. Overall we had a very comfortable stay. However, we paid approx. $150 extra to add a third person to our reservation, but we did not get a third key nor did we get additional rolls of toilet paper when we asked Mike for more after we used our two provided rolls. It would have been nice to receive an extra key and a third roll of toilet paper for the extra $150 it cost to have a third person.
Mike's place is incredible. It is the perfect walking distance to really great shops and restaurants. Mike was very helpful and great with communication! We would definitely stay again!!

We really loved to stay here. Everything was well prepared and communicated by Mike. Apartment is as shown in the pictures and points of interest in Montreal are near by. The view onto Old Town and St. Lawrence river are fantastic. We would definitly go there again.

Location, location, location! 
Cozy condo in the heart of downtown mtl! Great gym, pool! Super clean apt, perfect for a couple and the pullout couch is super comfortable! I would definitely stay there during my next stay in Montreal! Perfection!

Amazing location and beautiful condo. We had all that we needed and were just a walk away from everything Montreal had to offer. The condo was super clean and the building offered some great amenities!
Great place to stay, large windows and a good view to the right. Very clean and spacious. Full set of utensils, pots and pans for the kitchen. Definitely would stay here again.
Mike's place was great. We had some difficulties with check-in, but it was smooth sailing after. Good location, nice building, nice place.
Great location and everything! Love that appartment.
Amazing flat, best location and I really enjoyed the jacuzzi!
This place was amazing. We where able to see Jazz Festival stage from our balcony. Right in the center of the city and everything around. Clean and welcoming.

Appartement jouissant d’une très belle vue.  A 2 pas de la place des Arts. Très central. L’appartement est très confortable et propre. Indications très précises pour l’arrivée et le départ.  
Nous reviendrons

Perfect location to enjoy the great city of Montreal. But ask Mike if the apartment has been fixed and is ready to welcome guests. Too many and basic things that were not in order when we stayed 10 days in January 2019.

Es tranquilo, muy espacioso, y esta totalmente equipado de todo.
Tuvimos una estancia muy agradable.
La terraza es impresionamte.

The property boast from prime position and breathtaking (Website hidden by Airbnb) has everything you might need without being cluttered. It is a really beautiful place.

We brought top quality local seafood at very affordable prices (very impressed).  Close to Porto and 8 minutes away by car from a big outlet shopping mall.
Highly recommended property!!

Catherina is always ready to helps us if there is any kind of problem. If you want to have good time in a wonderful setting I recommend you Catherina's place! Thank you for your trust and kindness!
5 estrelas. Ótimas condições, com tudo o que é necessário à disposição. Sem nada a apontar. A D. Manuela é muito simpática e incansável para que não faltasse nada. Voltarei sem duvida.
Very nice and spacious place, balcony with fantastic view!

This is a lovely, airy and large appartment with great sea views and use of a good sized shared pool. The appartment was immaculately clean and the hosts Manuela and her daughter were most welcoming. They provided beach towels as well as bath towels - but you might want to bring body boards along if you can to make the most of the surf. 
The local Mindelo area is a bit down at heal, but offers all the basic shops needed and a few beach bars and a couple of restaurants. 
It’s a half hour walk or 5 min drive to the metro station and then a 40 minute journey into Porto centre.

Manuelas home is truly spectacular. The view over the ocean is incredible. 5 days wasn't long enough for us... there is so much to explore and we never had to get in the car. The apartment is enormous and very stylish. We wish we could have stayed longer. Next time we may not hire a car, but hire bikes and cycle the boardwalk. Bring wetsuits as well... Manuela and her daughter were so inviting and were contactable the whole time.... highly recommended!
Das Apartment befindet sich in einer tollen Lage direkt am Strand mit einer wunderschönen Aussicht auf das Meer. Die Wohnung  ist sehr groß und sauber. Manuela ist sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend.

Excellent accueil et prestation 
Merci beaucoup

Private bathroom is en-suite, so no hallways or roommates to worry about. We have a great cat named Squiggles who is very sweet and talkative, so must be cool with a chatty cat!

We are across the street from great local bar with nice outside seating, and there is a delicious vegan diner downstairs.

neighborhood_overview: Straddles Williamsburg and Bushwick - 10 minutes to industrial chic off Morgan (Ichiran, the amazing Tokyo ramen import just opened), or 10 minutes to fun bars and restaurants off Graham and Lorimer. Montrose also has its own collection of great spots to hang - Tradesman, a chill, cozy bar with nice outdoor section literally steps away, Win Son, an amazing Taiwanese restaurant is three blocks away, or Champs, a hip vegan diner is right below us.
notes: Our cat can be pretty talkative, sometimes at night. That said, many people have stayed and don't hear her with the door shut.  Ear plugs are available should you desire.
transit: Take the L to Montrose Ave, apartment is 1.5 blocks away. Easy walking distance to other spots in Williamsburg and Bushwick.
access: Very large living room and and nicely equipped kitchen available in addition to large private bedroom, bathroom, and communal outdoor area.
interaction: We are available via phone and email for any issues, and our roommate will be in and out and around for anything as well.  We provide a great customized PDF with local food spots sorted by distance.
house_rules: No shoes in the house, don't feed the cat, don't open the windows, and don't touch the plants.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Hi!  I live in Brooklyn with my girlfriend Paige. I've been in New York City for 17 years - came here for school and never left.  I love to snowboard, grow plants, cook Chinese food, bicycle, and drink scotch.  Studied history and art history in school, now work as a producer and agent for visual artists.  Come packed with recommendations for almost everything.

reviews.comments:
Kung's place was centarlly located; right on the L train line, comfy, and the clean towels were everything. 

His place is located in a hip area of BK. Champs, a vegan restaurant...that's definitely like "a (Website hidden by Airbnb) located right downstairs from Kung's place and the food is soooo poppin! #breakfastburrito

The apartment and neighborhood are really nice and have all the things a person could ask for!
#kungsthebest
#highlyrecommend
#followemailedinstructions

Kung was great at communicating with us and approved our room request right away, even though we sent it the day before our trip! What a lifesaver! We only got to meet briefly at check-in as he was about to go on a trip of his own, but he was delightful and made us feel very welcomed and we were always able to reach him thru the app with any questions/concerns. My daughter and I loved the location because it's right next to Champs Diner and around the corner from Dun-well Doughnuts, two of my daughter's favorite vegan eateries! We had breakfast at Champs before heading into the city each day, so convenient and delicious! The L train is also right around the corner and it's a fairly quick ride into Manhattan. We were able to get almost everywhere we wanted with only 1 train transfer (including to Yankee Stadium, the theater district and Greenwich Village). The apartment itself is very spacious! It's located on the 3rd floor. The stairs were a little hard for me at the end of the day, but I'm in my 60s now so I'm sure they would be fine for younger/ more athletic people. My 34yo daughter had no trouble with them. There is a very friendly cat named Squiggles that lives here. She sleeps a lot during the day, but sometimes "sings" during the night. It didn't bother us, but if you're a light sleeper maybe use ear plugs. Kung did make us aware of this before we arrived so it wasn't a surprise. The bed was big & comfy and Squiggles even came in to sleep with us for part of the night. (My daughter left the door open, hoping the cat would come in. You can leave the bedroom door shut if you want to keep her out). Kung's roommate was staying in the other bedroom during our stay. We barely saw each other, but she was very nice when we did. One of the only issues we had was it was pretty hot & stuffy the first night, but Kung asked us the next morning how our stay was and then told us how to operate the central fan/air so our 2nd night would be more comfortable. Also, the kitchen was pretty messy and the floors needed a good sweep, but like I said in the beginning, we booked the day before and Kung was going out of town so they probably thought they weren't going to have guests that week. It wasn't a big deal for us anyway. Overall, my daughter & I had a really great stay and would definitely stay here again! Highly recommend. Thanks Kung (& Squiggles) for your hospitality!

Stayed in Kung's spot for a weekend in NYC. The location was great- Bushwick and Williamsburg are amazing areas. The bathroom straight off the master is a convenience (especially when only renting the room). The cat does sing at night, as advertised. Kung provides ear plugs but my girlfriend and I didn't mind. Overall, great value and would stay w/ Kung again.

host.host_about:
ALOHA !  E komo mai . . . and mahalo for choosing to stay with Captain Cook Resorts!  

Captain Cook Resorts manages over 140 privately owned vacation rentals in Waikiki (a district of Honolulu on the island of Oahu).  Everyone on the fun and energetic CCR team works hard to offer great accommodations, great service, and has a passion for sharing all that Oahu has to offer our guests!  

We appreciate that you're on vacation, and we ask that you let us know if there's anything we can do to make this visit stand out as one of your best!

Provided with your rental:

• Bed linens, bath, beach & kitchen towels, dishes, silverware, cookware (including tea kettle & rice cooker)
• Beach chairs
• Hair dryer, iron & ironing board
• Several days’ supply of coffee filters, laundry detergent, dish soap, dishwasher soap, bar soap, 2oz shampoo & 2oz conditioner, paper goods (paper towels, tissue, toilet paper), and basic cleaning supplies. Additional sundry and food items are available local markets and grocery stores, for example, Safeway, at 888 Kapahulu Avenue, or Costco at 525 Alakawa Street (between the airport and Waikiki).
 
Not provided with your rental:
 
• Beach umbrellas, beach toys, aluminum foil, Zip-Lock baggies, coffee, condiments, seasonings, cooking oil, fabric softener, bleach, and hand lotion.

Please let us know if you have any questions!

Mahalo!
