Soy de origen chileno, pero vivo en Barcelona hace 15 años, conozco a la perfección cada rincón de la ciudad, pueden hacerme cualquier tipo de consulta, si es que lo necesitan.
neighborhood_overview: El barrio de Poble Sec, es la mejor zona de pintxos a 1e de toda Barcelona. Cuenta con numerosos bares para todos los gustos. Esta muy bien comunicado, de ambiente cosmopolita guarda su esencia típica en las plazas, conservando su esencia undergroung.  Caminando unos minutos puedes dar un paseo por el Montjuik, hermoza zona verde de parques, desde donde tienes las mejores vistas de todo Barcelona. También puedes fácilmente viajar en teleférico hasta el puerto. Ubicado a 10 minutos a pie de la Fundación Joan Miró y la zona de museos de Montjuik.
notes: la casa esta ubicada a pie de calle, asi que el ruido de la calle no lo podemos controlar por favor futuros huespedes, cuidar la llave de casa, si la pierden tendran que pagar 20€ por que nuestra puerta es de seguridad y una copia de llave es cara. Gracias.
transit: Puedes acceder facilmente al metro Poble Sec, estaciones de Buses y Bicing (sistema de bicicletas públicas de Barcelona).
access: Los huéspedes pueden utilizar todos los espacios comunes y la cocina.
interaction: Soy de origen chileno, pero vivo en Barcelona hace 15 años, conozco a la perfección cada rincón de la ciudad, pueden hacerme cualquier tipo de consulta, si es que lo necesitan.

name: Big and luminous apartment in Little Italy
summary: Big and beautiful apartment (4 1/2) in the center of Little Italy, calm and flourishing neighborhood. Renovated in 2017, the housing has the advantage to be very clean. Located close to Jean-Talon Market and many services (bank, restaurants, grocery store, liquor store, metro station of Castelnau orJean-Talon).
space: Beau et grand appartement au coeur de la Petite Italie, quartier calme et effervescent. Rénové en 2017, le logement est très propre. Situé près du marché Jean-Talon et près de tous les services (banques, épiceries, restaurants, SAQ - alcool, stations métro).
description: Big and beautiful apartment (4 1/2) in the center of Little Italy, calm and flourishing neighborhood. Renovated in 2017, the housing has the advantage to be very clean. Located close to Jean-Talon Market and many services (bank, restaurants, grocery store, liquor store, metro station of Castelnau orJean-Talon). Beau et grand appartement au coeur de la Petite Italie, quartier calme et effervescent. Rénové en 2017, le logement est très propre. Situé près du marché Jean-Talon et près de tous les services (banques, épiceries, restaurants, SAQ - alcool, stations métro). A luminous and spacious room with king size bed, fully equipped kitchen, renovated bathroom, another room with a sofa bed (2 places) with work space if needed, washer, dryer and a terrace for your summer dinner. Une chambre lumineuse et spacieuse avec portes françaises et un lit king, une grande cuisine toute équipée, une salle de bain fraîchement rénovée, une chambre d'ami à l'arrière avec divan-lit (double) avec espace de
neighborhood_overview: L'appartement est à quelques minutes à pied du Mile-end, du marché Jean-Talon, des musts à visiter pour toute escapade montréalaise. The apartment is just a few minutes away from the Mile End neighborhood and Jean-Talon market, which are a must for any Montreal trip.
transit: Métro Jean-Talon ou De Castelnau  Ligne autobus 55
access: A luminous and spacious room with king size bed, fully equipped kitchen, renovated bathroom, another room with a sofa bed (2 places) with work space if needed, washer, dryer and a terrace for your summer dinner. Une chambre lumineuse et spacieuse avec portes françaises et un lit king, une grande cuisine toute équipée, une salle de bain fraîchement rénovée, une chambre d'ami à l'arrière avec divan-lit (double) avec espace de travail à disposition, laveuse/sécheuse et une terrasse conviviale pour vos soupers.
house_rules: - Pas de bruit après 11h  - Pas de party

host.host_about:
Freelance in PR - arts & food
Voyageuse sympatique : )

reviews.comments: Beautiful clean bright apartment, as advertised.

Marie's place was perfect.
I visited there with my friends and we had great time. Transportaion was convenient and we can go to a lot of bars or restraunt around there. 
Place was so pretty and clean. I liked it a lot.
Super appartement et hôte très arrangeante ! Je recommande

Superbe refuge où poser ses valises le temps d'une petite virée sur Montréal. Tout a été facile y compris pour le stationnement. Très bien situé. Merci à Marie qui nous a suggéré plusieurs lieux de sorties intéressants!

Wonderful apartment as advertised. Marie is a great host. Thanks Marie! 

Our stay took place during a particularly cold winter week, but we were plenty warm. 

We were comfortable and appreciated the proximity to a number of good restaurants, cafés, and bars. Check out nearby Dispatch for coffee and Fieldstone for brunch.
J’ai adoré habité chez Marie! Super beau condo,propre et bien situé. Marie a étévraiment accomodante :)
Marie’s place was exactly as described, cute appartment with plenty of space in a nice neighborhood. I would recommend her place to anyone! Thanks Marie!

The place was as described in the listing.  The place is located in a walking distance to metro station. The market (Marché) is also near if you want to get some fresh groceries. I would recommend staying at this place.

Excellent location and apartment! It was well decorated and the photos truly displayed what it looked like. It was beautifully renovated and the bathroom was great. We really appreciated the quick communication from Marie. Since it is located on a busy street, it can be quite loud. There are great little coffee shops and restaurants all around. Overall good experience, would recommend.
Excellent

Marie's place cannot be beat as far location!  Right in the middle of amazing dining, shops and groceries.  Her apartment has great energy, is cute as hell with a deck perfect for you to ease into your day.  Check in and check out was a breeze and Marie was very responsive to our few texts sent.

Super bel endroit. On y a passé quatre nuits en famille (couple avec deux enfants 7 et 10 ans). L'appartement est à 30 minutes du vieux port et de ses musées en autobus (même chose en métro mais, honnêtement, les gens sont plus souriant dans le bus). Il est situé au-dessus d'une superbe épicerie italienne, et à moins de 10 minutes du marché Jean-Talon et du Parc Jarry (piscine, terrain sports). Il y a aussi plusieurs petits parcs avec jeux d'eau et cinéma en plain air. Et de la bonne bouffe, il y en a à profusion. On a bien aimé!

Marie is one of the best host and
easy to communicate and freindly.
Her appartment  is best location
and very clean and cozy.
Wish to come back soon!!
This space is exactly as described. Great location and neighbourhood, close to the Metro, it was an excellent place to stay. Well deserved 5* reviews.
Great place. Excellent location.
Marie’s place was very cute and stylish. She gave us awesome tips and was very quick to respond to our requests.
Nice. Spacious, location excellent, above a lovely supermarket: a little noisy due to construction

name: One-Bedroom Apartment with Balcony
summary: This modern property is decorated in grey tones and comes with 1 double bedroom and 1 bathroom. The living area includes a sofa bed, a TV and a dining area.
space: Located in Barcelona, just 600 m from Sagrada Familia, Bcn Sagrada Familia Apartments offers a furnished balcony and free WiFi. Sant Pau-Dos de Maig Metro Station is 5 minutes' walk away. This modern property is decorated in grey tones and comes with 1 double bedroom and 1 bathroom. The living area includes a sofa bed, a TV and a dining area. The kitchenette is equipped with a microwave, coffee machine and electric kettle. Jardins de Montserrat Roig Gardens are just 100 m from Bcn Sagrada Familia Apartments and you will find restaurants in the surrounding streets. Plaza Catalunya is a 20-minute metro ride away and Barceloneta Beach is 4 km from the apartment  Eixample is a great choice for travellers interested in architecture, food and tapas. Check in time from 15 to 21, arriving between 21 and 23 extra cost of 25 euros, Arriving past 23 extra cost of 45 euros. Tourist city taxes not included cleaning fee 20 euros Tourist registration code: HUTB-009648

name: Cosy Terrace Studio
summary: Seria um prazer recebê-lo no Porto! O estúdio está localizado no centro da cidade com diversos pontos de interesse por perto, assim como serviços (Restaurante, cafés, supermercados, etc)   O espaço tem um belíssimo terraço com vistas desafogadas.
description: Seria um prazer recebê-lo no Porto! O estúdio está localizado no centro da cidade com diversos pontos de interesse por perto, assim como serviços (Restaurante, cafés, supermercados, etc)   O espaço tem um belíssimo terraço com vistas desafogadas. O apartamento está a 15 minutos a pé de Aliados, a principal praça da cidade, e perto de muitos monumentos e atrações famosas: a maioria dos hóspedes visitam a cidade a pé. A paragem de autocarro está a 50 metros, poderá encontrar o 302 e 402. A estação de metro do Carolina Michaelis fica a 10 minutos a pé. A praça de táxis fica a 3 minutos a pé. Estacionamento público gratuito disponível.  Possibilidade de aluguer de scooter e bicicletas.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: The place was clean, in perfect location, close to Metro station.AND the host, Miguel, was super friendly and helpful.

Lovely stay at Miguel's place! His studio was a perfect fit for my friend and I to spend a few days exploring Porto. He was very flexible with an early check in. When we arrived to the place, he was waiting for us and led us right up to the apartment, orienting us to the space and area. He gave us excellent activity and local restaurant recommendations. The apartment are on the top floor (but don't worry there is an elevator!) and this location provides beautiful views of the city and included a large terrace (perfect for breakfast or dinner). The apartment was well set up, had everything we needed and very clean and nice. Miguel also printed out my boarding pass and slid it under the door and was flexible with a late check out as well where we gave the keys to his mom who lives in the building (so convenient). He was a great host and I would highly recommend staying at his studio while in Porto!

A minha estadia no apartamento do Miguel foi muito boa. O apartamento é como mostram as fotos, a varanda é realmente muito boa. Toda vez que precisei contatar o Miguel ele foi muito atencioso e rápido nas respostas. Fica perto do super mercado continente e alguns cafés. Recomendo!

I met Miguel's mother who was lovely. I could leave her my luggage : she lives in the same building. She brought my luggage to the apartment before I checked in. The studio was super clean (floor, kitchen, dishes, bathroom, balcony...). For breakfast, I could use capsules which was very appreciated. The kitchen is fully functional. All furniture looked new; a fire extinguished and a fire safety towel are easily accessible. I recommend staying in Miguel's studio !

Miguel fue un excelente host. Estuvimos todo el tiempo en contacto por cualquier duda o necesidad que tuviéramos. El departamento tiene lo necesario y una terraza muy linda. Está muy bien ubicado y de puede llegar caminando a los puntos más importantes de la ciudad. Lo recomiendo.
Miguel's house is very cosy. With a fantastic terrace. Clean and very comfortable.
Perfect. Miguel is very responsive on phone. His mother who lives in the building is here to recieve you and privide you with the keys.

Miguel was very helping as a host and was always available in case you needed something. My stay was good at his apartment. The apartment is good enough for someone looking for a short stay in Porto who may be willing to visit and explore the city.

Monolocale molto carino, pulito e comodo per la vicinanza alla metro. Non abbiamo conosciuto Miguel ma ci ha accolto sua madre, che è stata molto gentile e disponibile. Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo.

Excellent stay at Miguel's appartemnt, really close to the center and a wonderful terrasse, when you can choose to have your breakfast. 

You can easily choose it for a Short stay in Porto (For the sensitive earings, think about the ears plugs ;) because of the street noise) 
+ The sofa bed is quite tall, ok for two adults but not as comfortable as a real bed for people who have a fragile back like us two ! :)

Нам очень понравилось, квартира чистая, уютная, есть все необходимое. Рядом с квартирой большой супермаркет, круглосуточная аптека, есть кафе, где можно взять еду на вынос за небольшие деньги. До центра пешком минут 20. Хозяин квартиры был очень приветлив! Однозначно рекомендую!
Très bien situé  20 mn du centre appart très propre  sa maman très gentil pour nous accueillir  Appart lumineux nous nous sentions comme chez  nous
Wonderful palace!!! Everything was good
¡Ha sido genial! Muy limpio, cercano al centro e igual que en las fotos. Miguel ha sido muy amable y seguro que repetiremos en próximas visitas.

We had a wonderful stay at Miguel's place. The terrace is amazing and his mother who did the check in was really lovely and even helped us to find a local restaurant on the first night. 

Obrigado!
Estava tudo limpo e arrumado.

Very nice flat on a quiet street and with a huge terrace - ideal for sunny morning  coffees. The flat was very clean and had everything we needed for a short stay. Miguel's mother welcomed us and she was a very kind and approcheable host.

We enjoyed the location as not too far from the city centre (Ribeira), c 15 min walk, and there were shops nearby (the pastry cafe shop before the flat street is excellent and perfect for breakfast!).

The only point I'd raise is the shower - difficult to manager to get a good temperature and not enough water pressure. 

Thanks for the stay Miguel!

Der Kontakt zu Miguel war vor und während unseres Aufenthalts klasse. Er hat immer schnell geantwortet und uns Tipps und Hilfe für unsere Erkundungstour in Porto. Miguels Mutter wohnt im selben Haus und hat uns sehr herzlich empfangen, uns die Wohnung gezeigt und ein paar Tipps für die Umgebung geben (Supermarkt, Bahnstation usw.). Sie spricht nur Portugiesisch, aber mit etwas Spanisch und Händen und Füßen hat die Verständigung trotzdem super geklappt :) Die Wohnung ist sauer und es ist alles vorhanden was man für ein paar Tage Aufenthalt braucht. Zu Fuß braucht man 15 - 20 Minuten in die Innenstadt, dafür liegt die Wohnung ruhig und man hat von der Dachterrasse einen schönen Blick.

Miquel is very responsive and helpful. He even gave a ride to airport at night. His mother, who let into studio is very nice too. The appartment is sunny, good for a couple. There is everything you need. There were some problems with shower, but Miguel promised to fix it. The studio is 10 min from metro station  Carolina Michaelis. Just bed could be more comfortible.
Appartement très bien agencé . Très propre et confortable. Accueil très chaleureux de la maman de Miguel.

Una estancia recomendable. El trato con Miguel muy bueno, en todo momento se mostró amable y disponible para cualquier duda que pudiese surgir. La casa está genial y si vas en época de buen tiempo podrás aprovechar su magnífica terraza. La única pega la poca presión de agua caliente.
Spotless little studio, right in the heart of this beautiful city. Sunny, spacious terrace with a view. We used a motorbike, only way to get around, especially if you're stuck for time.

Buen apartamento, situado a unos 15-20 minutos andando del centro de Oporto. Es pequeñito, pero suficiente para pasar un par de días en pareja o con amigos. Se puede aparcar sin problema en la zona y no es de pago.
C'est un petit studio agréable avec une belle terrasse ensollei
Localização muito boa. O apartamento estava bem limpo e apesar de pequeno tem tudo que é necessário para uma boa estadia.
Apartamento muito bem localizado com uma sacada grande com vista linda! Fica próximo ao centro e transportes públicos! A recepção é extremamente simpática e prestativa! Indicação garantida
Communication with Miguel was perfect. The place was clean and like shown on the pictures. Close to the city center. I had a great stay!

Très bien situé très propre la maman de Miguel très gentil qui nous a acceuilli malgré la difficulté de langue mais on s'est compris quand même    Je recommande fortement avec une belle terrasse   tout était parfait

El estudio es ideal para pasar una estancia en pareja. El piso es pequeño pero con todo lo necesario, y tiene una terraza desde la cuál puedes disfrutar de vistas de gran parte de la cuidad. Todo estaba muy limpio, y Miguel se mostró muy accesible.
Alojamiento más que recomendable.
Très bien !
Great space and great people. Loved staying here and would stay again for sure.

Bon emplacement, proche du métro Carolina Michaelis, logement impeccable, grande terrasse avec vue dégagée. Miguel est très réactif par messagerie et disponible pour toute question. Allez y sans hésiter !

La comunicación con Miguel fue muy buena, al llegar nos recibió la madre y nos guió hasta el apartamento. Al ingresar el departamento se encontraba impecable.
Respecto a la comodiad creo que está bien si lo que uno busca es estar fuera todo el día y llegar a dormir, pero resulta un poco chico si uno desea disfrutar un poco de las instalaciones. La cocina está bien equipada, pero se hace un poco incomodo cocinar en ese espacio (por ejemplo hay un solo enchufe y hay que estar desenchufando los electrodomesticos todo el tiempo). La nevera es pequeña y el agua caliente para bañarse alcanza para una persona.
Tiene una terraza bellisima para desayunar.

Very pleasent stay! It's a truly cosy house, divided into "interior" and "exterior". You have everything you need on the inside, and on a functional way, then you have a very cool balcony / rooftop, in the outside, that I'm sure will be great to spend some time in the Summer!
Casa muito bem localizada e em zona bastante calma. Os anfitriões são super prestáveis. Recomendo!

Perfect space for 2 people who want privacy and tranquility. 
Very Close to Carolina Michaelis Metro station, and in a calm street. 
Super clean apartment, and the balcony as a super nice view!
I will stay there for sure in my next visit to Porto, also a perfect spot for traveling in Business.
Cozy terrace with a great view, enjoyed very much staying there. I certainly recommend.

Apesar do seu tamanho o estúdio é bastante cómodo, tem uma varanda otima e está bastante perto da metro da Casa da Música. Tem mini mercados, confeitarias, churrascaria e farmácia muito perto. O Miguel foi muito prestável e simpático connosco.

Der Aufenthalt in Porto war super, leider habe ich Miguel nicht persönlich kennengelernt, doch die Begrüßung durch seine Mutter war sehr herzlich. Die Unterkunft war wirklich in Ordnung, mit persönlich fehlte ein Lesesessel und ein Radio, sonst war alles top. Auch das Auschecken verlief wieder über  Miguel's
Mutter, doch alles war problemlos. Ich hoffe, ich habe die Unterkunft ordnungsgemäß hinterlassen, da ein Feedback nicht erfolgte.

This clean, well equipped compact apartment with lovely sunny terrace is well situated to access restaurants and shops.  You can walk to the older Central area of Porto as it is all downhill most of the way. A taxi, Uber or public transit can bring you home.  Grocery store is just a couple of blocks away.  Miguel responds quickly to any requests or questions and his parents live in the building if you need anything. If there were any issues with the shower previously they have been rectified as there was lots of hot water and it worked just fine.  Enjoy a morning coffee or evening glass of wine on the sunny upper balcony with a view over Porto.  Churrasco Alicante just down the street has great Portuguese style grilled chicken take away or eat in ( plus other items) and you can enjoy coffee and pastry on the patio at the corner cafe. I would certainly recommend Miguel’s apartment for your stay in Porto.

Nous avons passé un bon séjour chez Miguel. Nous avons été bien accueillis par la mère de Miguel. Le logement est simple mais le rapport qualité prix est très bon. Nous avons eu un petit problème avec le store, mais Miguel nous a tout de suite recontactés pour trouver le meilleur moment pour le réparer (ce qui a été fait dans la journée!). Merci encore pour tout!
Super séjour dans le studio de Miguel (la vue du balcon est très appréciable).
Muito bom, recomendo

Das Appartement war sehr schön. Es ist nicht besonders groß aber mit allem ausgestattet, was man benötigt. Leider gab es keine Heizung was an den verregneten Tagen schön gewesen wäre. 
Die Terrasse ist super, riesig groß und mit einem tollen Blick über die Stadt.

Check in war sehr flexibel. Portugiesisch ist von Vorteil, aber die Kommunikation mit Englisch und per Hand und Fuß geht gut klar.

Insgesamt absolut empfehlenswert!
Good location, just a short walk from the city centre. Very nice terrace with view over Porto. A warm welcome and good communication with the host. I definitely recommend!
The appartement is  a cosy and very clean place and in a safe neighbourhood and closeby  a Metro station ...
A perfect stay! The apartment was just as described and the location was absolutely lovely - within walking distance of Porto's old town! :-)

Perfect for a lone traveller, or indeed a couple who just want a base for sightseeing. Compact (especially the bathroom) but with all the basic necessities, and a surprisingly large terrace. The bed was also comfortable, which is always important. Excellent value for money. The location is not close to the centre, but there is a metro station not far away. I walked every day, which in hindsight was a little too ambitious. The flat was very clean, Miguel's mother was there to meet me and explain everything, she was very helpful, and Miguel was easy to communicate with.
Overall, I would be happy to return, and I recommend it to singles or couples on a budget.
Miguels place is nice, in particular the big terras! The apartment itself is small, but hey, who wants to be inside the whole day in a place like Porto!

I stayed here one week. This studio was the ideal place for me to relax and explore the city. It is 5 minutes from metro stop Carolina Michaelis, from where you can travel very quick to the center. Or take the bus, there are a lot of lines passing nearby. A large supermarket is around the corner, open every day until 21:30. And the studio itself offers everything you need, including a small espresso machine which I enjoyed a lot! Recommended!
Good apartment. Miguel was very responsive and helpful

O espaço de Miguel é muito agradável, sob medida para um casal. Está muito bem localizado em uma região tranquila e com fácil mobilidade para toda Porto. Não o conhecemos pessoalmente mas esteve sempre muito ágil nas respostas e sua mãe, uma senhora muito querida, foi quem nos recebeu para o check-in. O espaço atendeu às nossas expectativas. Estava limpo, com equipamentos funcionando e tudo o que precisávamos para uma excelente estadia em Porto. Recomendo!

Den Kontakt habe ich persönlich mit Miguel's Mutter gehabt. Eine sehr nette, freundliche und hilfsbereit Frau, die mir sogar bei Krankheit meines Kindes sehr geholfen hatte.
Die Wohnung ist keinerlei für eine Familie bzw. für Kinder geeignet. Da die Temperatur in einer Nacht sogar auf 3 Grad gesunken ist, dann kann man sich vorstellen, was das für ein 6 Monate altes Baby bedeuten kann, wenn es auf einmal so kalt wird und keine Heizung vorhanden ist. Auch für ein Erwachsene kann das unerträglich werden, wenn es so kalt ist.
Sonst gute Aussicht.
Perfecto! Muy hospitalarios y sin ningún problema, repetiré
Ambiente confortável e muito aconchegante. Tudo funciona muito bem!

name: East Village Renovated Apartment
summary: Building has just been gut-renovated. Exposed brick and new crown molding in the bedrooms and common areas. Steps away from The 1st Ave L train, Tompkins Square Park, minutes away from Union Square. Private room with air conditioning for you with shared kitchen area. There is a washer and dryer in the bathroom and a dishwasher as well. Bedroom has a queen-sized bed. There is a free drawer you can use and part of a closet but there will personal items in the closet and dresser as well.
space: Heart of the East Village. Great to experience the local history and vibrant nightlife.
description: Building has just been gut-renovated. Exposed brick and new crown molding in the bedrooms and common areas. Steps away from The 1st Ave L train, Tompkins Square Park, minutes away from Union Square. Private room with air conditioning for you with shared kitchen area. There is a washer and dryer in the bathroom and a dishwasher as well. Bedroom has a queen-sized bed. There is a free drawer you can use and part of a closet but there will personal items in the closet and dresser as well. Heart of the East Village. Great to experience the local history and vibrant nightlife. Your own private bedroom with closet in addition to a common area with kitchen access and a bathroom with shower and washer/dryer. I'm happy to offer hints and tips as to what there is to do in the area. I'll be free over the phone and via email. The First Ave L subway is nearby, as are bus stops. Taxi and Uber are also an option.
transit: The First Ave L subway is nearby, as are bus stops. Taxi and Uber are also an option.
access: Your own private bedroom with closet in addition to a common area with kitchen access and a bathroom with shower and washer/dryer.
interaction: I'm happy to offer hints and tips as to what there is to do in the area. I'll be free over the phone and via email.
house_rules: Guests are expected to be fairly quiet after 11 p.m.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Hey guys, 25-yr-old finance professional here. I'm a very considerate guest and love to meet new people wherever I travel

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Cosy and newly renovated room in a great location. Very close to subway, lots of restaurants nearby. Skip was a kind and conscientious host.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
El apartamento está muy bien ubicado. Muchos lugares cercanos de comida de todo tipo y la estación de metro a pocas cuadras. Muy recomendable

name: Spacious cozy apartment in Little Burgundy
summary: Grand logement lumineux sur deux étages à aire ouverte situé dans le charmant et dynamique quartier de la Petite Bourgogne ,à deux pas de restos et bars réputés . Tout près du canal Lachine, à 5min du métro Lionel-Groulx et 20min de l'aéroport.  Cosy two-storey appartment in the trendy Little Burgundy area, just around the corner from great restaurants and bars, 5min walk from Lionel-Groulx metro station and 20min away from the airport. Next to the Atwater Market and the lovely Lachine Canal.
description: Grand logement lumineux sur deux étages à aire ouverte situé dans le charmant et dynamique quartier de la Petite Bourgogne ,à deux pas de restos et bars réputés . Tout près du canal Lachine, à 5min du métro Lionel-Groulx et 20min de l'aéroport.  Cosy two-storey appartment in the trendy Little Burgundy area, just around the corner from great restaurants and bars, 5min walk from Lionel-Groulx metro station and 20min away from the airport. Next to the Atwater Market and the lovely Lachine Canal. A 2 minutes de Griffintown,près de restaurants réputé comme Joe Beef,Grinder,Liverpool House,Burgundy Lion et plus. Sono Italiano perciò...ITALIANI siete i benvenuti !!! :))
neighborhood_overview: A 2 minutes de Griffintown,près de restaurants réputé comme Joe Beef,Grinder,Liverpool House,Burgundy Lion et plus.
notes: Sono Italiano perciò...ITALIANI siete i benvenuti !!! :))

reviews.comments:
Coming from NYC, I loved the laid back atmosphere of Montreal. The people where absolutely amazing on all levels. Starting with Alfredo. At first meeting, he was nice enough to come meet me at the subway station and walk with me to the apartment and tell me about the neighborhood. Alfredo was such a gracious host - from meeting me at the subway and giving me a tour of the neighborhood on the way to the apartment to making sure I felt welcomed and at home in his place - one of the best I've had. He had beautiful fresh flowers from the market around the house, some amazing yogurt in the fridge to start the day (have to find this back home) and even had a personalized map to welcome me to the neighborhood.  
The location is absolutely perfect. The apartment itself is nestled between some of the city's top rated restaurants and shops. The canal is situated right at the end of the block for the perfect after super stroll. There is a market about two blocks away that was just about perfect in every way. 
The neighborhood shops and their keepers really made it feel like a neighborhood - one that I wish I had had more time to spend in.
I would highly recommend this place and I'm hoping I can visit again soon.

Great location and value. This condo exceeded our expectations. Alfredo was a great host, communication was nothing but smooth. I would highly recommend this place to anyone, the location is fantastic, Atwater market, great restaurants and bars all within a short walk.

Chez Alfredo est un excellent appart où rester lors d'un séjour à Montréal! Alfredo nous a accueillis chaleureusement et a maintenu un excellent contact avant et durant le séjour. L'appart est propre et très bien situé dans un coin jeune, dynamique, proche de tout. La cuisine est très bien équipée avec tous les petits électroménagers comme un grille-pain, mélangeur, cafetière, grille à sandwich etc. Salon propre avec télé câblée. En haut, il y a une salle de bain propre avec laveuse\sécheuse et le lit dans la chambre est très confortable! Quant au quartier, il est génial. Beaucoup de bars, bistros et cafés charmants, quartier jeune et vibrant avec beaucoup de patios en été. Une distance à pied du marché atwater et du Canal Lachine, deux excellents endroits pour une promenade ou être parmi les gens. Bref, j'y resterai à coup sûr lors des futures visites à Montréal!

One of the best Airbnb experiences we've ever had! Alfredo is an amazing host who embodies what Airbnb is all about. He greeted us at the place, insisted on helping us carry our big suitcases, left us wine and macaroons (!!) at the place and was so gracious and responsive our whole stay. The place was a complete delight. Clean, comfortable, centrally located right by AtWater and just 5 minutes from the Metro station. Lots of cool bars and restaurants right down stairs, even a natural store and pharmacy. The bed and shower were comfortable, enjoyed everything about this place! When we checked out Alfredo came to see us out, once again insisted on helping with the luggage and was fun to chat with for a few minutes until our Uber got there. We are Airbnb super hosts and feel like Alfredo inspired us to be even better by adding his own personal touch and lots of thought into his hosting. We recommend staying with him highly!!! Your Montreal experience will be amazing, you will feel just like a local with the comfort of home!! Thank you Alfredo! We will be back!

Alfredo's space was a great home base for us for our week in Montreal. It's a great location - we loved being by Atwater Market, and we ate at several of the restaurants in the area. It's also a fantastic spot if you want to get around by metro, since the station Lionel Groulx is on both the orange and the green lines, which was perfect for us (we used the metro a lot). Alfredo was a great host who was happy to answer our questions and I'd definitely recommend his place!

Alfredo is beyond a perfect and gracious host. He is attentive to detail and makes sure your stay is better than you could have hoped!! We will surely stay there again due to Alfredo, the apartment and the location. You could not ask for better. Why stay anywhere else!

I was in the city for a conference downtown and the place was perfect. I could hop on the metro around the corner and quickly get downtown, and then retreat into this sweet little neighborhood with great restaurants and cafes, the Atwater market just across the street, and take long runs up and down the canal or to the river.  Also a great public pool just down the street. Such a laid back vibe in the area!  The apartment is just as nice as in the photos and the stuff in the place is nice - crisp sheets, nice towels, good kitchenware, etc. Alfredo is a superhost who greeted me with an overview of the place and area, and made himself available if anything came up (which nothing did). I will definitely stay in this area if I return and @ Alfredo's if it's available.

My favourite air bnb to date. Alfredo was a fantastic host and very accommodating. He was there on arrival with everything we needed (including some macaroons and beer in the fridge!). Gorgeous apartment, very spacious and clean. The neighbourhood was fantastic with countless bars and restaurant and close to the canal, market and the metro. We walked into the city some days and took the metro others but either way, fabulous location without having to be too into the city to not have the pleasure of seeing the canal etc. Our flight time was changed last minute and Alfredo was very accommodating in allowing us to leave our luggage at the apartment. He was super quick in responding and catered to our every need. I can't recommend this listing enough. BOOK!

Absolutely brilliant flat, super clean, Alfredo is incredibly friendly and easy going, happy to answer all questions with a big genuine smile. Flat very well equipped, TV, Washing machine, great big shower room, very comfortable bed. 
Will definitely stay there again.

Alfredo is a great host and his apartment is in a great location. It's located in a lively street with several restaurants and Irish pubs and 5 mins walking from the supermarket, farmers market, and the canal. We'll definitely look for its availability next time we visit Montreal.

I had a wonderful stay at the unit hosted by Alfredo.  When I arrived at the unit, I let myself in with a key from a lock box and Alfredo arrived 30 minutes later to introduce himself and provide information about the unit.  He graciously supplied a case of water and a much appreciated bottle of craft Quebec beer.  

The unit itself is in a safe and thriving neighbourhood about a 5 minute walk from the Atwater Market.  The entrance to the unit is through a locked door at street level and up a flight of stairs to the front door.  Inside, the unit is very spacious and bright, with windows that face the street.  The living room and kitchen is on the first level and the bedroom, washroom and laundry facilities are on the second level.  

The unit is stylishly decorated and furbished, with a strong wifi signal throughout.  There is a long sofa facing a top class entertainment system which I didn't have time to use. The kitchen area is roomy and has a dining table.. Although I just made coffee in the mornings with the cream and ground coffee supplied by Alfredo, there are plates, cutlery and utensils for those planning to cook their own meals.

I had a comfortable sleep on the king sized bed and the black out shades kept the room completely dark when I slept in in the mornings.  The bathroom is well stocked with toiletries and the shower has excellent pressure with lots of hot water.  

All in all, the apartment completely met my expectations and I would certainly consider renting it again the next time I'm in Montreal.
Siamo stati bene, casa con ogni confort e in un punto strategico vicino ad ogni servizio. Consigliatissimo

Bien situé, très propre.
Sur 2 étages très bien décoré et confortable.
Internet trop lent.
Overall très bien.

Our stay at Alfredo’s place was amazing. 

The place is spacious, very clean, comfortable, decorated with good taste, and has everything one may need. I really liked his apartment. 

It is very well located, the restaurants and bars around are great and in an easy 30 minute walk you are downtown or in old Montreal. Very pleasant area to be outside and felt very safe. 

Alfredo always answered my messages within 5 minutes and was incredibly helpful and generous. 

I highly recommend this place. Thank you Alfredo!

Couldn’t hope for a nicer place. Everything is great, the space, the area and the host. Clean, comfortable, well equipped,...
Just wonderful. Highly recommended

Excellent accueil d'Alfredo (vraiment !) et très joli appartement dans un quartier animé, proche de la station de métro Lionel-Groulx.
La cuisine est bien équipée, ce qui permet de profiter du marché Atwater situé juste à côté...
Je recommande !
It’s a great place, located near so many restaurants, a metro station, and Atwater Market. The apartment has everything you’d need to be comfortable.

Très joli duplex près du Marché Atwater .L'appartement est très propre et bien (Website hidden by Airbnb) chambre est au 2ème étage mais en mezzanine .Il convient plus à un (Website hidden by Airbnb) le louerai à nouveau .
Alfredo went above and beyond the usual need for our stay. He even found us parking last minute. I hope I get to stay here again.

Superb flat, beautifully decorated, super clean. Alfredo is very friendly and it was our second stay there and we will come back. Located so close to Lionel Groulx, very close to the canal that we can follow to town center (25 mn walk). 
 A perfect flat for a comfortable affordable stay. Alfredo had put coffee, a jar of jam and a beer in the fridge for us...

My third stay at Alfredo's, feels like home sweet home ! 
Lovely appartment, charming host... highly recommended for a nice stay in Montreal.

Great location for restaurants, Atwater market and Lachine Canal. The apartment on 2 levels is well set up for a couple but not all parents with small kids would be comfortable with the steep stairs. We liked it despite construction outside during our stay. Only criticism of the kitchen was the lack of microwave and lighting not as good as it could be. Same for the shower (lighting). We would come back i think.

It is the second time I stay here, I guess that says it all!
Thank you Alfredo for making it possible.

Alfredo’s wonderful space and convenient location is perfect for anyone staying in Little Burgundy. It is closely situated near the Atwater market and a great many shops and restaurants. The space itself is second only to Alfredo’s superb hospitality. In my case, he was tremendously accommodating in extending my stay. 
Thank you, again, Alfredo.
Alfredo was a great host. The location was perfect, the street had parking and lots of restaurants and shops. We loved our stay!

We appreciated the opportunity to stay at this stylish and spacious one-bedroom. The apartment is well appointed, with an attractive large window on the upper level. The location, beside many bars and restaurants and close to the Metro, is excellent. Alfredo was an attentive host and a flawless communicator. We hope to stay again.

This was the third time staying at Alfredo’s. Always wonderful. It was really cold out and the heating worked really well. All very clean and comfortable. Alfredo’s communication is swift, detailed and polite. He is friendly and welcoming. The area is nice, central but with a neighborhood feeling. I explored Atwater market this time and had a great time. Highly recommended. Overall everything was as expected, perfect. Would stay again? Yes! Thank you Alfredo

Highly recommended! Alfredo's place is beautiful, comfortable & homey. We were able to walk or take the Metro everywhere. The location was perfect as we were in town for a show at the Theatre Corona - a 3 minute walk away. I appreciated Alfredo's hospitality. He greeted us in person, arranged parking for us, and even had some local treats sitting out for us. The bed was so comfy! Great place to stay.

As always, Alfredo is a wonderfully accommodating host who truly has earned the moniker Superhost. 
When faced with a potential cancelled flight, Alfredo did not hesitate to suggest for me to stay an extra night. A tremendously accommodating offer!
Thank you, Alfredo.

This was my fourth time at Alfredo's. That says it all! Alfredo is a great host. The space is amazing, so close to some of the best restaurants in Montreal and to Atwater market where you can get anything from great cheese, bread, produce and fish. being so close to the 747 bus to the airport is perfect, 25 minutes to the airport for 10 dollars couldn't be better. All in all, I truly enjoyed staying there and I feel "at home" at Alfredo's! He always leaves a little present, this time it was a great bottle of wine. Grazie!

This is a great place to stay in Montreal. We were in town for a show at the Theatre Corona and Alfredo’s apt was less than two blocks away. The neighborhood has many great dining options within steps from  the apt, but also extending out a few blocks. There’s also some cute boutiques to check out.  TheOld Poet, Botanical Gardens and Mile End is a 15-20 minute drive, so getting around is easy. 
The apt itself was fantastic.  Sparkling clean, comfortable, lots of light,  nice towels, and a very comfortable bed. Alfredo was great to deal with before, during and after our stay. He was responsive, great at communicating, offered tips and recommendations and even left us some welcoming treats. We will definitely stay at Alfredo’s again. It was perfect for our needs!

Amazing
Generous
Kind
Comfortable 
Easy
Great! Great host!
Alfredo is a great host. Very accommodating and beautiful space in a great location. This was my second time staying here, I would highly recommend it to anyone or couple. Thanks again Alfredo
Great location. Great space. Great host. Would stay with again 100%.
Good home base for our trip.
Wonderful apartment in an interesting location--close to downtown. Alfredo was a thoughtful and helpful host and the apartment was perfect. Definitely recommend!

Awesome apartment in a great location, with great restaurants at your doorstep (check out Le Bon Vivant!).  Atwater Marche was right around the corner and the supermarket also a very close walk.

Great apartment with everything you would need - the fresh flowers in all the rooms were a beautiful touch!  Highly recommend for couples looking for a getaway in Montreal.  Thank you Alfredo for a wonderful stay!

6th time here. It was fantastic. This time I loved the Spring light coming in through the windows. The place is clean, comfortable, easy, functional and practical. I love the area. Alfredo is thoughtful, kind and generous.

Highly recommended.

The best kind of Airbnb experience. 

The apartment is lovely, spotless and a really homely place to stay. Alfredo has thought of all the little touches, and the location is perfect, with easy transport to/from airport and loads of great cafes, restaurants, markets and bars nearby. The Lachine Canal nearby is also great for running.

Alfredo makes everything simple. Check in and check out is easy and his communication throughout was great. 

Thank you Alfredo - you played a big part in our amazing holiday!

There are two key components to my review.  The first is Location, Location and Location.  You could not want for a better place to stay in Montreal.  Firstly, you’re barely five minutes from the Atwater Market to get all those amazing goodies for your meals (which we did!) and five minutes from one of the Metro station that will get you to most of the key sightseeing places in Montreal.  We didn’t use our rental car during our three day stay there.  On top of that, walk out the apartment door and whether you went left or right, there was an amazing selection of cafes to choose from.  

Secondly and most important is the apartment itself.  The apartment had everything you could want for your stay, a comfortable bed, great living area and so on.  Then add in the personal touches left by the host like fresh flowers, coffee, etc. and you can see why I can’t recommend Alfredo’s apartment highly enough.  I’ll certainly won’t hesitate staying there again should I return to Montreal in the future.

This flat is WAY better than the pictures show. It really felt like home away from home from the moment I'd walked in. First of all, Alfredo is a wonderful host. He was waiting for me at the flat even though I was running late due to traffic from the airport. A great welcome from him from the moment I walked in. The flat is actually quite large for a single traveller but would be perfect for a couple. Alfredo thought of everything: from a well-stocked kitchen to tons of towels in the bathroom, to cable TV, and even fresh cut flowers! The flat is located minutes away from TONS of bakeries, cafes and restaurants, not to mention the amazing Atwater market. AC definitely helpful during hot summer days. The flat is on two levels located above a pop up shop; so no noise issues from neighbours. However, it is located right on a busy street; so if you're a light sleeper, highly advisable to bring earplugs. Otherwise, a truly wonderful stay. Thank you Alfredo!
We had a wonderful time at this apartment. Alfredo exceeded our expectations. The location was perfect. We highly recommend staying here!

Alfredo was a great host and was very quick to respond. Many nice touches to make us feel welcome. Apartment was clean and had everything we needed. His apartment was exactly as advertised and actually turned out to be better than our expectations. Thanks again Alfredo

Alfredo’s place in Montreal is conveniently located to great restaurants and markets.  Alfredo was extremely responsive and his extra touches including complimentary wine and water made our stay extra special.  We would definitely recommend it to anyone visiting Montreal!

Alfredo's place is at a perfect location, very easy to get around with public transportation and walking distance to awesome bars and restaurants. His place is great,  clean and has everything you need. He is nice guy who was  helpful since the beginning, available at all times whenever I had any questions. Totally recommend it.
5-star accommodations, 7-star hospitality.

Alfredo & his apartment far exceeded all expectations for our trip to Montreal. My husband and I initially booked with another host but after unforeseen circumstances arouse, I was left to look for another place to stay while on our way up to Montreal. I reached out to Alfredo and he dropped what he was doing to take us in and make sure that all was perfect for us! We walked in and we’re greeted with a cute sign welcoming us and with some Canadian wine. He showed us around and made us feel welcomed right from the start. He even gave us some fresh fruit that he had picked up at the market before we arrived. 
The location of his apartment is perfect! There are so many amazing restaurants and bars within walking distance. My favorite was the ice cream shop - La Diperie. The subway is also just five minutes away which was so convenient for getting into the city! The apartment itself was super clean and has everything you could need. The bed was very comfortable and the sheets were so soft. Stop searching now and book with Alfredo! I definitely will the next time we are in Montreal.

Alfredo is a Superhost. His unit is my home away from home. Very hospitable and has great attention to details. The unit is well maintained and has complete amenities. I would say that it exceeded my expectations. Thank you Alfredo for making my stay in Montreal a very relaxing and memorable visit. It was great meeting you.
As I have become accustomed to, Alfredo’s superior hospitality and convenient space have exceeded my expectations. Thank you again for accommodating my reservation (on such short notice).
A very nice private apartment with many restaurants and cafes right outside and a subway station within a 5 minute walk.
Alfredo's place was great! Perfect location right down the street from a market and great restaurants. The check in and out process was super easy and the apartment was very nice.
Superbe . », si j’ai l’occasion , j’y retournerai!

Great spot, in an exciting neighborhood.  Clean, comfortable and larger than expected. Alfredo's place is situated in a perfect area, with a pharmacy, supermarket, lots of restaurants, bars, Atwood market, the canal and the metro close by.  Don't pass this spot up.
Alfredo's place was great!  It was convenient, comfortable, and clean.  Alfredo was quick to reply to messages and super helpful.  I highly recommend staying at Alfredo's place!
Terrific location, thoughtful host, lovely space, close to metro.

Alfredo was truly a super host! The location is hip, the apartment is spotless and cool, and the attention to detail and communication with Alfredo was superb! We would absolutely love to stay here again!

Great as always
Can’t wait to be back
Wonderful place
Wonderful host!
Excellent apartment and Alfredo is a very helpful and considerate host.

The place is very comfortable and spacious; not fancy but the decor and layout really works and and is very comfortable, with many thoughtful touches.  The stairs were no problem for us and most people, but could be a challenge for someone with limited mobility. 
 We loved the location. Within a few blocks we went to the Atwater Market, which is great. The bakery accross the street is fantastic.  We liked brunch in the place next door and dinner at both restaurants within a block or two.
The metro is only a few blocks away and  the 35 bus going to the old town right in front.
We didn't meet Alfredo in person, but he was very prompt in communications and accommodating to our needs.
In Montreal, we really enjoyed Bota Bota and the light show at the Botanical Gardens.
Great location. Awesome host!  CLEAN and a great place to stay
Amazing location and great, clean and stylish place.  Great communication with the host. Recommend!

Far and away my new favorite Airbnb in Montreal. If you're coming for the food, like me, note this place is 4 minutes walk from Joe Beef and Liverpool House. if you enjoy a drink, some of Montreal's best are at Atwater Cocktail Club half a block away. In short, very centrally located. 

The place itself exceeded all expectations with a great bedroom, a nice living room and even a patio out back. Lots of fresh towels and the place was sparkling clean. 

would stay again in a heartbeat!

This is a lovely, comfortable, and spotlessly clean apartment in a great neighborhood. The location couldn’t be better...right near Atwater Market, close to the Metro with lots of great restaurants in walking distance. Alfredo is a very responsive host and will go out of his way to make your stay a good one.
As I have come to expect, Alfredo is a wonderful host and his place makes for a lovely and convenient stay in Little Burgundy

Great location and space. Conveniently located less than 5 min walk to Theatre Corona and Metro station. Plenty of restaurants, cafes, a pharmacy, liquor store and grocery near by. Would definitely recommend this place to others traveling to Montreal.
Alfredo was an amazing and very accommodating host and the place was fantastic. Super clean, very nicely decorated, warm and great location. Highly recommended.

I spent 5 days at Alfredo's place, a little longer than other times and had an amazing stay. It was clean and well prepared. His new bed cover is very pretty! I actually prepared a full meal this time and found everything I needed in the kitchen. It is so well located, the restaurants nearby are excellent. I was even able to take a 20 minute walk to go to the cinema. The apartment is cozy and welcoming. As always I recommended and would go back anytime to stay there.
Cozy apartment in a great location! Easy checkin and checkout, with good communication and thoughtful touches.

Modern light filled space to stay. Dine in with well equipped kitchen or eat out at one of numerous restaurants close by. The amazing atwater market is a block away beside a huge liquor store...never seen one with as much choice!

Alfredo is an amazing host. His place was spotless. The location was outstanding. Can’t ask for more in an Airbnb. Allowed for an early check-in and was very quick to respond to our questions. We will definitely be returning. Thank you Alfredo !

I love this place. Cozy and well located. It was very cold and was very happy with the heating system. 
Alfredo is an outstanding host.

Alfredo is consistently an attentive and warm host. His place is conveniently located in Montreal’s Little Burgundy very near to shopping, Aesop, dining, the Atwater market, etc. It’s a lovely spot to stay with a super-host!
Great host, great location close to metro and everything you could need. Clean stylish apartment. Makes you want to come back.
A fabulous location and a very nice unit. Host Alfredo is a great guy.

name: Oporto Sunset Blue Balcony ❤
summary: The Oporto Sunset Blue Balcony is a lovely and recently renovated 50sqm high ceiling flat. Central location in downtown Oporto near the busy Santa Catarina shopping quarter. Easy access to tourist attractions, transportation, restaurants, bars and stores. IKEA style deco. Free wifi and many modern amenities. Free luggage storage.  Family friendly. There is a baby cot and a baby chair ☆ Historical building - 1st floor, no lift ❤ Free and paid parkings (more info below)
space: The flat boasts a large well lit living area with wooden floor and one small “Belle Époque” balcony, where guests can enjoy every sunset and have a relaxed smoke, drink or tea, while overlooking one of the most renowned streets of Oporto. This street has several old mansions and palaces, and the flat is located in front of one of those (the Spanish Consulate). Once the three big double glazed windows are closed, this comfortable and modern flat becomes quiet and offers a wide range of amenities to turn your stay into a memorable experience. The property has one bedroom with a double size bed, a kitchenette, one fully equipped bathroom, one dinning area / workstation, a storage room for luggage/suitcases, and two big sofa beds. Overall, it can accommodate up to 4 guests. Families are very welcome ❤. Free Wifi with 100MB internet access, flatscreen TV with 145 digital channels and towels / bed linen are also provided. The flat is in the heart of Oporto’s cultural and historical center ❤,
description: The Oporto Sunset Blue Balcony is a lovely and recently renovated 50sqm high ceiling flat. Central location in downtown Oporto near the busy Santa Catarina shopping quarter. Easy access to tourist attractions, transportation, restaurants, bars and stores. IKEA style deco. Free wifi and many modern amenities. Free luggage storage.  Family friendly. There is a baby cot and a baby chair ☆ Historical building - 1st floor, no lift ❤ Free and paid parkings (more info below) The flat boasts a large well lit living area with wooden floor and one small “Belle Époque” balcony, where guests can enjoy every sunset and have a relaxed smoke, drink or tea, while overlooking one of the most renowned streets of Oporto. This street has several old mansions and palaces, and the flat is located in front of one of those (the Spanish Consulate). Once the three big double glazed windows are closed, this comfortable and modern flat becomes quiet and offers a wide range of amenities to turn your stay into a me
neighborhood_overview: The Oporto Sunset Blue Balcony is located in Rua Dom João IV, very close to the city center. The neighborhood is composed by a set of residental and commercial historical buildings with architectural design, dating back to the end of the 19th and beginning of the 20th century. The street also boasts a set of palaces that are quite unique and give a distinctive historical and posh feeling to the neighbourhood. The building where the flat is located and other buildings close by, have been recently refurbished and are being mostly used to provide tourist accommodation. The street is quite busy in terms of traffic during rush hours, however, the modern materials used in the flat’s renovation are effective in terms of noise reduction, creating a reasonably quiet environment inside. Some street noise can be heard occasionally, even during night times, however, that should not keep you from relaxing and sleeping well.  The neighbourhood is very peaceful and extremely safe, both during the day
notes: Extra Services upon request with special conditions: • Sightseeing Bus + Port Wine Cellars:  - 1 day: 13€/person* - 2 days: 15€/person* • 6 Bridges Douro Cruise + Port Wine Cellars: 12,50€/person* • Sightseeing TukTuk + Port Wine Cellars: - up to 2 people: 12€/person* - more than 2 people: 10€/person* - Plus Bridges Cruise: 22€/ person* - Plus Cable railway: 17€/ person* • Home groceries delivery  • Babysitting  • Bike rental • Taxi For more information, please contact us. These prices are only a reference and they may vary according to the services requested and/or guests involved. All services are provided by business partners and therefore are subject to unexpected changes in prices and availability.
transit: The flat is very central and allows you to enjoy the city on foot or by bus or metro. -2 minutes walk to Bus Stop -4 minutes walk to the Via Catarina shopping mall -5 minutes walk to Bolhão metro station -5 minutes walk to shopping area in Rua de Santa Catarina -10 minutes walk to Majestic Café -11 minutes walk to Oporto City Hall -15 minutes to São Bento train station -15 to 20 minutes to all major historical and cultural attractions in the city center, including “Livraria Lello”, Clérigos tower, Rua das Flores, Ribeira and much more. Transfers to and from Oporto Airport: -Private transfer to apartment (Lux car): 9€ per person in a group of 2 to 3 people. For a single person, total cost of 18€.. Private driver pick up at Arrivals – takes 20/25 minutes. -Transfer service in a private bus:9€ per person in a group of 4 to 6 people. Private driver pick up at Arrivals - takes 20/25 minutes. -Metro (stopping at Bolhão station) – 2.45€ per person – 35 minutes travel + 5 minutes walking Trans
access: There is a 24 hour check-in available for all guests. Guests will be checked-in by the host or co-host and the default check-in location is the building’s main door. The appropriate time for each specific guest can be arranged by personal airbnb message, email or telephone. In case, you arrive too early or find it easier to get the keys from another location, you can also go to the Porto Concierge headquarters in Rua 5 de Outubro, 195. Guests enjoy an environment of full privacy and have access to all areas and amenities of the apartment. In case you need help to operate any appliances or have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact the Porto Concierge team.
interaction: When you arrive you will be met by The Porto Concierge team that will welcome you, do the check-in and share tips on special places to eat, visit and have fun. When check-in is performed at the flat’s door and as the building has no elevator, the Porto Concierge team can also help with luggage carrying. Just ask for help! In order to comply with official regulations, your stay must be reported to the Immigration and Borders Service (SEF), so your Passport or ID Card details will be collected during check-in. The Oporto Sunset Blue Balcony is a fully licensed and 100% legal flat complying with Portuguese and European tax requirements, so business guests are more than welcome to stay with us. If you require an invoice or a receipt for your stay, please  send us a message with the following details immediately after completing your booking: - Full name: - Address:  - Country of residence: - VAT number or tax number: - Email address Invoices or receipts will be issued after check-out and w
house_rules: - Smoking is only allowed in the balcony and never inside the apartment. Please use the black vase with sand hanging from the balcony fence as an ashtray. Please make sure that no cigarrette tips or ashes are thrown elsewhere.  - Check out time is before 11h00. - Flexible check -in : if requested and if possible, check in could be made earlier. When early check-in is not possible, the guests can leave their luggage with us (The Porto Concierge headquarters) until check in time. The person that made the reservation will be responsible for any issues during the stay. - As a basic safety measure, please leave all electric appliances switched off, make sure water taps are not running and close all doors and windows every time you leave the apartment, including check-out. - When checking out, we request that guests leave the dishes and the kitchen clean and empty out the trash, as there is always a garbage deposit in the street nearby. The apartment is cleaned prior to each arrival. Please,

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: El piso está genial, no es excesivamente grande pero tiene todo lo necesario. Además, está bien situado.
Close to everything, yet quiet and comfortable! Would go again
Très bel appartement !!!
Beautiful, clean and modern apartment. Only a short walk away from restaurants, main attractions and access to the metro. Would definitely stay here again!
Buena ubicación, apartamento tal como aparece en el anuncio. Te  reciben con mucha amabilidad y con un detalle de bienvenida.

This apartment makes a great base for exploring Porto. It's exactly as described and represented well in the pictures. The check-in was hassle free and very helpful. Located just a short walk from Bolhão Market (my 5 year old managed to walk there and back) and within easy reach of restaurants, transport links, metro and supermarkets.

The only downside is the traffic noise. It can be a little loud at times during the day. It's not a continuous stream of traffic, just short bursts due to the traffic lights further down the road. By the end of my stay it no longer bothered us.

L'appartement est très bien
Propre, bien placé, très agréable..nous n'avons pas rencontré Mario mais une bouteille de vin nous attendait
Il y avait des travaux dans la rue donc un peu de bruit mais ils doivent êtres terminés !
(Ce que je peux Conseiller c'est de ne pas arriver avant l'heure du check in car le garde bagages est un peu loin et c'est galère)..sinon séjour parfait

El apartamento es perfecto, comodo y muy bien ubicado.
La recepcion muy detallada sobre lugares y recomendaciones muy buenas.
Ademas justo enfrente hay un parking.
Muito obrigado!
Tolle Lage (sehr zentru (Hidden by Airbnb) ah), sauber, neuwertige Ausstattung. Leider an der Straße, ein paar Kaffee-Tabs für ein Frühstück wären nett.

Nice place in order to stay and visit the city. The apartment is near the center and with the host suggestions we really enjoyed the staying.
As a plus the furnishing is new and good looking.

We enjoyed Mario's apartment very much. It is very nicely renovated and spotlessly clean. Lots of natural light in the morning which makes you enjoy the start of the day. Also the building looks very authentic - Portuguese tiles on the front and azulejos inside the main lobby.  

Perfect distance to the tourists spots - close enough for an enjoyable walk, but not too close to be crowed or noisy.  

We had a great stay! Definitely recommend it!

Nice apartment building in the centre of Porto, everything is in walking distance. The apartment was Very clean and spacious, well equipped kitchen and nice bathroom with a big shower. But there is not enough space to hang or store clothes. All in all we highly recommend this apartment.

We enjoyed our stay at the apartment for 4 nights in Porto. 

Pros:
+ Great Pre-Stay Communication
+ Arranged a courteous transfer from the airport for 20EUR
+ Very Spacious Living Area with Lots of Natural Light
+ New and Modern Looking Place
+ Walking Distance to Central Porto
+ Modern and Secure Building
+ Very Clean

Cons:
- Cheaply constructed (for short term rental purposes it seems) and not very well furnished - for example we could hear lots of noise from neighbours above, below and to the side at 2am when they started playing music, there is no windows or extractor fan in the bathroom. 
- Bedroom is very small with no windows or natural light. They should have opened the ceiling up when building as it is a box within a box.
- No basic extras like milk, tea, sugar, salt. However a courtesy bottle of wine was provided.

Overall it was a good stay but I have to deduct one star for the above which I think is reasonable. It was still a good stay and I would recommend but please bear in mind the above.
O apartamento é muito bonito, fica em um local de fácil acesso e próximo ao centro, fizemos tudo andando. Minha única crítica é pela ausência de copos para beber vinho, fez muita falta.
Acojedor y muy luminoso. El apatamento es genial, limpio y muy bien ubicado. Cuando llegamos nos dejaron un detalle en el apartamento. Recomiendo este lugar para pasar unos días en Oporto.

The apartment is a great place from which to explore Porto. It’s in the downtown area and is very close to all that Porto has to offer. There’s also a nice, very cheap, bakery on the corner which is great for breakfast!

The apartment itself is clean and tidy. The bottle of wine was a lovely gesture! 

Overall a great place we’d highly recommend!
Logement placé sur une rue très fréquentée.  Proche du centre de Porto. Ce logement n'est pas géré par un particulier , vous ne rencontrerez pas  Mario.
The team was just so professional. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The apartment was delightful! I highly recommend.

He had a great stay at Marios Apartment . The apt is very clean and you have everything that you’ll need during your stay . Piedro was very welcoming and communicative person , we welcome us with a bottle of wine and he gave us many many tips of what to do in the city . We really thank you for everything .
Nice place and amazing location. Only downside: you can hear the noise coming from the street (cars).

The apartment was very clean and cozy. We had no problem with check-in whatsoever. A big plus - newly renovated building so we really enjoyed staying in Porto. Fully equipped and beautiful apartment with high ceiling. The place is located in downtown, 8 min walk to the main square, 5 min to a big supermarket and only 10 min to the beautiful bridge (a must-see). You will find a lot of cafes around. Right on the corner a small cafe where you can have a breakfast.

Thanks a lot for the welcome gift, it was sooo sweet. We definitely recommend the apartment.
P

Adoramos o apartamento!! O Mário foi super atencioso e prestativo. O apartamento é super bem localizado, seguro e a limpeza impecável!!
Retornaremos com certeza!!! ❤❤
Nice and clean place in perfect location. Could'nt ask for more.
A great apartment, lovely location and good value for money.  I will return :)

Apartamento bonito, limpio y MUY BIEN UBICADO: en 4-5 minutos te plantas en cualquier lado. 
La calefacción es una de esas eléctricas con ruedas y, aunque le cuesta calentar todo el piso, lo consigue. Deja la temperatura bastante equilibrada.
Tiene bastante ruido por parte de los vecinos (se oyen los pasos) y también de los coches, aunque si te cierras la habitación, se insonoriza bastante.
Justo enfrente del apartamento y como a 30-40 metros hacia abajo, hay una pastelería-cafetería que hace esquina que es IDEAL para desayunar: tienen de todo y muy bueno. Hablan español perfectamente y son muy amables. Los pasteles de Belén (que en Oporto se llaman Natas) están muy bueno.
Lo mejor es la ubicación, sin duda.
Mario responde bastante rápido y salvo el problema que tuvimos con el retraso, fue muy cordial.
Dejo, no obstante, lo sucedido con el retraso:

Avise con exactitud de a qué hora llegaría al apartamento (21:15) y llegué a las 21:18. Hasta las 10:25 no vino nadie a abrirnos. 
En toda esa hora y cuarto solo tuve 2 mensajes: 1 a las 21:30 (ya con 15 minutos de retraso) donde me decía "On the way :) " y otro a las 22:00 donde me comentaba que la persona que venía a abrirme había tenido un pinchazo. 
No voy a dudar del pinchazo, pero lo que me pregunto es ¿Y los 45 minutos anteriores a la hora pactada, que van desde las 21:15 a las 22,...¿Dónde estaba? ¿Y ese retraso tan grande sin avisar?
Eso sin contar que hacía frío, llovía y teníamos hambre por las horas que eran.
Que cada uno saque sus propias conclusiones.

The place is really nice and quiet!! Walking distance from everything. Really easy to arrive from the airport.
Kitchen fully equipped.
They let us checkin late and the guys were very kind and helpful.
Room is small but the rest of the apartment is huge. Recommend it 100%
Um ambiente agradável e bem localizado e uma equipe pronta para auxiliar sempre que for preciso.
CENTRICO Y LIMPIO, BUEN SITIO PARA CONOCER OPORTO

Dit appartement is een fijne ´thuisbasis´ voor een weekendje Porto: het is schoon, rustig, en alles wat je nodig hebt is er. Bij aankomst kregen we een flesje wijn en allerlei tips over Porto, een fijn welkom! Het appartement ligt ook op een goede locatie, dus: zeker een aanrader.

The Oporto Sunset Blue Balcony apartment was wonderful. From the great location right in the heart of the city to the stylish decor in the rooms, we loved every part of it. The host was very helpful as well and gave us some useful tips for our first time in Porto. I would recommend this place for everyone.
Very nice apartment, everything is so perfect that I wanna live here forever;)

Fuimos a pasar un fin de semana a Porto y este alojamiento fue la mejor elección. 
Está muy buen situado, es acogedor y está totalmente renovado.
La atención fue muy buena y entrega de llaves personal.
Muy recomendable!
Um espaço muito bonito e confortável, cheio de comodidades :) Numa zona calma, mas muito perto do centro. Uma experiência ótima!

Fantastic apartment, clean, modern and comfortable. The airport pick up was tied in seamlessly with our check in, making the whole process completely stress free. Can't recommend this place, and the Porto concierge team, highly enough.

Ótimo apartamento no centro do Porto! Moderno, limpo, bem decorado, espaçoso, recém reformado, com todas as comodidades para uma excelente estadia. Próximo ao Mercado do Bolhão (500 m) e à Estação de Comboios São Bento, muito fácil para conhecer o centro histórico da cidade. Recomendamos a todos!!
Je recommande cet appartement !

Very good appartement to visit this
beautiful City of Porto.
The apartment is very nice, clean and tidy. Communication was smooth and respectful. We really enjoyed our stay.

We were warmly greeted by Maria upon arrival who was more than happy to answer any of our questions. The appartment was clean, and was just as advertised. It is also well situated, near restaurants and the main shopping street. We also took up our host on passing by their office, where they kindly helped us with our flight back. All in all, a great experience with very friendly people.

Una ubicación justo a las afueras del casco histórico muy tranquila y bien comunicada, nos gustó el apartamento bonito bien equipado y bien acabado. Nos obsequiaron con una botella de vino a nuestra llegada fue un bonito detalle.

Appartement sympa, bien placé mais un peu bruyant (route et bruits dans le couloir). Le service de la conciergerie qui s'occupe de l'appartement sont très appréciables et réactif.
A la période où nous avons séjourné, le temps était un peu frais, heureusement qu'il y avait un chauffage d'appoint!
Nos encanto

El apartamento está impecable y en una zona muy céntrica algo apartada del bullicio, por tanto muy agradable. En 5 minutos andando llegas al meollo. 
Es cómodo porque además tiene un parking justo enfrente. 
Tiene mucha luz y el edificio está muy bien mantenido. 
Hemos estado encantados!

Un super logement près du centre ville. Nous avons visité une partie de porto à pied, très jolie la nuit. Le logement est bien aménager et assez calme. Le seul petit bémol étant qu'à notre arrivé, le ménage n'était pas fait. On a tout de même pu poser nos bagages et après une petite balade, on a quand même pu constater que cela a été fait à la va-vite. Mise à part cette petite parenthèse, nous recommandons tout de même cet appartement.
Todo bien. Excelente ubicación y buen servicio por parte del anfitrión.
THE APARTMENT IS ABSOLUTELY WONDERFUL. IT IS CLEAN, NICE AND IS LOCATED IN A VERY NICE AREA CLOSE TO THE HISTORICAL CENTRE OF PORTO (WALKING DISTANCE)

Appartement très agréable et bien situé...Propre et fonctionnel. Le seul bémol est le bruit de la circulation dans cette rue qui est très passagère...aussi dans les couloirs on entend beaucoup...Sinon tout était parfait!
Accueil très sympathique de Tania ! Appartement propre, spacieux et très bien placé, conforme aux photo. Je recommande cet appartement !

L'appartamento è molto bello, in perfette condizioni e con una pulizia impeccabile. Si trova in una via molto tranquilla in prossimità del centro. Viene gestito dal Concierge team motivo per cui la comunicazione non è sempre in real time e "personalizzata". La persona incaricata di effettuare il nostro check in (concordato in nottata) era in ritardo (per concomitanza altri ospiti) ma molto gentile. Al check out il personale delle pulizie si è presentato con mezz'ora di anticipo. Complessivamente è un buon appartamento.

Fui muito bem recebida! 
As dicas do Marco foram ótimas!
O apartamento é muito bonito e aconchegante. Bem cuidado, limpo.

Fica em uma rua bem tranquila e muito próximo de restaurantes, lojas, cafés e barzinhos.
Fiz quase tudo a pé.
Eu recomendo!

Super appart, idéalement placé. Le seul problème est la circulation dans la Rue qui est assez dense et le feu en bas de la Rue : les automobilistes accélèrent juste sous nos fenetres... impossible de laisser les fenêtres ouvertes. Sinon tout est parfait.
사진만큼 예쁩니다! 천고가 높아 탁 트인 느낌이고, 채광이 너무나도 좋아요!! 3박 포르투에서 특별한 시간이었습니다~
Très bon accueil, l'appartement était très propre. Idéal pour un weekend à Porto.

Most disappointing Airbnb I have ever booked. We have given the TPC many hours of notice of what time we were going to be arriving. However, when we entered, the place was still dirty from the last guests. Unacceptable. First of all, we had to pick up the key from the TPC office which is a 15 min drive from the apartment, this was fine because it is what was ultimately decide between myself and "Mario". But "Mario" was nowhere to be found when I got to their "check-in" office. I was met with a woman who was too busy yelling on the phone to another AirBnb customer who has booked a different apartment. When I had arrived to the apt, Mario said the crew should be there to clean... But not even an apology? He seemed unapologetic and ended the conversation. The "cleaning crew" finally got to our place maybe 30 minutes later after I had sent messages to TPC staff over (Hidden by Airbnb) because Mario was not replying to messages right away. About the apartment itself, extremely noisy. The family upstairs seemed to have been playing Dance Dance Revolution, or so it felt like for a majority of the time we were there given that i noticed a rhythm in their foot slamming. Jokes aside, I guess there is a lot of kids upstairs and they run around all the time. When the main door to the entire complex is opened, it slams closed and literally rumbles the walls. I am not used to Portuguese infrastructure, but it seems like they built these places with no sound proofing in mind. There is no ventilation in the apartment either, so with all the windows, it gets hot. Impossible to sleep at night for two reasons: The beds are absolute cheap IKEA garbage. Extremely extremely uncomfortable. The pillows are dollar store quality as well. My wife and I had one of the worst sleeps the last night we were there, we even unfolded the pink couch to try to sleep on that and it just gives you back spasms all night. Point #2, since it is hot, you want to open the window? Good luck, the apartment is on a busy street and people love to rip it in their Fiats, Honda Bikes, and trucks on that main road since its a one-way. Expect lots of traffic noise. Even with the window closed. Speaking of no ventilation, there is NO FAN in the bathroom, when you take a shower, i guess you could say the apartment also comes with a free sauna? And when you go to the bathroom and do your business, yeah its going to stink... for a while. The kitchen cutlery is extremely cheap, when i read the brand on the knives, yeah, you got it, IKEA. The "sharp" knife couldnt even cut butter. I sat on this review for a few days and I've toned it down a bit but my wife and I were not happy...

This place is much prettier, cleaner, and spacious than it looks in the picture! Great hosts, too. 10/10 would recommend. The stairs might be annoying for people with weak knees or little kids, but other than that, we liked it. The bedroom might feel like a small box but we kept the door open so it wasn't a problem for us. They also gave us a bottle of wine. Who can complain?

Great apartment, great location as it is so close to the metro and a cafe. Very quiet neighbours, too. They were very flexible with check-in times as we were slightly early. Good luggage storage facilities before and after check-in. Great experience, overall!
Nice location and good value for the space
Apartamento céntrico, a un paso del centro, limpio y funcional. Con cafetera, secador de pelo y todo tipo de menaje. Muy recomendable. La botella de vino de Oporto a la llegada, todo un detalle.

Mario's place was perfectly located and just as described. He met us on arrival and walked us through everything we needed to know; from local tips about bars to bike rentals to suggestions on how to spend the days and what to plan for when. he even threw in a bottle of wine which was the perfect way to start the trip! Clean, spacious apartment and just as expected from the photographs. I'd definitely stay again.

Beautiful, spacious apartment almost directly in the heart of the historic districts of Porto! With a welcome bottle of red wine and a large heaping of local tips, we couldn't ask for better accomodation!
- Everything important to see is very much in walking distance. Location is slightly out of the way, but it also means morning traffic noise is kept to a minimum.
- The recommendations for food and sights are all spot on. Be sure to listen and take their handwrittern tips on the map seriously!
- Be prepared for lots of communication with the hosts! Maybe check in on your AirBnB messages a couple times a day to keep up!
Great apartment, very good location, central and close to the main attractions.

Het appartement zag er precies hetzelfde uit als op de foto's. Het was schoon en ruim. Het appartement ligt centraal van waaruit Porto makkelijk te voet te verkennen is. Daarnaast was onze vlucht 1,5 uur vertraagd. Dit maakte voor de check-in niet uit wat wij erg waardeerde!
I really enjoyed staying at Mario's place. The neighborhood is very conveniently located and the apartment is very quiet! Mario is thoughtful, gracious host. Would absolutely recommend to stay there!
Super appart, déco neutre, très  bien situé au coeur de Porto
Bien ubicado y con todo lo necesario
O apartamento é excelente, bonito, e muito bem localizado.  Permite visitar a cidade a pé.
