Points positifs : appartement situé à quelques minutes à pied de la Rua Santa Catharina, animée. Grand espace de vie et la communication facile pour le check-in anticipé. Personnel accueillant. Parking possible dans la rue avec paiement et parking privé en face moins cher que celui de la rue avec des prix pour les personnes qui louent l'appartement. Points négatifs : appartement bruyant aussi bien de l'intérieur et de l'extérieur. Impossible de dormir fenêtre ouverte. La vaisselle utilisée précédemment était sale, mal lavé. Il n'y avait rien pour faire un ménage quotidien lorsque vous restez plus de 2 ou 3 nuits.
Dans l'ensemble, pas de regrets mais nous étions avec un bébé donc pas idéal.
Bien situé mais bruyant (trop).

We love the house so much clean spacious bright and lovely the hose even prepared a bottle of wine for us as a welcoming gift! Lovely the house is located at the city center all the attractions are within walking distance great house new !!

Lo que ves es lo que te vas a encontrar, bien localizado, limpio, casi se diría que nuevo, con electrodomésticos y cubertería, con wifi que funciona muy bien, y con detalles de regalo de vino y mapa, cuando volvamos a Oporto repetiremos en el mismo sitio, gracias Mario.

Чудесная квартира, рядом с центром, весьма просторная и светлая. Идеальная чистота и уют. Нас встретили, все подробно рассказали, дали полезные советы. Рядом с квартирой расположены супермаркет, прачечная и 2 больших торговых центра. Остались очень довольны.
Excellent location, cleanness and value. Perfect for 3/4 guests and good bottle of wine offer by the host. A little noisy because of the street but not something to be worried.
Just the perfect place for a short a long stay in Porto.
Very comfy place with a great location! The host, who let us in was very helpful, giving us many advices what to see in Porto, where to eat and a bit of tips about the city!

Appartement conforme à la description, bien aménagé et très bien situé! Accueil très sympathique!
2 petits bémols : invasion de fourmis pendant le séjour et quelques nuisances sonores du voisinage, notamment dans la cage d’escalier et le logement du dessus. 
A part ça, tout était parfait!
This is a lovely apartment, very spacious and clean. Excellent location and the host was very clear with the check in and provided some great tips for our stay. would definitely recommend!
Very clean stylish comfortable apartment, near to everything. Great communication. Thank you!
The apartment is well located and very bright and spacious! We loved our stay here! The check in was fabulous and Vanessa gave us loads of great recommendations !!
Amazing location, although a bit noisy.

The Blue Balcony House is in a great location for seeing all of Porto given its proximity to the Bolhao Metro station. We took the Metro everywhere, from the airport to the coast to the across the Douro for Port wine tastings. You can drop your luggage off at their welcome center at the Casa de Musica Metro stations, and walk around a bit and have coffee until the apt is ready. This was a very convenient feature. From Casa de Musica station, you're just a couple stops away from Bolhao station and a few blocks away from the apt. A recommendation for the area: after the sun goes down on weekends, one the commercial streets down the road turns into a pedestrian mall closed to cars and is great for strolling, people-watching and trying pasteis do nata. There's also a Pingo Doce market about 5 blocks away in the same direction so you can stock up your fridge and pick up some (absurdly) cheap Douro wine. Overall, a good place to stay while exploring Porto. One drawback I feel obligated to mention is the significant noise from the road just outside, even at night. With the windows closed and the shutters locked, the noise is muted, but still evident. For those who like windows open or are bothered by the sounds of a city, I would take this into consideration. We only stayed here, so it may be that road noise is a feature of all apartments in Porto. But that said, for the location, service, and price, the Blue Balcony House was a good place to stay for our three days in Porto. Thank you TPC.
Reasonably priced appartment at good location. Street side is a bit noisy and cleanliness good be a bit better. Missed a little the personal touch of an Airbnb...
Its a nice place with all kitchen supplies great point close to downtown very clean and confortable I recommend it 100%

The flat is okay.
It is not very clear from the pictures, but the bedroom is actually inside an isolated container inside the flat with no windows and poor air circulation. If you ever dreamt of sleeping in a wardrobe, this is your chance!

The possibility to do a late check-out is nice. The location is great. A bit noisy but normal for a place close to the down town. A TV is available to relax after an afternoon of wandering on the street. I felt safe in the neighborhood of the appartment.

L’appartement de Mario est spacieux, lumineux et très agréable à vivre. On s’y sent vite comme chez soi. C’était le lieu parfait pour notre semaine à Porto avec notre bébé.
 Petit bémol: le bruit de la rue ....
Todo tal cual lo vimos, bien situado aunque la limpieza podría estar mejor

Excelente apartamento en el centro de la ciudad con una buena comunicación (paradas de autobús y metro cercanas). El apartamento estaba muy limpio y super equipado con todo tipo de electrodomésticos y menaje (satenes, platos, cubiertos, vasos, decantador de vino, tostadora, cafetera, batidora, exprimidor eléctrico, plancha...). Además Felippe, que fue quien nos realizó el check-in en el apartamento, nos dio todo tipo de recomendaciones sobre que barrios visitar y actividades que hacer e información sobre restaurantes.

Hemos pasado 4 días en el apartamento de Mario, y ha estado genial. El apartamento está preparado a tu llegada, limpio, con té y café, una botella de vino... La cocina está equipada con tostadora, sandwichera, kettle y cafetera de cápsulas. También hay un horno y un microondas. Puedes encontrar ollas y sartenes en los armarios y cubiertos en los cajones.
El baño estaba muy limpio y también está equipado con secador.
El dormitorio pequeñito pero super acogedor. La cama es comodísima y las almohadas también.
En general muy recomendable, es un apartamento muy céntrico. Nosotros no hemos utilizado metro para nada, solo el primer día para llegar.

It is a great apartment, perfect for two person. It is located in a very good location, everything is within walking distance, but it is still quite. There is a bakery just around the corner, perfect for breakfast :)
O apartamento é bonito, bem localizado, limpo e agradável, somente a questão do estacionamento na região inteira que é difícil, porém em todo o Porto é assim.

Mario's place is more or less exactly as described and represents incredible value for money. It's fairly well located and very easy to reach from the airport via metro - don't waste your money on an Uber! Also there's a bakery on the same street, it looks very cheap and simple but the nata are incredibly good - must try!
Apartamento excelente! Bem localizado, novo e equipado.

Apartamento a 10 minutos del centro, todo limpio y con muchas facilidades (cafetera, batidora, tostadora y mucho menaje en general). Espacioso, buena iluminacion. La cama es cómoda también. Estuvimos como en casa. 
Lo único malo es que no dispone de calefacción, pero puedes encontrar un radiador portátil fácil de usar. 
Si volvemo a Porto, este será nuestro apartamento de nuevo.

Recomendo vivamente este espaço! É muito limpo, áreas incríveis, muito confortável e bem localizada.
A apresentação da casa feita pelo Diogo foi muito boa e útil, e já se apresentava na casa portanto não tivemos que esperar para entrar em casa.
Piso muy bien ubicado y muy acogedor.  Sin duda repartiríamos.
This place was great! Easy check-in, located just a 5 minute walk from the Bolhão metro station, and a great find. Would definitely stay again!

Muy moderno, y limpio y son muy amables. 
No cuentan con ascensor

숙소 근처에 메트로 역이 있어 캐리어로도 이동이 편했고, 포르토 주요 관광지들에서 걸어서 10-15분 거리에 위치해 접근성이 아주 좋습니다. 시설이 생각보다도 훨씬 좋고, 가장 까다롭게 생각하는 화장실 상태도 호텔 못지 않았습니다. 또한 조리 도구와 소금까지 구비되어있어 저녁에 숙소에 들어와서 고기도 구워먹고 환영 선물로 주신 와인도 곁들였습니다. 티비 밑 수납장에 다리미도 있어 와이셔츠 구겨 넣어 다니는 여행자분들도 유용하게 사용하실수 있을 것 같습니다. 숙소에 창들이 커서 밤에는 조금 쌀쌀한데 침실에 라디에이터가 있어 따뜻하다못해 덥게 잤습니다. 마리오 사랑합니다.

The house is in a great position, and it has a lot of space inside to be comfortable with. It was perfect for us because we both needed to work on our laptop sometimes and we had the perfect space to do it. The house at night was quite cold, but we managed to put the provided heating device in the bedroom before going to sleep to not have problems. There was no self check-in, but we were welcomed by a very nice Porto Concierge lady that showed us everything we needed to know. We will definitely come back!
Muy recomendable, el apartamento es muy amplio cómodo y muy bien decorado. La ubicación es excelente

Расположение отличное. Старый город и пешеходная улица в 2 шагах. Рядом паркинг, куда можно за 15 евро в день поставить машину. 
Встретил русскоязычный агент и дал несколько полезных советов, что посмотреть в Порту. Порекомендовал прекрасный ресторан с местной кухней Сантьяго . Обязательно сходите и попробуйте Франсизинью, в других городах Португалии мы ее не встречали. Цены вполне приемлимые. Приходить лучше около 18, место очень популярное, потом придётся стоять на улице и ждать.
В целом, квартира замечательная. Все есть!

L’appartement est nickel, récemment rénové à l’intérieur comme dans les parties communes. Effectivement l’isolation phonique et thermique n’est pas au top, prévoyez simplement un pyjama un peu chaud pour les plus frileux. Sinon l’emplacement est génial et vous permet de visiter la ville facilement à pieds ! Serviettes, gel douche, plan de la ville et même bouteille de vin sont fournis à votre arrivée !

El alojamiento de Mario es ideal muy luminoso , no le falta de nada , genial ubicado y con facilidad para aparcar . Cuenta con todo lo necesario y Mario fue muy amable , nos ayudo y nos explico que cosas poder ver y hacer en Oporto  . 

Lo recomendamos muchísimo . 

Muchas gracias por tu amabilidad .

Parfait séjour chez Mario. Nous avons vraiment apprécié le lieu et la proximité avec le centre ville. L’appartement est pratique, fonctionnel et relativement propre. Très bon rapport qualité-prix. 
Il y a tout ce qu’il faut pour le premier jour (serviettes, savons,cafés etc.) il nous a juste manqué un torchon pour essuyer la vaisselle. L’accueil était parfait. Nous sommes arrivées un vendredi soir vers 23h30 et avons été accueillies sans problème. Merci beaucoup à toute l’équipe !
Great time in the appartment, the street is noisy but the bedroom is away from the windows. The host was really reactive. Good

Mario’s place is very well located. Bolhão metro station is only a 10 minute walk or less. It is extremely clean and spacious. Everything we needed was provided and more. Our host was very friendly and I would recommend this place to anyone planning to go to Porto. Would stay here again myself. We were well received and got some tips on where to do groceries and what places to visit. This place and the host made our visit to Porto a real 10/10
Muito bom, adorei!
Apartamento muy bonito y limpio. Esta muy bien ubicado y muy limpio. Si vas en coche hay que pagar o parking o zona azul. Repetiríamos sin duda.

name: The Cov @ Marrickville (the Brooklyn of Sydney)
summary: Relax and enjoy our welcoming and light-filled Federation two-bedroom home which is a perfect urban retreat for a family, couples, grey nomads or just friends who want to experience the heart and soul of the inner west. Situated in a leafy and quiet street, The Cov house offers our guests a friendly and vibrant neighbourhood with cafes, bars, music venues, shopping and restaurants minutes from your doorstep.
space: With high ceilings, stained-glass windows, original polished timber floors throughout, in combination with a modern and fully-equipped kitchen (stainless steel gas stove and large oven, Nespresso coffee machine, dishwasher and microwave), The Cov offers a relaxed environment to return to after a day immersing yourself in Marrickville or exploring our beautiful Sydney. During the evening you can sit on the front porch with a glass of wine, a gin & tonic or a cup of tea and share the many stories of your day.
description: Relax and enjoy our welcoming and light-filled Federation two-bedroom home which is a perfect urban retreat for a family, couples, grey nomads or just friends who want to experience the heart and soul of the inner west. Situated in a leafy and quiet street, The Cov house offers our guests a friendly and vibrant neighbourhood with cafes, bars, music venues, shopping and restaurants minutes from your doorstep. With high ceilings, stained-glass windows, original polished timber floors throughout, in combination with a modern and fully-equipped kitchen (stainless steel gas stove and large oven, Nespresso coffee machine, dishwasher and microwave), The Cov offers a relaxed environment to return to after a day immersing yourself in Marrickville or exploring our beautiful Sydney. During the evening you can sit on the front porch with a glass of wine, a gin & tonic or a cup of tea and share the many stories of your day. You can access all areas of The Cov. It is entirely at your disposable for
neighborhood_overview: The Cov is very comfortable Federation home located in a quiet neighbourhood with amazing city views at the end of the street offering easy access to a vibrant, ethnic Australian community awash with exciting food,  cafes, shopping, entertainment and of course ‘The City of Sydney’ just down the way. You can walk down to Lazy Bones for some great live Jazz or to Camelot Lounge for some eclectic World music.Prior to your check-in you will get an email with our own Foodie Tips and Handy Hints which will ensure your stay is both enjoyable and allows you an immersive experience into our own  'the Brooklyn of Sydney.'
notes: We provide high quality bed linen and bath towels. Once you have made your reservation please advise whether you will be needing both bedrooms made up (maximum of 4 x guests) or just one bedroom during your stay. Both bedrooms have supremely comfortable Queen beds and pillows, with ceiling fans for the summer and gas heating for you feel cosy throughout in the winter.
transit: In Sydney an Opal Smartcard is a requirement for public transport. It can be purchased Online, at the Airport, most Newsagents.  Load up a dollar value onto your Opal card at the airport or any station to cover trains, buses, ferries and light rail on the NSW Opal Network. AIRPORT TRANSFER: Yep! You can do it by train but after a flight with suitcases and case of jet lag why not just take an Uber, Taxi or Hire Car. It’s affordable and The Cov is only 15mins drive. Prior to your check-in  I email a very comprehensive Travel Tips guide which includes info about trains, light rail, buses which are all walking distance and minutes away.
access: You can access all areas of The Cov. It is entirely at your disposable for you to relax and enjoy. Our Federation home is on one level (no stairs to negotiate). The beautifully tiled bathroom offers both a bath and a large walk-in shower with washer and dryer facilities. The living room has a large comfy couch to enjoy the LCD TV ( with Fetch TV and free movies from Movie Box). The wifi is free and fast. Street parking is at your doorstep and available with no time restrictions.
interaction: Prior and during your stay I am available by mobile or email if you have any questions or need any assistance to ensure you have a relaxing and comfortable stay.
house_rules: Please treat The Cov as you would your own resting place otherwise an extra cleaning fee will be deducted from the security bond. Friendly reminder that for the comfort of all guests there is a STRICT NO SMOKING in the house. There is   also a STRICT NO PARTY POLICY. Any violation of this will result in eviction from the property and additional cleaning management fees being charged to the Bond. Yes, there is a Bond but I have never once had to make a claim on it. Let's all keep this good track record !

host.host_about: Am a woman who  believes that "grey is the new black." I also believe that travelling should be both a comfortable and a welcoming experience and that's why I'm confident that when you visit you will return again...and again.

reviews.comments: We absolutely loved staying at The Cov. The house was delightful, full of character, clean and equipped with everything we could need. Communication from Joy was excellent and the location of the house was perfect for us. We highly recommend staying at this place and we'll be back for sure, we hope. Joy was also hugely helpful when I left my earrings behind. She went out of her way to make sure I had them before we were on the road again.

Joy's house is very conveniently located to restaurants, bars, cafes, public transport and great food shopping in a great neighborhood. Her home is thoughtfully appointed and very comfortable with convenient self check-in
Close to shops and public transport, great kitchen, neat and clean, great communication.
The location for us was perfect . It is close to shops restaurants and public transport. The house had everything we needed.

Really a comfortable house for the family. Very convenient traffic to the city and community nearby. Only 4 minutes' walk to Marrickville train station. The house is federation style with beautiful high ceiling, the landlord has excellent taste for selection of pictures, such as oil painting, Chinese painting, scenery pictures, make the house vivid, I like them very much! The facilities in the kitchen are all ready. The landlord is very communicative, thoughtful. The car can be parked alongside the street freely. By the way, there is a very good Chinese restaurant supplying Canton breakfast, tasteful and original, just by 10 minutes' walk.
This is a great space in Marrickville, I was working in the area and it really suited my needs. I would not hesitate to stay again.
Stylish house, great location, perfect!
This apartment is really beautyful! We loved the perfect kitchen equipment. All the lovely details and the warm atmosphere made us feel like home. Very friendly and caring host. :-)

The Cov House is beautiful, and beautifully appointed. We cooked a Christmas lunch there and found everything we needed in the kitchen, and the rest of the house was no different. Joy responds promptly to messages and was very helpful both before and during our stay. We had a lovely Christmas and couldn’t have asked for anything more.
This is the perfect house for two couples. Very well equiped and location is close to shops and train station. Highly recomended
A very modern and cosy but truly historical house! Parks, supermarkets, public transport within walking distance. The library is fantastic!
Nice house, comfortable and near to everything.  If you have any question Joy will answer ASAP and so kindly. The experience has been a real pleasure!! Thank you once again!!!!

Joy is a super smart host that has thought of everything a guest could need. Seems silly, but I appreciated all the USB chargers around the house in the perfect spots. 

Really considerate with her communications too. 

Was as smooth as you'd hope.

We loved our stay here. Just like the pictures - maybe better! Very clean with excellent amenities. Very convenient location. Joy was a joy to deal with. Would happily recommend & will be staying again.
Great stay! Very close the train. We are local so know the area!. It doesn’t have a garden but a short drive to parks.

We had a great stay, the house is family friendly and in an excellent location!
Joy was very accommodating and responsive to all of our questions.
We had a very nice little journey by train into the city each day and much preferred staying in a nearby suburb compared with the city center. Would recommend this house to anyone.

Thanks again 

Ben and family

“It was the best of times it was the worst of times”. Best- the House was superb, beautifully furnished in a good location. Worst- 1. The door lock broke and we got trapped inside the house for almost two hours on our first morning. Which was harrowing with small children and no food. 2. The host could not be contacted when we had trouble with Check in. Leaving us standing on the door step with young children at 11pm at night. 3. The renovations next door were quite loud especially with young children sleeping during the day. 
Overall I think the place is great but we were unlucky with the mishaps.

The host is really helpful, the place itself was disappointing. You feel a bit trapped in there as it's a house that has been cut into 2 flats and this one has no real outlook or access to the outside... other than the path to the front door. If you are basically just sleeping there it probably wouldn't be an issue but if you want somewhere where you can relax in a lounge room, cook a dinner and sit down and enjoy it etc etc this probably won't be what you are after. Really close to the station though, which was great. Nice high ceilings. Just not that comfortable or welcoming.
We had a wonderful time at the Cov, a great place to stay & location was tops. Thanks for everything Joy!
A cosy & neat house
Very comfortable and clean home.
Great space, and location

Ideal location for Marrickville and very convenient for the city train. The Cov is exactly as described, Joy checked regularly that all was well. Hope to be able to stay here again for next Sydney visit
Great location in Marrickville and a very clean and lovely home.

name: Cosy Double Room in a bright flat!
summary: Double room in a cosy and nice appartment in the heart of Gracia, just 2 minutes from Joanic metro station. The apartment has a nice atmosphere, recently renovated, it is cozy and bright, with fully-equipped kitchen and a nice terrace. It also has free WIFI and heating. The room has a double bed, closet and a big desk. I will provide you blankets and towels.
description: Double room in a cosy and nice appartment in the heart of Gracia, just 2 minutes from Joanic metro station. The apartment has a nice atmosphere, recently renovated, it is cozy and bright, with fully-equipped kitchen and a nice terrace. It also has free WIFI and heating. The room has a double bed, closet and a big desk. I will provide you blankets and towels. Gracia was founded in the 17th century by the Carmelite order and for over two centuries was a separate village to Barcelona. However the poble became part of the whole when the vast Eixample district was constructed, bridging the gap between itself and the Old Town. Gracia is the district to choose for those who want to enjoy the charms of a bohemian and multicultural Barcelona which offer a great variety of cafes terraces and sunny little squares during the day as in the evenings is a real hub of Barcelona's nightlife with its restaurants and bars. In mid-August during Gracias has its Festa Major! During this rambunctious festiva
neighborhood_overview: Gracia was founded in the 17th century by the Carmelite order and for over two centuries was a separate village to Barcelona. However the poble became part of the whole when the vast Eixample district was constructed, bridging the gap between itself and the Old Town. Gracia is the district to choose for those who want to enjoy the charms of a bohemian and multicultural Barcelona which offer a great variety of cafes terraces and sunny little squares during the day as in the evenings is a real hub of Barcelona's nightlife with its restaurants and bars. In mid-August during Gracias has its Festa Major! During this rambunctious festival the residents of the barri hold a competition of "best dressed street" and half of the city descends night after night for a right royal knees up.
notes: For long term reservation we are able to host only one guest
house_rules: - Before booking send me a message presenting yourself, telling me if you are coming alone or with your friend or partner - Remember I will not accept booking for a third person

host.host_about:
Me gustan las capitales europeas, he vivido en muchas hasta que me enamoré de Barcelona hace 10 años, será porque he nacido en una isla y hechaba de menos el mar. Con un phd en periodismo me gusta los cuentos, el cinema, el arte e la literatura, luego de mi país hecho de menos los desayunos. 
Como el italiano no hay otro café...creo que sólo el portugués es tan bueno como el!

name: FURNISHED BACHELOR APARTMENT
summary: Fully furnished, clean, bright and sunny apartment. Ideal for one person or a couple. Heat/electricity/Internet included. An easy commute to all four universities as well as to downtown Montreal. Read the detailed description below.

house_rules: Please remove outdoor shoes when inside the apartment. Please ensure that the stairwell light is turned off when not in use. Please ensure that the bathroom fan is turned off when not in use.

host.host_about: Pamela and Fernando are teachers from Montreal, QC, Canada. We have both lived in many countries and travelled the world extensively. Between us, we speak English, Spanish, French, Portuguese, Hebrew and even some Esperanto. We are looking forward to more adventures in 2018 - 2019  as we travel during our sabbatical year abroad.

reviews.comments: The appartement is really perfect, cosy and well situated at the same time! Pamela and her husband were fantastic hosts as well, really nice and accomodating, thank you again!
The reservation was canceled 31 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

L'appartement est très bien situé, près de tout et facilement accessible par métro. Ce joli logement fût idéal pour nos 2 semaines à Montréal. Je vous le conseil fortement! Merci Pamela pour ton accueil et ce fût un plaisir de faire ta connaissance :)

Première expérience Air BandB réussie!! Pamela est une hôte très accueillante et très patiente (elle m'a attendue jusqu'à mon arrivée à 22h30). L'appartement est conforme à la description et il est très proche du métro Beaubien et de toutes commodités. Le centre ville est accessible en 15 mn. Merci encore pour ce séjour formidable.
Pamela est une hôte charmante et très disponible. L'appartement autant que le quartier sont agréables, bien situés, pleins de vie. Séjour agréable, on reviendra.
Pamela a ete tres accueillante et disponible, un charme.

We had an amazing time at Pamela's place, she welcomed us warmly and explained to us everything about the apartment and neighbourhood. Super friendly and helpful, she made herself available to us by email or phone for any questions we had about anything. 
The apartment is big, very clean and super sunny :) Very comfortable bed. Grocery store and liquor store at the corner, very close to Beaubien metro station, 2 blocks away from St Hubert shops, tons of restaurants and bars - the location is great - about 15 mins from downtown. Would definitely stay here again :) Thank you Pamela and Fernando for your hospitality !

The apartment was just like in the pictures. The location was very good close to the metro and near dowtown. We stayed 11 days. During that time, we experienced lot of noise coming from the other apartments, we could hear everything that was happening downstairs in the owner's house. The oven was also so dirty it even started the fire alarm when we tried to preheat it. The bathroom also had visible mold on the ceiling. Pamela and her husband also refused to give us the wifi password forcing us to wait for them for every electronic apparatus we had. The bed kept breaking. We had lots of trouble reaching Pamela or her husband on the first day although when we did they were very nice and kind to us.

Je suis restée dans l'appartement pour une nuit. C'est un bel appart. Tout était bien aménagé et complet. Pamela m'a chaleureusement accueilli et m'a tout expliqué même quand j'étais là que pour un nuit. Elle était très flexible sur l'heure du départ. Je vous recommande donc cet appartement.

Pamela was a great host. She contacted us in advance to be sure we would either meet or have the entrance code for the door. That was so helpful because we were driving and couldn't say exactly when we'd arrive.  The listing was accurate and we were very pleased with the sweet little apartment. The neighborhood is residential and quiet, but has convenient shopping right around the corner. It was also so convenient to be around the corner from a Metro stop. The mattress was fabulous! We had a wonderful time there.

J'ai vraiment apprécié mon espace. L'appartement était tel que décrit et très propre. Le lit est très confortable. J'ai été chaleureusement accueillie par Pamela. L'appart est vraiment bien situé et à proximité de tout. Je connais bien le quartier et le recommande fortement. Merci encore!

Pamela et Fernando ont été super avec moi et ma famille. Ce sont des hôtes très accueillants et très compréhensifs. 
Merci mille fois.
Léa
Thanks Pamela for making our stay exceptionally comfortable. Your apartment had everything we needed and you guys were very helpful. We had a great time,  and hope to return again someday!

Pamela was an excellent host, very friendly and always offered prompt and thorough responses. The place was clean and has great light. It is only rented out, not lived in, so it feels more like a hotel than someone's apartment. It's really close to the metro, the neighbourhood is charming, and the best coffee in town is 10 mins away at Odessa.
This place was clean, hosts were friendly and reliable, the pictures are accurate, overall great experience.
Pamela and Fernando were excellent hosts. My girlfriend and I enjoyed their apartment and loved the neighborhood. Look forward to staying with them again.

Pamela and Fernando were wonderful hosts! They left us a binder full of maps and ideas to explore the city. They were there if we needed anything and made sure everything was perfect. The apartment was very cozy and perfect for us. We loved Montreal and staying at their place made the trip even more fabulous! We look forward to staying with them again in the future! Thank you guys! =)

We found our hosts Pamela & Fernando to be communicative, friendly and helpful- thank you! The apartment was as pictured and described, in a good location just a short walk from the metro with some nice cafes and a grocery store nearby. We had a very busy itinerary and only needed basic accommodations for sleeping and bathing and this apartment was a nice fit for us - a good price, a comfortable mattress and fairly close to where we needed to be. Thanks again!

J'ai profité du studio de Pamela & Fernando une nuit, le temps d'un petit répit de famille, et cela m'a fait un bien fou! La grandeur est parfaite pour une personne ou pour un couple et l'appartement est nimbé de lumière naturelle, ce qu'il est fort agréable. De plus, les hôtes sont discrets et très accueillants. Ce n'est pas très bien insonorisé, comme tous les appartements de Montréal, mais ce n'est qu'un détail sur lequel Pamela & Fernando n'ont malheureusement pas de pouvoir, alors comment leur en vouloir? Les râleurs n'ont qu'à aller à l'hôtel, après tout! Moi, j'aurais bien profité de petit appartement quelques journées de plus!

Pamela and Fernando were amazing hosts, and were lovely enough to welcome my boyfriend and I into their home for an evening chat! They were very communicative, the apartment was delightful, just as shown in the pictures. The apartment was close to all amenities, and I will be definitely staying with them the next time I am back in Montreal. Thank you!

The apartment was excellent and even better than it looks in the photos! It was very private and pretty quiet. It was very easy to get to the metro and everything you need is within walking distance. Checking in was easy and straightforward and Pamela made sure that we were enjoying ourselves and made herself available to us if we needed anything. If I ever get back to Montreal, I will definitely stay with Pamela and Fernando again!

Nous avons été très bien accueillies par Pamela elle-même. L'appartement était parfait pour deux personnes, propre et bien équipé. À deux pas du métro Beaubien et près de très bons restos(Pâtes bol!). On le recommande fortement!

I had a short but wonderful stay here. The place is huge, clean, well-lit, and very conveniently located. Pamela sent me great instructions on getting there from the airport ($10 bus ride, and you can use the same ticket to transfer to the underground that takes you 3 blocks from the apartment). I especially enjoyed having Vietnamese pho a few blocks south of their apartment. Overall, an awesome experience.

Je me suis senti chez moi dans ce joli appartement situé près du métro. La description contenue sur le site Airbnb était conforme à ce que j'ai trouvé dans l'appartement qui était très propre et très tranquille. 
Je me promets d'y retourner dès que possible, pour un séjour plus long car, j'avais le sentiment d'être véritablement chez moi.

Merci à Pamela et Fernando

The apartment was clean and spacious, as well as being closely located to 2 metro stations and in a nice neighbourhood. 

Pamela and fernando were really easy to communicate with. They checked in with us before and during our stay to make sure everything was going alright. 

I would definitely return for another stay in Montreal!

Nous avons beaucoup apprécié notre séjour chez Pamela et Fernando, l'appartement correspondait exactement à la description.  Très propre, tranquille et beaucoup d'espace pour laisser nos effets.  Pamela a toujours répondu rapidement à nos questions et nous avons pu y accéder facilement malgré le fait que nous n'ayons pas rencontré notre hôte.

Der Aufenhalt bei Pamela und Fernando war ausgezeichnet und war sehr angenehm. Das Appartement ist in bester Ordnung. Die Lage der Wohnung ist sehr praktisch in unmittelbarer Nähe von Supermarkt und Metro. Pamela und Fernando sind sehr herzliche Gastgeber und haben mich willkommen geheissen! Ich habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt! Vielen Dank Pamela und Fernando, I hope to stay again with you!

Superbe appartement, clair et lumineux. Très bien équipé et très agréable à vivre. Le quartier est très sympa et il y a plein de commerces à proximité. Un peu galère pour se garer mais l'adorable Pamela nous a aidé à trouver une place pour éviter l'amende ;) Des hôtes très disponibles et sympathiques. À recommander chaudement!

My partner and I had a lovely stay here in early May 2015. Great apartment and neighbourhood. Pamela and Fernando were so accomodating and made arriving at the apartment after a long haul flight so easy. Communication was excellent and we really couldn't fault this place.
L'appartement est très lumineux et agréable. Il est bien situé et Pamela est très gentille. Merci encore de nous avoir accueillis chez vous
Super appartement au calme. Mes parents étaient ravis! Merci Pamela;)
Appartement comme décrit. Spacieux et bien placé proche d un métro. Pamela est vraiment sympa. Appartement à recommander

Pamela and Fernando were very welcoming and friendly throughout our stay. The apartment is both cozy and in an excellent location. They provide appliances if you wish to cook in the appt. during your stay. Wonderful experience!

description: Very close to shopping district and public transit

reviews.comments: It was close to the airport and very clean. Highly recommended
A pleasant and hassle-free place to stay. Really good value.
Very clean room and the May is veryFriendly.
May is quite warmhearted and super nice. The room is clean and the mattress is soft which make me home over here.
May is a lovely person, I'll recommand her anytime! oh and, her dog daisy is adorable!
Lovely self contained place with washing machine, TV bathroom. May was very helpful and nice. Good location near restaurants. Unit was very clean. Secure place. I would stay here again.
房间很干净,可以自己做饭｡距离火车站大约步行20分钟,还是挺方便的｡火车站有大超市｡房间内东西很全｡

reviews.comments: 比想象的好很多,但床单被套好想没有洗干净一样
很好找,出了尖沙咀地铁站A1过了马路就是了,空调热水都很给力,周围吃的玩的逛的都有很多选择
交通超级方便,尖沙咀D1出来就是了,下楼吃饭买东西都方便｡
位置不错,就在尖沙咀地铁站那边,房间在角落,比中间的宽一点,很棒
比预期的要好  干净整洁  就是房子有点潮湿可能个人对这块比较敏感   靠近市中心  逛街买东西超级放屁 可能个人比较
自带牙刷牙膏,否则会不方便,酒店内neiw没有
很干净,每日打扫,地理位置优越,出门尖沙咀地铁站,逛街购物出行非常便利!
the place is in good location and the rooms were clean.will surely be back here whenever i’m in HK.
The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

對於這次的住宿只能說香港寸土寸金想要住起來舒適只能選價錢稍高的賓館 我們在住宿上面覺得房間很昏暗 枕頭被子發黃 毛巾更是讓人嚇到傻眼雖然上面有標記是非一次性毛巾 但是大部分的毛巾要不是脱線要不就是有奇怪的污漬在上面 非常噁心 還有蟑螂 整潔上面完全跟上面寫的乾淨舒適完全不一樣 
垃圾桶只有一個非常小的在廁所裡面 
但是我要說他們賓館的位置是非常好的 接待跟打掃的人感覺人也不錯 但是內部的住房經驗感覺不是說一天不小心放了錯的毛巾給客人使用 而是一直都是這樣供給給客人用所以要入住的房客請三思謝謝
Great location, clean room and helpful staff. Would stay again!
整个房间很棒,比想象中的好太多了,对于出去玩的人来说,这样的性价比很高啦,每天还有专门打扫房间的哦,很赞
挺好 性价比对于香港来说挺高的

name: Bedroom in a Cozy Apartment
summary: A bedroom in an apartment located in Upper Manhattan (Harlem) just 20min train ride to Times Square, Penn Station on the 2/3 Train. Grand Central,Empire State Building and other neighborhoods around the city. Private compound with a good view & 24/7 Security. Building is located very close to the Apollo Theater, Sylvia’s,Red Rooster, New York Public Library and a few blocks from the East River. Good proximity to the 2/3 subway lines (4min walk) and a short walking distance.
space: Apartment is located on the 8th Floor.
description: A bedroom in an apartment located in Upper Manhattan (Harlem) just 20min train ride to Times Square, Penn Station on the 2/3 Train. Grand Central,Empire State Building and other neighborhoods around the city. Private compound with a good view & 24/7 Security. Building is located very close to the Apollo Theater, Sylvia’s,Red Rooster, New York Public Library and a few blocks from the East River. Good proximity to the 2/3 subway lines (4min walk) and a short walking distance. Apartment is located on the 8th Floor. Guests have access to the Bathroom, Kitchen, & Dinning Room Area. 2/3 Trains are available and are only a 4 min walk. Buses are also available right across the apartment.
transit: 2/3 Trains are available and are only a 4 min walk. Buses are also available right across the apartment.
access: Guests have access to the Bathroom, Kitchen, & Dinning Room Area.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Tobi was a gracious and flexible host. I highly recommend staying at Tobi's place if you need a place to crash in Manhattan and want to check out its historic Harlem neighborhood. He was very communicative and friendly, making my short stay very easy and comfortable. Don't hesitate to stay at Tobi's place!

Tobi's place was perfect for our needs. The apartment was clean, our room was comfortable, and Tobi was very accommodating. Checking in and out was easy, and communication was A1! His place is also conveniently located - only a few blocks away from the train. Tobi, thank you for your hospitality!
It's a really nice room and great place to stay.
Nice and friendly place Tobi make you feel home
Large bedroom & bed, located a 2min walk from 145h station in North Harlem. Tobi makes sure you have everything you need. I recommend!

Tobi est très sympathique et chaleureux. Son appartement est joli et la chambre très confortable avec un immense lit à l'américaine! L'endroit est au cœur de Harlem : à proximité du métro et des quartiers animés. Nous avons apprécié cette nuit sur Manhattan! Merci Tobi!
We really felt as if we were at home!!
Merci Tobi!

Tobi was a brilliant host and was so helpful! Me and my partner stayed in NYC for 4 days, and it was our first time there. Tobi went out of his way to help us understand the public transport and gave us loads of ideas. Room was clean and comfortable, would highly recommend! Thanks again Tobi!
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Allt praktiskt fungerade perfekt. Mycket gästvänlig. Omtänksam, kollade om vi kommit hem på kvällen, kändes bra. Hjälpte oss och boka buss och restaurangbesök. Tog oss till en gospelgudstjänst. Gjorde oss sällskap sista kvällen då vi åt på en restaurang i Harlem. Vi är supernöjda
Tobi was very friendly and helpful. His accommodation was pretty central and close to the subway station. We enjoyed our stay a lot!
Buen piso para una pareja que quiere pasar unos días en NY. Cerca del metro y se tarda 20min en llegar al centro. Tobi es muy simpático

Tobi was a fantastic host. He was very helpful with suggestions on where to get things in his neighborhood. He was also very flexible and accommodating with my check-in/check-out times. Highly recommended!!

The apartment was Ok. What you see in the pictures is what you get. The location is convenient, close to some subway stations in a walking distance, even though you make about 30-40 min to get midtown or downtown Manhattan. 
Even the apparent has a nice look, there were lots of dust everywhere, some parts of the apartment seam to not being cleaned since a very long time. The floors and carpets were dirty and there were stains on it (my partner stuck himself a needle in his foot left on the carpet), particularly in the kitchen, where there were dirty dishes, even the sink had grease and dirt. The dish washer had stagnant stinky water in it. It was home of the cockroaches we found all over the kitchen, food left there and dishes. That’s why we needed to clean up the entire apartment so we could stand for the long of our stay. Tobi offered us to find a cleaner as soon as possible but never appeared. That’s something he needs to look up before anyone comes into the apartment. 
Other than that the communication was ok, even when we were not able to meet each other during our stay as he was out of town.

Absolutely perfect for the non fussy traveller that wants value for money and an awesome location. Tobi is an excellent host and will make you feel at home and comfortable, he offers tips and ideas so you wont feel lost. I really enjoyed the location and local amenities are perfect. Always had hot water for showers, the bedroom is nice and clean, plus theres netflix and nice big tv in there so you can relax if you need to. I was always out most of the time and loved the location and felt very safe and secure. Its a lovely neighbourhood, with a lot of character. If i go to NYC again i'd defo consider Tobi again.

La casa di Tobi è molto carina e confortevole. La posizione è comoda, infatti si trova a pochi passi dalla fermata della metro e in 20 minuti si raggiunge midtown. La zona è molto tranquilla, anche la sera dopo cena, noi siamo sempre tornati a piedi senza nessun problema. Tobi è un host molto simpatico e disponibile, ci ha aiutato ad ambientarci nella zona ed è sempre stato molto gentile. Sicuramente ritorneremo nel suo appartamento alla prossima visita a New York. Lo consiglio a tutti!
Great value. Tobi is very friendly and accommodating
Cool location. Tobi is a nice guy as well.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: JF Cozy Apartment Blue
summary: O espaço extremamente luminoso, onde a luz do dia entra em todas as divisões , foi decorado com muita paixão sempre a pensar nos hospedes e em todas as comodidades possíveis para que se possam sentir «na sua casa» enquanto permanecerem no Porto. Casa de banho equipada com secador de cabelo e oferta de gel de banho e champôo Edificio com elevador
space: situado na zona mais animada da cidade If the arrival is after 11:00 pm the supplement will be € 30
description: situado na zona mais animada da cidade If the arrival is after 11:00 pm the supplement will be € 30 If the arrival is after 11:00 pm the supplement will be € 30
neighborhood_overview: Este bairro integra o Centro Historico do Porto, Patrimonio Mundial da UNESCO, assim pode visitar locais tão emblematicos como a famosa Torre dos Clerigos, o Jardim da Cordoaria, a celebre livraria Lello, desfrutar das vistas para o rio do Passeio das Virtudes, etc....
notes: If the arrival is after 11:00 pm the supplement will be € 30
transit: Walking distances: Trindade metro station - 6 min Clerigos Tower - 8 min Lello Bookstore - 5 min Galerias de Paris street - 5 min S. Bento train station - 10 min Porto art district (Miguel Bombarda) - 8 min Bakery, pharmacy and bank - 2 min Paid underground parking - 2 min (costs 15€/day) Supermarket - 6 min Laundry - 3 min O apartamento é muito central permitindo a visita a todos os pontos de interesse da cidade a pé. No entanto se preferir tem à disposição todo o tipo de transportes publicos como autocarros, carro electrico, taxis...
interaction: Se precisar de alguma coisa durante a estadia pode sempre contactar-me Este apartamento está situado perto de todos os pontos de maior interesse a visitar e de toda a diversão.
