In the case of requesting the extra bed (sofa bed) with an occupation of 2 guests, there should always be paid the fee for an additional guest, as the use of more beds is not included in the base price. - Babies are free till the age of 2 (max 1) when using existing beds. - When you leave the apartment, I ask you to turn off the lights and the heaters. - Do not put anything above the heaters and turn them off when you leave the loft (discon

host.host_about: Receber é uma arte e um prazer pessoal. Poder conhecer pessoas diferentes é um desafio empolgante para alguém que como eu preza a comunicação e a relação interpessoal.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
6월24일부터 27일까지 이용했어요. 
블루컨셉의 집으로 사진과 똑같아요. 머무는 내내 편안했고, 좋은 기억들만 있네요^^ 
한국어로 된 포르토 가이드북도 준비해주신
센스넘치고 친절한 호스트님 위치도 trindade나 aliados 역과도 멀지않고 걸어서 주변명소 돌아다니기에도 좋아요. 또다시 방문하면 또 이용하겠어요!

Verdaderamente en el centro de todo, a 15 min andando de los puntos turísticos mas importantes, del transporte publico, restaurantes,limpio, tranquilo, aunque es un interior es súper luminoso, con todas las cosas que puedes necesitar para estar unos días  fuera de casa

숙소가 사진에 보는 것처럼 깔끔하고 쾌적했어요. 아주아주 만족하며 머물렀습니다:)
또 호스트분이 웰컴푸드로 에그타르트랑 와인을 준비해주셨고, 주변 맛집들도 알려주셔서 잘 이용했어요!
다음번에도 머물고싶은 숙소!!!

This is a 6 star apartment and faultless. Maria's taste and attention to detail is impeccable and every thought given to the comfort of her guests. The bed is excellent and we loved having our morning coffee on the small balcony. The location is perfect, with many restaurants nearby, just a short walk to Livraria Lello and Clerigos tower and yet QUIET!  Trindade metro stop is just a 10 minute walk away and connects to the airport in 30 minutes. Maria is very responsive, considerate, charming and gives great suggestions about visiting the city and places to eat.

Maria's flat is beautiful, clean, and quiet. The kitchen is well-equipped for a longer stay in Porto, and the location is excellent: you are close to everything but not stuck in the middle of the busiest area of the city (Ribeira).
정말 강력 추천합니다.

It's very comfortable and good for sight viewing in Porto. It takes about 15 minutes to river on foot, especially 5min to he famous book store.
There is a kitchen in the room and some supermarkets around the room, and you have to prepare salt, pepper, oil and so on by yourself.
Besides, the host is so kind. We had to leave there at 4:00AM to take a plane, then she made a reservation of taxi. We really appreciated.

L accueil de Maria à été parfait. Son cadeau de bienvenue excellent. Maria a pris le temps de nous présenter son appartement et les choses utiles du voisinage. Ses recommendations en matière de restauration sont des plus judicieuses. La décoration est très soignée et l équipement parfaitement pensé et efficace. La propreté des plus impeccable. La localisation juste ce qu'il faut entre centrale et un peu à l écart du bruit. Sans doute un des meilleurs Airbnb que nous ayons utilisé. Nous aurons plaisir à revenir.

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Maria à notre arrivée malgré notre retard. Maria parle un peu français et nous a conseillé sur des visites et restaurants. Elle s'est même proposée de gérer la réservation de notre taxi pour notre retour à l'aéroport ce que nous avons beaucoup apprécié. L'appartement est conforme à la description. Très bonne literie et quartier calme. L'appartement est très bien situé au centre de Porto. Tout se fait à pied. Commerces de proximité, gare, métro sont très facilement accessibles en peu de temps. N'hesitez pas à vous rendre en périphérie de Porto comme Matosinhos, Aveiro, Guimares, Espino...Le train ou le métro ne sont pas chers, ils sont très propres et très accessibles , nous voyageons en toute sécurité. Les restaurants dans des petites rues réservent de belles surprises avec des plats typiques à faible coût. Nous conseillerons à nos amis l'adresse de l'appartement de Maria ! Encore merci pour cette belle semaine !

What a lovely apartment! Clean, beautifully decorated, very spacious and in the best location. Everything was within walking distance, and Maria was very communicative and gave us some great tips and recommendations, plus also helped us with an early check-in. We truly enjoyed our stay and would definitely book again!
Excellent emplacement de cet appartement très bien situé, calme et pratique, très sécurisé. Grandes baies et mobilier tout à fait charmant. Très propre, visiblement récemment rénové.
A lovely apartment perfectly located! Maria is very welcoming and available to provide information. She deserves the 5 stars without any doubt. I will come back for sure!

A wonderful, centrally located apartment in Porto within walking distance to many of the fine restaurants the city has to offer. Maria made the check-in process extremely easy and had many recommendations for us during our stay. My only regret is that we couldn't have stayed longer!

I've never been in a house so egual to the photos. Maria is an amazing host, so gentle, helpful and kind. She even called a taxi for us. She answers to messagges in a very short time. The house is beautiful and really clean placed in the city centre and fits perfectly families, couples and friends. Kitchen is well-equipped, bathroom is nice, the bed is really confortable and livingroom is big. The house is bright full! Highly recommended

BEAUTIFUL home!!! Right in the heart of the city and walking distance from everything but also very quiet and peaceful. The home was very clean and comfortable. We only stayed one night, but we could have easily stayed several more! Cannot recommend this place enough! :)
Hôte très professionnelle et accueillante, quartier calme et très bien situé par rapport au centre ville. Appartement très fonctionnel et très propre. Tout y est! On le recommande

The apartment is actually a surprise and Maria is very nice host.  She gave us detailed introduction not only about the flat but also recommended some good local restaurants.  Her apartment is comfortable, elegant and clean.  The kitchen and bathroom is full facility.  Metro station, town centre and point-of-interest are in walking distance.
Alojamiento muy céntrico y completamente preparado

Maria's apartment is beautifully decorated in blue and white shades. The location is perfect - right in the centre of Porto, making it very easy to walk to all the main sights. The best thing about the apartment is, however, Maria - she went above and beyond to ensure we had a lovely stay. I would highly recommend Maria's apartment for a great base in Porto.

Everything was great. Place was super-clean and location is more than perfect. Checkin went very smoothly and Maria's daughter showed us everything needed. I'd recommend this place to everyone, for both short but also longer stay.

Such an amazing location to explore Porto from.  This apartment is literally close to everything.  Tourist sites, bars, good eats, coffee, shopping etc.  Should I come back I'd want to rent this apartment again.   It's nicely decorated, comfortable and has everything you need for a home away from home.  Maria was easy to communicate with, flexible with our check in time, helpful with must see suggestions and a joy to meet.  You couldn't find a better location.
Maria’s place is super clean, in a great position, and she is very helpful.

L’appartement est situé au 2ème étage avec ascenseur, et donne sur l’arrière du bâtiment et est donc à l’abri du bruit de la rue. Il est très agréable, lumineux, très bien décoré, avec un équipement complet, et une excellente literie. Tout est en parfait état. La localisation, centrale, est idéale pour découvrir et visiter la ville, et très commode pour les courses et les sorties : nombreux commerces, bars et restaurants à proximité.
Enfin, Maria (qui parle bien français) nous a offert un accueil particulièrement aimable et chaleureux, et a fait tout son possible pour nous assurer un séjour réussi : une belle rencontre qui fait honneur à l’hospitalité portugaise.
Une adresse à recommander très vivement.

Here we (my wife, my 5-month old son and I) had our first Airbnb experience. It was great! Maria had everything prepared before arrival. The apartment was exactly as described, family friendly and perfectly located, with everything in walking distance.
Sometimes it was a bit loud (music) from cafés nearby, yet this was within limits. The little one wasn’t bothered by it all.

Overall, 5 stars from us!!

Can't wait to come back here the next time we come visit Porto!! Maria's place was exactly as described; a beautifully decorated little haven in the heart of Porto. Maria was an incredible host, going above and beyond to meet us early to drop off our bags, helping out with a medical situation, and providing endless amazing recommendations. It couldn't have been a better experience!

Excelente opção para quem quer ficar no centro, próximo à padarias, restaurantes e livrarias (Lello inclusive ).  O apartamento é lindo, limpo e bem cuidado. Maria nos recebeu super bem e deu dicas que fizeram a diferença, pois não conhecíamos o Porto ainda.
I strongly recommend to follow Maria's advices on restaurants. Every single one we tried from her list was a marvelous experience :)
숙소가 깨끗하고 엘리베이터가 있어서 편리합니다. 호스트과의  의사소통도 메시지를 통해 즉시 이루어집니다. 위치도 좋습니다

The apartment is kept in good condition. Quiet and nice location. The only concern is the portable heaters appeared to be inadequate for cold nights. Thanks to Maria's hospitality, we had a very pleasant stay :)

El lugar es muy bonito y está en una zona en donde hay lugares para comer y tomar. Queda cerca de Praça da Liberdade y no tuvimos ningun problema para caminar al centro o al puente.  El departamento es igual a las fotos y María nos dio muchas recomendacions, es súper atenta y linda.

I’m not new to airbnb but staying at Maria’s place was definitely the best experience I had so far. First, Maria is an incredible host, absolutely charming and pleasant to deal with. All the recommendations Maria gave about the city, especially restaurants and cafes, were worthwhile. Second, the flat itself is just great. It’s in perfect condition, sophisticatedly decorated and located in a great place to enjoy Porto. I’m still impressed.
Percebe-se que cada detalhe foi pensado para uma estadia confortável. A casa é linda, decorada, completa e bem quentinha. A localização é perfeita. Super recomendo!!
O espaço é maravilhoso. O apartamento é muito aconchegante e fica bem localizado ! Adoramos cada segundo em Porto. Eu e minha esposa recomendamos !
Boa estadia!

Appartement très propre et idéalement situé. Calme, literie de bonne qualité, appartement fonctionnel.
Une très bonne adresse

Merci Maria pour votre accueil.
Votre appartement est charmant et à tout le confort nécessaire.
Il est également très bien situé .
Je recommande votre appartement. 
Très bon séjour à porto .

L'appartement a une localisation parfaite j'ai meme réussi a me garer deux soirs de suite dans la rue ( coup de chance ^^ ). Sinon c'est très facile a rejoindre de l'aéroport par le metro. Maria est tres gentille et nous a tres bien accueilli. L'appartement est très bien décoré, c'est tout mignon. Super propre, irréprochable.   Il y a plein de tres bons restaurants (tapas, pizza, viande), bars et café a deux pas.  Je recommande et je garde l'adresse! :)

Quel accueil ! Maria nous a tout de suite expliquée les bonnes adresses pour profiter un maximum de notre séjour. L’appartement est conforme aux photos, top! Si nous repassons par Porto nous reviendrons!! Muito obrigado :)
Great location, quiet, comfortable and clean.  Highly recommend

The apartment is very central and yet  quiet. Everything is fully equipped and as described. Maria was the perfect host, I’m looking forward to staying at the apartment again in a future visit to Porto.

Maria was an amazing host!  I understand why she's listed as a "super host."  It's true.  She was hospitable.  She was accomodating.  She was kind.  She definitely goes the extra mile in every way!  She was a wonderful host and her place was beautiful.  It is better than described and perfectly centrally located.  It was imaculate and lovely.  I am thrilled we were able to stay here!
Maria’s place was exactly as described, excellent location for exploring Porto.
For three people staying in Porto, good central place. Maria was nice and responsive. Good value! Thanks Maria!

Apartamento excelente para jovens de baixa estatura,  sem filhos e sem carro. Cozinha bem equipada e decoração preciosa. Muito bem localizado, porém, dificuldade para estacionar ou estacionamento caríssimo.  A rua está repleta de obras e movimento. 
A senhora Maria é bastante atenciosa e flexível.  A cama para bebê é alugada por apenas 10 euros.

The apartment is beautifully designed and very well located for exploring Porto on foot.  There are a number of restaurants and bars nearby that cater for all tastes and Maria also pointed us in the direction of a fantastic bakery just across the street. We would definitely stay here again on any future visit to up and coming Porto.
Very nice apartment in a quiet location in the historic area of Porto. Close to great restaurants and nice walkable streets. Highly recommend this apartment!
Very pleasant appartment in a brilliant location. Maria is the perfect host.
Really nice welcome ! Maria is a great host , totally recommend the place !
Fantastic location! The apartment is lovely, very conveniently located and incredibly clean! Maria is amazing! Highly recommended!

A beautifully-decorated apartment with a lift, Maria's place was a great stay for us. The 3 fans came in very handy since there was a heat wave while we were there. The outdoor dining area was a bonus, as was the washer and drying racks provided. The bed was comfortable and the apartment was spacious. Nice resto area around the corner, charming neighbourhood nearby. I would recommend this apartment.
Apartamento coqueto, limpio y amplio con baño un poco pequeño pero suficiente. situado e en el centro.
Great place, perfect location highly recommend staying here. Maria is an amazing host.

Très bon accueil chaleureux de Maria. Un appartement « cosy » très bien placé près des rues animées du « haut Porto » le soir, mais au calme la nuit car il donne sur l’arrière. 
Propreté impeccable. Bien équipé. Près du métro.
Idéal pour profiter de la ville. Nous le recommandons.

I highly recommend this listing! Maria’s place is gorgeous and homey.  It has everything you need and more and is in a very central location with cafes and bars within a few minute’s walk. The apartment is exactly as pictured, and is so beautifully decorated! Maria is such an accommodating and thoughtful host. We arrived very late for check-in and Maria kindly waited and even had a bottle of wine and some pastries as a gift for us. One of my best Airbnb experiences!

The apartment is at the center of the city with a walkable distance to almost all the tourism attractions and sao bento station!It is even more beautiful than the pictures!The bed and towel are extremly cozy!You can get all you need here. Maria is very helpful!will definitely come bac k!

We spent 4 days in Maria's apartment and it was wonderful time.  The flat has a perfect location...not so far from historical center, there are many nice restaurants/cafes/bars around this place. The apartment is cozy, beautiful and has everything  you need. Maria is the most welcoming and attentive host I've ever met. If you'd like to visit Porto you should definitely stay in Maria's flat.

숙소는 사진에서 보는 것과 똑같이 깔끔하고 예쁩니다^^ 

식기가 잘 준비되어있고 
프라이팬이나 냄비등도 깨끗해서 좋았습니다

늦은시간 체크인했음에도 불구하고
반갑게 맞아주었고, 
에그타르트와 포트와인을 웰컴푸드로 준비해주었습니다 

궁금한게 있을때, 마리아에게 메세지 보내면 바로바로 답이 와서 좋았고 

거실과 방에 라지에이터가 있어서 따뜻했습니다

숙소 근처에 카르무성당, 렐루서점등 주요 관광지와 가깝고 맛있는 음식점도 많습니다 

아 수건은 인당 두장 제공되니 수건 많이 쓰시는 분들은 수건 준비해가시는것도 좋을것같습니다 

다시 포르투 여행을 간다고 해도 다시 이곳에서 머물것 같습니다 ^^

My wife and I are two seniors from the U.S. and have been traveling through Europe for 5 months, lodging at many different apartments. Maria and her apartment are one of our few highlights. The apartment was charming, very comfortable, well stocked and perfectly located for enjoying Porto. Maria herself was always available and extremely helpful. Thank you Maria for a wonderful memory.

The apartment is very well located in the center of Porto, in a strategical position for visiting the city. The apartment is a professionally furnished and designed two-rooms space + bath and balcony (a very nice feature, even if the sight is on an internal court you can see a slice of sky). Inside we could find everything we needed, the space was perfectly clean and definitely comfortable. Maria was very kind in receiving us and gave us many informations about good restaurants and places to visit. Recommended!

name: Luxury Retreat On Maunalani Heights Honolulu
summary: Luxury Retreat In The Mountains Behind Diamond Head Overlooking Waikiki With Views From Kokohead To Honolulu International Airport.   5 to 10 miles from the best beaches (Waikiki Beach, Kahala Beach, Ala Moana Beach), best shopping centers (Ala Moana Center, International Market Place, Chinatown, Kahala Mall), best restaurants, activities and events.
description: Luxury Retreat In The Mountains Behind Diamond Head Overlooking Waikiki With Views From Kokohead To Honolulu International Airport.   5 to 10 miles from the best beaches (Waikiki Beach, Kahala Beach, Ala Moana Beach), best shopping centers (Ala Moana Center, International Market Place, Chinatown, Kahala Mall), best restaurants, activities and events.

reviews.comments:
Michael's place is Gorgeous And very 
Accommodating,Everything you need is there..Its so nice just being there was just so tranquil.
The views are amazing.Excellent utilities !
Water pressure,light's, washer n dryer etc 
We stayed 7 days added 3 more snd eould have still been.But he had guests coming in.So If you want the best place all around 
OH AND BEST HOST EVER! - Get him and book extra in advance!!:)))
What a great host! Nice hospitality, everything was perfect and we had a great communication. Totally recommended. The room has n amazing view. Perfect in all ways

Guest house in a great location with a wonderful view of Diamond Head and Waikiki. The house was well stocked with juice and snacks for us. Micheal was nice and quick to respond to any questions over text. Would definitely recommend as a great place to get out of Waikiki and see the rest of Honolulu!
Such a beautiful view and relaxing a cozy home! Definitely a home I would recommend and come back to later!

Amazing view cottage perched on the ridge, perfect for a couple. Short ride down the hill for shops and restaurants. Not too far from the Waikiki action/ nightlife. Host Michael is awesome, you will be glad you stayed here.
Very nice view, near the city center. And most importantly a pleasant owner! :)

Michael has a lovely retreat home.The view from the balcony was just beautiful. Quiet,clean, homey. He responds right away to our messages.  He was professional, and a very nice gentleman. We had the pleasure to  meet him and he walked us through his place.Would definitely recommend his place to our friends!

This place was seriously awesome. I lived in Hawaii for some time and recently went back for a wedding. This place was perfect my 3 buddies and myself. Michael was very accommodating, kind, punctual, and very good with communication. He even let us use the driveway for a bigger car, and when an extra friend flew in allowed him to stay with us last minute. The place had an amazing view, but only after driving up the giant hill. Also the knook area was my favorite place in the property. Cool, quiet, and with a great host I would totally recommend and stay there again. Great job Michael!!
Michael's place is awesome, a secluded but central hideout with a great view! Loved having coffee on the deck- great day to start the morning! Very hospitable, we would definitely stay again!

This beautiful space is so lovingly maintained and incredibly comfortable.    We enjoyed watching the sunrise and sunset on Diamond Head and the trade winds provided the perfect cooling during a particularly hot spell!  My husband grew up on Wilhelmina Rise and it was so wonderful to be 2 blocks from his parents and family home.  No  ka oi!

The view here was absolutely amazing. It is on top of the hill which provides a stunning view to wake up to every morning and sip some coffee before heading out for the day as well as a wonderful spot to watch the sunset. It is super close to Waikiki but is tucked away in a quiet neighborhood. You get the best of both worlds at this location! Additionally, the loft was super comfortable and very roomy. To top things off, Michael was tremendously communicative and was a very welcoming host. I will definitely stay here when I return to Honolulu!

Michael was a great host! And the place was in a great location for us. The bungalow was out of the busy town and away from the noise but still had a fantastic view that was great for the sunrise and sunset. Cozy with great hospitality

Michael's place was beyond perfect. You easily have one of the best views of the city and ocean from the patio, and it's just a short drive into town. The accommodation was great, our family of four fit just fine, made dinner in the kitchen, and enjoyed the place just as much as we enjoyed going out and seeing the sights. Michael is a wonderful host and we'll definitely be staying with him whenever we come to Hawai'i.

What a great place to stay! With all the generic places to stay that are just condos, to be in a great little cottage with a feeling of seclusion, all dark wood, great deck view. There's basically a caretaker / resident on site who is very friendly and lives in one of the other houses - easy to get ahold of, no waiting around.

A few points: the internet here is very strong, as is the shower. I love a good morning shower, and this is the best ever. An on-demand water heater, I think.

If there is anything to be aware of, the parking is a little dicey. There's a garage right under the house, but our monstrous rental car was a tight fit! A normal car should be fine..

We had such a lovely time at Michael’s place!  The view and island breeze were so beautiful that my husband and I canceled some of our plans so we could spend an entire morning sitting on the patio and drinking coffee.  Michael was a very welcoming and responsive host who embodies the aloha spirit.  If you’re looking for a relaxing experience away from the crowds, I highly recommend Michael’s getaway!

The cottage itself is a beautiful piece of mid-century modern architecture. 
It's cozy and quiet with twinkling nighttime views. A very special place for getting up and out of the city. 
Michael is a very sweet person. We had privacy but he was also close by if we needed something. 
This is a very special gem.

This is a comfortable, beautiful , private posh apartment with an outstanding view of Diamond Head from the covered porch and bedroom.  Michael is a wonderful host  . It doesn't get any better than this---you can stop looking and book this now.

Scenic, cool breezes, quiet and relaxing. Amazing view of Diamond head. Loved the shower pressure. Its a steep or winding drive up to the top which I found a little hair raising.  Found a better route off of Keanu St. thru a lyft driver on our last day.  Michael was very friendly and accesible.  Pretty yard with lots of fruit trees.  Morning rain was lovely.

It's like having your own private cabin in paradise with  breathtaking views,  you will have a blast just driving up the hill to your B&B  don't forget your drinks and Camera to sit on the patio  for the sunset

Very nice place for a small family.  I traveled alone with 3 kids and I felt safe here.  My kids loved the loft!  I loved the view!  Michael was nice and flexible with checkout.  I hope to visit again sometime!!!

A fantastic location with great view. Away from the busyness of Honolulu but close enough for quick and easy access to Honolulu and environs. Michael is a great host, very responsive to any requests. Highly recommended!!
风景超好的民宿,位于火奴鲁鲁的半山,远眺威基基海滩和钻石山头,虽然我们只住了一天,但是我们还是放弃了其他的旅游安排,享受旅途的片刻安宁,完美的日出､日落｡房间设备齐全,Michae人又很好,也很热情,竟然抱着他的一只乌鸡跟我们say hello,并且开心的跟我们分享了他的三只乌鸡的故事｡很完美的一次民宿体验,并且给我们的旅途画上了一个完美的句号,值得推荐｡

We were fortunate to spend 3 fabulous weeks at Michael's retreat. Michael is a wonderful person, gracious and respectful. He was always helpful and kind. His place totally reflects his wonderful sense of Hawaiian style and grace.  Everything is here for a simple restful holiday.  Since this visit was a pre-celebration of our 50th wedding anniversary, it was perfect.

The kitchen was cozy and well equipped. The bathroom was private with a great hot shower and the bed was very comfortable.  The beautiful lanai was a highlight as it overlooked Michael's beautiful garden and personal touches. The view was phenomenal and large enough for dining and working at a computer while enjoying the sights of Diamond Head, the ocean and city below.  Finally we loved the neighborhood and its proximity to the bus, if needed.  We will never forget the chorus of birds singing from dawn until dusk. One cannot help but be happy and at peace at Michael's place.

We truly hope to return one day.

Thank you, Michael!

Patty and Bill

Micheal's place is located at the top of mountain across from Diamond head. My wife and I had a wonderful dinner at the balcony while watching a beautiful sunset. As long as you have a rent car, I believe this house is one of the best choice.

I spent 3 nights at a hotel right in front of Waikiki then another 2 nights at Micheal's place. Frankly, my wife and I pretty much liked the stay at this house than the hotel at Waikiki.

Rent a car and get to Micheal's house, this is my next choice again. Sure, I won't regret.
Great views, far from the business of Waikiki but still close to places like Hanauma bay etc.

We had a very brief stay at Michael's place but it was great one none the less.  Amazing view of diamond Head Crater.  Highly recommend hiking to the summit of diamond Head for the sunrise.  Would recommend this place to people in small groups of 2 or 3.  A car or ride share are a good idea as it is near the top of a large hill.
Michael is very friendly. We had three great nights at his studio.
Michael is a very hospitable host!Very nice Mountain View! A quiet place for retreat! Away from crowd!
Great hospitality and location, would  definitely stay again. Thank you!

Even after having admired the nice pictures on Airbnb, Michael’s place exceeded our expectations when we arrived. It was well equipped with everything we needed during our stay and the interior was very tasteful and cozy. The view overlooking Diamond Head and Waikiki is really spectacular.

Michael greeted us upon arriving and showed us around in a very welcoming way.

The place was greatly appreciated by the whole family and we would definitely like to come back to stay longer.

Michaels bungalow was perfect. It was secluded from the business of Waikiki and you really felt like you had a special little Home while on vacation. The view was absolutely breathtaking. I would highly recommend this place for anyone! Families, couples, or just the solo traveler alike!
Great location, beautiful view, wonderful host.  Short distance from Waikiki, but couldn't hear any city noise.  Easy access to the highway, allowing us to travel the island easily.

Loved the view from Michael's place and it's proximity to the interstate. If you're going to be spending a lot of time on the south shore, this is a great place to be. The neighborhood is quiet and safe, and the rental unit provides a lot of privacy.
너무 친절한 호스트 입니다 집의 위치는 시내에서 다소 떨어져 있지만 어디서도 볼 수 없는 완벽한 경관을 연출 합니다 또한 상쾌한 공기를 느낄 수 있습니다 아침에 일어났을때 보이는 다이아몬드 헤드의 아름다움은 완벽합니다 다음번에도 이곳에 머무를 것을 확신합니다

Really nice veiw, hospitable kind friendly responsive host, accommodates family’s well
Kitchen full of delightful tea cups and dishes as well as bachelor type condiments for your conveinience

The house is as presented, the view is great with nothing to disturb your sleep. 
Michael is friendly, helpful and informative.
The first ride up to the house is a little confusing but after that all is good
Quiet and peaceful, beautiful view! Close to highway and attractions!

Incredible view, lush tropical gardens, great neighborhood location, and the birds...
The birds provided a symphony of tropical music. Late afternoon we felt like we were in a rain forest garden and woke us in the morning to their joy of the new day.
We loved staying here! The view is amazing and Michael was very friendly and helpful! It’s so nice and quiet in the neighborhood.
Excellent host - quick communication, clear instructions, clean space with beautiful views from the porch. Loved the space and found it very relaxing.

We had a wonderful stay with Michael over our 5 day vacation in O'ahu! Michael was an amazing host, he was easy to communicate with and made us feel very welcome. The place has an amazing view we thoroughly enjoyed every morning and evening, and was also very well equipped with lots of everyday items you are likely to not think about packing and end up having to purchase. The studio itself was beautiful, and we had such a great time. Would definitely love to come back and stay with Michael again!
This an amazing place, highly recommmended. Extraordinary views, a home away from home.

This place is epic. Seriously if I could give more stars I would. I cannot express how amazing the view is. And it was SO nice staying outside the hustle and bustle of the usual Waikiki scene. Michael was incredibly responsive and accommodating. The kitchen comes with a lot of condiments, food items and such so make sure you take a look before you go shopping!

The bungalow was extraordinary; a much more exciting and unique choice than staying in a hotel.  Michael's place offers a large lanai with great views of Diamond Head Crater, a full kitchen, washer and dryer, a private backyard area, and the most comfortable bed ever, which was amazing to luxuriate in.  The bungalow is definitely romantic, but know that the place, and all its amenities, truly caters to every kind of traveler.  The loft bed, in addition to the queen-sized bed in the bungalow, would be great for friends and family.  The kitchen comes with a stove, full-size refrigerator, microwave, coffeemaker, dishware, and cookware, perfect for those who prefer to stay at home and enjoy dinner on the lanai with the amazing view.  Michael's place is incredibly fun and, honestly, I will never go back to staying in a hotel again if I can help it.  Thanks, Michael--you are a dreamweaver and a memory-maker.
Michael was an extremely kind host. Great location; close to everything but secluded from hustle and bustle. Amazing views!
wonderful location outside of Waikiki with amazing view.

This place was great! The view is truly sensational, and we loved waking up to it every day. The bed was comfortable, the bathroom was spacious and well-appointed, and Michael was a kind, responsive and gracious host. There are lots of great spots for coffee or a bite in the Kaimuki neighborhood at the bottom of the hill. It's a very lush spot, so if there's been a lot of rain, you might need to wear bug spray out on the deck (if mosquitoes like you like they like me). We would absolutely go back.

Michael’s place is  beautiful
He’s a dear 
And very full of the aloha spirit

Such a wonderful stay, I highly recommend this air b n b for your time in Honolulu. The view from the lanai is absolutely stunning. Michael was quick to respond to all communication. Absolutely wonderful!
Sum it up in one word, Amazing!  For sure coming back here to stay again.

Michael’s place was a lovely getaway from busy Waikiki without being too far out. The bungalow was private, charming, and well kept. Michael was quick to respond and a very attentive host. Would definitely recommend this spot!

Merci à Michael pour son accueil chaleureux !
Comme annoncé la vue sur Diamond Head est magnifique. La maison est bien au calme sur les hauteurs, loin de l'agitation de Waikiki. Un quartier plus animé avec plusieurs restaurants est à 5 minutes de voiture. L'appartement est très bien équipé.

Such a fantastic host! This was by far the best air b n b experience yet! Michael was attentive and hospitable and yet we felt like we had our privacy. The space was clean and the bed was very comfortable. The veiws are great and waking up in the morning to the sounds of birds in the trees was so special! Total gem! Words can’t begin to describe how delighted we were with our stay. It’s a great place to come home to at the end of the day to take a fresh shower, sleep in a comfortable and then wake up to the birds and take in your coffee on the lanai with gorgeous veiws. Simplicity at its best!

Michael is a really nice guy and was very nice to chat with him. He was always available to help during my stay and because I was travelling alone, he picked me up at the airport and took me to the bus station on my departure. Guess what, he has 3 amazing hairy chickens and their eggs are delicious (he gave me some to cook). The apartment is very nice and you'll love having your breakfast in the balcony while you enjoy the great view. Thanks for everything Michael - João

Nous avons passé 3 semaines superbes chez Michael.. Le logement se trouve sur les hauteurs d Honolulu avec une vue à couper le souffle sur le cratère du volcan Diamond Head.. Le treck pour se rendre au sommet du volcan est à conseiller, la vue est splendide.. 
Le logement est très bien équipé et conforme aux photos postées..
Pas besoin de réveil, les oiseaux magnifiques que l’on peut voir se chargent de vous réveiller.. Nature luxuriante et très bien entretenue..
À conseiller... Aloha à tous ceux qui viendront rendre visite à Michael...

This is a great little oasis away from the hustle-and-bustle of Waikiki. We loved retreating here after days at the beaches or snorkeling Haunama Bay, to return to the sound of birds and a blissful evening rain. Michael is a great host (he even brought us scones one morning!) and the rainbow-vistas from the deck every morning make this place a great stay all on their own. 

We'll be back!

We had a fantastic time staying at Michael’s. The view was breathtaking overlooking the Diamond Head crater and Waikiki. The little place was clean & cosy with everything we ever needed. 
Michael was a wonderful host: super responsive and caring. Hubby got sick on the flight over to Hawaii. Michael kindly let us check in a bit early to rest and provided some much need  cold & flu tablets. 
We’re definitely planning to go back and would recommend Michael’s place to anyone visiting Honolulu.

Michael was very helpful and went over and above in terms of hospitality. The place was pleasantly removed from busyness of the city (this is why we went here) but close enough to get there quickly. You'll need a car or get to know "The Bus" that goes up there. Either way... you probably aren't walking there (think San Fran steep roads). We took Uber up just fine. 

Can't beat the view. Quite neighborhood and fun to walk around in morning. We didn't come prepared for mosquitos (went in June)  but the place was stocked with repellent.  

Overall wonderful, wonderful. Would come again. Thanks Michael!

Great spot to stay at. About a 20 minute drive from the airport, with an amazing view of downtown Waikiki & Diamond Head Park. Michael was a phenomenal host, offering us some local spots to grub. He always checked up on us to see if we needed anything & never hesitated to respond. Will definitely come back!

Micheal's place is in a nice, peaceful neighborhood with a magnificent view if Diamondhead from the balcony.  He is a wonderful host and I look forward to staying at his place again..  The accommodations were perfect!

This bungalow was a little haven away from the bustle of the city.  It was so nice being able to fall asleep and wake up to the sounds of the birds and crickets, not to mention the view is fantastic!  Michael is a wonderful host - he was there to welcome us at check in and gave us a couple of phenomenal suggestions for food and things to do. Thanks for making us feel at home in Honolulu!

Michael is incredibly nice and helpful and we loved our stay at his place! The view from the lanai is amazing and it was lovely to wake up every morning to the sounds of birds. There is no AC but the place is up on a hill and is cool and breezy so there was no need for it (there are fans if needed)  Bed is very comfortable and the kitchen is stocked with everything you might need including lots of condiments. Would love to stay here again!
It is the best place for rest and recharge. You can meet the beautiful Diamond Head and the blue sea every morning. If you're lucky, rainbow too.
Michael was very kind and place was as described.  He was quick to get us anything we needed

Michael ist ein sehr lustiger, hilfsbereiter und entspannter Gastgeber! Sehr gute schnelle Kommunikation! Die Lage des Hauses ist perfekt: ruhig, fantastische Aussicht auf den Diamond Head und Waikiki, angenehme Nachbarschaft und als Ausgangspunkt optimal, um den Süden von Oahu zu erkunden! Die Küche ist sehr gut ausgestattet, es gibt jede Menge Basics an Lebensmitteln, schöne Handtücher im Bad, ein sehr bequemes großes Bett. Wir haben es genossen, zu viert auf der schönen Terrasse zu sitzen und zu frühstücken mit Blick auf Waikiki und dem unglaublichen morgendlichen Vogelgezwitscher! Wie im Dschungel! Weiterer Pluspunkt: kostenloser Parkplatz am Haus! Wenn man zu viert reist, sollte man damit klar kommen, dass das Bett auf der Empore ein Futon und die Deckenhöhe sehr niedrig ist. Unsere Teenie Kinder haben dort aber gut geschlafen! Da das Haus inmitten von Bäumen und Pflanzen liegt und immer ein Wind weht, war die Temperatur zum Schlafen angenehm! Die Ventilatoren, die Michael uns auf Wunsch zusätzlich zur Verfügung gestellt hatte, haben wir letztlich nachts nicht gebraucht! Wir waren sehr froh, nicht im rummeligen Honolulu gewohnt zu haben und würden diese Unterkunft sehr empfehlen! Mahalo, Michael!!!

Michael's place lived up to every expectation. It's in a quiet neighborhood, perfect for a remote getaway, but close enough to downtown to be convenient. I cannot get over how adorable the house was and how open, plus the amazing views. I would recommend it to anyone!

Great views, conveniently located near Oahu's main attractions but far enough to be a relaxing retreat.  We were able to see Waikiki, Spitting Caves, Pele's Chair, and the Ala Moana center, which were all within 20 min of the Airbnb. Michael was very welcoming and our stay was great.
Nice, quiet and beautiful retreat with great view!  Michael is a great host to lend us beach towel after check out. Thank you, Michael!!

Das Haus liegt  toll mit einem fantastischen Blick auf den Diamond Head und Honolulu. Michael ist ein sehr sympathischer und lustiger Gastgeber , die Kommunikation war schnell und problemlos, ebenso der check in. Die Ausstattung ist gut, alles vorhanden, was man braucht.
Wir haben zu viert zwei wunderschöne Tage und entspannte Nächte bei Michael verbracht und können es nur weiter empfehlen!

Michael’s place is a little haven on top of the hill. Great views of Diamond Head and the city. It has everything you need to feel at home. Michael is a very hospitable host. He is easy to communicate with. I recommend staying at Michael’s for a quiet close to nature stay in Honolulu. Also recommend having a car while staying in Honolulu. Thank you Michael!

Michael’s apartment was great. He waited to greet us upon arrival and was very welcoming and communicative. He was also very accomodating in a few particular requests we had. The place was clean had a good view and was perfect for our resting needs.
Great host. Great location. Great view.

It was so lovey to be in a neighborhood, listen to the birds, watch the geckos, and be in a quiet homey space between our daily adventures. We absolutely made the right decision to stay here! Thank you Michael!

This place was absolutely amazing!! Tucked just far enough away from the crowds that it felt secluded, but close enough to go downtown for an evening out. Beautiful views from the deck. Everything was just exactly as depicted in the photos. We were even able to do our laundry before we left (because who wants to do that after you get home)! Truly a great stay. We will absolutely stay here in the future if we ever find ourselves in Oahu again. Thank you so much!
Michael is one of the best person I've ever met in my life. Great communication with home and easy to talk to even though you are not good at speaking English:)

Beautiful views!! Great space for couples. Uber drivers will always make a comment about the hill HAHA but do compliment the view! Michael was very sweet and always responded quickly. Only a 15 minute drive from Waikiki. You'll have a great time!!
호스트가 정말 친절합니다. 즐겁게 맞아주시고 응답도 빠르게 줍니다. 주변 경관이 아름답고 다이아몬드 헤드가 보이는 뷰가 정말 멋집니다. 렌트카가 있다면 충분히 접근성이 좋은 곳에 위치하고 있습니다. 예쁜 숙소와 따뜻한 호스트 덕분에 행복한 추억을 많이 만들고 갑니다.

Our stay was an experience we’d never get at a hotel in Waikiki. The view and sounds of wildlife were wonderful. During our stay the weather was hot and humid. No A/C but property cooled down at night.

This was a wonderful and peaceful oasis.  We loved our stay here and would definitely recommend it to friends.  Michael was an incredible host - very welcoming and provided everything we needed.  Thanks!

This is a majestic hideaway above the tree line looking down at diamond head and the ocean. Breathtaking views and serenity. I think the term luxury doesn’t do justice to the experience. Michael couldn’t have been more friendly and accommodating. The spirit of Aloha is alive and well here. I’ll be back and already missing waking up to the chirping of birds and those inspiring views.
Very cozy home, amazing view and friendly owner! Beautiful, quiet location. All you need for perfect spend of time! Thanks, Michael)
I really like the view and the place itself! We had a great time there!!
Great view and nice location. A short ride down to the shops and restaurants

Michael was very accommodating. He kept a package for me and gave us an option to leave our luggage at his place after the check out (we asked). His place is on a very steep hill so offers an amazing view. The pictures were truthful. The stairs to the loft are quite steep but steps are wide enough to make going up and down easier. I gave 4 stars because the extra blanket/duvet required some cleaning and there were some bugs. Given the location maybe the bugs are to be expected.... didn’t get much of the natural light in the room. The mattress upstairs is closer to a futon. We made it work but it might feel small for 4 adults. Amazing water pressure in the shower and easily accessible washing machine and the dryer!!Overall liked the location and the stay. It was quite convenient. The host was very nice.

Michael's place is a peaceful sanctuary away from the city's congestion. During our brief one-night stay, we were content to stay put. There is a fabulous view of the ocean and Diamond Head from the lanai where we enjoyed sipping wine in the evening and drinking coffee in the morning while listening to the birds. In the space itself, the owner's thoughtful touches are evident in the essentials provided, including  food and beverage items, working kitchen, cooling fans, fresh linens and comfortable sleeping spaces.  Moreover, the artful design of the place is both aesthetically pleasing and very welcoming.  As host, Michael himself, is warm and gracious. My spouse and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

Michael is a very responsible, attentive, and welcoming host. We barely got to chat with him because of our hectic schedule, but when we did it was always pleasant. He seems like a genuinely friendly guy and the perfect type to be hosting guests from around the world. The apt is very cute and we really appreciated the oatmeal and tea-stocked kitchen for our late evening arrival!

This place was great! Amazing view of the city and diamond head plus tons of beautiful greenery everywhere. Nice quiet place away from it all. Very close to food and shops down on waialae ave which was convenient. Great host too!

We had a wonderful stay at Michael's place. The place is exactly as described in the listing - its small and cosy. Elderly people might have some trouble climbing the stairs to the loft bed. Michael had provided Oats for breakfast, however, there are restaurants in the area. Communication was excellent and we look forward to staying here in the near future.
Beautiful, secluded spot. What a view!!!
房子在山上很高,对着钻石头山,风景不错｡提供停车位,对于两个人来说空间不错(只对于两个人),天气好的话,可以在阳台舒服的享受午餐｡
Michael showed great hospitality! The neighborhood is nice and quiet. Very peaceful!

This bungaloo is a gem.  Michael is a kind and thoughtful host.  It is located in the hills above diamondhead volacano.  You feel as though you are up in a rainforest canopy.  Ideal ot have your own car, as there are no amenities in walking distance.

The location is away from the tourist places and it is surrounded by greenery and trees. You can see the Diamond head from the unit. The unit is equipped with salt/pepper and other condiments in the kitchen, in the bathroom there is shampoo, soap and other aminities. The host is very nice and communicates with him was fast. Now the negative part, we just didn't think the place was clean enough overall. Also, there were ants in the kitchen which made it difficult for us to cook and eat there.
Michael propose un très chouette petit logement dans les hauteurs d'Honolulu avec une vue génial sur le crater, sur l'océan et sur la ville.

The sunset view over the ocean is a delight in this charming Hawaiian gem. Easy access to Kaimuki area with great restaurants (Town; Mud, Water, Hen; and Kaimuki Superette), and a great wine store (Tamura's). This is a good location if you want to spend time in downtown Honolulu and Chinatown, accessible via a short drive. Michael was very responsive to communicate with and he also gave us an insider's tip for local beach access close to, but away from the congested Waikiki area.

This bungalow has a very private, woodsy feel to it. Of the five spots we stayed at this extended trip, this was the only one that has cable tv - my husband was able to view his sports programs finally! Be aware that you'll need a car to drive up the very steep road to this spot. Also, this area is much cooler than down below.
Beautiful view, even in the crazy storm. Dry porch to drink hot tea on. Super clean and incredibly charming!

We loved our stay at Michael’s appartement. The view out the balcony is stunning, we never got tired of looking out and admiring the city, the water, and Diamond Head. Originally we were supposed to be 4 adult travellers, and I suspect the apartment would’ve been a little too tight for us all, but we absolutely recommend this place if you’re a couple, our have young kids with you. The apartment was super clean, well-equipped, and functional.
Great space with lots of room , full kitchen and spectacular view!  We would definitely stay here again.
位置居高,可以观见钻石山和威基基海滩景观｡住的很舒服｡

Michael's place is perfect get-away retreat from the business of Waikiki. He had coffee, tea and instant oatmeal for breakfast. My favorite part of the property is the deck and the gorgeous view. Every morning I would wake up and listen to the birds and look at the view, while enjoying my coffee. Definitely recommend to stay!

Michael is a great host- accomodating - and he or representative is always available but don’t hover. Private lodging separate from main house with every amenity provided and fantastic view. Cool nights after hot days in city is luxurious and also feels very safe in hilltop neighborhood off the beaten path. Worth it. Thanks guys.

name: Sunny & Budget Friendly
summary: ...SEE MORE OF NY, PAY LESS, & STAY IN COMFORT -Sunny room, accommodates 2. -Wi-Fi -Our subway is the "L" train - EAST 105 STREET station. (Feel free to check the travel time to all the places you would like to visit). -Short walk to L train.
space: The room:  Sunny and Budget Friendly room located on the top floor of our 3 floor townhouse.  It has a full size 10" memory foam mattress that comfortably accommodates 2 people.  The room is a nice size with closet space, wood floors and large window.   Our home:  Is a 3 floor townhouse with a total of 6 guest bedrooms, 2 kitchens,  3 bathrooms, front porch and backyard. We adore the people that we host and work hard to keep a clean and harmonious space for our guests.
description: ...SEE MORE OF NY, PAY LESS, & STAY IN COMFORT -Sunny room, accommodates 2. -Wi-Fi -Our subway is the "L" train - EAST 105 STREET station. (Feel free to check the travel time to all the places you would like to visit). -Short walk to L train. The room:  Sunny and Budget Friendly room located on the top floor of our 3 floor townhouse.  It has a full size 10" memory foam mattress that comfortably accommodates 2 people.  The room is a nice size with closet space, wood floors and large window.   Our home:  Is a 3 floor townhouse with a total of 6 guest bedrooms, 2 kitchens,  3 bathrooms, front porch and backyard. We adore the people that we host and work hard to keep a clean and harmonious space for our guests. Guest will have access to all the common areas. The neighborhood is great for people who love nature and outdoor activities.  We are near the Jamaica Bay Riding Academy, Gateway National Park and Canarsie Pier.  If you like bike riding you could take the Gateway National Park bike p
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is great for people who love nature and outdoor activities.  We are near the Jamaica Bay Riding Academy, Gateway National Park and Canarsie Pier.  If you like bike riding you could take the Gateway National Park bike path to Brighton Beach--the ride along the water is beautiful and peaceful. As far as cafes-- there are a few spots in Canarsie but I prefer to take the L train to Williamsburg or Downtown Brooklyn to go to some of Brooklyn's most revere hip spots.  The total ride to the hippest areas in Brooklyn is about 15 to 30 min depending on the area and on the (Website hidden by Airbnb) Manhattan the first stop is 40 min).  By-the-way, I've seen other posting with spaces  in Canarsie that are located further away from our block, and they are claiming 20 to 30 min to Manhattan--- this is a lie.   Our space is 3 blocks away from the L train and door to door  to 1st Avenue/14 Street (first stop in Manhattan on the L train) it is 40 min.  This is the minimum time you co
notes: We are not 20 min away from Manhattan but we are budget friendly and in a nice safe location.  Our neighbors are great, they appreciate diversity and would be friendly towards you.  As for us we love meeting new people, we are welcoming and will make your comfort our priority. We want to offer you a home away from home and a fabulous stay in NY for a fraction of the cost.
transit: Subway: The L train is 3 blocks away from our home. The total travel time to the first stop in Manhattan (1st Avenue/East Village) is aprx 40 min. Bus service: B (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , and BM2. The BM2 runs from Canarsie to Midtown Manhattan. The total travel time is 1 hour.  The principal commercial streets are Rockaway Parkway and Flatlands Avenue. Near Airport: We are 15 to 20 min away from JFK and the total fare from JFK to our home is $28.
access: Guest will have access to all the common areas.
house_rules: Keep house clean and be mindful of others. No street shoes in the house,bring sleepers. No loud music after 8 pm. To live well with others it is important to practice proper hygiene. Kindly wear deodorant and clean yourself daily. Help us maintain a nice smelling house :-).

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I am a musician from Quebec living with my beautiful wife in Brooklyn, New York. My wife is from Panama and works in fashion.
We are a peaceful harmonious couple with a lot of space and no children.
We enjoy going out to shows, visiting friends and relaxing with a nice cocktail.
Our friends are colorful, international and hilarious.  
If you decide to stay with us you will find that we are generous people, helpful and accommodating. My wife loves to cook and make cocktails so she would probably invite you to dinner or offer you a drink. 
As we are honest and considerate people we expect the same from others.  Therefore, we hope that if you decide to stay with us you will respect the space, maintain it clean and be considerate.

Thank you for showing an interest in our posting and we hope to hear from you soon

reviews.comments: They were really accommodating and left us alone. The experience and the place is recommended. As a plus, there is an IHOP extremely close by.
This was the relaxing Brooklyn home to stay for my week long New York City trip! The location was good within three blocks of multiple subway lines. Patrick and his wife were super accommodating.

Patrick and Nancy were both more than accommodating during my stay in NYC. I was relocating to Brooklyn for a job from Columbus OH, and what a change it was! They helped ease me into the city while I gathered a sense of direction and searched for apartments. I definitely could not have settled into the belly of New York without a comfortable, clean, and affordable place to stay while I was getting myself established. They have more than one location in Brooklyn, and both excellent. Good job guys!

Patrick and Nancy are such great hosts. My room and the entire place was clean and my bed was super comfortable. I would most definitely stay there again and would recommend anyone on a budget to book with them.

Patrick and Nancy are kind and generous people who took the time to make me feel welcomed. The room is basic but clean, and the bed is comfortable. If you need anything  at all you can ask them and they will do their best for you. Nancy has an eye for detail and clearly cares that her house is tidy and has a personal, aesthetic touch. She provided coffee, tea, cream and other kitchen items.
Nancy et Patrick sont des personnes très sympathiques et très accueillantes. La Chambre est cosy et le logement très propre et fonctionnel. Endroit idéal pour passer quelques jours a NY

Staying with Patrick and Nancy was my first Airbnb experience during my first trip to NYC. It was amazing. The room and bathroom was spotless and even better than depicted in the photos. Nancy was very helpful with directions. I walked home from the subway  very late at night or early morning hours and did not feel unsafe at all. 
I had a problem with a key that did not work properly but both Patrick and Nancy was home during these occurances and opened the door for me once I returned. 
The house is big and it felt like I had the floor to myself mostly. Being a solo traveller who wanted to get the most out of my NYC experience in 4 days, it was definitely a great choice. 
Upon leaving Nancy called a car service that was efficient and not expensive at all. 
I would definitely stay with Partrick and Nancy again.

Nancy was lovely and welcoming.  She really worked with me to fit my family in because it was a special family reunion and my father live just a few doors away.  But I think this was the first time she hosted a family with teenagers, so she went through the rules with us very thoroughly, especially the sheets, the bathroom and the air-conditioning.  
The rooms were as I expected and very much like the photos, all simple and tasteful. There was another lady sharing the flat with us but generally we felt secure and comfortable to use the kitchen as we needed it.  We just use the common sense and mutual courtesy rule and tidied up after ourselves after we used something. 
We had a problem with the toilet once but Patrick came and dealt with it immediately.

The downside is that there was no lounge space and the kitchen bench sat only two people at most (there was a chair with no seat, hopefully it is now restored!). We spent our days out so after our return, we missed a communal space. But for a couple or a single this may not matter much.
 Overall, we enjoyed our stay at Nancy's and would recommend this place to others.

My mum and me had the loveliest time with these to.
From the beginning we felt really welcome and totally at home.
When we met we always had the nicest talk and we already miss you guys!
Already thinking about our next trip to the lovely house :) 
Thanks for everything !

Nancy und Patrick haben uns herzlich empfangen und sogar gleich mit leckeren Pizza-Schnecken versorgt. Das Zimmer war klein, aber fein und absolut sauber. Die Küche und das Bad hatten alles was man braucht, diverse Geschäfte in der Nähe sorgten für schnelle Einkäufe. Nancy hat täglich geschaut, ob genügend  Kaffee und Milch da waren,  Müll entsorgt etc.. Dabei immer zu einem netten Smalltalk bereit. Wir haben uns in der einen Woche sehr wohl gefühlt und würden sicher ein zweites Mal dort wohnen!!

J'ai séjourné 10 (Website hidden by Airbnb) chambre est beaucoup plus grande que ce qu'elle parait sur la photo , au calme avec un bureau,un grand placard intégré et un lit des plus confortables ..coussins multiples,fleurs ds la chambre,lampe de chevet , wifi,tout est confort et douillet .vous avez accès à la cuisine , moderne et très bien équipée. Des restos avec plats à emporter,superette sont à votre porte,ainsi que le train L .le plus appreciable c la gentillesse et la disponibilité de Nancy et Patrick .une belle ambiance règne ds la maison et je m'y suis sentie (Website hidden by Airbnb) vous recommande cette adresse qui cloture en beauté mon tour du monde!

Feels like home

Nancy was an amazing host, being kindly caring about me and my friend Alice. We stayed for almost a week and were blown away by the lovely atmosphere that Nancy created with her spirit. Creatively arranged room and kitchen, which a lot of light and cosyness :)
I would absolutely recommend it for someone in need of a bit of a home in a busy crowded city like New York.
Patrick is very easy going and a joy to talk to- I think it's hard to not like these guys.
So one final THANK YOU!

Nancy and Patrick were both very nice, and Nancy took good care of us. The kitchen on our floor was well equipped and I cooked dinner a few times. I really enjoyed staying there, even though the wall to the adjacent room is very thin and you could hear your neighbors very clearly.
Very lovely people that help you with everything you need. I had a great stay

Nancy and Patrick were perfect hosts.  Patrick was very good at communicating directions to the house from the airport when I arrived.  Nancy was warm and welcoming.  I was a lone traveller and sharing my day's experiences with Nancy and the other guests on my floor when I got home was a good way of winding down.  

The shared kitchen and bathroom were clean and luckily I shared with 3 other considerate girls.

It is a predominantly residential area.  There is a small shopping block about 5 mins away with a Foodmart, pharmacy, bakery, laundromat, salon etc..  Just a block further down there's a collection of eating places including KFC, Taco Bell, Pizza Hut, IHOP, Baskin Robbins and a Japanese chain called Sarku. along with other shops.  In his descriotion of the area Patrick mentions a shopping centre called Gateway Shopping Centre, this is a short bus ride away and has bigger shops such as Gap and Bath, Bed and Beyond. 

The subway L train is 10 minds away walking at an average pace.  I walk fast (7 mins to the subway) and from the house to Union Square on Manhattan took me 30 mins.  I was lucky enough not to have to wait for trains.

Nous avons passé quelques jours chez Patrick et nous avons apprécié sa maison. C'est très propre et calme, il fait bien chaud, ce qui est agréable quand nous rentrons d'une journée dehors à parcourir New York. Le logement est proche d'une station de métro. Très bon rapport qualité prix.

Nancy and Patrick have an adorable, nice and cozy house! Although we didn't meet Patrick, Nancy was a super host and she made us feel really comfortable! She is really sweet and she couldn't treat her guests any better. She was always making sure we were comfortable and didn't have any problem to answer any questions. We really enjoyed our stay in their house, which is really clean, amazingly decorated and comfortable. Totally recommended, its really close to the subway station so you can easily get anywhere you like! With any doubt we would happily stay with them in our next visit to NY! Thank you so much, we really felt at home!

Adorei a minha estada no Sunny & Budget Friendly!!! O casal Nancy e Patrick são super afetivos e interessados nos seus hospedes, sempre atentos e preocupados em oferecer o melhor para todos. O fato deles morarem na casa também torna o lugar super seguro. O  meu quarto era confortável e quente; o banheiro com um água e chuveiro delicia; e a cozinha super equipada e pronta para que todos usassem os seus pratos e comidas prediletas. 
O bairro  em Canarsie é super seguro, a casa fica há 10 minutos ou menos da estação de trem/metro, e nunca fiquei por mais de 3 minutos esperando para ir para Manhattan. Mesmo a noite, o bairro impressiona pela sensação de segurança.
Nancy and Patrick are great hosts. The are very committed to their work and the well-being of their guests.

Patrick nous a mis de suite à l'aise lorsque l'on est rentré dans le logement. Ils parlait français ce qui nous a été très agréable vu notre niveau d'anglais. Nancy, sa femme, était très disponible pour nous expliquer le fonctionnement des métros et des bus. Elle est doté d'une grande hospitalité. C'était très convivial. Le quartier était sympa. La maison était à 5min à pied d'une bouche de métro et à proximité de plusieurs arrêts de bus. Le trajet vers Manhattan était de 40min à peu près. La chambre était correcte, dans un style brooklyn année 70 (parquet vieilli, déco kitche). Pas d'équipement dans la chambre hormis le Wi-Fi mais mise à disposition de la cuisine et de son équipement.

Patrick & Nancys place is the best place to stay in NY!  We spend here a week and from the first moment we feeld very welcomed! Apartment is super clean and cozy, feels really like home away home ;). 
Nancys smile and big heart was making our days!! 
Big thanks for everything!!!

なんども滞在してます｡NYに来たら滞在してしまいます｡居心地がいいんです｡それにその人のﾆｰｽﾞに合ったｻｰﾋﾞｽを提供してくださいます｡
自然に行っているように見えて実はすごい優しさがいつ行ってもあります｡またすぐに戻ります!

Very tidy and clean place. The owners' rules  helps to keep a place clean and nice, since there are multiple rooms for rent. The location is not so close from Manhattan, about 40 minutes with subway. Neighborhood  was okay, but nothing special around, just simple residential area including public housings.

Great hosts. Nancy is lovely. If you needed to know anything Nancy was very helpful. The room was very clean and spacious. The amenities were good. The area is very safe and the access to public transport meant you were never far away from the Big Apple. Would definitely stay there again if I was on my own.
Spacious room with ac and good parking. Nearby stores. Good stay

Our stay at Nancy's and Patrick's house was super great! It was close to the subway and the house / kitchen and our room was very clean. Nancy and Partick also gave us a ride to the airport again to pick up our suitcases a day after we had arrived. Next time in New York I would stay with them again!!

Nancy et Patrick sont un couple très gentil et vous aideront si vous avez des questions.
La chambre et la maison sont propres
La maison se trouve à 5 min de la bouche de métro pour prendre le L train qui vous mène en 40 min à manhattan.
Quartier populaire mais assez "safe".

Un lugar acogedor para visitar NY y accesible por su precio. Llegas fácilmente en metro a una estación cerca de la casa y resuelves el tema de movilizarte en la ciudad. Eso sí, debes tomarte el tiempo para movilizarte ya que las distancias son grandes. 
Te sientes como en casa, si estás acostumbrado a tener una buena limpieza en tu casa, es un lugar muy limpio y tranquilo para pasar los días de viaje. Puedes prepararte tu comida en una buena cocina, hacer un asado en un balcón de la casa, tienes tienda que abre hasta tarde y lavadora de ropa cerca de casa las 24 horas. 
Puedes conocer a otros viajeros que se encuentran en la casa, hay algunos cuartos más donde llega más gente. 
Y los anfitriones, Nancy y Patrick, te ayudan en lo que necesites, tendrás unos buenos anfitriones. 
Hemos pasada 10 días en NY en un buen lugar.

Great place to stay in Brooklyn! The house is beautiful and had all that we needed. But most importantly, his owners welcomed us with a big smile and they were always open to help us with directions or just to chat. It's located in a safe neighborhood (we returned from Manhattan very late at night and didn't have any problem) and a short distance from the L train. We had approx 25 or 30 minutes to Manhattan by this train. But the rides is quick and you can see Brooklyn from above in the first couple of stops, pretty cool! Also in the neighborhood are various stores that have all that we travelers may need.
Thank you Nancy and Patrick for your hospitality! We will recommend your place to everybody!
It was a very nice room and the host was nice!

Super séjour passé chez Nancy et Patrick. Nancy s'est montrée très disponible dès notre arrivée, en nous expliquant directement comment se rendre à Manathan. Petite cuisine sympa pour ceux qui souhaitent se faire à manger, sanitaires nickels, le tout dans un quartier très calme et très typique de Brooklyn. Nous avons pris un Uber pour nous rendre depuis l'aéroport. Le prix est correct (compter entre 23 et 31$). Le métro est à 900 mètres, tout droit en sortant de la maison. Métro à prendre à n'importe quelle heure du jour et de la nuit, il roule en continu et se prend sans crainte. En résumé, nous retournons avec plaisir chez Patrick et Nancy si l'occasion se représente.
Nancy and Patrick

Nancy and Patrick made us feel very welcome. The house is old and at first apprence seems to be in a rough neighbourhood however we walked through it all hours of the night and on one occasion very drunk and had no trouble. 

Nancy has a very high standard of cleanliness which was very noticeable the bathroom was very clean and so was the rest of the house and bedroom. Just one thing remember to walk like a ninja when in the house.

Patrick et Nancy sont accueillants. Ils nous ont permis de laisser les bagages après l'heure de départ prévue afin de profiter de la dernière journée sans êtres chargés et Patrick nous a appeler un taxi pour le départ. Nancy nous a laisser un pochon cadeau de départ avec des petites choses dedans (chocolat...) ce qui est très gentil ! La chambre était spacieuse et fidèle à la photo. La station de métro est à 10min à pied et on met environ 1h pour à peu près partout où l'on veut aller autour de ny, c'est peut-être le seul point négatif si l'on bouge beaucoup. Nous avons passer un agréable séjour. Merci à vous !

Très bon séjour chez Patrick et Nancy, des personnes vraiment adorables, accueillants et attentifs. Le logement est parfait et propre . Il est situé à Brooklyn à 35 min en Metro de Manhattan, mais il y a beaucoup de Metro à chaque heures de la journée. Le quartier est plus ou moins sûr . Nous avons passé le séjour de nos rêve et notre logement y a bien contribué. Nous le recommandons à toute les personnes désirant se rendre à NY

Realmente mi estancia en la casa de Nancy fue grata, personalmente Nancy fue muy amable ,atenta conmigo , me ayudó mucho y me hizo sentir como en casa, Nancy gracias por ser tan hospitalaria y haberme prestado la computadora dado a la pérdida de mi celular  , era mi primera vez en Estados Unidos y realmente Nancy nos hizo sentir muy bien en su (Website hidden by Airbnb) un poco lejos pero vale la pena hospedarse alla
I had a really great time at Nancy and Patricks house. It was very comfortable und very clean! Nancy and Patrick were awesome awsome hosts. Thank you for all!
Nancy and Patrick did a great job at welcoming myself and other guests that stay in their home. It really felt like home!
Nancy y Patrick son muy buenos anfitriones, siempre dispuestos a colaborar para que nuestra estancia fuera placentera.
Tudo estava como o esperado. Quarto limpo, banheiro limpo, bairro tranquilo. Ótimo custo/beneficio.

La estancia en el alojamiento de Nancy & Patrick ha sido genial. Está ubicado en un barrio tranquilo, cerca del metro para acceder a cualquier parte de NY y la casa llena de detalles que han hecho una estancia acogedora y magnífica. La atención de Nancy las 24h es de agradecer.
We really enjoyed our stay. It takes only 30 minutes to the city by the train. Nancy was kind and helpful.

Thanks Nancy and Patrick! Kirstie and I had an amazing stay. Everything was an exactly described and pictured. We couldn't have asked for better host. Thanks for making our stay pleasurable. Will definitely stay with you guys again when we come to New York :)

Our stay with Nancy and Patrick was entirely positive. They are both very friendly hosts and they made us feel relaxed and welcome in their home. Nancy has some basic house rules which ensure everybody staying at the house lives harmoniously in a clean and peaceful environment. We were very grateful for that because our room and the shared facilities were clean at all times. The house is warm, the room is cosy and the bed was comfortable. The location is great. It doesn't take long on the L line subway to get to Manhattan and there are lots of nice places to eat along the L line in Brooklyn itself. The neighbourhood is quiet and the subway station is a short walk in a straight line from the house. You won't get lost! The neighbourhood is like any other suburban area just outside of a city centre so just adopt the usual street-smart attitude you would anywhere else. We had no problems and felt safe. Considering how comfortable the accommodation is and the house's close proximity to the subway station, the price is really excellent. If you're on a budget you can even save money by cooking at the house. We wholeheartedly recommend staying with Nancy and Patrick and we'd love to return some day!
房東人都很好,衛生要求很高,地區蠻安全的,就是離市區遠了點
If you decide to look for a bed in Brooklyn. This is among the best. Clean and Convenient. The host is very friendly and helpful.

I would definitely back Nancy home when I go to N.Y. in June.  
I would go to the beach with Nancy!

Nancy and Patrick are truly awesome people! I had to stay here for 4 weeks and this whole time I super enjoyed my stay. Nancy is very sweet, cheerful and happy person. She will always help you if you need anything and is a great person to have a conversation with. Patrick is often out playing music, but if you get to see him, he is super cool guy. This place is clean, quiet and beds are soft. Everything you need for comfortable and peaceful stay you will find here. Train station is about 5-8 minutes walk. Withing 40 minutes you will be in Manhattan or downtown Brooklyn. Five stars, hands down. I would recommend this place to anyone - you will not regret.

Nancy & Patrick are the best hosts in Brooklyn you can imagine.
They have received me warmly although I was too late, because my flight was delayed.
If you want to visit New York and you won't pay the hotels directly in Manhattan, this is the first option. 
With the "L"-Train it's just a short ride to Manhattan.
The house is very comfortable and clean, also the neigborhood is very safe.
There are very good rules that Nancy has in her house, but that makes it so special in a positive way. If you follow the rules it is like your own home far away from your home.

Very much recommended.
They are kind. This house is so clean and nice!
Amazing stay! Extremely friendly hosts, clean environment, close public transportation, cost effective! This was my first Airbnb experience and it was great!

I can only repeat what other reviewers have said - a great host, Nancy went out of her way to be friendly and helpful. Very convenient for JFK airport and easy transport to Manhattan albeit approx 1 hour subway each way.  Recommended

Great and clean place to stay in a quiet neighborhood. Few minutes from metro station, 45 minutes by metro to the Time Square. Nancy is very nice, funny and talkative :)
Thank you!

Lo que más me ha gustado han sido los anfitriones, personas cercanas, amables y dispuestas a ayudarte en todo, he tenido más contacto con Nancy en mis días aquí y es una mujer encantadora, cuidadosa de que todo esté en orden y limpio. La casa es bonita y confortable, mi habitación era amplia, luminosa y muy cómoda, sin duda repetiré. La única pega que podría poner, es que El Barrio está un poco apartado, por lo demás todo correcto, una experiencia única vivir en una zona tan auténtica.

Nancy is such a nice and hospitable person and made our stay more than comfy. She was always able to helpful with everything and gave us some advices. I couldn't had the chance to meet Patrick but thank you both for your hospitality, your house is so cozy and clean! Next time we'll come to Brooklyn, we'll come back here for sure :)

Nancy and Patrick were amazing hosts. Very communicative and you felt right at home! Neighbourhood isn't difficult to get around and you have everything you need locally. I couldn't ask for better accommodation.
Nancy is attentive, always makes sure you have what you need and is on top of things.

Cute little space with awesome amenities. Full kitchen use and the water pressure in the bathroom is great. Location isn't the best, it takes 40 min-1 hour to get to the city and you'll need to uber or take the train to go anywhere worth going within Brooklyn but for the price it was great, especially if you plan to be out all day anyway like we did. Nancy was very sweet and made us feel right at home.

The stay was good, but people should beware that is far from Manhattan, so be careful when you take late night trains. Also, expect some noise during the night, which seems to be typical in all NYC. We heard so many police cars driving around at night but we don’t know if that was unusual. 

You have to be careful with the rules of the house, so try to understand everything before you get there. Nancy was available 100% of the time, so you will be heard if you need assistance.
The apartment is very stylist and clean. Nancy and Patrick are very friendly and welcoming. This place was an amazing deal, if you want an authentic Brooklyn stay.
Nancy and Patrick are very nice people. They gave us a lot of help. And the room is the best one I've ever seen.
Nancy was really lovely
El alojamiento es como sale en las fotos, Nancy y Patrick son encantadores, la casa esta cerca del metro, 10 minutos andando.

Very lovely place. Nice and spacious room with a very good bed. Peaceful apartment. Good kitchen and toilet. Hosts are willing to help straight away if there is any problem.  Trip to Manhattan was quicker than I expected. L-train. I walked two times during the night back home from the train and I didn't have any problems.

あまりﾎｽﾄの方と会いませんでしたが
お会いした際にはこちらのことを､すごく気遣ってくれました｡
ﾍﾞｯﾄﾞが大きくて快適に寝ることができました｡
ﾏﾝﾊｯﾀﾝへは少し遠いことくらいであとは言うことなしです｡

Thank you Nancy for great hospitality. The house was pleasant to stay. I enjoyed my two weeks in NY. 
Strongly recommended to other visitors
Their place was extremely clean and I felt very comfortable in their home!

Patrick and Nancy's place was amazing!!
It was exactly what we needed for our trip to New York.

The place was clean and the hosts were super friendly.

We also liked that we had a quiet place to sleep.

the L train was few minutes away and it took us directly to Manhattan. 

Super conveniant and amazing value!

Thank you Nancy&Patrick for staying at your home! Nancy is a great, nice and helpful person!  The house is very nice and clean, with air condition in the room. The subway (L train) is very close, about 7 min. walk and it's about 1h to Manhattan, for us it was ok becouse we had a long stay and a lot of time. The neighbourhood it's ok, we did't have any issue. There is a very nice, long beach - Jacob Riis Park, about 15 min. by Uber - Nancy thank you for arrange it for us :)

Nancy's place is cute, comfortable and quite. Nice easy access to the L train. 2 minute walk to one of the best and friendliest laundromats. Grocery store, hairdressers etc all very close. Had a great stay.
Great place! Great value! Super clean and exactly as advertised. I would recommend this place to anyone.

If you’re looking for a place to stay with a reasonable fee in New York, this is the place. The commute from 105th Street  to Manhattan takes around 45 minutes - 1 hour. Hence, plan your commutes. Other than that, everything was great. I may consider to stay at this place if I come to New York in the future.

Patrick and Nancy are very nice and friendly, and I felt very happy to meet them and stay in their lovely and  tidy place for my short trip in New York. The transportation is also quite convenient for me to visit downtown and anywhere in New York. Anyone who wants to enjoy a quiet and comfortable place for stay, I strongly recommend this cozy and wonderful place.

We had a lovely stay at Nancy’s home. Unfortunately we didn’t get to spend much time with Nancy as we were often out early and back late from exploring the city, but she was always very friendly when we did see her. There are some house rules to help keep the space clean which we were thankful for as it meant everyone was on the same page and the house was clean for our stay. The subway is a 10 minute walk away and the L train will take you to 14th St in Midtown in about 40 minutes.
Nice Air b&b. Recommend anybody thinking going to New york area a bit different but cheap price.

Nancy est très accueillante et à l'écoute. L'appartement est incroyablement propre et est vraiment sécurisé et bien organisé. 
Incroyablement silencieux !
La wifi y est très rapide. 
Le métro est à 10min a pied. 
Joli quartier ! 
J'y retournerai assurément ! 
A home away from home !

This place is exceptionally clean and quiet, and the bedroom is quite big. Nancy was very accommodating and welcoming. The commute to Manhattan was a bit far, but it's no problem if you just plan for it. I was very happy with this place.
All excellent! The place is cozy and clean. Nancy is very kind. It has a deli right on the corner and a supermarket 2 blocks away, the metro only 3 blocks away. Thanks for everything!

name: 近大学24小时安保豪华公寓长短租
summary: 安全,舒适,体面!!!举步可到康大,麦大 豪华智能24/7保安studio公寓出租 ｡中央冷暖空调,带家具,电器(炉子,烤箱,冰箱,洗衣机,烘干机,电冰箱,微波炉,洗碗机),楼内 有游泳池,桑拿房,SPA,健身房,网球场,免费活动室有电视,WIFI｡即刻提包入住¥1350/月包热水｡
