name: Room in a historical apartment in Beyoglu.
summary: Room of a historical flat at the 3rd floor of a 110 years old Greek building in the center of Beyoglu, with high ceilings & wood flooring. Audio system with a record player & piano.
description: Room of a historical flat at the 3rd floor of a 110 years old Greek building in the center of Beyoglu, with high ceilings & wood flooring. Audio system with a record player & piano. Livingroom, home office, laundry room, kitchen, bathroom. The apartment is in the center of Beyoglu where all the art galleries, wine&dine places, restaurants, bars, concert halls, foreign embassies, shopping centers and much more are located around. 5 minutes walk to the central subway station Taksim and public buses. 15 minutes walk to the public boat. The neighbourhood can be a little noisy since the location is very central.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in the center of Beyoglu where all the art galleries, wine&dine places, restaurants, bars, concert halls, foreign embassies, shopping centers and much more are located around.
notes: The neighbourhood can be a little noisy since the location is very central.
transit: 5 minutes walk to the central subway station Taksim and public buses. 15 minutes walk to the public boat.
access: Livingroom, home office, laundry room, kitchen, bathroom.

host.host_about:
Artist – Photographer
Born in Istanbul.
Interested in cinematography & writing scripts.
Specialized in the city life & history of Istanbul.

reviews.comments: Ahmet is a really nice guy; helpful, considerate and interesting.  The flat's beautiful (in a lightly ramshackle way) and the room itself is fine; a double bed and a few other bits of furniture.  Despite being in the centre of town there was no problem with the noise (except, perhaps, a neighbour's alarm clock at 8 in the morning...).  All in all, I would full recommend.

It's amazing apartment and amazing Ahmet!))
For people who loves creative stuff - old building and such unusual layout - so many rooms are in such a big apartment. Location is great - right in the center of Istanbul life!
The best place to stay in!

name: Private room between Bondi Beach and Junction
summary: Public transportation, 10 mins walk to the beach and Bondi Iceberg, shopping street
description: Public transportation, 10 mins walk to the beach and Bondi Iceberg, shopping street
house_rules: - No shoes in the house

reviews.comments: Nice place, very neat in a great location, Eric is respectful, great company and makes you feel at home. It was a pleasure to stay here.

Eric was a lovely guy he really was BUT house was filthy, room advertised was the wrong room, got there and he hadn't cleaned the room. Had old bedsheets that someone had just slept in. Dust everywhere, toilet was filthy and when I asked where the towels where he said didn't I bring my own. Said I was fussy because I liked things a certain way. My last night bought me a towel but I had already gone and bought one because first night I had to use a hand towel to shower with. It was freezing with no heating. Really disappointed as I needed a place to chill as I had a few busy days of work in sydney but this made me feel really unsettled and yuck. I told him how air bnb works and he didn't see interested and just kept saying I was fussy. I had someone's cup on the bedside table and yeh it just wasn't great at all. But again nice bloke bad host.

name: Renovated 20min train to enter city 5min to subway
summary: In the safe neighborhood of Kensington. One private room in a newly remodeled whole apartment. New kitchen and bathroom, solid wood floors,  marble table. Nearby there are two 24hr supermarkets and many restaurants.  5 min to subway  F and G trains. 20 min train ride to the first stop of city. F train also directly goes to 34st Empire State Building, 42st Times Square, 50st Rockefeller Center, 57st Museums, Central Park, so you can go to all NYC attractions easily. 15 min walk to Prospect Park.
description: In the safe neighborhood of Kensington. One private room in a newly remodeled whole apartment. New kitchen and bathroom, solid wood floors,  marble table. Nearby there are two 24hr supermarkets and many restaurants.  5 min to subway  F and G trains. 20 min train ride to the first stop of city. F train also directly goes to 34st Empire State Building, 42st Times Square, 50st Rockefeller Center, 57st Museums, Central Park, so you can go to all NYC attractions easily. 15 min walk to Prospect Park. We will be available at anytime a phone call away. The neighborhood is composed of Russian, Italian, Polish, Bangladesh, and Jewish families. Take the F train into the city. We have high speed internet. We Have Netflix. Call Helen at (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) if you cannot reach me.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is composed of Russian, Italian, Polish, Bangladesh, and Jewish families.
notes: We have high speed internet. We Have Netflix. Call Helen at (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) if you cannot reach me.
transit: Take the F train into the city.
interaction: We will be available at anytime a phone call away.
house_rules: - Quiet hours 11pm-7am, No New York Residents or those bouncing around from NYC Airbnb to Airbnb consecutively as a solution to long term housing - Guests must send a copy of Passport or State ID before arrival - No unauthorized guests allowed inside the residence -Guests are not allowed to send mail to this address -All guests must book through Airbnb including those who wish to extend their stay ABSOLUTELY NO CASH PAYMENT ACCEPTED -Guest must book their own reservations guests may not have others book for them unless they are the same group. - Guests must tell check in time ahead of time -If you wish to leave your luggage for a while after checkout it will be a $10 fee paid thru airbnb -No unauthorized persons allowed on the property

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Hi my name is Jason. Me and my mom are renting out the spare bedrooms for Airbnb to make a little extra money. We hope you enjoy your stay in our newly remodeled room, living room, kitchen and bathroom.

reviews.comments: Jason's place was exactly what I needed for my trip to NYC. Jason is very communicative and I felt everything was direct. I felt super comfortable in the room too. I will always remember how hospitable and at home I felt at this booking. Thanks again!

I needed a place to stay for two nights and Jason's apartment was perfect for my needs. Communication was impeccable and he and his mom were very present and went out of their way to welcome me and make my stay truly special. They really spoiled me! Made me dinner the first night when I arrived very late and drove me to a class I had to take! Very kind. :)

Such a wonderful place to stay. Made me feel right and home and went all out making me feel welcome, including letting me drop off my stuff early and even offering me food and a ride. The very best of Airbnb experiences.
Cozy, friendly, convenient

Jason and his mother were very kind hosts. However, it was very unclear to me when my check-out time was and I was rushed to leave. Also the listing is not as close to the rest of the city that it says it is. I would not stay here again.

Nice and clean room in a very walkable and safe neighborhood. It is close to subway and bus stations. Jason made sure checking in was smooth and easy. Jason's mom was very nice. She made us dinner on the day I checked in. I really appreciated the hospitality I am even staying for one more week :)
I enjoyed staying at Jason's place. It's clean and close to the bus and subway station. And it's priced right.

Jason's place was wonderful! Both him and his mother went above and beyond my expectations and I felt very welcome! The room itself was simple and clean with a comfortable bed and a powerful air conditioner! Jason gave me lots of recommendations for activities, and his mother cooked me breakfast and even sang a song for me. The house has a great vibe. The neighbourhood is pretty nice, not fancy but plenty of takeaway food options. You'll have to travel a couple of stops on the subway for the nicer bars and restaurants. Getting into Manhattan is super easy, just hop on the F! Takes only around 35 minutes to get to Times Square. Overall a really nice stay!
Great place. Very clean. Easy access to subway. Communication was excellent!

Jason and Helen are great hosts. The communication was excellent from the beginning. The place is very clean, tidy and cozy. They always helped me with anything I needed. Helen made me very good breakfasts whenever she could and Jason gave me really good recommendations about different places to go in NYC and nice restaurants. I really felt very comfortable with them from day one. If I’d come back to NY I would go with them for sure.
The neighborhood is quiet and safe (even in the late night, I always went back between 11pm and 2am and I never had a problem or felt unsafe). The locations is relatively near to Prospect Park and Greenwood Cemetery, F and G trains (Church Avenue), which is very convenient as you can get to Manhattan in approx. 20 or 30min. depending on where you go.
If you’re looking for a good place and reliable people to stay with in Brooklyn, don’t waste more time, go with them.
Located pretty close to subway as described. Hosts were friendly and super accommodating; they gave suggestions on places to check out and even prepared food occasionally. Great people, great stay.
They were so accommodating and helpful. I was very happy with everything. I'll definitely consider staying there again on my next trip to Brooklyn.

I had a great stay at Jason's place. Everything went smoothly. The place is conveniently located and very clean, especially the renovated bathroom. Jason was very quick  and to respond to messages and communicated clearly. His mum was super sweet!
Great stay! They made me breakfast everything morning, super attentive.

This space is as described, and very quiet. I did not interact with Jason much but his mother was absolutely wonderful. She made sure I had all I needed during check-in and provided breakfast. Jason was very communicative. Prior to check-in, the continued requests for updates were a bit overwhelming for me, as I was travelling, but he was very helpful during my stay and provided me with suggestions for activities and even gave me a portable charger to borrow! Would recommend if you plan to be on the go and need a comfortable, clean place to stay, as this room is an excellent value. Also, the Wi-Fi is great.

I had a great stay at Jason's and his mom home. The place is clean, cozy, and conveniently located close to subway station as listed.
Mom made me welcome breakfast on the first day and great pork with noodles before my leave.
Jason also provided me the best routes to commute within the city.
I was feeling calm and relaxed.

Thank you Jason and mom :)

My stay in Brooklyn with Jason and his Mom was very pleasant. Check in, communication and everything was very easy. The apartment is very clean and he and his mother were great hosts. It took about five minutes to the subway and in the neighborhood were all kinds of stores for daily needs. Only thing to say is that in the room there is no window, the AC is very good, though. All in all, a great place to stay.
This was an extraordinary lovely place to stay: clean, happy atmosphere and close to subway. nothing more to wish. Highly recommended!

I enjoyed my stay here! On arrival, Helen made me dinner and we spent some time exchanging songs and playing the piano. Jason was full of great local advice and whenever I had a question or query he could not have been more helpful. Really efficient communication as well. 

If you're someone who wants a quiet place to stay, this will suit you well - definitely not a party venue which suits me down to the ground as I'm generally looking for a quiet place to sleep. The air con in the room works great too - it was quite warm while I was in New York so that helped a lot! 

The place is really close to subway where can get the F line that runs you into Manhattan. Typically I was spending a lot of time in Midtown or the lower east side, so you're looking about 40mins door to door for most places in Manhattan. I'd recommend downloading the Citymapper app when traveling anywhere - this'll also help you to take the shortest route to the station. 

While I wouldn't describe this as being a very trendy part of Brooklyn, there is no shortage of food shops and take aways nearby (and Jason again made good recommendations for this too). It's a bit dimly lit at night but as someone who made the trip at all hours of the morning solo, I felt pretty safe. The area is also really diverse which is always a plus :D

Thank you so much Jason and Helen x

If you are looking to stay in Kensington, this is the place to go! The apartment is spotless clean and host  very nice and helpful. It is also priced reasonably for the area. Jason gave me great and accurate tips on local restaurants. Helen was wonderful and I had the honor of listening to her sing.
I highly recommend Jason's place if you are making a short trip to NYC. Very convenient from nearby subway stations.
Jason and his mother are so kind. Their home is pretty tidy. You will get a great value deal if you choose their place! 另外,他们也可以讲中文,对自己英文没信心的话,这所民宿也是一个不错的选择｡
Excellent value and nice people. Highly recommended. I’ll certainly stay here again.
Jason's place is exactly as described. Very clean and quiet. Close to public transit.

Jason and his mother were excellent hosts, they were extremely communicative and replied to my questions promptly. The apartment was spotless and featured beautiful wood floors throughout. The room was quiet as it isn't near a street and located in an intererior room within the second floor apartment. The bed was comfortable and had a cozy duvet. A closet to hang clothes and small table and chair were in the room. Two F subway stations were a quick walk away and Manhattan and downtown Brooklyn were half an hour away by train. I would definitely stay again as the price was a bargain. They suggested a wonderful Asian restaurant my last evening which turned out to be excellent.
Super close to the subway. Helen was very kind.
Jason and Helen are the perfect hosts. Warm and welcoming but not overbeari g

The host and his mom are very caring. Very responsive. I felt comfortable. First day, I was rather skeptical as it was my first experience being at airbnb. By second day, I felt very comfortable. The hosts are very cordial, responsive and generous. They make sure you are completely comfortable. Subway is 8-10 mins distance. It is better to commute by uber pool if weather is too cold like I faced on one of the Days. The park near Brooklyn is great, which was suggested by the host.
Helen and Jason were great hosts. Helen went out of her way to make sure I was comfortable.
Jason and Helen were lovely to stay with. They showed great hospitality and are kind and thoughtful hosts. I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again!
It was a nice place , friendly host , quiet and clean.
Excellent place for budget traveller. It's located in a relatively safe and quiet neighborhood with shops that stay open after 10pm. The host is hospitable.

Jason and Helen provide a warm welcome for their guests and go out of their way to be accommodating. Clean, quiet and simple space. My guestroom was in the interior of the apt and did not have a window, but it did have a ceiling fan and was airy enough and cozy and comfortable. The mattress was firmer than most, but I slept very well. Very easy commute to Lower Manhattan by subway.

It's awesome place.Especially his mother took care of a lots for me!I could really enjoy this trip.
Just the private room doesn't have window, so it might be difficult to wake up  if you're not good at it.But it's only small thing.
Just a super host! Helene Jason’s mother and Jason himself. Sure I will stay with them next time in New York
Жильё полностью соответствует описанию, чисто, уютно, отлично подойдёт для отдыха и выспаться. Я доволен пребыванием у Джейсона на 100%.
I very much enjoyed my 2 week stay with Jason and his mom. They were very kind and made me feel right at home. I will definitely book with them for my return visit next year.

Jason and his mom Helen were very helpful.
I asked the early check-in and they were kindly letting me with breakfast!

Thanks so much and enjoyed the stay.
The place was really clean and Jason’s mom was such a sweet lady! Definitely recommend this to everyone. :)

Room was comfortable, has a fan, small desk and closet space.
Jason’s mom was very hospitable, provided a nice dinner on the day of arrival.
Jason and his mum are very kind and the hospitality is great- his mum offered to cook me breakfast in the morning which was a very nice touch! Place is clean and in a really good, safe location!

I liked everything about my stay. The room doesn't have a window, which I loved, there's no single light when kind. She prepared food for me when I had to leave early in the morning.  How lovely... anyway, clean room and bathroom. close to Church Ave subway station, G and F line. you will have to walk a little to get varieties of food but it's doable.
I’ve stayed at Jason’s several times. He and his mother are excellent hosts. The room is spartan but scrupulously clean and very good value. I’ll certainly be back.

Great place for the price. Helen is super friendly and helpful. Jason even wait for me at 9pm for checking.
Absolutely will stay here again.

This is a great place to stay. Not only Jason and Helen are great,  location is very convenient and the value can't be beaten.   Helen kept offering food, which was not expected but appreciated.   Highly recommended!
Great place and great people!
This is my third time at Jason and Hellen house as always for me perfect

A great little gem! The room and bathroom were spotless (which is always my number one priority). Other info: the apartment’s on the second floor of a townhouse (I didn’t have a lot of luggage but that might be helpful for some to know). The bathroom (and kitchen) is in a little hallway that’s separated from the main living areas which is nice so I didn’t feel like I was disturbing too much if I came home to take a shower late.  

I really appreciated that they let me leave my luggage for a few hours after I checked out. Overall, seamless and great experience. Really enjoyed Jason and Helen’s hospitality.

Jason and his Mom are great hosts! I loved staying with them while visiting NYC. Helen (his Mom) cooked a great meal for me on arrival and even shared her passion for music. It was a very warm welcome to the area. I can't wait to return to NYC!

Jason’s place is really good value for money, I felt safe and welcome there. Everything was clean, I commuted easily with the subway and buses to various parts of Brooklyn and Manhattan. The room was quiet and the fact that it has no window helped me sleep better and recover quicker from jetlag.
And the most enjoyable part of this experience was meeting Helen, a wonderful woman who tries her best to make you feel welcome and even cooks for you! She's very generous and caring. And she sings beautifully!
Jason and his mother are awsome! She cooked me lunch & breakfast and i was very thankful! Also, the room is SOOO COMFORTABLE! No window, but i loved it!
Very easy to communicate with, thorough and welcoming. Very hospitable, there was a snack when I arrived and a big breakfast too! Would definitely stay again.
Nice place!

My stay was very comfortable. Jason and his mother Helen were wonderful hosts. I arrived later than expected and Helen stayed up to help me check in. The apartment is conveniently close to a Subway station. The room itself was very nice and had its own AC unit, which was a blessing for my July stay. Wonderful hosts and a nice place to stay.

Jason and his mom are both very friendly and very helpful. The neighborhood is quit and peaceful. It's really close and easy to get to the subway and you'll be in Manhattan in minutes. I would definitely come back here.
so nice.

You will remember Jason and his mom Helen forever! Jason is a kind young man who has it all figured out (ex- need vegan options? He’s texting them to you before you even ask). The room and house are both very clean and simplistically kept. No clutter. There are grocery stores & restaurants all around. Definitely stay here if you’re looking for a safe, clean, and inviting place during your travels.

Jason and Helen’s place is clean, simple, and well-located in a residential area off the F in Brooklyn. I was so pleased by the hospitality they showed me, even though I wasn’t spending much time in the apartment other than sleeping. The air-conditioner in the middle of this hot NYC summer was such a relief. No, the room doesn’t have a window, but I, personally, did not find the room to feel confining. If you’re looking for a tidy space to lay your head in a quiet part of the city (about 45 minutes - hour to Midtown), Jason and Helen’s listing is a nice option.
Quiet, safe and easy accessible neighborhood on the F line to Manhattan. Outstanding hospitality. Thank you!

Jason’s place was just right - easy access to the subway, very affordable, very comfortable bed, and great AC. His mom was extremely sweet and offered to cook for me. They were very kind to accommodate my late check-in and any questions I had.
the host is very nice, but the place is not so good
As a first airbnb experience, this was the perfect place to get started. The  subway was a short walk away, place clean, and Jason & his mom were awesome hosts!
This is the forth time I go at Jason and Helen house, extraordinary hospitality.
Very great clean place. Jason and his mom Helen are very nice, knowledgeable, and reliable. If u are thinking of staying in NY, stay here.

Very high value for this price! I was jet lagged, so the lack of a window made it easier for me to sleep. Helen made me breakfast, while Jason helped me find my way, gave me tips as to where to eat out and was very friendly and frank. I’m very grateful that they responded to my texts quickly and showed understanding for my late check in due to a flight delay. I self-checked in without a problem.

This was my second time staying with Jason and his mom. I booked with them the second time because the first time had been so nice that I had no incentive to bother looking for something else. I had great experiences both times. This place is great value: the house and room are super clean, the bed is comfy, the neighborhood is safe, the subway
station is a 5 minute walk away. Jason is very helpful and accomodating. His mom (Helen), is very sweet. She cooked breakfast for us, bought us tasty
dumplings from Chinatown, and shared her passion for music by singing to us. If you are looking for a safe, affordable, and confortable place for 1 or 2 people to stay while
in NYC, look no further. I recommend Jason's place without reservations. I would love to stay with them again when I'm back in NYC. Best wishes.

I was visiting for an extended weekend. Jason and his mom were lovely hosts. My room is as shown in the pics and very clean and comfortable. I could walk or take the Uber to local hangouts. I needed a safe and clean place to nap/sleep and this was a great.
I had a great experience. Pretty much everything has been said in previous reviews. Jasons and Helen are great hosts!
The location of the place is peaceful and quiet.  Jason and His mother are gracious hosts and I enjoyed my stay thoroughly!

Expect fantastic hospitality, responsiveness and professionalism - beyond most of my other Airbnb experiences!!! Good transportation links also. I would happily come back in the future. For those with heavy luggage or accessibility issues, note there is one flight of stairs to climb. There's also no window in the room but AC/heater ventilation.

The room is super clean, the floor is sparkling! I’m a person who is very picky about cleanness, but Jason’s room can definitely meet my standards. Also, the host is very considerate, even provide the link of restaurants and stores around, very thoughtful to details. Btw, Jason’s mom is so nice, cooked meal for me, it’s delicious and I appreciate it very much!
Jason and his mother are very pleasant and very accommodating.
they were great! best value for money!
simply, the right place to live. very close to Pakistani restaurants. the place was also very clean.
A very warm and thoughtful mom-and-son team of great hospitality. Everything is as described. The hosts went out of their way to make sure that I felt at home.
I've stayed there for 3 days. They were very considerable and kind!
Jason and his mom were wonderful! They communicated quickly and were very accommodating. I also quite liked my bedroom—I could sleep forever in that thing.
Helen and Jason were great hosts. Lovely people and I had a lovely stay. Thank you for your hospitality! location and value were great for my few days in the city.

A pesar de que está bastante lejos de Manhattan, el metro esta a un par de calles.
La madre de Jason es muy amable y todo estaba tal como informa la publicación
Awesome stay, awesome hosts. Very convenient location! Will definitely comeback should the occation arrise!
Helen is so nice, the place is ok worth to pay, so it is not luxurious, but it’s clean and comfortable.

Helen was a wonderful host. Very caring and thoughtful. Always offering to cook you some food. Extremely nice. Room is as shown in pictures. A very short walk to the subway. Apartment is very quiet. Would highly recommend. Thank you!
Jason and his Mom were great and traveling to the city was easy.  His mother was so attentive and she offered to cook meals every night. Great stay!

Excellent location close to the F and G subway lines. Jason was very efficient in responding to me with any questions or concerns. Helen is a sweetheart and even offered me dinner upon checking in which was very sweet of her. I enjoyed my stay and would recommend to anyone visiting New York.

Awesome place, awesome host.  Jason and his mother Helen have a wonderful Airbnb.  There is a lot of privacy, but Helen was always there to help with any questions I had.  She even cooked me an amazing authentic Chinese lunch!!!!!
very good!
Jason and his mum are really helpful and considerate. The communication couldn't have been better and the room was really clean. The location was safe.
Jason and Helen make you feel home! This is my fifth time with them I guess this means something...

Jason's place is simply excellent. 4 mins to the subway F/G, close to Manhattan as advertised. Helen is very helpful and nice and to my surprise she can speak Cantonese and Mandarin too. Very satisfying experience! Thank you perfecting my vacation in NYC.

Jason and Helen were very kind and I was able to spend inconveniently during my stay. 
Sometimes I had a meal to eat and I am very grateful!

name: The Porto Concierge - Horus House
summary: Practical and conveniently located 2 bedroom flat with all amenities for a comfortable stay. Centrally located to enjoy all the city has to offer! In this apartment can sleep up to 4 people comfortably. 14 minute walking distance to Marques metro station. Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment. Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay. Free luggage storage at The Porto Concierge - Welcome Center.
space: Within a building, this apartment is on the 1st floor, accessible by stairs only. With great sun exposure, this flat has 2 bedrooms, 1 living room, a fully functional kitchen and a bathroom. The living room has a TV with international channels, there is also a comfortable sofa. The kitchen is equipped with everything necessary, from coffee machine, water kettle, microwave, toaster, oven and stove top, all utensils necessary for a home cooked meal can be found like pots and pans, cutlery and crockery. There is one bedroom with a double bed and another bedroom with 2 single beds. In this apartment, you can enjoy the balcony for some fresh air. Its fantastic location allows a quick access by metro to the main touristic spots in Oporto, like the iconic Lello Bookshop, the Clérigos Tower or even the river area.
description: Practical and conveniently located 2 bedroom flat with all amenities for a comfortable stay. Centrally located to enjoy all the city has to offer! In this apartment can sleep up to 4 people comfortably. 14 minute walking distance to Marques metro station. Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment. Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay. Free luggage storage at The Porto Concierge - Welcome Center. Within a building, this apartment is on the 1st floor, accessible by stairs only. With great sun exposure, this flat has 2 bedrooms, 1 living room, a fully functional kitchen and a bathroom. The living room has a TV with international channels, there is also a comfortable sofa. The kitchen is equipped with everything necessary, from coffee machine, water kettle, microwave, toaster, oven and stove top, all utensils necessary for a home cooked meal can be found like pots and pans, cutlery and crockery. There is one bedroom with a double bed and another bedroom with 2 single
neighborhood_overview: In a quiet residential area, within 5 minutes walk to supermarkets, restaurants, coffee shops, bakeries and all sort of commerce. 15 minutes walk to the metro station that takes you downtown within 10 minutes! In the neighbourhood you can find all type of services: many restaurants, supermarkets, butcher, fruit shops, typical grocery stores, cafes, bakeries, take-away, ATMs, etc.
notes: Extra Services upon request w/ special conditions: • Private transfer to the apartment/airport (Lux car): 9€/person 2 to 3 people (private driver) - takes 20 minutes (can be used for 1 person but will cost 18€) • Transfer service in a private bus to the Airport (private driver pick up at the apartment): - 4 to 6 persons: 9€/person - takes 25 minutes • Sightseeing Bus + Port Wine Cellars:  - 1 day: 13€/person* - 2 days: 15€/person* • 6 Bridges Douro Cruise + Port Wine Cellars: 12,50€/person* • Sightseeing TukTuk + Port Wine Cellars: - up to 2 people: 12€/person* - more than 2 people: 10€/person* - Plus Bridges Cruise: 22€/ person* - Plus Cable railway: 17€/ person* • Home groceries delivery  • Babysitting  • Bike rental • Taxi  • Other services as requeste (Website hidden by Airbnb) years old: Free/ 4 - 12 years old: 50% discount For more information, please contact us. Prices may vary according to the services requested and/or guests involved. Services are provided by business partners
transit: There are some options for you to come from the airport to the apartment:  - Private transfer to the apartment (Lux car): 9€/person 2 to 3 people (private driver pick up at Arrivals) - takes 20 minutes (can be used for 1 person but will cost 18€)  - Transfer service in a private bus from Airport to the apartment (private driver pick up at Arrivals): - 4 to 6 persons: 9€/person - takes 25 minutes  - Metro (you should leave on Marques stop) - 2,45€ / each person - takes 35 minutes + 14 minutes walking
access: Guests have access to all the amenities of the apartment.
interaction: When you arrive you will be met by Concierge Service that will receive you for check-in and share with you tips about where to find special places to eat, visit and have fun. As to communicate your stay to the Immigration and Borders Service (SEF), your Passport or ID Card details will be requested during check-in.
house_rules: - Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment, only in the balcony when available or at the window-sill. Please leave all electric appliances turned off, make sure water taps are not running and close all doors and windows before check-out. We request that guests leave the dishes and the kitchen clean and empty out the trash, there is always a garbage deposit in the street nearby. The apartment is cleaned prior to each arrival. Please, keep the apartment tidy and clean as reasonably possible during all the time of your occupancy. If you require extra cleaning during your stay, please contact us - we will arrange it. PLEASE TAKE CARE of the decoration items, furniture, towels/linen and other apartment's equipment. Any doubts handling the apartment's appliances and equipment please call. The neighbours appreciate some peace and quiet as do our guest, please keep the noise level to a minimum between 22h and 8h. Use the place as if it were your own. Check out time is before 11h. If request

reviews.comments: Accurately clean and well-equipped apartment

The apartment was spotless, very large, newly decorated and completely outfitted for the traveler with modern appliances, dishes, etc.  Easy access to Uber (be sure to tell the taxi driver the address is in Porto.  There are several similar addresses!).  The area is very walkable and scenic.  The Concierge service was great and they provided numerous suggestions, places to visit, and where the public transport was located.  A 24 hour phone number was also provided plus an array of services (such as tours, transport) similar to any hotel's offering.  Recommended!

We loved this place. We needed something a little bigger than what most of Porto has to offer (we had four people staying together) and this place was wonderful. My only (very minor) issue is that it was a little far from the city center (a 25-30 min. walk). This was not a problem for us because the weather was nice enough that we would just walk downtown and get an Uber back. Public transportation also isn't ideal from this location (would have to catch several busses to get to city center), but it is definitely an option here. The host was a little late, but her thoroughness and helpfulness absolutely made up for it! The Porto Concierge was so helpful, and offered information about tours, airport transfers, etc. They also provided a 24 hour phone number for any issues or information we might need, and also included a bottle of wine on our arrival.  Loved working with this company, and the place was beautiful. We had a wonderful stay - and if I had to do it again, I would definitely choose this place and The Porto Concierge. Loved it!

Estuvimos cinco días en Oporto con mi familia, la casa esta algo retirada pero bien comunicada con transporte público, se agradece que se pueda aparcar en la misma calle de la casa, El alojamiento esta muy bien equipado y me parece muy recomendable. Una única pega, la llave de la casa la recogida en otro punto de la ciudad y eso después de viajar en un pequeño engorro.

Très belle appartement, confortable, pas trop loin du centre-ville, à proximité des transports en commun.
Il y a un service pour les problèmes.
Great apartment! New and clean, perfect for 3-4 people. I recommend it to everyone who wants to visit Porto. Hope to come back next year ;)

C'est un peu comme si on se trouvait à l'hôtel. Dans un lieu impersonnel et néanmoins propre. Nous avons apprécié notre séjour, il faut simplement se dire que l'on ne retrouve pas ici le concept d'airbnb qui est de loger chez l'habitant.
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Propre , bon agencement .

Overall our stay was okay, the place looks like in the pictures. It is 30 mn walk from the center and quiet. 
But it's small details that were a bit unpleasant. Being a family, we chose an apartment with two toilets. One of them was out of order and no one let us know before we had already moved in. The communication was very irregular and consisted mostly in copy-paste, we never felt like we could actually talk to someone. Workers came twice while we were there to fix the toilet, which they didn't. 
Overall the apartment is practical and charmless, and that's okay. But for the price we would expect better finitions and service.

Malheureusement un toilette était hors services. Notre avion avait du retard une voiture devait venir chercher via la conciergerie mais n'est pas venue, nous avons donc pris un taxi. Ce qui est finalement mieux car beaucoup moins cher. Là communication avec l'hôte n'a pas été simple. Plusieurs numéros de tel envoyés par l'hôte mais les personnes difficilement joignables.

Accertatevi che tutte e due i bagni siano funzionanti ed evitate i transfer che loro forniscono non sono precisi.
Meglio taxi normali o meglio ancora uber". Io mi sono trovato benissimo. Preciso, economico e affidabile

La estancia fue buena, la zona está cerca de restaurantes y tiendas.
Por poner un pero, el ruido de la calle en las habitaciones es un poco molesto.
It is a good choise. Low price and wide space are the reasons for choosing this flat. You can also walk a few minutes to city center. It 's so convenient.
Big appartment for this price, kind of far from the citycenter but easy to reach with bus or metro. I recommend Jose's appartment
Recomendo!
The apartment is very clean and comfortable, with red wine, I like it, just a little farther away from the city center and everything else is perfect!

Apartamento simpático e confortável porém a precisar de algumas manutenções!

Tivemos 8 dias neste apartamento mas ocorreram alguns problemas, nomeadamente :
- Quando chegamos o chuveiro só tinha a mangueira
- Haviam poucos covertores 
- A persiana de um dos quartos não funcionava 
- A banca da cozinha estava entupida (passados 3 dias houve uma pequena inundação na cozinha porque a àgua começou a verter fora do cano)

Tudo ficou resolvido em 24 horas, menos a banca e a presiana, os técnicos foram la resolver o problema, mas no dia seguinte o problema manteve-se.
Não podemos preparar refeições na casa durante 3 dias  porque não podiamos usar a banca.

Resumindo : 

Gostamos da localização, embora não esteja localizada no centro do Portro nem perto do metro, mas tem autocarros, supermecados, e restaurantes à volta, a casa estava limpa, o espaço estava bem organizado, a decoração é simples mas bonita, na cozinha temos acesso a muitos utensilios.

Não gostamos do barulho que ouviamos dos vizinhos e dos carros a passar nem dos poblemas que tivemos na estadia, contudo o anfitrião esteve sempre em contacto conosco e respondeu aos nossos pedidos, embora nem todos tenham sido resolvidos com sucesso ! 

Recomendo, depois das manutenções serem realizadas :)

This was a very clean and spacious apartment. There's a great restaurant/bar right across the stress with very yummy food. 30 minute walk to the heart of the city. Fairly quiet neighborhood. Host is very accomodating and easy to communicate with!

This is a lovely apartment, clean, spacious and close to local amenities, only takes 20minutes to walk to the centre. Jose was a thoughtful host and left lots of information on local transport, sites to visit, as well as, prices. Would definitely stay again.
Ótima estada. Tornou a saudade de Porto ainda (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaremos.
Pleasant apartment in quiet neighbourhood, bit far from central Porto,  but Uber is very cheap and takes you everywhere quickly.  Very clean worth money. Thank you
We had a good stay at the apartment. It is a little far from the city centre although there is a good bus connection. There might be some noise at night, but overall we had a good stay.

el apartamento era genial. si bien en las fotos se ve mejor, es súper cómodo y acogedor. las camas eran brutales y las almohadas igual, súper cómodas.

la recogida de llaves en el centro que tienen se nos hizo muy cómoda, porque hay algo más de libertad si llegas a una hora distinta a la convenida. además el anfitrión nos dio unas recomendaciones geniales para comer y sobre qué ver (no os perdáis el restaurante rito que está al lado del apartamento). 

nos ha parecido un detallazo la botella de vino y el gel, aunque los botes sean pequeñitos al menos dan para llegar y ducharte si vas sin gel. 

quizá el apartamento este un poquitin apartado del centro, sin embargo es muy fácil encontrar aparcamiento y se puede llegar a pie en unos 20minutos, teniendo la parada de metro a unos 7 minutos así que genial!

sin duda tendremos en cuenta el alojamiento la próxima vez que volvamos a Oporto!

Nice two bedroom apartment with an excellent check-in service and helpful staff. The property is a bit far out from the main attractions (about a twenty minute walk from the nearest metro). Buses served the property well but stopped running at 9pm.
Tudo limpo, boa localização, simpatia e profissionalismo, só um pequeno apontamento o chuveiro estava estragado e os estores tb.

Muy buen apartamento, una ubicación estratégica cerca al centro, aunque el vecindario es muy residencial y el parqueo del carro dependía de disponibilidad de espacio en la calle, pero el barrio con mucha seguridad.
약간 외곽이지만 아주 좋아요..

El apartamento está muy bien, como en las fotos. Esta un poco lejos del centro, una media hora caminando, aunque hay de todo en las proximidades, supermercados, cafeterías, algún restaurante. 
Se agradecería que hubiera algunos productos básicos de cocina, como azúcar, café, sal y aceite, y también papel higiénico suficiente para los días de la estancia. 
El apartamento estaba más o menos limpio y ordenado pero no olía a limpio como si hubieran fregado con agua sucia, tuvimos que salir a comprar las cosas que faltaba y un limpiador de suelos. 
Si cuidaran más estás cosas el apartamento sería perfecto porque es como se ve en las fotos.
A big apartment with everything what you need for a nice vacation. 30 min on foot from the center.

name: IDEALLY LOCATED COZY COTTAGE
summary: Clean, Cozy And Comfortable Studio With Private Entrance and Patio. Free Street Parking. Walking Distance To Amazing Variety of Restaurants And Other Food Options. Block away from Express Bus To Manhattan or Subway. 5 Minute Drive To City Island, Orchard Beach and Pelham Bay Park (All Accessible By Public Transportation As Well). Minutes Away From Bay Plaza Mall.
space: We Know How Important A Good Night Sleep Is. This is Why We Provide You With Real Bed with Soft Sheets, Extra Pillows Upon Request. Brand New Bathroom with Plush Towels, All Essentials (Shampoo, Soap, Hair Conditioner). Kitchenette with mini fridge, a  microwave, basic essentials (salt, pepper, dining and silverware, can opener) and coffee maker. Free refreshments such as bottled water and sodas.
description: Clean, Cozy And Comfortable Studio With Private Entrance and Patio. Free Street Parking. Walking Distance To Amazing Variety of Restaurants And Other Food Options. Block away from Express Bus To Manhattan or Subway. 5 Minute Drive To City Island, Orchard Beach and Pelham Bay Park (All Accessible By Public Transportation As Well). Minutes Away From Bay Plaza Mall. We Know How Important A Good Night Sleep Is. This is Why We Provide You With Real Bed with Soft Sheets, Extra Pillows Upon Request. Brand New Bathroom with Plush Towels, All Essentials (Shampoo, Soap, Hair Conditioner). Kitchenette with mini fridge, a  microwave, basic essentials (salt, pepper, dining and silverware, can opener) and coffee maker. Free refreshments such as bottled water and sodas. We are just a  text or phone call away. Enjoy Your Privacy to Reach Out with Questions. We are located in a quiet residential neighborhood with  a variety of restaurants such as Italian, Irish ,Mexican , Carribean, Chinese and Japanes
neighborhood_overview: We are located in a quiet residential neighborhood with  a variety of restaurants such as Italian, Irish ,Mexican , Carribean, Chinese and Japanese cuisine as well as a local Dinner. Also 5 minute drive to City Island Seafood cuisine . Some local attractions include the Bronx Zoo, Botanical gardens Fordham University and Yankee Stadium.
transit: Walking distance to  regular and express busses to NYC and 20 minutes to subway.
interaction: We are just a  text or phone call away. Enjoy Your Privacy to Reach Out with Questions.
house_rules: - Treat our home as you would your own. Quiet time is after 10 pm. No smoking   is allowed inside the suite. Please do not throw anything in the toilet and place      in the waste basket instead. Theres no smoking of any kind allowed inside the room. Check out time is by 11 am. Late check out is subject to an extra charge.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Hi, my name is Luis Antonio Im a business owner who enjoys hosting and meeting new people and as an avid traveler I know first hand the importance of great hospitality. I love traveling and learning new languages. Everyone is welcome in my home!

reviews.comments:
My stay was the best at Luis' place. Very neat, beautiful and close to public transportation. And the area was also very well located with many stores and places to eat. Really recomend!
Luis was very helpful and the communication was great!!! Thank you so much!
Luis was great. Definitely a good spot
This was the perfect (Website hidden by Airbnb) friend had to visit his brother in a nearby hospital. It was an absolute perfect experience...thanks to luis and his family

Luis was an excellent host. We stayed in NY to celebrate our first anniversary as husband and wife and his place was everything we could hope for and more. It was clean, cozy, and had all the essentials necessary ( Iron, blow drier, soap, shampoo, paper towels, not to mention refreshments). We had a moment to chat with Luis and he was super friendly.

Thanks to Luis and Maria this is the second time we stayed in this beautiful private quiet Cottage and we have only positive things to say. Everything worked out great
This is our first time ever staying in a Air B&B so I was very nervous and it worked out better than I could imagine! This trip from San Diego to New York turned into a little vacation notto mention we come to Bronx to visit a dying relative.
You cant find a better host!

Luis' place was amazingly comfortable and convenient wrt the privacy it affords and the accessibility of the location. Luis is also really nice and made sure I was comfortable. Great place, great host.
I would definitely stay here again and I would recommend it to family and friends. Their place was beautiful and the hosts really went above and beyond!
Very pleasant stay! Far exceeded expectations!
This place was very comfortable and great location. The hosts provided a clean and accommodating stay.

I had to check in early and had trouble finding the parking and they were very accommodating!!! They allowed for me to use their driveway as needed. I would definitely recommend this location as well. The cottage is located near a 24 hour rite aid, several restaurants/bars and the bus stop to Manhattan was a very short walk. I felt very safe in the neighborhood as well, for those coming from afar and don't know the area. Everything was super clean!!!  Thanks!
Super cute! Will definately stay there again.

Wonderful place to stay. The space was very accommodating And comfortable for me and
My friend. Would definitely recommend and stay again !

Location is great, a few minutes from major highway.
Restaurants and banks within minutes.
 The cottage is just like in photos. Would stay again.

My family had a great stay for the fourth of July weekend.  The location was excellent. The cottage had just enough space for my family with everything strategically placed inside. Luis was an excellent host and I would definitly go back again.
awesome place. friendly neighbourhood

Highly recommend this place! Luis and his wife were great hosts! We ran into an issue and they responded quickly and were very accommodating. The stay was comfortable and clean. I would defiently stay here again.

Luis's place was as described. He was able to accommodate my early checkin which is definitely a plus! And communication was excellent! Would definitely stay again next time I'm in the city!!! One of my best Airbnb experiences!!!
Very outstanding!! I had a great stay

nice quiet, efficient in-law unit in a residential neighborhood. 
We were only there for a quick night but it was exactly as described, the bed was comfy, and Luis was very responsive and provided some nice little touches (e.g., shampoo and soap dispensers in shower, ironing board, small fridge with some drinks and snacks provided, and a Keurig).

Check in was simple and easy, the space was exactly as described in the pictures and very, very neat. Cozy and inexpensive private cottage with no one disturbing the peace. Would definitely stay again!

La casa es mucho mejor que la descripción. Pasamos una noche y todo fue mejor de lo que esperábamos. Me encantó el detalle que el minibar estaba lleno. La zona es muy tranquila. Excelente para sentirte cómodo.
Location was good place was clean had refreshments for us and just a decent room
Place is great for what we needed, right off the highway and included parking, easy drive to the airport in the morning. Would recommend.
Great place. Host was available when I needed to talk to him. Location is convenient.
Nice clean cottage, close to public transport.
Lovely place and location near restaurants, pubs and easy access to highway.
I loved the safe area, the comfy bed, the streaming video.
Perfect set up for what we needed!  Immediate response to all communication. Will definitely book again when I'm in the area!

I highly reccomend Luis and Maria's Cozy Cottage. If you are looking for something clean, comfortable, and convenient you might want to consider their place. Thank you for making my first Airbnb experience great!
Very impressed with the cottage and host service! First time using airbnb and they set the bar high for me. Would definitely recommend this place to family & friends.

Luis has a beautiful cottage, everything was exactly as described in the pictures. Super clean, cozy and quiet place. There were snacks and beverages provided in the room which was nice. Watch out for the mosquitoes though! But we enjoyed our stay, would definitely come back!
My boyfriend and I enjoyed our stay. I would definitely recommend this place!
Very comfortable bed! and the softest sheets! The room is very private and the area is quiet. My husband and I slept very well. Fridge was stocked with a variety of drinks.

The place was great comfortably and private, the host is
So helpful and well prepared for guests!
The cottage is comfortable and private.  Luis was friendly and professional.  I would certainly stay there again.  Thank you!
They made my stay as comfortable as possible !! .. I would highly recommend anyone to stay, I know I will again :)
Definitely will stay again. Thank You Louis.
The place was very nice and cozy, plenty of parking, close to attractions and our host was very friendly. Would recommend this place to everyone!
This was honestly a great experience, the place was nice and Luis was really nice and outgoing ! If I had a chance to go again? I will !

El alojamiento es tal como lo indican, muy confortable e independiente. me pareció muy limpio y el hecho de contar con un lugar para parquear el carro, muy útil. Luis fue muy amable ayudándonos con sugerencias para tener una buena estadía, incluyendo recomendaciones de donde comer y otros. Sinceramente lo recomendaré a quien me pida una sugerencia.
Stayed for a second time and I enjoyed myself once more !!
Luis was very hospitable and the cottage was as advertised. Would definitely use again if I were in the area.
Convenient accommodations. Nice touches like snacks and beverages in the fridge.

Awesome place it's like a hotel with out the hassle and Luis was great from greeting me when I needed help checking in and accommodating my special requests he took the time to make sure we were covered! I'd come back again!
Luis was extremely easy to communicate with. I messaged him about potentially accommodating a third person and he responded that it was no problem within minutes. I would definitely stay here again.
This is a great place to stay. Nice and clean.. Parking is easy to find and really close to restaurants and stores.
First time with airbnb and we had a great experience with Luis, the refreshments was a really nice touch. We recommend this cottage. Thank you Luis.
Great one night stay for a great price. Thanks!!

Luis's place in the Bronx was ideal for our stay. It is close to many wonderful restaurants, deli's, public transportation, and located in an all round safe/comfortable neighborhood. Luis provided us with our own entrance key, clean towels, great beverages, cozy bed, tv +wifi, snacks, etc. Wonderful communication and an amicable host. Highly recommend for a stay. Nothing but good feedback.
We liked the place and enjoyed our meeting with Luis and his family.

Simple checking via lock box, clean location, and quiet. I can't stress enough how those three things can be hard to find. That was not the case this this cottage. Checking in via lock box made things convenient to my busy schedule. The cottage looks just as it appears in the photos. The cottage was clean as a whistle and well maintained. I had no trouble finding the location or parking my car on the street. The neighborhood was quiet and located next to some shops to help keep you from having to drive around or use mass transit. I loved everything about the cottage and the location. I definitely would stay again when I come back to NYC in the future!

Luis's place is very comfortable and cozy.  Everything was as described and he even left some snacks for us when we arrived.  The location is quiet, residential and very close to the bus stop.  We enjoyed our stay!
A great place to stay, within walking distance to plenty of shops and restaurants and a short drive to see the botanical gardens.
Just as described. Parking was easy on the street. Place was quiet, clean and cozy, perfect for a quick trip.
Great price, clean room with all amenities you need, pretty safe location. Lovely place, would stay here again!

Luis' cottage was great. It literally had everything you need to feel right at home. The place itself was very comforting. The only complaint I had the shower was a little too small for me but other than that everything else was great.

The cottage is such a great find in the Bronx! Wonderful area with just about anything you need close by, easy to get around on mass transit and the Puerto Rican restaurant that the host Luis recommended was sabroso! Clean, comfortable, roomy, private... what more can you ask for? Well if you think that it would be nice to have complementary beverages and snacks in your room, they got that covered too! Luis is super nice, responsive and willing to assist. I wish we had stayed  longer. Definitely will be our go-to place when visiting family and friends in the future. If they are not now, they should be considered as a super-host!

The cottage, is, well, cozy! It has everything you'd need, and was perfect for my husband and me. There is air conditioning, a place to work, wifi is available, and the bathroom is all you need. And the snacks were appreciated :) no trouble finding street parking (though we were out of there by 7:30am), and we arrived after 1am. Luis was super speedy on communication and ridiculously easy to work with.

The cottage was as cozy and lovely as described on Luis' profile. The snacks and clean amenities were a plus. My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our quick stay in the Bronx and would definitely recommend this accommodation option. Thanks Luis!
This place is AWESOME! Luis is a great host, provides a great space, and the area is close to everything. Good food, 7/11, gas ect. A great place to stay and Luis is willing to work with you!!
Clean,Nice,Definitely Cozy

This little cottage is located in a very central location. Very easy to get to with plenty of street parking. Upon entering the cottage we found everything just as described in the listing. It smelled very clean! And while the unit is small, no detail in amenities is spared! There were snacks, drinks in fridge, tv with movie channels included, fluffy towels, a very comfortable bed, and things you would find in a hotel. It was a great pleasure to be there and highly recommend! Luis was very attentive and even allowed us to borrow his printer and responded quickly to all my questions. Thank you Luis for hosting us!!!
We loved this location and will come back every time we are in NY! Best place for a small family:)
This place is so cute, cozy & clean. Luis was so easy to work with and he responded very fast. Everything was perfect ! Would book again & again
They were king rude, no one came to Hi or if we need anything. The room was dirty the bed was full of hire!

We really enjoyed our stay at Cozy Cottage.  We loved that it was close to public transportation, but far enough away from the noise of the subway.  Luis was quick to respond to any questions we had, and was nice enough to meet us on our check-in date.  The place was very clean and the perfect size for two people.
Excellent host quite neighborhood  parking is available off the streets few blocks away from a bus stop that takes you to midtown in 30. I highly recommend.
Perfect for a quick 1 night stay!! Thank you Luis!
Prefect location right off the highway and close to everything while still being private and quiet. No problem finding parking. Would definitely stay here again next time I'm in the area!
I loved Luis's place! Very cute and it has every little thing someone could need.

Was first time using AirBNB! I was looking for a close place to stay for my Job interview and I thought at first this place was a little pricey- but as I arrived, I was immediately greeted and welcomed by you Luis! Your place is wonderful, clean,  and very well organized. Every detail was well thought out for the comfort of your guests! I was so pleased to have a private entrance, private bathroom in a very private studio room detached from the main house! I loved the mini fridge stocked with the different snacks and juices. I loved the coffee machine with the variety of coffee, tea and hot coco - my only request for next time is to have a few Starbucks (Pike or Sumatra ) K-cups :) .I even made a short video to show my wife - she was very jealous and wants to come there in the very near future. 
I was so happy to walk into a warm, comforting room after a long day of travel - thank you for turning on the heater for me!
I wish it was not raining so I could have enjoyed my morning coffee on the porch :) 
What also made my experience great was that you, Luis are a great communicator- which tells me that you take your business very seriously. I can say that your price is very fair and I had a great stay at the Cozy Cottage! I will definitely come back with my wife to stay here for a vacation. 
Thank you so much for your hospitality!
I can’t tell you enough how great my stay was!
Thank you
Kays Kaysi
It's a nice cozy place to rest and relax
My girlfriend and I️ had a great time , place looked exactly liked the  . Great place to stay , I️ would recommend this place definitely!

Luis Häuschen ist klein aber gemütlich. Alles war sauber und so, wie beschrieben. Luis hat uns ein paar Snacks und Getränke im Raum deponiert, was wir sehr nett fanden. Im Winter könnte es vielleicht ein bisschen kalt werden, aber es steht ein kleiner Heizkörper zur Verfügung, der schnell wärmt.
Luis hat uns bei der Ankunft begrüsst und am Schluss verabschiedet, ansonsten ist man absolut privat dort. Ich bin mir sicher, dass Luis hilfsbereit zur Seite steht, wenn seine Hilfe benötigt wird.
Das «Cozy Cottag» ist ideal, um als Paar Tage in New York zu verbringen. Die Hauptstrasse ist um die Ecke und da hat es viele Shops und Restaurants. Nebst dem Expressbus nach Manhattan ist auch die Subway nicht allzu weit entfernt und ein günstigerer Weg, um nach Manhattan zu gelangen. Wir können die Unterkunft empfehlen und bedanken uns für die Gastfreundschaft.
The stay was amazing! Parking wasn't an issue. The place was very cozy and the neighborhood was calm. Get place to stay for a mini vacation or a family event.
Great private location.
Really nice cottage that’s cleanly and in a great area in the Bronx. Would recommend to anyone.
Thanks for a great stay!
Such a wonderful place to stay for any activities in the NYC area. Very clean and comfy place.

Excellent place to stay in the Bronx , exactly what you see in the pictures . Very clean and very cozy . Perfect for 1 or 2 people . The best bang for your buck as far as I’ve seen in New York so far and Luis couldn’t have been a better host ! Almost everything needed was already provided and if not anything you need is just a short walk away . highly recommend staying here,  don’t waste too much time looking elsewhere someone might just book it before you do !
Luis was great he was very welcoming and also let us know places in the area. We had a slight issue, but he came right away. My boyfriend and I will definitely use the Cozy Cottage again.
The place was perfect for us and Luis was the perfect host. Will definitely stay there next time was come back to new york

This is a great place to stay if you're looking for a quiet place but close to the city! The value is amazing. It was very clean and had everything you need for a few nights stay. Check in and check out is very easy.
Great place!! Very clean and cozy. Would definitely come back.
Lovely place that was super convenient. Great parking and super fast communication.
Very nice accommodation but a little far from Manhatten. Very lovely and warm during the new year snow storm. Much appreciated . And thank you so much for all the snacks and drinks.
Amazing time. Luis is a great host and the place is super amazing. You can't go wrong booking this place.
It was a good quiet private and cozy place definitely would come back
Very cozy place everything you need for a comfortable stay, I would definitely recommend anyone.

When I walked in the cottage it was perfect in every way! Little amenities in the room make it very thoughtful of the persons stay. Luis was more than helpful in making sure I had everything I needed and was quick to respond to any messages. I look forward to staying here again when I'm in the Bronx.

This place has been one of my favorite airbnbs I've stayed at. It was so clean and well prepared. It was a great location and offered a lot of privacy. The walls were a little thin so we did hear if someone was walking by outside and it was a little cold, but they had electric heaters which helped keep it warm. It was a perfect size for two people and all the thought that went to the extra amenities (like snacks and instant noodles and utensils) was so impressive.

Didn’t get the pleasure to meet them but very communicative and accommodating. Had a great stay, very cozy and clean. Also, for pizza lovers. Really good pizza around the corner & 24HR rite aid, amongst other things. Quiet nice area. Would definitely stay there again.

Being a Bronx native that lives in Virginia Beach, I needed a safe area with a comfortable and clean stature while on business. This Home was nothing short of amazing. The space was clean, there were drinks and snacks left for me when I arrived and the entire process was painless. I will definitely stay here again and again and again!! Thank you for your hospitality!

Luis has a nice house when you walk in, however, does not communicate when there is an problem with reservations. I actually went to the house with my 11pm reservation & someone was in the house already saying they reserved for 11pm
Super cute and nice would definitely come back again.
Cozy little place in a very quiet and safe area!

Cool little backyard shed turned into an Airbnb private room. Nice location for me since I had to stay in the Bronx for an interview. Perfect for one person. Everything is new. Bathroom is tiny! But hot water and toilet works well. Nice host
Everything was just perfect. Pictures were exactly how seen in person. My boyfriend and I had a great time and we will be back soon!

Louis was very nice and prompt with his responses! The cottage was just that an ADORABLE quaint little home away from home, my bf and i loved it! The bathroom was beautiful! The bed was so comfy! We will most deff be back!
Had a great time its was perfect.
Great stay. Easy check in. Cute bathroom. Would book again

Literally the nicest shed I’ve ever seen! I can tell Luis put a lot of thought into the cottage. I arrived pretty late from dinner with friends, and had a little trouble unlocking the key. Luis was a phone call away and did not seem bothered that I called so late. The bed was SUPER comfy! The shower took a while to get warm, but eventually it was  perfect. The toilet was clogged upon my arrival. I did not see a plunger ( I may have not looked hard enough because I was in a rush in the morning).  The fridge is stocked with snacks and beverages. This was such a thoughtful touch. My only complaint was how cold it was. There were 2 heaters, but they didn’t do much because outside was super cold. Aside from that, it was a great stay.

We enjoyed our stay but it was freezing and the shed had no real heat, only plug in radiators and they did an alright job, but they’re the old style that took a really long time to heat up. So it took us a while to get comfortable. After few hours of them cranking it gets pretty cozy in there! Other than that it was cute, clean, and convenient! The snacks were a great touch! Thanks!
Cutest and private building/cottage. So clean. Luis was amazing. Hubby left his wallet And he contacted us right away to return it. We will be back.
Awesome place to stay!!!

Luis place was extremely clean and cozy. It was easy to find and there’s street parking. Walkable places to eat. Luis was very quick with his responses, which we appreciated. Variety snacks and drinks for guests. We will definitely stay again, if available. Thanks!
Such a cozy place I loved it!
Awesome spot.  Dependable you can never go wrong with this place. will be coming back.

This cozy cottage was awesome! Super clean, and super convenient! Near a lot of restaurants and convenance stores! For night life, I would recommend “Casa” it is legit around the corner and an amazing lounge with great food, music, and hookah! We had an amazing time ! Thank you Luis!!
Definitely recommend love the place clean he even left snacks I loved it

The Cozy Cottage was perfect for my boyfriend and I as we were passing through New York.  Lots of nice, thoughtful touches and very clean upon arrival!  Had I arrive a day early, and Luis was very accommodating and quick to respond!  Would stay again an recommend!

I really like this place! So confortable! It has it all! So clean! I felt like in a 5 Star hotel. Thanks

Clean, Quiet, and  comfortable! Perfect stay with lots of street parking. Very considerate host with a stock of snacks and beverages! Thanks for everything!
Very nice amenities, we enjoyed our stay!

Luis was a great host. His place was clean, beautiful, and cozy. He even left snacks and drinks for me. I  will definitely stay again whenever I'm in the area

Luis' place was very comfortable, especially the bed. The place was clean and comes complete with shampoo, body wash and conditioner. Luis was very generous with the snacks and refreshments. This is a great place to stay if you are looking for some peace and quiet in the evening. Luis was very prompt and welcomed us very pleasantly. The place is in the Bronx, located close to a police station and main road, so it is very safe. We would come home at 12-1am without any issues. The place also has a rite aid close by (5 mins walk) and if you are hungry, there's an amazing pizza place called Cestra's (very friendly), which is also 5 mins away.
The place is a little far from Manhattan but an express bus (BxM8, approx. 10 mins walk) will take you to Manhattan (30 mins to 1 hr during rush hrs).  The express bus costs $6.50/1 way. When you reach Manhattan, you can buy an unlimited 7 day pass for subways and local buses (does not include express buses) for approx. $35/person. 
Overall, our experience was great.
AWESOME AIRBNB! Super clean, awesome price, and everything you need! Luis, is such a friendly guy! Will be visiting again! Thanks again Luis!
The place is clean and the neighborhood seemed safe enough. He was very accommodating to our needs and the communication between us was adequate!

This is maybe my 6th or 7th time staying here I can say it is the best spot since I have been a airbnb member.  Visiting never gets old , a great place when you don't know what to choose  . Beautiful back yard ,   I treat this place like my home ,  I am always referring people to stay here so if you can make a choice make this one . :)
Perfect for a short stay. Luis was very friendly and a great host
The room was fantastic. It was cute and clean and had just the right amenities for my intended stay. I would definitely recommend this room for anyone looking for a private getaway!
Clean place, easy check-in and parking, and comfortable! Definitely recommend.

On the day that I chose to rent Luis cottage, upstate ny was hit with a few tornados. This was by far my best stay! I was already a bit distraught because the tornados left me without power and cell phone service. I had a very long drive but upon arrival Luis was extremely nice and helpful! He had great hospitality skills! Left snacks for us to enjoy! And we did end up enjoying all of them Lol :) This was exactly what I expected, very cute and cozy. My girlfriend loved it and the area was very nice and quiet.
Luis was very responsive. The cottage was exactly as described: well appointed and good location. If I return to the Bronx, I would definitely stay there again.
A cute spot with all you need. very convenient to the lower Bronx. The fresh fruit for breakfast was a very thoughtful touch. It was nice to have off street parking also.
Great host. The place was cozy and welcoming.

This place was a great find. It was clean, comfortable, and close to many different restaurants and shops. It was a hot day so the AC was a perfect touch. Luis was friendly and put snacks and drinks in the mini fridge for us. He even gave us an HDMI cord within 10 minutes of asking if he had one. Overall a perfect stay. I will definitely be back!
Very comfortable, loved the extra touches available in  the room like drinks and snacks. Private area was great with a small patio. Would recommend. Luis is very kind!

Loved staying at Luis. Very nice place to stay in Throggs Neck area of the Bronx . Luis communicated right away. I booked the the room in the morning and he confirmed my reservation within the hour. The place is very cute and located close to a lot of restaurants.

Great spot for what we needed. We were able to make coffee in the morning, not worry about our vehicle being parked, and catch the subway to downtown and Brooklyn. Perfect!
It was a perfect place to stay after attending a wedding near by. And Luis made a point to come say hello and goodbye. He was a great host.
Great place. Enjoyed my stay. Nice thoughtful touches. Will definitely recommend to others and would love to stay again

Luis’s place was the cutest! It was perfect for my over night stay in NY. He made sure everything was presentable for us and left snacks out in the room as well! He was very polite ,very helpful and flexible when you needed something. I’ll definitely come back again!

We had a pleasant stay at Luis's place. He was responsive to the slightest problem. We would happily stay at his incongruous cozy cottage in the Bronx again.

Checked into another place before Luis’s space. Place was awful. Had to check into Luis’s space the next day, very short notice. He did a great job with communicating with us and accommodating us. His place is very clean.
Luis’s place is clean, convenient and has everything you need for a night or two! Wonderful stay!

My girlfriend and I stayed here during pride weekend in the city and it was the perfect place to stay! it was very clean and comfortable. had just about everything we needed, no complaints at all. We will definitely be staying again in the future when we come to NY!

Not just your own room, not just your own suite, not just your own apartment, 
but your own little BUILDING!  You can’t beat that at this pri$e!
The place is nice and has a very warm feel to it. It’s great and recommend this place to anybody.

Luis is a super friendly person. Made me feel comfortable instantly. Something to be said for friendly eyes and a firm handshake.

The check in is as good as it gets. Lock box on the door. Luis had communicated the lock box password before hand so I walked right in like it was my own place. 

His place is clean and private and the parking spot is amazing given NYC and it’s parking costs. 

He even leaves you some snacks and drinks in his mini bar and the bathroom, although small, had clean towels, soap, shampoo, and conditioner on the wall in the shower . Nice touch.

If I had to gripe about one thing it would be the fact there is no cable TV and the WiFi signal is bad so even though he has Roku to watch shows it barely worked. But I didn’t come for that so it didn’t bother me too much. 

The neighborhood felt safe and even though it’s not next door to Manhattan the express bus is only a two minute walk from his door and a twenty minute ride to Central Park. The deli on the corner at the bus stop sells metro passes so very convenient. $26USD will get you a full day of transit.

All of this to say that I feel $150CAD a night is fair and I would stay at Luis’ again.
Luis set my boyfriend and I up with some complimentary drinks and snacks and was very easy to get in touch with when any questions came up. We had a great stay. Would definitely recommend.
Great stay. Check in is always easy and I would definitely recommend this place to others. Great host.

Adorable cottage, cutely appointed. I reserved this cottage within 4 hours of arrive. Luis was very responsive we confirming and providing the code for the lockbox. This space was just what we needed. Thank you, Luis.

My stay at Luis’ place was absolutely amazing. The location was great and the cottage was so relaxing. When I’m back in NY, if the cottage is available, I would definitely book it again.  Having available parking was also a plus.
Great,quiet location. Easy, private  access to home and snacks.
Cute cottage and the hosts are great!
Thank you! We'll be back!
Nice sized cottage on his property. The neighborhood is quiet. The cottage was stocked with snacks and drinks in the fridge. Really nice touch.

Great place to stay! I went to New York with my daughter for her first ever trip to her dream city and Luis’ place made it super comfortable for the both of us. 
The cottage itself is amazing. Check in was easy, and it is very clean and tidy. It is equipped with all the essentials, and the fridge and counter were even stocked with snacks and drinks which was a really nice touch. 
The location is great, a nice neighbourhood which felt very safe even when coming back after midnight. There is an express bus to the city and the stop is just about a 10-15 minute walk away so traveling to and from was very easy. 
Overall you can really tell the hosts aim to please with great hospitality. I would definitely stay again, and thank you for helping my daughters first trip be a memorable one!
It’s a super cute small space. Really good for a night with your lover kind of energy.

I loved the cottage. It is well located in a quiet neighborhood a block from the main shopping street.  I felt safe walking to restaurant for dinner and to the nearby bus stop. What really makes it special is all of the thoughtful touches. Coffee and creamer,snacks, and an iron and ironing board. I was particularly happy to find the first aid kit as I had blisters from walking.  Luis communicated well and the lockbox for the key was very convenient.
Great and amazing place
Great little place to stay. Was worth it.
Nice private location with great parking. Very comfortable resting place.

The place is overall good with almost everything you could want from a place and with some nice bonuses such as free parking and snacks and drinks provided. However there are some things that let it down, for example, the bathroom is very small, the shower area is tiny and hard to use and the toilet gets blocked easily making it a frequent problem (although the owner will fix it quickly on request). Also the fridge is very loud which is annoying when trying to sleep.
Great place!

Luis had a great place for us to stay. The cozy cottage was clean and in a nice quite neighborhood. The amenities were well stocked and the bed was very comfortable! Five star, would definitely stay here again.

The inside of this guest house is nicer than the photos! It’s clean with an extremely comfortable bed. The unlock system was extremely easy as well as hopping on to the Netflix account. The room also provided snacks and drinks which we were grateful for. We also went for a beautiful walk between 5-7pm and the neighborhood is so peaceful. Luis was very responsive especially when I needed to move my car very early in the morning for work. We appreciated our privacy and enjoyed our time at the location. I know you would too!

I fell in love with Luis’s place as soon as I walked in. It was so beautiful and comfortable! I highly recommend this place to everyone looking for a small, comfortable, and beautiful place in the Bronx.
Luis's place is clean, and well cared for.  A plus was having a Keurig coffee maker, and some pods to make a cup of coffee in the morning...thanks!

I think this place is a great value it has everything you’ll need, better than a hote for sure, it has a mini fridge, microwave and other amenities, it was also clean and cozy. The host Louis was kind and went above and beyond to make our visit worthwhile. 

Check in process was quick and easy there’s a lock box next to the door simply align the numbers in the middle lane with the code and you’ll get access to the key. I have nothing bad to say about this place or the host. It’s close to La Guardia airport and there’s even a McDonalds nearby within walking distance and other restaurants. 

Some notes: I would recommend this place to those traveling by foot or public transportation. Parking was really hard to find after 7pm, there are paid parking meters from 11-7pm, I found it troublesome having to coming out every two hours to pay for the meter since I couldn’t find parking. The host was kind enough to allow me to use his private drive away. That was a nice gesture of him.  I wish I would have traveled using a taxi or public transportation. Nonetheless like I said this is a great place to stay and it was lovey despite the hard to find parking. (In NYC is hard to find parking anyway so if you’re traveling from abroad save yourself the headache and don’t rent a car) don’t let this decoupage you from staying at this great cottage. It’s a good value :)
Great space, great host, I would definitely stay again
The best place
Luis is a pleasure to work with and we had an absolute awesome experience with him and his Airbnb! Boom!
What a wonderful experience we had at Luis’s place. The location was absolutely perfect walking distance to anything we needed. We will be back again!

This place is amazing. It was super convenient off of the highway and close to everything New York has to offer.
