He even had snacks and drinks stocked in the fridge. I was skeptical of renting an Airbnb in New York but im glad I stayed here. This place is perfect for a solo traveler or a couple exploring the city.
Luis is a gracious host! We felt very safe & comfortable in his cozy cottage and neighborhood. We hope to stay with Luis again next time we are in the area!

This place was perfect! Spent the weekend visiting a friend in Queens one day and exploring NYC the second day. Very quiet and relaxing. Great location, easy access to transportation, and multiple restaurants & amenity stores. Luis place is absolutely as cozy as advertised and he is a superb host. It's located in a lovely, quiet neighborhood. We stayed 2 nights. Luis generously allowed us to park at the end of the private driveway for the duration of our visit. Check-in was easy, the key is in a coded lockbox, with security cameras & lights (which helped us feel secure). The space was immaculately clean and cleverly designed. Very welcoming. The host left some snacks and beverages in the fridge, a welcome touch after a long multi-hour drive.

I wouldn’t recommend that to females alone - it was a longer walk to where the bus let us off at that time than when we got on in the morning (when they make more stops), and that was a bit unsettling to walk 1/2 mile without many other people around in a dark place I wasn’t familiar with, and just us girls. This has no reflection on Luis’ place or location, rather an inexperienced tourist lesson learned. I wouldn’t want to walk anywhere new at 11pm, and didn’t realize we would until we were in the situation. If coming back that late again, I’d take a cab/Uber.

lovely clean space with snacks and beverages,  great location. everything was great
Super responsive. Polite. The Cottage is as was expected and a few other comforts included.  Would be even better during the warmer weather.

There are also a lot of buses going to Central, Wan Chai, Macau Ferry, Repulse Bay, etc. The area is very quiet, no cars around with the Lo Pan temple just in front. The flat is on a hill side, 5 minutes walk to ParknShop supermarket, Kennedy Town's new public swimmingpool and 10 minutes walk to bars, restaurants in Kennedy Town.

reviews.comments: Nice quiet spot in hk. Near to all public transport yet away from the hustle & bustle of the city. By hk standards the apartment was  spacious.
Great place, very clean, host was very friendly and responsive. Would recommend.

Matyas was a wonderful and responsible host, he was very helpful and he responded to all my questions and needs in a very timely manner. The studio was just as described and looked exactly the same in the posting, which was very important because it was exactly what I expected, I really appreciate the accuracy of the posting. Matyas prepared a very clean and comfy studio for us to move in. New bottles of shampoo, bodywash and hand-wash were there for us to use. The kitchen and bathroom are big in HK standard, the area is very safe and quite. The de-humidifier, the air conditioning and the fan make the studio very comfortable. Kennedy Town and the markets are less than 10 minutes walk down the hill. If you don't the exercise of walking several flights of stairs to get to the studio, I highly recommend this place.

name: Beach House Manly Apartment 4
summary: Well done !!! you won't find a better location in Manly. The “Beach House” Apartments overlook Cabbage Tree Bay Aquatic Reserve between Manly and Shelly Beach, in one of Manly's premier locations  Swim, dive, snorkel, surf, paddle board, coastal walkways, ocean pool, restaurants, all literally at your doorstep, or simply chill and unwind. Manly is amazing, I look forward to welcoming you
space: Designed and equipped for Airbnb visitors this spacious, newly refurbished beach apartment is a such a lovely place for a getaway This dream location right on the ocean is a 20 second walk from your front door to the water (I've timed it!) It's like a boutique hotel suite where you can hear the ocean waves at night. This fabulous two bedroom apartment provides Fully furnished apartment    High quality comfy beds and linen   Built-in wardrobes and ample storage  Beautiful large bathroom with a bath  WIFI included  Shared laundry facilities with the other 4 apartments at the Beach House   The apartment is fitted with all amenities for your stay, fresh linens, shampoo and conditioners, and essential pantry items. This is what beach lifestyle is all about. Relax you have found your own little paradise

neighborhood_overview: Manly is a pretty special place to stay. It's part holiday resort and part style conscious city suburb While Manly is definitely all about sun, surf and the outdoors, it also has a really vibrant food and drink scene. Every kind of dining option from pub to beachside casual to evening chic is available. Some of my favourites include Bower Restaurant (next door neighbour’s) The Boathouse Restaurant at Shelly Beach, Hugo’s at Manly Pier, Yok Thai in Manly and Garfish on the Esplanade.
transit: The apartment is a 5 min walk to Manly Beach, the Corso and Shelly Beach (voted one of the world’s best beaches and a 15 min walk to the beautiful North Head Reserve. Your apartment is also  5 minute walk to the surf beach, Manly Ferries, shops, local markets, restaurants and cafes, so traveling around is easy. There are buses or ferries to the city, if you have a car, there is off street parking available at the apartments for $40 per day (subject to availability) If they are already taken we  will supply our guests with a council parking permit for free 24/7 street parking (upon request). Locally you'll find you probably won't drive at all as everything you need is walking distance. You can also rent bikes as there are bike paths all around Manly and along the beachfront, including the path right in front of your apartment   Manly Fast Ferry is a 5 min walk away and will get you into Sydney Circular Quay in just 20 mins  You can also catch the ferry to Watson's Bay from the Manly wha
access: The entire apartment is yours to enjoy as your own. There is a key lock box with a code so you will be able to check in on your own. We will send you check in instruction a few days before your arrival.
interaction: Our aim is to help you enjoy the apartment and Manly as much as we do. The apartment has everything you will need for a comfortable stay, and it is professionally cleaned to a high standard before each guest arrives. If there is something we can do to make your stay  more enjoyable please contact us

I'm from Palm Beach in the Northern Beaches of Sydney  but I spilt my time between Manly Melbourne and Adelaide for business and to visit my family who are spread between those places.
I have four main passions my family wine yoga and travel ( in that order )

reviews.comments: Right on the waterfront, close to beaches. Everything walkable. A great place to stay
Location is excellent, close to ferry, cafes, swimming and snorkelling. Even on a wet day it was exciting.

Rob was great to deal with! Very helpful, friendly and timely - nothing is too much trouble.
Clean bedding (like a hotel), towels and clean bathroom.
Photos aren't quite the same as the property. It's quite aged and in need of a good clean or complete renovation.
Was very considerate in hard circumstances
Great location but not ideal for a family. 1 small wardrobe, no cooker and very tired and outdated. Needs a good clean and fresh paint.
Cosy home and perfect location
The host canceled this reservation 380 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This place is not at all what we were expecting from the advertising.

It was so unclean (filthy stained carpet and sofa bed, didn't smell nice and obviously previously used bed linen for the spare beds) and small that we had to find alternate accommodation.
I'm certainly not a snob and I'm happy to camp but not one of us could bring ourselves to sleep there even just for one night.  So disappointed!  I have used Airbnb previously and was extremely happy with our choice.

Only positive was the great location but even that couldn't keep us there.
Perfect location!  Loved it!

Could not ask for a better location. Right on the water, cafe next door, parking and 10 minute walk to Manly Corso and ferry. 
Rod’s hospitality was fabulous. The room itself is nothing flash, but great value for money and has everything you need. 
Will definitely be back!
Great stay! Had a great time

This place was AMAZING!! 1 bed and 1 sofa bed and 1 rolling bed. The unit is self was clean and 100% as expected. 

Location Location Location!!! This place is 8 feet from the ocean. It was beautiful to walk outside and go snorkeling with minutes of waking up. Perfect to watch the sunrise with a cup of coffee. 

On top of that the walk along the ocean to the downtown area was stunning. Seeing the surfers and waves roll in on the walk was nice. It is only a 8 min walk to the main downtown of manly. 

Rod was awesome and very helpful. He even had a free for our car. 

100% will rent again.

Home to three of Sydney’s best pubs – including the iconic The Imperial, which featured in Pricilla, Queen of the Desert – within a brisk walk from one-another, you’re never short of options for a lazy afternoon’s drink. The thriving high street, which extends from Erskineville train station towards Newtown, offers up the coffee, brunch and gourmet del
neighborhood_overview: Home to three of Sydney’s best pubs – including the iconic The Imperial, which featured in Pricilla, Queen of the Desert – within a brisk walk from one-another, you’re never short of options for a lazy afternoon’s drink. The thriving high street, which extends from Erskineville train station towards Newtown, offers up the coffee, brunch and gourmet delights. Despite sitting shoulder to shoulder, the small-scale terrace homes that crowd the narrow streets all possess a distinct sense of personality. Erskineville may well be one of the hottest inner city spots, but it hasn’t sacrificed any of its charm by way of jarring developments. Erskineville’s creative conscience runs deep. From the colourful residents, the dramatic drinking dens, fringe theatre at PACT, to the gourmet food stores and cafes, there’s a sense of thinking differently here that’s embedded within the tight-knit community. There’s an Erskineville way of looking at Sydney, which makes it one of the most prized lifestyle po
transit: Walk and explore Erskineville/Newtown or even walk into the city 5km's.  Public transport is also fantastic and extremely close with a train station within 400m and bus stops 100m away.
access: Shared lounge room/kitchen and bathrooms and back court yard.
interaction: I'm home intermittently throughout the day and weekends.

host.host_about:
Hi, 

My name is Matt and i live in Sydney, Australia.

I love traveling, photography, film and exploring on weekends.

My housemate just moved out and i have available the main bedroom of the house for 4 weeks until a friend of mine moves in.

Weekdays I usually get up early and leave the house by 8:00am and can sometimes be in and out at home throughout the day as i can occasionally work from home.  I make the most of my weekends by eating out and exploring the city and beaches.

Happy for guests to treat the place as their own.  I hope you enjoy it as much as i do!

reviews.comments: Matt was an incredible host! He made our stay as stress-free as possible and went above and beyond our expectations! Highly recommend staying with him at his gorgeous apartment! Great location, too!

Matt’s place really is a gem, it was exactly what I wanted… Clean, Tidy & Spacious. Matt was a great host, really flexible on my check in and out and great to chat to. Location wise it was great giving quick access to the city and walking distance to the bars in Newtown. Totally Recommended.
Such a great place. Matt was a great host, the place is so close to city and is super close to public transport and in a very nice neighborhood. Definitely recommend to all.

name: Sunny Modern Bedroom 30 seconds from Subway!
summary: Modern, recently renovated and refreshingly sunny apartment. It's an ideal place to recharge after a long day of going about town. One block from the N/W subway so great for commute to all central neighborhoods in Manhattan (ex. 15 min to Times Square). Our neighborhood is quite and famous for its local shops and authentic food options from across the world. We're a short walk to Noguchi museum, sculpture park, Astoria park and museum of the Moving Image among other attractions.
space: I really hope you enjoy the space when you're home. You can lounge in the living room and watch a movie (you'll have access to all my online channels!) or you can use the elegant desk space to get some work done. The kitchen is stocked with coffee/ tea and breakfast treats which you should definitely help yourself to. A hallway leads to your room which gives it optimal privacy. It is also very quite and overlooks a garden. All basic essentials (ex. shampoo, toothpaste, iron, hair dryer) are there and please feel free to ask for any others you may need.

host.host_about: I've been living in Boston for 6 years, went to school here and stayed to work in health care. I really enjoy meeting new people and exploring new places so will be away for a good chunk of time this summer.

reviews.comments:
My wife and I stayed at Lana's place for 3 nights. We loved the place and would definitely recommend it! This is a new apartment. 

The bedroom, bathroom and common areas were very clean, tidy and well maintained. Although Lana was out of town, she gave us very detailed directions regarding key pick up and was in touch with us to check whether we were fine. 

The place is less than a minutes walk from the N train. The wifi works great! The bedsheets and towels provided were very clean.

Our best airbnb experience so far!

Lana a super nice and helpful person who goes out of her way to make sure your needs are taken care of. This let me have a great time exploring the city without worrying about much else.

I found her apartment to be artfully decorated yet functional. Theres loads of space to move around and get work done and the internet functions great. Its also located on the N train and you can be in manhattan within 10 minutes.

So yeah, this is a thumbs up from me.
The best Airbnb experience I ever have. Super Clean, One block from the Train. I felt home every second.! Lana, Your place should be #1 in Astoria.! Thank you very much.!!!

Lana communicated when I needed her which was great. Location is nice. There was some construction going on at night time which became annoying, especially at 5am, so bring earplugs just in case. The place is beautiful and spacious except for the bathroom which can be feel a bit cramped for some. I would totally stay again here. :) Thanks again.

We had a wonderful stay! Lana's home is a beautiful, clean, and sunny space. The location is great as well—honestly steps from the subway with a grocery store on the same block. It's a quick ride into Manhattan from the apartment.

Lana is so polite in her messages. We had a bit of a miscommunication regarding check-in, but she handled it so well and was very accommodating to us. Though we weren't able to meet her in person, I consider her a great host! Highly recommend this home.

Lana's home is super convenient location. Less than 25 min to get into Manhattan and subway is 1.5 blocks away. Lovely apartment with hardwood floors, a beautiful kitchen, and well sized bedrooms/common area. Lana was excellent at communicating with us and check in was a breeze. Would stay again in a heart beat.
All think  was OK. I recommand  to visit  the  city. Esy to goo by  Subway.

Lana's modern apt is in a nice old building. I stayed in her room . The internet was speedy and the bed was comfy. Across the street there is a cheap looking indian restaurant but the food is surprisingly good, I ate there every night.
Had a great stay for the long weekend! Very comfortable space!
Lana's place was great. She was very accommodating and quick to reply!
Nice and cozy apartment. Close to a subway station and the centeral park.
This is a great place to stay. Very clean and in a great location. 10/10 would recommend this place to anyone.
Lana's place is so nice, clean, and cozy. The location is perfect as well. Would definitely recommend!

name: Waikiki Studio with Kitchenette 5 min to beach
summary: Come and have fun in Waikiki! The most famous tourist spot on the island is waiting for you to explore: shops, restaurants, activities and most importantly the lovely beach. No matter if you are a solo traveler or a couple, stay here right in Waikiki and be close to everything. My place is located on one of the main strips and about 5 minutes walk to the beach. Travels from all backgrounds and all over the world are welcomed to our Aloha state. See you soon...
space: The studio is located in a secured building, you will have both fob and key for access and security is 24 hours. Linens, towels and essentials are provided. You will have microwave, toaster, coffee maker, burner stove, dishware and utensils.

reviews.comments: Very nice little apartment in a great location close to everything! Had everything we needed and host was very accommodating. Would definitely stay here again!
Perfect place for a couple visiting Hawaii. Great location by Waikiki beach, restaurants and shops.

I really enjoyed staying this room. Everything was super clean and nice, and I had everything I needed. Also, I liked the view from the balcony. Very close to the Waikiki beach and a lot of restaurants. I totally recommend this place. Much better than staying in a hotel for sure.

My stay was absolutely great! I booked very last minute, but Sherry was great at communicating and assisting to any of my needs. The room was a well kept and a good size for two people. Located close to public transit and great food. Love!

Great location and the value for Waikiki! Only a short walk to the beach and central to bars and restaurants! All of the amenities you will need (coffee maker, hair dryer, mini fridge, A/C, cups, dishes, etc) are provided and check-in and check out was super easy! Thanks!

The appartment was excellent, only two block until the beach, downtown at 5minutes and a lot of food stores or restaurant around the appartment! The hosts are very welcoming and if you need anything, they are available to help you.
Obviously, O'ahu is a very beautiful island. We have enjoyed our trip !
Studio was great, very clean! Extremely close to the beach and walking distance to all of the shops and restaurants. We loved our stay!

My stay at your place was wonderful.  Was pleasantly surprised to find so many useful items in the apartment like cleaning  supplies for kitchen, power strip, iron, ironing board and rice cooker in the room. 

The apartment size was just right for me. The public bus stop is right on the corner. The coin laundry is in the lobby. Everything is so convenient for a traveler. 

Thank your kind and patient assistance during my stay.  
Aloha and mahalo!

the overall visit was perfekt, an amazing price and location. Close to everything. 
The only problems was that the shower is not for people over 165 cm.. we had huge problem with showering.. and would have been nice with more than two knives and forks so we didn't have to wash it off two times a day. We were there for 10 days so would also have been nice with more than one sheet for the bed and maybe a vacuum cleaner :) 
But this was small things that could've been better, but we really loved the visit and was so happy that we found such a
cheap place that has
the same locations as the expensive hotels. :)
Exactly as pictured. Clean spot and steps from the beach. Thanks!

We spent five days here in Honolulu for our honeymoon. Much better than a hotel. It was a clean, fragrant, cozy room like a picture. There are also microwave ovens, tableware, and coffee machines. The location was also fantastic. Waikiki Beach is right in front of you, bus stop, pink trolleys, McDonalds and ABC are very close.  There is also security, so it seems safe for women to live. Laundry rooms on the first floor are easy to wash. Then, there is a cheap, delicious, sweet fruit house.) Host sherry is very kind. Her answer to the prompt was always quick and accurate. Thanks to her, I could make good memories in Hawaii. Also, the Hawaiian Chocolate she prepared was so delicious and touching. If we come back to Hawaii, we will stay here again. Everyone who lives here will be satisfied. Mahalo
Such a great place. Good location, very clean room and very kind peaple.

Awesome location, easy check-in and check- out. The perfect location to explore Waikiki beach. The apartment was spotless and everything was easily accessible. Would definitely stay there again next time I'm in Honolulu.
This is a solid, no frills crash pad for exploring Waikiki. Easy self-checkin.

Superb location - so close to beach and main strip in Waikiki. Very clean and tidy unit - no complaints whatsoever! Would definitely stay again - great value for money.
Mahalo :)

It was great! Jian's place was clean, it was located in the center of Waikiki so we could easily walk around Waikiki even without a car. As smokers, we loved the fact that we could smoke in the lanai. She even let me stop by at 12 around before the check-in hour to leave my luggage. She was very friendly and we loved the place!
The studio was nice and cosy in a great location. Jian was a great host and made it very easy to communicate all of our needs.
Good place to stay and it is near to Waikiki beach!

We had a great stay at Sherry's place. She was very accommodating to our needs prior to check in. The apartment itself was spotless - probably better than a lot of the hotel rooms I've stayed in, and it's the little things like water and biscuits she provided that made our stay extra comfortable. The location of the unit is unbeatable, as it's a less than 5 minute walk to the beach and several great food spots. Overall an awesome stay in Waikiki!

We really enjoyed staying there. The studio's really clean and the Check-in's so easy. It's in the middle of Waikiki and you can reach all stores and whatever you need very fast. I definitely wanna come back.

The location of the house was perfect. Sherry/Ying was very kind. The surroundings near the house were incredibly safe and clean. Grocery store, delicious restaurants, other major shops and Waikiki beach were available in a couple of minutes away. The house and conditions were exactly good as described. However the public parking space under the building is a little bit hard to get in. If you rent a car, you may double check an alternative parking lot. Thank you for your help.
Very clean, comfortable unit.

Cute studio flat with a reasonable price at a great location. Equipped with essentials, possible to do some basic cooking. If you have a late flight back as we did, it might be tricky to find a luggage storage with reasonable price. There's a place downstairs that takes one bag for 5$. We had 4 smaller type of bags so $20 for few hours of luggage storage is definitely too much. Otherwise great experience, hosts are friendly and responsive.
Loved it! Nice touches and prompt communication from the hosts.

It takes only 3minutes to get the wakiki beach!
Very clean and comfortable for staying 1-2 people.
The liquor shop is in the 1sr floor and the parking lot is under ground.
But you have to pay $25 per a day for parking car.
The host is very responsible.

The apt was great! First of all, the location was amazing! 5 minutes to the beach, 1 minute to Kalakaua ave. There is a bus station across the street in case you don't want to rent a car. There is a nice kitchen with all the stuff you need to cook for yourself (We cooked every day for 10 days, very comfortable). The host was very nice, kind and answered quickly to every message. Thank you!!
Great stay. Very helpful with everything. Very responsive. Excellent host!

It is very comfortable, and the room is clean.The access to a beach and a market is good.Sherry answered a question carefully quickly.It became the wonderful trip in Hawaii.

Mahalo.
Great place to stay! Highly recommend it for it is comfortable and location is perfect!
Thanks for your quick responses and for accommodating an early check in for us!! We loved the location and the views of your airbnb!
Great location! Comfortable studio as described. Would recommend.
Very nice place with excellent location. Clean and well maintained. A bit congested for 2 of us, but Waikiki is congested, so that is fine.
Cute studio right in the heart of Waikiki. Close to the beach, shopping, and a ton of restaurants. Checkin was easy and I enjoyed my stay.

GREAT location to everything. If you can’t handle noise at night then this place may not be ideal, however they provide an air conditioning unit that drowns out the noise! We were welcomed with a clean place, friendly staff and water and Hawaiian treats! This spot is literally a two minute walk to the beach, there is great nightlife close by if you with to explore, and awesome restaurants around! Super easy to communicate with the host and they respond quickly!
The location is just fantastic. Waikiki beach just few blocks away, nice bus routes right in front of the house and great food place near:) Highly recommended

Well maintained and clean.  Easy check in, on site 24-hr night guard, as well as 24hr variety store.  5 min. walk to Waikiki Beach, restaurants, shops and mall.  Great communication with host, any questions were promptly addressed.  Highly recommended!

Jian's place was exactly what we wanted! You can't beat this price and location to the beach in Waikiki. All of the shops, restaurants, bars, and anything else you might want on your vacation was right nearby the condo including the beach which is just a block away! We also were not far from Diamond Head, so we ended up walking up there, hiking, and walking back, it was just the right amount of exercise. The condo was small and simple, definitely nothing glamorous, but overall was perfect for our needs and very clean. The patio allowed for a nice breeze and the fridge/microwave helped us save money on food and drinks. If you're looking for an inexpensive Hawaii getaway, this is definitely the way to go.
Great studio! In the heart of Waikiki, everything in a walking distance. Nice view. Wash and drier downstairs, also a local store downstairs as well. Very convenient.

This is a great place to stay in Waikiki for solo travellers and couples on a budget, not wanting or needing the frills and expense of the many nearby big name hotels. The location is ideal: steps away from the beach and the main thoroughfare of bustling Waikiki, with its many shops and restaurants. I would advise though that it can get noisy at night, with the sounds of traffic passing below and the a/c unit rattling away. If you’re a light sleeper, bring ear plugs (I ended up purchasing some after my first night there). Otherwise, I heartily recommend this place and would stay here again.
The location of this place was perfect, just a couple blocks off the beach. Great value for the price!

Jian’s place is very cozy, really good for two guest. Responds to messages quickly. Jian’s place is highly recommended if you want an accommodation near waikiki beach and Waikiki international marketplace.

たまたまﾄﾞﾗｲﾔｰが壊れていたのですが､すぐに交換していただけました｡
お部屋はﾍﾞｯﾄﾞﾘﾈﾝがかわいくて好きでした｡

Highly recommend, esp for those travelling on a budget, you won't find better value! Everything you could need & fantastic location to boot. Short walking distance to everything, the beach, eateries, shopping and public transportation. Also an easy walk to free overnight street parking on Monsarrat Ave. Check in was straightforward and building access is secure.

Beau logement bien situé.  Il y avait tout ce dont nous avions besoin. Un food truck de tacos à l'avant, les arrêts d'autobus à proximité et la plage à 5 minutes. 
C'est une belle option à envisager si vous séjournez à Waikiki.

Wonderful cozy studio blocks away from the beach! Bars and restaurants are all within walking distance. Such a lovely stay with great WiFi we will be back soon. Thank you for always answering my questions so promptly. Mahalo!

Sherry and her apartment are amazing! It may be small, but it had everything we needed. From a cooker, to ironing board, to ziplock bags and even a firstaid kit (which we thankfully did not need to use). Sherry was super prompt in her responses, and even went out of her way, rushing down from her daughter's piano lesson to save us after our key got lost at sea. 

This was our first time in Hawaii, and Sherry and her amazing place made us feel absolutely welcomed. We truly got to experience the spirit of Hawaiians. We will definitely be back!

Really great spot, at a great location. Located conveniently in the middle of Waikiki. There is a public parking underneath, and a laundromat inside the building. The room is nice and clean, and for being in the middle of Waikiki you are secluded and have a beautiful mountain view’s!

Sherry/Ying are great hosts. They responded very quickly to every message. The check in was easy. The appartment was clean and had everything we needed, little kitchen is handy! In pictures the appartment might seem little bit bigger than it really is though. Location is perfect!

Location is great, just a couple blocks from the beach. The first floor of the building has a 24 hour convenience store. Check in was super easy and quick. I was surprised about the amenities in the place which included; iron, ironing board, a hot plate, pot, pan, dishes, soap and shampoo in the shower, and bottles of water in the fridge. Right across the street is Hula Dog and North shore tacos which are both great.

Location is perfect, few steps to bus stops, few minutes to Waikiki Beach, walking distance to Kalakaua shopping district. Accessibility to anywhere is possible as long as you don't mnd bussing, $5.50 for whole day. Will not mind booking this place again.
Amazing spot, easy walking distance to the shops and beach! Great views! Great room! Would highly recommend this spot!
Excellent location, so much to eat, do and see. Jian is great at responding and a great host! Bare in mind, the room is a little small but is fine for two people :)
ﾋﾞｰﾁから近くて､よかったです｡

This place was one of the better Airbnb’s I’ve ever stayed at. The location is right on the Waikiki strip and it costs less than half of what you would pay per night at any nearby hotel. The bathroom is small but that’s really no big deal. She even leaves a little home manual that details everything from transportation options (the bus stop is steps from the apartment complex) to good places to eat. I will definitely be staying here again in the future!

Appartement parfait pour un couple. Il y avait tout le nécessaire pour moi et mon conjoint. Le logement est à maximum 5 mins de marche de la plage. Il est proche de tous les services(épiceries, dépanneur, arrêt d'autobus, buanderie etc.) C'était ma première expérience et je ne suis vraiment pas déçue. Si vous chercher quelque chose de pas dispendieux et intime, cet endroit est parfait pour vous. Très sécuritaire et le lever du soleil le matin sur la balcon est magique ;')
Great location, solid room, and good value. Perfect for a solo traveler only staying a few nights.

A fantastic place to stay. The hosts are brilliant, really easy to reach  and very accommodating. The location is fantastic with a very short walk to the beach and several restaurants. It’s also very easy to get out and see the rest of the island with a reasonably priced day hire car located in the building. The room itself was plenty big enough for the two of us, was very clean and we were able to cook full meals with ease. Excellent value for money, I would highly recommend to stay here.
Very convenient location in Waikiki, walking distance to all the bars/restaurants/shopping. However parking here is not free, it is $25 for 24 hours.
Very close to everything you need. Nothing was too far of a walk. The apartment was clean and everything worked efficiently.
Very good location! Close to everything and Waikiki beach just need 5 mins walk! Recommend to everyone!
A small place in a big complex, it was fine for a quick stopover and good location to get to the beach - less than 5 min walk.

Jians place is awesome. Very clean and comfortable. Its just a few minutes walk down to the beach and nearby to lots of attraction *hula show *honolulu Zoo . such a great place and value for money. Theres also food trucks nearby for food and a nice 24hrs convenient store. Jian even provided a floatee!

Awesome place to stay!! Literally in the best location being able to just walk to the shops and food places that were on Waikiki. The only thing is the parking, since it’s first come first serve and open to the public it can be hard to get your spot back when coming back at the end. But overall I loved the place and the location. When questions came up Jian responded very fast and upon check in and through out my stay till check out she was there to make sure my stay was great! I highly recommend staying here

This is such a great find in the heart of Waikiki! Everything on the main strip is walking distance, with a bus stop just a few feet away from the front door. I especially loved that there’s a convenience store downstairs and a few doors down as well for any last minute supplies or snacks :) Jian was really quick with communication and everything from check-in to check-out was smooth and easy!

This is a great, little apartment to base your Waikiki adventures out of! The location is amazing - just a couple of minutes and you're at the beach. You've also got the main beachside street of restaurants and shops. The studio is small, but you don't need something big when you're always out and about. The bed was comfy, and it had all the amenities we needed. Balcony was handy for leaving beach towels out to dry for the next day!

Jian is a great host, and replied to any questions I had so quickly - thank you! We had an excellent stay, and appreciated the reasonable cost. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this apartment as a 'home base' for your Waikiki adventures.

Jian’s studio is in an amazing location in Waikiki - about a 3-5 minute walk to the beach. Everything was very accessible and the in unit AC was a life saver. We were so grateful for Jian’s flexibility with early check in and her prompt responses. There is also a car rental shop in the bottom of the building that offers affordable luggage storage ($10/4 bags) which came in handy after check out!

My husband and I really enjoyed our stay here. Great location, quick walk to the beach, shopping, and restaurants. The studio was clean and comfortable and had everything we needed. Jian is very helpful and quick to respond to any messages. Overall a great experience and we will definitely recommend to friends and family!

Jian was very clear with the instructions and updated us with information before and after the stay. The location itself is perfect for spending time in Waikiki, central and easy to get around by foot. Guests should take into account that fee parking is difficult to find and parking on the premise is expensive. Overall, a beautiful and cute studio in a central location with wonderful views every morning of the hills of Oahu. 

Thank you, Jian, for opening up your place to us. Mahalo.
ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝがとてもよくﾚﾝﾀｶｰやﾚﾝﾀﾙﾊﾞｲｸ､ﾚﾝﾀﾙﾓｰﾀｰｻｲｸﾙ､ﾚﾝﾀﾙｻﾙﾌﾎﾞｰﾄﾞなどｱｸﾃｨﾋﾞﾃｨへのｱｸｾｽがｽﾑｰｽで快適でした｡
A nice little spot in a great location.

Such a perfect place near the beach. It has everything you need for a relaxing vacation. It has it's own balcony, which offers a great view of the hills at night and the early morning sky. There's a 24 hour convenient store and laundromat downstairs so you can buy supplies and do your laundry. It's also located near many places to eat, including a lovely vegan friendly place that is less than a minute awat from the building's entrance. It's in the middle of the hustle and bustle of Waikiki, yet it is peaceful and quiet once you get inside the studio apartment.
 Jian, the host, was very communicative from the very beginning and keeps the place beautiful and tidy. You won't find a better spot to spend your nights (maybe even days) than this lovely studio apartment. Highly recommended if you're traveling alone or with a significant other.
Great stay! Perfect location

The apartment was just as described, cozy with the right amount of space for two people. 

It was so conveniently located, we had no troubles finding our way around. A 5-min walk to the beach was just ideal. We had access to so many choices of restaurants, malls and small shops, we barely spent time indoors. 

I’ll recommend this place to anyone.
Was a great stay—stayed just one night and Jian was so helpful with our quick booking and providing information. Fantastic location with lots to do and just a few blocks from the beach!
Great little space and awesome location. Host is very responsive and helpful.
Great place to stay

This was a great place to stay for someone who has never been to Hawaii before. The location is amazing - great food and shops right outside the building. Definitely try the food trucks especially the Hula Dogs truck across the street. The beach is only a few minute walk away. The actual studio apartment is small, but it works for a solo traveler or for 2 people. It was clean and had everything that a traveler would need. Jian is very communicative and if you have any questions, she will answer them. I highly recommend this place.
Small cute studio walking distance to Waikiki beach. Easy parking and close to plenty of restaurants. Would absolutely stay here again, can't beat the price.

We really enjoyed our stay the apartment has a great location.  Check in was super easy thanks to Jian's communication!  The unit is very close to the beach and everything Waikiki has to offer.  The unit has A/C which was great to have in the hot weather.

Jian's place is perfectly located just 2 blocks from the beach, we were able to comfortably go back and forth to the beach a few times a day without feeling like it was a hassle. Lots of great food, shopping and board rentals nearby as well!
The room was just as described: small studio with kitchenette. It was fine for our short stay. It would be too small for a long stay.

Great host, location and space was exactly what we needed. Close to the beach, and great city view. Parking got tough at times as it’s limited spaces but we got lucky every night and was able to get a spot. Would recommend Jian’s place to friends and family and would stay here again without a doubt. Thank you Jian!

I spent seven nights at Jian's place while attending a conference in Waikiki. I found the studio apartment very comfortable, clean with everything I needed. The place is small but it has a balcony and is right in the heart of Waikiki and safe to walk at night. It's also a very good value!
Great place to stay. It was clean, close to the beach, shops, restaurants, etc. we would stay here again. Thanks Jian!
My partner and I enjoyed our time here. It's a small space but it has everything you need. Would definitely stay here again.
Perfect spot. Can walk everywhere in Waikiki. Parking was a bit of a pain if you didn’t want to pay but that’s Waikiki. I definitely will stay there again
Convenient location, clean, secure and private.  Would stay here again.
An efficiency apartment, well located for walkability and bus access in Waikiki.
Great location, clean place, plenty of kitchen utensils. I would recommend this place to anyone.
Great location and Jian is fabulous to deal with

The room is great, exactly as described.  The location could not be any better - right by the beach and close to everything.  I didn't need a car, as everything was within walking distance, along with a nearby bus stop.  Very clean room and great host responsiveness.  I can't recommend this place enough - incredible value!
非常好的地理位置｡房东很热情｡房东会中文

Jian's Waikiki accommodation was just perfect for me and my boyfriend. It is in a prime location and was super clean and easy to check in. Theres everything you need for a convenient stay and its within walking distance to resturants, shops and convenience stores.
Clean and convenient place to stay in Waikiki with everything you need for a good vacation.
Wonderful place!  Comfy bed and lovely lanai, very convenient to Waikiki beach.  Jian made the whole process easy. We’d happily stay here again!
Located in the heart of Waikiki. Easy access to beach restaurants bars bus station etc. Laundry station in the building. Balcony. Easy check-in. I would stay there again!
Perfect location, and Jian was great to communicate with and made the whole experience extremely easy! Would definitely stay here again if we were to come back to Waikiki.
Great location. The space was very clean.

Jian’s place was an excellent value and the location was superb.  The check-in process was very smooth and we had everything that we needed in the unit.  We had absolutely no issues and would happily stay here again.  Thank you Jian!

Jian’s place was awesome. Food trucks next to her place, convenient store at each corner of the streets. Ample restaurants around her place. And most of all Waikiki beach is just a block away. Highly recommended.
Located in the heart of Waikiki- very walkable to many different places around! Clean, simple place to stay. Check in was very easy and Jian was very responsive to messages.
Great space in such a perfect spot in town! She had the best communication to my many questions, definitely recommend this place to others visiting the area!
Great location alil loud for outside noise but great setup for the price and great location could not beat how close to strip we were
房間地點好,房東親切回覆迅速!!很棒的房東

Great studio:  Super clean, icy cold a/c, nice space for casual cooking, excellent shower pressure (not always easy to find in Hawaii), TV programming was clear with many channels to choose from, comfy queen size bed, easy access to everything,  Waikiki just two blocks away. We loved it!

Jian is a wonderful host! She gave us very detailed and timely information in terms of check-in and check-out so there were absolutely no complications. The location is to die for, walking distance to everything! We absolutely loved our stay.
Great location, really close to the beach and other popular places. Will definitely come back and stay here next time :)
Nice little place.  Good place to eat across the street.
Jians place is in an amazing location, we could walk to anything in Waikiki and for the price that is amazing! The apartment was cosy but all we needed for a couple! Thanks for letting us stay Jian!

If you're looking for a no frills but very walkable location in Waikiki, this fits the bill. Just what we needed for an overnight stopover, nothing more, nothing less. Jian was easy to communicate with and left clear instructions for check-in and check-out.

name: H MERIDIANA 1
summary: New furnished,  bright full furnished private bedroom available in a student flat of 4 persons in total (Students). The apartment is 80 sqm big and has a big bathroom with toilet. Also a living room with balcony is available . Fully equipped kitchen. 2 min walking distance away from metro Station CLOT L2. The place has been totally renewed and furniture are new. The apartment has a lift and is at the 5th floor with elevator. To be shared with friendly students coming from all over the world.
description: New furnished,  bright full furnished private bedroom available in a student flat of 4 persons in total (Students). The apartment is 80 sqm big and has a big bathroom with toilet. Also a living room with balcony is available . Fully equipped kitchen. 2 min walking distance away from metro Station CLOT L2. The place has been totally renewed and furniture are new. The apartment has a lift and is at the 5th floor with elevator. To be shared with friendly students coming from all over the world. There is a cleaning plan for common spaces that has to be respected by each tenant once a week
access: There is a cleaning plan for common spaces that has to be respected by each tenant once a week

host.host_about:
Agente intermediaria registrada en España que se dedica en alquiler por meses y de pisos turisticos asi que de B&B
Langues parlées : 
- Anglais
- Espagnol
- Allemand
- Français

name: Club Cliff for a great beach vacation.
summary: Spacious beach haven with modern conveniences. Hampton's style decor. Three level house all to yourself! One floor dedicated to living spaces, open plan kitchen/dining/living rooms with balconies either side. Top floor has main bedroom with ensuite and balcony with water views. Ground floor has two bedrooms, bathroom and study which opens up to backyard. Internal access to double garage. Minutes from beaches, ferry and everything Manly has to offer.  Multiple living spaces, perfect for groups.
space: The living space can grow and enclose as it has a deck either end whose doors at both ends will bifold back to give you one big space full of sun and light. The northerly facing front deck is in sun all day and the rear deck with BBQ makes for fun dinners and cocktails. Beach Shower outside and under the stairs ina cupboard are beach chairs, umbrellas and sunscreen so you can indulge in what makes Manly famous, its beach! The leafy rear garden is wonderful on a hot day to cool off in and share a drink.
description: Spacious beach haven with modern conveniences. Hampton's style decor. Three level house all to yourself! One floor dedicated to living spaces, open plan kitchen/dining/living rooms with balconies either side. Top floor has main bedroom with ensuite and balcony with water views. Ground floor has two bedrooms, bathroom and study which opens up to backyard. Internal access to double garage. Minutes from beaches, ferry and everything Manly has to offer.  Multiple living spaces, perfect for groups. The living space can grow and enclose as it has a deck either end whose doors at both ends will bifold back to give you one big space full of sun and light. The northerly facing front deck is in sun all day and the rear deck with BBQ makes for fun dinners and cocktails. Beach Shower outside and under the stairs ina cupboard are beach chairs, umbrellas and sunscreen so you can indulge in what makes Manly famous, its beach! The leafy rear garden is wonderful on a hot day to cool off in and share a
neighborhood_overview: Like most of Manly Club Cliff is in a street of a mix of houses, townhouses and appartments. A short walk to the corner and you can see the arc of manly beach stretching out in front of you! You can stay quite happily here and not drive at all! The ferry service consists of 2 types, the regular service on large green and Yellow ferry which takes about 45 mins to get from Manly to Circular Quay. Or the Fast Ferry which takes about 20 mins for the same journey. Its a great way to see Sydney's famous harbour and Opera House.
access: Guests have access to all spaces, including the double garage which also has 2 bikes and Kayaks to play with. There is a storage room behind the garage which will be locked and not accessible. Plenty of towels, beach towels and linen is all there. Own front door up a path direct from the street and internal access from garage. It is on 3 levels so there are stairs.
interaction: I wont be available but my co host will be for any questions.
house_rules: - As we are close to the beach please use the beach shower to rinse off sand

host.host_about: Maryanne Kolek from Sydney Australia. I like to walk, go to parks, yoga and kyak. My daughter lives in New York so I hope to travel there more. I dont smoke and neither does my husband.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 39 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Club Cliff was an exceptional property. Great for a family stay in Manly

name: Huge private bedroom in the heart of Manhattan
summary: spectacular private bedroom in UES! a lot of natural lights!
space: You can use kitchen and we will share a bathroom
description: spectacular private bedroom in UES! a lot of natural lights! You can use kitchen and we will share a bathroom you will have your own private bedroom and we will share bathroom, kitchen and living room a lot of bars and restaurants around, everything just around the corner or the same block 5 mins walk to Central Park, 5 mins walk to East River, 2 blocks away from Bloomingdales, close to subway lines N,Q, R, W, 4, 5, 6, F I have a wonderful Turkish angora cat , so please be pet friendly
neighborhood_overview: a lot of bars and restaurants around, everything just around the corner or the same block
notes: I have a wonderful Turkish angora cat , so please be pet friendly
transit: 5 mins walk to Central Park, 5 mins walk to East River, 2 blocks away from Bloomingdales, close to subway lines N,Q, R, W, 4, 5, 6, F
access: you will have your own private bedroom and we will share bathroom, kitchen and living room
house_rules: - please be pet friendly since i have a wonderful turkish angora cat - please take off your shoes when entering apt - please dont talk with neighbors about Airbnb, you just my guests and friends who are visiting - please no noise after 10 pm - please turn off the lights if you're not using it especially for the night time -absolutely NO overnight guests

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm a busy  green architect from NYC, most of the time Im out of my apt. I start to do Airbnb to meet new interesting people and share my experience . I love to travel and enjoy my life.

reviews.comments: Ulyana is a nice, friendly host. But keep in mind that you have to really keep it quiet, because of the neighbors

My stay at Uly's apartment was great! The apartment's location is excellent, next to the most important subways, which take you everywhere! In addition, the size of the apartment is great, specifically the room where I stayed! It is bright, comfortable, with a big bed! It also has a TV (although I did no use it). The whole apartment is very very clean, including the bathroom and the kitchen. The cat is beautiful and friendly (and clean), it should never be a reason for not staying at Uly's. Last, but not least, Uly was an amazing host! She is reachable and flexible, and despite the fact I changed several times the hour I was going to arrive, she waited for me and welcomed with a beer. She is nice and fun; a perfect mate to live with! Next time I travel to NY, I will definitely stay at her apt. Thanks Uly! :)

A+ friendly and helpful host. Great location, literally right next to the subway station, modest yet comfortable  accommodations. She wasn't there often so one typically has the place to himself. The cat is friendly and not a concern. Good value.

I absolutely love staying with Uly!!!
If you see Uly's place is available and fits with your requirements, don't hesitate to book it! Her place is very near to the main-line subway, so you will be safe when you arrive home at night. Uly is so  cute and friendly ... you can ask for help. I enjoyed having a chat with her and bothering her cat ^ ^ (lol). Although at first I was worried because I booked this place only one day before arriving NYC and had no time searching information, but it was very lucky that I found Uly's place! ,,,,, love<3
Had very pleasant stay, large room, very clean aparment with everything I needed. Uly the host is very nice and caring. I'd definitely come again

Mi estadía en el departamento de Uly fue excelente. Uly ha sido una persona sumamente atenta, amable y cordial. El departamento está muy limpio, bien cuidado y la ubicación es excelente (es uno de los barrios más lindos de Nueva York). Muy cerca del Central Park y al lado del subte que te lleva a todos lados. Realmente recomiendo alquilar este departamento!

I enjoyed Uly's apartment.  It is neat and clean, and the bed was very comfortable  It is in a great location, a few blocks from Central Park and very close to two major subway lines.  Very good value.

Uly is my favorite kind of Airbnb host who recognizes hosting as an opportunity to meet interesting new people and share some time together. While not in any way intrusive, she was a gracious and friendly host who made sure I was comfortable and was a fun and  intelligent conversationalist.
Uly's place offers an exceptionally large bedroom and king bed on the 4th floor directly above the M & Q subway station (it's way down there so there was no noise or vibration. There is an elevator. The location makes it easy to get around Manhattan and there are a number of restaurants, bars and shops in the area (my favorite was The Jeffrey).
Uly had coffee available in the morning and Thomas her snow white cat adds to a homey feeling.
I highly recommend Uly's offering to those visiting Manhattan.

I really enjoyed my stay with Uly, her apartment is clean, neat, and centrally located in Upper East Side. The room is quite big, so there is plenty of space. At night, there can be quite a bit of street noise, especially over the weekend. Uly was friendly and helpful, I enjoyed talking to her. Her cat is also very sweet. Uly was gone much of the time, so I had the apartment mostly to myself. 
I definitely recommend Uly's place to stay NYC!

Uly was very good at communicating and flexible. The place is very clean and tidy. It’s located right next to a subway station so excellent for transport. The bedroom is quite large with plenty of storage space and a queen bed. Supermarket nearby. It’s relatively quite residential area but not far from some great bars and midtown.

30min tops to LaGuardia.
Uly is a very good host and all her descriptions 100 % fit. The cat thomas does not bother at all.
Amazing stay and amazing host! Always friendly and accessible to help out :) definitely will visit again!

Uly’s place is great! 
Great location (very walkable to and from shops, restaurants. The metro is literally next to the apartment block entrance). Apartment is very clean and tidy, Thomas the Turkish Angora kitty (very cute and friendly) is a sure bonus. It is exactly what it’s supposed to be.

Uly is a fun, loving host. We shared our stories and get to hang out as part of my stay.

I highly recommend Uly’s place!!!
Uly's place was excellent! Incredibly convenient, clean, and comfortable. It is a tremendous value for this location. Check in was very easy and Uly was very accommodating. Highly recommended!

Uly was a great host. She kindly provided snacks and water when I arrived! She was easy to work with in terms of key coordination and leaving. Her apartment is spacious and quiet, and the king sized bed was great. Her apartment is located right by a subway station Highly recommend!

I had an amazing stay and would highly recommend. It’s a great location, super close to the subway, many shops and restaurants around and very easy to connect to other areas. Also very cute and clean apartment and comfortable bed and room.
Uly's boende var väldigt bra! Rent och fräscht och läget är perfekt för att uppleva NY. Trevlig och välkomnade värd. Rekommenderas verkligen!

Uly is a great host - the room is spacious and comfortable with tall ceilings and good light from two windows. Check in was easy, conversation was enjoyable, and everything was clean. Highly recommended!

Une expérience newyorkaise au summum: emplacement exceptionnel (proche de Central Park, des musées, à la frontière entre Upper East Side et Midtown. Une station de metro littéralement à la porte d'à côté), propreté impeccable, chambre spacieuse et toute équipée (lit de très grande taille, écran plasma). Hôte de grande qualité. Je ne peux que recommender.

I had a wonderful stay!! She is such an amazing host. 
She makes you feel right at home. The small details like snacks, a toothbrush, etc made it all perfect. The location is great! Good neighbourhood and literally a subway around the corner! Will definitely stay here again when I come back to NYC! Thanks again! Xx Laura
Excellent location,  subway station below the building.   Room is so big and clean.  Uly and Thomas are the best host.

Amazing host!

Uly has been great from key collection to the day I left. She has been flexible for key collection, briefed me on what to do in the neighborhood and has been a great person on a day-to-day basis. I have really enjoyed this stay in NYC and can thank Uly for that. 
I highly recommend her as a host.

特别喜欢Uly的家,在她家可以独享一个超大的房间,厕所虽然是共享,但非常干净!公寓有电梯,所以不需要担心提着行李箱爬楼梯~地理位置我觉得还不错,可以步行走到中央公园(大都会博物馆)或者洛克菲勒中心(附近有Moma博物馆)等比较中心的地段｡Uly家的Thomas(白猫)已经五岁啦,但是有一点点凶,不喜欢别人摸他,所以各自岁月安好就好了哈哈｡房间内有暖气,非常舒服,不怕外面寒风阵阵的纽约嘻嘻~非常推荐大家住Uly家(⑉°з°)-♡
Great location and overall pleasant stay!

Uly’s place was spacious, clean, cozy and beautiful! Her place is right next to the subway, super convenient. She also has an adorable cat! Even though I didn’t get the chance to meet Uly, she made the check in and out process really easy.
Uly was a great host. She cares about her guests and goes out of her way to be accommodating.
Great location! Close to the subway, supermarket and coffee shops nearby. 10min to run to Central Park. Large spacious and bright room and Uly left really personal touches! Felt like home!

I just had the best New York experience in the shortest time. Apartment is nice and very well located right above a metro station and close to Central Park. Ulya is a great host, communication was quick and easy in a very friendly way. Room is well equipped with TV and air conditioning and Ulya provided towel and toothbrush. 
Can't wait to come back for a longer stay!

Highly recommended! Uly is a great host! She provided me detailed check in instructions and we had an enjoyable conversation. Uly's place is beautiful, clean and convenient. Her apartment is next to subway station. Her cat, Thomas, is soooooo handsome and smart! I'd definitely come again.

Uly is an amazing host.  She had everything from a welcoming sign with my name (so I know would know where the bedroom was lol), travel bathroom accessories in case I forgot anything, and a convienient digital key pickup box.  The place is large and spacious, especially for nyc, very clean and located in a nice classy neighborhood and safe part of manhattan.  The tv in the bedroom has an embedded roku, so it has netflix etc and you can pair your phone to it too for streaming.  Uly is very sweet, intelligent, kind and offered coffee and breakfast in the morning.  I can't stress enough how welcomed Uly (and her cat!) make you feel at home.  Prob my fav airbnb so far, highly recommend.  I have already saved this and hope to stay again here for future trips to the city!
Believe all the good things you read - all true.  Comfortable, roomy private space; a wonderful host; everything you need; fantastic location
Such a nice space, very roomie for the city. Great located close to attractions, next teh subway, and lots of options to eat and shop.
Uly is simply AMAZING. Thank you for everything! 10/10

Most ouststanding stay. Beautiful, clean, spacious room with a big widescreen TV. Literally next to a subway stop. Most friendly, charming wonderful host - Uly is the best, kindest, most charming host I ever met and I can not recommend her enough!
good place to stay

Uly was an amazing host! She offered me some food and water when I first arrived from a long bus ride. The room is clean and the location is literally next to F and Q train. Would definitely come back next time!

Uli is the best!  The large tv was replete with free movies and shows.  The room and bathroom was  clean. My room came with simple toiletries and the couple pieces fruit was a nice touch. 
 The shopping and dining is vast from Bloomingdales to Goodwill from 24 hour family diners to white table cloth restaraunts.  A definite good find.

Right from the start of my trip till the end Uly helped me out with everything with respect to check-in, giving me recommendations for things to do while in NYC. I can't ask for a better place while i was in NYC. The location is great, easy to get around everywhere. I will definitly recommend Uly's place for anyone who is visiting NYC, she is a great host!

Uly is a friendly host and has an amazing place to stay at in Manhattan. Bedroom is huge and gives you a great space to relax in. Short walk to the major subway lines which makes for an convenient experience of NYC. I would certainly stay again.
Uly is a very good host (hospitality, smiling, good tips) and her flat is in a perfect location in NYC and very clean.. It was a pleasure to stay at her home.
Increíble lugar, limpio y cómodo. Me encanto la estadía con Uly, ¡Excelente persona!

reviews.comments:
The house location is incredibly central, you can reach anywhere with variety of transportation means.
Host is very friendly and attentive, he was great.
House is rather small but cozy, room was clean and adequate.
Overall, it is pretty great if you are not looking for a grandeur house, but a place to rest after travelling in the city all day long.

L'appartement est très bien situé! C'est très facile d'accéder à tous les autres quartiers. La communication avec Evrim était très facile. Il a eu la patience de nous aider avec les vélos et nous a prêté une carte pour les transports en commun. Je recommande vraiment l'endroit!
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: GIANT! Perfect for families, in the center of NYC
summary: Great apartment, We do not do single day rentals...  Steps to everything, Newly renovated and decorated... In the center of New York City! Doorman building, Hardwood floors, Modern loft.. A GEM! Lofts in midtown are rare gems. Modern.  We do live in this apartment it is our full time residence that we rent when we travel. SO NOTE : our stuff is here, clothing...etc... its not a RENTAL ONLY unit but our actual HOME.
space: Our 2 bedroom 2 bathroom loft is spacious, It ALSO has a playroom!!! And loft with pull out sofa upstairs.. VERY KID FRIENDLY. It has a full kitchen and washer dryer, dishwasher,  Queen pull out sofa sleeper, 2 twin beds in the kids rooms, Kitchen has updated appliances, oven full fridge and microwave, dishwasher Flat screen TV's, Very comfortable open space, steam shower. Bedrooms have room darkening curtains, everything you need to be traveling with a family... or if you need SPACE! In the center of Manhattan mid town east central to all shops, Museums, United Nations, playgrounds, nightlife and dining. Close to all subways and buses, Part time doorman. A very unique loft in mid town Manhattan.

Doorman building, Hardwood floors, Modern loft.. A GEM! Lofts in midtown are rare gems. Modern.  We do live in this apartment it is our full time residence that we rent when we travel. In the center of Manhattan mid town east central to all shops, Museums, United Nations, pla
neighborhood_overview: Getting around is easy! We are in the center of New York and close to all attractions, transportation, museums, dining, Everything you come to New York for. Steps to all tourist and business centers.
notes: Fully stocked kitchen, towels, sheets, hair dryer, wifi, all of the comforts of home in a fabulous location and space. Newly decorated and very modern! Electric curtains, anything you need for your stay here in NYC! Playroom , full service this is a home that is normally lived in by a family with 2 children.
transit: There are all major buses and subways steps away as well as easy access to cabs, No car needed. In the center of Manhattan. Ubers, Lifts and walking to anything and everything at your fingertips!
access: Cleaning lady fee is included, They will come every week. Cleaning of sheets and towels weekly included. Door man building, Very large and Very private. Laundry is extra fee payed directly to cleaning lady This is our home so it is more like staying at a family members house rather than a cold rental. The apartment is warm and inviting and we ask you treat our children's things as if they were your own
interaction: NONE, We are avail phone & email but you will have complete privacy and run of the apartment. We travel while we rent out our place.
house_rules: No smoking, No pets, Kid friendly, No wild parties. Please respect our home as if it were your own. This is our primary residence and we rent it when we travel.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Easy going

reviews.comments: Fantastic and quiet location, but still within walking distance of 5th Avenue. Extremely well appointed apartment with all amenities that may be needed. We had a great time and we can absolutely recommend this home. Excellent communication with the host who really went out of her way to make us feel welcome and at home.

Izzy and her apartment are both amazing. It was such a great, easy process. Communication was wonderful, any questions we had Izzy responded to immediately. As for the apartment, it is fantastic. The photos don't do it justice. It was an amazing place to stay, lovely and clean and so so quiet and just perfect as a base to explore NY. Izzy also left a lovely 'care package' with lip balms etc in the bathroom. The apartment had everything you would want. A wonderful place.

Izzy is a great host!  She's very friendly and responsive.  The loft is GORGEOUS! Very well decorated and has everything you ever needed!  Great mid-town east location, surrounded by awesome restaurants!  Will definitely stay there again!  Thank you Izzy! :-)
The reservation was canceled 32 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Izzy's apartment is the perfect location in midtown east. It's a spacious and well maintained apartment, close to every amenity including many restaurants and supermarkets. The hosts are welcoming and were very responsive in case of any queries. Perfect for a long trip and I would love to stay here again!
The reservation was canceled 68 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Izzy was a great host.  She was very helpful in answering questions both before and after booking.  The building was great (very friendly doormen!) and apartment was just as described.  Very spacious by NYC standards!

Izzy was very responsive with our questions upon our arrival as well as beforehand.  The neighborhood is fabulous with grocery stores, a great patisserie, restaurants, etc. all within half a block.  The doormen were also very helpful with suggestions.  Instead of the two big screen TV's in the living room, as pictured, there is now a HUGE pull-down screen the length of the bookcases with a projector-type TV.  The guys loved it for the final NCAA basketball game.  The apartment is on the ground  floor and even some of the passers-by on the street commented on the size of the screen.  There is a Sonos sound system operated by an iPad that the owners provide that we loved as well.  The bedrooms are in the back with windows that open and at night, even with the windows open, it was very quiet. The two cribs plus a bassinet, tub toys, etc. make it very infant friendly.  However, there is a circular stairway that leads to a loft which is not kid-friendly in the sense that there are no barriers other than the one railing to prevent falls to the lower level.  Izzy was kind enough to let us use the sofa-bed upstairs in the office for our adult son who was with us for part of our stay. The kitchen is very well stocked as this is an apartment that is lived in when not rented.  Closet space was a bit tight.  This really is a HUGE apartment for New York and it was so nice to be able to relax comfortably when we weren't out exploring.  We even had a Sunday brunch for 11 people who, like us, were in town for a wedding and there was more than enough room for us all.  Highly recommend.

Having arrived in NYC late afternoon our driver dropped us off at what we thought was the right address.....panic started to set in when we couldn't find the apartment! As it turned out, I had incorrectly recorded the address and the apartment building was only some 20m up the road.  When I called Izzy, she responded promptly and welcomed any further contact or queries we might have; the doorman had our key and was expecting us.  The apartment was great it, accommodated the four of us well with plenty of space to relax after the long and adventurous days in New York. The apartment had a theatre set up which was great for watching movies.  The apartment location was perfect for us with lots of great restaurants within walking distance, which meant we didn't have to go far for late night dinners.  There was a supermarket around the corner on 2nd Ave which again was very convenient and  great bagel shop on 3rd Ave which the kids really enjoyed for breakfast.
Thank you Izzy. We had a great time. We felt truly at home.

Oh my goodness! Wonderful space, remarkably quiet.  Lovely amenities.  Beds just heavenly and you float away!  Best of all location: we are theatre buffs and went to Broadway twice: in a cab it would have been a nightmare (traffic solid) but we had a very pleasant 20-min stroll there and back both nights.  When we did take the tube so easy: 2 short blocks from mainline tube taking you north and south.  One of our favourites became the fabulous grand central station (only 10 minutes away): famous oyster bar, balcony bars to people watch and the extremely interesting and hidden Campbell  bar

A fantastic place from which to explore New York!

My family and I stayed at Izzys home for 3 nights. The apartment is in a great location, close to midtown , walking distance to great restaurants, shopping and all that nyc has to offer. 
The apartment is a perfect place to stay. It's clean, well equipped with anything you may need - kitchen, linens, tv, wifi, and it feels warm as if you're staying in your own home. Izzy was an exceptional host,  she included all info we needed to make our stay run smooth and was available to answer questions. 
My family and I would stay at Izzys home again in a New York minute!

The Force is strong with this one!
My family and I had a total blast staying at Izzy's beautiful home. This was the best Airbnb experience I've had, and will likely remain the best indefinitely! The home is SO elegant, it is a real treat. We loved everything about it. Izzy conveniently left a House Manual throughout the house, instructions were very clear and helpful. Izzy was consistently responsive, and just an awesome host! (She should be an Airbnb Ambassador ;) )The doormen were extremely courteous as well, we even received recommendations for New Years Eve celebrations which turned out to be spectacular! The icing on the cake for me was the abundance of Jedi Master Yodas scattered throughout the house.
All in all, staying at Izzy's made our NYC holiday vacation AMAZING!  Definitely hope to stay in the Giant Loft again in the future!

The description was very accurate.  This place was perfect for our family with two little kids. Izzy was quick to respond to any questions that I had.  Apartment was clean and well maintained. I will definitely stay here again!

Izzy was a great host! I am spoiled now- this was my first Airbnb experience and it was so good. I can't imagine staying anywhere else when I visit New York City!
The home was large and comfortable with all the amenities that one would need. I felt like I was staying at a really cool friends house. I highly recommend and will be back!
Thank you Izzy!
Great apartment! It was perfect for our needs and Izzy was a great host. Looking forward to booking again next year.

Although we never met our host check-in went smoothly and the doorman was there to give us our keys even though we were late arriving given delays at JFK. The apartment is centrally located in a great area with a 24hr grocery store 1 block away. The apartment has all the amenities as advertised with a well equipped kitchen which makes a family holiday much  more enjoyable.

This is a fabulous large, stylish apartment in a great location in Midtown East - centrally placed for all sightseeing but still feels like you are living in a stylish neighbourhood as a local. 
The apartment is very well decorated and appointed and super comfortable to live in.   The living room is a great communal space and the bedroom was very comfortable. 
Izzy was a generous host leaving not only a bottle of champagne for our NYE celebrations, but also a thoughtful basket of "necessities" in the bathroom for use during our stay.   The location is a favourite of ours,  well catered for by many local restaurants and bars, cinemas and corner stores, but also walking distance to the theatre district, 5th Avenue and a short cab ride to uptown or down.   
We had a wonderful stay at Izzy's Place and recommend it highly for the perfect Manhatten stay.

Izzy place is the kind of location you don't want to write a positive review of, for fear that it will be harder to book in the future. Izzy was a great host and more than accommodating when we had to extend our stay for an extra day when we were snowed in. Thank you for the wonderful stay and letting my family use your home. I hope others enjoy it as well.

This is our go to place for NYC!  Perfect for our family as it is made for travelers with small children.  The apartment is spacious and comfortable.  Will always try to stay here during our visits to the city!
This is a fantastic, huge, modern, comfortable apartment, very well appointed, it's almost unbelievable and in central Manhattan!

Perfect place to stay! Clean, spacious, well-appointed, beautifully decorated, great location, and near many subway lines! Included all the comforts of home. Izzy was a wonderful host and always responded to messages right away. Would recommend this place highly to anyone!
Great location. Great size for midtown, was perfect for two parents and a teenager visiting colleges and enjoying Manhattan. I would return.
Great location, great place: a paradise for a familly, specially for little kids

Just what we were looking for in Mid-Town. Izzy's home was accurately represented. Communication with her was quick and helpful. Doormen were awesome and very helpful. Walkable to most attractions. Plenty of local restaurants and subway within a few blocks. Looking forward to returning to her home again on our next trip!

We have a 10 month old and this was her first trip away from home.  The spacious home is very kid-friendly and we were able to keep the baby comfortable in what would probably be a stressful first experience away from home.  The playroom and nursery definitely helped out!  With easy access to the Metro, we had the entire city (and more!) within walking distance.  Thank you Izzy!  We definitely look forward more trips to the city now that we know of a great place to stay for children!

Izzy is an easy going warm hostess. She is always available to address questions or concerns. The apartment is exactly as it's featured in photos, a spacious tastefully decorated oasis in midtown Manhattan with luxurious touches like firm comfortable beds, central air, and plush towels. Highly recommended.

A wonderfully amazing place. Super clean. Very spacious.  So close to everything in east midtown. Very friendly and helpful doormen. Izzy had everything you could want and much, much more. Perfect for families of all ages. A perfect stay in Manhattan. Convenient to market and restaurants.

Izzy and her home were great. Izzy was SUPER responsive and able to accommodate us on such quick notice. Her home is clean, cozy (really a home away from home type of feel) and offers great amenities (wifi, coffee maker, larger kitchen space for NYC). Checking in is super easy and the area is close to many of New York's finest places for dining, attractions and shopping, even though I was there on business. Couldn't have been happier. Thanks, Izzy!!

Veldig flott og stor leilighet. Lå i 1. etg men begge soverom mot stille bakgård. Rolig gate. Stille til å være på Manhatten. Var trygt å gå rundt i området. Restauranter og matbutikk rett i nærheten. Kul og moderne leilighet. Perfekt for familie med 2 voksne og 2 barn, men har sovesofa på hems om man er flere. Vi var 5 ( 2 voksne, barn 17, 16 & 8). 2 flotte bad og veldig bra kjøkken. Kjempegode senger og luftig og god plass. Veldig enkelt med doormen og sikkert med 2 dører før man kom inn til døren til leiligheten. Gitter foran vinduer. Moderne aircondition med både kjøling og varming. Generelt en varm leilighet om man reiser om vinteren. Vasking er inkludert i leien. Izzy var på ferie, men svarte raskt på spørsmål hele veien. Kule møbler, designelementer og innredning. Romslig og fin leilighet. Absolutt verdt prisen.

Izzy’s place was a great experience for our family with young kids and a baby! The location is great, apartment cozy and full of toys. Highly recommended for any family planning to enjoy a Manhattan experience!

We had an amazing time! The place is just like in the pictures. Izzy was really prompt with any questions we had and very nice to give us early check in and late check out.
It's a stunning apartment, with possibly everything you may need. It's perfect if you are travelling with young kids as there is a great play room with really quality toys. Great doorman, and perfect location. When we go back to NY, this place would be our first choice!

Hvis du tager til NYC med børn - så er Izzys lejlighed et helt perfekt valg! Vores to børn på 1 og 3 år var vildt begejstrede over legetøj, badekar og bilsengene. Beliggendheden er klart i et roligt kvarter og alligevel er alt det spændende i gåafstand. En perfekt kobling til at opleve byen uden stress og jag. Super hurtigt og god kommunikation med Izzy - den varmeste anbefaling på alle leder og kanter!

name: Chambre double- à deux pas du métro
summary: Je propose une grande chambre double avec bureau. Beaucoup d'espace pour vos valises.  Un appartement spacieux, à deux pas du métro. Accès au centre-ville en 10 min. Si vous êtes en voiture, il est facile de se stationner dans la rue en face. C'est vraiment l'emplacement idéal pour venir profiter de Montréal.

reviews.comments: We stayed at Ève's room for 3 nights and we liked it quite much, even though we never met her. We had a metro ticket for one full week and we only had to walk two minutes which is very good with heavy bags.
Eve's house is nice, in a great location and very close to subway station. It is perfect for a cheap weekend in the city!

I had high expectations from the pictures of the place and my short conversation with Eve. Taking that into account, the experience still highly surpassed my expectations. Eve is an amazing person that is more a friend than a host after having met her for a few minutes.
