reviews.comments: They were very responsive, offers help all the time. The place is small as expected of HK but sufficient for one or two people, especially if out for most of the day.
All in all very good value. Very close to the mtr and many restaurants around.

Very clean room and nice value. Definitely worth the stay. Not a lot of space but it is Hong Kong. It is a little hard to find in the complex and other people may harass and try to sell you a room if you look lost, but just go to the A block set of elevators (should be on your left shortly after entering from the Main Street) and go to 16th floor before taking the stairs up to the 17th  easy to find from there.

People running the place are great, but the conditions and surrounding areas weren't. It was a convenient spot, so if you don't really care much about what the rooms looked like it should be fine. I wouldn't stay there again.

Really nice staff. Helpful and attentive. They let me stay in a double rather than a single room even though I booked a single room. The room was clean, and shampoo and soap are for free. The toilet is a bit small, but that is to be expected in Hong Kong.
位置绝对棒,离香港中文中心特别近,步行就好啦,地铁尖沙咀
Nice
位置绝佳
had to stay overnight in hong kong due to typhoon weather. got a room at cebu's and found it to be adequate for a budget hostel. bed length is not suitable for people over 5'9".
this price is good, also the location, but sometime you need to waite for elevator.
女孩子一个人千万不要住!女孩子不要住,女孩子不要住重庆大厦!门口全是黑人和印度人,上楼梯也是,真的很恐怖,我每次都需要房东送我下去,或者接我!房东是印度小伙,虽然人不错,但是周边环境很糟糕啊!女孩子一个人会很恐怖!房间其实很简陋,马桶还是破的,门锁也是坏的,感觉被人撬开来过!建议大家不要轻易尝试!
位置在尖沙咀重庆大厦17楼,出地铁口就能看到了,坐车很方便,房间很小,但挺干净的,洗漱也方便,就是热水一定要调好,不然会烫死,房东很热情就是不会说中文,楼下很多黑人开始有点吓到,但还好,微笑点头打招呼就行了
As others have said lobby crowded and lift slow but taff friendly and room and bathroom clean and efficient

Passably clean with a friendly host, this place is best suited to backpackers who have a tolerance for imperfections. I was moved to the Sydney Hostel, which I think is affiliated with Cebu Hostel and are used interchangeably. As a result the listing photos were decidedly inaccurate. The room was small and the sheets, while probably clean, were old and purple (not new and white as the photos show) and had a stale smell to them. Neither the TV nor the hot water worked and while the internet was reliable for a few days, it stopped working and never came back on for my last 20 hours even though I notified the host and he repeatedly promised to get it working again. Overall, you get what you pay for and whether you find this place comfortable or not depends on your standards.
不錯
Good location to be and really kind people. Would book it again! :)
位置很好
The hotel itself is not bad, good value if you are not expecting to much. However the building it is in can be very dangerous. Do you recommend it
Friendly hosts.
Place was nice and neat overall (Inside premises).
Good value and location. The only negative I had was that the towel they gave me was really dirty, and the elevator doesn't go all the way up to the rooms. Have to walk up the last flight.
性价比很不错,值得一住

比想象中好很多,十分的干净舒适
性价比极高,期待下次入住
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great place for your great price :)
Clean room

Cebu Hotels look nowhere else. You get a well stylish modern place with the overall place being quiet and Comfy. Everything was Clean & Really the best for you buck. 30 Sec away Is the I square mall and many many restaurants, fast foods, shopping, nearby plus TST Station is literally across the street. Thanks very much Cebu Hotels. - Calvin Chen
I had a great stay, thank you
Good location. Close to bus stop to airport
I was put in a newly remodeled room. Very clean and nice. Highly recommended.
很干净,管理比较好,没有闲杂人等｡基础的用品都有提供,适合一两天的将就
Rooms were okay. You get what you pay for. The staff were friendly and responsive. The overall building looked a bit shady though
不错 推荐~招待很热情❤️
Чистота немного хромает. В целом нормально для данной стоимости проживания. Есть фен, банные принадлежности, по ночам тихо.

summary: 3 mins walk to Hung Hom Station, Cafes, restaurants , supermarket ! close to everything !! Thank you very much
description: 3 mins walk to Hung Hom Station, Cafes, restaurants , supermarket ! close to everything !! Thank you very much

reviews.comments: Kristina is a warm outgoing host. You'll never feel bored staying or talking with her. Her place is clean, tidy and convenient. Great choice if you visit Hong Kong!
Kristina 房東回復很有效率而且還幫助及介紹了我們跟多香港好去處,包括購物啊,休閑啊,酒吧啊｡房子位置十分的好,很市中心,紅磡直通車出來幾分鐘就到｡下次有機會再來肯定再回入住｡
Very nice flat. Clean, easy check in an perfect communication. I come back.
brand new facilities, best connected spot in Hung Hom.

The apartment was great and Kristina was very helpful. Neighborhood was peaceful and the metro station, shops and restaurants was near. The apartment was nice and clean and there were everything that you need in a vacation. All in all great place to stay.
地点是蛮方便的,走路大约5分钟就到港铁何文田站｡从飞机场直接乘搭机场巴士然后步行大约10分钟就到了｡房子也和照片一样,也很干净｡只是那一区是殡仪服务行业集中区｡
We really like this apartment. Cozy, clean and comfortable. Location is perfect for walking and running. Thanks Kristina
離地鐵很近~居住環境乾淨還有廚房可以煮泡麵!還蠻棒的~
깨끗하고 괜찮습니다. 다만 처음에 숙소까지 걸어야하고 찾아야하는데 살짝 헤맬 수 있습니다. 숙소엔 수건이 많이 준비되어 있지 않으니 근처 빨래방을 이용하던지 수건을 챙겨가세요

Kristina's place was great. The location was good as it was close to two MTR stations on different lines, including one that goes to the mainland Chinese boarder. It was very clean, quiet, well equipped and quite large for a Hong Kong apartment. Communication was great. There was a bit of confusion regarding sofa bed set up. However this was quickly and efficiently resolved by her great team. They even did a bit of tidying:). A great stay in a fantastic city. I recommend her place to anyone wishing to stay in Hong Kong. 

Kristina's 的房子非常好｡很干净还有舒服｡地区方便. 2 个MTR站不远｡

This apartment is great. Its quite small but looks good. 
The only discomfort we had is mortuary in 100meters.

Location is actually pretty good, walking distance from MTR and major street. Only downfall is that it is right across a funeral home, and the location is on a small street filled with coffins, and other funeral equipment stores. Other than that, no complaints at all.
Great location and closer to MTR. Kandy was great and accommodating when we needed to drop our bags early before check in. Would recommend!
very clean and tidy. close to MTR. nice host and a nice place.
Five stars host with five star service, if I ever need to stay in that areas again I will book this again with no further looking. Highly recommended

Place has all the essentials, close to everything, nice neighborhood, security, great room set-up. The owners communication was quick and efficient, even when assisting with transportation the owner gave more than enough details. Awesome Air Bnb service all around!

Kristina's place is perfect. I stayed for one month while working in Hong Kong and could not have chosen a better place and location. Short walking distance to two MTR stops, plenty of food shopping nearby, and 15 minutes walk to Victoria Harbour just a little beyond Whampoa Shopping Centre where you can run, walk, walk over to Tsim Sha Tsui, have a drink on the terrace or just enjoy the view of Hong Kong Island. It's a magical place and few people seem to know it. The apartment has everything one could possibly need and would be perfect for a couple. Will book again if the opportunity to stay in Hong Kong for a longer period of time presents itself again. Everything worked perfectly and check-in and check-out could not have been easier.
Host was very responsive and the place was nice and close to public transport!

Kristina did a great job with her listing! She even allowed us to drop off our luggage, even before check-in. The place is very clean and convenient. Roughly around 5-7min walk from MTR. Her family were great with informing us how to get in, use things, and were very attentive. They will respond to your message asap!

As it has already been mentioned before, coffins and other funeral stuff is sold on the street around the place. If this does not bother you, you will definitely not be disappointed by this apartment.

If you are also OK with a host who is permanently unavailable and does not respond to your messages, the place is a very good option to stay at while in Hong Kong. 

A rather convenient and cheap supermarket is within 7-10 minutes walk. All transport is within 5-10 minutes on foot.

The Internet is very fast. The kitchen is fully equipped (including a large fridge).

The apartment can comfortably accommodate 2-3 people. 

Everything was fine despite an absolutely unavailable host.
Kristina’s place is great—she is extremely communicative and helped us with everything we needed. Thanks again Kristina!
交通方便 房东也很好客
Comfortable place to stay. Very helpful and thoughtful people. I would recommend this place.

Awesome value! The unit is clean, and has all the essentials. Kandy was super helpful and responsive, too. Even the neighbours we ran into at the building entrance were nice. It’s only five minutes away from Ho Man Tin station (MTR), so you can reach Central, TST, and other popular tourist spots in no time. The neighbourhood has an old-fashioned charm, and there’s a seven eleven nearby in case you want some cold beer after a long day of sightseeing.

It was amazing stay at Kristina apartment.. it was super clean and tidy.. perfect for 2 .. Hung hom station is 10 minutes walk away for the gate B1 for mtr and D6 gate for intercity trains ( to Guangzhou/Shanghai/etc)... Both mtr (to hung hom station) & bus (e23 to 14th stop)   are convenient & cheap for apartment drop from Airport.. locality is good too.. all household stuff there in apartment.. Highly recommended.. Thank you kristina & kandy..

Excellent apartment almost in the heart of Hong Kong. Only 5 stops on the bus to Star Ferry Pier and the Garden of the Stars. Near two metro stations. 10 minutes walk to the district Whampoa where many shops of famous brands, restaurants, supermarkets.
The apartment is located in the quarter of funeral services.
Kristina is a great host. She helps very in any question.
The place is new,clean and tidy.Full ameneties peovided.
Communication was perfect and promt. Easy check in.  Kristina was very helpful. I definately recommend it! Apartment was cosy and nice.

Kristina's place was close to two train stations: Hung Hom and Ho Man Tin which was very convenient. A small supermarket and 7/11 was also close by.

As mentioned in previous comments, the apartment is in a district where coffins and funeral items are sold. 

Unfortunately, the host performed pest control a day before we arrived at the apartment, so there was a strong unpleasant smell for a couple of days, and we also saw a few cockroaches running around. The host did offer for a cleaner to come clean up the cockroaches. Apart from that, the place was very decently sized and clean.
The house to small and not even enough space for 3 people.

The AirBnB pictures and description of the apartment were accurate.
All communications were helpful and prompt.
Great place and great deal for a flat in HK!
Very nice!
It’s a nice apartment. It is very close to downtown and has convenient transportation. Had a good time here
Kristina’s apartment was very clean and in close proximity to the MRT - very convenient!
Everything is good!
Good for single occupancy

To get there the nearest MTR station is ho man tin, which just 300m away from its place, The bed was tidily arranged, the entire place was clean, the amenities are as per noticed by the host, good wifi connection. Suitable for Young traveller. 
but for family with children and eldery, and those that particular on superstition thing might need to think twice as the place quite near to the funeral house and store related to it. Nonetheless, overall was great.

Also Because i was traveling with my baby and my mom who  is above 60ies, KRistina being so thoughtful to let me have the extra hour for late check out which we are so appreciated~
perfect location , very clean and stylish
My overnight stay at Kristina’s was amazing to say the least! The check-in process is easy, the place is clean, and is easily accessible by subway. Would highly recommend!

욕위옫이맛에요
아니 증말.. 포데이동안 숙언을 넥에나 주는데 이게 말이나 됩니까??
갈로면 센투랄로 가세옹

For the price, this space is quite large for what you can find in Hong Kong. The apartment is very modern and has a lot of thoughtful amenities like a flat iron with an ironing board, washing machine, hair dryer, clips for your washed clothes.

It was important for my friend and I to find a place that was not absurdly cramped, had a table where we can do work, and fast WiFi. This location was pretty spacious, the table in the listing photos can be expanded, and the internet was over 120 Mbps and was very stable.

Location-wise, it's right in between Ho Man Tin and Hong Hum MRT stations. It takes around (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) minutes to walk to one of the stations. It's also very close to a bus stop.

There was some minor concerns over cleanliness regarding some trash and communication was initially a little bit slow and done on (Hidden by Airbnb) .

Before you book anything, you need to know that this spot is in the heart of the funeral district. It means that the first things you'll see when you walk out the front door are shops selling funeral flowers, coffins, and urns. This really wasn't a big deal for us as there's always people walking around the neighborhood. In fact, it was nice that this area wasn't as crowded. It's nice to go from shoulder-to-shoulder in the MRT or Mong Kok to a place that's a bit less in-your-face.  If I was superstitious or was staying here alone, I might have had second thoughts. However, the stay was very pleasant and I would even consider coming back for another stay.

The host rarely reply message and not fast reply that might show a bit unfriendly and unhelpful as us first time travel there. The place is suitable for three people max only because the space is small and limited for movement. During our stay the room door is not functioning well that cause uncomfortable stay for us. The place is nearby to MTR and about 5 minutes walk.
性价比超高!就是楼下还是要一段爬楼梯,婴儿车不方便

name: Amazing Gardens in Oceanfront Resort 8202
summary: Cool and breezy second story, two bedroom two bath resort condo. Spectacular garden and golf course views, huge lanai, central A/C with wonderful tropical furnishings and 16 acres of oceanfront grounds to enjoy. Secluded beach and a great pool and tennis complex included. No resort or use fees. The resort is right in the middle of the Keauhou Hawai’ian Heritage Corridor, surrounded by authentic Hawaiian history and scenery.
space: Welcome to Kona, traditional birthplace of Hawai'ian Ali'i! Situated directly on the ocean side of world famous Ali'i Drive, There is no better location. Amazing garden views just a short walk across the grounds from the black sand and coral beach and the newly renovated pool. A second story unit, there is great privacy from the oversized lanai that overlooks the tropical gardens. Parking space is right by the front door for easy access to your unit.  If your party is too large for a single unit, we have two other nearby units in the complex as well! On the Kona side of the Island, we are over 100 miles from the eruptions.  The effects of the activity is not felt on this side of the island, however if you and to see the lava flows, helicopter and boat tours are available for a once in a lifetime experience  Full kitchen with granite counters and fully stocked with everything you need for those gourmet meals made with the local ingredients you picked up at the weekly farmers market, jus
description: Cool and breezy second story, two bedroom two bath resort condo. Spectacular garden and golf course views, huge lanai, central A/C with wonderful tropical furnishings and 16 acres of oceanfront grounds to enjoy. Secluded beach and a great pool and tennis complex included. No resort or use fees. The resort is right in the middle of the Keauhou Hawai’ian Heritage Corridor, surrounded by authentic Hawaiian history and scenery. Welcome to Kona, traditional birthplace of Hawai'ian Ali'i! Situated directly on the ocean side of world famous Ali'i Drive, There is no better location. Amazing garden views just a short walk across the grounds from the black sand and coral beach and the newly renovated pool. A second story unit, there is great privacy from the oversized lanai that overlooks the tropical gardens. Parking space is right by the front door for easy access to your unit.  If your party is too large for a single unit, we have two other nearby units in the complex as well! On the Kona sid
neighborhood_overview: Keauhou Kona Surf and Racquet Club is a unique resort. It is in a historical area, the birthplace of King Kamehamea II. There are ancient temple ruins right in the middle of the property, and many very close by, including several large stone temple platforms on the adjacent beach that go right out into the water and are surrounded by ancient Hawaiian fish ponds. Petroglyphs are scattered around the area to find. Apart from the amazing history, the complex has amazing mature plantings that will take your breath away. The complex is meticulously maintained.  The nearly private beach and the cliff walk with the crashing surf are amazing.  The new pool is first rate and quite large. The property is so close to everything, yet you have ample space with 15 acres to explore and enjoy. The quiet demeanor of the complex is enchanting. So whether you want to relax by the pool, watch the surf crash against the black lava cliffs , hang at the beach or sit on the lanai under the monkey pod trees wi
notes: Please note: Smoking in the unit or on the lanai is not allowed and may result in damage fees being assessed.
transit: Busses and the Kona Trolley run regular schedules up and down Ali'i Drive.
access: The entire 16 acre site is at your disposal, from the ocean cliff walk to the secluded beach and the gardens, pool and free tennis and volleyball courts and bar-b ques. Due to cleaning scheduling requirements,  we are sorry but late check outs are generally not available. Non smoking unit, including the lanai.
house_rules: - We do ask that you remove your shoes before you enter the house, in the Hawai'ian style. It keeps your home free of sand and the red dirt that gets everywhere.  If you like, you may find that it is helpful to have a set of slippers inside the door to slip on for inside only.  Please no wet or pool wear on the furniture.  Mahalo

host.host_about: Passenger train conductor on the mainland, USN Submarine Service veteran.

reviews.comments: Very well equipped apartment. Great neighbourhood. Brad was very friendly. Perfect for families. Double check the apartment details with brad before check-in.
The condo is in convenient location and walking distance to beach, shopping and restaurants.  We enjoyed the fully equipped kitchen!

We had a great time at Brad's place.  The location was great (away from the crowds of downtown Kona) with a nice garden view from the second floor.  We loved having breakfast on the spacious lanai...very relaxing!  The unit was very clean and Brad provided most everything we needed for a pleasant stay.  The pool was very nice and the kids loved having that option when they wanted a break from the beautiful beaches.  The tennis courts looked nice, but for some reason were closed during our stay.  There was no AC and we were there during a very hot/humid time period which made it a bit uncomfortable, but overall, we'd stay again and recommend! Brad was super responsive and great to work with!

The condo was beautiful, the location perfect!  Directions and checking in, getting settled were all smooth. The condo had everything needed for a wonderful stay. The only downside I had was the lack of air conditioning.  That being said, it was my mistake to assume and not ask! Every room, including the bathrooms, had ceiling fans plus there were additional floor fans available.  I came to the realization that we are spoiled Oregon girls not used to the island heat and humidity!  Aside from that, it was an awesome stay and I would do it again in a heartbeat!

Brads place is very nice with a large covered open patio. No Air Conditioning but lots of ceiling fans.  Two bathrooms makes it great for families.  He has soft cooler, beach chairs, boogie board.  Nice Kitchen with dishwasher, dishes, pots and pans to cook if you wish.  WiFi was clocked at 15 Mbps.  Balcony looks towards a lush thicket of trees with birds about 100 feet away.   Thanks Brad.

Four of stayed at Brad's place and we had a great vacation.  We really enjoyed having coffee in the morning on the lanai listening to the birds.  Everything we needed was there from beach towels and chairs to the blender for fruit smoothies.  We also enjoyed going to the pool to cool off on hot afternoons.
The location was quiet and it was an easy to get to other places we wanted to go.
Brad is very responsive and the flat is very well appointed.
Overall everything was seamless. Brad was super responsive with my many questions and the place worked great.

As advertised and then some. Nice clean home to stay in with a 1 minute walk to the lava cliffs overlooking the ocean or a 3 minute walk to a sandy beach. I would for sure stay here again. Brad was always prompt in replaying to my questions as well. Mahalo!
Excellent location. Brad gave us tons of great info on places to check out. The place is quiet and we slept great.
Nicely appointed condo and surrounding grounds.
Brads place is a great place! It's clean and spacious and close to the ocean and downtown.

Brad's place is a spacious apartment in a great complex.  It is well located to Southern Kona.  The complex is on a quiet beach area and also has a great pool.  The apartment is quiet and well sized.  The complex is only minutes from a shopping center that has everything.  Brad is a great host.  Overall we really enjoyed our stay. 

However, I found the kitchen to be poorly equipped with no proper cutting knives, limited cooking tools such as wooden spoons or a colander, and it had only small number of plates/bowls.  When I gave this feedback to the manager he went out immediately and purchased those items for me.  The apartment is also ageing: the washing machine broke down while we were there (but it was replaced with a big brand new one), the dishwasher did not work great so I ended up hand washing everything, and the carpets were ageing.  The blinds also do no close well in the master, which let in a lot of light at night.  But we found it to be good value.
We had very good vercation in the big island. Brad's house is perfect for our family.
Perfect locale, beautiful condo and so comfortable with the five of us. The grounds are stunning and we enjoyed the pool too! We would stay here again for sure!
Great spot! The grounds are beautiful. The condo is clean and has everything we needed minus boogie boards which we bought and left behind.  The owner was super responsive! We will be back!
Nice place to stay, well appointed. Large condo with great garden view Lanai . Great pool with nice shallow end for kid's. I believe that Brad's is a good value in Kona, we will be back.

Very nice condo with nice garden views. Quick walk to the pool or to the ocean and located near a great snorkeling beach and close enough to Kona to get to easily but not so close that we felt like we were in the buzz of a downtown area.

Our stay at Brad's place was excellent. The condo was large, clean with full size kitchen and laundry. We are a family of four and our stay was comfortable. There are fans in each room as there is no central AC. This was not an issue for most nights except for two, which were bit warm and humid.  There is a shopping center nearby and downtown is few minutes away. There is an assigned parking space for  your rental car. The state's best beach, Hapuna beach, is 30-40min local drive. There are tennis courts, outdoor grill and pool on the property. Brad provided beach towels, chairs (4), umbrellas (2) and beach mats, He is super responsive and provided tips for best places to visit during our vacation. Rental car is a must.

The accommodation was exactly as described. The grounds are so quiet and lovely.  The kitchen was very well stocked and made in home cooking quite easy. We had a question and it was answered immediately by Brad. It was a lovely stay!

Perfect location south of Kona. Laid back and relaxing. Wonderful large lanai facing a garden area. We were out there most of the time. Everything we needed was there including an extra snorkel set, beach towels, umbrella, cooler and boogie boards. Beautiful decor and accessories. We will return!

Wonderful place to stay and relax, fully equipped on amazing beautifully maintained surroundings. The pool and BBQ areas were very nice to have and the ocean was just steps away. Nice and secure area within closeness of shopping areas and Kona just a few miles away.

Brad's place is definitely as described. The place is updated with all the amenities needed to make it a great stay. The lanai gives a nice and cozy look to a garden like setting. The master bedroom has private doors to the lanai as well and the Japanese style doors adds a fabulous touch. 
Brad was quick to answer all questions we had and may sure our stay was as comfortable as we expected it to be. He truly is a superhost and we're definitely looking forward to staying at his place in the future.
Nice stay

Brad’s Condo was exactly my sister and I needed for our first trip to the big island :). Beds and sheets were comfortable, shops and groceries nearby, condo itself was clean, nicely decorated and furnished with beautiful scenery facing the garden. We personally didn’t use the grills or pool but saw groups enjoying the outdoor area on our walk to the Oceanside to watch the sunset. being an asthmatic my biggest concern was vog in the area, but I had no issues at all. The volcanic erruption didn’t interrupt our trip except for keeping us off parts of the island, I highly recommend ! 

Oh and the bag of coffee was greatly appreciated :)
The condo was beautiful. My favorite was the lanai. You could enjoy the beautiful landscaping and birds. It felt like ones own private paradise.
房间很好,舒适,装修风格精致完美,设施齐全,躺在床上看窗外很独特｡

Big appartment, good location, with a lot of equipments (tennis, golf, for the Beach, towels,...).
It’s a great place to stay !

We loved our stay at Brad's beautiful, garden-view condo in Kona!  This home is very clean, comfortable and well supplied with everything needed to feel at home and have an enjoyable vacation.  A convenient location to visit a lot of attractions from and a very short walk to a great snorkeling park!  We would love to stay here again!  Thanks so much to Brad for providing a wonderful vacation home!

Brad’s place is great to stay! It’s spacious, clean and safe. Beautiful surroundings and pool area. The condo was with full size kitchen and laundry. There is an organic supermarket 25 min drive north - Island Naturals. They also offer cold and warm buffet. Delicious. You can also reach a pretty cool snorkel spot in a 30 min drive south. We really enjoyed our stay here! Thank you Brad! Absolute recommendation!

This unit was spacious, well decorated and air conditioned.   The facility is quiet, secure and has historical significance.  It's located close to a grocery store and great swimming.  There is also a quiet beach on-site to enjoy sunsets.   Although it's a large complex, it feels small and all the neighbors have the "aloha" mentality that make it feel like a small- I've known you a long time- kind of feel.  We felt at home immediately and enjoyed Brad's place as if it were our own home.  The owners are very attentive and friendly and aim to make our stay a great one.    We look forward to returning again sometime.  Thank you for making this stay a great one.  You truly understand how to help a guest move in and get ready for a great time on the "Big Island".  Mahalo!

The rental unit is quite nice. The lanai is great, as is the living room, kitchen and master bathroom (including laundry). The unit has no shortage of beach towels either! The beds are not great though, they are quite hard. The dishwasher also is not the best, it acted up a bit, stopping its cycle shortly after starting. The buildings themselves are pretty old and sound travels very easily, especially the neighbours stomping around upstairs (which can make for some rough mornings). 

The location is nice if you want to be a bit outside the busy area. There is a little shopping centre about a 2min drive away for groceries and things of that nature. There is a rocky cliff area that makes for great sunsets and you can walk to a black sand beach at the north end of the complex to see turtles (if you are lucky). To walk to the nearest public beach, it's about a 10min walk, but we had a great time snorkeling at this beach (for whatever reason the wildlife here was more abundant than at Hanauma Bay in Oahu - even saw some sea turtles). 

Communication was a bit of a problem, though Brad responded quickly. The instructions could use some work, as "Directions from your host" and "check-in instructions" contain different information (importantly, the gate code was not included in the check-in instructions). Also, the wifi details provided were not correct, but in the guidebook in the house, they were correct. The host mentioned that there would be a second set of keys in the unit but they were nowhere to be found.

Overall, the unit provided good value, though there were some flaws which could be improved upon.

Brad was responsive and provided all information very quickly. We loved the lanai to enjoy the garden view, but unfortunately weren't near enough the ocean to hear it! The lanai didn't get too  much of a breeze, so we were mostly able to use in the early morning. The air conditioning in the unit was a MUST HAVE. This seems to be a rental property only, so there were a few nice touches that were missing, but otherwise it's  a great space. We appreciated the pack and play for our baby's use and loved using the pool the whole time.

The Brad’s Condo was the perfect choice.
Clean, spacious, comfortable, exluzive, meets all your needs.
The kitchen is fully equipped with washing machine and dryer in perfect condition.
Whenever I return, I will choose this condo.
If I could give 10 points for the rating.

Tökéletes választás ez a lakás. A tengerpart mellett kertre néző szobák. Mindennel felszerelt a konyha, a két fürdő, van mosógép, szárító, tágasak a  helyiségek, minden igényt kielégített. Nyugodt szívvel ajánlom bárkinek aki errefelé vetődik.
great place, clean and conveniently located to the snorkling beach. Apartment had condiments and cleaning supplies already stocked which was a plus.
Very nice place in the paradise
We absolutely loved our stay! It was spacious, so clean and such a great location! Brad left helpful tips and was an excellent communicator! Highly recommend and can’t wait to go back!

Brad’s condo was comfortable and conveniently located. The nearby snorkel beach, bay, and sunset photo spot were all amazing. The shopping center on the hill had everything we needed and only just a short, uphill walk away. The condo had the necessary equipment for all the our activities.

name: Suíte na Barra-Jeunesse
summary: Local seguro. Próximo ao Rio Centro, Arena Jeunesse, RockinRio, Parque Olímpico.
space: Local tem um parque ao ar livre com total segurança. Para executivos e empresas não há local melhor para hospedar seus funcionários, próximo ao Rio Centro, Arena Jeunesse, Parque Olímpico e RockinRio. Transporte público próximo
description: Local seguro. Próximo ao Rio Centro, Arena Jeunesse, RockinRio, Parque Olímpico. Local tem um parque ao ar livre com total segurança. Para executivos e empresas não há local melhor para hospedar seus funcionários, próximo ao Rio Centro, Arena Jeunesse, Parque Olímpico e RockinRio. Transporte público próximo Piscina grande, lindíssima. Há 20 minutos da praia da Barra Bem próximo tem a estação Pedro Correa ou Rio 2 do BRT que faz integração com a linha 4 do metrô.
neighborhood_overview: Há 20 minutos da praia da Barra
transit: Bem próximo tem a estação Pedro Correa ou Rio 2 do BRT que faz integração com a linha 4 do metrô.
access: Piscina grande, lindíssima.

host.host_location: Jacarepaguá, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Sou tranquila e alegre.

reviews.comments: Reservamos o quarto com a Cassiana, o quarto fica dentro de um hotel, fomos bem atendidos no hotel e também pela anfitriã, o local é bem localizado e está a 1 km da jeunesse arena, ficamos surpresos pois esperávamos menos... Super recomendo

Desde  consideração do lugar, a Cassiana foi gentil e atenciosa, esclarecendo todas as nossas dúvida. Atendia todas as minhas questões, pra não ter erro nenhum. eixou a gente super a vontade com relação ao check-in e check-out, e foi um amor deixando alguns mimos no quarto, quando chegamos. O espaço é incrível, muito organizado e com uma localização ótima. Como fomos para o Rock In Rio, ficamos bem contentes em saber que estávamos há apenas 5 minutos de caminhada do Parque Olímpico, onde se deu o evento. Acesso super fácil ao BRT, e com um suporte muito amplo de lugares públicos, como supermercados, drogarias, padarias, restaurantes, shopping e parques. Fizemos uma ótima escolha e pretendo visitar mais vezes! Melhor experiência no Rio de Janeiro <3

O quarto é perfeito para casal e super bem localizado na Barra. Fomos para o Rock in Rio e não poderíamos ter escolhido melhor: fomos e voltamos a pé dos shows todos os dias, tranquilamente. O condomínio também é ótimo e fica próximo a um minishopping, e um parque muito bom. A Cassiana foi super atenciosa conosco. Recomendo muito!

name: Double room, livingroom and terrace
summary: Located in the neighborhood of Gracia. Close to the market, shops, bars ... The center is about 20 minutes walk. In metro 3 stops. The room is divided in two spaces, bedroom and living room with direct access to the winter garden. The kitchen and bathroom are shared with my roommates. The bedroom consists of a double bed, wardrobe for clothes and a small table. The living room has a sofa bed and a desk. It is decorated with personal objects. We require respectful guests.
space: Parties are not allowed. It is a small apartment, we prefer quiet people who want to enjoy the city but also need a good rest.
description: Located in the neighborhood of Gracia. Close to the market, shops, bars ... The center is about 20 minutes walk. In metro 3 stops. The room is divided in two spaces, bedroom and living room with direct access to the winter garden. The kitchen and bathroom are shared with my roommates. The bedroom consists of a double bed, wardrobe for clothes and a small table. The living room has a sofa bed and a desk. It is decorated with personal objects. We require respectful guests. Parties are not allowed. It is a small apartment, we prefer quiet people who want to enjoy the city but also need a good rest.

name: CL Ildefonso I Apartment
summary: Situado bem no centro histórico da cidade Porto, este apartamento localiza-se na rua de Santo Ildefonso a escassos metros da Igreja de Santo Ildefonso e do Teatro Nacional de S. João. Este apartamento está integrado num prédio com arquitetura do século XIX e encontra-se totalmente renovado respeitando as soluções construtivas da época.
space: Este apartamento de tipologia T1 totalmente reabilitado está localizado mesmo ao lado do nosso novo apartamento CL Ildefonso III, com a mesma tipologia, permitindo em conjunto albergar até 8 hóspedes, no entanto, para reservas superiores a quatro hóspedes deveremos ser previamente consultados a fim de confirmação da disponibilidade.
description: Situado bem no centro histórico da cidade Porto, este apartamento localiza-se na rua de Santo Ildefonso a escassos metros da Igreja de Santo Ildefonso e do Teatro Nacional de S. João. Este apartamento está integrado num prédio com arquitetura do século XIX e encontra-se totalmente renovado respeitando as soluções construtivas da época. Este apartamento de tipologia T1 totalmente reabilitado está localizado mesmo ao lado do nosso novo apartamento CL Ildefonso III, com a mesma tipologia, permitindo em conjunto albergar até 8 hóspedes, no entanto, para reservas superiores a quatro hóspedes deveremos ser previamente consultados a fim de confirmação da disponibilidade. Acesso à totalidade do espaço Nesta rua consegue-se apreciar a vivência tradicional da cidade, nomeadamente, o charmoso comércio tradicional de rua e os restaurantes explorados por gente simpática e acolhedora da nossa cidade. Este apartamento está serviço por transportes públicos a escassos minutos.  A partir da rua de Santo
neighborhood_overview: Nesta rua consegue-se apreciar a vivência tradicional da cidade, nomeadamente, o charmoso comércio tradicional de rua e os restaurantes explorados por gente simpática e acolhedora da nossa cidade.
notes: Check-in a partir das 23h terá um custo adicional de 44.28€. Check in from 11 pm will have an extra cost of 44.28 €

A partir da rua de Santo Ildefonso poderá percorrer a pé os melhores spots da cidade do Porto, nomeadamente: 3 minutos a pé do Coliseu do Porto; 5 minutos a pé do Teatro Nacional de São João e da Igreja de Santo Ildefonso; 5 minutos a pé da rua de Santa Catarina e do café Majestic;    14 minutos a pé da Torre dos Clérigos; 15 minutos a pé da rua das Flores; 20 minutos a pé da zona ribeirinha da cidade; 20 minutos a pé do Passeio das Virtudes.
