host.host_about: Sou natural da cidade do Porto e a minha atividade profissional está relacionada com engenharia. Nos meus tempos livres ando de bicicleta e pratico surf, skate e yôga. Exploro alguns apartamentos para alojamento local localizados no coração da cidade do Porto, preferencialmente, na zona histórica.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
We had a great time in Antonio´s flat which is very well located, brand new, clean. Futhermore, Antonio welcomed us very well and was available for us when we had questions !
Everything was perfect.

O espaço de António e bem localizado, claro, confortável, limpo e extremamente agradável e mais bonito do que nas fotos! António e um ótimo host, comunicativo e prestativo. Esperamos poder voltar em breve para o Porto e já sabemos onde vamos ficar!

Very cosy and spatious apartment with a modern interior. Quietly situated in the back of a lovely renewed house in a lively street, on walking distance to metro station, city centre, shops and restaurants.
Compliments to the pleasant contact with Antonio and Sofia!

The flat is perfectly located directly in the city centre (close to the main shopping street & the famous bridge is easily reached by foot), but still in a quite street, so it is never too loud. Everything was very clean, very new and the kitchen had everything (and more) one needs (and supermarkets were just around the corner). It was a little cosy, but big enough for four people. My personal highlight was the all-day-sun-balcony: it was perfect for some coffee& breakfast in the morning & a nice dinner or wine in the evening. Sofia was very helpful & caring and answered immediately. Muito obrigada & we will be back!
Great stay at a great flat at a great location.

Супер квартира, в прекрасном месте, в шаговой доступности абсолютно все необходимые объекты инфраструктуры ( транспорт, кафе, рестораны и тд), мы провели в этой квартире прекрасные 12 дней и всем рекомендуем это место!)))

This apartment is centrally located on a fairly busy street but is wonderfully secluded and quiet. It has a lot of charm too. It was spotlessly clean, the beds were comfortable and the WiFi worked well. Our host, Sofia, was helpful friendly and accommodating. I would absolutely recommend this apartment.
Logement agréable . Proche des transports . Possibilité de tout faire à pied . Resto , bars, rues commerçante très proche . Location de vélo à proximité
Very welcoming host and the flat is super nice !
Lovely clean and comfortable place, highly recommended.
Really nice appartement and well decorated. Well located and with a balcony. Room is calm so you can rest easily.

Great place at perfect location. Clean, nicely decorated and it has a lovely small balcony for your morning coffee. Located in a quite busy street, but you don't hear that at all once you're inside, so a good sleep is guaranteed. At walking distance from the main shopping street and many restaurants (don't miss Cantina 32, it has amazing food). Pedro was a great host, good communication and very friendly. Highly recommended!

Very cute apartment, fantastic location.
Just a few minutes walk from the main shopping area, tons of good coffee shops around.

The host was very helpful and polite  - he was very quick in giving us extra towels after we put ours out in the rain.

Definitely recommend staying here when in Porto!
The apartment is super nice and well located - highly recommend!

The apartment is good located, clean and quiet, the bedding confortable.
We spent a good stay in this place.
Mooi appartement, groot genoeg voor 4 personen als je er enkel slaapt. Super proper!!
Really nice apartment in a good location to get around. Communication and check in was really easy. Thanks for a nice stay.

The pictures don't do the apartment justice - it's really well decked out and beautifully designed and decorated. Very cosy and get facilities in the kitchen. The balcony is such a lovely suntrap and is sunny all day and great for a morning coffee / evening wine. The apartment is in a great location and on a very cute street with lots of lovely restaurants and shops
the appartment is very nice and funktional, its easy to walk into the city
The location was fantastic and the apartment was really nice and comfortable. We made good use of the terrace too! I would recommend this flat to stay in Porto.
Really nice apartment! Although we had some problems with our flight and came 3 hours late, we had no problems with our host and thankfully he waited for us! Obrigada!

The appartment was amazing, super super bright and everything was super clean.  I would love to have a place like that in Paris ! the only bad point would be the comfort of the sofa and the bed that makes A LOT of noise . Except from that it was perfect !
Appartement très bien placé et agréable! Très bien décoré et spacieux, idéale pour 2 personnes !
Super emplacement, déco très moderne, appart très propre ; parfait pour bien découvrir Porto !

Appartement très propre et bien situé dans le centre historique de Porto. Présence du métro à proximité, mais beaucoup d'endroits sont accessibles à pied depuis le logement.
Très bon accueil de notre hôte, arrangeant (nous sommes arrivés avant 15h mais il s'est montré disponible pour nous remettre les clefs).
Conforme aux photos. Présence d'une petite terrasse très agréable pour dîner.
Perfect apartment in a great location. Quiet, clean and modern. Antonio is a super host without a doubt! Helpful, with hand full of advises. Highly recommended.

Unser Aufenthalt war super! Die Wohnung ist genauso wie auf den Bildern dargestellt und sehr gut ausgestattet. Die Lage ist top, es gibt einige nette Cafés und einen Supermarkt in der Umgebung. Die nächste U-Bahn Station ist schnell zu erreichen. Wir wurden sehr nett empfangen - definitiv zu empfehlen!

Everything was well. Just the bed is not so comfortable.
Would go again.
Perfect

Thank you so much for this lovely place in the middle of Porto! Great describes kind of everything: location, hospitality, the apartment itself. The pictures don‘t give it justice!
Susana and Antonio were both very available and gave us useful tips for our stay. We can highly recommend it! Thank you!

L’appartement est conforme aux photos. Il est spacieux et lumineux et très bien équipé. Il est très bien situé tôt peitnse faire à pied. Juste un petit point négatif : la qualité du matelas. Sinon tout le reste était parfait !

The apartment was fantastic and even more beautiful than the photos! Sparkling clean, with amazing amenities and in the perfect location, we couldn't have asked for a better place to call home while in Porto. Highly recommend!

We stayed here for 3 nights and the apartment was just what we needed. The place is very clean and looks modern. It is also spacy with a kitchen, living room, bedroom and a lovely balcony. We enjoyed our breakfast on the sunny balcony every morning. The kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher which is always nice to have. A big grocery store is about 100 metres from the apartment and the centre and the riverside were within 10-15 min walk. We can highly recommend this flat for anyone.
The apartment was lovely, and very comfortable for our stay in Porto.  The location was great, and there was plenty of restaurants and shops nearby.
Schöne, neu renovierte Altbauwohnung in guter Lage. Küche mit Spülmaschine und Kaffeemaschine. Optimaler Ausgangspunkt um Porto zu erkundigen.
We had such a nice stay at Antonio’s place. We would definitely recommend this apartment. The apartment was very clean, very chic and modern and is in a very good location.
We had a great time in Porto. The apartment is really close to the centre. It's very clean and has everything you need.

Our stay at the apartment was really good. We enjoyed every minute of it.  It is very well located, there are many places to eat breakfast and lunch or dinner around. Two grocery stores and the metro are nearby. Pedro was an outstanding host, communication was very good. The apartment was very clean and had everything we needed. The dishwasher, coffee machine (Nespresso) and iron were a big plus for a two week stay. 
If we would plan a trip to Porto again we would definitely like two stay at this place again and would recommend it for friends too.
Apartament molt bonic i molt ben situat

name: Beautiful, Comfortable Apt. in Convenient Location
summary: Beautiful 2 bedroom apartment in Queens, New York. You will enjoy the entire space on the 2nd floor of the house in a residential area. The apartment has its own entrance for added privacy. Close to the JFK airport and a short subway ride to downtown Manhattan. Located in a quiet block with on-street parking around.
space: This apartment is unique as it is located in a quiet residential area in Queens, NY. You will enjoy being close to the JFK airport and close to Manhattan and Brooklyn. If you have a car you will be able to find parking around the block without fear of getting ticketed, as there are no alternate-side restrictions. You will experience life as a New Yorker while enjoying New York City as a visitor.
description: Beautiful 2 bedroom apartment in Queens, New York. You will enjoy the entire space on the 2nd floor of the house in a residential area. The apartment has its own entrance for added privacy. Close to the JFK airport and a short subway ride to downtown Manhattan. Located in a quiet block with on-street parking around. This apartment is unique as it is located in a quiet residential area in Queens, NY. You will enjoy being close to the JFK airport and close to Manhattan and Brooklyn. If you have a car you will be able to find parking around the block without fear of getting ticketed, as there are no alternate-side restrictions. You will experience life as a New Yorker while enjoying New York City as a visitor. The apartment is located on the 2nd floor. You will have the entire place for yourselves with 2 bedrooms, kitchen, living room and private bathroom. The apartment has a separate entrance and it is designed in a way to maximize privacy and comfort at an affordable price. I'm here to
transit: Airports: Located very close to the JFK International Airport. A short taxi ride will take 10-15 minutes with low traffic, 20-30 minutes during rush hours. Not too far from LaGuardia, between 20-45 minutes taxi ride depending on traffic conditions. Subway: The closest train station is 80th Street on the A line. Walking to the station takes about 10 minutes. The A train goes express to:  * Downtown Brooklyn in about 20 minutes (Attractions: Downtown Brooklyn, Brooklyn Bridge, MetroTech)  * Downtown Manhattan in about 25 minutes (Attractions: Statue of Liberty, Wall Street, the Bull, 9/11 Memorial) * Lower Manhattan in about 30 minutes (Attractions: China Town, Little Italy) * Midtown Manhattan in about 35 minutes (Attractions: Empire State Building, Madison Square Garden) * Times Square, Broadway in about 40 minutes. AirTrain to JFK: You can take the A train in direction to Rockaway Park or Far Rockaway. Once on the train get off at the Howard Beach/JFK station to take the AirTrain. Bus
access: The apartment is located on the 2nd floor. You will have the entire place for yourselves with 2 bedrooms, kitchen, living room and private bathroom. The apartment has a separate entrance and it is designed in a way to maximize privacy and comfort at an affordable price.
interaction: I'm here to help, and available for anything you may need. Just give me a call or send me a message.
house_rules: During summer please turn off the AC when you leave the apartment. During winter if you come from a warmer weather keep in mind that it is cold in New York. I'll be happy to provide you with a space heater and more sheets/blankets for your comfort on request. Please turn the space heater off when you leave the apartment.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Hello my name is José and recently joined AirBNB as a host. I love meeting new people from all around the world. Love travelling, good food and having a great time. As a host I want you to feel like home so that you can enjoy your visit to NYC for play or fun. Any question or comment don't hesitate to contact me.

reviews.comments: It was a beautiful place. Jose provided things similar to a hotel. It felt like we were staying at home.
Excelente anfitrión
Great value for such a comfortable stay
Nice and clean apartment that is located just a short walk from the subway! Definitely would stay here again.
Apartment was clean and comfortable, no issues, I would recommend.
Spacious, comfortable and quiet neighborhood. Also you can see the public bus stop from the window.

We really enjoyed our stay at Jose's. The neighbourhood was quiet, safe and interesting with stores and amenities close-by. The subway was great - a bit of a walk away, but an express train that took us quickly into the city. The apartment itself was very comfortable, bright and clean with plenty of space for our family of five.

Everything was fine, place was may be not very modern but clean and well kept, not far from transportation, in short - everything as described. Parking was not a problem as well, to my surprise - I thought it would be tricky to find a spot, but it was not at all. Good place!
Great place if you are going to Queens. There is plenty of parking space so it's also a good choice if you have a car.

We stayed at Jose's place for one week and enjoyed it.  It's a good size 2nd floor unit located at the back of a house.  It is in a safe residential area that is quiet and convenient to Manhattan.  The unit is bright with 2 bedrooms and a nice size living room.  The kitchen is fully equipped to cook a nice meal.

There is a large grocery stores within 9 minutes walk.  The A train subway station is 7 minutes walk with express trains into the city. 

Jose was a great host, He communicates effectively, is very responsive and prepared the house well for our arrival. 

Overall it was a nice stay in a quiet residential property with easy access to NYC.
Communication was clear! Close to train station. Apartment was very clean and cute!
The house was very clean, and the neighborhood was very residential and quiet. Jose was very nice and helpful.

The appartment Is very clean, close to Subway  and Jose is very kind to respond to all questions. No problem! Thank you Jose.

  Appartement très propre et près du métro. Jose nous a accueilli cordialement dès notre arrivée un peu plus tôt que prévu. Réponse rapide à toutes nos questions. Notre hôte réside au 1er étage. Merci pour tout!
Very clean place, apartment was as described, Jose was a great host and very easy to get ahold of with questions.

The appartement is located in a calm part of Queens, only 600m from the subway. The appartement is perfect choise. A lot of space, everything You need is in. Jose is really kind host. He helps a lot and takes care about guests. I really recommend this appartement.
This is the perfect little getaway! The area is quite and felt safe, the place was clean and just lovely! Jose was great to communicate with, and very kind. We will remember this place!
The place is exactly as described, the host was very quick with responses and he was really nice
Great place which love up to expectations.
The short walk to the A-Train and the the private space were enough to sell me initially, but Jose’s outstanding hospitality made this experience five star!

Jose’s home is absolutely beautiful! The hospitality was outstanding and the beds were so comfortable!! I definitely recommend this place!!! One of my favorite Airbnb’s by far! One of my friends accidentally broke a mug and Jose was like extremely nice about it!! Thank you once again!!!
Clean and comfortable. Jose was extremely responsive to all my questions. If I find myself in the area again I wouldn't hesitate to stay here.
It’s a great place if you want quietness. Jose is very friendly and responsive.

Jose's place is nice, comfortable, spacious and luminous. It is a 10/12-minute walk from the subway station and it seems a safe area even late at night. Downtown Manhattan is about 30 minutes away with the A train. Nothing to complain about. Perfect for a convenient vacation in NYC.

The location close to the A line subway into Manhattan was great. Plus very easy to travel from JFK airport. Beds comfortable and clean. However could do with wine glasses and cork screw . Also a pack of useful information about the local area, shops, restaurants and WIFI password would not go amiss.  Communication with host was excellent. Overall a great apartment.

My friend and I enjoyed our stay at this cozy apartment in Queens. The beds are super comfortable, the temperature throughout the space was pretty nice, even though it was warm one day and freezing the next, and the neighborhood is super easy to navigate and very quiet. I loved how easy it was to get into Manhattan from there. Though it's still a bit of a trip once you get on the train, the station is just a short walk away. Jose was very responsive in the days leading up to our trip, and he continued to be responsive even after we arrived. I recommend this space for sure!

Good value. Spacious, all necessary equipment. Prompt response. Pack 'n play available.
The neighborhood is ok, subway 10 mins walk. Limited eating and gricery shopping options within walking distance.
If travelling with a toddler be aware of the steep stairs and very hot heaters in the morning.
We were struggling with  shower pressure and temperature.
Great place! Really spacious and clean! We did not spend much time in the apartment but the beds are very comfy. Short walk to the A-train and your in Manhattan in no-time!

Prima accommodatie in verhouding met de prijs. Jose reageert erg snel op al je vragen. Het appartement ligt wel een eind uit de stad zelf. Met de metro duurt het ongeveer 40 minuten voordat je er bent.

It’s a good value apartment, spacious and clean. The beds are very comfy and it has all the kitchenwares and appliances for those who want to cook at home. The neighborhood it’s ok and quiet and it’s only 10 min walking far from the metro station. We really enjoyed our stay at the Jose’s apartment. Thank you!
Jose的房子里地铁很近可以步行达到,房子比较干净而且生活设施一应俱全｡性价比很高｡

We stayed in the apartment with 5 people for one week and we were all very pleased with the accommodation! 
It was clean, the rooms are big and the kitchen is equipped with the essentials. The couch for the 5th person was comfortable enough to sleep on. Check in and check out were simple and Jose was really quick and friendly answering questions during the stay! 
You can get to Manhattan easily by train A which comes every few minutes (express and local). But you should be aware that in the evening the A train operates only local so that it takes way longer. But for us who went to Manhatten in the morning and returned in the late evening it wasn't a problem at all. You cannot expect to be in Manhatten in 10 minutes for that price. 
I highly recommend this apartment!
Very clean and comfortable
Everything was great. I’d definitely recommend.
Nice place to stay!
El trato de José fue excelente y nos atendió siempre que le pedimos cualquier cosa
Excelente
Wir wurden freundlichst von Jose begrüßt . Die Wohnung war sauber und schön eingerichtet. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt.

The apartment is very clean. The bathroom was stocked with shampoo, conditioner and liquid soap. The couches had beautiful pillows. The area is  very quiet. Both beds are  comfortable. I have two recommendations, adding a list of channels and adding another tv to one of the bedrooms. We could not figure out your local tv channels, so the list would definitely help. The additional tv would be helpful since your apartment has two bedrooms. I would definitely recommend this place, and would definitely stay there again.

Very clean and neat. The beds are comfortable and basic necessities provided for. We were able to find parking easily and the subway is extremely close. All in all a good spot that’s quite convenient.
Was a really nice place. It was a walk towards the train but not too bad. Wish the place wasn’t so hidden. But overall good vibes
Great place !

Jose keeps a really nice place - especially for the price. It’s close to the subway and located in a decent neighborhood. As a host, he took his role very seriously and displayed strong efforts to make our stay as enjoyable as possible.
Really nice 2 bedroom with extra sleeping on the pullout couch and futon. Jose was always quick to respond and introduced himself to my families and I when we arrived. Overall great stay!

Situated near an A train metro station, this location has direct transport links to the Airtrain (JFK), the Financial District, Times Square and Central Park.

The self check-in allows guests to come and go as they please, and the host, Jose, was very quick to reply to any queries we had.

Everything you could want from a stress free NYC city break.

We decided to not stay at the place. My family and I, not being familiar with the area, found ourselves quite lost and not super safe. We also find what we believed to be mold in some corners of the apartment and decided to leave the premises. On a positive note Jose, the owner, was very helpful and communicative during our message exchanges. He checked the place out after my feedback to him and confirmed that it was not mold what we saw. The apartment is quite of a deal to stay in NY for cheap, but you need to be willing to travel a bit to get to visit Manhattan and figure out places to go to.
Appartement est très calme, proche du métro, José l’hôte s’occupe de tout et à l’arrivé tout est prêt pour vous recevoir!! Qualité prix imbattable
Our stay was amazing, the rooms were sparkling clean and everything was well arranged and taken care of. Would stay again
Stayed here with a friend for the weekend and loved it. The rooms were spacious and the location was great as you are just a couple blocks from a subway station.

Jose’s spot was exactly what we expected. A cosy, private and safe accommodation for my short stay in New York. It’s in a great location, with lots of places to eat nearby and an approximately 10 minute walk to the subway. Jose was always available when we needed him and very quick to respond to our messages. He was sweet enough to leave us with lots of information, advice and suggestions on how to best enjoy both our trip and our stay!

Our stay was fantastic! We had a great time at the apartment. 

Jose was extremely accommodating, and everything was clear and laid out for us upon our arrival, in the manual provided. This meant that we didn’t have to ask much of anything throughout our stay, and could refer to the manual if any problems were met. 

The apartment is in a prime location, with many grocery shops and food spots nearby. The area took us back at first, but it didn’t take us long to settle in - the area is family friendly, and is extremely safe, quiet, and secluded. 

Local transport is great! With the local subway within a 10 minute walk from the apartment. The express train takes you straight into Brooklyn within 10-15  minutes, Manhattan within 20-30, and is no hassle to navigate at all. 

We would highly recommend!

Jose's place was so cute and very spacious! It most definitely accommodated my needs and could comfortably fit 4 people. Parking was much easier than it would be in Manhattan and could find spots with no problem. He was very flexible when it came to a later check out which came in handy when I wanted to get some extra sleep. I would definitely recommend this place to others!

Very comfortable an cozy apartment, with everything we needed. 
Only 10 minutes by foot to the next metro station, a supermarket, a diner and so on.
And only around a half hour with the metro to the JFK.
We had a great time there and recommend Josés apartment to everybody.

We stayed in Jose's place - as a family of 4 with a 15 and 13 year old. The apartment is clean and comfortable and had all the amenities you need and excellent wi-fi. 
There is a nearby supermarket and various eateries and take-away restaurants ( menus provided in the apartment). For delivery of take aways, we found they were not keen to take a foreign (UK) mobile number as a contact number but with persistence, they eventually took the order and we had nice Chinese and Japanese meals. 
This is a good place to base yourself when visiting NYC but it takes approx 40 mins to get into Manhattan - the Subway service is very frequent- so some planning is needed.
Highlights of our trip were cycling in Central Park, walking over Brooklyn Bridge and in DUMBO, visiting the 9/11 memorial/ museum, the usual tourist sites, walking the High Line, and seeing Broadway shows. We picked up reasonably priced tickets by going to 'tkts' (in Broadway) and queuing up 2 hours before curtain up as they sell off the empty seats at a discount. 
Jose was easily contactable but we had no problems during our trip.
Great Place and great host! Would come back any time:)
JOSE PLACE IS A MUST WHEN VISITING NY
The host is quite helpful and so kind!

We had a great time at Jose's place. The communication was super easy and quick and the place looks exactly like it does on the pictures. The neighborhood is very conveniently located and although it’s Queens, it's very easy to get to Manhatten with public transportation! Would absolutely recommend to stay there!
Wonderful place to stay its close to the subway, very clean  and Jose its an amazing host. totally recommend his place.
HOSPITALITY IS ON POINT.
Excelente custo-benefício. José é um anfitrião atencioso e cuidadoso. A hospedagem foi perfeita e nos fez sentirmos em casa.

Jose’s place was exactly as advertised. We had a great stay. It was convenient for us to where our friends live and had plenty of space for the three of us (myself, husband, & baby). We loved the pack-and-play for our baby to sleep in. Parent tip: there is not a traditional dining table so if you plan on feeding a baby or small child, you may want to bring a booster seat that attaches to a chair, which is what we did for our 10mo old and it worked great! Jose is super speedy with communication and the place was easy to find. Lyfts & Ubers were readily accessible. The kitchenette was well stocked and made it super easy for us to make a quick breakfast before heading out for the day. We’ll definitely stay again if we’re going to be in the area.
Super cute place, had all the necessities, & very hospitable host, would totally stay here again!

Jose's place is very conveniently located from public transportation. He is very responsive and helpful. 
thank you Jose.
It’s a great place. Jose is there whenever you have a question and tries his best to be a great host and help with whatever is needed. Would recommend if you’re looking for a place to stay!

Jose was very responsive during our stay. The apartment was very clean and had everything we needed. The commute from JFK was simple and inexpensive. If you are planning a trip to NYC, I highly recommend Jose’s Airbnb!

name: ★ Luxury Loft | Pool | Gym | Spotless ★
summary: Beautiful industrial luxury loft, impeccably clean , rooftop pool with BBQ , gym , sports room with basketball court and a yoga room!! in great neighbourhood. Hardwood floors throughout, high-speed internet. 5 minutes walk to metro Lionel-Groulx (3 stations to downtown and 4 to Old Montreal). Steps to cafes and some of Montreal's finest selection of restaurants. 10 min to Atwater market and canal, free parking on adjacent streets, secured building, TV-Netflix.
space: Enjoy Montreal at its finest in an impeccable authentic industrial loft, located just minutes away from the heart of the city. Perfect for the business or leisure traveller. Steps away from some of Montreal's best restaurants, nightclubs, bars, museums and major attractions, At the end of a perfect day, the rooftop terrace is the perfect place to be! The kitchen is fully equipped: microwave, dishwasher, stove, oven, fridge and freezer, The cabinets are stocked with dishes, cookware, utensils and everything you'll need to prepare a good meal. You'll also find paper towels, napkins, dish towel, cleaning cloth and dish detergent. If you don't feel like cooking you can use apps like Foodora or Uber Eats that have the finest restaurant selections and deliver straight to your door !!
description: Beautiful industrial luxury loft, impeccably clean , rooftop pool with BBQ , gym , sports room with basketball court and a yoga room!! in great neighbourhood. Hardwood floors throughout, high-speed internet. 5 minutes walk to metro Lionel-Groulx (3 stations to downtown and 4 to Old Montreal). Steps to cafes and some of Montreal's finest selection of restaurants. 10 min to Atwater market and canal, free parking on adjacent streets, secured building, TV-Netflix. Enjoy Montreal at its finest in an impeccable authentic industrial loft, located just minutes away from the heart of the city. Perfect for the business or leisure traveller. Steps away from some of Montreal's best restaurants, nightclubs, bars, museums and major attractions, At the end of a perfect day, the rooftop terrace is the perfect place to be! The kitchen is fully equipped: microwave, dishwasher, stove, oven, fridge and freezer, The cabinets are stocked with dishes, cookware, utensils and everything you'll need to prepare
transit: Public Transportation:  Located 3 blocks from the metro Station Lionel-Groulx which is a hub for 2 metro lines so you have access to most of Montreal. Bicycle:  Right around the block is a Bixi station (rental bikes). Simply insert your credit card, grab a bike and start exploring what Montreal has to offer! Traveling:  - Montreal International Airport: 30 minutes drive. 40$ flat rate by taxi or 10$ by the shuttle that give you access to the metro for 24h. The shuttle drops you at the downtown Berri metro station. You can also use Uber app for anywhere you need to go they come within minutes !!
access: The guests have access to everything they need:  - 24h Gym  - High speed Internet/WI-FI  - Pool  - Stream Netflix or Youtube  - Dishwasher  - Washer/Dryer   - Fresh towels, linens, etc.  - Plates, cookware and everything you need for cooking
interaction: As often as needed, I typically respond to messages within the hour.
house_rules: - NO EVENTS/PARTIES are allowed - NO pets and NO smoking!  - NO extra people stay over during the stay/night. Please be respectful and courteous of the space as you will be treating it as your own. Guests should act respectfully in regards to noise levels and interactions with neighbours and people in the building. Don't be shy to ask any questions; Feel free to message me anytime. I am here to help you enjoy your stay! Also I'm very Flexible in terms of Check in and Out time just contact

reviews.comments: Shereen's place is the ideal spot for experiencing Montreal.  The apartment is immaculate with easy access to two metro stops, the Atwater market, the canal, and a Bixi bike hub around the corner.  Her recommendations are perfect for enjoying the city and nice additions like netflix access, the gym, and on-street parking make the apartment a top-notch experience.

Shereen's place is beautiful!  Sparkling clean, beautifully decorated, and the rooftop terrace was incredible.  The apartment is in a great location--a quiet, peaceful street, but a quick walk to great restaurants, shops, and the metro.  Checking in and out was super easy.  Shereen was communicative, really friendly, and had great recommendations.  Stay here, it's wonderful!
Shereen appartment's is a very nice place. Very clean! Exactly like on the photos ! The pool on the rooftop is a plus ! Shereen answers very quickly if you have a question. We highly recommend it.

Shereen was an amazing host. The neighborhood was everything my gf and I could have asked for. Its quiet and residential but also hip and lively in a short walk. This trip meant a lot to my gf and I and Shereen's place made it that much better.

We 100% would love to stay there the next time we come to Montreal. As we will definitely be back!
Shereen is a great host, got everything we need before we check-in. The location is great where closed to a lot of attractions and public transportations. Definitely will come back next time.
This a lovely place - everything is just as it appears in the photos! The building and amenities are great - especially the rooftop pool and seating areas.

Shereen was very helpful in terms of providing restaurant and entertainment recommendations and her place was beautiful and clean, just as the photos show. There was one surprise that the photos show but I didn't realize until we arrived - the large windows don't have any curtains. If you're a morning person, this is lovely, but it does make sleeping in difficult when the sun rises so early.
Shereens place was great and just as beautiful as the pictures. She made us feel very comfortable and gave us really good suggestions on things to do and see.
Awesome place looks exactly like the pictures!

Shereen's place was really great.  Overall, a 10 out of 10.  The condo was as advertised in the photos, but pictures don't do the bed and shower justice.   The memory foam bed was very comfortable and the shower has some serious pressure.  Easy kitchen in which to cook, and the wifi was very reliable.  Only "hang ups" were with check-in (had to pull bed sheets/pillow cases out of the dryer and put them on bed/pillows myself) and parking, from time to time.  While parking is, in fact, free, it's not entirely hassle-free.  To Shereen's credit, though, she makes this known in her condo's listing.   Parking in front of the condo is nearly always filled up. On Rues Bourget, Irene, Sainte-Antoine, and Sainte-Jacques (four main streets near the condo) you don't have to pay to park, but you're not allowed to park during certain weekly times.  For example, on the north side of Rue Bourget (right in front of the building) you'll be ticketed if your car is parked between 8 and 11:30 am.  Then, on the opposite side of the street, you're forced to move your car on Tuesdays from noon to 3:30 pm.  Moral of the story?  Come enjoy Shereen's awesome condo, just don't bring a car.  You can Uber anywhere from her centrally-located spot in less than ten minutes for about ten bucks.  Overall, an awesome stay and I look forward to being back.

Shereen's place was bright and clean. Close walking distance to  Metro. The roof top pool was nice, however the gym was across the street in a different building. 
If you're looking to be a little outside of the downtown core this place is oerfect.
This is a fabulous place if you want to combine busy city weekend with some relax time by the pool. Very cool indeed.

Le logement est identique aux photos présentées dans l'annonce: magnifique. Le coin est calme et super beau! Pout ce qui est de Shereen, elle est très gentille. Elle répond rapidement aux messages ce qui est génial! Avant d'arriver, elle nous recommande plusieurs restaurants et endroits à voir ce qui aide beaucoup.
Shereen was such an amazing and helpful host!! The location was perfect, and gorgeous (the pictures don't do it justice). I just totally recommend it all around.
Loved Shereen's place. Clean home and has all necessary basics. She is a great host, and offers lots of suggestions for Montreal. Thank you!!
Apartament amb un disseny remarcable, cuidat, molt agradable, ben equipat i molt net. Ben situat a pocs minuts a peu de l’estació de metro, en poques parades et situes al centre.
She's the sweetest person ever if u are looking for a great place u should stay at her place.

There's nothing you won't like about the design and furniture of this place. Beautiful. It's like a 10 minute walk to the nearest metro station. Also around a 15 minute walk to St. Catherine which is a main spot for tourists. The building is very nice. Shereen was so sweet, I met with her when checking in and she was willing to help with everything I had, lovely lady!

The place is great, it really is as advertised in photos. The curtains are the only thing I can think of as a slight negative. They are a bit too thin. They let a lot of light in, and you may need to get dressed in the bathroom if you have some privacy concerns. Apartment has anything you may need. Shereen responds fast if you have any questions. Overall, we were very happy.

Shereen's place is exactly(!) as pictured and was perfect in terms of design and layout. Extremely clean and spacious, with a pleasant view of the street and plenty of natural light. Shereen herself was as pleasant, responsive, and helpful as any Airbnb host with whom I've ever stayed - she gave great tips on both the surrounding neighborhood and city as a whole. Finally, I loved the gym (across the street) and rooftop lounge area - peaceful with amazing views.

Shereen's place is a nice cozy studio. It felt very homey and looked amazing, the pictures don't do it justice! Shereen is a great host. She was flexible with our check in/out time. The neighborhood is nice and quiet yet very convenient with plenty of places close by. I had no issues with street parking, however do read the posted signs. I would highly recommend staying here and would love to visit again.
Centrally located on a quiet street in one of the hippest neighborhoods of Montreal. Shereen was very acomidating and the bed is super comfy!

Shereen was extremely helpful with giving us information for our stay. Her place was kept very clean and it's a very nice quiet atmosphere. My husband and I stayed this past weekend with our 6 month old for our wedding anniversary and it was a perfect place for house. The washer and dryer is a bonus too.
Shereen was a terrific host, easy to communicate with and very easy check-in/check-out.  The place very clean, as described and the building has wonderful amenities.  Highly recommended.

We had a great stay at Shereen's place. We love the converted loft style and loved how the condo was decorated. Check in was super easy and Shereen was kind enough to let us check in a couple of hours early. The building is located in a quiet residential area. Bed was comfortable. Would recommend!
I stayed here previously and both experiences were great. Perfect stylish loft that is clean, comfortable, and in a great neighborhood. Shereen is a wonderful and helpful host. Highly recommended.
Very stylish apartment. Great location - close to a lot of restaurants and shops. Shereen was very quick to respond and check-in was a breeze.
Great place! Nice and cozy. Very comfy bed :)

Great place in St Henri - very clean, has everything you need, close to the metro. You have access to the gym in the building which is very well equipped and convenient. You are just a few min walk from the metro and some great restaurants as well. Would highly recommend staying here.

Great place.  10 min walk to Lionel-Groulx metro station.  Very clean and quiet.  Washer/dryer in unit works well.  Host was very responsive.  I texted her that the internet was down, and 2 minutes later she was on the phone with the provider, and service was restored within 10 minutes.

My stay was great. I was traveling on my own and found that the apartment was spacious and had everything I needed. Shereen was incredibly responsive and thoughtful throughout my stay.  I'd highly recommend staying here.

We had a mini road trip and decided to stay in Montreal for 2 days. The place was very clean and tidy. It was close to the places we wanted to visit. Shereen was very responsive to answer all of our question. We enjoyed our stay there. Thank you.

This place was absolutely GORGEOUS. Everything you could hope for in an airbnb. The pictures are absolutely true to what it is! If anything, they undersell the spacious, luxurious nature of this loft. Shereen was the most gracious host! She accommodated our check in time and responded within minutes of messages. The apartment is incredible - big ceilings, clean, fabulous kitchen and bathroom!  It is so open and warm (quite literally, toasty with the heating system!). She has all necessary kitchen items/utensils needed - plates, dishes, knives, pots and pans, etc. The gym was gorgeous - a room for floor work (the yoga room) equipped with weights, mats, kettleballs, etc. as well as multiple cardio machines, weight machines available in the main gym space. 

Truly, there is little you could want or need for at this place. Parking was so easy and the area is great with tons of lovely restaurants, easy access to groceries, and very accessible to downtown Montreal.

Very nice unit in a great location. 
Perfect for one person or a couple.
Shereen was quick to respond to messages and made me feel very welcome. 

The parking is free in some areas on the street, however you will have to move your car daily depending on the section of the road. 

The building was very safe, the amenities were as expected and the unit was nice and tidy.

It was a great spot, definitely recommend it!

Shereen’s place was clean and stylish. Had everything I needed except parking. When the listing said “free parking on premises” I assumed that meant there was parking on the premises but apparently it means there is some free street parking on the adjacent streets. However the signage was confusing for a non-local and I had trouble finding parking on multiple occasions (especially if I arrived later in the evening). Other than that everything was good. Pool was closed. Gym was across the street and looked decent but I didn’t end up using it.
Great place, near from the Metro. Cozy and stylish!
The place was amazing, Shereen provided excellent recommendations and helped make an all around good trip even better!

name: Luminous Vintage Room near Plaza España
summary: Bright and spacious room close to Plaza de España and Montjuic. Parking possible!
space: The apartment is located in a quiet and green area near the city mountain Montjuic, only 10 min footwalk to Plaza de Espanya. The room is bright and spacious. Availabilty of parkings close to the apartment.  Besides this we provide access to WiFi, as well as all needed bath products like shower gel, shampoo, towels and a hair dryer. If needed we also rent out beach towels.
description: Bright and spacious room close to Plaza de España and Montjuic. Parking possible! The apartment is located in a quiet and green area near the city mountain Montjuic, only 10 min footwalk to Plaza de Espanya. The room is bright and spacious. Availabilty of parkings close to the apartment.  Besides this we provide access to WiFi, as well as all needed bath products like shower gel, shampoo, towels and a hair dryer. If needed we also rent out beach towels. We are using the kitchen for a familiar get-together. Therefore you can´t use the utilities of the kitchen however, you can store beverages or anything in the fridge. If requested we willingly provide iron, cups, glasses etc. We are pleased to help with recommendations and trip planning. We speak english,spanish and german. The apartment is located in a quiet and green area near the city mountain Montjuic, only 10 min footwalk to Plaza de Espanya. In this area, you find  cafés and restaurants, as well as a supermarket. A short bus ride
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a quiet and green area near the city mountain Montjuic, only 10 min footwalk to Plaza de Espanya. In this area, you find  cafés and restaurants, as well as a supermarket. A short bus ride or footwalk away you reach the Shopping Centers "Arenas" at Plaza de España or "Gran Via Center" at Gran Via de Catalanes. In case you`re travelling with your car: This area is one of the only areas in Barcelona City where you can park your car for free. Parking oportunities are always in striking distance.
transit: The bus stop is within 1 min footwalk. From this bus stop you have access to the airport  and the city centre (each approx. 15 min).   At Plaza de Espanya, you also have access to the subway.  Buses and trains take you easily from here to the beaches of Gava, Castelldefells and Sitges. Also the main train station "Sants" is in considerable distance.
access: We are using the kitchen for a familiar get-together. Therefore you can´t use the utilities of the kitchen however, you can store beverages or anything in the fridge. If requested we willingly provide iron, cups, glasses etc.
interaction: We are pleased to help with recommendations and trip planning. We speak english,spanish and german.
house_rules: Please be aware that we are not a hotel. We cannot provide a 5 star environment of a hotel. We are a family sharing our private home with people from different countries and different needs. In exchange we offer a nice and warm stay for basic needs for little money  Tener en cuenta lo siguiente: No somos un hotel!! No tenemos las comodidades de un hotel 5 estrellas, somos una familia que compartimos amablemente nuestro espacio y nuestras zonas comunes... * it's not possible to use the kitchen for cooking, but we provide the basic utilities to prepare a snack (e.g. microwave, water boiler)for our guests to use in our common areas . You can also store snacks and drinks in the fridge and prepare a coffee in the morning .  * Check out until 12 pm but you can store your luggage in our place when you leave Barcelona later that day . Same applies if you arrive earlier than our check in time  *. Please understand that we don't accept other persons than our guests in our home without a permissi

host.host_about: For 4 years I lived in Hong Kong before I made myself a home in Barcelona. In my new place I live with my boyfriend and his son from Venezuela. I consider myself as open minded and social. My intention are  always to connnect with other people from all nationalities. I may be German after all but influenced from all impressions all over the world.

name: Cosy Studio / pool / barbecue / sunny lounge
summary: Cosy light full one bedroom studio. This small fully equipped 3 guests flat is designed for offering a comfortable and colorful space to everyone who stays here. Located in the heart of the Porto University Camp, you can use all the facilities. Pool, barbecue and a sunny terrace.
description: Cosy light full one bedroom studio. This small fully equipped 3 guests flat is designed for offering a comfortable and colorful space to everyone who stays here. Located in the heart of the Porto University Camp, you can use all the facilities. Pool, barbecue and a sunny terrace. Metro Station IPO -  4 minute walk  Bus to the beach - 100 meters away Bus to the center -  25 meters away
transit: Metro Station IPO -  4 minute walk  Bus to the beach - 100 meters away Bus to the center -  25 meters away

host.host_about:
love traveling, tourism, speak different languages and meet people !!
favorite sports: surf and alpine skiing :)

reviews.comments:
Apartamento simpático e acolhedor 
Gostamos de passar 5 dias neste apartamento, ele é ideal para 2 pessoas.
Ainda aproveitamos para fazer um bom churrasco bem a moda portuguesa.
Os vizinhos são simpáticos, o espaço é envolvente é muito calmo e bem localizado!
Recomendo o apartamento do Fred :)

Premiére experience airbnb pas déçu du tout bien au contraire .Fred est une personne pleine de bonnes intentions envers ces hôtes,trés souriant , aux petits soins une personne exceptionnel nous sommes ravis d'avoir fait sa connaissance nous avons passés un agréable séjour .
We had a great time in Oporto! Fred's apartment are so cosy and we were very comfortable! It is a lovely place to enjoy Oporto! And Fred was so nice with us!!

Le logement de Fred est super, c'était vraiment agréable d'y séjourner! Les espaces extérieurs sont vraiment très sympas pour se poser après avoir marché pour découvrir la super ville de Porto!
Fred a pris le temps de nous faire découvrir son quartier, il est vraiment très sympa, accueillant et disponible!
Agréable pause loin du bruit de Porto. Lieu convivial et qui favorise les rencontres.
Todo genial!

El alojamiento es fantástico sus comodidades, el lugar y el una persona encantadora no falto detalle por su parte.
Repetiré sin ninguna duda, 100%recomendado.

fenomenal.
limpieza y completito el apartamento.Freud simpático y amarillismo.
recomendable 100 por 100.

Muy recomendable, barrio tranquilo, a sólo unas paradas de metro del centro de oporto, con algunas cafeterías y un centro comercial donde cenar o comprar la comida. La habitación es pequeña pero cómoda, limpísima y todo muy nuevo.

Je ne sais pas par où commencer tellement cet air bnb ainsi que son hôte sont parfaits ! 
Tout d'abord l'emplacement : 
10 à 15 minutes de l'aéroport en taxi ou UBER
Très bien situé à quelques arrêts de métros du centre ville ! il faut une dizaine de minute à pied pour rejoindre l'arrêt de métro IPO de l'appartement. 
L'arrêt de bus pour aller à la plage (MATOSINHOS SUL) est également très bien placé ! Il faut 25 - 30 min depuis l'arrêt Rua sao tomé !
Ensuite l'air bnb : il s'agit de magnifiques plusieurs appartements colorés avec terrasse et petite piscine bien pratique quand on veut se rafraîchir ! 
L'appartement en lui-même convenait très bien pour 2 personnes et surtout très propre :)

deuxièmement, l'hôte :
Fred est tout simplement une personne extraordinaire, d'une gentillesse incroyable et toujours disponible quand vous avez un service à lui demander ! Il nous a formidablement accueilli, n'hésitant pas à nous faire faire le tour du quartier pour repérer les endroits utiles (centre commercial, arrêts de transports...). 
Il est toujours disponible et n'hésite pas à venir faire un petit passage pour savoir si notre séjour se déroule bien !

Au final, ce séjour à Porto fut des plus agréables, bien aidé par Fred et son formidable appartement :)
We enjoyed staying at Fred's house.  He was really kind and insisted for helping us as soon as we arrived.
Descobri os estúdios do Fred durante uma viagem de trabalho. Fantástico sítio com uma fantástica atmosfera.
O espaço é muito bom e o Fred esteve sempre disponível!
We stayed with Fred for the week and he was the most hospitable Airbnb host we ever had! Thank you again - we will definitely be back at your beautiful place

Fred’s place was very stylish and clean. It was well equipped with plates/cutlery etc and plenty of towels. It is small but was perfect for us- a couple. It wasn’t as close to the metro as we hoped- you walk through a hospital car park to reach the metro and these gates are locked even to pedestrians in the evenings and on weekends- the walk to get around was significant. We used uber a lot which was fine. The pool is a plunge pool. The outdoor sofas looked lovely in the pics but there were no cushions on during our stay. Overall a good place, thank you.

This apartment is really neat. It's small, but very smartly equipped. It feels a bit like the student dorm in college you only dreamed you had. Despite its compactness, it really has everything you need and feels very luxurious to it. The kitchen is well equipped, the bathroom is very stylish and the bedroom would even suit more than two people. Unfortunately we couldn't use the patio as much as we liked due to the weather, but it looked really cozy. 

Also, public transportation is great as the metro and a couple of bus lines are close. To finish, Fred reacted very quickly when you needed him and was very friendly. We could send him a message through (Hidden by Airbnb) if we liked, so communication worked very informally.

Un logement cosy tel que décrit sur le site. Idéalement situé (10’ de centre-ville, 20’ de la plage), des extérieurs très appréciés à toute heure de la journée, la petite piscine est bienvenue après une journée de marche…
Fred, un hôte au TOP : accueillant, souriant, toujours disponible et de très bons conseils! Toujours prêt à nous aider…
Une adresse que nous conserverons et proposerons à nos amis, sans aucune hésitation. 
Encore Merci Fred!!!!

Anne-Isabelle & Margot

Tout s'est très bien passé. Fred n'a pas pu être là pour notre arrivé mais il s'est arrangé pour que tout se passe bien tout de même. 

L'appartement est très bien pour un couple et la piscine à l'extérieure est vraiment agréable, de jour comme de nuit, en fonction du temps à Porto. ^^

Un point que nous avons vraiment apprécié, c'est la tranquillité de l'appartement situé au fond d'un petit lotissement privé très mignon.
Uma boa escolha, localizado numa zona calma da cidade, no entanto de rápido/fácil acesso ao centro.

Fred s’est rendu disponible à l’heure de notre arrivée. Un accueil des plus agréables et sympathique ( et en français ) !!!
Fred nous a rapidement fait part des immanquables de Porto et des bons restaurants .
Son logement était conforme aux photos, décoré avec goût, propre et fonctionnel.
Nous sommes ravis de notre séjour à Porto.
Nous recommandons +++
Encore merci Fred!

Fred a été un parfait hôte du debut a la fin tres arrangeant sur les heures d’arrivés, et compréhensif. L’appartement était tres propre et cosy. Nous avons tres bien été reçu, et Fred a ete disponible pendant tout le sejour pour nous conseiller les meilleures adresses locales de Porto. Un grand merci !
Logement conforme à la description, très propre et accessible. Fred est disponible, réactif et attentionné. Je recommande fortement le logement.
Un grand merci pour ce séjour et l'accueil  !
We had a great stay at Fred’s place, definitely recommend it!
Buen alojamiento para pasar un par de días visitando la ciudad.

name: KONA COUNTRY CLUB VILLAS
summary: ENJOY SPECTACULAR  OCEAN AND SUNSET VIEWS OVERLOOKING THE GOLF COURSE  FROM THE LANAI OF THIS SPACIOUS 2 BEDROOM, 2 BATH CONDO WITH A LOFT. LOCATED ALONG THE 17TH GREEN AND THE 18TH TEE OF THE KONA COUNTRY CLUB. COUNTRY CLUB VILLAS IS A POPULAR COMPLEX WITH FABULOUS AMENITIES,  3 SWIMMING POOLS, 2 SPAS, 2 TENNIS COURTS, AND BEAUTIFUL TROPICAL GROUNDS WITH ASSIGNED AND VISITOR PARKING. GREAT BREEZES AND AIR CONDITIONERS IF NEEDED  A FEW MINUTES WALK TO KEAHOU SHOPPING CENTER AND NEARBY BEACHES.
space: Quick and reliable Wi-Fi throughout unit. Smart Tv's Fully equipped kitchen, dishes, pots and pans, silverware, toaster, microwave, blender, toaster oven, and many more items for guests use. Bedrooms have sheets, blankets, pillows, towels bathroom amenities, hairdryer and more. Ironing board and iron. Snorkeling equipment, beach chairs, towels, misc beach use items, tennis rackets, misc items  and upon request a set of golf clubs.
description: ENJOY SPECTACULAR  OCEAN AND SUNSET VIEWS OVERLOOKING THE GOLF COURSE  FROM THE LANAI OF THIS SPACIOUS 2 BEDROOM, 2 BATH CONDO WITH A LOFT. LOCATED ALONG THE 17TH GREEN AND THE 18TH TEE OF THE KONA COUNTRY CLUB. COUNTRY CLUB VILLAS IS A POPULAR COMPLEX WITH FABULOUS AMENITIES,  3 SWIMMING POOLS, 2 SPAS, 2 TENNIS COURTS, AND BEAUTIFUL TROPICAL GROUNDS WITH ASSIGNED AND VISITOR PARKING. GREAT BREEZES AND AIR CONDITIONERS IF NEEDED  A FEW MINUTES WALK TO KEAHOU SHOPPING CENTER AND NEARBY BEACHES. Quick and reliable Wi-Fi throughout unit. Smart Tv's Fully equipped kitchen, dishes, pots and pans, silverware, toaster, microwave, blender, toaster oven, and many more items for guests use. Bedrooms have sheets, blankets, pillows, towels bathroom amenities, hairdryer and more. Ironing board and iron. Snorkeling equipment, beach chairs, towels, misc beach use items, tennis rackets, misc items  and upon request a set of golf clubs. Total space of the unit is accessible. 3 swimming pools and 2 tenn
neighborhood_overview: The condo is located on beautiful Alii drive which is a main Kona street that runs a few miles and runs along the ocean for several miles beginning nearby to the condo. It ends at the northern end of the tourist facilities located all along the road. We are 0.9 mile from the wonderful beach of Kapahulu and 0.3 from the Kona Country Clubhouse and Amici's restaurant as well as about the same distance from Keauhou Shopping Center, with cinemas, restaurants, supermarket and more.
notes: The condo has 16 steps from the ground floor
transit: A trolley runs from Keauhou shopping center, a short few minute walk away, and goes back and forth to downtown Kailua Kona.
access: Total space of the unit is accessible. 3 swimming pools and 2 tennis courts also accessible. The popular beach of Kahalu'u, a fine little beach for sun, swimming, surfing and snorkeling. only .09 miles away from the unit. Kona Golf Club house and Amici's restaurant, .03 miles from the unit. Keauhou Shopping Center, .3 miles from unit
interaction: We live about 10 minutes away and are available for inquiries or assistance if needed. We will be there for check in and checkouts

host.host_about: Retired Judge enjoying life in Kona with Faythe, my wonderful wife.

reviews.comments: The condo was located in a golf course and it had a great view. Location was close to many grocery stores. The condo had all the necessities for living and for the vacation. The host was very friendly, and was always in touch with us. One downside was the noise, golfers were noisy and the street was busy. Thank you David and Faythe for the lovely condo.
Great! Very nice accommodation, quiet, clean, beautiful sunset! Wonderfull location! Looking for going back someday.

I was in Kona for the Ironman World Championsip with my wife and a friend. The apartment is well furnished and clean. Dave and his wife are very helpful. The place is quite and has a private parking. It is about 20-40mins (according to the traffic) from the main event area.

The location was wonderful. Close to town but far enough away to not be in the bustle of things and room to spread out.  The condo was very nice and had everything that one might need on a Hawaiian vacation and more.  David & Faythe were very nice and very helpful when we had some travel difficulties.  We will come back again!  The pools all had beautiful views and the sunset off your very large lanai cannot be beat.
We enjoyed our stay a lot. It’s a big loft for just two of us. We enjoyed the view, the patio and easy drive to many great snorkel places.

Great spot for a getaway! The view can't be beat. Seeing the ocean from bed is amazing... falling asleep to rustling palm leaves & waking to the birds was wonderful (occasionally the lawnmowers from the golf course too - but that's to be expected as it's part of what makes the beauty of the view!) The home is comfy, has everything we needed (including smart TVs if you want a Netflix night!  The location is fantastic - close enough to town without being in the midst of it all & shopping & restaurants just a quick walk away & main hwys are easy access. We throughly enjoyed our stay & would absolutely stay there again. Thank you!!
The place is very spacious. Host is very helpful and always responsive. Would definitely stay again.

We very much enjoyed nice view with both sunset and golf course.  The wind coming through the windows was fresh and comfortable.  We did not need air conditioners at all.  The location is very near the beach, nice restaurants and shopping center, which our stay made very active.  We met the owner couple of the property and they gave us all the necessary information.  Thanks for that we did not have any trouble at all. The space was just right for our party of four plus two year-old girl.
Excellent location and well supplied.

This lovely condo was everything and more than expected.  The view was amazing, very well stocked and set up for a great start to the vacation.  The condo was perfect for us and our needs.  David And Faythe were lovely guest whom we met for coffee one morning and traded stories of our travels with.  They are a very interesting lovely couple.  We will definitely be back next year to share their stiries, condo and a nice Gumbo.  We highly recommend this condo and these guys company.  Thanks for a terrific holiday and sharing your condo with us.  We saw the mos th wonderful sunsets on the lunai....

Great well-stocked and spacious suite with a wonderful view (we got to see an unobstructed sunset every clear night!) . I loved the option of using AC as well. Would definitely recommend this place again!

To keep it brief - you can pretty much trust the listing. The property is exactly as described. Well stocked unit: beach gear, utensils, toiletries etc. AC available but not really needed (at least in April/May). Good communication from the host. No real issues and a very pleasant experience all around.
There is a lot of beach equipment and they have info on a lot of things in the area. We had a great stay!
It's our second stay in this beautiful place. Its spacious, close to everything we need and stocked with snorkel gears. Highly recommend.
Nice high ceiling.  Place has pool and spa, nice TV with Blu Ray player, close to shopping, but away from it all on Alii drive.
This was an absolutely beautiful place. The location is perfect. We saw sunsets at night and rainbows in the morning from the lanai. Great value, great communication, great hosts.
A really great place to stay, with all the necessities and more!
The location is great and unit has everything you will need for your stay. Highly recommended.

Great location, beautiful view, great sunsets, a/c was available but the trade winds kept the place cool, without using it. Shopping was within walking distance, as well good snorkelling was close too. Would be pleased to come again.

name: Habitación en Villa Olímpica
summary: Apartamento recién remodelado a 5 minutos de la playa y muy bien comunicado con el centro. Rodeado de zonas verdes y espacios deportivos. Ideal para gente que quiera disfrutar de la ciudad a la vez que se aloja en un barrio tranquilo. Nice sunny apartment next to the beach and downtown.
space: Habitación con cama de matrimonio grande, luminosa y tranquila.
description: Apartamento recién remodelado a 5 minutos de la playa y muy bien comunicado con el centro. Rodeado de zonas verdes y espacios deportivos. Ideal para gente que quiera disfrutar de la ciudad a la vez que se aloja en un barrio tranquilo. Nice sunny apartment next to the beach and downtown. Habitación con cama de matrimonio grande, luminosa y tranquila. Por supuesto facilito mi móvil para cualquier ayuda que necesiten Barrio al lado de la playa con muchos espacios abiertos y buenas comunicaciones A dos calles de los transportes públicos al centro, metro L4 y autobús H16
neighborhood_overview: Barrio al lado de la playa con muchos espacios abiertos y buenas comunicaciones
transit: A dos calles de los transportes públicos al centro, metro L4 y autobús H16
