house_rules: - silencio de 10 a 7

host.host_about: Nacido en Pamplona, criado en Cataluña. Soy un profesor interesado en probar Airbnb. I speak English.

name: Liiiving in Porto | Foz Terrace Studio
summary: Welcome to our Foz Terrace Studio: a fantastic apartment set in a residential area, extremely well located, specially prepared for a relaxing and refreshing holiday between family and/or friends.
space: The space offers a bedroom with double bed, a comfortable living room, a kitchen equipped with all the utensils for your comfortable enjoyment, a full bathroom and even a double bed placed on the mezzanine. There is also a refreshing patio, perfect for sunbathing or alfresco dining. Book now! Because Liiiving is easy.
description: Welcome to our Foz Terrace Studio: a fantastic apartment set in a residential area, extremely well located, specially prepared for a relaxing and refreshing holiday between family and/or friends. The space offers a bedroom with double bed, a comfortable living room, a kitchen equipped with all the utensils for your comfortable enjoyment, a full bathroom and even a double bed placed on the mezzanine. There is also a refreshing patio, perfect for sunbathing or alfresco dining. Book now! Because Liiiving is easy. The guests have full access to the apartment. We leave our guests at ease, but we’re available whenever they need us. Within a five-minutes walk stroll you can find the beach, delicious and internationally recognized restaurants such as Terra, Cafeína and Portarossa, and an incredible promenade with sea and river views. Porto Downtown is only a 10-minutes' drive away. For those who do not have a car there is no problem, there is a whole transport network circulating right at the
neighborhood_overview: Within a five-minutes walk stroll you can find the beach, delicious and internationally recognized restaurants such as Terra, Cafeína and Portarossa, and an incredible promenade with sea and river views. Porto Downtown is only a 10-minutes' drive away. For those who do not have a car there is no problem, there is a whole transport network circulating right at the door of the apartment and in the surroundings that will comfortably take you to the center of Porto or Matosinhos.
notes: In order to make Porto more attractive, the municipal tourist tax came into effect. The rate of € 2.00 included in the price of stay, is for guests over the age of 13. It is charged per person and per night for a maximum of 7 nights. We have a transfer service that will leave you at the apartment! You only need to ask it (consult us for price) You can also enjoy a delicious breakfast, which can be delivered every morning in your apartment, upon request (consult us for price)
transit: You can request our transfer service whenever you need it (consult us for price) There is a vast public transportation network at your disposal.
access: The guests have full access to the apartment.
interaction: We leave our guests at ease, but we’re available whenever they need us.
house_rules: Treat the apartment and its items well and with care as it was your own  Smoking is just allowed outside. Please respect the neighbors: No loud noise allowed before 10h00 am or after 10h00 pm Please respect the check in and check out times: •	Check in: from 15h00-24h00. Please provide a check in time at least 24h hours before you arrival. If you need a baggage drop (from 12h00) please let us know in advance. A member of Liiiving Team will have the pleasure to meet and welcome you at the apartment at the arranged time. •	Check-out: until 11h00. (If there’s availability, we would love to provide you a late check-out). Please do take care of the decoration items, furniture, towels/linen and other apartment's equipment. Any doubts handling the apartment's appliances and equipment please feel free to contact us. Please leave all electric appliances turned off, make sure water taps are not running and close all doors and windows before check-out. We ask guests to please leave the dishes and

host.host_about:
Olá! We are Liiiving's Short Stay team!

We are looking forward to welcome you in our properties :)
We were born and we have lived in Porto. We will be happy to help you out to know and enjoy every city where we are installed !
We love to meet new people, enjoy literature, cinema, to travel, meeting other cultures, other ways of being and living life !
We are delighted to give a personal welcome to our guests and to receive them the best way we can :)
Hope to see you soon !

address.government_area: Aldoar, Foz do Douro e Nevogilde

reviews.comments: This place was really lovley, walking distance to shops,beach and bus routes. Hosts were very friendly too and made sure everything was ok.

Everything was perfect! Ines was a perfect host. She helped us with everything, no matter what time / weekend / .... she also gave us amazing tips. We would recommend everyone who goes to Porto to stay here!
It has been some wonderful days in Porto with a nice apartment! Thanks!!
Local tranquilo em pleno bairro da Foz. Espaço estiloso.

name: Clérigos Apartments - Apt. 4E for 2/3 Pax
summary: New, small and cozy apartment with kitchenette, mesanine room with two single beds, a sofa bed in the living room and a bathroom. Furnished and equipped, right in front of the Clérigos Tower, the heart of the city. It is about 100 m from the Lello's Bookstore and 500 m from São Bento Station. The apartment will be completely clean at the beginning of the stay. For stays of 7 or more nights, the apartment will be cleaned mid-stay and bath towels and bed sheets will be changed mid-stay.
space: The apartment is very well located, in one of the most emblematic buildings of the City down town. Is the perfect place to feel the city and its people.
description: New, small and cozy apartment with kitchenette, mesanine room with two single beds, a sofa bed in the living room and a bathroom. Furnished and equipped, right in front of the Clérigos Tower, the heart of the city. It is about 100 m from the Lello's Bookstore and 500 m from São Bento Station. The apartment will be completely clean at the beginning of the stay. For stays of 7 or more nights, the apartment will be cleaned mid-stay and bath towels and bed sheets will be changed mid-stay. The apartment is very well located, in one of the most emblematic buildings of the City down town. Is the perfect place to feel the city and its people. Bus and taxis at the door, subway and train at 500 m. We're very pleased to have you in our city, and at your disposal for any help you need. Welcome to Porto! As you walk out of the apartment building you're close to all trendy restaurants, famous monuments, and by night you can enjoy a fun evening. The "Clérigos Tower" will be your host during your stay
neighborhood_overview: As you walk out of the apartment building you're close to all trendy restaurants, famous monuments, and by night you can enjoy a fun evening. The "Clérigos Tower" will be your host during your stay, and you'll get to the famous "Lello Book Store" in less than 5 minutes walking distance.
notes: ACCOMMODATION BULLETIN - According to the "Local Accommodation Law" in Portugal, we are required to deliver to the SEF (Immigration and Borders Service) on the day of the check-in of all NON-PORTUGUESE guests, the "Accommodation Bulletin" with some personal data of the guests. For any questions or clarification about this form, please contact Airbnb. TOURIST MUNICIPAL RATE - The Tourist Tax will enter into force on 01 March 2018, with a value of € 2 per overnight stay and per person, up to a maximum total value of € 14 per person (seven straight nights per overnight stay/person). The Tourist Tax is charged on all guests older than 13 years. The tourist tax is paid by guests to Airbnb at the time of booking.
transit: In 10 minutes walking distance, you can find the "S. Bento Railway Station", the station is beautiful and there you can take the train or metro to longer distance places. About 50 meters from the building there is a public car park, guarded 24 hours a day.
access: Bus and taxis at the door, subway and train at 500 m.
interaction: We're very pleased to have you in our city, and at your disposal for any help you need. Welcome to Porto!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Très bon emplacement, des conseils de resraurants et visites donnés.  Tout le necessaire pour passer un très bon petit séjour et decouvrir cette très belle ville
Ubicación excelente

It was a great stay. Very clean, nice communication and helpful tipps. The apartment was downtown. Nice bars and nightlife around the corner. 
Great Host!!!!
It's a beautiful apartment. Perfect to spend a couple of days in Porto, especially with all the great suggestions from Miguel.

We had a great and comfortable stay here. The apartment was in a very convenient location within walkable distance to many restaurants, bars and other amenities. Communication and check-in was also easy and hassle-free!
Perfect place, location and Miguel is very kind.

Sehr schöne kleine Wohnung in super Lage. Ideal für Singels oder Paare. Ausstattung ist sehr gut. Sehr schönes Licht in der Wohnung und atemberaubendes View  aus dem Toiletenfenster ;-)
Vielen Dank und LG k ;-)
Ottimo appartamento ... Consigliatissimo

Posizione centralissima e prezzo super ok. Unico neo, 4 piani di scale. Ma la posizione è ottima per girare a piedi. L'appartamento si trova in pieno centro vicino alle principali attrattive storiche della città, oltre ai numerosi locali, ristoranti e non solo.

Appartamento in ottima posizione. Host preciso e comunicativo. Appartamento nel complesso buono ma con una piccolissima stonatura nel bagno non tenuto al top, ma si sa che noi italiani siamo un po' fissati
Lieu conforme au descriptif et très bien situé,dommage que le bruit de la rue ne perturbe nos nuits le week-end

Este apartamento es tal y como se muestra en las fotos. Incluso mejor, las vistas desde el baño son incluso expectaculares! Nos han tratado fenomenal y no hemos tenido ningun problema en la hora de llegada ni hora de salida. Muy limpio todo! Contestan rapidamente. Ubicacion inmejorable a pie de todos los restaurantes y monumentos. Sin duda repetiré.

Excellent séjour dans un logement parfait pour 2-3 jours à Porto. Miguel est réactif quand on a besoin de lui, l'appartement est très bien placé, fonctionnel et charmant.Bref, un joli cocon très bien rénové ! La salle de bains est propre, la douche est grande, les azuléjos d'origine dans les wc  mais le lavabo un poil petit.
Par contre, boules quies indispensable la nuit car quartier animé et ventilation à l'extérieur de l'immeuble assez présente.
Pour un couple, je recommande vivement !

Excelente localização para quem quer conhecer a baixa da cidade, sem recurso a meios de transporte. A considerar numa próxima visita ao Porto.  
Anfitrião muito acessível e flexível.

Miguel was the perfect host, giving us great tips and following our stay with lightning fast response. Great place, clean, beautiful. The location is central. Thank you for the experience. It was a pleasure staying at your place.
Location is great! You’ll be in the walking distance to all interesting places. Miguel communicates very professionally and clearly. Thank you a lot!
Fraai appartement op zeer centrale lokatie. Alles is op loopafstand. Prima communicatie met Miguél

Schöne Wohnung, in der problemlos 3 Personen schlafen können. Perfekte Lage zu Bars, Clubs und Restaurants (Wohnung liegt direkt am Clerigos Turm). Der Gastgebr Miguel war sehr hilfreich was Tipps und den Transfer vom Flughafen anging.

El apartamento es tal cual se muestra en las fotos, limpio y muy bonito.
Es muy fácil ponerse en contacto con Miguel, nosotras tuvimos un pequeño problema que nos arregló perfecta y rápidamente.
El apartamento está muy bien ubicado, pero hay que tener en cuenta que la calle está en una zona de marcha nocturna, por lo que el fin de semana es ruidoso.

O apartamento esta super centrico, zona perfeita para restaurantes, bares, lojas e visitar a cidade, sempre deslocando a pe ou com taxis ou metro proximo. O atendimento foi fantastico, fornecendo varias indicacoes e mostrando sempre maximo diaponibilidade e rapida comunicacao.

Miguel was lovely and waited at the apartment even though we arrived late. The apartment was incredibly well located and very clean. As it is on the top floor of an old building, it is quite chilly, so we sure to bring slippers and sweaters if you visit in fall/winter! Very simple amentinities (no kettle). Otherwise lovely, safe, and great communication with the host. Thanks Miguel! :)
Thank you for feeling so welcome to the place. location and amenities couldn't be any better. We want to return, definetly!!!

Our stay was perfect. Miguel was the best host. The place couldn't be in a better location. The house is just as you can see in the pictures: it's clean, comfy and warm. And the beds are so, so cosy!
I would recommend it to anyone.
La ubicación muy buena. El apartamento muy bonito y muy limpio. La restauracion del apartamento es espectacular. Tiene wifi propio, calefaccion, cocina, nevera... muy bien todo
Local avec hambiente super sympa et propre. Très proche du centre, des bars, des discothèques, etc. Expérience à répéter.

Je recommande sans hésiter ! L'appartement est conforme aux photos, propre, fonctionnel et bien situé. Très bonne literie !
Le chauffage fonctionne très bien, toutefois si vous y séjournez en hiver et que vous êtes un peu frileux, emportez un pyjama et des chaussons ;)
Miguel est très sympathique, réactif, ponctuel, chaleureux et parle très bien anglais. Il nous avait envoyé une liste de bons plans et d'activités à faire à Porto.
Obrigado Miguel :)
All the spaces are well optimized, the host is really kind and the instructions for the self check in are really precise, the flat is new and nice. quality/price top!
Nice apartment  for a few days. located centrally and everything is possible to visit by a short walk

Miguel was a wonderful host and the apartment outstanding!

Flawless!

Can recommend to anyone and next time this is where i'll be staying!

Obrigado Miguel!
It’s a very beautiful apartment with nice details. It’s perfectly located with many good restaurants around. We had a great time. Thank you Miguel
Tolle Wohnung in - für Touristen -  bester Lage. Nachts am Wochenende ein wenig Laut, aber nicht über die Maßen. Sehr schöne Einrichtung, gute Aussicht aus dem Bad und unkomplizierte Kommunikation.

Nice apartment cozy and clean. A bottle of water and some apples were waiting when we arrived, nice touch. It is near the University so it does get quite loud at night. Very central, close to the train station and Livraria Lello book store.
Super appart et très bien situé ! Le propriétaire est super sympa aussi !
Zeer centrale plek in de stad, makkelijk bereikbaar vanaf het vliegveld. Sfeervol appartement. s Nachts wel wat uitgaansgeluiden van de straat. Snelle en accurate communicatie over in- en uitcheck.

We really liked the apartment and it’s location. It’s located in the perfect area because it’s central and it’s  bright and clean. Miguel is a nice host who answers pretty quickly and has nice tips for the city. Would recommend the apartment to friends!

Miguel est quelqu’un de très gentil, serviable et réactif! Il est venu nous chercher à l’aéroport alors que notre avion avait pratiquement 4h de retard! 
Je le recommande vivement! 
L’appartement est très bien situé, en plein centre ville, dans une rue piétonne certes un peu bruyante mais ce n’est qu’un detail.
位置很好
The appartment was really nice and stylish:-)
Petit appartement sympa, bien situé, propre. Miguel est disponible, bienveillant et c'était un plaisir de le rencontrer
Miguel was great and very helpful.

The house is amazing also very convenient location. The bed is comfortable the the view from window is beautiful. The host Miguel is very helpful and fast response to any issue. The only thing that will be a bit tiring is the building has no elevator, but for me i think the location and kind hosting are more i'm concerned. Will definitely coming back here if i will be in Porto again in future!

à 1min des deux rues qui concentrent les boîtes de porto donc pratique pour faire la fête. pour autant ce n'est pas bruyant.  proche des restaurants et rues commerçantes. Miguel est réactif. attention particulière: deux pommes et une bouteille d'eau à notre arrivée.
Exevelente apartamento, muito bem localizado e equipado. Miguel é um excelente host, atencioso e prestativo! Voltariamos com certeza!
Great location, great restauration of an old building with pretty azulejos in the bathroom
Great place to stay.
房东很热情,人超nice !! 提前发邮件给我们推荐了很多附近好吃的餐厅｡(列了十分详细的清单,很体贴｡)房间里有椰子味香薰,很棒｡厨房的用具也十分齐全｡只是入住的两天邻居有装修,有一点点吵｡另外, (Hidden by Airbnb) 用西语和房东沟通完全没问题｡总之是性价比不错的选择｡
Perfect location in Porto city center. consequently a bit noisy during big events in Porto but it worth it. The appartment is very well equipped and Miguel was also very helpful.
Really great host and central location. Only complaint is that it was really loud at night

We can absolutely recommend this apartment. It is located in the city centre of Porto (-yes, it can be noisy at night but you're at all the nice places in only a few minutes-). In the middle of the night our host Miguel came to welcome us & he gave us a million tips & ideas in advance so that we were well equipped! The apartment is very charming and you have a wonderful view over Porto from the bathroom.

Parfait pour un séjour de quelques jours, idéalement placé dans les rues vivantes. De plus, Miguel est très sympa et réactif quant aux demandes que l'on a pu lui faire. Petit plus : l'appart a beaucoup de charme !
Localização excelente!

Die Angaben waren alle richtig, es sieht aus, wie auf den Fotos. Alles ist sauber und die Küche ist gut ausgestattet. Das Appartement eignet sich gut, für ein paar Tage in Porto, um die Stadt zu erkunden. In dem Viertel sind viele Bars und Restaurants, die teilweise nachts zu hören sind. Jedoch ist die Lage sehr zentral.  Miguel hat viele Tips und ist sehr gut erreichbar. Danke für deine Gastfreundschaft:)

Miguel was a very helpful and responsive host. He offered many great recommendations for restaurants and things to do. The place was also very clean and looked just like the posting. I liked the central location. Very close to the train station and many things in Porto.

If you are looking for a moderate cheap apartment in a great neighbourhood and where the communication between the owner and yourself is spotless, this is the place for you. From beginning to end we were provided with all info needed and even more. Miguel gave us tips to do, recommended us places to eat or visit. I surely will be coming back. This place is a rare find in the abundance of places to stay in Porto. No negative points, whatsoever.

Idéal pour un séjour a Porto proche du centre des restaurants des lieux a visiter 
Bon contact avec le locataire via sms appartement propre bien agencé et pratique comme les photos 
Très satisfaite du séjour et du service 
Je le recommande a tous

Unbelievable location - close to everything you need! A quaint and adorable little loft, with ample space for 3 guests. Well supplied apartment with towels, linen, pillows and coffee/tea for guests. Miguel is a great communicator and was very helpful. 
Only downfall for some may be:
- No air conditioning, meaning you need to open the windows. This was fine for us and we enjoyed the fresh air, however the street is a little loud at night time so bring ear plugs!
Thanks again Miguel!
Apartment clean, at a great location. Host is perfect, he gives a lot of extra information. No complaints. However don't forget your airpluggs because of the noise from the street

Logement très bien situé pour découvrir Porto. La rénovation de l'appartement (en photo dans la pièce de vie) est très fonctionnelle pour deux à trois personnes. L'équipement est réduit à son minimum. L'appartement est situé au 4eme étage sans ascenseur. A ce jour, il est toujours en travaux, qui peuvent débuter à 7h du matin. 
La communication est très rapide avec le propriétaire, qui s'adapte aux heures d'arrivée et de départ.

Super Lage im Zentrum von Porto, ideal für jegliche Aktivitäten. Miguel hat uns zahlreiche Tipps (Restaurant, Ausflugsziele, Portale etc.) vor unserer Ankunft zukommen lassen. Alles sehr unkompliziert und so wie es sein soll: 10 von 10!

localização privilegiada, a pé é possível chegar em poucos minutos a vários pontos turísticos, mini mercado, padarias, farmácia, bares e restaurantes.
Mas, com fica no quarto andar, os hóspedes precisam ter disposição pra subir escadas.
It was a nice apartment in the middle of the centre. Everything was really close by. No air conditioning in the room so sometimes it was hot.
Un lugar ideal si quieres pasar unos días en Oporto, el apartamento cuenta con los servicios básicos y la ubicación no puede ser mejor. Sin duda, repetiríamos.
Tal como en la foto la habitación de arriba es muy bonita y abuardillada está ideal los recomiendo mucho

Best location in Porto, all the touristic attractions were within walking distance but at the same time the area was not too busy or loud. 
Plenty of good restaurants and bars around, metro stations were few minutes walk from the appartment and made it very easy to go and explore the city further down. 
Amazing place to stay when visiting beautiful Porto.

Great central location with very accurate description and photos. Had a wonderful stay here with 2 friends and Miguel went above and beyond, organizing transfers and providing great local tips and recommendations.

Highly recommend but similar disclosure to other reviews that the street is quite noisy, even in the early hours, so pack ear buds.

Amazing location in Porto!
The aparment is beautiful and very clean. 
The street next to it has many bars/pubs/clubs and restaurants. 
I think its perfect for young people!

The host was really friendly and accommodating! 
We can recommend absolutely it!

10/10. Miguel is super helpful with tips about the city and he even arranged a cab to take us to the airport at the end of our stay which (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was seamless and really prompt and the flat was super super clean and convenient. Perfect location, would stay again.
Miguel is a perfect host ! The communication is easy, he's reactive and provides many useful tips ! The apartment is nice, clean and well located. Don't hesitate if you want to discover Porto.
Nice place in a nice area in the city centre. Can be noisy at night on the week-end.

Miguel was a very nice host he helped us in best possible way. His apartament is in a very Prime location and close to all the important places
The place is just as shown in the photographs and very immaculate
Muito obrigado Miguel!

Miguel was a great host. Communication was flawless and we really enjoyed our stay there. Although it's a bit noisy at night it's a fair price to pay, especially considering the location of the apartment. Thank you!!

The apartment is in a great location in the centre of the city - within short walking distance to most places. Was also the perfect size for the 3 of us.
Miguel was a wonderful host and gave great recommendations of things to do in the city. He always responded quickly to any of our queries and was extremely happy to help

Die Wohnung befindet sich mittem im Zentrum in einem beliebten Gebiet mit Bars, Restaurants und Clubs. Alle Sehenswürdigkeiten von Porto sind von diesem Ort zu Fuss leicht erreichbar.
Die Wohnung ist sehr geringhörig. Lärm von der Strasse ist auch um Morgens um 3 Uhr noch sehr laut. Dies ist im Inserat auch so beschrieben. Trotzdem ist es für Personen mit leichten Schlaf nicht ideal. Am besten selber lange im Ausgang bleiben. ;-)

Nice, cosy and clean Apartment in the heart of Porto. Not a quiete place, just simply glazed Windows! Beautiful view from the Bathroom and a special thanks to our host Miguel, who gave us great tips and recommendations.

This is such a lovely place! It‘s cozy but although spacious thanks to the second „floor“. The apartment is very central with a lot of sights, cafes and restaurants nearby. Just step outside the door and you are in the middle of beautiful Porto. I would love to stay here again next time!

L'appartement de Miguel est idéalement situé et très propre. Nous avons passé un excellent séjour à Porto. Miguel est un hôte de qualité qui est très réactif lorsque vous lui faites une demande particulière. Il nous a donné des renseignements sur comment nous rendre de l'aéroport à son domicile et plein de bonnes adresses sur place.
Seul petit bémol, le bruit en fin de semaine car l'appartement est situé dans la zone des bars et les portugais font la fête très tard dans la nuit!

We had two nights at this place and would definitely come again! The apartment is beautiful and the location is also perfect. All in all, everything worked really well, more than expected. Thank you Miguel!

Le séjour s'est très bien déroulé, Miguel et moi avons échangé par mail et par le biais de whats ap une fois sur place pour convenir des modalités d'entrée dans l'appartement, de wifi et de départ de l'appartement pour laisser la clé. L'appartement est très bien situé, au cœur du centre ville, extrêmement facile de se déplacer à pied ou transports en commun à proximité, l'appart est tout refait, design et pratique, il fait chaud sur la mezzanine c'est agréable et un peu plus froid en bas mais avec le chauffage ça a été parfait, les azulejos conservés dans la salle de bain/wc sont chouettes ainsi que la luminosité dans cette SDB originalement organisée, il manquerait peut-être une cafetière mais les cafés portugais sont tellement bons que finalement ça ne nous a pas manqué! Merci Miguel, je reviendrai avec plaisir

L’appartement est impeccable et très bien agencé. La localisation est parfaite: près des principales attractions de Porto !
Miguel est très sympathique et il nous a donné toutes les informations  pour visiter la ville !
Je recommande fortement cet appartement !

The space was stylish, clean, comfortable and in a fantastic location! The host was super responsive with communication and gave great ideas for restaurants and things to do in Porto. A perfect place to stay to experience Porto!

Très belle appartement, très bien situé
Un peu bruyant mais précisé dans l'annonce donc nous avons su nous adapter.
Miguel a été parfait, très disponible et à l'écoute
super séjour a Porto dans cet appart
It is a place really nice to stay. Close to the train station and next to the central place. Miguel is an amazing host with really good communication. Good quality-price relation for the Airnbn

It was a big pleasure to stay in this apartment. It situated in the historical center of Porto. Appartment is on a 3 floor without  elevator, but it's ok. All useful information about Porto, helping with our luggage, well coming light lunch for guests was provided.  It was a little bit cold in a living area but on a second floor (where beds situated) was warm and comfortable. It seems to me that in summer time it will be very good there. We highly recommended to stay in this  appartment. Thanks for everything.

name: Nautical Nest
summary: Welcome to our bright sunny, clean and airy newly renovated 1 bedroom, one bath hale. Sip a cup of coffee and watch the sun rise right outside your front door :) Better yet take a 10 minute walk to the beach and watch it rise from the ocean! Restaurants, stores, and coffee shops are only a 5 minute walk away as well.
space: Our kitchenette has everything you need- fridge, microwave, sink, coffee maker, hot plate, rice cooker/crock pot & toaster oven. The living area has dining for 4, flat screen with all movie channels and Sunday Ticket, and a queen size futon (doubles as extra bed) for snuggling on a rainy day. There are plenty of windows to let the ocean breeze blow through.
description: Welcome to our bright sunny, clean and airy newly renovated 1 bedroom, one bath hale. Sip a cup of coffee and watch the sun rise right outside your front door :) Better yet take a 10 minute walk to the beach and watch it rise from the ocean! Restaurants, stores, and coffee shops are only a 5 minute walk away as well. Our kitchenette has everything you need- fridge, microwave, sink, coffee maker, hot plate, rice cooker/crock pot & toaster oven. The living area has dining for 4, flat screen with all movie channels and Sunday Ticket, and a queen size futon (doubles as extra bed) for snuggling on a rainy day. There are plenty of windows to let the ocean breeze blow through. The access to the one bedroom is along the walkway to the left of the main house. There is a patio area for grilling, and a seating area outside unit. A washer and dryer are available during your stay. Please contact host for access. We are available 24/7 via call or text, and live on the property. We have had guests in
neighborhood_overview: Awesome location! Just a 10 minute walk to Kailua beach and only a 10 minute drive to the world famous Lanikai Beach. 5 minute walk to Aikahi shopping center, home to many new restaurants including Nico's Pier 38 Kailua and Hawaii Hot Pot ShabuShabu and Sushi! We are conveniently located in a main street making it very easy to hop on H3 to head to Waikiki, Honolulu, airport and Pearl Harbor. It is just under 4 miles to hop on the scenic route to the North Shore. Kailua is such a cute little town, we waited almost 10 years to find the right home and this is exactly where I dreamed of raising my family.
notes: -Trade winds blow rain in, so please close all windows when you leave the unit. -Hot water takes awhile to get to the unit (old house) -Please call or text upon arrival. -Please call or text when you need to do laundry. -Please recycle with bins provided
transit: Bus stops in both directions located just a minute walk down the road. We also have bikes and kayaks for your land and water transportation :)
access: The access to the one bedroom is along the walkway to the left of the main house. There is a patio area for grilling, and a seating area outside unit. A washer and dryer are available during your stay. Please contact host for access.
interaction: We are available 24/7 via call or text, and live on the property. We have had guests in the past, who have stayed for a week without us seeing or hearing them. We have also had made many new friends who have joined us for a BBQ's and beach!
house_rules: - Quiet Hours 9 PM- 6 AM - Laundry Hours: Contact Host

host.host_about: I'm a preschool teacher turned play at home Mom. Living the dream raising 1 boy, one girl here in paradise with the coolest guy in the world (my husband Bret). We live a very healthy, super active lifestyle and love to be surrounded nature. We try to live life to the fullest and love traveling, eating good food, trying new things and meeting new people :)

reviews.comments:
Bret and Shawna's place was perfect for our little family. They were communicative and gracious hosts through and through. 

We loved our stay and would totally recommend it!

I had a great stay overall, the place was clean (never saw a insect inside which is unusual for Hawaii), well appointed (couldn't think of anything I wanted or needed that wasn't thought of), safe (well lit outside and gated).  

The only reason I am giving a score of four is the road noise.  The property which is attached to the side of a residence is on a main road.  The unit doesn't have air conditioning which most homes in Hawaii don't, as utilities in Hawaii are expensive and nighttime temperatures don't nesastate it.  So having all the windows open at night will make quality sleep a challenge especially if your a light sleeper.

The owners were friendly, helpful and communicated well both before and during my stay.

Aloha!
A great house in Hawaii, enjoy it!!!

It was fantastic stay for our family. very close to the beach, supermarket, some restaurant, bus stop... really nice place! Bret, Shawna and their kids are really friendly and we have appreciated to their kindness.

Walking distance to beautiful beaches, driving/biking distance to the famous Lanikai. We got to catch 3 sunrises over the nearby beach--highly recommended! Clean, comfortable, very functional space to stay! The hot plate was great for us to save a little money on a few dinners. We never had trouble with parking by the house. It was easy to feel at home here! We had an amazing time!

Shawna and Brett were hands down the best! The first place we were going to stay fell through and we needed a room last minute, within an hour of contacting them we were at their amazing beach cottage. 

They greeted us with the sweetest most genuine smiles and made us feel welcome from the beginning. 

They let us use their bikes and double kayak even going the extra literal mile to drop us off in a sweet spot where it would be most conviennent to put in at. 

The place is a short walk to the beach, clean, has a little kitchen, is private, and the best little place ever. It had everything we needed and then some. We weren't bothered that it didn't have air as we felt like we were sleeping on the beach with the air that circulates naturally from the ocean breeze. 

We will most definitely go back. Hopefully sooner than later and if you need a place to stay, go stay with Shawna and Brett!!!
Shawna's place is in a great location, is quiet, and comfortable. I'd stay there again!
I enjoyed my stay.

We absolutely LOVED our stay at this AirBNB spot. The location was so perfect. We were close to shopping, restaurants and the BEACH! They let us use their beach chairs and even a volleyball. It was much bigger than I expected. It had everything we needed, and it was SUPER clean! I am so glad we stayed there.
Cute little place and fit our budget and had everything we needed for our stay. The price was great for my budget and was a good value.
A lovely place to stay. Would come back and stay!!

Bret and Shawna are great hosts.  Completely available and unobtrusive at the same time!!! Very warm and delightful people!
The little place is well maintained, in a great location, and it is a treat to step out the door and immediately see lovely flowers! I have stayed in or near Kailua several times and Shawna's Nautical Nest is a very good value. While cozy, the living area with a futon and bedroom area separate allows for options a studio would not.

Shawna and Bret were very friendly and welcoming hosts. They provided a queen size air mattress in addition to the bed and futon for us to sleep on. Check in and check out was easy and their place was only a short walk to the beach. There was plenty of parking available on the street. I would highly recommend this place to anyone!
Everything is great
Great place to stay! Close to interstate and beach. Quiet place. Nice surf board decoration. Made us really feeling some of the islands spirit. Lovely hosts.
Shawna's homes were beautiful and cozy in a great location only a short walk to the beach.  Her and her family were amazing hosts.  We would absolutely stay again!

Shawna and Bret are great hosts! They make you feel at home and are super accommodating. The place is super clean and filled with all the little necessities you didn’t even know you needed. After leaving a dress at their place they even reached out in order to get it back to us. It would be a pleasure to stay with them again. 10/10

I spent 9 days with Shawna and Bret in their home-away-from-home Nautical Nest.  Our little suite was perfect for us.  It was clean, pleasant, and nicely decorated and stocked with everything you'd need.  The bed in the bedroom was very comfortable, and the futon in the living room worked just fine for my daughter.  The many ample windows allowed the gentle trade winds in.  There was no AC, but certainly there was no need, as we were never overly warm.  Best of all, Bret and Shawna were themselves warm, welcoming, and helpful.  They have a sweet, calm lab, Bella who greeted us friendlily from time to time, and two quiet little kiddos who toddled around the front yard from time to time but who were never noisy.  Also, and this is a big plus, they have 3 bicycles and a couple of kayaks to you to use for free.  Bret will even help you load the kayak onto your car.  The beach is an easy 10-15 minute walk or 5 minute bike ride away, and the shops and restaurants in Kailua town center are only a 10 minute drive or 20 minute easy bike ride away.  All-in-all, a great place to stay, out of the commotion of Waikiki, but yet only 20 minutes away from the airport, Downtown Honolulu, Hanauma Bay, or many cool hikes.
What a great place and location. The unit was clean and had everything needed for our stay. Also Bret and Shawna were wonderful, friendly hosts and communicated things well.
Shawna and Bret were so fantastic and welcoming. We highly recommend staying here, it’s so central to everything and the hosts are great and so welcoming.

Shawna and her family was a great host!
The house was better than I expected! It was very nice.
My family enjoyed so much!
I want to stay here again when I visit Hawaii next time!
Thank you!
Great place to stay! Very clean! My wife and I highly recommend this site!

Shawna was so wonderful and the place was super comfortable and cute. She let us borrowed bikes and we biked to the beach, which is about 10 min away. There is a Safeway close by also. Overall it was a really nice stay and the location is great. We really enjoyed the seclusion from the main busy areas.

We had a wonderful time at the "Nautical Nest".  Shawna and Bret are wonderful hosts, going well out of their way to make our stay a great one.  It's a nice location to explore Oahu. We would love to stay again if we make it back here!

Shawna and Bret were such great hosts. They answered all our questions and let us use their beach chairs which was awesome! The place was clean and close to everything we wanted. Would definitely recommend staying at Nautical Nest!
Amazing rental! We loved everything about our stay with Shawna and Bret! Can't wait to go back!

Shawna and Bret are wonderful hosts and made sure that we had everything we needed. They even made sure to provide a play pen, books and sand toys for our kids and let them play on their trampoline! We had a great time and enjoyed being close to so many beautiful beaches. We would definitely recommend the "Nautical Nest".

Great place to stay, easily accessible and Shawna and Bret were great hosts. They let us use their beach gear so we didn’t have to rent any and overall so hospitable and welcoming. Would definitely stay here again!
I recommen this place, nice and quite
they were great. it was a lovely space with everything we needed

Fantastic place, amazing value! We loved our stay at the Hale. It's a very cute guest house with amazing beach house touches and decor. The bathroom was recently renovated and the apartment is equipped with a comfortable bed and renovated finishes like the bathroom and kitchen. Good wifi, fast communication and help from Bret and Shawna. They were extremely hospitable and made this a top-5 Airbnb stay I've ever had. Just a super cool place. But do understand there is not A/C. No A/C is common in Hawaii so we knew what we were getting into.
Shawna and Bret were great hosts. Friendly, welcoming and helpful. Anything we needed they provided. We would definitely go back if we go back to the area.

My Family and I, we had a really nice stay at Shawnas house! There was a warm welcome just as we were family members so we immediately felt at home in our holiday appartment. Beaches are beautiful in Kailua and we could use the bikes to get there. We highly recommend a stay at Shawnas home and we hope to get the chance to come here again - loved it!!!!

Upon our arrival a little attention was waiting for us to welcome us.

Really a nice place well located, near the city and services and at the same time a few minutes from one of the most beautiful beaches of the islands. A small apartment really adorable with a terrace and a bbq or we passed to the opportunity our evenings in the tranquility.

Thanks to Brett, who was particularly effective with a problem at the refrigerator. I would not have done better.

Alain and Manon
Highly recommend! Great value. Great location. Awesome hosts!!

Shawna and Bret were wonderful hosts. Very welcoming and the communication was perfect.
The apartment was exactly as described. You can reach the beaches, restaurants and shopping easily per car or bike in minutes. We recommend staying at Shawnas place and will book again next time when we are back to this beautiful area.
Thank you very much Shawna and Bret for a wonderful time!
Aloha! Carsten and Britta

Shawna and her husband are very friendly!  Our family showed up at 1:30, tired from a long flight, and they made us feel welcome and allowed us to check in then instead of wait for the check-in time.  They have a bunch of chairs and beach equipment outside their front door, which she told us to use whenever we wanted.  The location is on a busy street, but the apartment is quiet and there is plenty of free street parking.  Public beach access is about a 10 minute brisk walk.  This isn't a luxury place, but it is fairly priced for the money. 
Kailua is a great place to stay!  Plenty of good restaurants and beaches, without the frantic tourism of Honolulu.

Shawna’s place was perfect for my mom, grandmother, and me during our stay in Kailua. The location is amazing, the suite has everything we needed, and Shawna is literally the sweetest and most accommodating host ever. Would absolutely recommend this place!
The best place in Kailua.

We stayed at Shawna’s place for three nights with our two little boys. The apartment is small for four but really nice and clean. Shawna was really helpful with all kind of tips, communication was quick and easy and the beautiful Lanikai-Beach is just a five minutes drive away. We can definitely recommend this place!
Great hospitality!

Amazing spot!!! Private with great hosts and amenities! We would book it again in a heartbeat. We rented a car and found this the perfect location to see the whole island with a reasonable drive! But the bus line is feet away and a beautiful beach a short walk.

Fantastic location - away from the hustle and bustle of the town but only 5 minutes away if you want some great food or to hang out at Lanikai Beach. Also central to some great hikes like Olomana and the Lanikai Pillboxes. Lastly, Shawna and her family are super accommodating and have great recommendations for the island no matter what you’re looking to do!
We had a lovely time at Shawna's small but cute and cozy space.  No complaints.  Totally great and kid-friendly.

This was the PERFECT place for our little family for our week long vacation. My wife and I stayed here with our two younger children (8 and 6) and loved it! Shawna is the world's best host and helped make our trip be everything that it could be. Kailua is a wonderful little city with everything you will need along with some of the most beautiful scenery/beaches Oahu has to offer. Unlike the Waikiki area traffic was minimal and getting places was easy! I would highly reccomend it for a local/tourist balanced experience.

Shawna is so sweet and accommodating! She provides boogie boards, bikes, beach chairs and other beach goodies (including beach towels which is very nice!) The welcome gifts were a nice touch and the coffee was delicious!! Thank you so much, I hope to be back one day!

This was our first Air b&b stay and we were a little nervous when we first booked. All of that nervousness melted away as soon as we walked onto the property. What a nice, clean and cozy little place. Shawna and Bret were great hosts, giving us suggestions on everything from restaurants, hikes, snorkeling...  everything! There was plenty of room for 3 of us. We chose it because of its proximity to the Marine Corps base but travelled all over the island easily. I can’t say enough nice things about this experience. It made our trip awesome! If we ever get to go back this is exactly where we will be staying.

It is a best place with kids. Host has every beach stuff for adult and kids. You can use everything even bicycle!. And safeway and some restaurants are located in 5 minutes on foot. Kailua is a nice place and Shawna and her family are also nice people.

Spotless place and in a good location within walking distance to Kailua beach, grocery stores etc. The hosts were very welcoming, easy to communicate with and provided lots of beach towels and also beach umbrellas, kids toys and boogie boards that guests can borrow for a nice day on the beach. Had a great stay and would highly recommend it!
Perfect location. All the amenities needed. Easy parking. Clean space. Cute outdoor space too. Everything perfect.
Good space for one person. Kitchenette, bedroom, and living space are clean and standard.
We enjoyed our stay and how close this cute place is to the beach! Very quiet for sleeping!

This place was so cute, clean and perfect for what we were looking for.  Although we didn’t interact with Shawna very much, she introduced herself at check in, was extremely friendly and ready to provide recommendations.

The Nautical Nest is a very comfortable and clean place to stay in beautiful Kailua.  Nice decor, easy access with electronic door lock,  items for cooking, lots of towels, comfy bed and close the beach.  Shawna checked in with us a couple times to make sure everything was okay. She recommended an off the beaten path place in Honolulu called La Mariana which is one of the last original tiki bars in Hawaii. It's a restaurant as well and has great history and has been the back drop at different times for the Hawaii 50 show.  So if you're interested in that kind of thing, it's worth the drive.   Shawna is a wonderful host and her upbeat energy is amazing.  We highly recommend the Nautical Nest!

name: Conduit Rd Luxury Mid-Levels Apt
summary: Welcome to my home in the exclusive neighbourhood of Conduit Rd. This apartment is extremely spacious and quiet, situated on the hills overlooking Central. Tastefully decorated, private and quiet, my apartment is perfect for those looking to get away from the hustle and bustle of Hong Kong but be within 10 mins of everything in Central. There is a live in english-speaking helper who can provide cleaning and amazing Thai food, on request. Privacy is also respected, please let your wishes known.
space: The apartment is tastefully decorated with British military memorabilia and unique artwork. You will have access to all of the space and can we only ask that you treat it as your own. The outside balcony is perfect for having a cold drink or snack in the sun.

notes: No other guests other than those booked will be permitted access as its a quiet residential block.
transit: Best way to get to and from the building is via taxi or Uber, the MTR is a 20 minute walk down the escalators. There are also many minibuses along Conduit rd, and there is always a long line of taxis available.
interaction: The helper will be available to help if you so wish. If you would prefer privacy then that can also be arranged but the kitchen is shared space between guests and the helper.

name: Akin YellowHouse 2nd floor twin room good location
summary: Twin beds with separate bathroom, nice big door/window leading to balcony
space: This room is on a separate floor with your own key.  You have your own private bathroom
description: Twin beds with separate bathroom, nice big door/window leading to balcony This room is on a separate floor with your own key.  You have your own private bathroom Your flat has your own floor and locked door. There is no lift. Wooden stairs are curved going up. I live nearby and am available by email and phone if you need anything. The Fener-Balat quarter, is a great area to walk around and safe to do so.  Whilst it is becoming trendy it retains it historical character. You will often see Brides having photos or children playing soccer in the streets.  The roads are quite narrow and go in all directions, the slopes can get steep but the cobblestones, among coloured Ottoman houses, some superbly restored, others irremediably ruined, that one can feel the history of Istanbul.  Rum Lisesi, the Greek Orthodox College, the magnificent and peculiar red-brick building that dominates the hill of Fener. Climbing up a picturesque staircase one will then reach the top of the hill, where once the a
neighborhood_overview: The Fener-Balat quarter, is a great area to walk around and safe to do so.  Whilst it is becoming trendy it retains it historical character. You will often see Brides having photos or children playing soccer in the streets.  The roads are quite narrow and go in all directions, the slopes can get steep but the cobblestones, among coloured Ottoman houses, some superbly restored, others irremediably ruined, that one can feel the history of Istanbul.  Rum Lisesi, the Greek Orthodox College, the magnificent and peculiar red-brick building that dominates the hill of Fener. Climbing up a picturesque staircase one will then reach the top of the hill, where once the ancient walls of Constantinople ran, and it is precisely here that in the 13th century was built a church unknown to most, but of fundamental importance in the history of the city. This is the graceful Church of St. Mary of the Mongols, also known as the Red Church. The neighbourhood of Fener is situated one of the most important lo
transit: It is 2.6km to the Spice market at Eminonu walking at a reasonable pace.  It is about 4km from the blue mosque and hippodrome.  You don’t need to walk…it is about 200 metres to a bus stop which has buses going past around every 5-10 minutes during the day.  These can take you either to Eminonu where there are great back street markets or there is a bus that also takes you to Taksim in about 10 minutes (traffic dependant).  This is a great location to base yourself and really get to know the real Istanbul as well as set you up as a base to visit the main tourist attractions.  In order to do Istanbul some justice you really need around 5 days to visit the main areas and attractions.
access: Your flat has your own floor and locked door. There is no lift. Wooden stairs are curved going up.
interaction: I live nearby and am available by email and phone if you need anything.
house_rules: - Treat this apartment like your own home

host.host_about:
Hi ; This is Tahir . i have been living in İstanbul almost all my life andtotally in love in this city  especially in old part of city which we call as inside the walls. 
Worked 15  years in Sultanahmet as a hotel manager and decided to establish Akin-house as a new project in Balat- Fener Area. 

 i am an easy going and hard working man . love to travel thats why i can understand what a tourist need when they travel and how i can help them best .

name: Stunning vintage room with AC (old town)
summary: Gorgeous vintage room equipped with smart TV and Netflix, hair dryer, shower gel, towels, remote fan and AC. Please notice that the shared bathroom is not big but practical. In the kitchen, a Nespresso machine, mineral water, fridge and dishes are available. Extremely well located, right in the heart of Barcelona, next to Basilica Santa Maria del Mar. Great area for dinning and also its stunning architecture, 10 min walk from the beach and 10 min walk from all the shops in city centre.

house_rules: Guests must read our generic document in order to get the full address and find the apartment. Check-in is from 2 pm and check out until 12 am with no exceptions.  Check-in time as well as luggage drop off should be provided with 24hours in advance, to make sure we are available to welcome you.  Guests may drop in and leave in luggage outside this schedule with previous consent. The host will wait only one hour prior to check in time provided by guests, if guests fail to communicate their delay a new check in time must be settled with a risk of little availability from the host part. We also appreciate that from 10 pm to 10 am guests are discrete in the house. People that are not guests must have authorisation from us to come in the apartment.

host.host_about:
Hello there ,
Welcome to my home.
I am outgoing and love meeting new people.
the best thing is to visit places i've never seen before, and go for adventures.
Embrace the new and dare to make new friends.

I am renting out two rooms in my apartment because i love to travel and i want to share my home with others.
This makes me able to afford my lifestyle and an artist and musician.
