host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Gurpreet was very accommodating and went out of his way to make sure my stay was good. The place is very clean and newly renovated and is a steal for the price. I would highly recommend staying here if you ever need a place to stay.

Singh's place is sooo beautiful. It's my ideal home, dark hardwood floors, A/C in the rooms, nice and clean bathroom with toiletries provided. Singh was very attentive, asking if I was happy and comfortable every time our paths crossed. I felt quite safe and rested comfortably. The neighborhood has a wonderful East and West Indian community with lots of authentic restaurants nearby.  The area is near an automotive district so there aren't tons of bars and clubs, but still plenty to do. The buses and trains are very near so get a metro card and have a blast. JFK is less than 10 minutes away, it was a $13 Lyft ride.
The house is near the JFK airport, the room and the bathroom are pretty clean and cozy and the host did his best to help me with what I needed. Totally recomended.
I loved my stay Singh's place. It was for only one night but it was very clean and comfortable and he was a very nice host, and I will probably be coming back soon.
La habitación y el baño estaba limpio y el hogar era seguro. Gracias por el agua, y la toalla. Su hospitalidad lo aprecio mucho. धन्यवाद श्री सिंह।

Gurpreet and family are all wonderful and respectful of your privacy. I had a flight delay that pushed my check in past midnight, they did not make me feel like a burden nor had any issue with this, a very very clean home in a good neighborhood.

The host was extremely nice to us, and his willingness to help us with any questions we had made the stay easier and convenient. 
The check in time and the check out time was flexible, the public transportation was near by the place so it was nice moving around even when we didn't have a car with us.
I would definitely visit here again when I visit NYC.
This was my second time at Singh's place and both times were great experiences, Singh's a very nice host, the house is clean, right next to a bus stop and restaurants

다음날 아침비행기로 출국이라 공항에서 가까운 숙소찾다가 예약했어요. 저렴한 가격에도 불구하고 너무 친절하게 대해주시고 답변도 빨라서 완전 편하게 지냈어요. 체크인도 바로 하구요. 

자메이카 역에서 내려서 24번 버스타고 가면 숙소 바로 앞 정류장에서 내릴 수 있어요. 

대신 버스비는 메트로카드로 내거나 동전으로만 낼 수 있어서 미리 준비해가시구요. 달러는 안된다고 하더라구요. 

심플한 방에 에어컨 빵빵하고 화장실 깔끔해서 혼자 하루 편하게 쉬다왔네요!! 동네도 예뻐요 ㅋㅋ 다음날 자메이카역 가는 정류장도 알려줘서 완전 편하게 도착했어요. 

밤비행기로 도착한 분들이나 다음날 공항갈 일 있는 분들은 정말 편하게 이용하실 수 있을 거예요! 추천드립니다. 

I'm really appreciate Gurpreet and her children, especially her son. He really helped me a lot! he welcomed me as i arrived for check in and gave me lots of information that i asked for. 

Gurpreet's house is really easy to get to the airport bc it's close to the Jamaica station. you can take a bus #24 in front of the Jamaica station to get to the Gurpreet's place and get back to the Jamaica station. 

The place is really clean, neat and comfy. Towel is provided. Wifi and Air conditioner were perfect. 

They are all so kind and helpful! I Highly recommended!
I enjoyed my stay in this safe and fine neighborhood. Gurpreet et al, were friendly and helpful. It is nearby public transportation. I highly recommended to stay here.

Gurpreet was a very professional and caring host. He treated me like family and was very prompt with answering my questions via Airbnb and later through texting. Incredibly flexible with my requests and always ready to help. 

I booked the room only for 2 nights. But after I checked out in the morning, a situation arose and at 10 pm on the 3rd night I realized I needed a place to stay. I texted Gurpreet first and he came through for me which was a blessing. The really surprising thing was he made room for me on the fly just to help me out! I really really appreciated that gesture cuz he'd just met me 2 days back!

I didn't take any pictures of the place because he did not exaggerate at all! What you see in those pictures is what you'll get. Extremely clean and comfortable private room. Bathroom was impeccably clean throughout my stay. 

I'd recommend this place for everyone!

The place is perfect for rest between flights out of JfK . The airport is close . Unbelievable cleanliness - walk barefoot without a problem. Husband Singh was welcoming and friendly. Will definitely stay there again., Yolanda

The Host was extremely cordial and gracious.  I felt really great in this space because they treated me the way I would treat any guest in my own home.  The host was quick in communicating with me and helped me with my suitcase when I checked in.  The house was clean and there is an iron and blow dryer in every room.  The host asked me if there was anything else I needed; and made arrangements for me to use a blender for my smoothies this was really kind and courteous. 

The towels were soooo fluffy and smelled so clean as did the sheets; there is lots of space to hang clothes .  I experienced an elevated level of service and hospitality; just the way I would treat someone in my own home.  I can't say enough about how positive my experience was I highly recommend this place and this host.  The entire family made me fell comfortable and at ease.

Thank you Gurpreet and family for making my stay great!

Namaste

Gurpreet communicated very well.  I asked if I could check in later than I originally had asked and it was no problem.  I was welcomed by who i think was the son, either way he was very sweet.  Ne told me everything i needed to know and offered me water (on a very hot humid day where i was exhausted and extremly hot) which i appreciate. He was very polite.  I was checked on via text to make sure i was ok and if i needed anything.  The room is exactly as shown and very clean along with the bathroom.  Good price and nice stay.
Really a hassle free experience! Near JFK airport and Singh was kind enough to let me check in late at night. Very clean place.
Very clean and close to the airport. It was comfortable staying here

Second time staying with Gurpreet.  I was helped with my bags and my interaction was again pleasant.  Nice and clean room/bathroom, very convenient to both JFK and LGA.  Would stay again for my next flight.  Thank you!
Os quartos são muito confortáveis.
I loved staying in this apartment. Total privacy all the time. They even were super flexible with letting me check in early and out late. Thanks for a great stay!
Ideal for layovers. Clean, good wifi and goo transport to JFK
Was very helpful, came to the bus stop and helped me to the house and with all bus routes! Very welcoming and clean :)
They are a really nice family! the house is really clean and it's close to the subway
The place is exactly as described. It's very clean and the hosts are so kind. There are plenty of restaurants around and it is in a great location to public transportation. I definitely recommend.
For anyone with a quick stop over at either JFK or LGA, this is a great place to stay. Everything was clean and tidy and the hosts were super helpful and communicative. Definitely recommend!

I had a pleasant stay at Gurpreet's family's place. Communication was efficient, and Singh was very polite and attentive. 
The room is quiet and well equipped. The whole premises are recently renovated, and spotlessly clean and tidy (including the bathroom). Many Indian restaurants nearby (which to my regret I didn't have a chance to try!).

The place itself however is not so well situated when having to move within the boroughs, as it quite far from any subway station. Also, I had some inconvenience with bathroom availability, as it was shared by guests occupying three different rooms.
Excellent place for travelers. The rooms are very clean, the owener's response is quick and reliable. I will definitely stay here again when I come to NY next time.
Gurpreet was very accommodating. Room was very cozy and Ac was chilled. Every was neat, clean and well organized. 5 Big stars. Highly recommended.

Die Unterkunft war so wie ich es erwartet hatte: sauber, geräumig und schön eingerichtet. Man braucht mit der U-Bahn zwar 45 Minuten bis Downtown Mannhatten, aber die U-Bahnstation ist zu Fuß nur 10-15 Minuten weit entfert. Auch die nähere Umgebung ist praktisch: es gibt indische Restaurants, eine Pizzeria, eine Tankstelle und ein Kiosk nur wenige Meter entfernt. Ich wurde nett begrüßt und bekam sogar ein frisches Handtuch und eine Flasche Wasser. Insgesamt bin ich sehr zufrieden, besonders für den Preis!

I only spent one night at Gurpreet's place, but it was very comfortable and easy to reach. I checked in a bit late, around 11:00 PM, but the host was still up and opened the door for me. It was perfect for my overnight stay in New York

Gurpreet had everything ready befor my arrival. Cleanness is my first impression when get into the apartment. Gurpreet is very friendly and helpful. Nice neighbors as well.
Thank you Grupreet. I'll stay here again if I am in the area again.

My overall experience was really great. The location is great for the LaGuardia airport. Check in was smooth. The shared bathroom was very clean. I really liked my room except one thing - I did not expect to sleep on a mattress covered by plastic. But the host explained to me that it was to protect the guest and the host from bedbugs.
Nice, easy. In and out.

Needed a room to sleep off a long day of flying. This place was easy to find, clean and comfortable. There are plenty of NYC food options right in the area. There is even a 24/7 diner on the E/F train stop at Kew Gardens where you take the bus from the apartment to get to a subway. The hospitality was 5 stars! Will stay again.
Perfect for my over night stay before a morning flight out of JFK. Uber was $14 to terminal 1. Room was very clean, easy to find. 25min walk from Metro station.

My friend and I were staying in this Airbnb. This place is fantastic. I recommend it to anyone visiting the New York area. You definitely get much more value than what you pay. Friendly hosts and convenient location near transportation, in a friendly neighborhood.
Very clean and organized...definitely a great value! Also, good communication...would stay here again for sure.
Good location and very clean place.
Everything was perfect, thank you!
Had a great stay! Very convenient place to stay overnight from JFK.
Very nice place to stay. Very nice people. Everything was very clean, the bed was comfortable, communication was very fast. I recommend this place to everybody. Thank you Gurpreet.
Subway was farther than I expected, but everything else was ok!
A little out of the way but to me it was the ideal place to crash while I was working in the city

I do recommend this place to other travelers! The host is very nice! Their apartment is very neat,  cute and clean. I was so happy that there was a parking option as well. The location is convenient. Everything was super! :)
Great host, excellent customer service and well kept apartment. No wonder I keep coming back! Thank you Gurpreet.

convenience store and restaurant within walking distance. bus stop to JFK airport is just few minutes away too. takes 45 minutes to get to Manhattan with bus and metro.

Generally quiet environment. Expect to hear a little noise(footsteps etc) from other rooms and living area.

the bathroom and toilet is clean. I was asked to wash away the hair in the bathtub after shower if there is any. Also have to wipe the floor with toilet paper if there is any stain of water.

Host kindly accommodates my earlier check in time. 430pm instead of 6pm.
Excellent quality/price! Very convenient if you arrive/departure from JFK! The owner can pick you up or drop off!!!!!!

I stayed one night at Gurpreet's place. It was very clean and peaceful. Gurpreet is very hospitable, offering airport pick-up and recommendations for food and places to visit. He and his family really went the extra mile to ensure that my stay was not only comfortable, but also healthy and safe.

Would stay again.
Just one night for flight, it was ok

Great place to crash after 20+ hours of travel and a late arrival. Very clean and quiet, and the location is very convenient -- 15 min drive from JFK and < 10 min walk to the A train. I really appreciate the easy, late check-in! My two qualms: 1)  there is a really crinkly plastic wrapper on the mattress, which I found a bit annoying, and this can be easily fixed. Ultimately I slept fine, but I'm a good sleeper. Since this bothered even me, I can imagine it being problematic for people who can have trouble falling asleep. 2) from the reviews, I thought I would be staying with a family. But I arrived to an extremely sparsely furnished apartment with a few young guys in it, seemingly a hostel of sorts? This is totally fine, but not what I was expecting, which was a little jarring.
Very reasonable price to rent the room in NYC!
Herşey için teşekkürler.Temiz ve güvenilir bir yer.
Great value

Very well recommended! Room, restroom, shower and other spaces are all very clean, and the host is very helpful. The location appears close to JFK airport (which makes it good location-wise), but I didn't hear any aircraft noise and slept well.

Тут где то был отзыв внизу неадеквата из Питера, так вот, если ему 12-15 минут далеко до метро, до двух разных веток метро, то он должен жить в центре, а если он живет в центре, то какого хрена он снимает комнату за 35 баксов в ньйорке, где по есть в макдаке 10 баксов.да аэроэкспресса 22минуты пешком, удобно, если вы не с крупными сумками. единственое, если у вас чуткий сон, то полы шумят. за уборку у многих в сша доплата 15-10д. так , что для тех, кто ищет дешево и близко к аэропрту, то это гуд

It is such a clean place that you can stay comfortably. Gurpreet and her family are well communicated with the guests and willing to help. The location is at a quiet neighborhood so that I had a good rest for three nights.
Bus stations are around the corners. This was my happy choice.
Nice host, clean place, would stay again.
The room is very clean and cozy, definitely the best night I have in New York! I strongly recommend this!
Place is really nice and rennovate! It Is in the middle beetween airport and center! A good place if you are looking where to stay after a long fly!
Thanks one again for the stay, prompt reply, easy check in , everything clean as before, will definitely recommend others.
Clean and tidy! Recommended.

My 1 night stay here went very well - no complaints! I aimed for the 6:00pm check in, but after getting caught up in sightseeing, didn't arrive til closer to 7:00pm. The host was understanding and did not mind. Communicated well and replied quickly. When I got there, the teenage son let me in and showed me my room, which was clean, had my towel for a shower, and a bottle of water as well. The bathroom was also in good condition. I accidentally went over my 9:00am check out the following morning, as I had some alarm/daylight savings time confusion...but the host was again understanding, and messaged me ahead of time to remind me of check out (this is when I realized my phone was still 1 hour behind). I apologized and headed on out. Their home is less than a 1 minute walk from buses that will take you where you need to go in NYC, whether it be connecting to subway or airports. I would definitely stay again again recommend this place to others!

Great hospitality, clean. I had a short stay (a night) but it was welcoming. Good location with easy access to public transportation and to JFK airport. Because of a bad weather, I used Mr. Singh's ride service and he was very thoughtful and considerate. He made a stop at a local phone shop before home and I was able to purchase a sim card. This saved me a lot of time.  The room and a bathroom were super clean. I started my day with a good wish from him for my job interview.  I will definitely revisit the place if I need to stay close to JFK.
Very convenient place for a layover. highly recommended!
Perfect for layovers, comfortable, clean and friendly service, thanks!

A clean, comfortable stay that is extremely convenient for travelers who are wanting to get some work done and stay close to JFK. Public transportation is easily accessible and the host was very responsive to answer all my inquiries. It was a pleasure staying here the second time. Will recommend staying here again.
Accurate description, good for staying a night in ny before a morning flight from jfk
Clean place, no disturbance, close to airport, super affordable and friendly hosts!!

I gave her a last minute notice about my late arrival and was checked in around midnight, but her son waited for me. The next day, after check out, they let me waited inside the living room until my pick up came since it was very cold and windy outside. The place is very clean, comfortable and most important is she always respond right away whenever I sent her messages, even when it was in the midnight. I definitely will stay again and recommend Gurpreet’s place!
Quiet neighborhood, accesible transportation, 50 minutes to Manhattan, late check in and early check out. 30 minutes from the JFK in bus.
Arrived at the place at check in , Gurpreet son was there to greet me. He gave me all the information I needed showed me to my room and everything was well. Nice location and clean space.

Overall it was an OK experience.
The host was a little rude when I asked a few questions via messages on Airbnb. However, the place was clean and there were no disturbances. I was also able to check in late which was helpful.
Great host! My cab dropped me of at the wrong address in the middle of the night. Gurpreet was really worried about me and helped me get to them. Really nice and helpful host!
If you are looking for a great stay you should surely pick this Airbnb. With no doubts you will have a safe and happy experience like I did.
Amazing host, house is very clean, great response time from host, close to public transportation. I personally recommend this place to everyone.
Toda la Atencion muy Buena.El lugar Limpio y Seguro

Impeccably clean (the cleanest among 20 or so airbnb places I’ve stayed thus far)!! And wonderful location if you are going to JFK/Brooklyn/beach areas; very close to bus stations; walkable to Train J or A (and i felt safe walking back from Train A at night; about 12 mins walk). Lastly, it was great to meet Gurpreet Singh and his son; I had a very pleasant stay and experience! :)
Very nice and accommodating. My flight arrived but we couldn't get a gate for about an hour and he was very understanding. I arrived slightly after midnight and he was there to let me in.
I was accommodated last minute and the space exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend staying here!
Very nice place. Great host. Everything was great. I strongly recommend this place. And I come back again and again
It is a very nice, clean and comfortable place. Highly recommended. I will definitely go back to Gurpreet's place. As a matter of fact I've already booked the room for next week:)
Five starts are putting it mildly. This place deserves 8 stars!
Clean and spacious. Great value for a single traveler. Would definitely stay again.
Great as always!
Clean room, the bathroom rules are very accommodating. I would recommend to anyone who doesn't care about having to take a 40 min train ride to the city.  A lot of value
Great host. Nice, comfortable and clean place. Since 2 months ago, I am coming to NYC every week and always stay at Gurpreet place. I strongly recommend this place to everyone.

Everything was perfect!
Landlords are the best! The room was very clear!

excellent host 
highly recommend


clean friendly environment
This room is surprisingly quiet, cozy and clean. Totally beyond my expectation.
Clean and convenient as usual!
The place was very clean. location is very convenient near shops and public transport. host was great. i honestly think this was a bargain. i am looking forward to staying here again.
Nice people clean place
Clean space and friendly hosts. Great place to stay after an evening flight to JFK.

I was in a pinch, and it was late, I was having trouble finding something in my price range and I was running out of time. Then I found Gurpreet's place, quick response, not only did it save my night, it was so much better than expected! Clean, Private, easy access to transit, and such a nice family! Highly recommended!
Comfortable place conviently close to the airport.
I love staying at Gurpreet’s place. It’s always sparking clean and quiet. I sleep so soundly here. Highly recommended for cleanliness and fantastic host.

For the money you pay, it is somewhat reasonable. However, there could be more effort put into cleanliness. Floors has hair in the corners, the desk was not wiped properly and also had hair in the drawer where the remote for the air conditioning is. That walls and light switches have clearly not been wiped for a while.
Great host and great experience
A quiet place to rest. Very kind host.

Gurpreet's family was extremely welcoming and friendly to me, and very responsive in communication. The bedroom and bathroom were kept extremely clean, and there is even a desk in the bedroom in case you need to get work done on the computer. If you are traveling by yourself, this place is a great value option for your stay, as long as you are comfortable navigating NYC public transportation. I would not recommend this place for couples, as the room has a twin bed. Also, if you want to spend most of your time in Manhattan, I would suggest finding some place closer, as it takes about an hour to travel by bus/subway to get to manhattan from here. The ad lists this location as being 15 minutes away from Laguardia airport (LGA), but that's not entirely true. If you're taking public transportation it's about an hour from LGA. Even if you use an Uber ($20-$30 fare), the only way you can make it in 15 minutes is if you don't hit any traffic. It's closer to a 30 minute drive than 15. If you're traveling on a budget, this is a fine option with some wonderful people hosting your stay.
The room met my expectations, great value

Very pleasant experience, place is like ultra-clean and amenities are covered. Communication is easy and fast. Apartment is located 1 minute from bus station at which you can take one bus and be at JFK. Highly recommended. But checkout very early (9am). If I were in New York I’d probably rent this place again.

My stays at Gurpreet's is always excellent -  you get as the add says and more.
Thanks
Good and cheap alternative to booking an airport hotel in the last minute. Very patient and friendly hosts. And bathroom and kitchen are, I would say, nicer than how they appear on the pictures.
Very friendly and hospitable host, made my late night arrival as easy as possible.  Room was pleasant, and I had everything I needed.
Totally excellent for the price
great place for jfk travellers

name: 1BR condo, full kitchen, Lanai, value in Kapaa
summary: Located on the garden island of Kauai, our second floor 1BR Plantation Hale condo is beautifully appointed in Hawaiian style offering guests a tropical 'sense of place' to help refresh one's spirit, mind and body. With ocean view and easy beach access, King bedding, full bath, private lanai off living room and bedroom, full kitchen, and living room with TV. The property includes free parking, 3 pools, 2 hot tubs, BBQ grill, free computer work station, and coin-op washer/dryer.
space: Kapaa is a great location to get to both the north shore and south shore for day trip excursions.
description: Located on the garden island of Kauai, our second floor 1BR Plantation Hale condo is beautifully appointed in Hawaiian style offering guests a tropical 'sense of place' to help refresh one's spirit, mind and body. With ocean view and easy beach access, King bedding, full bath, private lanai off living room and bedroom, full kitchen, and living room with TV. The property includes free parking, 3 pools, 2 hot tubs, BBQ grill, free computer work station, and coin-op washer/dryer. Kapaa is a great location to get to both the north shore and south shore for day trip excursions. Easy walk to the beach, shops, restaurants, and activities center. Cars are recommended simply because you will want to see all of the island has to offer.
neighborhood_overview: Easy walk to the beach, shops, restaurants, and activities center.
transit: Cars are recommended simply because you will want to see all of the island has to offer.
house_rules: - Quiet hours 9pm to 8am

host.host_about: After years of traveling to Kauai for vacation we decided it is time to become more committed to the ocean lifestyle my wife and I both love. With a mother born and raised on the island of Bermuda, my love for island life started early. And my wife, a 'left-coaster', spent her youth daytripping to Oregon's beautiful Pacific Coast.

reviews.comments: Das Apartment ist sehr gut ausgestattet. Der Ort ist sehr perfekt Sehr zentral gelegen von allen Stränden, Ausflügen & Einlaufsmöglichkeiten.

This is a beautiful, well equipped and well maintained apartment! The pictures are accurate. You're provided with everything you need for the beach including towels, nice chairs, big umbrella, snorkels, etc. The apartment is very close to downtown Kapaa. You can walk places, but it's much better to have a car. The pool, hot tub, and grill were great. There was an issue with the AC and Robert had it fixed right away. The town is very cute and well located to visit the west and north of the island. While the apartment is across the street from the beach, you cannot swim there as the surf is too rough. We swam at other beaches and in the pool. You can walk from the apartment down the beach to a great bar on the ocean with a wonderful happy hour (lava lava beach club). Free parking spot, coin operated laundry, guide books provided. We would definitely stay here again. Enjoy!!

Location is PERFECT! you are in between north & south side. 
Restaurants nearby are better than the 5 star resorts(not kidding) "We deep sea fished; the fish we caught was sold to the Hukilau & sleeping Giant restaurants (both are in walking distance to the unit). Owner is very quick to respond and handles ANYTHING you need. Kitchen is great to cook in and the accommodations provided are so helpful: boogie Boards, Snorkel Gear(we brought our - so didn't use the packaged ones), Towels, umbrella, beach chairs, beach mats, Cooler. Refrigerator & AC Unit work GREAT! Living quarters are spacious & from the Lanai you can see the top of the ocean shore line and mountain views - so gorgeous! Self - coined Laundry service is downstairs and was very helpful for us. There is on-site concierge at the Plantation "check-in" area (GO HERE TO GET YOUR ROOM CARD), they can BOOK TOURS for DISCOUNT RATES: definately do the Captain Andy's cave tour & the Hola Hola Charters Super tour to Niihau. Horseback riding at CJM stables was great too. Best Snorkel Spots are Tunnels Beach & Hideaway Beach (Both on North Side), Poipu has great snorkeling too (south side). Plenty of convenient stores within a mile from unit; safeway, foodland, and Longs drugs (CVS). BOOK NOW WITH ROBERT & YOU WILL HAVE THE BEST STAY IN KAUAI!!! ALOHA & MAHALO!

Plantation Hale was our home for a week vacation on Kauai. It has many great features: convenient location, easy parking, a big comfy bed, air conditioning, reliable wifi, beach towels, lanai, kitchen, beachy decor.

There were a few hiccups with our stay, but our host was quick to remedy any problems that we had. Our last day accidentally overlapped with another party booking through a different website, so we had to spend our last night in a hotel. Bob refunded us for that night and gave us a discount for another night. The refrigerator didn't work while we were there, but Bob had it replaced as soon as we let him know about it. He also offered to pay for our dinner one night during our vacation. 

Overall, this is a great place to stay for a great price. We were comfortable and happy. We would recommend it to any couple looking to enjoy the wonderful island of Kauai.

The best place ever. Very big with all the extras and close to every thing. Beautiful beaches, rivers mountains and shopping. The place was so well furnished and had everything that we needed. I would recommend it to anyone and plan to come back again.

Bob's condo is in a good location with walking distance to quite a few good restaurants and the weekly market. Also not far from a couple good hikes my husband and I enjoyed. In all we enjoyed our 10 day stay.

This place was great! I had an incredible stay in Kapa’a, and Robert was an amazing host from start to finish. He answered ALL of my questions super quickly and offered tips and local info. The condo was perfect for my trip. It was clean and comfortable, with awesome views of the ocean and mountains, and so central. It made it easy to explore the island. Plus, it is a short walk to the ocean and restaurants.

Good place to be while staying on Kauai. The condo has a lot of space, the kitchen has a lot equipment and the bed was very comfortable. We also enjoyed the pool which was very nice. You are so close to supermarkets etc., could even walk there if you want to. The airport is also very close which makes arriving and leaving very easy. Happy I chose this place! Thanks for having us.

Everything is as described. The condo is in a complex with 3 pools, and walking distance to several restaurants, a great croissant bakery and 2 big supermarkets. The staff at reception are very helpful and will make restaurant recommendations, which we used several times.  Highly recommended!
Sehr schöne Wohnung. Gute Lage der Wohnung für Ausflüge. Schöner Pool mit Grillanlage. Die Küche hat alles was man braucht. Liegestühle, Sonnenschirm und Buggyboards vorhanden.

This place is comfortable, clean and a good value.  It's close to town, but it won't feel like it when you're sitting on your lanai.  The well appointed kitchen allowed us to cook meals at home rather than eating out.  The pool is nice and if you want to go to the beach, he provides chairs, mats, a beach umbrella and boogie boards.  I would choose this place over an overpriced resort any day.   The money we saved meant we could stay longer and do more fun activities.
If your traveling on a budget, be aware that the Coconut Marketplace is shockingly expensive.  There's a Safeway and Foodland just down the street...much cheaper and better selection.

My husband and I had the best time staying in Bob and Heidi’s condo! The view off the lanai was incredible, ocean to the left and the Sleeping Giant to the right. They had boogie boards, beach towels, an umbrella.. everything you need for a great day at the beach! 
We definitely hope to come back!

My husband and I really enjoyed our stay at Robert's condo. Having a full kitchen was great as well as the lanai offering a mountain view.  The location really worked for us, a great home base while we explore this beautiful island. Everyone there was friendly and helpful.  Also appreciated was the availability of beach towels, chairs and a cooler.  
We had a great time!

Bob and Heidi's place is located in the perfect location for beach going, souvenir shopping, and picking up necessities for your stay at the condo. In addition, it's location on the east side of the island makes it convenient to explore the entire island. 

The lanai has a lovely view of one of the three pool areas and the ocean can be seen from the balcony with only a slight crane of the neck ;)

The place is clean and nicely furnished and I would recommend it to anyone. Bob and Heidi are kind enough to supply beach towels, chairs, umbrella, and boogie boards.
good location for trips north shore and west side of the island. Shopping and restaurants close  by.

Great Location when visiting Kauai, you can easily access all corners of the island from Kapaa. It was great to have beach towels, chairs and especially the cooler. The mattress is firm, if needed to know. Easy parking.
Convenient location to shopping, dining and happy hours! Close to water falls and wonderful sights and beaches!
it was fun
Clean, great location, easy check in. Drug store down the street was very convenient for those small necessities.
Very nice place would definitely stay there again

name: ❤ of NYC | Walk + Transit Score 100 | King Bed
summary: Luxuriously furnished studio in heart of Upper East Side a few blocks from Central Park • Walk + Transit Score 100 ('Walker's/Rider's Paradise') 55" Smart TV w Amazon Fire TV, Netflix, Hulu, + Amazone Prime Video • Fully equipped + stocked kitchen • Extremely safe neighborhood • King-sized bed
space: ￫ Second floor studio (you must climb 2 flights of stairs) ￫ Couch-bed is Queen size ￫ Keurig coffee maker  ￫ Electric kettle  ￫ Air conditioner ￫ Printer
description: Luxuriously furnished studio in heart of Upper East Side a few blocks from Central Park • Walk + Transit Score 100 ('Walker's/Rider's Paradise') 55" Smart TV w Amazon Fire TV, Netflix, Hulu, + Amazone Prime Video • Fully equipped + stocked kitchen • Extremely safe neighborhood • King-sized bed ￫ Second floor studio (you must climb 2 flights of stairs) ￫ Couch-bed is Queen size ￫ Keurig coffee maker  ￫ Electric kettle  ￫ Air conditioner ￫ Printer Entire apartment For an extra charge, I can accommodate check-ins at any time. I will be available anytime via email, Airbnb messenger, text or call. If you need a recommendation, help with something, or have an emergency, I will be available. Do not hesitate to contact me. Check out Airbnb's guide to my neighborhood: https://www.airbnb.com/locations/new-york/upper-east-side I highly recommend using ride-sharing services: For $20 in Uber credit, use my code - iyql4 For $20 in Lyft credit, use my code - daniel4661 There are 5 metro stations with
neighborhood_overview: Check out Airbnb's guide to my neighborhood: https://www.airbnb.com/locations/new-york/upper-east-side
notes: Being that it is NYC, there may be some noise outside of the apartment at any given time. Please remember that you're staying in a house, not a hotel. Please treat the space with respect. If any problems arise, we will do our best to take action ASAP, but there is no one living on site 24/7.
transit: I highly recommend using ride-sharing services: For $20 in Uber credit, use my code - iyql4 For $20 in Lyft credit, use my code - daniel4661 There are 5 metro stations with 0.5miles (0.8km) from my home. I know getting around NYC can be confusing, so if you ever need help, please feel free contact me!
access: Entire apartment For an extra charge, I can accommodate check-ins at any time.
interaction: I will be available anytime via email, Airbnb messenger, text or call. If you need a recommendation, help with something, or have an emergency, I will be available. Do not hesitate to contact me.
house_rules: • Instant Booking guests must check-in between 3pm-11pm and check-out by 12pm. Any questions should be sent prior to booking. • No shoes in the apartment • Please keep the topic of Airbnb discrete with neigbors. Try to keep music volumes down on weeknights and please attempt to keep the apartment as clean as possible. • If you open it, close it; if you borrow it, return it; if you turn it on, turn it off; if you break it, fix it; if you use it, take care of it; if you make a mess, clean it up; if you move it, put it back

host.host_location: New Rochelle, New York, United States
host.host_about: I have been living in New York my entire life, I love this city and enjoy traveling!

reviews.comments: We had a great weekend at Sanjay's place for a friend's birthday. The apartment is larger than it looks in the photos (4 of us were able to sleep comfortably in the studio) and was newly renovated, perfectly clean and well equipped with everything out could need. Near the subway & shops / restaurants, it's a great base in NYC.

Sanjay Unterkunft war toll. Er ist sehr offen und hilfsbereit. Er half mit dabei wie ich ein Taxi anhalte ;) Die Lage ist top. Central Park & 5th Avenue sind sehr schnell zu Fuss erreichbar. Der Lärm kann für Leute die ihn nicht gewohnt sind sehr laut sein. Für mich persönlich war es sehr laut (Autos, Krankenwagen, Polizei, Feuerwehr, Bus, Personen die auf der Strasse lauter reden, die Haupteingangstüren hört man sehr gut zu fallen. Sonst war alles so wie im Bericht von Sanjay beschrieben.

Nice, clean compact studio, located under 10 minutes walk away from the subway, with lots of F&B options within a 10-12 minute walk.  On average, took us under 30 minutes to reach most spots within mid-town.  Sanjay mentions it, and be prepared for some noise from the street, and for having to climb 2 floors on narrow steps.  We had some bad luck with the AC settings, so please do clarify those with Sanjay at check-in. But for the automatic switch-off settings, the AC functions well.

The Environment: We loved our stay at Sanjay's studio! First off, it is in a great, safe location very close to public transit. There are a number of great restaurants and shops all around the studio. 

The Studio: THE STUDIO IS BIGGER THAN YOU THINK! The photos don't do it justice. I've stayed in a number of studios in NYC and this is by far the most spacious. We were pleasantly surprised! Note that you have to climb two flights of stairs to get to the apartment, however; that is very common in NYC especially in pre-war buildings. 

It is also beautifully decorated in an elegant yet modern theme and newly renovated. The apartment is very, very homelike and cozy. The kitchen has everything you would need, including a Keurig with K cups! The bathroom was very clean and the shower pressure is nice (hard to find in NYC). Towels, a hair dryer and shampoos/ body wash were also provided. As I mentioned before, the studio is large... so large that it fits a king size bed that is very comfortable. The A/C works great as it cools the entire studio. The TV includes Amazon Fire, Netflix, Hulu, HBO, and all other regular channels. 

The Host: Sanjay is very communicative with messaging/ texting which I appreciated. We met him at the apartment and he gave us a rundown on the house rules and answered any questions we had. He and his girlfriend were nice enough to leave us a bottle of wine! 

Sanjay's studio is by far the best place I've stayed in when traveling to NYC. I plan on coming back to this apartment for my next NYC trip. Don't hesitate to book-- you won't regret it!

Apartment was perfect for our 5 day trip to NYC.. easy to get around everywhere with metro sations super close! Apartment was filled with everything you would need! I would stay here again next time in New York.

A surprisingly freshly decorated studio that was very clean and proved to be a good value. Everything worked including WiFi and the large flat screen with Amazon Fire. Comfortable king size bed was a pleasant surprise. Completely outfitted for cooking and eating. Good location: one block to subway and crosstown bus. Grocery, bagel, and pharmacy within a block. Plenty of restaurant and bar choices nearby. Two flights up and 3rd Avenue traffic but well worth it for the great accommodations and convenience.

I wish I could leave 6 stars for Sanjay and his stellar NYC pad. He was the most wonderful host and his place is absolutely outstanding. I cannot recommend it enough. Don't let any reviews regarding noise scare you away. New York is a city so yes, the hustle and bustle is unavoidable but it's also a part of what you get when you visit a big city. Sanjay's place is super close to wonderful bars, restaurants, Central Park, the metro, top notch gyms, and great shopping. The apartment itself has everything you need for a comfortable quality experience. Myself and three girlfriends were more than happy with our stay. Thanks Sanjay!
It was a great place and great location. There was construction on the street, but... it’s New York.

Sanjay's place was perfect for our week in NYC. It's bigger than it looks, very comfy and the bed is HUGE! The kitchen has all we needed, grater, can opener, pealer, nutribullet, bowls, you name it, very well equipped. Same with bathroom, towels, hair dryer, they even leave shampoo and conditioner! The location is perfect! It was close enough from the museums and other attractions so we could go back, rest a bit and then back out to enjoy the early night. Very close to the subway which we used to get to all the attractions. Same with bus. Supermarket across the street and another a couple of blocks away. Awesome place overall. I'd recommend it and would stay there again.

Great location as starting point to explore NYC. Very convenient, well-equipped and furnished in good taste. Sanjay replies fast and adequate, high hospitality.
Just bring good earplugs for the night, if you are not used to traffic noise.
Ben & Elise, 60 years old, Netherlands

The place was clean and perfect. Had plenty of towels and the kitchen was stocked with everything you could need to cook and feel like you were at home. There was a grocery store right across the street to stock up the fridge among some restaurants and stores nearby. Sanjay wasn’t in town but his mother was there to greet me and answer any questions I had upon arrival. Both were in contact with me throughout my stay and even wished me well and congratulations on completing the New York City Marathon. It was the perfect distance to Central Park and numerous forms of public transportation to get around the city.

Very nice studio in a great location.  Sanjay is an excellent host.  He answers questions quickly.  He had some great suggestions for grocery stores and restaurants in the area.  We’ll definitely be back when we’l travel to NY.
Lovely place.

Fantastic location - not far from central park and a walk from downtown. I found myself walking to Time Square on several occasions, it's not a short walk but very pleasant. Several restaurants at your doorstep too so easy to find something to eat. Really safe neighbourhood too, no trouble walking home late into the evening.

Sanjay (the host) was incredibly thorough, friendly and helpful throughout our stay. We were given everything we needed to make Sanjay's place a home away from home.

Great space; excellent location! Very clean with nice amenities. 
Sanjay was the best host!! I felt comfortable texting to ask for recommendations and he responded immediately. Highly recommend!

Sanjay's place was awesome! Sanjay was there to greet us at checkin and was easy to contact before and during our stay. The place was very clean and the bed was so comfy. We also really appreciated the keurig coffee and full stocked kitchen (especially the nights we got to-go food). We really liked the location. You're within walking distance to great restaurants & bars, pharmacy for basic necessities, Central Park, and the subway to get downtown. I highly recommend this place and would stay again in a heartbeat.
This place was great. Comfy, great location, great amenities, the bed was super comfy and Sanjay was really responsive since the beginning! 100% recommended!

I had originally booked for a two night stay at Sanjay's Airbnb.  Unfortunately, NYC had one of the worst storms in the past decade.  Due to this unforeseen circumstance, My flight was cancelled over and over again.  Instead of arriving Thursday afternoon, my flight was cancelled until Saturday morning.  It was not the most fun trip for me but Sanjay understood, communicated and refunded the entire cost of the Airbnb cost back.  Thanks again Sanjay.  You've been awesome!  :)

Sanjay’s apartment was perfect for our long weekend in the city! The spacious studio apartment was clean and equipped with everything you could need. The location was great - in walking distance to many restaurants, cafes, and markets, as well as Central Park and major museums. There was also a subway station just around the corner. Sanjay was a great host. His communication made the check in and check out processes easy, and he responded right away to our questions. We had a great experience and would love to stay here again!

Sanjay has a beautiful place. The apartment is as beautiful as you can see in the pictures. Spacey living room a king size bed and a very nice bathroom. The TV has any app that you could ever imagine, so don’t worry you will find something to watch.

The apartment is also located in a beautiful area with many restaurants right next to you. I suggest Blake Lane for Brunch and if you want something fast the Chinese place downstairs is really good. Thank you for everything. Niccolo

Overall we had a good stay at this very stylish, well decorated and comfortable studio. Just be aware that you are in a lively neighborhood on a busy street (3rd Avenue) on the second floor so they’re might be some noise. After all this is Manhattan. The place had everything we needed for our week stay. Shops, laundry and restaurants are plentiful around. Sanjay was a great host and very responsive which made us feel at home right away.
Great place. Comfortable and close to Central Park.
The room is fully loaded and you can find whatever you want here! Location is also perfect!

You can not find a better host! Sanjay made our stay incredible. Location was centrally located to everything! 1.5 blocks to the subway and you are where ever you need to be. Neighborhood was super safe and comfortable, a few blocks from central park/museum mile. Sanjay's place was beautiful and met all of our needs. The bed was amazing and you literally melt into it. 

We appreciated the coffee and all the amenities he provided. Sanjay was quick to respond and checked on us to ensure our stay was perfect. He truly is passionate about the experience of his guests and we will stay here again.
Sanjay is the man! He was very flexible with us and our stay. He was great at communicating & the location an d space was nice

This was a perfect NYC away from home for our family of three for five nights. Our teenager slept in the convertible couch bed and thought it was comfortable. We slept in the king bed and it was great too. (There is standard NYC street noise but we were not bothered by it.) The apartment was warm during a week of cold weather. The kitchen has everything you need to eat meals in. We didn’t cook there but could have. We found great bagels a couple blocks away and enjoyed cakes from Harbs downstairs. If you like Thai, we recommend UpThai a few blocks away. The subway was a block away and Central Park with museums is a few blocks walk.sanjay was very responsive. There are a couple flights of steps to navigate but it helps burn off the Harbs cake, so well worth it.
Great place. Location is excellent. Bed was very comfortable. Sanjay was so pleasant to work with. Thanks Sanjay!

Sanjay is very responsive and flexible. He allowed me to drop off my bags a couple of hours early and leave them a little later after checking out. The apartment is comfortable with an excellent bed and well-appointed kitchen. I much appreciated the supply of Keunig coffee! 
Note: the key pickup and drop-off place is about 10” walk or .4 miles away from the apartment so with heavy cases or bad weather that would be a challenge.

Sanjay er en fænomenal vært! Han svarer indenfor meget kort tid, og altid positivt, hjælpsomt og høfligt. Han hjalp os meget med tips og tricks ift. til specifikke ting vi gerne ville i løbet af vores ophold. Lejligheden er også fantastisk. Den er stilfuldt indrettet, ren og pæn, veludstyret og hyggelig. Der er alt hvad man skal bruge i køkkenet, også selv de basale fornødenheder som kaffe, te, salt, sukker, opvasketabs etc. Også badeværelset er veludstyret med sæbe, shampoo, hårtørrer, fladjern, kvindelige hygiejneprodukter og håndklæder. Sengen er virkeligt god at sove i, og sengelinned er inkluderet. Wifi fungerer upåklageligt og der er også en ladestation med adaptere til alle slags elektronisk udstyr og elektriske stiktyper, og der er paraply og strygejern. Vi brugte ikke fjernsyn eller sovesofa, så hvordan det fungerer ved jeg ikke. Vi kan kun give Sanjay og lejligheden min bedste anbefaling, vi ville bo her igen til hver en tid.

Honestly, the location, the price, the comfort of the space and Sanjay’s communication was top-notch. I would stay here again in a heartbeat! And the bed is ridiculously comfortable! Thank you, Sanjay!

At first, everything seemed fine. We got the keys from the lockbox located close to the apartment (2 sets of keys), then went to the apartment. 

After that is when things went downhill.

There were 3 separate locks on the door, and of the 3, only the top one turned. The bottom lock refused to turn even though the key fit, and the doorknob itself was jammed. After facetiming with Sanjay, we resolved the situation and managed to get in. It turns out the door WAS jammed, and the upper lock wasn't great. 

Despite Sanjay saying the housekeeper had been there that day, there were stains on the bedsheets, the floor was dirty, and there was a strange half-empty drink in the fridge. In addition, later when Sanjay went back and checked, he would find a previous guest's belongings there. Clear evidence that the housekeeper had NOT been there.

As two girls, we felt pretty unsafe about the situation now with the lock, and we wanted to look for housing elsewhere. Sanjay was very accommodating and gave out a refund quickly when we asked. 

I personally walked back to the 7/11 and returned the keys into the lockbox. This should have been the end of our communication, and I would have been happy to give 4 stars for the quick resolution. 

However, at 2:30am, Sanjay messaged and said that he didn't receive a notification for the keys being returned. I said that I had returned both sets into the same lockbox, and I also told him that because I had only swiped one fob when returning them, it might be an issue with him swiping a different fob from me when putting it in, as there were 2 sets of keys. 

At this point, it should have been easy for him to try and contact customer service for keycafe, as I later had to do. The situation could have been resolved entirely on his side. 

At 3:30am, I received more messages. He accused me of not having returned the keys and threatened to charge me again for the two nights (which airbnb had already refunded) if I didn't return the "stolen keys" within 30 minutes and said that I was lying about returning the keys from the directions that I gave. 

What if I had been asleep at 3:30am, a time at which almost anyone would have been asleep?

In addition, he then said that he had only given me ONE set of keys. However, he KNOWS this is untrue because we had facetimed earlier and he had seen both sets. 

I had to contact keycafe personally to resolve the situation. By this time, it was around 4:30am, and Sanjay never even issued an apology afterwards for the accusation or the threat. 

This was a horrifying experience that I would never wish upon anyone.
This spot was the perfect location for us for our business trip.  Super clean and easy check in and departure.  We were able to set ourselves up at the desk and relax on the couch.

We stayed in Sanjay's apartment for 8 days recently. From the moment we checked in, to the moment we left everything was fantastic. Being in New York it was great to have an apartment to come home to each day after exploring. The apartment has everything that you could ask for, and spotlessly clean. The  king size bed was also great.  Local restaurants only a short walk and supermarket over the road and bottle shop, what more could you want.  Subway was just around the corner and so easy to get around New York. Would thoroughly recommend staying here, Sanjay is a wonderful host, was quick with any questions that we had during our stay.
Sanjay was a great host , very responsive and apartment had everything we needed.

We had a great time in NY. The place is in a great location with lots of shops, and places to eat. About 10min walk from Centre Parks and  a two underground lines, that gives you an option to get around NY. The coffee place on the corner has some amazing cakes, worth trying.
The apartment is on a second floor and there is no lift to use, a bit hard with a lots of bags and a bad back. Very clean place, the only thing is that a bathroom needs an update and no iron and a board to use. 
Apartments has an aircon, but the noise from the street thru the hole in the window is crazy, and in ideal world would need to be fixed rather than a parcel tape around as a quick fix.
The whole place / room the layout of is on a slopy side of it, very odd. It feels like you are staying in an old building in Amsterdam that has been ancient by the water, odd feeling but i guess for a few days it doesnt make a big change.
Again we had an amazing time in NY, but i guess it what you make of it all.
Thank you Sanjay :)

Sanjay’s place was just as described.  Fantastic location.  Easy key pickup.  Super communication.  It had extra towels and linens galore, and the kitchen was the best stocked AirBNB we have ever stayed at (thanks for thinking of the containers to save leftovers!!!!!). Thanks and we hope to be back soon.

Loved our stay in New York and loved the city. 

Sanjay was a great host, he responded to all questions in a very timely manner, flat was very clean and stylish as you can see in the pictures. 

Flat is fully kitted with kitchen amenities and coffee machine etc. Which was very useful to have in the mornings. 

Couple of blocks down there are lots of bars/restaurants to eat out with plenty of choices so the location is also great. 

We are already considering going back to New York again and we’ll be in touch with Sanjay. 

Nilly & Martin

If the photos of Sanjay's apartment have charmed you, and you are considering making a reservation ... just do it!  The place truly is spotlessly clean, the bed is super comfortable, and Sanjay is an incredible & thoughtful host!  I had some seriously odd questions and a few interesting requests - and he came through every time ... even to the point of doing some research for me.  Above and beyond at every turn.  My next reservation is already on the books.  Thanks again for everything, Sanjay!

Sanjay is a perfect host. Everything was perfect and clean. Lots of towels and the house have all you need in the bathroom and especially in the kitchen. Is only a little noisy cause you are on the 3 avenue , but all NY is like that. I really raccomand this flat!

Sanjay is a thoughtful and amazingly responsive host. The studio is spacious, comfortable and very clean with updated features and a good eye for interior design. Everything you will need is here - and plenty of towels, coffee pods and pillows - just as an example in terms of where other places fall short. On the contrary, Sanjay went above and beyond to make us comfortable- before, during and after our visit. Your host and his home will not disappoint! One of the best of my AirBNB experiences!

Sanjay’s place is really nice, I will choose his apartment again, when my next trip to ny. I like walk, morning take me about 15 minutes to Central Park,  to NBA store about 40 minutes walk, is pretty convenient for everything.

The apartment was adorable and cozy with lots of pillows and a very comfortable large bed. Kitchen had everything we needed, and the shower was relaxing. Parking is around the corner, 1 minute walk. I was happily surprised how quiet the street sounded at night, amazing sleep. Walking distance to Central Park & Museums were the added bonus. I recommend the restaurant downstairs & walk to the Pastrami Queen for lunch. Both are Incredibly Delicious.

My wife and I enjoyed our stay in this nice little studio in the UES. We came with the intention of exploring the city as much as we could, and this apartment is situated perfectly near a couple major NYC trains. Loved being able to walk a block and jump right on the 6. The room had plenty of space and Sanjay makes sure to have everything you could possibly need to stay comfortable. Plenty of towels in the bathroom. Big kitchen. Comfortable bed. Sometimes we forget how many items we have that need power, but our host had it covered with USB and power outlets all over the apartment. A bunch of them.  It was also nice having a large refrigerator and freezer to save leftovers, something we often overlook in hotels. During the 4 days we were in NYC, it was under a heat advisory and that made traveling around the city on train or foot pretty miserable. The apartment has a unit that keeps it as cool as you would like, and we enjoyed coming back to it. We really did feel like we were at home in the apartment. It was so comfortable. The TV was big. WiFi was fast, but I will point out that we had none for the last 1.5 days of our stay. I tried to fix it but no dice. The box just stopped receiving an internet signal from the cable. It came back on once or twice for a few minutes but went out and never came back.  It wasnt a big deal because we weren't in NYC to stay in the room and use WIFI, but should be taken into consideration if you're visting the city for reasons where you absolutely cannot live without it. Before it went out, it worked fast and with no drops. These things happen. 

We will definitely stay in this place again when we come back. Thanks again, Sanjay.
Great place. Very clean. Super fast responses. Amazing location. Great amenities.

Sanjay’s apartment turned out to be the perfect place/location for an extended NYC weekend with my teen aged daughter.  The apartment was comfortable, very clean and appealing.  We loved the location; it always felt like coming home after a daily excursion.  Sanjay was super receptive and readily available for any questions that came up.  When I return to New York, I'll be checking the availability of her place first!

Sanjays place is in a great location and to top it off its incredibly clean and has really good quality linens and towels! My sister and I stayed 2 nights and really loved the luxury of staying in the upper east side. Easy walk to the park and madison ave shopping and all the museums. Sanjay was very responsive and even allowed me very early check in which was a huge help! Thanks! Just a small note to future guests the door may latch on its own when closed so do not leave without ur key. I would definitely stay here again!
Great place, just as posted. Sanjay is easy to contact, helpful. Place is super clean.

Wonderful studio space. I stayed with a friend and we were impressed with how nice he made the place. We shared the king bed which was very comfortable and covered with nice, fluffy pillows and soft linens. We didn’t need to cook anything but had we, supplies would have been available. We loved that there was a grocery store across the street and the area felt safe for two women. Sanjay was excellent about checking in with us to see how we got in, how our first day was..etc. I would stay here again.
Sanjay was a very responsive host! The place was in a great location and had everything we needed :)

This was my 2nd stay at Sanjay's charming apartment ... never any question that I would go back on my next trip to the city!  The place is spotlessly clean, he has provided absolutely everything that you'll need (and then some), the bed is super comfortable, and the location in the Upper East Side can't be beat!  Check in is a breeze with one of 2 convenient Key Cafés, and Sanjay is a lovely host ... always very responsive and helpful.

Place is smaller than i expected. I understand NYC manhattan has space issues, but a week before i had found a different airbnb in west village that was same price but bigger space. Building is old and common areas are dirty and not pleasing to look at. On the plus side, there is an excellent chinese restaurant below as well as a nice tea and cake shop  nearby. This would not be my choice again when i visit NYC. Apartment is clean, bed is firm, has nice coffee place and fast internet and decent TV.

Sanjay’s apartment is conveniently located just a block away from the 77th exit for the 6 subway! It’s a quick commute into the city (however note that the 6 does not stop at the 77th exit on weekends). Also just a few blocks from Central Park!! So fun to walk over and enjoy some coffee in the park. 

The apartment is warm and snuggly! The kitchen is fully stocked and their is coffee waiting! Plenty of towels in the bathroom! For a hot shower, you may need to run the water for a few minutes while it heats up!! 

The bed is very comfortable and lots of cozy pillows to snuggle!! As most places in NYC, there is street noise (the trash men come at night)...but with the help of some white noise we had a very comfortable sleep!! 

Sanjay is very easy to communicate with! The apartment was very clean! The key pick up and drop off is 5 blocks away so just know that in advance as you are planning your day!!
Sanjay’s place is fantastic!!! Loved it - location is perfect, the bed is incredibly comfortable, the apt. is. VERY clean! I would stay here again in a heartbeat!

My husband and I just wrapped up a 4 day stay at Sanjay's apartment and we couldn't have been more pleased! From the moment we booked the place all the way to check-out, the experience (communication, cleanliness, apartment features, etc.) could not have been better! It's evident Sanjay takes great pride in providing 5-Star accommodations ... the king size bed and pillows are incredible, there's no lack of coffee / creamer, the bathroom and kitchen are stocked with all your required necessities ... the list goes on and on.

Put your mind at ease and book Sanjay's apartment as you'll have no regrets! It's truly a hidden gem.
Great location, great space! Highly recommend and would stay there again:)

Sanjay is a pro when it comes AirBNB. It is an easy transaction to get the key, and the apartment is lovely. Comfy king bed, large TV, thoughtful amenities - including single-serve Half & Half, and Keurig coffee maker. He’s thought of it all. And, if you questions he is responsive.
Comfortable and well furnished.  Clean.  Excellent location. Hostess is quick to respond to questions
Great space. Very clean and great location. Sanjay is very quick to reply to any inquiries.

name: A beach break AND a lake!
summary: Location! Location! 200 mtrs to the beach & 100 mtrs to the lake. Between Manly & Palm Beach. Surrounded by a quirky cluster of shops, cafe's, bars, restaurants, and lots of outdoor activities at your door step.  This is a fresh new unit. The perfect sunny day, getaway!
space: This is a spot you will fall in love with instantly.  Narrabeen is a thriving hub with so much to do! Manly and Palm Beach are both 20 minutes away and easy to access with public transport.  This is a convenient ground floor unit providing privacy and comfort, with a pool in the complex. Sounded by picturesque beaches, lookouts, walks, parks, bike tracks, water sports, golf course, and wildlife.  Cinemas, supermarkets, pubs, clubs, restaurants, cafe's, butcher, baker, shops. It goes on...  2 bedrooms, 1 queen bed, second room has a baby cot. Can put a blow up but mattress in lounge room if required although it will be tight. (This can also be supplied) No need for a car as you can stroll to everything you need if something is a stretch, public transport is right at the corner within a 3 min walk. The CBD is 45min on a bus.  A quiet dead end street that leads to the lake, fully furnished modern unit, air conditioned, 1x bathroom, laundry, dishwasher and BBQ.  Check in and check out time

Surrounded by a quirky cluster of shops, cafe's, bars, restaurants, and lots of outdoor activities at your door step.  This is a fresh new unit. The perfect sunny day, getaway!
