(This can also be supplied) No need for a car as you can stroll to everything you need if someth

host.host_about: energetic, active and very social. Love music,traveling, snowboarding, meeting new people and relaxing in our perfect beach abode!

reviews.comments: We had a wonderful relaxing stay at a beach break and lake. The location was great and the apartment was positioned directly between the beach and lake. It was also a very short drive to other nothshore beaches such as whale beach and palm beach. The host Terri was lovely, helpful, and very responsive to any queries.  The next door neighbours were also very friendly and welcoming which made you feel at home. Overall we had a great stay and didn't want to leave!

Teri's apartment was just perfect for our northern beaches holiday.
Just a couple of minutes walk to Narrabeen beach, the lake and  cafes. The apartment was clean and very functional. We had a great time!
Very quiet and convenient location, Teri was very quick and smooth in communications.  Loves to go back.

We stayed at Teri’s place with our 2 young kids - perfect place for families. Pool right out the patio. 2 minute walk to lagoon and kayak hire, 4 minute walk to beach. No need for a car (plenty of buses and easy to walk everywhere on the scenic walk path). Lots of good food options / cafes within a 4 minute walk.  Lots of toys /plates / cups for the kids made the stay great for our family.

name: Cozy basement with 2 bedrooms for 4 people in NDG
summary: Our basement has a large area with 2 bedrooms  living and dining rooms located in the duplex. The property is perfect for 1  family with  children/ couples/solo travelers or business people. Our property includes 1 garage  in the backyard. The house is located in just a 4 min walk to the 51st bus station, which departs every 5 min; and in 15 min to metro Snowdon. There are markets and cafes nearby. Parks with different entertainment for children are just in an 8 min walk. WIFI is available.
space: Our house is located in a green and quiet area of Montreal, called NDG. We are in just 2 min walk to the 102 bus station, and 4 min walk to the 51 bus station, which arrive to metro Vendome/Snowdon. The swimming pool is also available nearby in the park.  There is Metro grocery store, Jean Coutu pharmacy and Dollorama all located in 5 min walk. We also have numerous cafes nearby. Cote Saint Luc outlet is in 12 min walk.
description: Our basement has a large area with 2 bedrooms  living and dining rooms located in the duplex. The property is perfect for 1  family with  children/ couples/solo travelers or business people. Our property includes 1 garage  in the backyard. The house is located in just a 4 min walk to the 51st bus station, which departs every 5 min; and in 15 min to metro Snowdon. There are markets and cafes nearby. Parks with different entertainment for children are just in an 8 min walk. WIFI is available. Our house is located in a green and quiet area of Montreal, called NDG. We are in just 2 min walk to the 102 bus station, and 4 min walk to the 51 bus station, which arrive to metro Vendome/Snowdon. The swimming pool is also available nearby in the park.  There is Metro grocery store, Jean Coutu pharmacy and Dollorama all located in 5 min walk. We also have numerous cafes nearby. Cote Saint Luc outlet is in 12 min walk. We offer our basement to our guests, which includes a private bathroom with a to
neighborhood_overview: Our neighbourhood is super friendly and quiet with private properties. The area is full of trees and flowers. Also, it is very easy to reach the downtown from our house, using buses. Nearby parks on rue Sherbrooke, in the Benny centre, on rue Hingston and on Westhill make our house a charming place surrounded by nature.
notes: We have a terrace in our backyard where our guests can have iced beverages and chill during a warm and nice weather.
transit: The easiest way to reach the downtown is to use the 51st bus station which is located in a 4 min walk from our house and departs every 5 min to metro station Snowdon. Also there is a 102 bus which is in a 2 min walk which departs every 30 min to metro station Vendome. There is also a 105 bus on rue Sherbrooke which departs straight to the downtown.
access: We offer our basement to our guests, which includes a private bathroom with a toilet and shower, 2 bedrooms with large beds and a living room with a TV and sofa which can also be used as a bed. We try our best to make our guests feel as cozy and comfortable as possible. Parcing space in the backyard in front of the two garage( on the right side of the backyard). Guests can use garage or leave their car in front of them. The keys you can take from the locker. Access cod will provide before check in.
interaction: We are always available and can be reached either by the mobile phone, email or directly through the Airbnb app. Please do not hesitate to ask any questions. Also, we are happy to chat with our guests during their stay, in case if they need any kind of socialising.
house_rules: Please note that every additional person (more than 5 persons) is extra charge per night.

host.host_about: At present time i’m studying in college in Montreal. I like to meet with people from different countries communicate with them and use my language abilities. I speak in azeri, russian, english, french and turkish. Azeri people very welcoming and i keep that tradition.

reviews.comments: Sakina and her family were great hosts. She is always available to help. The place is really nice and comfortable. I recommend Sakina's place and will definitely stay there again on my next trip to Montreal.
Despite the location being a little out of the way, it was wonderful, cute, and clean. We had a great stay! :)

Je trouve le quartier résidentiel les gens très sympathiques aussi 
Restauration pas très loin par contre pas de très bonnes qualités dommage
Un peu loin du centre ville
Sakina was a great host, and the townhome was awesome. Spotlessly clean and in a great area close to the heart of Montreal. I highly recommend it!

This is a cozy, comfortable basement suite in a quiet residential section of Montreal (NDG). Sakina is an attentive hostess, very responsive by text both before and during our stay. There is free parking on site behind the building, which was great. We really enjoyed exploring the neighbourhood, and it is a short walk to the number 105 bus which links to the metro system. There is also a small fridge and microwave, which we did not expect but of course were very appreciated. Our party was 2 adults and 3 kids, and there was plenty of space for all of us.

We were delighted with Sakina's basement apartment. It was clean and large and private, with two decent-sized bedrooms and a very large living/dining/common room, and a locking door separating it from the rest of the house. We had exclusive use of the washer/dryer that was in our space, and on-premises parking. It worked extremely well as a comfortable home base for our family of 5 during our 5-day stay in Montreal.
Very clean. Suited our needs. Great value.
Sakina and her family were very friendly. We definitely enjoyed our stay. The apartment was clean, cozy, and had everything we needed.
Sakina was an awesome host and her apartment was clean and an awesome price!
Sakina est très accueillante très disponible aussi pour mon deuxième séjour impeccable merci pour tout

Sakina's place was sparkling clean, convenient for a family of four.
The location is in a quiet residential area 15 mins away from downtown by car. 
Sakina is very welcoming and made up feel at easy which made our holidays even more enjoyable.

Sakina's place by far has been my greatest stay. Sakina was a great host providing all essentials and even had breakfast foods, including milk, stocked for us. The space was large and the beds were very comfortable. The neighborhood was quiet and close to public transportation. I would definitely stay here again.

Sakina's place was great and just what we needed. We were traveling with a single person and a couple so we needed two bedrooms and a common space, and this worked out perfectly. We had a nice couch to relax on and watch TV, along with a table and chairs for eating. Sakina even left us a variety of breakfast food, which was a nice surprise. There was a fridge and microwave as well. The apartment was very clean and quiet, and she left plenty of amenities like shampoo, extra blankets, and a hairdryer. The neighborhood is quiet and residential, and it's a short drive from the city center not far out of the way. One day Sakina asked to borrow a table in our space for a birthday party, and when we came home we found that she had returned the table with slices of cake for us! We felt very welcome and there was a good mix of communication and privacy.

L'appartement a été très bien, propre, et dans un quartier calme et résidentiel mais quand même pas trop loin du centre ville. C'était parfait pour plusieurs personnes, dans notre cas moi et une couple, vu qu'il y a plusieurs chambres dans un espèce d'appartement privé dans le sous sol. Il y a également une espace commun dans l'appartement pour parler, regarder la télé, et manger ensemble. Sakina a même laissé des choses à manger pour le petit déjeuner. On sentait très à l'aise, confortable, et les bienvenus dans cette espace. Merci, Sakina !
I found this place to be very spacious and clean. It was easy to get to and from and Sakina was very easy to communicate with. I would recommend it to anyone.

Sakina's basement has everything. It's very clean and it's very spacious. There're many things included: breakfast and bathroom soap etccc..
The relationship prize-quality is fantastic. I recommend it.

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour chez Sakina, qui s'est montrée disponible et attentive. Le quartier est sympa, a 25-30 minutes du centre de Montréal en voiture ou en bus. Nous recommandons ce logement à d'autres voyageurs ! Encore merci Sakina ;)
It's very good place to stay.
Everything was fine! Good place!

I booked this cozy basement for one of my friends who came to Canada for the first time, and she could not afford the cost to stay in hotel due to high season. Sakina was very communicative and she arranged everything for her and her family.
Great place! It was nice having two separate rooms, and the living area was perfect for hanging out.
Nice and tidy basement accommodation,  suitable for family, quite street, very accessible to highways. Friendly host SAKINA*****

I stayed 3 days at Sakina's basement appartement which was very spacious, cleaned and had all of the comfort and essentials we needed. It was also very easy and clear to communicate with Sakina and she was accommodating. We would definitely stayed with Sakina again.

Very clean, beautiful and spacious 2 bedroom basement. Our host Sakina provided everything for breakfast we needed. We really enjoyed our stay at her place and we would recommend to everyone to go there if you!
Sakina is a very nice host, welcoming and helpful whenever needed. The place was right for us, and we look forward to staying again here!

It’s a beautiful and cozy place to stay, very clean and Sakina is so friendly and kind. You can take transportation just around the corner to go to downtown or any of the most touristic places in Montreal, my family and I had a great experience!
Great space, very close to the downtown area. Has all the amenities you need for a great stay.
Appartement propre,accueillant et pratique. Notre hôte a su bien nous accueillir et répondre à nos besoins. Il est facile de communiquer avec l'hôte.

Great little 2 bedroom apartment in the west end of Montreal. Great location with good bus service. Grocery and drug stores nearby, as well as a couple of pizza joints. I like the parking at the rear, don't like leaving my car parked at the curb in Montreal. Everything for a nice stay is provided, will definitely go back.
Very clean. Sakina is also very quick at responding. It is a large space as well and very clean.

We had a lovely stay at Sakina's and all five of us (2 adults and 3 children) slept well. Her home was very spacious and tastefully decorated.

We appreciated that Sakina provided us with all the breakfast essentials (bread and spreads, milk, cheese, cereal, coffee, tea, hot chocolate, etc.) As parents, she made our life so much easier, especially when traveling from afar.

Sakina really went the extra mile by helping us recover our youngest daughter's  forgotten stuffed animal.

We would definitely welcome an opportunity to enjoy her home again and would not hesitate to recommend her.
The space was very clean . Sakina provided us with breakfast and was prompt in replying back

Sakina was very nice to me and my familly. We were supposed to stay for a month , upon arrival we realized that there wasn’t any stove for cooking, hence, we only stayed there for one day. It was our fault we didn’t read properly the comments that Sakina posted. She agreed on refunding us the full price.
Super endroit, très propre

Sakina provide us a compliment breakfast, it was perfect for the first day.  the place is very, very clean, and very confortable. Sakina answer us really quick, and help us in what we need. You gonna love the place!!
Awesome hospitality and service with great location
Great location and could not be cleaner.  Fantastic value.
Great hospitality, clean, and spacious place to stay!

My wife and I stayed at Sakina's place for 3 nights/4 days. The place was very clean and, for a couple, very spacious. The place had the essentials needed for a good stay. We liked that Sakina offered us parking behind the building (her private parking area). There were a couple of things that we didn't like, though. The first one was that Sakina's was not quick at responding to our messages. Actually, she never answered the first message we sent her once we were in her property, and she was not prompt to respond to a couple of other messages. The second thing is that the place gets very noisy from around 5am to around 8am. We stayed there during weekdays and in the basement we could hear them getting prepared for their day. In all, we had a good stay, but based on previous reviews we had higher expectations. Thanks.

Would recommend a stay with Sakina without any hesitation. Everything we wanted and more. Wonderful hostess and so helpful with directions, as this was our first trip to Montreal. Very quite house and surroundings.
Close to bus stop and Metro, which meant not having to use our car.
Close to the bus stop and it was a perfect, clean space for our family!  Some breakfast foods provided and water was helpful in the mornings.  The sofa bed was comfy too.  We had a great time!
Wonderful hospitality.We felt like our own home.Very neat and clean space.Good parking facility.Breakfast was awesome.
amazing place. better than staying in the hotel. I will recommend this place to Everyone

The listing said a/c is not available however the host provided us with fan for each room as it felt warm, Parking was not an issue, check in was smooth, the only down side was that we felt the linens were not washed as 3 of us had red spots that looks like bites on the face and neck after the first night.

Totalement satisfait par le logement, même mieux que sur les photos. Sakina à été un hôte disponible et serviable.
Je recommande sans hésiter.
こちらからの質問に対して､とても対応が素早くとても助かりました｡

Sakina is a wonderful host! She prepared the place very nicely and provided us with more than just basic necessities. The location was perfect as it was very easy to drive downtown (about 10-15 min) and there were a lot of restaurants in walking distance in the quiet neighborhood. I would definitely stay here again if I ever went back to Montreal!
Très bon rapport qualité prix

Sakina est une (Website hidden by Airbnb) d'une formidable gentillesse, elle a été durant notre séjour très attentionnée, disponible et chaleureuse. L'appartement est très conviviale, bien équipée, et est situé dans un quartier calme. Le rapport qualite- prix est excellent. Je recommande.

bello basement, cómodo y agradable el datelle de la comida fue increíble. muy recomendable. un poco lejos del centro, pero vale mucho la pena. Sakina estuvo al pendiente de nuestra llegada y salida como n respuestas rápidas
Bien

Perfect for our trip. We were very comfortable. The place was stocked with anything you could think of. Very nice host. We were 3 for a weekend trip and this was ideal for all of us. We had no complaints at all.
Very spacious and clean room. Sakina supplied us with breakfast food and was a great host. Neighborhood is a nice location. Would recommend.
amazing and sparkling clean place in a very central and cozy location. highly recommended.  Great coffee and snacks for the kids as well!

name: 450sf entire place in Kennedy Town
summary: It is a normal apartment (540sf ) but your bed room is bigger than standard HK size, clean double bed & bedding . the location Kennedy Town is excellent ! Convenient surrounded by plenty hippest restaurants & bars and local foods where you still find true spirit of Hong Kong merged with the modern . Easy access to all places . 3 minutes to MTR station and 5 minutes ride to central . There are many supermarkets within the vicinity . All walking distance .
space: From 2nd of February 2018 , for the guest who stays more than 3 weeks , you will get the entire apartment only pay a bed room rent . You have an open closet with 20 hangers for hanging up your clothes . And a big chest drawers .You have enough space to open your suitcase on the floor ...
description: It is a normal apartment (540sf ) but your bed room is bigger than standard HK size, clean double bed & bedding . the location Kennedy Town is excellent ! Convenient surrounded by plenty hippest restaurants & bars and local foods where you still find true spirit of Hong Kong merged with the modern . Easy access to all places . 3 minutes to MTR station and 5 minutes ride to central . There are many supermarkets within the vicinity . All walking distance . From 2nd of February 2018 , for the guest who stays more than 3 weeks , you will get the entire apartment only pay a bed room rent . You have an open closet with 20 hangers for hanging up your clothes . And a big chest drawers .You have enough space to open your suitcase on the floor ... Anywhere inside the apartment (not my bed room ;) Yes , definitely ! Hong Kong university , Park , sea side ... tram stop , buses stops , subway stop . Starbucks , 24 hours Macdonels . A sport centre with in door and out door swimming pool . Bar and Re
neighborhood_overview: Hong Kong university , Park , sea side ... tram stop , buses stops , subway stop . Starbucks , 24 hours Macdonels . A sport centre with in door and out door swimming pool . Bar and Restaurant , cafe .
notes: For long stay guess (more than 3 weeks ) you can have the entire apartment cause I will go for my trip;)
transit: It is in Kennedy Town station by MTR . Exit B. 3 minutes walk to reach my place .
access: Anywhere inside the apartment (not my bed room ;)
interaction: Yes , definitely !

host.host_about: To be honest with you all , I am in the downturn of my life at the moment ... that's why I am end up in here hahaha. Need to stop over again soon

address.street: Hong Kong , Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
I spent I great week at Mandy's place !

The apt is clean and nicely decorated, and the room comfortable, Mandy is a great host.
I especially like the neighborhood with plenty of cheap Hong-Kong style eateries, a public swimming pool, a hidden temple (Lo Pan temple) and the roots of the big banian trees.
Excellent MTR, tramway and bus connections.
I will be back !

Life is like a box of chocolates, you never know what you will get next. Never expect to have such an amazing and unforgettable Airbnb experience in HK. Mandy is definitely one of the best hosts I've met so far. Her place is very relatively spacious and extremely comfy. Perfect check-in and out. She is a very knowledgeable, thoughtful and considering elegant lady, I had so many great conversations with her. Probably the best experience and host you can expect and wish for.

I lived in Kennedy Town and the room was for my cousin. The first day Mandy picked me up at McDonald and led me to her apartment. The size, the decorations, and the furniture surprised me a lot. As we know, the room size in Hong Kong is super small. However, for Mandy's apartment, the room is commodious. I really love the sofa and the pig carpet. And thank Mandy's chocolate for my cousin. Best experience ever.

I had a great stay at Mandy's place. Her house is located in close proximity to the MTR station in Kennedy Town - which is a lovely area in Hong Kong and not too crowded. She was easy to communicate with and I enjoyed my stay at her place. The apartment is fairly big by HK standards, and while the building is old, I had a comfortable stay!

I feel so lucky to choose and meet Mandy when I firstly use Airbnb in HK, I booked Mandy,s place for my little brother who is the first time visiting HK. Sincerely, Mandy,s place is tidy, comfortable and large. The room is totally enough for two people. Mandy is also a very nice lady, we are so happy to talk to her. I am so grateful to her for taking care of my brother. I already recommend her place to all my friends. If you also would like to choose one temporary place around Kennedy Town, I strongly recommend Mandy,s place !
Mandy is a great host! Her apartment is very convenient and she stays out of your hair.

Mandy was great. I booked this apartment for my friend who was coming to visit me. Mandy was really easy to communicate with and was really accommodating. When I dropped my friend off at the apartment after a few drinks out, Mandy invited us all in for champagne and red wine which was good fun! My friend really liked the apartment and said the bed was really comfy, the shower was great and it was nice and spacious... great place great host!
The host canceled this reservation 115 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
我想一直到很久以后我都会怀念住在坚尼地城的日子,因为住在这里的短短几日实在太美好了｡住处的楼下有24小时早茶夜茶供享用,凉茶铺､超市､各种茶餐厅里想吃什么都有;交通方面地铁巴士叮叮车一应俱全;环境方面有海有山还有完美的跑步路线｡房间面积相比价格已经非常宽敞,屋内收拾得非常干净,简单又不失情调,Mandy is amazing,大家都是一个世界的人,我们在一起喝酒聊天,简直不能更棒!

Good value, good place to stay, Mandy was out of town so we almost had the entire place.
Close to public transportation and all kind of restaurants you can find near there, recommend to stay in Mandy's place!
It was a wonderful stay, the host is very friendly.

It's really roomy and comfy to stay with Mandy! 
The house is very clean and located near HKU, also 1 min walk from Kennedy Town MTR.
Mandy is the best host you could ever asked for - helpful, kind, artistic, communicative, friendly, etc. Love her so much!

If you want to experience "living / knowing" about Hong Kong, this place would be suitable for you. There are so many local restaurants and bars surrounded by and very easy to access to MTR (Kennedy Town)

Mandy is a great person, ready to help at all times and really smart. Defining her just as a host wouldn't be enough!

Thanks for welcoming me to HK! :D

Great location, less than 5 min walk to MTR and only a few stops away from central. Direct bus to the airport available. A lot of food options around the neighbourhood too. Room is spacious and tidy. Host will gladly offer tips and advice if you ask her. Overall, good value!

It was the most awesome journey Ive ever had! And very important part in it played Mandy. She was amazingly hospital (in every category), super easygoing and knowledgeable about good places to visit (also about HK nightlife). Her flat and room she provide very comfortable to stay, transport access is perfect. And I vas really glad to know her, i think I found an amazing friend also.
Really nice stay here, with a great location
Mandy has a lovely place in a convenient location. She was friendly and helpful. It is only a three hour walk from her home to the Peak Tram :)

Mandy was a perfect host. Her apartment is in a great area which is only a 5-minute metro ride or 45-minute walk from central. Mandy recommended a really good local dim sum place for cheap breakfasts close by, definitely worth trying out :)

Mandy's place is well connected with buses, trams and MTR for getting around HK.  She gave us a tip to take the bus from the airport to her place which was easy and convenient. The room was clean and spacious for the 2 of us and bed was comfy. Mandy was helpful with information on transport and food around Kennedytown which typifies an older HK residential area.  Lots of small shops and restaurant selling local food at great prices. Check out Chuek Kee for great and cheap porridge, couldn't get enough of the silky smooth porridge and wide variety of condiments. Highly recommended for those who are looking for a great place to stay in a more old world of HK.
Mandy is an easy-going person. The room is clean and comfortable. Construction work nearby but that's no problem if you don't plan to sleep late. Good value for money.
Mandy was very welcoming and accommodating! Her effort goes beyond just being a regular host. Highly recommend!
Mandy is a very kind and nice host. The room is clean and tidy. The location is very convenient. You can have everything you needs there.

Mandy has been an excellent host. She went above and beyond and notified me that there was a construction going on nearby, and that the noise would be an annoyance. She was accommodating with our requests and we really appreciated it!
Mandy was such a joy! The place was just as described (so artsy!) and she was very hospitable.

I stay at Mandy’s place because I’m waiting to check in my hall at HKU. Very convenient and cozy place, really spacious, clean and nice. There’s a lot of local food near by. The mtr is also about just 3-4 min walk away. It’s super easy to get there from airport, just take airport bus A10 and in less than 50hkd, u will reach. Last but not least, Mandy is a friendly and approachable host. She has many great stories about herself to share, i had a great conversation with her.  Once again, thank you Mandy!

Mandy is an amazing host, this is the second time I stayed at hers. Like the first time’s unforgettable experience, I had yet another wonderful staying at hers. Will definitely recommended to whoever wants to stay at a local residential place and experience local HK culture and food.
An easy going and great host who will undoubtedly make your stay a pleasurable one.
空间很大,位置很好,生活很方便
Location is very good with good selection of local eating places. Transport is very convenience.
It is a flat conveniently located in an area with supermarkets, restaurants, pharmacies and shops.
it’s an interesting trip
Super host level
The house is clean and comfortable. The location is very good, safe and convenient to find supermarket and restaurant. Mandy is very nice responsive. I and my friend really enjoyed the time there.

Lovely, spacious stylish flat in a cool part of town, walkable to MTR. Supermarket opposite.  There is not much pet friendly apartment in this platform and I am sure hers is one of the best.  I feel like home during my stay.  Last but not least, Mandy is a truly, extremely friendly, helpful and responsive host.  Highly recommended.
Great location! Mandy is very responsive when arranging check in and throughout the stay.

Mandy's apartment is quite nice. It’s rather big and comfortable compared to the living standard of HK. The location is very convenient, it’s close to the subway and some view points such as HKU. 
Living in this apartment gives us an chance to get know abt part of the local lifestyle. 
Besides, Mandy is quite nice and considerable. The apartment is very artistic which attracts us a lot. 
When I go to hk, I’ll definitely choose this place.

Mandy’s home is very cozy with carpet, cushions and sofa, helping me relax after a long day walking in the city. It is convenient with bus stops and metro station Kennedy town within 5 minutes walk. Also you can find a lot of local food nearby.
Although I haven’t seen Mandy but she manage well all the communication and check in check out. Thank you for having me and my boyfriend!
To be honest, it was a little bit noisy at night since the building is just by the street. But this is HongKong! Busy, crowded and having so much night live! Nearly every Airbnb I’ve been stayed in HongKong shared the same problem. So just make your choice.
Good only for space and location. Not value for money.

name: Condo familiale 4 chambres près du centre-ville !
summary: Beau grand six pièces sur deux étages à pied des stations de métro Frontenac et Papineau. Toutes commodités à proximité (épicerie, pharmacie etc.). Situé à 10 à 15 minutes du vieux port de Montréal, du centre ville et de la Place des Arts.  l’île Sainte-Hélène, le parc Jean-Drapeau, le parc La fontaine et celui du Mont-Royal sont également tout près. Venez découvrir Montréal !
space: Maisonnée familiale accueillante et chaleureuse ! Chambre aménagée avec téléviseur, câble et petit frigo.
description: Beau grand six pièces sur deux étages à pied des stations de métro Frontenac et Papineau. Toutes commodités à proximité (épicerie, pharmacie etc.). Situé à 10 à 15 minutes du vieux port de Montréal, du centre ville et de la Place des Arts.  l’île Sainte-Hélène, le parc Jean-Drapeau, le parc La fontaine et celui du Mont-Royal sont également tout près. Venez découvrir Montréal ! Maisonnée familiale accueillante et chaleureuse ! Chambre aménagée avec téléviseur, câble et petit frigo. Vous aurez accès à toutes les pièces communes de la maison ( Salon, cuisine, terrasse et salles de bain ) Nous sommes facile à joindre Le quartier est tranquille et près des services d'épicerie, pharmacie de transport en commun. La maison est à 500 mètres du métro Papineau et tout près du centre-ville
neighborhood_overview: Le quartier est tranquille et près des services d'épicerie, pharmacie de transport en commun.
transit: La maison est à 500 mètres du métro Papineau et tout près du centre-ville
access: Vous aurez accès à toutes les pièces communes de la maison ( Salon, cuisine, terrasse et salles de bain )
interaction: Nous sommes facile à joindre
house_rules: - Merci de ne pas faire de bruit après 22h00 - Merci de respecter les lieux en prenant soin des effets à l'intérieur et l'extérieur de la maison que vous avez louée

reviews.comments: Pascale was great abs super accommodating. Will stay there again
Pascal left us with a very cozy and organized house that my family enjoyed a lot. Every thing seems perfect. RECOMMEND!
pascal's place was wonderful, close walk from metro so made it conveninent to get places! And thely photos match the place exactly, would definetly recommend this place !
Super appartement idéalement situé à 10min du métro et à 20min du quartier latin. Les hôtes sont vraiment charmants et arrangeant. Bref rien à redire c'était parfait

Vous voulez visiter Montréal en famille? La maison de Pascal est l'endroit idéal.  La maison est parfaite pour petites ou grandes familles. Pascal a été superbe, ayant répondu à chacune de nos questions. Nous n'hésiterons pas de suggérer l'endroit pour une famille. Les enfants ont bien aimé.

L'emplacement est central et facile d'accès. C'est facile à se déplacer à pied, en autobus ou en Métro. Nous avons visiter des attraits touristiques comme le Vieux-Port, le Biodôme et la Ronde, et on a pu se rendre à chacun de ces endroits en moins d'une demi heure.

Merci pour votre accueil chaleureux!
Joli appartement, lumineux et bien décoré. Bien situé. Proche du quartier latin et d'un arrêt de métro. Les propriétaires sont accueillants et disponibles.
Amazing place!

Excellent accueil, nous étions vraiment comme à la maison.
Le logement est bien situé et calme

Pascal et sa famille ont le don de mettre à l'aise. Toute la famille a su rendre mon séjour plus qu’agréable bien au-delà du contrat commercial, par ailleurs parfaitement bien honoré. La famille de Pascal est à l'image de ce que j'ai pu sentir du peuple Québécois ouvert, généreux... Une fort belle expérience.
Pascale is absolutely fantastic and his family is even better! Very welcoming and thoughtful; everything you could ever need. Great location, accommodating, and close to the Metro!
Good location. All the necessary amenities. Lovely hosts.

Pascal and his family are super friendly and kind. The room is exactly like in the pictures, very comfortable and clean. There is a mini fridge if you can buy some food. The location is perfect in a quite and calm neighborhood very close to the metro station. If I come back to Montreal, I'll stay again with Pascal's family.

It was a pleasure being with such a sweet family. Had a very wonderful time in Montreal. Everything was great. They made me feel as I was in my own home. Thank you very much to all of you and wishing a superb 2018 !!!!

Super séjour, toute la famille a été très accueillante. Donne envie de revenir chez eux!
Tout est à proximité, le logement est vraiment bien placé.

Hi, I'm Selena from HK! Travel, food, movies, music all my life bit by bit. I like to make friends from all over the world. Airbnb provides gave me a good platform and opportunity. Of course, Selena's hotel is to make friends from all over the world for the purpose of affordable hotel, we have been trying to do better, but we still have shortcomings, I hope every guest a little more of a communication misunderstanding, Selena is looking forward to you and your friends!///


Hi,我是Selena來自HK!旅行､美食､電影､音樂都是我生活的點點滴滴｡每到一座陌生的城市,走街串巷,逛逛當地的菜市場,鉆鉆當地的小巷子,吃吃路邊攤,逛逛自由市場,才能真正體驗當地人的生活,不虛此行!另外,去一些很少人知道的或者交通不那麽方便的地方玩一玩,會有完全不一樣的體驗和收穫｡我喜歡結交來自世界各地的朋友｡Airbnb提供給了我一個很好的平台和機會｡我個人有一些相當不錯的空房,我希望能提供給更多Airbnb的旅客,也希望每個人留在我們這裏都是非常愉快和舒服的｡當然啦,Selena的旅店是以結交來自世界各地朋友爲目的的平價旅店,成長路上難免有不足之處,望多一份溝通少一份誤解,Selena非常期待您和您的朋友光臨!

reviews.comments: 稳
位置很好找,因为最近修路所以绕了点路,不然真的离旺角站很近,我们一家人5天都住这家,主要是行李较多不想换来换去,而且这家地理位置不错,离我们游玩的点都挺近的,比如朗豪坊,维港(尖沙咀码头)等等,包括去澳门的码头(坐巴士)｡｡｡但是那天碰到台风天没去成澳门好可惜啊｡房东人很好的~普通话不错哦!
呢个价钱,加多百几蚊可以住酒店,而且附近有凤姐架部,介意者慎入,女孩去旅行也不推荐,虽然交通系方便噶,而且隔离都有旅行团入住噶宾馆,但系都系介意者慎入
很好
位置什么都挺好的｡就是房间比图片小的多,我们带孩子住的,有点小,没见到房东,直接住的,所以也没办法选房间
虽然房间比较小,但是在香港这样寸土寸金的地方,性价比还是很高的,房东人也很好很热情,对这次住宿很满意｡

位置挺好的,地铁旺角站A1口出来向左过一个路口步行大概60米就到了,跟着导航走很好找｡到达酒店上午九点,房间入住是下午两点,但是客人退了房只是还没打扫卫生,也给了房卡给我们放行李到房间｡房间确实小,不到十平方,但是干净整洁,东西也齐全,两面墙上都是窗户,光线很好,床也够大,两张1.2米的床,我们两个大人两个小孩(5岁和10岁),睡觉足够了｡当然除了床也就一个很小的过道,只能一个人通过｡但是只是睡觉休息就完全足够啦｡房间隔音也挺好的,住了两天,都没听到隔壁房间的声音(隔壁也有人住的)｡总体体验都挺好,白天前台有人时大门会开着,晚上没人在前台的话就会关门,需要按密码才能进入,挺安全的｡
Everything is ok. The place is good and the landlord is very nice.
地理位置的确是好的不得了,已经做好打算空间很小,但是去到是真的有点小,而且床单不是很干净 有点多尘｡
Nice to stay!
The place is great but it's a little hard to find.
不错
침대이불 쓰레기통 매일 새거로 갈아줘서 좋았습니다 와이파이는 터졌다 안터졌다 해서 불편했지만 문제점이생길때마다 호스트와연락이 잘되서 좋았다  그리고 빵에써또롱뇽나왔어욨근떼아무쪼치안취햬쭘쏠찍히추쩐안하꼬앂따여헁망쪘어욧빵음안돼꼬뜨라이끼꼬짱나있었음 또롱뇽이너무충겪이였음니따

The rooms literally small compared to photos uploaded. The room is clean.. The location is perfect but.. The host does not reply QUICKLY. No front desk personnel on duty when we checked in. Only a 7 yr old kid was sitting on the front desk. We do not know where to leave the key card and leave temporarily our luggages. And one thing we noticed at night theres a noise in the hotel its like a car alarm.

A bit hard to find the place, our room's toilet was too small and cramp even for a normal size Asian guy like me..please choose a room with a bigger toilet if you want to stay there next time..location was strategic with the airport transfer bus stop just downstairs, Mcdonald just opposite and few minutes walk to MTR Mong Kok and Prince Edward..the cleaner Ms Leong was friendly and helpful...
Worth it! The room is clean, and has basic toiletries. Would definitely book again at Selena's place.
很好,位置好找方便,推荐入住
Convenient place, better provide entrance and check in information
Clean room. Neart public transport.
The room was clean and very close to public transit stops. My only complaint is that the room is extremely small.
比较干净舒适｡
交通非常便利,下楼什么都有!

总体来说很不错,跟网上描述的一样｡从机场到宾馆很方便,有机场快线｡不过下车后,需要花点时间找金轮大厦｡问一问路人就找到了｡另外宾馆附近也有很多小吃和餐厅｡最近的就在宾馆楼下,叫文记小食｡味道挺不错,有一次凌晨两点饿了,下去那里买了一碗牛杂｡非常的好吃!!另外,房间里有两张双人床,能睡两个成年人｡在香港这个寸金寸土的地方,已经很不错了｡而且在宾馆门口有密码锁,房间门口有门卡锁｡保安还是不错的｡唯一不足的是,浴巾是放在公共区域的,要自己拿,而且有点脏｡不过我没有太在意,因为我每次出门都带自己的毛巾的｡
不要有所期待,能凑合下就订
位置挺不错的,出门方便,前台接待有问必答,有什么需要都可以及时解决｡房间对内地客人来说可能感觉小了,但香港寸土寸金,性价比还是很高的｡
幫親戚租既房,地點方便,好容易搵到,間房比預期中既細,但價錢實惠,性價比不錯
寸土寸金,性价比已经很不错了,交通很方便,周围也很多商场,个人觉得来香港吃饭如果想节约就吃楼下麦当劳餐厅
虽然房间小,但干净｡地址在旺角,离地铁近,便利｡

host.host_about: We offer a private room at our flat, including a breakfast (croissants, butter, orange juice, coffee and tea), for guests who want to have a quiet and nice place in Barcelona. Our apartment have fast wi-fi connection, kitchen (to cook something fast, like pasta, sandwich, tea, coffee). I am Victoria, a young profesional in international economics, living with my boyfriend who is profesional in tourist services. Out flat is small, clean and it is located really really close to Sagrada Familia. I am in love with my city and I can offer you some place to visit. We also offer one day trips to RUPIT, BESALÚ, CAMINO DE RONDAS, CASTELLFOLLIT DE LA ROCA, CADAQUÉS, PORT AVENTURA, AIGÜESTORTES. Ask us any question on availability and price of the excursions , prices are starting from 150 € pp, including the whole day of activities, car transfer to the place and much fun! We are also offering discounts for many attractions in Barcelona (ask for that in advance). We really want you to fall in love with Barcelona and have perfect vacations here

name: [NEW] West Village Dream Home!

description: Stunning West Village apartment with privacy, views, and classic New York charm. • 2 bedrooms  • Flooded with sunlight • Large living room and dining area • Separate kitchen • Park Views • Minutes to Subway, High Line, Shopping, Dining and the Hudson River!
house_rules: - Check in time is strictly 3pm or later. Check out time is 11am. This is negotiable if you let me know before you book your stay or a reasonable amount of time before you arrive - just let me know your plans, I want to make it as easy as possible for you but sometimes new guests arrive in the same day and I need time to clean and set the apartment up for them. Thanks !

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Hey there, I'm a singer-songwriter. Welcome to my home!

reviews.comments:
Amazing apartment!

This was a huge apartment in the middle of hip, Greenwich Village. The building itself is very clean, quite, and beautiful. Lots of great restaurants near by (perhaps too many choices!) The accommodations were very comfortable and was perfect for a few days, although I would love to stay longer. Josh was very responsive and check-in / out was no problem.

I would recommend this apartment for sure and hope to be back soon!

Joshua's place is located in undoubtedly the best part of New York city! The house is spacious and well equipped with basic necessities. Lots of cool bars and nice restaurants around! The area is lively and has so much to offer! Will definitely stay here again on my next visit!
Josh was great.
Joshua's place is spectacular! Beautiful, large, great location, great views from multiple windows. The apartment is filled with natural light. Kitchen is great. Loved everything about it!
We loved our stay! Neat apartment that is very centrally located. Amazing communication . The whole check in and check out process was very smooj

Muy buena ubicación.
El departamento es tal cual está descripto.
Las pocas veces que contactamos a Joshua respondió en el momento y con muy buena predisposición.

Joshua's apartment felt like home immediately.  Conveniently located with a subway entrance within a 5 minute walk, the location also hosts many bars and restaurants.  
The apartment itself is fantastic. The bed is comfortable, the kitchen is convenient and the shower and bathroom are in excellent condition.
Location is good.
This is really one of the best places I've ever stayed in the West Village. Walkable to everything, relatively quiet, awesome shower, great AC, solid WiFi. I want to come back.

Location Location! Loved the area- near so many things. Very walkable even with our 7 year old. Apt is comfortable and as described. Be prepared for a noisy and authentic NYC- the windows face a busy street and it's active throughout the night.

Comfortable stay in a fantastic location. Mike our main point of contact was great and had good communication. 

The home only featured 1 bed, the other two of the three were temporary/camping type beds which were not comfortable for all guests, but the main bed is very large.

The apartment is in an excellent location close to the Chelsea Market, shopping area, public transport, cosy bars and cafes. Very nice place to stay with family althout a little bit noisy in the night time.
It’s a great location but if you plan to put 1 or 2 adults in the second bedroom be aware that it’s an uncomfortable fold out bed.

This place was centrally located to a cute downtown are of Greenwich and close by Chelsea Market and Highline area for great restaurants. So high marks for that!! 

I have to say though that this feels like a dorm room with mismatched furniture, incredibly hard (not just firm) beds, 1 pillow for each person and very very basic of things that should be nicer for an Airbnb. There are just a couple older poor quality pots/pans, you will need to pick up what you need in the form of spices and the cheapest possible blow dryer that stops every 1-2 min so it can cool down.

If you like extra extra firm bed, you will love this place ! Most of us do not but for some, they will like that aspect. The master bed was just as hard as the portable beds that that are in the 2nd room. It’s like putting a thin mattress on a wood floor and sleeping. Also to note for the light sleepers, there is hot water running through the pipes that squeals through the pipes all day/night so if you are a light sleeper ..that 2nd room or living room are not places to sleep between the hard bed, full light and noise.

At the end of the day, it was a place to stay centrally located down south which is where we wanted to be.

We absolutely loved our stay. I would certainly love to return and recommend the apartment to fellow travelers. My wife and I brought our kids for a trip and we had more than enough space.

There’s an abundance of restaurants nearby, but the highlight was the excellent coffee shop on the first floor. We were able to walk downstairs and bring it up to the apartment every morning. You’re also centrally located and very close to subway stations. 
 
The host was very responsive and check-in was seamless.

Joshua was very reactive in communicating, found a solution for us to check in early when my parents got in on the red eye and even managed to get us a baby bath for my newborn! The apartment is exactly as shown on the pictures, we had he small room made up as one bed which worked nicely for us, we were three adults and a baby. The apartment is very bright so my parents didn't mind spending a lot of time with the baby there. I came for work and will definitely try to book again next year! Thanks Joshua and Mike!

Joshua’s place is cute and extremely well located. Super easy to get around. 
The good location does come with a bit of traffic / Street noise but that’s to be expected in nyc!

The place is in a great location and check in and out was very easy. Joshua and Mike were attentive and accomodating to our needs. We had problems with no hot water every morning but one and cleaning had also not been done properly prior to our arrival. The cleaning was redone but on day 3 of our stay which wasn't ideal. The hot water problem was out of their control. The heating is also out of their control which meant the apartment was stupidly at all times other than when the hot water wasn't working! All the sheets were also really full static which meant if you moved in bed you got an electric shock! We had to put towels down on top of the sheets to stop the kids electrocuting themselves. Otherwise would be a 5 star review. Noise overnight and early morning as usual for Manhattan.

The place couldn’t be in a better spot. Right next to the subway, the pizza and tapas joint downstairs are amazing.
The beds are very hard, and remember ear plugs. You are right in the heart so sirens are a plenty. 
Very responsive. Kitchen needs a coffee pot, but otherwise has basic needs. 
Great place if you want to “be a local” and enjoy all the walkable jaunts.

This is definitely what you want if you are looking for a nice appartment in one of the best parts of New York! Greenwich village is a very trendy area, lots of nice restaurants and bars.
You can really feel yourself a ‘local’ New Yorker for a few days.
Appartement was comfortable and suits perfect for a short stay with your family.

Our experience at Joshua's place was absolutely positive, the apartment is nice and super well located: the subway station is just across the street and you'll find nice restaurants everywhere.
What makes the difference is definitely the location, the neighborhood has a great atmosphere and makers you feel like a local.

The second room is really small and the mattress are not so comfortable; in general the cleaning of the house could be done better.

We felt like home at Joshua's place, after all day walking around the city, it was such a good feeling going back to this apartment.
Thank you Joshua and Mike!!

Joshua's place is amazing! It's incredibly spacious and extremely well located. It has an elevator and we were able to self check in. Also, we reserved his place last minute and he responded very quickly. The only minor complaint is that the master bed is rather firm and the bed in the second room is very difficult to sleep on.
Great apartment, great building, great location. In the heart of everything, west village to one side and everything else to the other. Great apartment for a weeks stay in NYC.

Amazing location, spacious living and helpful host. You will be minutes away from anything you need or want (convinience store, pizza shop, bbq joint all located right outside the building entrance) amongst the plethora of restaurants and bars. Could not have chosen a better location!

Bel appartement très bien placé dans sur Greewich avec tout ce qu'il faut de bars restaurants, d'animation  pour survivre à New York! Un peu bruyant (c'est New York) mais très agréable.  Amis runners, vous êtes tout prêt de l'Hudson River avec ses promenades de plusieurs kilomètres sans feu rouge du nord au sud (vélos également).  C'est Mark qui s'est occupé de nous avec beaucoup de réactivité. Merci!

[This review will be submitted to the Airbnb Resolution Center.]
We arrived in Joshua's apartment between 10:00pm and 10:30pm with 3 kids after traveling for several hours. When we opened the door, the first thing we saw was an overflowing garbage container. The bed in the master bedroom was used and unmade. The towels in the bathroom were used. 
We started making the beds and we realized that the bed-sheets in the linen closet were not clean. They had stains and smelled. It seems that they were simply folded and put in the linen cabinet. When we tried to change the pillows, we noticed that they had yellow stains; one had blood stains on it.
We felt completely disrespected and unwelcome. 
We slept in bed-sheets used by others and left running from this apartment the next morning.
The overall feeling of the apartment is tired and outdated. This is a very noisy place. The living room and the master bedroom have air-conditions on the windows giving the sense that the windows are open and all the noise constantly travels in the apartment. 

Lastly, a couple of days before our arrival. the owners explained to us that the apartment is an illegal airbnb and if anyone asked we should say that we are friends of them which did not make us feel very comfortable.
Nice and clean apt. Kitchen was very modern and well stocked with applicances. Location is perfect. I highly recommand this place. Thanks for hosting us.
Awsome location high up hugh space cozy big kitchen shops everywhere old school vibes thank u for the stay
Great apartment in an amazing location. Joshua and Mike were really helpful too

Excellent location
Apartment was nice and clean prepared.
 
Internet / wifi was not working.
Sleeping  arrangements was Not as advertised.
Last two pictures in the description is fake or not existing..
 
Considerable noise level all day and night from traffic; street and nearby hospital ( emergency vehicles)
Great location in the West Village. Close to subway stop 1,2,3 trains and walking distance to so many great restaurants and the Hi Line.  Comfortable beds and nice living area.
Location was great and the place was clean. Easy access to multiple subways. Overall we were very happy with our stay.
Nice big space in the West Village in a great location.

Joshua's apartment is very comfortable and in an incredible location. We were only able to find 3 beds (a full, a twin foldaway, and a king), but we didn't have any trouble sleeping our group of 5. The unit does face the street, so an eyemask and earplugs might be a good idea for light sleepers who aren't used to city noise and streetlights. 

I'd definitely stay here again the next time I'm back in NYC :)

We truly enjoyed our stay here! The location was perfect. Check-in was easy, the beds super comfortable and the place was nice and clean. We had everything we could possibly need. The typical city noise didn’t bother us one bit. We will definitely be back! Thanks for the great stay.
Great host
The host canceled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Fantastic Studio, Heart of Central
summary: Nestled in the middle of Lan Kwai Fong in Central - the beating heart of Hong Kong - you can't get better location than this! This apartment is perfect for couples and solo travellers alike. It is clean, safe, and has everything you need for a great stay in HK!
space: Note - the map doesn't display address correctly, the actual address is on Wing Wah Lane (more Central than displayed in the map).  Perfect for a single or couple looking to stay in SUPER Central Hong Kong. This lovely apartment is a fully furnished and nicely decorated. Despite being quite cosy (around 150 sqft) it is a self-contained studio with everything you will need for a comfortable stay. Double bed, bathroom, TV, lots of storage space and a kitchen area completed with a fridge, microwave, hob, sink and washing machine. The studio also includes essentials such as freshly washed bed sheets and towels, plates, bowels, and cups / wine glasses, pots and pans and toilet paper etc. LOCATION  The studio is situated in the 'centre' of Central Hong Kong, Lan Kwai Fong. Located in one of the buildings towering over the many cafes, restaurants, bars and clubs of Lan Kwai Fong, you really couldn't find a better location. As well as this, Central and many of the must see attractions are righ
