house_rules: We hope this apartment will be your home-away-from-home during your time in Hong Kong. We would also appreciate if guests could treat the apartment with love and respect (that you would normally show your own home!) - here are some additional simple house rules. * Please read through the ONLINE HOUSE MANUAL carefully prior to your stay - we will send you a link to manual via airbnb messages once your booking is confirmed. The manual contains important info on the apartment and amenities, location and how to get there, how to self check-in and check-out, as well as some other useful tips. Please let us know if you cannot find the link to access the manual and we will point you at the right direction.   * Keep the flat clean and tidy * Kindly refrain from wearing shoes in the house * Switch off water heater every time after you take a shower - otherwise it may blow the fuse and break down! * Switch off all lights, A/Cs, and electrical appliances before you leave the house - be kind to pl

host.host_about:
We moved to Hong Kong from London in summer 2013, and this incredible city has been our home ever since. Ryan is from London and Krystal is originally from Hong Kong.

We both run our own businesses and travel regularly for our jobs and for leisure of course! Blessed with the proximity to other fantastic places nearby, we have been busy travelling extensively around Asia ever since we arrived in HK, including Tibet, Nepal, Cambodia, Vietnam, Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, Japan, Bali etc. We will be more than happy to share travel tips if any guests are making a trip to other Asian countries too!

In our spare time, we enjoy going on the many fantastic hikes in HK, sipping iced tea and cold beer on the beach, yoga, jazz, good coffee, a good book, and spending time with our furry friend Lola. 

You may also meet our lovely helper Jay (she's is from Philippine and enjoys volleyball!), who helps us out when we are not around.

When we travel abroad we always use Airbnb. For us, a clean, comfortable and safe place to stay is essential. This is exactly what we offer to any guests staying with us. We hope that our place will be a little home-away-from-home for you during your time in HK.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Krystal and Ryan

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
Great small flat, best location !! Can't be more central then this, very clean and cozy.
Recommended.
the room is very small but in the middle of central so it is very convenient

Perfect place for 1 or 2 max, excellent location at the heart of LKF, 3 mins walk to Central station. This place comes with free internet connection which was awesome. Ryan was quick to respond to my queries, Will definitely book it again.
Excellent location right in the centre of Lan Kwai Fong right at the night life but quiet enough to sleep well. Friendly and prompt respond, the appartment is clean and free wifi. Recommended.
Excellent location, right in the heart of LKF, and a minute from the MTR. Space is small but ok for a short stay. Ryan was helpful and available when needed. Exactly as advertised.

Great location and great amenities! We stayed for 2 nights and it wasn't loud at all even though it was literally above LKF.

I love the fact that there's wifi and in unit washer/dryer. And truly superb location. Tell the driver to drop u off at Wellington street some don't know the exact street name. Really easy to find and really clean. Thanks Ryan!
The reservation was canceled 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Small pad, great location for a party weekend in Hong Kong.  Ryan was reliable and friendly, and flexible when I had issues with my flight and needed a late checkout.  Highly recommended.

The stay in small apartment is awesome. The location is just above all the pubs and bars in Lan Kwai Fong. Whether you choose to do shopping in day and have night activities at night, this place is definitely a great place to stay in Central. Unfortunately I didn't get to meet Ryan but his assistant Romelia is very friendly. I really would like to thanked her for picking me up on my first time to HK at the subway.

As for room wise, please don't expect it to be big in HK. In HK (Central) this size for 2 asian adults, I would say is fairly reasonable. But the room design wise is compact and I learn quite a few tips from there.

I would definitely choose this place again. Thanks Ryan & Romelia

Ryan's apartment is in the very heart of Lan Kwai Fong party district and yet despite this, is very quiet. Perfect for anyone with a sore head after partying too hard. Roughly 5 minutes walk to the nearest MTR (Central), Circle K convenience store, Starbucks and a local Hong Kong style restaurant (not to mention the broad spectrum of western style restaurants literally at the door) within a minute from the doorstep, you will have no trouble for your day to day needs.

The apartment is a small apartment with plenty of practical space for your belongings, good kitchen facilities, TV, WiFi, Air Con and a great bathroom. Despite its small size it has a high roof line so anyone who is taller than average won't have issues here.

Ryan was fantastic to communicate with and I had no issue throughout my stay.

Thanks again Ryan

Handy, surprisingly quiet, compact studio in the heart of Hong Kong.  The place is very small, but hey is Central Hong Kong, could not be handier!It looks exactly like the picture. It is about 6 minutes walk from Central station (exit D1 turn right and the right and 1st left and is the 4th street/laneway on your right) and Hong Kong Station (from the airport) is connected via an internal walkway.  I was able to check in my luggage at Hong Kong Station in the morning of my departure. so so handy! Don't bother taking a taxi, the train system in Hong Kong works! Everything in the studio works well, great air con, washer and dryer is incredibly helpful, hot water just turning a switch.  The bed is on the hard side, I personally prefer a softer bed. wireless Internet can be slow. Ryan is very responsive to any questions and his assistant Romelia very helpful when you get lost, trying to find apartment. The apartment is in this laneway in the middle of 6 bars/restaurants that are incredibly loud. Lots of expats having fun. as soon as the elevator doors close, THERE IS SILENCE. A complete an absolute pleasant surprise! Because the apartment is on the back of the building, the noise is absolute minimal! if you go there you will understand! Lots of people around at night having innocent fun, and is a very safe location. if you party that is you place, if you want a handy place that is also your place. We stayed 8 days and it was a great base.

Ryan was very fast with his replies even though I was 12 time zones away! Apartment was exactly as described, small studio, clean; and perfect location if you want the LKF experience. Ryan was very accommodating with the fact that I requested a later than regular check out from the apartment.

Quick and easy to get to from Central and HK stations.

The location was unbeatable for its proximity to the heart of Central--Pedder Street and Queen's Road Central. The lane the building is on is pedestrians only so taxis can't drive up to the building; it's a short walk in from the street, but with two suitcases it wasn't fun in the rain. The apt is small but well laid out. I wish there had been a coffee machine, table to sit at and a hairdryer.
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The apartment's upkeep is good and well-stocked with toiletries. The living conditions are very pleasant.

The location is splendid. If you're up for partying over the weekend, the stretch of bars and clubs is at your doorstep. If you want some peace and quiet, you get a very well-insulated studio which manages to defy any sound from the party district. You get the best of both worlds.

In sum, this is a great place.

Ryan's apartment is in the right spot if you want to be close to all the night-life and action. That's my style so it was perfect. 5min walk to the MTR.  It is quiet in the room despite being directly above bar street.  It is a bit small but for a single traveller or couple with a couple of suitcases its perfect. The apartment had all I needed for my 4 day stay and the bed was very comfortable.

The studio is clean and although small, is fine for one person if simply using as a base. 

Unfortunately I didn't sleep well as the I found the air con quite noisy and the bed uncomfortable. 

I was only provided with a hand towel although Ryan assured me that bath towels are usually supplied.

Great location! The apartment was pretty basic (no frills), but it was exactly what we needed - clean and cozy. The location was convenient enough to get around the city and it's in the middle of a lot of fun bars and late night restaurants. Even with all of that going on on the street, I was surprised to find how quiet it was inside of the apartment.

We visited Hong Kong for three days and could not have made a better choice to stay. The location is great. Within three minutes by foot you are at the MTR which makes exploring the city very easy.   The neighbourhood is lively, offering a lot of bars and shops in walking distance.  The apartment was compact, but had everything we needed and we was very comfy for our short stay.  Ryan was extremely  helpful in providing information, and his 'caretaker' gave all the advice we needed.  I would definitely stay again on my next visit.

Good place to live if you don't intend to do anything else but sleep in the suite. But why would you want to sleep in HK anyways?

Location is one of the best ever. It is right above Lan Kwai Fong and is filled with good bars and restaurants. Transportation is fast, took us 5 minutes to walk and we were at the Central MTR station. Lots of shopping can be done around the area. You can easily find your favorite luxury brand within a 5-10 minute walk from the area. If you are a coffee drinker you can also easily find your favorite coffee stand 2 minutes away. We also felt quite safe to travel in and around the area at any time of day. To sum it up this location is EXTREMELY convenient. 

Living there was a different story. The AC was loud, the bed/bedsheets were uncomfortable. The entrance to suite smells like incense and chicken. Extremely small suite if you have never been to HK. When the bars/restaurants open up at night, the "promoters" heckle you non-stop until you get to the entrance of the apartment. Wifi is extremely slow, technically it isn't really wifi, it's mobile internet turned into a wifi hotspot.  

Quick tips: Try not to check in at night after work hours, it's going to be really hard for your driver to navigate the crowds of people walking the streets and random drunks on the side of the road about to burst out. Do not speak to the "promoters" of the bars and they will eventually recognize you and stop heckling you.

Ryan was very welcoming and gave us a very good description in finding the place from the MTR. The photos accurately portray the apartment, but makes the space look bigger. Cozy was ok for us, and it's definitely an OK space for 1 person. The neighborhood is awesome with so much to do right off of Lan Kwai Fong, pretty quiet at night given the proximity.

The room was well located in LKF and close to the Central train station. There was always something going on and we never had trouble finding somewhere to eat. AC was great to have because of the humidity in HK. Everything was very clean and I would definitely stay here again!

the location is awesome and very convenient!  the studio is ideal for a lone traveler like me in terms of size and basic amenities, room is clean and neat.  Ryan was very kind to allow me to check in early morning! :)
 
feels rather safe when walking back late alone, room is quiet even though the area downstairs is busting with activities.  

there are good food choices, and even better shopping options within walking distance... MTR is also a short walk away for connecting to other places..

brilliant choice of accommodation especially if you enjoy the night life at Lan Kwai Fong!

The location of the apartment was great, it was close to the MTR which made going out and coming home very easy. It's also located near lots of shops, bars, restaurants and convenient stores. The apartment although small was great for two people, quite cosy. Despite being located right above LKF the noise level is quite reasonable. Ryan was a great host, responding efficiently and giving us lots of tips on how to get to and from the apartment with our luggage with was much appreciated

Ryan's apartment in the middle of Lan Kwai Fong was the perfect location for my three-month stay in Hong Kong! The apartment is convenient and close to transport links; central MTR, large bus terminal, trams and taxis.  Getting there from the airport was simple and the apartment was easy to find.

Located in an area known for its nightlife, the room was reasonably quiet. This is also a plus as there is plenty of choice of food and drink right out side of the building! There is great choice of shopping from brand stores to small markets just down the road. 

I stayed for three months during my internship and found it had everything I needed. The room was comfortable and perfect for a single person, or even a couple for a shorter stay.  There was also plenty of storage. The apartment was very clean and looked exactly like the images. 

Although we didn’t meet in person, Ryan was a great host and was easy to contact. 

I would stay again for sure!

I waited over 30 minutes to get the key even though I called and let her know when I arrived. The circumstances around the house was dirty. The air-condition was so loud that I couldn't sleep well. The worst thing was that wifi didn't work at all. Despite these inconveniences, if you like clubbing or something like that, the location will be perfect.

Positives:

Great location, right in the heart of the city
Easy check in and check out
Great AC

Negatives:

The internet didn't work during our stay which was a real bummer wince we didn't have Hong Kong enabled cell phones
Cabinet and wardrobe doors were completely broken or missing
Basic items weren't present (hair dryer etc.)
Directions to the place were poorly written causing a bit of delay/confusing getting to the place
Sheets were stained - not dirty, but still a bit off putting.
Missing basic stuff like a bath mat etc.

Ryan's place is great and perfect for those who just need a place to crash after work, or a night out at LKF which is literally right downstairs. 

I highly recommend this place and would definitely stay here again.
Great place in a very central location. Everything in walking distance. Ryan was very easy to deal with and everything went smoothly. Warmly recommend.

Awesome experience. Very nice host. the location is fantastic, literally right above all the bars in Lan Kwai Fong. Clean studio with everything you need. Definitely would love to stay there again if I come back to HK one day.
Super small apartment but it has everything you need and it's in the best location you can think of in HK Island. Thank you Ryan I had a great time

Let's start with the good, Ryan's place is in a very great location, just a few steps to pretty much anything you want in Central. It was nice to be near everything.

Now the bad, the bed was really hard and it made it difficult to get sleep. Also I don't know what it is but a sheet and a comforter would be better than just a thick comforter on the bed. Half the time I was sweating while I was sleeping, the other half I was cold because I didn't have anything but the sweaty comforter to cover myself with. 

The AC was barely working while I was there, I ended up opening the windows once the temperature outside had dropped enough. I was also disappointed with the internet which kept failing while I was there. As I was coming from the US it was a handy thing to have so I wasn't constantly munching on my data plan, when it was up.
Ryan and Romelia helped me get back in real quick when I was locked out. Right in the heart of LKF/Central. Location location location. Recommended and thank you!

Communication was fine with Ryan, both by text and calling him on Christmas Eve upon arriving at his place and picking the keys up.

The location is ideally situated a short distance away from Central metro station and admidst the bars and nightlife just off D'Aguilar Street. I was concerned about the noise in the early hours post-Christmas Eve celebrations, but the room is round the back of the building and there was little or no noise, especially when ear plugs were popped in.

The room has everything needed for a short stay and provides quiet comfort after a weary day wandering the streets of Hong Kong.
The apartment is as pictured and conveniently located at a very affordable price!

Great place. Excellent location, very convenient, and the mall, the subway is very near. Room is not big, but the equipment is very complete, also very comfortable. Downstairs is the Lan Kwai Fong bar street, and sometimes a little noisy at night. Thank you so much Ryan, we have a great trip.

Great studio with all you need.
The location of the Apt. is superb.  10 minutes walking distance to Central station. Lots of chic cafes, restaurants and cool night life.

Location was GREAT!  Right in the heart of Lan Kwai Fong so you're close to the action, but at the same time the room is surprisingly quiet when you're trying to go to sleep. 

Check in process was super easy.

Room is clean, cozy and had all the necessities (including a washer / dryer, which is SO KEY when you're traveling, and an AC unit).

Would DEFINITELY stay here again.  Thanks Ryan!

Perfect for my needs. I stayed for a week and a half while looking for something permanent. Finding the hallway to the elevators was a little tricky arriving at 1am with the party rocking downstairs but it all worked out. Flat is small if you are used to US size but like I said, it did the job. I would stay again.
Thanks so much guys! We really enjoyed our stay in your apartment. Great location. More than we expected .

When they said this is in the heart of LKF they weren't kidding!! This is RIGHT in the thick of things. An absolutely brilliant little pad with a location that simply cannot be beat. As a solo traveller, I would definitely stay again in a heartbeat.

Krystal & Ryan approved my stay super last minute and were incredibly helpful! I even missed my flight from London, arriving a full 24 hours later than anticipating. Regardless, Krystal communicated with my colleague who was able to check us in, no problem.

The location is incredible... we were right in the thick of things. The shower was nice (separated from the toilet which I really appreciate) and the kitchen was equipped for cooking a bit when we weren't eating at the number of restaurants within a stone's throw of the apartment. 

We were grateful for the AC and fold out desk and table. This was a very productive trip to Hong Kong and I'll definitely be staying here next time if possible!

This was a great place!  Right in the heart of LKF and a 1 minute walk to Central MTR.  The layout of the studio apartment is compact, but very carefully planned out; it has everything you need to enjoy a comfortable stay HK.  Surprisingly, the apartment is very quiet; no trouble at all sleeping at night.  Krystal was very communicative and ensured that we were able to get into the apartment as soon as possible upon arrival.
I would definitely stay here again!
Really nice location. Right in the middle of LKF and super close to the central station. The room is a bit small, but it works.

This is a fantastic spot and Krystal/Ryan are incredible hosts -- they're so fast responding that sometimes you wonder if it's a bot you're working with.  A really helpful + cool bot.  To address a couple of the other review comments:  (1) The place is indeed compact, as others note, but I would add that I'm a gangly 6'1 guy and had no problem living here for four months.  (2) The internet/WiFi setup was replaced, and is now blazing fast and consistent.  No problems at all.  (3)  Although the apt is directly in the center of LKF, the window faces out back and noise is minimal.  I was an exchange student and regularly worked there without any problem.  A few recommendations for people staying long-term:  (1) the Pure Fitness in the California Tower just outside is one of the nicest gyms I've been to, and they'll work with you on price if you're only around a few months, (2) the BEP Vietnamese Kitchen right down the street was my favorite of the recommended restaurants, (3) If you're a bball player, there's a great court in Wan Chai (Southorn Playground) for pickup ball, and also a meetup group (HK Indoor Basketball Lovers) that rents gyms 4-5x/week and always has 18 men/women show up.  (4) Krystal + Ryan have another spot one door down, so if you have friends/family visit it's very convenient to have them be able to stay there.  Thanks Krystal + Ryan, you guys rock!
Centrally located and wonderful hosts. Thank you again!

地理位置非常好!
雖然樓下是吵雜的蘭桂坊酒吧但是隔音效果非常棒!
Krystal是一位非常好的房東:)

What I liked:
- Tiny but very efficient space. The room included everything I needed.
- Location. Very close to the central MTR, Bus Terminal, Piers. 
- Good wi-fi signal. 

What I didn't like:
- Location. A loud music and noise until 2-3am from the bars located nearby. Sometimes hard to sleep.

The apartment could not be more central! You are quite literally in the heart of the action. Checking in was a bit complicated (first time in Hong Kong and I got so lost!) but they were amazing to wait for me and their helper even found me on the street a block over from where I was supposed to be. Apartment is small, but has everything you could need, including laundry! I would definitely stay here again.

We loved our stay at Krystal and Ryan's apartment! The highlight for us was its location, close to loads of shops, bars and restaurants. The apartment itself was clean and comfortable, and perfect for our two night stay in Hong Kong. We'd love to stay at Krystal and Ryan's apartment again if we ever have the opportunity!

This place couldn't be in a better location. It's small but literally has everything you need. Krystal is a perfect host and her communication skills were second to none. This was my first trip to Hong Kong (well, all of Asia) and I couldn't have felt more comfortable, secure, and taken care of. When I come back to HK, I hope to stay here again!

The cosy room locating in the centre of LKF can give you the best experience relating to nightlife. We weaved through 4 bars in a night with a dizzy head but still got back in 3min from Ciao Chow. Best choice for bar lovers.

Put up for 4nights from 16th-20th Feb at Krystal/Ryan's place. Big kudos to them for accomodating my check-in request of 6am as I got in on a red-eye.

The apartment is centrally located - right in the heart of LKF, minutes from many F&B outlets and transport options. The place itself was clean and though a tad small, was very well equipped and livable.

Krystal had communicated closely during the enquiry/booking/check-in/ check out process and together with her helper, make an excellent hosting team.

Thx for hosting!

Gabriel
The apartment was clean and very central.  It was easy to walk around and was in the middle of everything.
Funky little place in Central. Compact. Near the action to LKF. Krystal & Ryan very responsive snd helpful. Thanks for a nice stay.

The apartment really is in the center of all of the action! Well suited for those who want to enjoy the nightlife. Very compact apartment but has everything you need. The apartment itself is very clean but the building/hallway is not so much. Krystal is a great communicator and the guestbook with tips in the room is very helpful.
The place is clean and quiet. The transportation is very convenience.
Great stay! Awesome location and host was very friendly and attentive.
Very centrally located... right in the middle of the action in LKF. The flat itself is extremely small... but perfectly comfortable for a quick stay.

SUPER Central, is not exaggerated nor an understatement. Literally inside LKF with quick and effortless access to the MTR and Airport Express. Check In and communication was a breeze. Everything is as advertised. Cozy, comfortable and after a long day out, it's nice to come back to a warm shower and welcoming bed. Would definitely recommend and would not hesitate to book again if available when I go back. Thanks Krystal & Ryan!

I had a very pleasant stay.  Krystal and Ryan were very flexible with the check-in and check-out times, which really helped me a lot.  The communication was excellent throughout my stay.  The room had everything I needed for my stay, and there was a good manual to help get me oriented to the place.  I think the location is great, and the price is right.  I would definitely recommend the room to others.

Very central location - it's really in the middle of the party area, but it doesn't face the action so inside the apartment is actually fairly quiet even on a weekend night. The room is as described, and it really is very compact - I'm 6' and couldn't really do a push-up on the floor, for example, but Krystal and Ryan have packed a lot of useful appliances into the small space. Also Krystal is very kind and checked in several times during my stay. Given the great location I definitely wouldn't mind staying here again.
For a miniature place - I could find every appliance and utensil I needed!

So glad that the first place I stayed in Hong Kong was at Krystal's place. The location was very close to Hong Kong and Central stations. The place was cosy but enough space for myself. Although in the hustle and bustle of LKF, I barely heard any of the noise! I would definitely stay at one of Krystal's places in the future.

Absolutely loved the place. Location couldn't have been better. Steps from lots of bars and restaurants. The place is small, but everything is so well organized that you feel like you have all the space you need. 

Communication was top notch, and check in was a breeze.

센트럴 D1 /D2 출구에서 걸어서 5분 정도면 갈수 있어요

근데 건물 입구 찾느라 전 30분 넘게 걸렸는데 막다른 길 술집 화장실 입구 처럼 생겼지만 입구 맞습니다 

란콰이펑 핫 플레이스에 위치 하고 있으니 
이 점은 장점 입니다 

조용한 곳을 원하다면 비추.

사진은 작품 처럼 나왔네여
저정도 깨끗하진 않지만 머 홍콩이란걸 감안하면 이정도면 머 

총평
교통 좋음 / 유흥 좋음

작아요/ 좀 시끄러워요 

혼자 여행 가는 남/녀에게 추천
The appt was perfect.. its small but that is clear in the outline. The appt was spotless and well cated for. The location was fantastic and great if you want to be in the midst of everything

I came to Hong Kong on a business trip and needed a simple, convenient, central place to call a home base. 

Krystal and Ryan's apartment did the trick! It's a small unit but completely furnished and self sufficient. A comfy double bed, kitchenette to reheat some leftovers, clean bathroom and shower, and even a little washing machine should you need it. 

It's right in the heart of LKF, so it's a little bustling on weekends. But if you want to be in the middle of all the action you can't beat it! Close to the MTR and Star Ferry too. Easy to get to from the airport. 

Anyways, this place was a nice place to call home for two weeks. Maybe I'll return someday!

Phil

Location - really convenient as it's just few mins away from Central MTR station, and this station is just a few stops from many popular spots like Tsim Sha Tsui and Causeway Bay.

Host - super friendly and accomodating! I forgot to advise about my travelling details, but Krystal kept checking in with me to ensure my check-in on day 1 is smooth (despite being in San Fran!). And she kindly allowed late check-out even though it's a last min request. 

Size and condition of the airbnb is true to pics, and you have everything you need in that space at a good price, and at a prime location.

It was a short trip but I had a smooth and pleasant one because of the great hosts.
Great communication, lovely place - right in the middle of LKF (although you can't hear the sounds from the street from the apartment). Check in was very smooth, and the instructions were handy.

I really enjoyed my stay at this place. I didn't spect to find a place as good located as this one. I can easily moved to everywhere, even if it was located in Kowloon. It's full of nightlife outside but I also get a really good rest surrounded by a lot of nice pillows. This place has everything what you could need. I could even ironing my clothes before going out or cooking something nice in the mornings. Well recommended! Tidy, clean and nice.
It is a good spot!! I'll definitely stay again for my next trip. The response is quick and helpful! Love it!!
Very convenient flat, perfect location and a sense of local housing. Krystal and Ryan are making sure everything is fine even if we don't meet in person.
Cozy and clean apartment in a great location. I strongly recommend this place if you're staying in HK!
Great location! Small, but clean and nice apartment. Definitely a great place to stay in HK!

Pros: The apartment is very centrally located. It is a 5 minute walk to the Central metro station. Communication was excellent, very clear and prompt. The price is digestible, for Hong Kong lodging. 

Cons: The building, specifically the common areas and elevators, are not simply dated, but very dingy and unsafe-looking. As a single female traveling alone, I would've appreciated more heads up about the lack of security (over the two nights I stayed, the building front door remained open all night with no lobby attendant). There was some shouting and noise in the hallway at night, not uncommon for a city apartment, but not very comforting. The area is very commercial and crowded; if you're looking for a more residential / laid-back neighborhood, this might not be the right fit for you.

Krystal & Ryan's place is all they say it is and has everything you need for a great stay in Hong Kong. The flat is super central and you can get around really easily and though the flat is small (it's Hong Kong!) there's nothing missing, I felt very safe and it's cosy. Communication was excellent, really very reliable. Definitely recommend this place.

Fab airbnb in a lively & exciting neighbourhood. Would definitely advise people to stay here. Very clean & quiet given the busy district it is in. Also the hosts were great, simple directions and some great tips for things to do & places to eat.
Wonderful stay

Wie erwartet, alles bestens!
Ganz besonders zu empfehlen, wenn man den Hongkong Pubcrawl besucht. Dafür ist die Lage ideal!

If you're expecting a tiny crash pad for a short stay, that's exactly what you'll get, as this was the smallest place I've ever stayed in - that's true HK style for you, I suppose!

It was pretty much as expected: a tiny studio (which is, however, Not as bright, or as well put together, as the photos suggest), with no view to speak of. It felt squashed for one person (particularly when my HK friends breezed by to check it out); two people, with luggage, could find the very limited space unwieldy.

However, the studio's location is great - it's easy to find, and reach - with great communication, and the best put together Welcome pack (via email) I've ever had. Its good Washer/Dryer - And an iron! - were also greatly appreciated to have at the end of my holiday, and despite being set in the middle of several bars, the studio was pretty quiet.

Would I recommend staying there? Yes, as a short-term, no-frills crash pad for one, if you just need an easy to reach place to sleep in, and to get your laundry done before heading Home. Worked for me!
我来参加中环海滨举办的Clockenflap音乐节,Krystal&Ryan的这所房子离现场很近,走路就可以过去了,非常棒!楼底下是兰桂坊,离中环商业区也非常近,附近吃喝玩乐的地方很多｡房间很干净,房东也很贴心,一直很热情的问候和联络,是一次非常好的入住体验｡

This place was exactly what we were looking for, a clean, comfortable place where we can crash peacefully in-between excursions in Hong Kong.  The location of the apartment is right in the middle of LKF party area which is great for tourist nightlife.  The apartment was surprisingly quiet at night allowing us to get a full nights sleep each night.  I guess the location of the apartment is on the oposite side of the bars. 

Trying to get a cab back to the location may involve a walk at the end of the ride as some cab drivers refused to drive on the street because of pedestrian traffic.  The Hosts did an amazing job getting the apartment ready for guests and the manual they provide is priceless.  It gives you real insight on how locals live in Hong Kong.

I would stay here again.

Carolyn
Great location and reasonable price considering location.
Perfect location
Great location. Perfect apartment.
距离地铁站步行5分钟,交通购物都很方便｡Krystal给的地图描述得很详细,地方不难找｡房间很干净,很舒适｡

If you're into partying then LWF is a great location to be in. Beware that most of the restaurants in the area are a little pricier than average but that's HK! 

We stayed in the Kowloon side for 3 nights as well and preferred it there in terms of being more affordable, great street food and a healthy mix of fun and quiet. 

Krystal was very responsive and the place has great wifi. The guide she provided was also very helpful!
Great location which is central to, well Central. Clean and safe.
地段在兰桂坊酒吧街,不怎么安静,其他都挺好的,房东热情,房间环境还不错,东西一应俱全

Die Unterkunft von Krystal & Ryan liegt sehr zentral,  nur eine Minute von Central MTR entfernt und direkt im Kneipenviertel KLF. Die Kommunikations war problemlos, Krystal stellt eine sehr gute Beschreibung mit sämtlichen Infos zur Anreise, Unternehmungen, Restaurants sowie Bar's und öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln bereit - wirklich toll. Der Self Check-In klappt ohne Probleme. Allerdings war das Appartment sehr, sehr klein - noch keiner als Erwartet. Mit zwei Koffern hatten wir wirklich keinen Platz mehr zu laufen. Das Bett war leider sehr unbequem. Toilette befindet sich mit in der Dusche, bedeutet leider, dass man prinzipiell Barfuß auf Toilette muss, nachdem am Morgen geduscht wird, da es keinen Abzieher gibt und das Wasser nicht richtig abläuft. Alles in allem, gut für einen kurzen Zwischenstopp - länger hätte es allerdings nicht sein dürfen.
Great place and great stay!

The sweet home is just located at central of Hong Kong very convenient to everything. Clean and have all things you need during trip. It is a very nice place to stay. Most of all, Krystal is a very helpful host and has provided many information. Looking forward to another visiting in future.
Cosy and in the middle of everything.
Great hosts, very responsive and accommodative.

I stayed here for about a month and spent a good time without much inconvenience. The location here is excellent, given the fact that Hong Kong houses are small. I think this would be a good choice if one of us planned a short trip..
Krystal & Ryan's apartment is in a great location. It's easy to access the rest of the city and of course go out in LKF.
Krystal & Ryan are awesome hosts and the place is right in the heart of central Hong Kong.

I stayed at Krystal and Ryan's place for a week and really enjoyed the convenience of the location and practical comforts of the apartment.  I would definitely stay there again.  Krystal and Ryan are excellent hosts: They provide clear instructions for access and are very responsive in communication.  They also provide helpful tips and recommendations for restaurants and bars in the neighborhood.   One thing to be aware of is that the apartment is located right in the heart of one of the busiest nightlife areas of HK.  I like the lively, late night energy of the neighborhood, but it might not appeal to everyone.
It was so accessible. I'll miss this place where I used to party every day. I want to stay again next time.
Ryan and Krystal are super nice and easy to communicate. The location is super convenient, we had a lovely stay.

とにかく立地が最高です｡
部屋は超狭いですが､ｽﾀｲﾘｯｼｭで清潔でした｡
ﾗﾝｶｲﾌｫﾝのｵｰﾌﾟﾝﾊﾞｰの真上なので､夜うるさいのは覚悟してましたが､思ったほどではなかったです｡
逆に飲んだ後すぐに部屋で寝られるので個人的には良かったです｡
しかし神経質な人はやめておいた方が良いでしょう｡

The location is fantastic! Close to LWF, the metro and all your basic needs. A short walk to most of the neighborhoods you’d want to visit as a visitor to HK. Also close to a really good massage place (the right spot) which was an added bonus. 

The hosts were very responsive and detailed.
This apartment is perfectly located in the centre. It is very good for a couple who wants to enjoy the city

Very central and clean. Easy to
communicate with and very comprehensive house manual. I foolishly locked myself out of the apartment, and Krystal quickly arranged for another set of keys to be delivered within a couple hours of contacting her! Very understanding and helpful. I highly highly recommend!
Krystal & Ryan were very responsive to my questions and their answers were very helpful. The place is close to all the action and is very conveniently located. I would stay there again.
Great place! Very central

Great location and quiet despite being at the heart of LKF. Krystal was very responsive and the instructions to the apartment was clear. Had an enjoyable stay and will recommend it for 1 or maximum 2 travellers as it is a really small, cozy place.
the neighbourhood is great! the place is a bit small for 2 but with good facilities. Krystal has been very helpful and communicative!

Fantastic communication, very easy to find, great location, heaps of useful local tips , super clean in a safe and secure building. Perfect place for a solo traveller used to small spaces in large cities

Krystal and Ryan were great hosts from the beginning with very quick and easy communication. We discussed check in and check out times as well as a house guide. 
The place is pretty much what you expect out of a Hong Kong apartment in terms of size. I would say comfortable it would be up to a couple but as a solo traveler it was perfect. The place was clean and had an AC unit that could make the room cool in a couple of minutes. Wifi was great and so were the other amenities. One thing about the bathroom, (awesome rainfall shower head btw) it's a regular asian style shower/bathroom combo meaning there's a drain in the center. There is a slight barrier between the toilet and shower but it is still susceptible to being wet for a bit.  
Location wise this place is in the heart of Central right next to LKF (Bars and Nightlife area). Very convenient for a night out and also could not hear any noise from the apt! The directions from the MTR are easy and only about 5 minutes walking!
Overall a great place relative to HK with an easy location and friendly hosts who can help you if needed!
Apartment was clean and in a great location. Krystal and Ryan were great hosts and easy to communicate with.
Great place. Great hosts. Small space but perfect for one or even 2 at a stretch. I was worried that it might be noisy being over a popular night district but it was not - and I am a light sleeper.
Great place with a convenient location
wonderful
very prompt / good hosts

I had a fantastic stay at Ryan and Krystal's place.  Whilst the apartment is small it is very comfortable and has everything you need.  It's incredibly quiet given it's location and it's right in the middle of the action.  check in and check out were a breeze and the communication from Krystal was top notch.
Excellent. Great price. Great location. Surprisingly quiet room despite being in LKF. Would stay again.
Great place in a convenient location, all essentials were available with no issues! Krystal greatly assisted me on my stay and I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again if I do visit again.

Krystal and Ryan's place is in the heart of Hong Kong. For first time travelers who want to experience the liveliness of the city it is a perfect place. The place is certainly big enough for two people who are used to being in tight quarters. We come from New York so it was easy to adjust to, but if you come from Texas and you are used to big places it may come as a bit of surprise. That said the studio is highly functional.

There is a reason Krystal & Ryan are super hosts! They were very responsive to all of our messages and had a bunch of nice touches throughout their place. The location was right in the heart of the central district and close to everything. Would definitely stay there again!

Superb location if you want somewhere right in the heart of it. We were there from Thursday night to Sunday morning. The only night where the night party noise affected our sleep was Saturday night which is pretty good given there are pubs and bars right outside the apartment that is packed every night.
Comfy bed & effective aircon!
A bit smaller than the photos portray but it is a classic shoebox Hong Kong apartment.

Cozy homestay in Central. 
Krystal & Ryan are very helpful :P
Great host. Quick easy communication. Location is in the heart of lkf.
位于中环D2出口3分钟,楼下商店超市酒吧很热闹,进门也很好找!如果下次有中文入住指南更好!房间不大1-2个住可以｡如果喜欢喝酒晚的最合适 楼上楼下,如果是喜欢安静的或出差的建议不要住这里!房子楼下的酒吧会开到3:00,在00:00前是非常吵闹的基本不能睡｡屋子装修很现代,是年轻人喜欢的式样!总体还可以,兰桂坊不愧为亚洲酒吧街
Very accommodating hosts. Central location in HK and makes it a good choice for people looking to be in the centre of nightlife / among expats.

I had a great stay at Krystal and Ryan's apartment. I was traveling alone, and it had everything I needed. It's located in the heart Lan Kwai Fung so there is plenty of activity as soon as you step out of the building.  Even though the street is busy at night, the apartment is quiet.  It's close to the train station which is convenient, and is centrally located which is also very convenient. Krystal was very responsive and helpful.  She gives you a information package when you book that is full of helpful tips, restaurants, etc.  Would be happy to stay here again on my next visit.

Krystal and Ryan’s place is in the central of the central area, right in the heart of LKF bar street. I stayed there for six nights for a short work stay and family visit. Location is super convenient to walk to work and family visit in Kowloon is a few subway stations away. 

The studio, although tiny (typical of central apartments in HK) is spot clean and well equipped with necessary amenities. 

Only downside is because of its bustling nightlife location, it can get quite noisy during the night and thin wall would allow you to hear neighbor conversations. So careful choice for light sleepers... and because the building is quite old, elevator got broken down on my floor on last two days, but there’s a backup one that is one floor away. 

Overall it’s a very good choice for location-focused travelers for its price and Krystal is a super responsive host. Would consider stay again when I visit next time.
我们非常喜欢这个房子,如果能准备拖鞋就更完美了,下次去中环一定首选住这里!

Krystal and Ryan's place is right in the middle of everything. It is easy to get to from the airport express station and you walk out the door into a myriad of bars and restaurants. This was a great spot for me as a solo traveller. The space is small but it has everything you need, including air con !! I enjoyed my time at the apartment and would stay again. Krystal was lovely to deal with and very accommodating!!
離地鐵很近､房間乾淨舒適(除了樓下晚上會稍微吵一點,但還可接受)､設備都很齊全,下次還會入住!

Great space! Great location! Best for comfy couples and single travellers. 
Works great as a crash pad!

Small and cosy space but has all that I needed for a comfortable stay. Location was great and it was really easy to get around. Right at the centre of LKF but no noise at all when windows are closed. The hosts were very prompt with replies and flexible to accommodate to my request for late check-out!

The place was perfect for 1-2 people, that just needs a place to crash after a long day of walking around Hong Kong. It also had everything that you would find at a regular 3 star hotel minus the swimming pool.

Tha place is right in the center of LKF, super convenient for trips focusing on food galore, shopping and more. Krystal and Ryan are super friendly and helpful to make sure we could find ways to the place and dig into delicacies in neighborhoods! Loved the apartment that gave original HK style atmosphere! Great authentic experience with friendly host, i really recommend the place!

This studio is in the center of Lan Kwai Fong in Central. It was the perfect location to easily explore restaurants, bars, and shops -- and had impeccable access to the rest of Hong Kong via the MTR and Star Ferry. The studio is as advertised: very cozy, but with all the amenities you would need for a pleasant stay. Also, Krystal was very helpful and responsive; she gave us great tips on local fare!

Definitely recommend for solo travelers or couples if you want to be in the center of everything Hong Kong has to offer.

Great location- super easy access from the Airport Express and then easy access to the rest of HK. There is party every night at the base of he building before but you can't hear it at all- it's great. The space is tight but it's Hong Kong, so that's very normal. Krystal is super communicative about how to find the apartment and sends a great guide that includes suggestions of what to eat and stuff to do. All in all - a great place to stay
Amazing hosts! Cute little room at a great location! Definitely more for budget travelers and heavy sleepers. It gets a little loud at night due to the location but it never bothered me! :)
My hosts are always responsive and thoughtful. The location is great for night life.
Location is right on!
Nice studio, small but still good if you travel alone. Little bit noisy at night
Fantastic staying , looking forward the next staying with you!
Nice apartment. Right in the most central area of HK. Very good place in general.
Great place. Little tricky to find but the hosts did a great job of communicating and providing instructions in advance of the trip. Would highly recommend for solo travelers or couples.
that is my first time for HongKong. this place is a good place that is near subway station and 兰桂坊 which is famous place

The location is unparalleled. Very convenient to get to everywhere. Will not recommend walking to the apartment with a luggage from the airport express station at central as it was quite a distance with the cobbled streets. Right in the centre of Lan Kwai Fong and near to famous eateries.

The towels and bedsheets didn't seem entirely clean and there was a slight smell of grease. Will still need ear plugs for light sleepers. The apartment is a very old one. Quite thin walls and can hear the Neighbours, vice-versa. 

Good for one person and even so was rather small for me and a big luggage. Easy to grab a taxi just outside. 

Asked for late check out and received a kind reply from owner. Thank you

A quaint home away from home. Although in a bustling location the apartment faced the quiet side of the building and was equipped with everything needed to have a happy environment. 
Checkin process should be thoroughly reviewed prior to arrival, but once you're in, it's perfect. 
Thanks Krystal and Ryan

name: Air conditioned townhouse with furnished room!!
summary: Aloha! Beautiful brand new 3 bed townhouse with fully furnished room for rent in beautiful Kapolei! Oahu's second city is the perfect place to stay and get away from the craziness of Waikiki while only a short distance to beach, malls, bus lines, and the beautiful west side and Disney Ko'olina resorts! Safe neighborhood, secure place, air conditioning and a clean home! Great deal!  The master bedroom is used by myself but the rest of the house is available for the guest use! Including kitchen!
space: The 3 bedroom house is new and wonderfully decorated! Room has brand New Queen size bed. Flat screen tv, digital HD cable, ice cold air conditioning, and plenty of closet space! The house is very clean and neat, similar to a hotel! Set of  towels for guests and bar soaps provided for each guest! There are two guest rooms in the home that are Air B and B, your room and another.  Safe, quiet, and comfortable.
description: Aloha! Beautiful brand new 3 bed townhouse with fully furnished room for rent in beautiful Kapolei! Oahu's second city is the perfect place to stay and get away from the craziness of Waikiki while only a short distance to beach, malls, bus lines, and the beautiful west side and Disney Ko'olina resorts! Safe neighborhood, secure place, air conditioning and a clean home! Great deal!  The master bedroom is used by myself but the rest of the house is available for the guest use! Including kitchen! The 3 bedroom house is new and wonderfully decorated! Room has brand New Queen size bed. Flat screen tv, digital HD cable, ice cold air conditioning, and plenty of closet space! The house is very clean and neat, similar to a hotel! Set of  towels for guests and bar soaps provided for each guest! There are two guest rooms in the home that are Air B and B, your room and another.  Safe, quiet, and comfortable. You'll be allows to access the whole house! Free wifi, cable tv and ice cold air condition
neighborhood_overview: It's a very brand new, safe and secure neighborhood! It's in a two mile radius from the mall, grocery stores, and restaurants and only 4 miles from the beach!
notes: The neighborhood is brand new, and maps does its best to guide you here but sometimes it can lead you to the wrong side of the house (garage side). Do you best to locate Kukulu Street, and parking is best here. There is a yellow fire hydrant just in front of my home.  If you arrive on the GARAGE side of the house you are on the wrong side of the house. Please go back out of the neighborhood and find KUKULU STREET.
transit: You can drive (suggested) or bike, or walk around the area! But a rental car does wonders!
access: You'll be allows to access the whole house! Free wifi, cable tv and ice cold air conditioning.  I don’t mind if you use the kitchen, downstairs bathroom, or other common areas. But ask that everyone leave their personal belongings in their room:) If you need to do laundry please just ask, and keep the loads to a minimum please:) There are two doors the front door and the back door of the house. The front door is on the Kukulu Street side of the house. This is where you can park as well!
interaction: I am usually available and able to give suggestions for neat beaches or surf or snorkel spots on Oahu! Can also leave guests be, should they like some privacy to enjoy their trip! I also work a bunch so I maybe working during your stay!
house_rules: General respect and aloha and all will be well! Also no shoes in the house please! No eating in bedrooms. Sorry no guests under 20 years old.

host.host_about: Aloha! I am a full-time Soccer Coach,  here in Hawaii… Soccer is my passion, and educating kids here in Hawaii as well! I work very hard, but always find time to relax and enjoy the beach and mountains of this beautiful place.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 24 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This place is fantastic, 5 min from shopping and the mall and anything else u may need, beautiful home and James is very easy going and respectful, I will be staying here anytime I come back to Oahu for sure.
James is a very nice person and very accomodating. James place is very nice, clean and quite.

James was everything you want in a host.  Friendly, helpful, respectful of your privacy and very easy to work with.  The place was clean and very comfortable, and everything worked perfectly.  Will absolutely look to stay there again when in Kapolei!
James was a great host that is very flexible and communicates quickly with you.  Place was extremely clean and comfortable.  All my needs were met as requested.  10/10 would stay again!
James is a good guy, very accommodating, with a clean and comfortable place to stay. The location near the Ko'Olina Resorts was exactly where I needed to be.
Nice room in a quiet and safe residential neighborhood. Requires car to go to Waikiki or North Shore. Host was super nice. Would recommend to others and stay again.

James was an amazing host! Checking in and out was super easy and he was so flexible and willing to work with our schedules. The room was comfortable and looked exactly as advertised. He keeps his house very tidy and minimal as to help you feel at home without it being over crowded. It was nice not to feel like we were invading someone's personal space! James was available whenever we needed him, gave us space but was also willing to hang out and talk if we were feeling like it. Will definitely be booking with him again if I ever find myself back on Oahu!

James is a great host and made us feel very comfortable and at home. The room we had was one of two rooms that were available for Airbnb and we had no issues when the other room was also booked. The location is great and pretty central to lots of things, especially if you want to avoid the hectic Waikiki area but still want easy access to the rest of the island. Parking was a breeze with James's Airbnb. Plenty of room to park on the street right in front of his house.  Great experience overall!

The accommodation was perfect for our needs. It's clean, quiet, and James was responsive to our needs
 I will definitely stay with James again.

We only had a short stay at James' place -- arrived late in the evening and left early for the airport the next morning. But he still provided us with a pleasant, relaxing experience. The place is clean and well-maintained, the neighborhood is safe and quiet, and James himself is a conscientious, chill host who responds promptly to communications and made us feel comfortable right away. Recommended!

Great location and beautiful place! Anyone vacationing or passing through in Hawaii should definitely stay at Jame's place! I had a great experience and I would highly recommend staying at his place at this great location.
Nice Condo . Clean and close to everything. Great place to stay and enjoy West Oahu
Great place! Super clean and worth the price.
Awesome house, super friendly host. Really clean and kitchen was very comfortable to cook in and very easy to find parking in front of house
Very clean, close street parking available, large clean bathroom, great host who communicates well and quickly! I loved the area also, neighborhood was new and felt safe.
Awesome host!  Have stayed here 2x and will stay again.
Excelente trato y muy servicial. Es una privada bonita pero un poco alejada. Necesitarías coche.
Great stay and great value.  Love having use of the kitchen.
Beautiful townhouse in a nice and quiet area. Walking distance to restaurants. The ideal place to stay while you're here.
James is very accomodating.  We've stayed here for several weeks while waiting to close on our house.  This Airbnb is  A+.  Highly recommend.

Great stay.  We stayed here for almost a month as we transitioned into our home.  James made us feel very comfortable. Great place and definitely a great value, the use of the kitchen and laundry is a plus as most other Airbnb's don't have that amenity.   Would highly recommend and would definitely stay here again.
Amazing house, the pictures look nice but it is really a beautiful house in a nice area of townhouses. Very close to drive to Honolulu, Pearl Harbour and the airport.

The house is great, room is super clean. James is an awesome host and very helpful.
You're gonna need to rent a car to explore the island by yourselves. 
My husband and I enjoyed our stay there, will come back again.

For the first time we tried BNB and our experience is just awesome. I felt like I am in my own home. It was so much comfortable, clean house, kitchen , washroom. I would strongly recommend this to my friend and give thousand stars.
James’s place was 5 star! He was available to answer any questions and the location was great for the area I needed to stay! I would definitely stay there again!
We enjoyed staying at James's place. It was nice and relaxing after a long day of exploring! Would stay there again
Once again a lovely stay! I will definitely recommend his sweet house to others.
Easy
Simple simple simple.  James just made it a simple easy stay.
James was a great host. We didn’t hear him or see him through our stay and the space was awesome. Perfect location for what we needed. Great stay!
Great stay. James made is very Simple and easy check in and out process. Ample street parking. Lively neighborhood. Would love to stay again.
Sehr empfehlenswert. James Haus ist sehr groß und in einer schicken Nachbarschaft gelegen. Es ist schön eingerichtet und sehr sauber. James ist total unkompliziert und ein sehr angenehmer Gastgeber!
Great stay at Jame's place.  Very clean and well maintained room.  Very welcoming and accommodating host and excellent communication.  Would highly recommend his place.

Great stay with James! House was very clean and welcoming. Little touches like Charmin tp, new pillows and soft sheets made the stay even better than I expected. Parking was never a problem and James always responded to my texts within a few minutes. Overall a great stay! (Helpful note: my mom and I wanted our own beds. Room was large enough to fit a queen air mattress between bed and closet which was awesome)

Wonderful home, quiet and safe location for our stay during the holidays.  Our room was very clean with access to all amenities.  Parking was not an issue, available in front of home.  James ensured our stay was comfortable from an easy check-in to an even easier check-out as we had to leave for an early morning flight.  Quick responses to communications, very welcoming and accommodating host.  Highly recommended.
This guy is great. Very easy to get along with and great host. Great location and fireworks were all across the sky I could see from the room. Thanks again
Very responsive to my messages and accommodating to changes in schedule. Highly recommending staying here!

James place is great! Nice, clean room in Kapolei close to a lot of newer shops and restaurants. James is great with communication and like other reviewers said he gives you your privacy but there if you need him. Good guy too. Would definitely consider James again when we stay in Oahu. Thanks James for everything!
James is an excellent host. Very friendly and good communication throughout our stay. Clean, modern space with AC at a fair rate. Would definitely stay again.
James was a great host! Our super last minute request was accommodated quickly and easily. His place was really clean and comfortable and he made our short stay very enjoyable.

Notre séjour chez James a été parfait! Il répond très vite aux messages et est facile d’écoute. La chambre était parfaite, ainsi que la salle de bain! Le quartier était super bien situé, proche de tout! Nous y retournerons c’est certain!
Great place once again...just what I needed.
This is a bachelor pad, so don’t expect a woman’s details of attention! He has some nice touches with flowers and a non cluttered place. It was sufficient for our needs

James was a very nice host. He quickly responded to all of our request. His airbnb is nice and clean. He offered to let us use his washer and dryer while we stayed. The cost, location, and space offered by this airbnb was a nice value and I would recommend it.

James is going easy to talk to, responds so quickly, has the accommodations set up so nicely, it is clean, with a comfortable bed, and quiet area. I thoroughly enjoyed meeting him and “talking story” about soccer, and will definitely stay here again!
Always excellent experience...
Super clean brand new house and super nice guy!
Wish we could have stayed longer!! Such a comfy and nice place to stay. New and decorated so nice with everything we needed!
The place is very nice! James place is very clean , easy check in and the small touches in the room just made my stay better ! Will book again !
Great place and location again.
James was a great host, easy communication and friendly. The house and room were very clean and comfortable. I highly recommend booking!

James was a phenomenal host! A perfect balance of privacy and hospitality is how I would describe this home. The room was gorgeous and the bed was so comfortable I never wanted to get up. Centrally located, close to shopping, beaches and the freeway. If you are coming to the Kapolei area and appreciate a clean, welcoming space and a chill host, STAY HERE.
Nice and clean place to stay at.
Awesome place!
Good place. Quiet. Good location outside of the city. In a very safe neighborhood. Loved that there was air conditioning, most of Hawaiian’s don’t believe In it.
James is friendly and easy to work with. House is clean and great.

James goes above and beyond to have a pristine and welcoming atmosphere- I felt at home and safe, and was able to enjoy the surrounding local area while having a quiet neighborhood to come back to. The room had a pretty view of the neighborhood and the amenities were perfect. I recommend him to anyone staying in the area!

James was easy to communicate with. Place was beautiful and very tidy. Loved that ac was included but the GPS might be off. James I did make sure I was able to check in and reach him if I had any questions. It was easy.
Great place every time I'm in town for business
Always clean and easy
We had a great stay, mahalo!
James was a great host and I definitely recommend staying here. Clean place with great location to beach/shopping centers.

James is a great host, very responsive to questions and great with suggestions.  Clean, tidy house!  Close to shopping, dining and entertainment. Just far enough away from all the hustle and bustle of Honolulu and Waikiki.

It’s no wonder James is a superhost and rightly so! He was so welcoming and hospitable and tended to our every need. So genuine and down to earth. Was a pleasure to meet him! As for his place, this house is gorgeous and sparkling clean. Though we were just renting a private room, we felt welcome to use any of the other amenities in the house! Not walking distance of the shopping center/water park etc but a very short car ride! Would definitely recommend James’ place to anyone :)
Really nice place, super comfy bed and clean. The host is super chill and helpful.
Great owner great townhome
beautiful home.  great location.  great host.
a lovely neighborhood and James was very helpful.
Great place, great host, great value.
James was very nice and we had an awesome time staying at his place. Super clean - highly recommend it!
James was a great host. He made us feel at home even for one night. I would recommend him to my family and friends and we would stay again! Thanks again!
Easy, clean, and quick
Perfect room, so clean and comfortable, highly recommend!

What a great place to stay at. Much better location than anticipated. Super close to Ko Olina. Plenty of street parking. Went to a wedding at the Four Seasons and this was a much cheaper alternative to the major hotels. I recommend this place to anybody interested in saving some money. Very clean. Our host put a lot of love into this place.
A+ stay. Thanks.

We stayed with James the night before a cruise and visiting Pearl Harbor and needed a quick place to sleep and shower. His accommodations were easy in, easy out and we had everything we needed. The bed was comfortable, a hair dryer was provided and towels and toiletries were set out in our room. We stayed with James after returning from our cruise as well before flying out the next day. We would stay with him again if we came back!

This was our first airbnb experience and if they all go this easy then I may never stay in hotels again. We never had the opportunity to meet James but we had an easy in, easy out experience with everything we needed including parking. We would definitely stay with him again!

James places was very nice and comfortable. Towels and body soaps were provided, nice working A/C and cable in the room when you get back from your adventures during the day and just wanting to relax. We seen James a few times but if we ever had a question he would get back to us pretty fast. Very nice neighborhood and we had no problems with finding parking in the area. Food and stores are not to far, I would definitely recommend renting a car to get around so you can see and do more. My husband and I will definitely stay again at James place again if giving the opportunity to go to Hawaii again.
Clean easy place to stay

James' place is the real deal. Clean, quiet, comfortable (individual a/c & heat in each room!). Beautiful Island themed art throughout the home.
One flight of carpeted steps to sleeping rooms. 
I would return next trip without question. Kapolei must be seen to be appreciated. Modern homes, quiet, great neighbors.
My boyfriend and I loved the area, we had a rental car and felt safe parking it in the neighborhood. The place is a lot neater and nicer than it comes off as, which is definitely a good thing!!
Always great
This was the Best AirBNB Experience to date! I had a great nights sleep these past 5 work nights without being woken up by others, 10-6:00am. I look forward to staying again :-) *****

Nice clean comfortable home. As described. Quick responses but didn’t have a chance to meet our host.
Close to Ko’Olina Lagoons, Costco and Walmart. Thirty minutes to airport when no traffic.
Great location and great house. I will definitely recommend anyone to stay.
A very comfortable room with a great location. Communication with James was quick and easy. I wish we had stayed more nights. Thanks.
James is an excellent host! 5-Stars in all areas. This newer 3  bedroom Townhouse is very clean with access to all amenities.
Stay at Jame's place was great. Very, very clean!!! Centrally located, with very modern construction, large bedroom, clean bathroom, and fast Internet. Everything was amazing.
James’ Place was clean and comfortable. Reasonably priced. Very good location, lots of things to do nearby, restaurants, grocery, movie theater. Easy check in. Great bed and tv. Would stay again.
Enjoyed stay at Jame's place. Newly developed modern facility,clean bedroom and bathroom.  fast wifi Internet. A positive recommendation for sure from my side.

name: Bright, airy comfortable 1-bedroom apartment
summary: Bright and airy 1-bedroom apartment with a lovely view. Located between both plazas with easy access to ferry, outside buses and airport. Close to parks and an easy walk to the beach.
description: Bright and airy 1-bedroom apartment with a lovely view. Located between both plazas with easy access to ferry, outside buses and airport. Close to parks and an easy walk to the beach. A great location between both plazas in Discovery Bay with bus access or an easy walk. Bus stops to the airport, Sunny Bay and Tung Chung next to the building.  Walking distance to beach and parks.
neighborhood_overview: A great location between both plazas in Discovery Bay with bus access or an easy walk. Bus stops to the airport, Sunny Bay and Tung Chung next to the building.  Walking distance to beach and parks.

address.street: New Territories, New Territories, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The place was beautiful. It is situated to one of the beautiful spots in hk.  It was close to the airport so it was a plus.  Also close to disneyland. It was far from central hk though.  The unit was clean and beautiful to stay.  My only suggestion is to have more utensils available for use.  The caretaker asked for an apology though since it was forgotten. But all in all it was a great place to stay. Thanks alex for being very accommodating:)

We are a couple from Beijing, from the Internet to do a lot of the Raiders, in nearby Disney, the hotel is not much, but Disney inside the hotel, Discovery Bay Hotel two, whim with Airbnb to try, so came to Alex's house, the truth, Alex is my seven day trip have seen the most enthusiastic landlord that big house equipment is complete, there is actually a washing machine! Big bed, super comfortable, thank Alex gave me an unforgettable trip!
Communication with the host was excellent. Will definitely recommend to friends who come to HK to see us.
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
A very roomy apartment with nice views over the water.  A very friendly and obliging host. Very convenient to transport and comfortable walking distance to shops.

name: Single private room(Gray)
summary: This private room is located on 1st floor in a shared flat. Flats location is a few steps away from main Istiklal Street surrounded by historical atmosphere of local attractions.
space: We've private rooms for Erasmus students / foreign visitors in a secure & crowded area in the heart of Taksim/Beyoglu. We're located very close to Tunel Square, a few steps away from Istiklal Street surrounded by historical atmosphere, close to the major shopping districts, public transport, historical places, consulates (we're side by side with Russian & Swedish Consulates f.e.) This shared flat has 5 private rooms. Each room has its OWN bed, wardrobe & desk. There's also an unlimited WI-FI access, heating in every room and every room takes direct sunlight except one. Kitchen, bathroom and living room are shared areas in every floor except the privately rented apartments. You can take your shower whenever you want. There is hot water 24/7, you can watch TV and DvDs when you want to chill in front of the tv on a comfy couch.  Please contact me personally for details, I hope I'll be able to help you! Feel free to ask me about safe transportation directly from airport to my location and
description: This private room is located on 1st floor in a shared flat. Flats location is a few steps away from main Istiklal Street surrounded by historical atmosphere of local attractions. We've private rooms for Erasmus students / foreign visitors in a secure & crowded area in the heart of Taksim/Beyoglu.
