There is hot water 24/7, you can watch TV and DvDs when you want to chill in front of the tv on
neighborhood_overview: We are just 2 minutes away from Istiklal street and Sishane metro station. But please keep it in mind, we are in steep hill. Also our building is constantly protected by security cameras.
notes: You can leave your keys at your kitchen table at your departure day. Also please let me know one day before if you need airport transfer, I can arrange a driver who will pick you up to your destination airport for a fixed price (I do not gain anything from this, and I am stick to the amount which driver requests for his service).
transit: We are close to all kinds of public transport and I can call taxi whenever you need. Sishane metro station next to Swedish Consolate is just 2-3 minutes away from our building. Also Karaköy harbor is in 15 minutes of distance. It takes only 20 minutes to reach Taksim Square by walk.
access: Wi-Fi, TV in living room, shared kitchen, bathroom and living room.
interaction: I am living in the 3rd floor of the same building, so I am reachable in case of any need. If I am not around, you can email me, or text me via SMS & social media anytime you need help.
house_rules: Please pay attention to these simple rules to make life better in our flat ; 1. Please ask permission of your current (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) to invite more than 1-2 guests of yours, especially at late hours. Please do not invite dozens of people without asking other people, if you're in urge to do that, please do it with the permission of others at reasonable hours. 2. Please lock the flat door while you're leaving, also please keep your rooms locked when you're away to prevent any problematic situation. 3. Please pay attention to prevent loud noise after 23.00, there are lots of other people in the building who are waking up early and local people in nearby apartments as well. 4. Please do not smoke in the living room, if you're a smoker please try to choose your own room to smoke. Also please do not throw cigarettes into the garden. 5. 2 times per month a cleaning lady comes to clean the entire flat, but please be helpful to your (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) about cleaning of sha

host.host_about:
Greetings traveller!

I'm 38 years old freelancer, graduated from graphic design. Currently running my own business, renovating and renting private rooms & flats in the heart of Istanbul mostly for incoming visitors since 2010.

I will be glad if I can help for your accommodation need, and if i can make you feel at home!

reviews.comments:
I just booked a room for a night, before taking my flight. So I can't fully describe Dama's House. However, I can say Ali is a very very nice guy, he welcomed me very well. The room was clean, small but pretty and well arranged. Idem for the bathroom. About the location, it's nearby Karakoy's port (from there, you can go to Uskudar etc.) and nearby Istikal, a famous shopping street going to Taksim (a center place to take a bus and to go to the airport for example).
Finally I can recommend Ali and Dama's House ;)

I stayed two terrific nights at Dama's House.  It is in a wonderful location with shops and transportation in close proximity.  The common spaces (i.e. sitting room, kitchen and bathroom) of the house were clean, and my private room was larger than I expected.  Access to the washing machine was a very helpful amenity.

Great place to stay for a short or long term, international people, really comfortable furniture and very polite landlord. I can really recommend this accommodation. Thanks Ali, for make my stay so special in your house.

Dama's House is the perfect location if you want to discover Istanbul on your holidays or if you are there for Erasmus studies. The neighbourhood is really safe and central and the room is clean. But most of all, Ali is a great host who is helpful no matter what you need: a cab, recommendations for food and drinks, just anything!

I stayed for 4 weeks in the Gray Room in Dama's House and loved this place. The flat is very central (next street to Istiklal Caddesi), very clean and comfortable. Ali was was a great and cooperative host. Thank you very much!! :)

Ali was very communicative before I arrived in Istanbul, gave very clear directions to the apartment, and was welcoming and accessible throughout my stay.  The room itself--the grey room--was simple and lovely, in an apartment ideally located in Beyoglu within easy walking distance of everything I needed.  Perfect.  Ali also arranged reliable early morning transport to Ataturk airport for me on the day of my departure.  It was a really great place to stay, private and simple and friendly.  Strongly recommended.
Perfect location and very very nice people. Only problem was that the bed is not very good, my back was hurting when I woke up.

Ali was a great host. Very friendly and helpful. I stayed a week in the Grey Room. After a warm welcome, Ali gave me a street map of Istanbul and a nice present. The Location is just two minutes away from Istiklal Cad., very cool! Thank you Ali, for sharing your place.

Ali was a great host, so welcoming and helpful, he will make you feel at home.
he is ready to help in any situation, I had an argument with the taxi driver who was taking me to Ali's place and even before I meet with Ali in person, I called him to talk to the driver in Turkish since the communications in English was useless, Ali was ready to help and he solved the problem with the Taxi driver.
For the room its good size room, I had a stay in the Indian room as well, You will met nice people in Ali's apartment, the diversity of the guests will leave a great chance for a culture-exchange, and if you're planing to stay for a long period of time, there will be a possibility of making good friends.
Location is just perfect, 3 minutes walking up the hill to Istiklal Street where you can see the Turkish modern lifestyle surrounded by historical buildings and unique gift boutiques, live music, good food and the best part is Galatasary tower just 7 minutes walking .
I also liked the fact that the building has elevator so you don't have to worry about lefting your luggage!
I definitely recommend Ali's place and the best thing about it is Ali himself.

I had a very good experience at Dama house during my holidays in Istanbul. It's very central and that allowed me to walk to almost everywhere. The house is in a quiet street and it has all the facilities, also Ali has been always very quick replying to any questions and very easy person to deal with. I will definitely stay again there in my next trip to Istanbul.

Ali was great and met me even though I arrived a few hours later than expected.  The room was just as advertised.  The other guests seemed very nice though I didn't have much of a chance to get to know them.  The location is excellent, near the Shish-hane Metro stop, at one end of Istiklal, the pedestrian mall that leads to Taksim Square, full of boutiques, restaurants, buskers, and the world's most flamboyant ice-cream merchant.  Be aware, however, that the neighborhood is full of very steep hills--I brought only sneakers and my feet suffered.

Ali fue un excelente anfitrión; me brindó la información necesaria antes de mi viaje para evitar contratiempos y durante mi estadía siempre estuvo disponible, sin importar la hora, para orientarme y ayudarme a vivir una experiencia maravillosa en Estambul. Su buena disposición superó mis expectativas.
El alojamiento es muy agradable y cómodo, es evidente el esmero de Ali por garantizar el confort de los huéspedes, está equipado con todo lo necesario para llevar la vida cotidiana como en casa y se nota que hace renovaciones permanentemente para que todo esté en muy buen estado. Con una excelente ubicación, situado a dos minutos de la avenida Istiklal  esta cerca de todo; en mi caso hice buena parte de las visitas desplazándome a pie. Para ir a otros lugares de interés, la estación del metro y de tramway están igualmente muy cerca, llegar a Santa Sofía o la mezquita azul toma sólo unos 15 minutos.
Las noches en el barrio Beyoglu son simplemente fantásticas, restaurantes, bares, cafés, centros comerciales, espectáculos callejeros, etc. me sentí en el corazón de Estambul.
Así mismo, Ali selecciona cuidadosamente sus huéspedes permitiendo disfrutar de una agradable compañía.
Sin duda Ali contribuyó a que mi primera visita a esta bella ciudad fuera inolvidable.

The Grey room is a quite small room in a very nice in a very nice location right next to Istiklal. I had a very good time sharing the flat with some nice people from all over the world, mostly also "longstayers". Ali was great and allways reachable when needed. The flat was clean and in a good condition. Absolutly nothing to complain about.

Ali was great from day one - gave me all the information and help I could've possibly wanted and welcomed me personally to the flat. He even went the extra step to ask me whether I needed anything on my day of departure such as a taxi to the airport. The room is just as described and perfect for a single person travelling for a short period of time. What made the experience especially special was meeting the other young people living in the flat who were great and with whom I had a fab weekend!

The house was very clean, Is stiuated in heart of the city center, close to evrything! All safe the building looked like! 

Anything i needed Ali arranged for me. 

Hopefully going there again !
Miguel

Ali was a most welcoming host. He responded to all questions within remarkable short time and willingness to answer all of them. He also provided all necessary information to comfortably arrive to the house.
I had a specific request that involved me not being there all nights and he was very open to make the situation fit to my needs.
I would definitely come back to him and his place.
It's a comfortable and really quite place. Location is great. Ali, the owner, is a real gentlemen who helps, facilitates your stay.  I recommend this place and I'll definitely come back again.

The room is in a central but quiet place close to Sishane Metro station where you can reach several points of interest from.
Ali is a helpful host welcoming you even in the late hours. He provides you with water (drinking tap water is not recommended) towels and soap.

Это была моя первая поездка в Стамбул, очень переживала за то, как все пройдет. Как оказалось, мои волнения были напрасны: Али замечательный хозяин, подробно ответил на все мои вопросы, объяснил как добраться от аэропорта до квартиры, без проблем встретил меня в 02:00 (я прилетела поздно ночью). Моя комната оказалась маленькой, но уютной с красивым окошком, выходящим в небольшой зеленый сад. Что касается удобств, то здесь достаточно скромно, но есть все необходимое: хорошее соотношение цены и качества. Сама квартира находится в очень хорошем месте: это небольшая спокойная улица всего в 2 минутах ходьбы от улицы Истикляль, где расположено великое множество магазинов, кафе и ресторанов на любой вкус и кошелек. Рядом метро и остановки общественного транспорта. Также неподалеку находится Галатская башня, музеи, рыбный рынок, можно легко добраться до района Фатих (пешком через Галатский мост всего за 15-20 минут). Мои соседи оказались очень приветливыми, дружелюбными и позитивными ребятами, мне было легко и приятно общаться в ними, даже не смотря на мой ужаснейший английский)) Подводя итог, хочу сказать, что моя поездка удалась на все 500%, и выбор данного места сыграл немаловажную роль: здесь можно с головой окунуться в атмосферу удивительного Стамбула, забыть о том, что ты турист и просто наслаждаться этим великолепным городом. Уже задумалась о моей следующей поездке в Стамбул!
Огромное спасибо, Али! Больше гостей и больше друзей в твоем доме :)

Ali is really an outstanding host. While it may be cliche to say that he responds to 'everything' Ali really cares about his  tenants/clients and responds to everything in a very timely and immediate fashion. Ali is always happy to help with anything. The location I stayed at was really cleanly kept, rules were fair and clear, and the price point is unbeatable for the location!  I strongly, strongly recommend Ali!

name: TPC - Ribeira Marchands d’Or Apartment
summary: Located in downtown city centre, in the heart of Ribeira with all main attractions within walking distance and 2 steps ahead Douro River. Renewed apartment, fully equipped and comfortable. 8 minutes walking distance to São Bento metro station. Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment. Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay. Free luggage storage at The Porto Concierge - Welcome Center.
space: Within a building, this apartment is on the 4th floor, accessible by stairs only. Typical and renewed this flat has 1 bedroom, 1 living room with a kitchenet and a bathroom. The living room has a TV with international channels, there is also a comfortable sofa that turns into a sofa bed. The kitchen is equipped with everything necessary, water kettle, microwave, oven and stove top, all utensils necessary for a home cooked meal can be found like pots and pans, cutlery and crockery. Its fantastic location allows a quick access on foot to the main touristic spots in Oporto, like the iconic Lello Bookshop, the Clérigos Tower and just down the street - Douro River area.

Renewed apartment, fully equipped and comfortable. 8 minutes walking distance to São Bento metro station. Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment. Its fantastic location allows a quick access on foot to the main touristic spots in Oporto, like the icon
neighborhood_overview: In downtown city centre 2 steps ahead Douro River, within 5 minutes walk to supermarkets, restaurants, coffee shops, bakeries and all sort of commerce. 5 minutes walk to all the main attractions in Porto. In the neighborhood you can find all type of services: many restaurants, supermarkets, butcher, fruit shops, typical grocery stores, cafes, bakeries, take-away, ATMs, etc.
notes: Extra Services upon request w/ special conditions: • Private transfer to the apartment/airport (Lux car): 9€/person 2 to 3 people (private driver) - takes 20 minutes (can be used for 1 person but will cost 18€) • Transfer service in a private bus to the Airport (private driver pick up at the apartment): - 4 to 6 persons: 9€/person - takes 25 minutes • Sightseeing Bus + Port Wine Cellars:  - 1 day: 13€/person* - 2 days: 15€/person* • 6 Bridges Douro Cruise + Port Wine Cellars: 12,50€/person* • Sightseeing TukTuk + Port Wine Cellars: - up to 2 people: 12€/person* - more than 2 people: 10€/person* - Plus Bridges Cruise: 22€/ person* - Plus Cable railway: 17€/ person* • Home groceries delivery  • Babysitting  • Bike rental • Taxi  • Other services as requeste (Website hidden by Airbnb) years old: Free/ 4 - 12 years old: 50% discount For more information, please contact us. Prices may vary according to the services requested and/or guests involved. Services are provided by business partners
transit: This street is not accessible by car, but the entrance of the building is very close to main street ahead. Metro: 8 minutes walk to metro stop "São Bento". There are some options for you to come from the airport to the apartment:  - Private transfer to the apartment (Lux car): 9€/person 2 to 3 people (private driver pick up at Arrivals) - takes 20 minutes (can be used for 1 person but will cost 18€)  - Transfer service in a private bus from Airport to the apartment (private driver pick up at Arrivals): - 4 to 6 persons: 9€/person - takes 25 minutes  - Metro (you should leave on São Bento stop) - 2,45€ / each person - takes 35 minutes + 8 minutes walking
access: Guests have access to all the amenities of the apartment.
interaction: When you arrive you will be met by Concierge Service that will receive you for check-in and share with you tips about where to find special places to eat, visit and have fun. As to communicate your stay to the Immigration and Borders Service (SEF), your Passport or ID Card details will be requested during check-in.
house_rules: - Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment, only in the balcony when available or at the window-sill. Please leave all electric appliances turned off, make sure water taps are not running and close all doors and windows before check-out. We request that guests leave the dishes and the kitchen clean and empty out the trash, there is always a garbage deposit in the street nearby. The apartment is cleaned prior to each arrival. Please, keep the apartment tidy and clean as reasonably possible during all the time of your occupancy. If you require extra cleaning during your stay, please contact us - we will arrange it. PLEASE TAKE CARE of the decoration items, furniture, towels/linen and other apartment's equipment. Any doubts handling the apartment's appliances and equipment please call. The neighbours appreciate some peace and quiet as do our guest, please keep the noise level to a minimum between 22h and 8h. Use the place as if it were your own. Check out time is before 11h. If request

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Good appartment! It seems ecen bigger than in the photos:)
The unic negative part is that you don't have elevator and that there is a little bit of noise (but that's the price if you want to be in downtown). Overall really good place to visit porto, i recommend it
Excelente local. Otimo apartamento. Recepcao e comunicacao muito boa tambem.

C'est un bel appartement 
Propre 
On entend un peu les bruits de la rue mais on peut le comprendre vu l'emplacement
Ce serait bien au niveau de la cuisine de trouver quelques produits de première nécessité
( sel poivre sucre...)
C'est une suggestion mais c'était bien!

Appartement extrêmement bien situé dans le centre historique de Porto, très propre, calme avec tout le confort disponible. Josiane a été très attentive à notre bon séjour et nous la remercions grandement.
Muy buena estancia, en una zona céntrica. También muy limpio todo y muy amables.
Muy bueno! La mejor ubicAcion pero no vayan en auto.
The apartment was very well located only 2 blocks from the waterfront. It was clean and comfortable. Thank you Josiane for a great stay.

Appartement très bien situé, à deux pas de la rivière et donnant accès, à pied, à bons nombres d'endroits intéressants et à visiter. L'appartement est moderne et confortable. Cependant, le fait de donner sur une rue assez animée fait qu'il y a beaucoup de bruit ce qui peut etre dérangeant, et il y fait également assez chaud. Je recommande malgré tout car la localisation est assez exceptionnelle !
The stay was great. We booked last minute and picked up our keys at a concierge not far away. A perfect spot to explore Porto from. The bottle of wine was a sweet touch too!
Todo ok

The apartment couldn't have been in a better location! Steps from the waterfront and surrounded by restaurants, bars, cafes and shops. It's also larger in person then in the photos, more then enough space for one, would definitely fit 2 very comfortably. 

The only downside is that the unit is on the 4th floor, so getting luggage up or coming home after a long day of walking the hills of Porto can be a challenge. 

If you're a light sleeper may want to pack some earplugs. There's no a/c so on warm nights you'll want the windows open, and there is noise from the nightlife in the area, well worth the trade off in my opinion to be close to it all.

Also I used their car service to pick me up from the airport. My driver was waiting for me at arrivals with my name on a sign, was super friendly and coordinated my check-in en route to the apartment. highly recommend!

The apartment is very nice, modern and clean. There is no wardrobe. It is located in a perfect position. Perfect!
But we had many issues with the company which manages the apartment.
Every day they sent us the same message containing commercial offers. We asked for two different beds but when we arrived only one was ready and we had to wait two hours to have the sheets for the other bed (because they told us on the phone that they were having dinner...)
The apartment is on the 4th floor and we had no help (and no offer for help) in bringing up the luggage. Plus, you have only one pair of keys, but you need them to open the main door on street level, even from inside. Which means you have to make the stairs every time you have to open to someone else and in checking out (since you have to leave the keys inside the apartment) you need to go up and down two times.

L'appartement est très bien placé au centre de la zone touristique et à deux pas du Douro. Les images sont fidèles à l'appartement loué. Ce dernier est propre et plutôt confortable. Le parquet et les pierres apparentes apportent un plus.

C'est tout de même dommage de ne pas fournir de papier toilette, de savon (au moins pour les mains) et de laisser le bon code pour le wifi. En effet, nous avons du passer plusieurs coups de téléphone pour avoir le bon code. Rien de grave mais c'est dommage car c'est facilement évitable.

Comme souvent à Porto ce n'est pas un airbnb classique mais une agence qui loue des logements via la plateforme. Bref on est loin de l'esprit initial mais ça fait l'affaire.

Appartement idéalement placé dans le coeur du Porto historique. Certes un peu bruyant le soir, mais c'est le lot des quartiers animés et vivants. L'appartement est propre et correctement équipé, literie un peu vétuste. Mais endroit très agréable avec une vue charmante sur une ruelle pittoresque.

Location was incredible. Apt was beautiful. We have a little issues with our key that broke and it took 3 hours for them to get to us but it was a Sunday in Portugal so that can be forgiven! 

I would recommend this place to all types of travelers!

The pictures do not do this place justice!! The apartment in Porto is the most wonderful place to relax and enjoy a great stay in Porto. Not only is the apartment immaculate the location is fantastic!    
Josiane was a lovely host and the welcome bottle of wine was an extra special touch! We will be sure to visit again and recommend to family and friends. Thank you!!

Wonderful stay!
I spent two days in Porto at Josiane's flat. The house is exactly what it looks like in photos: beautiful and clean!
The neighborhood is amazing and I think one of the best in the city.
Absolutely advised.
Appartement très propre et très bien situé. Très bon accueil !

The Porto Concierge is very poorly run and managed. My initial airbnb message outlining arrival details went unanswered for 1 week. We finally coordinated a check-in time of 13:00h but were not met at the apartment by anyone until 1500h. During this 2 hour wait, I sent several messages through airbnb messenger that went unanswered. We found a local gentleman who was able to call the contact phone number for us and only after several failed attempts were we able to reach the company and get someone to let us into the apartment. Upon entering, the apartment was uncleaned (towels, linen, and garbage everywhere from the previous guests). When we expressed our displeasure the woman who let us in smiled and laughed in our faces. We were then asked to leave the apartment for 2 hours so that it could be cleaned. Would not recommend staying in any apartments managed by this company.
Very central location. Close to everything. 4th floor walk up
Great apartment! Very clean and had all you need.check in went smoothly, allways responded quickly on any questions we had.Very accomodating.Will definately recommend.
Apartamento bem localizado, limpo, arejado, está de acordo com as fotografias. Gostei muito.

Très bon séjour à Porto !
Appartement très bien situé et vraiment très agréable.
Adresse à conseiller !
Appartement fonctionnel, très bien situé idéal pour 2-3 personnes. Bon rapport qualité prix!

We had a very good time in Porto and Josiane's apartment has taken a big part of it.
Everything was perfect. 
Thanks a lot.
Bien situado algo de ruido pero bien en definitiva para un fin de semana

Le logement est conforme aux photo. Mais sachez qu'il est peu insonorisé (bruit extérieur lié au tunnel à proximité et bruit de voisinages) et qu'il n'est pas adapté à une location en hivers. Par ailleurs, il n'y a pas de produits de base dans la cuisine. 
En résumé, je ne recommande pas cet appartement pour une visite de porto hivernale.

The apartment is very beautiful and the location is perfect. It was clean, exactly as per the photos and Josaine was there on time for the checkin, she gave us tips on what to visit and she was really nice. 
However, the apartment is very cold, there is a stove but it is obviously not enough to get a comfortable temperature, so I think this is something to improve for a winter stay. Also, there is not hot water enough for two showers on the run, that woudn’t have been a problem if someone had told us in advance. Finally, none of the TVs were working, this was not a problem for us but just wanted to mention it.
I think the apartment is ok as long as it is not vert cold in Porto, the location is just perfect, it is nice, big enough for 2 people and the bed is comfy.
Great for young travelers (4th story walk up), fantastic location. We enjoyed the bottle of wine and water very much!

Everything is good. Great location and lovely apartment. They can still improve cleanliness as the bathroom was dirty when we arrived and they took over 12 hours to clean it after 3 calls. Overall good value and if the cleaning issue is well addressed can be recommended.
Très bon séjour a Porto dans l appartement de Josiane, bon accueil et une explication des choses à voir et à faire à porto.

Overall, nice and clean apartment, we enjoyed our time there and the location is very convenient. However, one drawback is that one heater in the apartment is not enough as it gets cold in the bathroom and other room.
Senclo, para una pareja y un niño genial, coqueto, equipado, sencillo, básico, bien ubicado....

Simpel appartement zonder poespas, maar dat is ook niet nodig met zo'n centrale liggen van het appartement besteden we de meeste tijd buiten. 
Alles op loopafstand van het appartement. 
Het appartement zelf was netjes schoon.  Alleen jammer dat de overbuurvrouw luidruchtig rookt op de hal.
De verhuurder reageert snel op berichtjes.

Great stay. The perfect house with the perfect service. We did a last minute booking and everything went smooth. Everything was very clean and the comunication was perfect. The house is incredibly luxorious and fully equppied. Highly recommended
A nossa estadia foi fantástica, esperamos voltar um dia.

Everything was fine, we liked it, but it could be a bit warmer!
Warm hosts and everything went smoothly.

Many thanks.

Great stay. The perfect house with the perfect service. We did a last minute booking and everything went smooth. Everything was very clean and the comunication was perfect. The house is incredibly luxorious and fully equppied. Highly recommended

Horrible service and house, I don't recommend it at all. Huge delay on the check-in time, leaving us under the rain. The house was not prepared for us, and we had to wait even more after the hostess arrival. Everything in the neighborhood and entrance was dirty, full of cigarettes and water from the rain. The clothes from the poor neighborhood were also hanging in the house. When we got to the place it was unbearably cold (4ºC) and the hostess refused to provide us with a heater. The electricity outlet was coming out, which could even be dangerous. We tried to contact the company, but got no answer from them. Don't book this place if you're looking for a pleasant experience.

We waited down more than an hour on arrival.

The localization of the apartment is very well, near the center, near the subway

 
The apartment is really poorly insulated : noise and cold …

Hot water doesn’t last long, especially when you are 3 girls.

The location of the apartment is very nice, right next to the Douro. The apartment has everything what you need and met my expectations. The communication with Josiane went good as well. We had a great stay in Porto!
Good apartment, excellent location for city centre, enjoyed my stay
El alojamiento es igual que en las fotos. Está bien ubicado y limpio. Tiene todo lo necesario para tener una estancia agradable.
Muy agradable y en un emplazamiento inmejorable!!

The place is amazing, clean and full equiped. The problem was that we were waiting 2h for her after calls and calls and answers like: “let me talk qoth the manager, I’ll call you” and nobody called me; or “I’m coming” and nobody came... the rest... awesome! Place for repeat of course!

El apartamento es muy bonito, muy limpio y súper bien situado. Pudimos ir andando a todos lados. PERO, hace MUCHO FRÍO (en abril, así que imaginaos en invierno) y con un radiador no es suficiente. Por otra parte faltaba una pieza en la cafetera por lo que no pudimos usarla. Por último, la vecina de enfrente estaba SIEMPRE sentada en la puerta fumando cuando entrábamos y salíamos (incluso a altas horas de la madrugada), nos sentimos muy observados y controlados.

We really enjoyed our stay there. The location is perfect. Walking distance to the river and to the best views of the city. However,  the apartment is not meant for people with big suitcases since there is no elevator. You have to climb the 4 floors by yourself. The trash can was not really big enough for our 2 days there. But other than that, recommended! Thanks Josiane for hosting us.

The appartement is very nice and luminous like in the pictures but very very noisy !! It was difficult to sleep ! 
And there is a building in renovation next to the apartment so a lot of noise starting at 7.30am !
The beds are not very confortable. 
So it’s expensive if you just want a place to sleep.. 
There was nothing for breakfast, the or coffee, not even for the first day. 
The location is great, you can do everything by walk.
appartamento in ottima posizione; buon arredamento; buona pulizia

Ho trascorso un week end con due amiche a Porto nella casa di Josiane.
Nonostante l'aereo sia arrivato con un'ora di ritardo, l'host si è dimostrato assolutamente disponibile e flessibile con l'orario di check-in.
Molto apprezzata la bottiglia di vino lasciata come omaggio all'arrivò.
Posizione perfetta, a due passi dalla Ribeira e da tutti i punti di interesse della città.
Assolutamente consigliata :)

La verdad que el apartamento está genial y son muy atentos. 

Cuando llegas hay una botella de agua y otra de vino esperándote, además de mapas de la ciudad y de distintas actividades. Además tienen muchos detalles que no son nada habituales y que están genial, por ejemplo, tienen gel en la ducha, servilletas, etc.

El apartamento tiene una situación genial, es un poco frío pero con el radiador se está bien.

Ce logement est d'une évidence énormément bien placé dans le centre de Porto, tout se fait à pied . 
L'équipement et l'ambiance chaleureuse de ce logement était au rendez-vous. 
Je le conseille vivement pour effectué un long week-end sur Porto. 
Si je devais revenir sur Porto, ça serait sans aucun doute dans ce logement.
Excellent stay at Josiane's flt. Highly recommended!!

Casa impecable en una ubicación inmejorable.
Volvería sin duda! 100% recomendable
Very clean! Warm welcome from Josiane. Very close to everything! I recommend.

Appartamento confortevole e completo, pulito e funzionale. Posizione perfetta, a un passo dalla riva del fiume e dai suoi deliziosi ristoranti. Ottima posizione anche per esplorare a piedi la città.
Il giovane staff di Porto Concierge si è dimostrato disponibile, educato e pronto a dare consigli. 
Consigliato!
Great location, clean rooms, friendly host.
Logement idéale pour un séjour à Porto
ubucacion perfecta para visitar la ciudad

Josiane was lovely and very accommodating. Place was very comfortable and right in the heart of the action. A little noisy due to the construction and there is no air conditioning so did get a little stuffy at night. Otherwise great and would definitely stay again.

Great place to discover Porto. Yo'll be 50mt away from Douro river, really near to Luiz I bridge. Narrow street, so quiet, but rounded by dozens of restaurants. We enjoyed our stay. This place is a real good option for your next visit to Porto.

Awesome appartment located in the best area possible. A must-book if you go to Porto.

The concierge was really nice and helpful, if I come back to Porto I will definitely stay here again.
We had an excellent stay with Josiane! Great space, location and communication!

Appartement très propre et bien situé. Instructions parfois peu claires : nous étions 2 et ne voulions pas dormir dans le même lot. Or il a fallu ajouter 20€ pour obtenir des draps pour le canapé lit...
Best location you can find, nice stylish apartment. Need a little refresh for the washroom but nothing serious. Everything is walking distance. Enjoy and have fun!

I stayed In this Airbnb with 2 friends and we had a very nice stay. Pictures of the location are accurate and it was perfect for 3 people. A few things to note would be that there is no air conditioning and the unit gets quite warm even at the end of September. We opened the windows which would’ve worked fine but there was loud construction nearby which made having the windows open a nuisance. The hot water also lasts very short and the hair dryer needs a “break” after a few minutes of use. The bottle of wine upon arrival is a very nice gesture and the location could not be beat as your minutes away from the river in Ribiera with lots of restaurants and cafes. Everything we wanted to see was walkable from our location.

We had stayed with TPC at a different apartment before and had a great experience, so we were looking forward to our stay at Ribeira MD. The apartment was very nicely designed and we loved the bar area. However, the internet connection was a bit weak and unreliable, which is important for us as we work online. We ended up needing the reset the modem multiple times in order for it to work. Additionally, we found some hair on the sheets when we arrived, and our request for new bed sheets went unanswered. 

Again, the apartment itself is great, the location is truly amazing, the woman who gave us the keys arrived timely and was super great, and we wish our experience wasn't as flawed!
Ótimo apartamento. Super bem localizado.

We had a nice stay in Porto, but there were a couple issues. The apartment was tidy and as described, and the location was wonderfully located in the Ribeiro neighborhood.  The hosts provided lots of suggestions and recommendations, and the complimentary bottle of wine was a nice touch.  However, when we got to the apartment, we realized the wifi and TV were not working.  We contacted the hosts, and had some back and forths, but in the end nothing was done over the course of the two nights we were there. Not having wifi was a huge inconvenience for us, and it would have been nice if the hosts could have done something to fix the problem.

Appartement vraiment idéalement situé, à deux pas du Douro, au cœur de toutes les visites. A quelques minutes du métro, à environ 45 minutes de l'aéroport (mais attention un métro toutes les 30 min ligne E aéroport). L'appartement est situé en zone 4 pour acheter vos tickets de métro au départ de l'aéroport. Quartier calme, appartement dans une ruelle typique. Appartement sans epicerie (sel,poivre,huile.....). De nombreux restos à proximité. Cet appartement est destiné qu'à la location. Accueil fait par une personne de l'agence Porto Concierge. En résumé une bonne adresse pour un couple. Bon séjour.

We had a great stay in this apartment. The location is just perfect, it's very central and there are lots of restaurants next door.  The apartement was clean and quite. We could enjoyed a bottle of wine offered by the host. If you are staying several nights, like we did, you will have coffee only for the first day though. That could be improved, but we are very satysfied of our stay in this apartment.

Il nostro soggiorno a Porto è stato eccellente anche grazie alla posizione dell'appartamento.
Pulizia, precisione e comunicazione efficace! 
Lo staff è stato molto gentile ed accogliente! 
Super raccomandato

L’alloggio è un piccolo gioiello. Ubicato in una delle più caratteristiche zone di Porto. 
L’appartamento è elegante e ben studiato. 
Dotato di 2 tv e servizio Netflix. Accurati i dettagli.
Faticose le 4 rampe senza ascensore, ma un poco di ginnastica dopo le abbuffate dell’ottimo cibo di Porto non fa male.
Tornerò sicuramente a Porto e indubbiamente nell’appartamento di Josiane.

Emplacement super ! Juste à côté du Rio Douro, pleins de resto, on a tout fait à pied. 
MAIS il manque le strict minimum, sel poivre huile torchon papier toilette (seulement 1) le chauffage ne marche pas. Et rue bruyante, mouette !!!

My wife, myself and a relative had an enjoyable stay at Josiane's place. The apartment is right next to the Douro river and Ponte Luis I bridge, and 15-20 mins walk from major sights. We appreciated the meet-and-greet service as well along with the complimentary bottle of wine, although the person missed informing us about the portable heater in the apartment, and we ended up having a cold first night since we didn't notice the heater (there's only one portable heater in the apartment, no central heating or cooling). Would recommend the apartment as long as the weather is moderate!

Even though we did not meet Josiane in person, her place was great! The Porto Concierge hosts did a good job, letting us in the apartment and briefly telling us what's what.

The design of the apartment is exactly as in the pictures, it looks beautiful. Everything has been thought of and the location is ideal if you want to explore Porto. Just by walking down the alley you're immediately on the water side with many restaurants with a great view of the water, boats and bridges. By walking up the alley, please mind it is gets a little steep so it's a good workout if you do it a few times a day, you'll cross Sao Bento train station. From there it's only a short walk to the shopping street, plenty of restaurants and many nice sites to see.

name: Ala Moana Hotel 1616 Studio City/Ocean View - 1K
summary: Cross the pedestrian bridge to Ala Moana Mall or cross the street to the Ala Moana Beach Park.  All the best Hawaii has to offer just minutes away. Enjoy the hotel amenities including an outdoor pool, stone sun deck, fitness center, sauna, business center, and valet service. For your convenience and comfort, we provide a hairdryer, iron and board, complimentary Wireless Internet access, flat screen TV, blackout drapes, alarm clock, and air conditioning in the unit. ****************What's Included?**************** -Hotel resort fee is included. -We provide Welcome Kit (shampoo, conditioner, bar soap, paper goods: bathroom tissue, toilet paper and paper towel) for no refill or replacement during your stay.  -Free Wi-Fi ****************What's NOT included?**************** -We do NOT provide daily housekeeping services or towel/linen change. Coin operated washers and dryers are available on 6th and 13th floor.  -Parking is available in the building (based on availability) with an additiona
description: Cross the pedestrian bridge to Ala Moana Mall or cross the street to the Ala Moana Beach Park.  All the best Hawaii has to offer just minutes away. Enjoy the hotel amenities including an outdoor pool, stone sun deck, fitness center, sauna, business center, and valet service. For your convenience and comfort, we provide a hairdryer, iron and board, complimentary Wireless Internet access, flat screen TV, blackout drapes, alarm clock, and air conditioning in the unit. ****************What's Included?**************** -Hotel resort fee is included. -We provide Welcome Kit (shampoo, conditioner, bar soap, paper goods: bathroom tissue, toilet paper and paper towel) for no refill or replacement during your stay.  -Free Wi-Fi ****************What's NOT included?**************** -We do NOT provide daily housekeeping services or towel/linen change. Coin operated washers and dryers are available on 6th and 13th floor.  -Parking is available in the building (based on availability) with an additiona
neighborhood_overview: ALA MOANA SHOPPING CENTER - 1 min walk HONOLULU INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT - 8 miles

host.host_about:
Gaia Hawaii is pleased to offer you some of the best deals on Oahu’s most sought after buildings. From unbeatable prices at the exclusive Trump Tower Waikiki, to incredible values at the Ala Moana Hotel, our goal is to help you have an unforgettable Hawaiian Vacation.

As one of the only authorized managers of the Trump Tower Waikiki, you can book with us and join the growing number of guests who have come to experience the incredible services and amenities the building has to offer. Trump is PERFECT for a getaway, romantic week, a wedding, a honeymoon, a business retreat,  golfing or yachting or simply to make memories. When you reserve your suite with Gaia Hawaii, you will enjoy all the benefits of staying in one of Waikiki’s top hotels at prices that are guaranteed to be 10% less than the hotel front desk.

Come and experience the “Aloha”. Share the memories of “Gaia Hawaii” with your friends and family – Paradise is calling!!

Mahalo,

reviews.comments: Had a pleasant stay. WiFi open network but fast enough to stream video in low resolution. AC very good and silent. View of city is nice! Note that you rent a room in a hotel so check-in is through lobby.
Rent directly with Gaia Hawaii Vacation Rentals directly (very easy at their website) and do not make this booking at the Ala Moana Hotel through Airbnb.  It will be much less expensive.

name: Oceanfront penthouse with private pool in Copacabana!
description: Luxury beachfront penthouse accommodation for up to 8 persons with 3 bedrooms, terrace and private pool! Luxury penthouse in Rio de Janeiro with 130m², divided in living room, 3 bedrooms (1 suite), 2 bathrooms, terrace and a kitchen. All bedrooms are equipped with double bed, ceiling fan, LCD TV and air conditioner. The living room features an sofa and dining table. Luxury Penthouse in Rio de Janeiro with free cable TV, wireless Internet, two safes and panoramic view to the sea and the beach of Copacabana. For an plesant stay the terrace features an private pool. Located in the 13th floor of a safe building with 24h doorman. Only a few seconds distance to the famous beach of Copacabana. This luxury penthouse in Rio de Janeiro enjoys a privileged location close to public transport, supermarkets, bakery and ATM. Beautifull view to the ocean. This Luxury Penthouse is the perfect choice for a memorable time in Rio de Janeiro! Ideal for families or groups.
notes: Luxury beachfront penthouse accommodation for up to 8 persons with 3 bedrooms, terrace and private pool! Luxury penthouse in Rio de Janeiro with 130m², divided in living room, 3 bedrooms (1 suite), 2 bathrooms, terrace and a kitchen. All bedrooms are equipped with double bed, ceiling fan, LCD TV and air conditioner. The living room features an sofa and dining table. Luxury Penthouse in Rio de Janeiro with free cable TV, wireless Internet, two safes and panoramic view to the sea and the beach of Copacabana. For an plesant stay the terrace features an private pool. Located in the 13th floor of a safe building with 24h doorman. Only a few seconds distance to the famous beach of Copacabana. This luxury penthouse in Rio de Janeiro enjoys a privileged location close to public transport, supermarkets, bakery and ATM. Beautifull view to the ocean. This Luxury Penthouse is the perfect choice for a memorable time in Rio de Janeiro! Ideal for families or groups.

reviews.comments:
We stayed at the Penthouse in the days leading up to the World Cup.  It was our first time in Brazil, and we were nervous about finding good housing at a fair price.  
Franky was fantastic, and the place was great!  He kept in good communication with us throughout the process, and the place was as described.  Excellent view, fantastic location.  The beds and furniture were comfortable.  The kitchen served our needs - we were not doing any cooking, though we could have if we wanted.  
The staff in the condo at the front door were very friendly and very helpful. 
We loved this place, and we will be back!  Thank you Franky!!!!
We had a great time staying in Franks apartment.
The reservation was canceled 530 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The contact with Frank was extremely easy and efficient and the place is nice and convenient with an outstanding view on Copacabana beach. Overall, a great stay and great spot.

Great host and the best place to stay in Rio by far!!!! The view is second to none. 
Will be staying here again!!

Was unable to stay here due to flight delays but my friends loved it. Had nothing but good things to say about it. Frank was super responsive throughout my delays and I definitely appreciated it. Next time I visit hopefully I can actually experience the apt.
Excellent location,  wonderful beach view, secure building with 24hr doorman. Steps from the beach.   Steps from convenience store.  Only con is sheets and towels are not hotel quality.
Amazing!

I had an amazing time in Rio! The people working the front desk at the building were incredibly friendly and went out of their way to help us with everything from scheduling taxis early in the morning to food recommendations. The penthouse for the most part looked as pictured- some of the furniture was different but it did not take away from the experience. The view from the balcony is unbelievable and is exactly as pictured. The location was good as it was close to everything (bars, supermarkets, restaurants, bus stations, etc...). Overall all, I had a great experience and enjoyed staying at Frank's home.

Frank's place was very nice and a very good location. the doormen were all great. the place is in a beautiful part of copacabana beach. great view!!. the only negative was that there is no actual "hot tub", as it does not have a heater. Other than that everything was great!!

Perfect location!  The doormen were very friendly but none spoke any English or Spanish.  Definitely learn some basic Portuguese phrases before staying here.  There are grocery stores two blocks down Rua Bolivar away from the beach.  Money exchange is also two blocks down Avenida Atlantica.

We spent Christmas in the Penthouse at Copacabana Beach.  This property is perfectly situated; overlooks the Beach, access to many great restaurants, a block from the supermarket and in a safe area.  The view from the Balcony (hot tub) is out of this world - perfect for watching the sunrise, followed by a long walk on the beach.

All'arrivo in casa non c'era nessuno ad accoglierci, abbiamo avuto difficoltà a trovare l'appartamento in quanto nessuno ci aveva detto che dall'ultimo piano raggiungibile con l'ascensore dovevamo ancora salire un piano a piedi.
La piscina non era funzionante e non ci è stata riparata per tempo.
Le luci in terrazza erano in parte rotte.
In bagno le prese della corrente erano rotte.
L'impianto audio era inutilizzabile.
La cucina era poco attrezzata, non è stato possibile cucinare nulla e siamo dovuti andare tutti i giorni al ristorante.

The apartment is very well located in Copacabana on the seafront From the 12th floor, the view is spectacular : from Sugar Loaf to the Fort Copacabana.
Its location in the city is perfect for visiting all the interests.
The building is a bit old as many in Copabana but is maintained. The apartment has undergone renovations that remain to be completed.
The air conditioning works well and the pool is very nice.
 2 bathrooms and kitchen have been remodeled.
We may regret the absence of a mixer on showers and of a dishwasher. The curtains are not blackout and should be changed.
The lighting in the rooms is impractical. Despite a sum of details that should be resolved shortly, it is very nice to stay in the apartment.

The penthouse is located in a great spot in front of Copacabana beach with great view from every room. Although if i chose to visit Rio one more time, i would definitely choose Leblon to stay because of the proximity to all nice bars and restaurants. The neighbourhood is safe in general and we encountered no bad surprises! 
Pros: Frank and his team are really easy to find and very helpful. They provided everything we asked or at least they tried. The doormen are 24/7 and very helpful!
Cons: The apartment though had some issues. Firstly the jets don't work properly at the hot tub so its more like a small pool. One of two safes and the microwave were out of order. We had some difficulties to fix the right temperature of the water in the showers as well. When we visited there was noise coming from the renovation of the apartment just underneath ours so we had to wake up at 8 every day except weekends. Overall it was a satisfying experience.

Elisa and Frank were easy to get a hold of when our group of six had questions. Pros: Location, location, location! It's awesome and right on the beach with tons of places to eat and drink right around the corner! We were granted an early check-in and a late-check out. The view of the beach is fantastic and the lighting in the apartment is reminiscent of The Max from Saved By the Bell! Elisa, who helps you get the keys and communicates with you when you arrive in Rio, is welcoming and always reachable by (Hidden by Airbnb) . The doorman, Simão, is delightful and super friendly. We miss him already! 
Cons: This is advertised as a five star penthouse, however, we think it is more of a three star. Our group is all good with a three star, no problems...we have all stayed at a many Motel 6 before and hostels, but the advertising was not quite accurate. The space does not have the same furniture as pictured in the living room. We had previously contacted Frank about the "pool" because we saw prior guests write that it was not working. Frank assured us that it was, however, it did not work. Ivo, a maintenance man, came by twice to help and ultimately, it never worked. We felt bad, as it was not Ivo's fault and he also came by later because the second bathroom did not have hot water. Overall, we had a lovely time exploring Rio and we would have appreciated an honest representation of this space.

Sehr freundliche Betreuung. Perfekte Lage an der Copacabana. Das Penthouse war schön gross und gemütllich. Die Farbe vom Whirlpool blätterte ab und verstopfte den Abfluss. Lange Rede kürzer Sinn, dass Penthaouse ist zu empfhlen.

There was a problem with this place we booked a few days before we arrived, so we were relocated to a different apartment in Rio. The apartment we were relocated to was similar to this one, with a bigger balcony. The downside was that the place we stayed was less modern than this one listed. Also, air conditioning wasn't the greatest in some of the rooms.
But it was very spacious, and the beds were extremely comfortable. Location was excellent, right on Posto 5 of Copacabana Beach. Nice place to stay if you are looking for a great view, and wonderful jacuzzi.
The place was fabulous!!!  The location was awesome!!!  Had the best birthday ever!!!

Overall had not a great experience - arrived to the apartment not being cleaned and unfortunately the people who stayed prior were very disrespected so had to witness an absolutely disgusting site entering the apartment. We appreciated that there was mix up in what time thought would arrive host tried to resolve the issue but re locating us to another apartment however said we could stay at the new apartment  the whole time to then tell us a couple days later we had to go back to this original apartment which was frustrating purely because we only had 10 days and wanted it to be a relaxing not unpacking and packing numerous times.

Once back in this apartment we had issues with no hot water and no blankets left and all linen feeling quite unclean. The host was easily to contactable however and sent plumber and cleaner to help fix issues. Unfortunately not all were fixed but we decided not to ask for maintenance to come back after third time as felt bad. 

PROS: The location and views are amazing with everything close by and amazing doorman that despite not being able to speak much English still did their best to be always friendly and felt very safe with them their 24/7.

CONS: Not quite quality I expected for being advertised as penthouse with penthouse being quite small, linen felt very well worn, spa difficult to get hot enough to be enjoyable, and not being able to have hot shower most nights. 

Host was very lovely however and tried to fix all issues that we bought up. Would have been happy if didn't have such high expectations as thought with paying a lot for stay would mean high quality but think more just paying for location.
The host canceled this reservation 51 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

My partner and I decided to extend our stay in Rio and, last minute, booked this apartment. With it being so late, we were slightly nervous about what we were going to get, however, when we arrived we were extremely happy with our choice! The location was impeccable with one of the best views we have seen while being in Brazil, we really didn’t expect it to be so good! The apartment seems to have been refurbished and is extremely clean and well presented. We really would recommend this property to anyone looking for something special at great value for money.
Muy buen alojamiento, gran vista a toda la ciudad.

My friends and I had a fantastic stay!!! The best thing about this place is the VIEW and LOCATION! Frank was very accommodating and quick to respond, making checking-in smooth and stress free. We spent every night soaking in the jacuzzi. There was no issue with hot water, as I read in previous reviews. Security was awesome! There were 6 of us total, and we all agree that we will definitely return.

Lo mejor del departamento es la ubicacion y las vistas, tuvimos una excelente estadia, inmejorable para ir con amigos, al departamento le falta mantenimiento, pero si la idea es pasarla bien, esta es la mejor opcion, gracias Frank por todo.

Lugar muito bem localizado!!! Muito
Bom o local!! Vale a pena!!

My two friends and I had a great stay here! The view like everyone else has said is amazing. You can see both ends of Copacabana from the terrace. No issues with hot water...actually the water can get very hot if you are not careful. One of my friends used the hot tub and it was working great. The apartment is walking distance to several grocery stores, restaurants, ATM's, really anything that you may need. The doormen were great to us and very friendly. The apartment is great for groups of six people (three couples) or three individuals. The place is large and has plenty of space to feel comfortable. I recommend this apartment if you are wanting to stay close to Copacabana (Ipanema is not far either).
Tuvimos problemas en la recepción , no había nadie , esperamos más de 1 hora en la calle , el departamento con humedad y suciedad . Lo único bueno la ubicación
It was a nice penthouse with a beautiful view to the beach! I recomend it to everybody!

The area the property was in was perfect. We loved the location and the view. We did expect more from the apartment as it was quite expensive for us. The shower heads in the showers are terrible. We had water issues. A pipe broke which we can understand that nobody can predict but then when it has been fixed we still experienced pressure problems. I don't think one is supposed to take cold showers in super luxury apartments. In all the Airbnb apartments I have stayed there is normally a few welcoming coffees and a few small things. Nothing in this expensive luxury apartments. The ceiling fans are noisy so are the two fans in the bathrooms.
The place is ok. It pretty poorly appointed. There is better for the cost.

Apt super bem localizado, porém prédio antigo  como a maioria dos de Copacabana. Vista excelente , como sugestão eu melhoraria a qualidade dos utensílios da cozinha e na área externa ambientaria com uma decoração

This penthouse was recommended by a friend and I booked in the last 
minute.
Communication was quick with the manager as well with the check-in 
person. She already waited in the penthouse which we had previous (Hidden by Airbnb) contact 
We got a nice welcome. Internet connection, Tv, safe and filling in 
the warm water into the jacuzzi was well explained.
In the living room we have seen that a brand new sofa and table were 
installed. Cleaning was perfect!
The location is more than perfect and the view from the bedrooms and the 
living room is fantastic!
Sitting in the private pool looking over the whole Copacabana beach was a 
wonderful and unforgetable moment.
We definitivily come back to this penthouse soon.
Thanks Riosfinest team!

Oreste Carpi

Amazing stay!

The view is the best. The pool is wonderful. The whole apartment looked very clean and updated.

We had a great stay in this penthouse. And I nearly forgot... the check in person was also lovely, we will come back for sure.

name: Huge Brooklyn Loft in the Heart of Williamsburg!
summary: light scandinavian touch
space: The perfect NYC get-away! Our amazing place is directly in the heart of Williamsburg with tons of café's, restaurants, local shops, the park, L-train (4 min. to Union square) and the ferry to Manhattan, Dumbo and Governers Island! Williamsburg is a very vibrant neighborhood full of young artists. The space Huge artist loft in the heart of Williamsburg on N6 and Kent Ave. N6 is a great shopping, café and restaurant street. The apartment is fully equipped: - Kitchen w. stove and oven & Nespresso machine - Bedroom with French door into the living room  - Huge living room w. TV and kids play area (Sofa turns into queen size bed). - Bathroom w. overhead and handheld shower.  - Additional room (walking closet) with changing table for child.  - Alcove above kids area in living room with queen size bed. - Additional queen size mattress to place in living or bedroom in case you are 6 people. - L-train (N7 & Bedford) going straight to Union Square - East River ferry on N6 going to Wall street an

name: The Porto Concierge -  Lodeiro Country House
summary: Beautiful country house with swimming pool, fish pond, football field, river with boats and canoes, bicycles and loads of fun and things to do for a large family or group of friends!
space: It is a large country house with 5 bedrooms, 4 double beds and 2 twin beds. There is also sofa beds! There are also 4 complete bathrooms.
description: Beautiful country house with swimming pool, fish pond, football field, river with boats and canoes, bicycles and loads of fun and things to do for a large family or group of friends! It is a large country house with 5 bedrooms, 4 double beds and 2 twin beds. There is also sofa beds! There are also 4 complete bathrooms. Guests have access to all the amenities of the House and its premises. Very quiet and calm area, enjoy the nature! Only 30 minutes drive to and from Porto city! Accessible by highway!
neighborhood_overview: Very quiet and calm area, enjoy the nature!
transit: Only 30 minutes drive to and from Porto city! Accessible by highway!
access: Guests have access to all the amenities of the House and its premises.
house_rules: - Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment, only in the balcony when available or at the window-sill. Please leave all electric appliances turned off, make sure water taps are not running and close all doors and windows before check-out. We request that guests leave the dishes and the kitchen clean and empty out the trash, there is always a garbage deposit in the street nearby. The apartment is cleaned prior to each arrival. Please, keep the apartment tidy and clean as reasonably possible during all the time of your occupancy. If you require extra cleaning during your stay, please contact us - we will arrange it. PLEASE TAKE CARE of the decoration items, furniture, towels/linen and other apartment's equipment. Any doubts handling the apartment's appliances and equipment please call. The neighbours appreciate some peace and quiet as do our guest, please keep the noise level to a minimum between 22h and 8h. Use the place as if it were your own. Check out time is before 11h. If request

reviews.comments:
Propriété calme dans un lieu magnifique
Accueil chaleureux
Nombreuses activités possibles sur site (piscine, canoé, playground, etc.)
Recommandé pour des vacances en familles au calme

Très belle maison dans un environnement relaxant, parfait pour se détendre et très proche de Porto. Facile d'accessibilité. Tous les commerces sont à proximité (à peine 10 minutes) : poissonnerie, boulangerie, épicerie, supermarché, pharmacie, banque.
Les propriétaires sont charmants et il y a toujours le jardinier de disponible si besoin de renseignements ou autre.
Parfait pour des vacances en famille ou entre amis, et les enfants seront contents de pouvoir donner à manger aux poules et aux chèvres de la propriété qui se trouvent un peu plus bas, ce qui nous a permis également de profiter des oeufs frais des poules de la maison.
Vives recommandations pour cette belle demeure. Rapport qualité-prix super!
Alojamiento para una estancia agradable y con buena ubicación para visitar la zona norte de Portugal.

Amazing and unique Airbnb experience. I wholeheartedly recommend Camilo's country house. You should know that it is not only a house but also a huge private garden with all sorts of amazing things to discover. 

Here are just some of our unbelievable impressions and experiences from the stay:
- We made our own mojito from the private country house farm, where we picked lemons and mint leaves to mix with.
- We picked our own figs, grapes and other great-tasting fruits from around the garden whenever we felt like it.
- Private swimming pool with pool cleaning.
- Private football field, with locker rooms. Camilo even helped us find a pump for our football, and bought a new football for us.
- We found lots of cute animals walking around the garden, such as goats, chickens, ducks and mini-pigs.
- We went mountain-biking, with the excellent mountain bikes, to the top of the mountain which could be seen from the balcony, and the charming village on nearby. We also hiked/ran to the same mountain and discovered other breathtaking paths and sights.
- We went to the Merendas Park a short 7-minute drive away. There was an amazing gorge, river and suspension-bridge to explore.
- In the middle of our stay, Camilo's wife, and a housemaid, came to clean the house for us.
- Camilo and his family were all very nice and talkative, truly great Airbnb hosts.

We were thoroughly impressed, and our only point of improvement would be to supply better Wi-Fi/Internet, although this was not a problem because the mobile connection for our cell-phones was good enough. I'm sure Camilo will remedy this quickly though so I would not worry about this for another stay.

A+++ to this Airbnb listing from me and my family.

Eleven of us had a great family holiday in Camilo and Maria's house. The kids loved the pool, garden and especially the puppy who they wanted to bring home. Having pets living around the house is an added bonus on holiday!  Camilo and Maria have a lot of land surrounding the house which was being worked on while we were there and guests in the main house should expect to share the pool and grounds with other guests . The (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps locator is significantly inaccurate so be sure to contact the hosts for directions! Maria was very helpful and attentive and at the property on most days. It's a good base for the Douro Valley and close to the lovely city of Porto.

It’s a great villa but if you don’t have a car, you can’t get groceries. Also, there is a bungalow in the big garden, other people are staying there but you don’t really see them if they don’t want to use the swimmingpool.

It’s a great stay for 12 people! You can get your own lemons and mint to make refreshing drinks :) the man and woman come by every day, they are very friendly and willing to help with anything!
A lovely setting and very kind and helpful hosts.

+ the pool area
+ the view and landscape
+ very spacious house

- the house is very old, messy, dirty and it smells (especially
 kitchen and bathrooms). The owners didnt clean appropriately, e.g. the fridge was full of old food and was extremely dirty, also one of the bathrooms was super dirty with black hair all over and pee and poo in the toilet :( After we complained, they send somebody the next day to clean the house. However, we think its not acceptable at all and even after the cleaning we did not feel comfortable and didnt enjoy staying there and especially cooking in the kitchen, as all the facilities and gadgets are kind of dirty and smelly. 

- they told us the whole property is privately for ourselves, however, there was another couple making holidays in the wooden house. We never saw them but they were  allowed to use our pool as well. They didnt do it in the end, because we complained about it, but anyways thats not fair!

- the property is a building site: they are currently building 4 more bungalows on the property and nobody told us about it! During the week you can even hear it.

All in all due to these reasons we cannot recommend staying there and we would never come back.
Maison très belle avec un bon potentiel mais qui n'est pas exploité ! Dommage

Très belle maison dans un cadre magnifique, offrant de possibilités multiples d’activités (canoe, vtt, rando, foot...).
Seul bémol sur l’etat des équipements et la propreté de certaines pièces.
Cependant, cela n’entache en rien le séjour agréable que nous avons passé dans cette maison faite pour vivre à l’exterieur. 
Hôtes disponibles (puisque présents tous les jours ou presque dans le domaine).
Nous recommandons pour un groupe d’amis ou une famille nombreuse.

summary: 1 bedroom unit on the 8th floor of a 12 story building, good kitchen and bathroom space, views over the Alawai channel and mountains of Manoa from the private lanai. Relaxing apartment with big windows and doors, tile kitchen floor and carpet lounge area. Beach 15min walk, bus’s 2mim walk, the apartment is right in the hart of Waikiki, all shops and stores are really close. We do require 1 week minimum stay, parking is available if you have car @ $20 per day.

summary: Appartement charmant en plein centre de Porto! Dans le quartier, nous pouvons trouver tous les types de services: nombreux restaurants, supermarchés, cafés, pharmacie, boulangeries...etc.

Une cuisine toute équipée avec four, plaque à induction, réfrigérateur, couverts, lave et sèche linge, lave vaisselle, micro-ondes, etc. La salle de bain complète avec douche, savon et serviettes de toilette sont fournis. address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: This was a truly disappointing experience. After I made my reservation, Catia told me she had only made her apartment available by accident and that the date was not available. After some back and forth, Catia said she could do it, but it would be a late check-in. I was in a pinch, so I agreed (I had come to Porto from the US a few days earlier on a day's notice to take care of my parents who had gotten in a nasty car accident, and were in hospitals 2 hours apart - I had nowhere to stay that night, and I was figuring all of this out on my phone in a public space). Shortly after, Catia informed me that there wouldn't be wifi. I needed wifi to be in touch with hospitals and doctors in Portugal and back home, so this wouldn't work. Catia emailed again a little while later and assured me I could use wifi from the bakery downstairs, but that felt tenuous to me. I was alone, spending my days on trains and in hospitals, and really just needed a safe, dependable, no-surprises place to come home to; between the delayed check-in time, the wifi problem, and the multiple messages with changes, this didn't feel trustworthy. I decided to cancel, I politely told Catia, and she was very understanding. I went to the Airbnb app, and the system said I couldn't cancel, because the reservation had already been cancelled. I tried again - ironically because I wanted to leave a note affirming that Catia tried her best - but again, it didn't work. I figured Catia cancelled it herself, and I moved on to find a new place to stay. A week later, after returning home, I realized I had been charged for the reservation - the cancellation didn't go through somehow - and after some back and forth with Airbnb, it turns out that Catia refuses to refund me. It all makes me pretty sad, to be honest. The impression I got was that a series of accidents got in the way of this being a good place for me to stay, but I really thought Catia was well-intentioned and trying her best. Now it turns out that she doesn't really care about the impact of any of it, and just wants the money. It's clear that the apartment didn't meet the description, and I have emails between us where we agreed that the reservation would be cancelled, and I obviously didn't stay there in any case - but she still wants me to pay for it. Catia is saying that I didn't technically cancel, so she couldn't host anyone else. During the day we were going back and forth, she sent me more than a dozen messages - she couldn't send one more to ask me to follow through on the cancellation? Or just cancel it herself? And after Airbnb got in touch with her on my behalf to ask for the...

Apartamento muito bem localizado, perto de tudo. Ele é muito bem dividido em destaque para o banheiro que é uma delícia.  A Catia foi muito atenciosa em todos os momentos.  Agradecemos muito sua ajuda e indicações durante nossa estada.

L'appartement  est complètement neuf et propre, il n'y a rien à dire! Très bien situé avec à proximité commerces et transports en commun. Catia nous a aidé et conseillé avant et pendant le voyage, une de mes meilleures expériences AirBnB!
À relouer sans hésiter!!
Accesible a pie. El apartamento prácticamente nuevo, muy moderno, muy limpio y bien equipado. Lo único la televisión, que sólo tiene canales protugueses. Lo demás genial, repetiríamos sin duda.

Malgré le précédent commentaire négatif, nous avons décidé de tester cet airbnb et nous avons bien fait. Très simple d'accès en arrivant de l'aéroport, et donc pratique pour le départ aussi. Nous avons été accueillis par la maman de Catia, très gentille, ainsi que par Catia via (Hidden by Airbnb) . L'appartement paraît un tout petit peu plus petit que sur les photos mais c'est loin d'être dérangeant, il y a tout ce dont on a besoin. Le lit est très confortable. Le centre ville n'est vraiment pas très loin. Il y a un ventilateur pour les grandes chaleurs. Catia est super sympathique et nous a donné pleins de bonnes adresses à porto. Tout s'est bien déroulé. Nous avons passé un très bon weekend. Merci.
El apartamento es fantástico,tal y como se ve en las fotos, la ubicación es bastante buena y los anfitriones muy agradables. Lo peor el ruido del tráfico para dormir.
Apartamento centrico, limpio y muy bonito

La comunicación con Catia fue excelente desde un primer momento, y agradecemos su buena disposición. Aunque ella no nos recibió personalmente, su madre nos esperó hasta una hora tardía, tras la llegada de nuestro vuelo, y nos recibió y explicó todo con gran amabilidad y simpatía. El apartamento está bastante bien situado (aunque cuesta arriba), muy cerca de todos los lugares céntricos (Avenida de los Aliados, por ejemplo) y a un tiro de piedra de la estación de metro Trindade, con conexión directa con el aeropuerto y el resto de las líneas de metro. Todo es nuevo y bastante bien cuidado, aunque el espacio nos pareció algo más pequeño de lo que prometía en las fotografías (da para dos personas con equipaje) y el precio que pagamos un poco alto. El mayor problema para nosotros fue que, pese a los vidrios dobles de las amplias ventanas, al estar situado en una avenida con no poco tráfico, por las noches el ruido de los coches y motos que aceleran para subir la calle es bastante molesto para conciliar el sueño. Sin embargo, el colchón de la cama era nuevo y muy cómodo (algo poco usual en apartamentos de alquiler temporal). Aunque la televisión no funcionó durante los días que pasamos allí, parece que era un problema de la antena del edificio. Los demás electrodomésticos funcionaban perfectamente, al igual que el wi-fi. Por lo demás, en las inmediaciones encontramos cafés y un supermercado en un centro comercial cercano. Fue nuestro reducto durante nuestra visita a Oporto y ayudó a que disfrutáramos de la ciudad y a que queramos volver cuanto antes. Gracias Catia por tu amabilidad.

El apartamento era pequeño pero con todas las comodidades, igual que en las fotos, muy limpio. La ubicacion perfecta. Nos hemos sentido como en casa, no dudariamos en volver .Catia estuvo pendiente de todas las dudas que le pudiéramos plantear. El recibimiento muy bueno con unas botellitas de vino de oporto y unas pastas, todo estupendo

Gostámos muito do apartamento, super central!
A Cátia foi sempre super rápida a responder e a sua familia que foi quem nos recebeu foi muito atenciosa.
Excelente escolha!
We can really recommend this airnbnb. A clean and comfortable flat very close to the city center.

Très bel appartement, accueilli par les parents de catia très gentil. Catia donne plein de conseil pour visiter porto par message et est très disponible. L'appartement est pas loin du métro 5 minutes à pied, on entend un peu la rue mais lorsqu'on passe des journées à visiter et marcher pas de mal pour dormir dans cet appartement très propre et qui dispose de tous les équipements. Nous reviendrons sans soucis.

Ubicación perfecta, cerca del centro de Oporto y de toda la zona turística. Piso ideal para pasar un fin de semana en pareja. Los anfitriones, tanto Catia como sus padres, muy acogedores y simpáticos.

空港からのｱｸｾｽもよく､近くには徒歩圏内で行ける素晴らしいｽﾎﾟｯﾄがいくつもあります｡
またｵｰﾅｰのCatiaさんのご両親もおばあさんもとても陽気で親切で
素敵な家族でした｡
家電設備も充実していて何一つ不便はありません｡
Catiaさんはいつでもﾒｰﾙを素早く返信してくれました｡
とても親切で素敵な場所です｡

Très bon accueil 
Accès facile pour les transports et le centre ville

Notre séjour dans l'appartement de Catia fut très agréable : propre,  bien placé, il a répondu à nos attentes.
Quelques bémols : il n'y a pas de chauffage (on y a passé le nouvel an), l'appartement est un peu bruyant.
Catia est charmante et super disponible !

A 3 pendant 4 jours c'était très bien.
Great place, communication was also good. Would recommend.

Apartamento bien ubicado para hacer turismo por la ciudad. Muy limpio y estiloso. Tanto Catia como sus padres fueron muy amables antes, durante y despues de la estancia. Lo unico que puedo decir a mejorar es que podrian poner alguna repisa para poner las cosas en el baño.

Hemos estado un fin de semana. Muy limpio todo, espacio bien aprovechado y mucha flexibilidad con los horarios de llegada. Llegamos muy tarde el viernes y nos fuimos muy tarde el domingoy estuvo muy atenta y dando opciones. Está muy bien situado, muy céntrico. Volvería sin duda.

Como en un espacio pequeño sacarle tanto provecho y no falta de nada! Todos los Electrodomésticos. Limpio! Da gusto. Encima esta a 5 m de la estación de Trindade. Abajo tenéis la granja São Jorge para desayunos que es maravillosa y muy atentos. Volveremos seguro

Catia's apartment is well-located near Trinidade metro station in Porto, but for those who like to walk a city, the apartment is within walking distance of many of the popular sites and restaurants, etc. The apartment is very clean.
Anfritriões  nos receberam muito bem, com um atendimento que nos deixou satisfeito. A localização muito boa,  com metro próximo e ônibus. Limpeza execelente. Recomendamos
Amazing place to live in!
Excelente apartamento e localização!

name: Hawaii - West Oahu - 3-Bedroom Home
summary: Comfortable 3-bedroom air conditioned home on Oahu's West Coast.  Beach articles available to appreciate the gorgeous ocean coast located just blocks away.  Enjoy a full kitchen, 2 full bathrooms, washer/dryer, fenced in backyard, and patio with barbecue!     With 3 queen sized beds it accommodates 6 easily.     Do you have more guests - ask and we can add queen-sized air mattresses / a crib / or work out other sleeping arrangements.
space: See Oahu staying in a comfortable 3-bedroom air conditioned home.     With 3 queen-size beds, it comfortably sleeps six.   Beach articles are available to appreciate the gorgeous ocean coast located just blocks away.   Enjoy free WiFi internet, a full kitchen, 2 bathrooms, washer/dryer, fenced in backyard, and patio with barbecue!
