interaction: - Always available on the phone or in person for everything you might need and make your stay in Porto a pleasant trip :)  - Please contact for any additional info
house_rules: - Please don't make noise after 22:30, thank you:)

host.host_about:
We are passionate about traveling.

When we travel our goal is always to have a good time and bring back good memories, same applies to our guests, we always try to deliver the best experience possible.

At the moment we have various rooms available across two flats in the same building in the heart of Porto downtown, the location is excellent and we can guarantee a good time in Porto :)

reviews.comments:
L'appartement de Mario a été rénové récemment et est vraiment très propre et bien agencé, chaque chambre à sa propre salle de bain, la cuisine est bien équipée (avec un lave vaisselle). 
Il est un peu excentré mais accessible facilement avec le métro depuis l'aéroport. 
Mario était disponible et à même créé une petite application avec quelques places à visiter et bons restaurants et bars à tester.

Our stay was really great and Mario was an amazing guest! We arrived very late (around midnight) and he was waiting for us. He also told us about his app, with a suggestion of places to visit and a walking tour: really helpful and well done!
The apartment has been recently restructured and it has all the necessary comforts. It's really close to the metro station with a direct line from the airport, and you can reach the city center by walk in 10-20 min.
I think it's a great place to stay for visiting Porto!

Marios place is lovely, really spacious and open. We were really glad it was so convenient by transport from airport and to the bus station, huge bonus. The only challenge would be the noise on the busy street but we managed to sleep through it anyway. Nice place. We would come back for sure
Confortable, friendly and cozy
Great experience! Wonderful appartment and the Host Mario is really Nice! Place to be!

Mario's place is conveniently located next to a metro stop and is walking distance to the historic area of Porto.  I loved the neighborhood's mix of old buildings and small local bars and cafes, with a few gastronomic restaurants, Seattle style coffee shops and art studios scattered throughout.  It is obviously a neighborhood in transition.  The apartment is in an old building that was recently renovated in very nice taste. My room was spacious and beautiful, and the bed was very comfortable with hotel quality sheets.I thoughly enjoyed my stay.
Nice place, clean, good looking. Mario's app is useful and nice to use to discover Porto ! We'll definitely come back :)

The place looked amazing, had lot of room and light. It was about 10 minute walk to the old town and had a metro station right next to the house. Mario is really easy to talk to and responds quickly. 

 It is a perfect place to stay with a group of friends.

We loved our stay! 

Thank you Mario

Mario's place was nice, clean and decorated beautifully. it seems exactly like the pictures and our room was spacious enough. Something that bothered us a little was the noise from the outside (the house is at a central road ) and also kitchen is not full equipment.
Mario answered really quickly, he was helpful, kind and we would like to meet and as we only communicated via phone.
Muita obrigada.
Mario's place was so nice! It is in a quiet but perfect location. The house is awesome and perfectly clean and the access to the room was easy. 100% recommendable

Mario is nice host, he was very helpful with all his advices.
The apartment is top clean, central located, seems new renovated, and we liked there a lot.
I can Mario and his flat highly recommend!

Mario's apartment was easy to find, just across the road from the metro station. He was very welcoming and even showed us his own app- which was so helpful navigating the sights of Porto! The apartment was spacious and had everything you needed, our only complaint would be the beds and pillows could be more comfortable. Location wise being near the metro was handy, as despite the close-ish proximity to Porto's central sights, the hills can be exhausting!
Everything's gone fine. Very clean and large house. Pictures corrisponded perfectly to the reality. Mario was available and kind.

The apartment is layed out beautifully inside. The noise of the street was quite loud, even at night. We had to sleep with earplugs. Breakfast was at a coffee shop, easily accessible with metro but still 15min away. Mario responds quickly on the phone if questions. The apartment was clean and very close to a metro station or just a 15min walk to the centre of town.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Mario's flat is really neat and comfortable. It is at walking distance from the center and there's a metro station just down the building. Mario wasn't there in person but was always available on the phone and quick to respond. One downside is the noise from the street, which is pretty busy even at night.

L'appartamento si trova in una posizione tranquilla e poco caotica,leggermente distante dai principali luoghi di attrazione di Porto. Metro vicinissima che collega l'aeroporto con la casa(noi abbiamo solo camminato per ammirare questo gioiellino di città) così come a due passi la stazione degli autobus. La cucina è ben fornita e una sala pranzo luminosissima e ampia con cui conversare con gli altri guest della casa.
Sfortunatamente non ho incontrato Mario ma assicuro sulla sua disponibilità e immediatezza nel rispondere ai messaggi. Super disponibile.
Excellent newly renovated place with perfect location to porto train station, just two metro stops away. Very convenient idea with check in using key box with a passcode. I enjoyed the stay very much

Mario's place is a great location, steps from the metro and walking distance to most sights.  The place is sunny, comfortable, spacious and clean: definitely a great value.  If you are sensitive to street noise, you should know, it is just above an intersection, which is quite noisy, so pack your ear-plugs!
The appartment was great, very clean and well located. The comunication with Mario was easy. We've been so comfortable in his appartment!
Corresponde con el anuncio.

Mario's place is a stylish apartment near the city's main tourist attractions, it is also well situated in terms of its vicinity to public transport. Mario encouraged us to download his app: a tourist guide along the city, which proved to be helpful.
Muito eficiente o sistema adotado e tudo correu perfeitamente.

Wir haben diese Unterkunft sehr genossen, wenn auch nur kurz.
Super Beschreibung und dadurch gut zu finden bzw in die Wohnung zu kommen...super praktisch eingerichtet - alles Da, was man braucht...super sauber - top !!! Danke ;-)

Appartement magnifique. Juste à côté du centre. Esthétique, aéré et lumineux. La décoration est simple, épurée. Après une journée de découverte dans Porto on s'y sent bien. Le matelas est super confortable, on dort bien. Si vous avez le sommeil léger c'est mieux de prendre des boules quies. Mario est très gentil et a répondu à toutes nos questions! Petit déjeuner dans le bar est top.
Merci beaucoup, on a passé un super séjour :-)

Comoda e ampia stanza (per due più che abbondante!) in grande e bell' appartamento restaurato con cura nei particolari appositamente allo scopo di affittare le stanze, il che lo rende ideale e piacevole. Grande e bella l'area comune, con una cucina abitabile e ben attrezzata. Bagno funzionale, privato ma separato dalla camera dal corridoio della casa; peccato per uno sgradevole odore di scarico proveniente (credo) dalla doccia. Biancheria lavata e pulita, ma con aloni e qualche piccola macchia: se non fosse bianca nemmeno si vedrebbero, ma dato che lo è... si vedono!
Mario ottimo host, sempre presente, disponibile e ben organizzato, niente da dire!  
Nel complesso, se si vuole girare la città, più che consigliato!! Sì è sul lato est del centro, ad un passo dalla fermata della metro, che spesso si può non usare se si è disposti a camminare 10 minuti in più.
Muy bien explicado cómo llegar a su cas y cómo recoger las llaves! La casa está limpia, tambien la habitación. Muy recomendable!
Very clean and professional place. beautiful flat.

La habitación es preciosa y amplia. Mario ha sido un anfitrión fantástico y aunque no lo conocimos en persona  estado siempre pendiente.  La zona es tranquila pero céntrica. Por poner un defecto, no hay armario en la habitación,  aunque sí un espejo con perchas y espacio para colgar ripa.

It's a lovely renovated house, close to the city centre, with a subway station nearby.  Mario was a great host, very thoughtfull! It's a great place to stay if you're looking to explore life in oPorto.

Al llegar nos faltaba ropa de cama,ya que otros huéspedes se habían tomado el atrevimiento de entrar en nuestra habitación. 
A la hora de abandonar el piso,nos obligaron a dejar el alojamiento mediante tres llamadas,en porto caía el diluvio y nos dieron la posibilidad de dejar allí las maletas.
Mario además de airbnb  tiene otro negocio para dejar las maletas por  2,50...
A informação de que não há  elevador, deveria estar explícita.

Nicely located, modern and brilliantly clean space - the room and en suite were like a hotel! Solid inside knowledge from a very helpful host on the best places to visit in this beautiful city. Thanks heaps!
Everything went well 5 stars

Emplacement idéal pour tous ceux qui doivent rejoindre l'aéroport ou la gare des bus. 
Appartement spacieux, propre, fonctionnel.
Système de remise des clefs très efficace.
Flexible and helpful. Very good honor

O apartamento é ótimo, limpo e confortável. A localização é ótima, perto de supermercados, a uma pequena caminhada das atrações, em frente ao metro que dá acesso direto ao aeroporto. Mario deixou um mapa muito legal com dicas de roteiros. Não conhecemos o Mario, mas tudo correu bem na hospedagem. Recomendo.

Quarto grande e muito agradável numa casa maravilhosa, espaçosa e cheia de luz. No entanto, as janelas não fechavam completamente, e apesar do aquecedor, estava um bocado frio. De resto, tudo bom. Bom valor pelo preço.

It’s ok to stay couple of days, but if you want privacy in apartment it might be a problem because there is a 4 rooms with diferent people, and you must share living room and bathroom with others. And its very cold inside.
Fue genial la habitación Mario es muy atento a la llegada y comparte información que da buenos tips para conocer Oporto. Recomiendo este lugar, algo más por decir es que la cama es muy cómoda.

Ótimo Airbnb para casais e grupos de amigos! O imóvel está muito próximo ao metro e a restaurantes locais, além de contar com uma ótima infra-estrutura. O Mario foi muito solicito e respondeu todas as mensagens prontamente.

Mario was really understanding about check in and check out times. He helped us about anything we asked. The flat is so comfortable and well decorated. We haven’t met Mario, but I really recommend his apartment!

Seconda volta per me con Airbnb, a differenza dell'altra non ho avuto il piacere di conoscere l'host ma rimane sempre disponibile via telefono. Appartamento e stanze molto moderni e con tutti i comfort necessari (attenzione: in Portogallo non hanno il riscaldamento, ma è fornita una stufetta per riscaldare la stanza). Molto comodo il metodo di check-in e check-out in quanto si deve solo depositare la chiave. Molto consigliato anche per la posizione!
Large and stylish apartment. Good location for exploring of Porto but very noisy (earplugs are required). Otherwise, everything was realy fine.
Esta céntrico, relación calidad precio muy bueno.
Great value for money. Check in was really easy and Mario was really flexible with our check-in process.
Nossa estadia foi ótima, bairro próximo ao centro, ótimas acomodações, local muito limpo. Adoramos!!!

We really enjoyed our stay in Mario’s apartment. The apartment is very clean, large and bright. Mario instantly replied any questions we had and offered his help. The apartment is further very good connected to public transport. The centre of porto is reachable within 5 to 10 minutes by foot.

Muy eficaz y práctica la entrega de las llaves, así se permite tener plena libertad de hora de llegada. Preciosa habitación muy amplia y luminosa. He tenido un poco de frío al llegar pero mejoró con la pequeña estufa eléctrica. El ruido de la calle me despertó muy temprano pero la verdad, qué más se puede pedir a este precio tan económico!! En conclusión una muy buena relación calidad precio! Gracias Mario! Volveremos!!

Todo perfecto, buena comunicación con Mario que nos ayudó a resolver todas las dudas que teníamos sobre Oporto, La señora de la limpieza muy amable y siempre dispuesta a ayudarnos, muy buena experiencia, nos gusta bastante caminar para conocer los rincones de las ciudades y esta ubicación nos ha venido muy bien para desplazarnos andando por la ciudad.
The room was a bit cold but it was in a great neighborhood and walkable to the tourist areas.

Very nice apartment with cute details especially in the living room! The offered breakfast was next to the sightseeing point ‚Capela das Almas’ and a good start for a day in Porto. Thanks for having us :)

We stayed with Mario for three nights. It was very easy to get to the station from the airport by metro, as the train station (Campo 24 de Agosto) is right next to the house. Checking in is very easy and uncomplicated. 
The room is bright and modern. The private bathroom is located on the opposite side of the corridor. The kitchen is fully equipped, e. g. with fridge, freezer, dishwasher, fridge, etc. We kept some drinks and fruit in the fridge. 
The city centre and the river are only a few minutes' walk away. We rented bicycles for four days, which was a little bit unnecessary because everything can be reached either on foot or by metro. Nevertheless, we enjoyed a day trip by bike to the beach along the river. One trip took about 45 minutes. 
We appreciated Mario's quick reactions and his helpfulness. We would stay at Mario's place again.
방이랑 화장실이 매우 깔끔한 숙소입니다.  체크인시간 전에는 청소하는 시간이기 때문에 시간은 지켜주는게 좋은데 체크인전에 짐만 놓을 수는 있습니다. 엘리베이터가 없지만 2층이라서 캐리어를 옮기는데 큰 어려움은 없었습니다. Marco는 매우 친절했습니다.  직접 만든 포르투여행어플도 있었습니다.:)
非常好~It’s a good place

I'm happy that I made this choise, it is beautiful and well localised appartment. It was easy to get there from the airport (by metro), close to the old city (by foot); next to the terminal for longdistance buses (so you can visit other cities in Portugal). I had separate room with bathroom in fornt of it, there is a shared space like living room and kitchen, wher you can meet other people and have an interesting conversation. I really like this place. In addition Mario is very kind and helpfull.

Mario is a really nice landlord and we communicate well! The room is really tidy! And it's really convenient because it's near the metro station. What surprises me most is that it's even close to the coach station !!
El apartamento es igual (o incluso mejor) que en las imágenes. Está muy bien ubicado, hay aparcamiento gratuito al lado y además el contacto con Mario fue muy fácil y rápido. Repetiríamos sin duda!
Really nice, clean and modern apartment. Great communication with the owner. The top was his application with Porto ´ s map and tips what to see.    Recommend this accomodation!

Bright, spacious and stylish room (and the whole place really). If all old houses were refurbished like this, I would love to live in one. Good location and the custom map with tips was a great touch. Everything lived up to our expectations, except for two small things. I definitely recommend this place, just keep in mind: the windows are not really sound-proof so in the morning, when the cars start roaming the streets, you will hear them. The private bathroom is not within the room, but across a corridor. Quite close but not as private as if it was inside. Great value!

Appartement très agréable. Fidèle aux photos. Accès facile. Station de métro à côté, au pied des commodités. 
Logement un peu bruyant mais on s´y fait. 

Mario est joignable et très réactif et ce soucis du confort de ses hôtes. 

Je conseil ce logement.

Our stayed in this room was amazing. We had a great time exploring Porto. Although we didn’t met Mario his local tips and map were very helpful. The check-in is very flexible since you get a code to get into the apartment. We would definitely recommend this place!

Loved the architecture of a curved building and walls, the spacious room, the easy to use kitchen, lots of communication when I needed it. There was a plumbing seal problem with the shower that meant water spraying around...easily fixed. Appreciated the few extra touches such as tea bags, espresso coffee capsules (that i didnt know how to use!). Only problem was the traffic noise as I didnt realise I was obove a rountabour of 5 main street intersections...luckily the Portugese are not early risers otherwise fun to people watch....beautiful accomodation.

Great apartment with a cool, funky layout. Mario makes sure you're set to enjoy the city with a cool map he designed showing some good spots to go. The place was clean, and check-in was super easy. Mario communicated well and in a timely manner, even with our last minute check-in. We could hear road noise from our room (mostly the relentless high pitch of the pedestrian crossings), but we drowned it out with white noise (rainfall soundtrack on Spotify). Took up Mario's offer on breakfast. It includes coffee, a cold drink and bread with butter and jam. Not much food, but it's cheap!

Parking: our only real complaint. It was super easy and right in front of the apartment on the street, BUT our car was broken into overnight :/ Not really anything you can do about it, but it was still a huge bummer considering the street looks safe.
Had a great overnight stay, thanks
Óptimo local
Excellent space, cozy and bright room. The check in was very practical and the location is great. Very close to metro and bus station. I recommend!
All good, interesting flat and being able to enter the flat with a code was very handy and no waiting around for someone to meet. Thanks Mario

Lo más importante y que yo no entendí al reservar, es que se trata de un apartamento compartido! Alquilas una habitación y te encuentras con desconocidos por el pasillo... El apartamento es amplio y luminoso (aunque carece de estores o cortinas y las persianas tenían que estar casi todas bajadas para protegernos del sol). No dispone de TV pero sí de equipo de música. La cocina es sencilla pero completa, suficiente para una estancia breve. Dispone de lavavajillas y microondas. La habitación 3 es muy amplia aunque falta de armario. El baño está en el pasillo, con lo cual no es un baño privado. Además tiene un grave problema de cañerías, el olor es nauseabundo y estaba lleno de insectos. También es importante recalcar que tiene dos tramos largos de escaleras, por lo que no es accesible a todo el mundo. Por lo demás el piso está bien y la atención fue buena. Una vez que sabes que es un piso compartido las expectativas cambian. Aunque es imperativo que solucionen el problema de las cañerías urgentemente.
Perfect

Mario responde rápido a los mensajes, nos facilitó el check in y el apartamento estaba limpio, muy amplio y muy luminoso. 
Además nos facilitó una aplicación para hacer turismo en oporto, el apartamento se encuentra en el centro
vi fik ikke et privat badeværelse, som vi havde betalt - ej heller søvn om natten pga støj fra gaden. Der var tillige uhensigtsmæssig kommunikation med udlejer.

nice appartment in a good location, everything you need nearby (1min walk to metro, 4 min walk to LIDL supermarket), helpful host. right beside a street and windows are not closing very well, so it can get quite loud at night. try the very good breakfast :)

L appartement est très beau idéalement situé à côté du métro qui nous a permis d arriver directement de l aéroport et d aller où on veut .
Juste un peu de bruit à cause de travaux et de la circulation.

Chambre très spatieuse accessible facilement en métro. Appartement très joli propre et agréable. Cuisine fonctionnelle au top. Un peu bruyant car rue très passante à côté mais cela ne nous a posé aucun problème ! Super séjour ! Je recommande vivement !
It was a pleasure to stay at Mario’s place. Really clean and great communication with the friendly Mario.

Die Wohnung ist zentral gelegen, insbesondere wenn man vom Flughafen an- bzw abreist liegt die Wohnung super, da eine U Bahn im der Nähe hält. Auch in die Stadtmitte sind es nur 10-15 Minuten zu Fuss. Allerdings geht die zentrale sehr gute Lage teilweise zu Lasten der Lautstärke, da die Wohnung entsprechend an einer befahrenen Strassenkreuzung liegt.
 
Ansonsten ist die Wohnung sehr schön eingerichtet, ich hatte nur ein Problem mit der Türklinke in meinem Zimmer, da diese nicht (mehr) durch Schrauben fixiert war und sie sich entsprechend nur schwer von innen abschließen ließ. Von aussen war es kein Problem. Dieses Problem sollte aber mittlerweile behoben sein. Mit dem Schlüssel per Schlüsseltresor und Code hat es problemlos geklappt.

Kann das Appartement empfehlen.
Good location, good communication...Clean and nice place with everything you need.

체크인이 굉장히 편리했어요. 방 5개 정도 있는 아파트형식이고 호스트는 같이 머물지 않습니다. 주방 작지만 알차게 다 있고 화장실 깨끗하고 방도 넓었어요. 창이 넓어 해도 잘 들어요. 거실도 굉장히 넓게 잘 꾸며놨네요. 레데 버스 터미널에서 불과 5분 거리! 리스본에서 포르투 도착해서 바로 짐 놓고 쉬니까 좋더라구요. 상벤투 역에서도 멀지 않고 강가쪽 관광지도 도보 30분 정도면 이동 가능하니 위치적으로 최고오! ㅠㅠ 더 묵고 싶어도 방이 없어서 아쉬웠던 숙소입니다

Très bien situé pour visiter Porto.
Beaucoup de circulation devant l'édifice, donc bruyant.

Merci Mario ! 

Bernard
The whole flat is really cozy and beautiful! We enjoyed our stay :)

It is a very modern and clean apartment, only a little bit noisy.
Mario is very friendly!
Bien situé près du métro logement propre et spacieux. rien à redire. Je recommande.
Good place for visiting the city and good price, but a little bit noisy and surely not clean.

Rapport qualite-prix très bien
Séjour super agréable et appartement tout a fait bien placé. Tout près du métro et direct de l'aéroport .
Appartement très clair mais bruyant.
Merci Mario !
위치는 공항에서 한번에 올수있는 위치에있으며, 센터까지는 걸어서 20분정도 걸립니다. 이정도 숙소에 이정도 가격이면 굉장히 좋았습니다.

Buena ubicación por el centro y bien conectada con el
Metro.
Habitación amplía y baño minimalista.
Buena relación calidad precio.

Boa comunicação 
Valor para qual é servido
Recomendo se não importa de ter wc partilhado.

Para além de todo o incómodo no check-in e de não termos ficado no alojamento que efectivamente marcámos, houve ainda problemas de sonorização e climatização.
Os tubos de saneamento que passam no interior do alojamento, vindos de pisos superiores, produzem imenso barulho cada vez que há descargas.
A climatização é fraca e desadequada o que tornou o espaço frio e desconfortável. 
Um termoventilador deve ser usado numa instalação sanitária e não num quarto/sala. Por não poder estar ligado durante um longo período tivemos imenso frio durante a noite. 
Também a roupa de cama, nomeadamente o edredão, não era de todo adequada à estação do ano. 
Na instalação sanitária não havia nenhum tapete de chão/saída de duche nem qualquer gel de banho/shampo. Apenas sabão de mãos. 
Mínimo dos mínimos. 
Boa localização, no entanto difícil de estacionar e descarregar bagagem. 
Medíocre. Não voltaremos a marcar!

Great and smooth communication, easy hassle-free self checkin, and a convenient location. I would recommend this place if you need a place in Porto. We didn't see Mario, but he's quick to respond to all your questions.

name: Room in Duplex, 5 minutes from beach.
summary: Our house is a big renewed, duplex apartment, with big bedrooms and living room.  The house is located in a relaxed area of Leça de Palmeira, 5-10 minutes walk from the beach, 20 min walk to a big shopping mall, and of course really close to Porto. Bus stop to city centre, and lots of free parking spots are just by the entrance of the building. We also have two friendly dogs and a cat that wont bother you at all, but are always well come to play with you.
space: Our apartment is a 3 bedroom duplex with garden.   In the first floor, we have a big living room, Kitchen and a toilet. The kitchen is open space and all equipped with new devices and furniture. The living room has access to our private small garden which has BBQ and furniture. Guests are more than well come to use all of this space.  In the second floor there are the 3 bedrooms. We are renting only one of the rooms. There is a private bathroom for our guests which is right outside their bedroom. The neighbourhood is safe, calm and family style. We can have a nice walk late evening around the house and by the beach and all we can see is families with their children and dogs. Also, there is a beautiful and known wooden path by the beach that attracts many locals and tourists. This path goes for Kms, all by the sea, perfect to have a nice afternoon walk. And along the way there are bars and coffee places for the ones that want to stay and enjoy the sunset. As we are 5 min away from the b
description: Our house is a big renewed, duplex apartment, with big bedrooms and living room.  The house is located in a relaxed area of Leça de Palmeira, 5-10 minutes walk from the beach, 20 min walk to a big shopping mall, and of course really close to Porto. Bus stop to city centre, and lots of free parking spots are just by the entrance of the building. We also have two friendly dogs and a cat that wont bother you at all, but are always well come to play with you. Our apartment is a 3 bedroom duplex with garden.   In the first floor, we have a big living room, Kitchen and a toilet. The kitchen is open space and all equipped with new devices and furniture. The living room has access to our private small garden which has BBQ and furniture. Guests are more than well come to use all of this space.  In the second floor there are the 3 bedrooms. We are renting only one of the rooms. There is a private bathroom for our guests which is right outside their bedroom. The neighbourhood is safe, calm and fa
access: The common places of the house including the living room, kitchen, garden, and the extra toilet are all available to our guests.  If you are traveling with your car, you can park easily at the entrance of the building, but still you can use the garage if you prefer.
house_rules: The guests need to be animal lovers.

host.host_location: Povoa de Varzim, Porto District, Portugal
host.host_about: We are Jorge and Shilan, Portuguese and Iranian couple leaving in Leça da Palmeira, Porto. Each of us owns a startup, Shilan has a Neurofeedback Clinic and Jorge a SaaS company. We are kind addicted to our companies, we love movies, playing padel and eating :)

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Jorge and Shilan were lovely to deal with. They have an absolutely beautiful home, well above expectation and amazing value for money. I strongly recommend it to anyone staying in the area! Their pets are nice to handle, very low profile and no trouble at all! Thank you so much for sharing your gorgeous home with us!

Lovely people, beautiful house,  amazing amenities,  very good / excellent location (depends of what you want: away from the center of Porto,  but close to the main Fish Market and very, very popular street with the fish restaurants in Matosinhos. And if the weather is hot -  it is very close to the seaside and the swimming pool with water from ocean.) We highly recommend this house :) V&E

Me and my husband loved staying with Shilan and Jorge, they are super friendly and nice people. It was really amazing. The place is near a beautiful beach, with the most incredible sunset. I definitely recommend it!

What a lovely place- we checked in for 2 nights and our hosts were so warm and welcoming. We had such inspiring conversations - it was definitely one of the best Airbnb experiences we have ever had. We are looking forward to come back or meet them at our home in Germany ;)

Wow we really enjoyed staying at Shilan & Jorge's beautiful place. They were very welcome, even we go invited for a delicious dinner, Thank you guys. Very cozy flat, we felted a home, wonderful couple and we strongly recommend to anyone visiting Porto.

Shilan and Jorge were great and the place is amazing! It is at a great location, especially if your are coming from the airport, the apartment is very well equipped, clean and the dogs are great:)  Getting to the city is not a  problem, you can take the bus or an Uber. We also received a very warm welcome from the hosts even though we arrived practically in the middle of the night. Highly recommended!!!
We had a nice stay in the place and enjoyed the spacious apartment.
Hospitalidade muito boa. Acomodações excelentes e são bastante educados e simpáticos.
Lovely place to stay in Porto. Only few mins walk to the beach. Very cozy and clean. Would definitely come back for another visit!
The host canceled this reservation 56 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The house is in the best part of Porto. We came late from airport and were so happy it took us just 10 minutes. To city center it is like 15-30 minutes, we drove our car but you can try cheap Uber or buses (bus stop is in front of house). We enjoyed beach which is really few minutes walk. There is lot of coffee, bars, restaurants around (5-10minutes far). But we were so happy at home as well. The house is so clean and pretty after reconstruction. Shilan and Jorge are really good company :) they are working a lot so if you prefere be alone, you can relax at nice living room, garden or wherever, they are usually all day long away.
Nous avons passé seulement une nuit pour notre vol le lendemain et c’est bien dommage car nous avons été bien reçu. On se sent comme à la maison
About 5 min walk from the beach, friendly people, clean house. The dogs are used to people and nice.
casa di una pulizia assoluta.Con mille elettrodomestoci.giardino con due cani adorabili ed educatissimi.Tutto molto moderno e confortevole.geroge e shilan due persone cool e gentilissime.
I can only recommend this place. Shilan and Jorge provide a great room and a bathroom in a beautiful house, quiet and clean. They were very nice and available.   And their pets too!
Agréable séjour et magnifique maison . Une grande attention .

Shilan & Jorges apartment is very nice and clean and within walking distance you are at the beach. During our stay we just met Jorge and he was a very friendly host. We really liked to stay their. The two dogs are very cute and you can easily play with them. We recommend to stay their.
los anfitriones muy educados agradables y simpáticos. la casa genial y muy limpia. las mascotas son entrañables y super bien educadas. lo recomiendo 100%.

Great location if you need to have access to Exponor. Very confortable bed and lovely fresh towels. Thank you Shilan and Jorge for letting me use the bike! It made my commute to the fair and to the beach a fabulouse experience

I can't say enough about these hosts and this house! The hosts were so responsive and very easy to get ahold of about everything. Right from booking it was quick and easy. They are so sweet and really do go above a beyond what an airbnb host would be expected to do. Besides a little misunderstanding on my hectic check in day (not hectic because of them, just in general) they were very easy to get ahold of and made sure I had everything I needed at all times. They have WAY more available for use than any other airbnb I've stayed at and they are so kind to let you use everything in their house. Even your private bathroom comes stocked with literally everything, even more than I would have in my own house. The place is so clean and welcoming and stylish. It is VERY close to the restaurants and beach area and the area is very safe and quiet... a nice break from the city centres for sure. I had a GREAT stay and would absolutely recommend anyone looking to visit this beach area to stay here. The hosts are wonderful and sweet and the place is incredible.
très bon sejour dans un duplex de qualité

Impecável. Foi uma estadia perfeita, sem nenhum tipo de problemas. O quarto é confortável e possui bastante espaço e ventilação. O banheiro também é espaçoso e o ambiente todo é muito limpo. Me deram liberdade para utilizar a cozinha e foram sempre muito gentis e solícitos. Ademais, foi um prazer conhecer o Jorge e a Shilan, fui muito bem recebido em Portugal e fiquei muito feliz em me hospedar com eles. Obrigado e espero vê-los em breve novamente.
